GS24jvkasipu:7: atha sabda-anuśāsanam keṣāṃ śabdānām? laukikānāṃ vaidikānāṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:13: a iu ityanena krameṇa varṇān-upadiśyānte ṇakāramitaṃ karoti pratyāhārārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:14: tasya grahaṇaṃ bhavaty ekenauran rapraḥ (*1,1.51) ityakāreṇa /
GS24jvkasipu:17: teṣāṃ sāvarṇya-prasiddhy-artham akāra iha śāstre vivṛtaḥ pratijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:18: tasya prayoga-arthama a(*8,4.68) iti śāstra-ante pratyāpattiḥ kariṣyate //
GS24jvkasipu:20: ṛ ḷ ity etau varṇāv updiśya pūrvāṃś ca-ante kakāramitaṃ karoti pratyāhāra-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:25: akāra-ādayo varṇāḥ pracura-prayoga-viṣayāsteṣāṃ sujñānam upadeśe prayojanam /
GS24jvkasipu:27: kḷpeś ca pūrvatra-asiddham (*8,2.1) iti latvam asiddham /
GS24jvkasipu:28: tasya-asiddhatvād ṛkāra eva ackāryāṇi bhaviṣyanti iti kim-artham ḷkāra
GS24jvkasipu:29: upadiśyate? latva-vidhānād yāni parāṇy ackāryāṇi tāni ḷkāre yathā syur iti /
GS24jvkasipu:32: yac ca-aśaktijam asādhu śabda-rupaṃ, tad-anukaraṇasya-api sādhutvam iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:34: ṛtakaḥ iti prayoktavye śakti-vaikalyāt kumārī ḷtakaḥ iti prayuṅkte,
GS24jvkasipu:37: e oity etau varṇāv upadiśya ante ṅkāramitam karoti pratyāhāra-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:41: ai au ity etau varṇāv upadiśya pūrvāṃś ca-ante cakāramitaṃ karoti pratyāhāra-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:44: ica ekāco 'm pratyayavac ca (*6,3.68) iti ikāreṇa /
GS24jvkasipu:49: varṇeṣu ye varṇa-ikadeśā varṇa-antara-samāna-akṛtayasteṣu tat-kāryaṃ na
GS24jvkasipu:50: bhavati, tac-chāyāmukāriṇo hi te na punas ta eva /
GS24jvkasipu:60: ha ya va ra ity etān varṇān upadiśya pūrvāṃś ca-ante ṭakāramitaṃ karoti pratyāhāra-artham
GS24jvkasipu:64: tasya yar-grahaṇena yay-grahaṇena ca grahaṇe sati, svarnayati,
GS24jvkasipu:65: prātarnayati ity atra yaro 'nunāsike 'nunāsiko vā (*8,4.58) iti anunāsikaḥ prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:66: madra-hradaḥ, bhadra-hrada ity atra dvirvacanaṃ prāpnoti aco ra-hā-bhyāṃ
GS24jvkasipu:68: kuṇḍaṃ rathena, vanaṃ rathena ity atra anusvārasya yayi
GS24jvkasipu:71: ākṛtau pada-arthe samudāye sakṛl-lakṣye lakṣaṇaṃ pravartate ity etasmin darśane yaro 'nunasike 'nunāsiko vā (*8,4.45) antaratamo bhavati ity evam etat pravarttate /
GS24jvkasipu:72: tad-anena gakāra-ādīnāṃ ṅakārā-adayo ye yathā-svaṃ sthānato guṇataś ca
GS24jvkasipu:74: ye tu na sthānataḥ, na api guṇataḥ, sthāna-mātreṇa guṇa-mātreṇa vā antaratamās te sarve nivartitāḥ iti sthāna-mātra-antaratamo rephasya ṇakāro na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:75: dvirvacane 'pi rephasya yar-antarbhāve sati yarkāryaṃ prāptam, tat
GS24jvkasipu:76: sākṣāc-chiṣṭena nimitta-bhāvena bādhyate iti na dvirucyate rephaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:77: anusvārasya yayi parasavarṇaḥ (*8,4.58) ity etad apy anusvāra-antaratamaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:79: na ca rephasya anusvāra-antaratamaḥ savarṇo 'sti iti na bhaviṣyati kuṇḍaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:81: aṭāṃ madye visarjanīya-jihvāmūlīya-upadhmānīyānām apy upadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:84: atra aḍ-vyavāye iti ṇatvaṃ yathā syāt iti //
GS24jvkasipu:86: la ity ekaṃ varṇam upadiśya pūrvāṃś ca-ante ṇakāramitaṃ karoti pratyāhāra-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:92: aṇ-grahaṇāni tu pūrveṇa, aṇ-udit-savarṇasya ca-apratyayaḥ (*1,1.69) ity
GS24jvkasipu:94: atha kim artham ajgrahaṇam eva-itan-na kriyate? na-ivaṃ śakyam,
GS24jvkasipu:95: antaḥ-sthānām api hi savarṇānāṃ grahaṇam iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:96: sayaṃ, yaṃ, yantā, savaṃ, vaṃ vatsarah, yalaṃ, laṃ, lokam, tallaṃ,laṃ,
GS24jvkasipu:97: lokam ity atra anusvārasya anunāsike yayi parasavarṇe kṛte tasya
GS24jvkasipu:98: yar-grahaṇena grahaṇād dvirvacanaṃ yathā syād iti /
GS24jvkasipu:100: lakāre tv-anunāsikaḥ pratijñāyate, tena ur-aṇ raparaḥ (*1,1.51) ity atra ra iti pratyāhāra-grahaṇāl-laparatvam api bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:102: ña ma ṅa ṇa na ity etān varṇān upadiśya pūrvāṃś ca-ante makāramitaṃ karoti pratyāhāra-artham
GS24jvkasipu:105: halo yamāṃ yami lopaḥ (*8,4.64) iti yakāreṇa /
GS24jvkasipu:106: ṅamo hrasvād-aci ṅamuṇ nityam (*8,3.32) iti ṅakāreṇa /
GS24jvkasipu:108: kecit-tu sarvāṇy-etāni pratyāhāra-grahaṇāni ñakāreṇa bhavantu iti makāram anubandhaṃ pratyācakṣate
GS24jvkasipu:109: tathā ca sati ṅamo hrasva-adaci ṅamuṇ nityam(*8,3.32) ity atra-āgaminoḥ
GS24jvkasipu:112: jha bha ity etau varṇāv-upadiśya pūrvāṃś ca-ante ñakārāmitaṃ karoti pratyāhāra-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:116: gha ḍha dha ity etān varṇān upadiśya pūrvāṃś ca-ante ṣakāramitaṃ karoti pratyāhāra-artham
GS24jvkasipu:118: eka-aco baśo bhaṣ jhaṣ-antasya s-dhvoḥ (*8,2.37) iti bhakāra-jhakārābhyām
GS24jvkasipu:119: ja ba ga ḍa da ś /
GS24jvkasipu:120: ja ba ga ḍa da ity etān varṇān upadiśya pūrvāṃś ca-ante śakāramitaṃ karoti pratyāhāra-artham
GS24jvkasipu:122: bho-bhago-agho-apūrvasya yo 'śi (*8,3.17) ity akāreṇa haśi ca (*6,1.114)
GS24jvkasipu:126: eka-aco vaśo bhaṣ jhaṣ-antasya s-dhv-oḥ (*8,2.37) iti bakāreṇa //
GS24jvkasipu:127: kha pha dha ḍha tha ca ṭa ta v /
GS24jvkasipu:128: kha pha dha ḍha tha ca ṭa ta ity etān varṇān upadiśyānte vakāramitaṃ karoti pratyāhāra-artham
GS24jvkasipu:133: ka pa ity etau varṇāv upadiśya pūrvāṃś ca-ante yakāramitaṃ karoti pratyāhāra-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:136: maya uño vo vā (*8,3.33) iti makāreṇa /
GS24jvkasipu:140: śa ṣa sa ity enān varṇān upadiśya pūrvāṃś ca-ante rephamitam karoti pratyāhāra-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:148: ha ity ekaṃ varṇam upadiśya pūrvāṃś ca-ante lakāramitam karoti pratyāhāra-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:153: ralo v-y-upadhad-dhal-ādeḥ saṃś ca (*1,2.26) iti repheṇa /
GS24jvkasipu:155: śala ig-upadhād aniṭaḥ kṣaḥ (*3,1.45) iti śakāreṇa /
GS24jvkasipu:156: atha kim artham upadiṣṭo 'pi hakāraḥ punar upadiśyate? kittva vikalpa-kṣa-
GS24jvkasipu:158: snihitvā, snehitvā ity atra ralo v-y-upadhād-dhal-ādeḥ saṃś-ca (*1,2.26)
GS24jvkasipu:160: liheḥ alikṣat iti śala ig-upadhād aniṭaḥ kṣaḥ (*3,1.45) iti kṣo yathā syāt
GS24jvkasipu:161: rudihi, svapihi iti valādi-lakṣaṇa iḍ yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:163: jhalgrahaṇeṣu ca hakārasya grahaṇaṃ yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:164: yady evam, ha ya va ra ḍ ity atra tarhi kim artham upadiśyat? mahāṃ hi saḥ; devā hasanti ity atra aḍ-grahaṇeṣu ca aś-grahaṇeṣuca hakārasya grahaṇaṃ yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:165: brāhmaṇo hasati - haśi ca (*6,1.114) ity utvaṃ yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:166: ekasmān ṅañaṇAvaṭā dvābhāṃ ṣastribhya eva kaṇamāḥ syuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:167: jñeyau cayau caturbhyo raḥ pañcabhyaḥ śalau ṣaḍbhyaḥ // iti //
GS24jvkasipu:172: vṛddhi-śabdaḥ sañjñātvena vidhīyate, pratyekam ād-aicāṃ varṇānāṃ sāmānyena tad-bhāvitānām, atad-bhāvitānāṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:173: taparakaraṇam aij-artham tād-api paraḥ taparaḥ iti, khaṭvaiḍakādiṣu
GS24jvkasipu:181: vṛddhi-pradeśāḥ -- sici vṛddhiḥ parasmaipadeṣu (*7,2.1) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:184: guṇa-śabdaḥ sañjñātvena vidhīyate, pratyekam, ad-eṅāṃ varṇānāṃ sāmānyena tad-bhāvitānām, atad-bhāvitānāṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:191: guṇa-pradeśāḥ -- mider guṇaḥ (*7,3.82) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:196: vṛddhi-guṇau svasañjñayā śiṣyamāṇau ikaḥ eva sthāne veditavyau /
GS24jvkasipu:207: guṇa-vṛddhī svasañjñayā vidhīyete, tatra ikaḥ iti etad-upasthitaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:209: kiṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati ? dvitīyayā ṣaṣṭhī prādurbhāvyate /
GS24jvkasipu:214: ikaḥ iti kim? ātsandhy-akṣara-vyañjanānāṃ mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:219: iha mā bhūt -- dyauḥ, panthāḥ, saḥ, imam iti //
GS24jvkasipu:222: dhātv-ekadeśo dhātuḥ, tasya lopo yasminn ārdhadhātuke tad-ārdhadhātukaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:223: dhātu-lopaṃ, tatra ye guṇa-vṛddhī prāpnutaḥ, te na bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:227: lolūya-ādibhyo yaṅantebhyaḥ paca-ādy-aci vihite yaṅo 'ci ca (*2,4.74) iti yaṅo luki kṛte tam eva acam āśritya ye guṇa-vṛddhī prāpte tayoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:233: ārdhadhātuke iti kim ? tridhā baddho vṛṣabho roravīti iti /
GS24jvkasipu:240: kṅin-nimitte ye guṇa-vṛddhī prāpnutaḥ, te na bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:257: acinavam, asunavam ity ādau lakārasya saty api ṅittve yāsuṭo ṅid-vacanaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:258: jñāpakam ṅiti yat-kāryaṃ tal-lakāre ṅiti na bhavati iti //
GS24jvkasipu:262: dīdhī-vevyoḥ iṭaś ca ye guṇa-vṛddhī prāpnutaḥ, te na bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:267: vṛddhir iṭo na saṃbhavati iti laghu-upadha-guṇasya-atra pratiṣedhaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:270: bhinna-jātīyair ajbhir avyavahitaḥ śliṣṭa-uccāritā halaḥ saṃyoga-sañjñā
GS24jvkasipu:274: tena dvayor bahūnāṃ ca saṃyogasañjñā siddhā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:281: halaḥ iti kim ? titaucchatram - saṃyogāntasya lopaḥ (*8,2.23) iti lopaḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:282: anantarāḥ iti kim ? pacati panasam - skoḥ saṃyoga-ādyor ante ca (*8,2.29)
GS24jvkasipu:284: saṃyoga-pradeśāḥ - samyogāntasya lopaḥ (*8,2.23) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:287: mukha-sahitā nāsikā mukha-nāsikā, tayā ya uccāryate varṇaḥ so 'nunāsika-sañjño bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:294: anunāsika-pradeśāḥ - āṅo 'nunāsikaś chandasi (*6,1.26) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:300: tulya āsye prayatno yasya varṇasya yena varṇena saha sa samānajātīyaṃ prati savarṇasañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:301: catvāra ābhyantarāḥ prayatnāḥ savarṇasaṃ jñāyām āśrīyante -- spṛṣṭatā,
GS24jvkasipu:303: a aa iti trayo 'kārā udātta-anudātta-svaritāḥ pratyekaṃ sānunāsikā niranunāsikāś ca hrasva-dīrgha-pluta-bhedād aṣṭādaśa dhā bhidyante /
GS24jvkasipu:304: tathā i-varṇaḥ, tathā u-varṇaḥ, tathā ṛ-varṇaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:305: ḷ-varṇasya dīrghā na santi, taṃ dvādaśa-bhedam ācakśate /
GS24jvkasipu:306: sandhy-akṣarāṇāṃ hrasvā na santi, tāny api dvādaśa-prabhedāni /
GS24jvkasipu:307: antaḥsthā dviprabhedāḥ, rephavarjitā yavalāḥ sānunāsikā niranunāsikāśca /
GS24jvkasipu:312: āsya-grahaṇaṃ kim ? kacaṭatapānāṃ bhinna-sthānānāṃ tulya-prayatnānāṃ mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:313: kiṃ ca syāt ? tarptā, tarptum ity atra jharo jhari savarṇe (*8,4.65) iti pakārasya takāre lopaḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:314: prayatna-grahaṇaṃ kim ? icuyaśānāṃ tulya-sthānānāṃ bhinna-jātīyānāṃ mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:315: kiṃ ca syāt ? aruścyotati ity atra jharo jhari savarṇe (*8,4.65) iti śakārasya cakāre lopaḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:319: ubhayoḥ ṛvarṇasya ḷvarṇasya ca āntaratamaḥ savarṇo dīrgho nāsti iti rkāra eva dīrgho bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:320: savarṇa-pradeśāḥ - akaḥ savarṇe dīrghaḥ (*6,1.101) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:324: tulya-āsya-prayatnāv api aj-jhalau parasparaṃ savarṇasañjñau na bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:325: avarṇa-hakārau daṇḍahastaḥ, ivarṇa-śakārau-dadhi śītam, savarṇadīrghatvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:326: vaipāśo matsyaḥ, ānaḍuhaṃ carma iti yasya-iti ca (*6,4.148) iti lopo na
GS24jvkasipu:330: īt ūt et ity evam-antaṃ dvivacanaṃ śabda-rūpaṃ pragrhya-sañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:340: pragṛhya-pradeśāḥ - pluta-pragṛhyā aci nityam (*6,1.125) ity evam ādayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:348: adasaḥ sambadhī yo makāras-tasmāt pare īd-ūdetaḥ pragrhya-sañjñā bhavanti
GS24jvkasipu:360: kim-idaṃ śe iti ? supām ādeśaś chandasi /
GS24jvkasipu:369: chāndasam etad eva-ikam udāharaṇam - asme indrā-bṛhaspatī iti /
GS24jvkasipu:371: itarat tu laukikam anukaraṇam - yuśme iti, asme iti, tve iti, me iti //
GS24jvkasipu:374: ekaś-ca asāvac-ca ekāc, nipāto ya ekāc āṅ-varjitaḥ sa pragṛhya-sañjño
GS24jvkasipu:384: anāṅ iti kim ? ā udakāntāt, odakāntāt /
GS24jvkasipu:391: odanto yo nipātaḥ sa pragṛhya-sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:397: sambuddhi-nimitto ya okāraḥ sa śākalyasya ācāryasay matena pnagṛhya-sañjño
GS24jvkasipu:401: sambuddhau iti kim ? gav ity ayam-āha /
GS24jvkasipu:406: anārṣe iti kim ? etā gā brahama-bandha ity abravīt //
GS24jvkasipu:410: uñaḥ pragṛhya-sañjñā bhavati itau śākalyasya ācāryasya matena /
GS24jvkasipu:415: uñaḥ itāv-anārṣe ūṃ ity ayam-ādeśo bhavati dīrgho 'nunāsikaśca, śāklyasya matena pragṛhya-sañjñakaśca
GS24jvkasipu:416: śākalyasya grahaṇaṃ vibhāṣā-artham iha apy anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:417: tena trīṇi rūpāṇi bhavanti - u iti, viti, ūṃ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:421: īdantam ūdantaṃ ca śabda-rūpaṃ saptamy-arthe vartamānaṃ pragṛhya-sañjñaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:424: māmakyāṃ tanvām iti prāpte, māṃkyām māmakī iti, tanvām tanū iti /
GS24jvkasipu:426: īdūtau iti kim ? priyaḥ sūrye priyo agnā bhavāti /
GS24jvkasipu:428: saptamī-grahaṇaṃ kim ? dhītī, matī, suṣṭutī - dhītyā, matyā, suṣṭutyā iti prāpte /
GS24jvkasipu:434: vacanādy-atra dīrghatvaṃ tatra api sarasī yadi /
GS24jvkasipu:435: jñāpakaṃ syāt tad-antatve mā vā pūrvapadasya bhūt //2 //
GS24jvkasipu:438: dā-rūpāś catvāro dhātavaḥ, dhā-rūpau ca dvau dābdaipau varjayitvā
GS24jvkasipu:446: adāp iti kim ? dāp lavane - dātaṃ barhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:451: asahāyasay ādyanta-upadiṣṭāni kāryāṇi na sidhyanti iti ayam-atideśa
GS24jvkasipu:454: ādāv-iva ante iva ekasminn-api kāryaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:455: yathā kartavyam ity atra pratyaya-ādy-udāttatvaṃ bhavati, evam aupagavam ity atra api yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:456: yathā vṛkṣābhyām ity atra ato 'ṅgasya dīrghatvam evam ābhyām, ity atra api
GS24jvkasipu:459: sabhāsannayane bhavaḥ sābhāsannayanaḥ, ākāram āśritya vṛddha-sañjñā na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:462: tarap tamap ity etau pratyayau gha-sañjñau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:471: bahu gaṇa vatu ity eta saṅkhyā-sañjñā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:488: bahu-gaṇa-śabdayor vaipulye saṅghe ca vartamānayor iha grahaṇaṃ nāsti,
GS24jvkasipu:491: ardha-pūrva-padaśca pūraṇa-pratyayāntaḥ saṅkhyā-sañjño bhavati iti vaktavyaṃ samāsakan vidhy-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:493: ardhaṃ pañcamaṃ yeśām iti bahuvrīhau kṛte ardha-pañcamaiḥ śūrpaiḥ krītaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:495: tatra dik-saṅkhye sañjñāyām (*2,1.50) ity anuvṛttes tataḥ saṅkhyā-pūrvasya
GS24jvkasipu:496: dvigu-sañjñāyāṃ śūrpād añ anyatarasyām (*5,1.26) iti añ ṭhañ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:503: ṣa-kārāntā na-kārāntā ca yā saṅkhyā sā ṣaṭ-sañjñā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:516: ḍatyantā yā saṅkhyā sā ṣaṭ-sañjñā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:521: ktaś ca ktavatuś ca kta-ktavatū pratyayau niśṭhā-sañjñau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:531: sarva-śabdaḥ ādir yeṣāṃ tāni-imāni sarva-adīni sarvanāma-sañjñāni bhavanti
GS24jvkasipu:546: ubha-śabdasya sarvanāmatve prayojanam-- sarvanāmnas-tṛtīya ca (*2,3.27) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:548: ubhābhyāṃ hetubhyāṃ vasati, ubhayoḥ hetvoḥ vasati /
GS24jvkasipu:567: tva tvat iti dvāv api ca anudātāu iti smaranti /
GS24jvkasipu:572: kathaṃ yathā-saṅkhyam anudeśaḥ samānām (*1,3.10), same deśe yajeta iti /
GS24jvkasipu:573: samasya sarva-śabda-paryāyasya sarvanāma-sñjñā iṣyte, na sarvatra /
GS24jvkasipu:578: tyad, tad, yad, etad, idam, adas, eka, dvi, yuṣmad, asmad, bhavatu, kim /
GS24jvkasipu:580: sarvanāma-pradeśāḥ-- sarvanāmnaḥ smai (*7,1.14) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:584: tasmin nitye pratiṣedhe prāpte vibhā-ṣeyam ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:586: dig-upadiṣṭe samāse bahuvrīhau vibhāṣā sarvādīni sarvanāma-sañjñāni
GS24jvkasipu:590: dig-grahaṇaṃ kim ? na bahuvrīhau (*1,1.29) iti pratiṣedhaṃ vakṣyati, tatra na jñāyate kva vibhāṣā, kva pratiṣedhaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:591: dig-grahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe jñāyate dig-upadiṣṭa-samāse vibhāṣā, anyatra pratiṣedhaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:592: samāsa-grahaṇaṃ kim ? samāsa eva yo bahuvrīhiḥ, tatra vibhāṣā yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:593: bahuvrīhivad bhāvena yo bahuvrīhiḥ, tatra mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:595: bahuvrīhau iti kim ? dvandve vibhāṣā mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:596: dakṣiṇa-uttara-pūrvāṇām iti dvandve ca (*1,1.32) it nityaṃ pratiṣedho
GS24jvkasipu:601: sarva-ādy-antasay sañjñā syāt iti pratiṣedha ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:602: bahuvrīhau samāse sarvādīni sarvanāma-sañjñāni na bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:607: iha ca, tvat-kapitṛkaḥ, mat-kapitṛkaḥ ity-akaj na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:617: samāse iti vartamāne punaḥ sammasagrahaṇaṃ tṛtīyā-samāsa-artha-vākye 'pi
GS24jvkasipu:623: kartṛ karaṇe kṛtā bahulam (*2,1.32) iti-tvayakā Kṛtam, mayakā kṛtam //
GS24jvkasipu:626: dvandve ca samāse sarvādīni sarvanāma-sañjñāni na bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:631: pūrveṇa nitye pratiṣedhe prāpte jasi vibhāṣā ārabyate /
GS24jvkasipu:632: dvandve samāse jasi vibhāṣā sarvādīni sarvanāma-sañjñāni na bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:634: jasaḥ kāryaṃ prati vibhāṣā, akaj hi na bhavati - katarakatamakāḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:639: prathama carama taya alpa ardha katipaya nema ity ete jasi vibhāṣā sarvanāma-sañjñā bhavanti
GS24jvkasipu:649: tatra nema iti sarvādiṣu paṭhyate, tasya prāpte vibhaṣā, anyeṣām aprāpte /
GS24jvkasipu:650: ubhaya-śabdasya tayap-pratyaya-antasya gane pāṭhān nityā sarvanāma-sañjñā
GS24jvkasipu:655: pūrva para avara dakṣiṇa uttara apara adhara ity-eṣāṃ gaṇe pāṭhāt pūrveṇa
GS24jvkasipu:656: nityāyāṃ sarvanāma-sañjñāyāṃ prāptāyāṃ jasi vibhāṣā ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:657: pūrvādīni vibhaṣā jasi sarvanāma-sañjñāni bhavanti vyavasthāyām asañjñāyām
GS24jvkasipu:666: vyavasthāyām iti kiṃ ? dakṣiṇā ime gāthakāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:669: satyām eva vyavasthāyām iyaṃ teṣāṃ sañjñā //
GS24jvkasipu:672: atra api nityā sarvanāma-sañjñā prāptā jasi vibhāṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:673: svam ity etac-chabda-rūpaṃ jasi vibhāṣā sarvanāma-sañjñaṃ bhavati , na cej jñātidhanayoḥ sañjñārūpeṇa vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:677: jñāti-pratiṣedhaḥ iti kim ? dhūmāyanta iva aśliṣṭāḥ prajvalanti iva saṃhatāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:678: ulmukāni iva me 'mī svā jñātayo bharatar ṣabha //
GS24jvkasipu:679: adhanākhyāyām iti kim ? prabhūtāḥ svā na dīyante, prabhūtaḥ svā na
GS24jvkasipu:684: atra api pūrveṇa nityā sarvanāma-sañjñā prāptā sā jasi vibhāṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:685: antaram ity etac-chabda-rūpaṃ vibhāṣā jasi sarvanāma-sañjñaṃ bhavati bahiryoge upasaṃvyāne ca gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:690: bahiryoga-upasaṃvyānayoḥ iti kim ? anayoḥ grāmayor antare tāpasaḥ prativasati /
GS24jvkasipu:696: vibhāṣā-prakaraṇe tīyasya vā ṅitsu sarvanāma-sañjñā ity upasaṃkhyānam /
GS24jvkasipu:702: svar, antar, prātar, ete anta-udāttāḥ paṭhyante /
GS24jvkasipu:704: sanutar, uccais, nīcais, śanais, ṛdhak, ārāt, ṛte, yugapat, pṛthak, ete
GS24jvkasipu:706: hyas, śvas, divā, rātrau, sāyam, ciram, manāk, īṣat, joṣam, tūṣṇīm, bahis,
GS24jvkasipu:707: āvis, avas, adhas, samayā, nikaṣā, svayam, mṛṣā, naktam, nañ, hetau,
GS24jvkasipu:708: addhā, iddhā, sāmi, ete 'pi hyasprabhṛtayo 'ntodāttāḥ paṭhyante /
GS24jvkasipu:712: san, sanāt, sanat, tiras, ete ādy-udāttāḥ paṭhyante /
GS24jvkasipu:714: antareṇa, jyok, kam, śam, sanā, sahasā, vinā, nānā, svasti, svadhā, alam,
GS24jvkasipu:715: vaṣaṭ, anyat, asti, upāṃśu, kṣamā, vihāyasā, doṣā, mudhā, mithyā /
GS24jvkasipu:717: purā, mitho, mithas, prabāhukam, āryahalam, abhīkṣṇam, sākam, sārdham,
GS24jvkasipu:718: samama, namas, hiruk, tasilādiḥ taddhita edhācparyantaḥ, śastasī,
GS24jvkasipu:719: kṛtvasuc, suc, ās-thālau, cvyarthāśca, am, ām, pratān, praṣān, svarādiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:721: ca, vā, ha, aha, eva, evam ity-ādayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:722: avyaya-pradeśāḥ-- avyayād āp-supaḥ (*2,4.82) ity evam ādayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:724: sadṛśaṃ triṣu liṅgeṣu sarvāsu ca vibhaktiṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:725: vacaneṣu ca sarveṣu yanna vyeti tad-avyayam //
GS24jvkasipu:730: tataḥ, yataḥ, tatra, yatra, tadā, yadā, sarvadā, sadā /
GS24jvkasipu:731: taddhitaḥ iti kim ? ekaḥ, dvau, bahavaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:732: asarva-vibhaktiḥ iti kim ? aupagavaḥ, aupagavau, aupagavāḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:735: kṛd yo ma-kāra-antaḥ, ej-antaś ca tad-antaṃ śabda-rūpam avyaya-sañjñaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:744: vakṣe iti vaceḥ tum-arthe se-sen-ase (*3,4.9) iti se-pratyaye kutve ṣatve ca kṛte rūpam
GS24jvkasipu:745: eṣe iti iṇaḥ se-pratyaye guṇe ṣatve ca kṛte rūpam /
GS24jvkasipu:746: jīvase iti jīveḥ ase pratyaye rūpam /
GS24jvkasipu:747: dṛśe iti dṛśeḥ ken-pratyayo nipātyate - dṛśe vikhye ca (*3,4.11) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:749: iha mā bhūt - ādhaye, cikīrṣave, kumbha-kārebhyaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:752: ktvā, tosun, kasun, ity evam antaṃ śabda-rūpam avyaya-sañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:757: bhāva-lakṣaṇe sthā-iṇ-kṛñ-vadi (*3,4.16) iti iṇaḥ, kṛñaś ca tosun
GS24jvkasipu:774: kṛ-kami-kaṃsa-kumbha-pātra-kuśā-karṇī-ṣv anavyayasya (*8,3.46) iti paryudāsaḥ siddho bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:775: sarvam idaṃ kāṇḍaṃ svara-adāv api paṭhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:778: iha ca -- purā sūryasyodetor-ādheyaḥ, purā krūrasya visṛpo virapśin iti na
GS24jvkasipu:783: kim idaṃ śi iti ? jaś-śasoḥ ṣiḥ (*7,1.20) iti śiḥ ādeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:790: sarvanāma-sthāna-pradeśāḥ-- sarvanāma-sthāne ca asambuddhau (*6,4.8) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:793: suṭ iti pañca vacanāni sarvanāma-sthāna-sañjñāni bhavanti napuṃsakād anyatra /
GS24jvkasipu:795: tena jasaḥ śeḥ sarvanāma-sthāna-sañjñā pūrveṇa bhavaty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:802: na iti pratiṣedhaḥ, vā iti vikalpaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:803: tayoḥ pratiṣedha-vikalpayoḥ vibhāṣā iti sañjñā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:806: tatra pratiṣedhena samīkṛte viṣaye paścād vikalpaḥ pravartate /
GS24jvkasipu:810: vibhāṣā-pradeśāḥ - vibhāṣā śveḥ (*6,1.30) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:813: ik yo yaṇaḥ sthāne bhūto bhāvī vā tasya saṃprasāraṇam ity eṣā sañjñā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:817: kecid ubhayathā sūtram idaṃ vyācakṣate vākya-arthaḥ sañjñī, varṇaś ca iti
GS24jvkasipu:819: samprasāraṇa-sañjño bhavati, yaṇ-sthānika ig-varṇaḥ sa samprasāraṇa-sañjño
GS24jvkasipu:821: tatra vidhau vākya-artha upatiṣṭhate ṣyaṅaḥ samprasāraṇaṃ putra-patyos
GS24jvkasipu:824: saṅkhyāta-anudeśād iha na bhavati - adhitarām iti /
GS24jvkasipu:825: dyubhyām ity atra diva ut (*6,1.131) iti taparakaraṇād dīrgho na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:826: samprasāraṇa-pradeśāḥ - vasoḥ samprasāraṇam (*6,4.131) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:827: ādyantau ṭa-kitau (*1,1.46) ādiḥ ṭit bhavati, antaḥ kit bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:831: ṭitpradeśāḥ - ārdhadhātukasya+iḍ val-ādeḥ (*7,2.35) ity evam ādayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:832: kit-pradeśāḥ - bhiyo hetubhaye śuk (*7,3.40) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:836: acāṃ saṃniviṣṭānām antyād acaḥ paro mit bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:841: mitpradeśāḥ - rudḥ-ādibhyaḥ śnam (*3,1.78) ity evam ādayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:848: eco hrasva-ādeśe kartavye ik eva hrasvo bhavati, na anyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:857: iha śāstre yā ṣaṣṭhī aniyata-yogā śrūyate, sā sthāne-yogā-iva bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:861: yathā-darbhāṇāṃ sthāne śaraiḥ prastaritavyam iti darbhāṇāṃ prasaṅge iti gamyate /
GS24jvkasipu:862: evam iha api asteḥ sthāne prasaṅge bhūr bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:870: prasaṅge sambandhasya nimitta-bhūte bruva iti ṣasṭhī /
GS24jvkasipu:873: tatra yāvantaḥ śabde sambhavanti teṣu sarveṣu prapteṣu niyamaḥ kriyate ṣaṣṭhī sthāne-yogā iti /
GS24jvkasipu:875: ata eva nipātanāc ca saptamyā aluk //
GS24jvkasipu:877: sthāne prāpyamāṇānām antaratam ādeśo bhavati sadṛśatamaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:882: dvayor akārayoḥ kaṇṭhya eva dīrgha a-akāro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:883: arthataḥ - vataṇḍī ca asau yuvatiś ca vātaṇḍya-yuvatiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:888: cajoḥ ku ghiṇyatoḥ (*7,3.52) iti ca-kārasya alpa-prāṇasya aghoṣasya tādṛśa eva ka-kāro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:892: adaso 'ser dād u do maḥ (*8,2.80) iti hrasvasya hrasvaḥ, dīrghasya dīrghaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:893: sthāne iti vartamāne punaḥ sthāne grahaṇaṃ kim ? yatra anekam āntaryaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:894: sambhavati tatra sthānata eva āntaryaṃ balīyo yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:896: pramāṇato '-kāro guṇaḥ prāptaḥ, tatra sthānata āntaryād ekāraukārau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:899: jhayo ho 'nyatarasyām (*8,4.62) iti ha-kārasya pūrva-savarṇe kriyamāṇe soṣmaṇaḥ soṣmāṇaḥ iti dvitīyāḥ prasaktāḥ, nādavato nādavantaḥ iti tṛtīyāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:900: tamab-grahaṇād ye soṣmāṇo nādavantaś ca te bhavanti caturthāḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:902: uḥ sthāne aṇ prasajyamāna eva raparo veditavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:911: an-grahaṇaṃ kim ? su-dhātur akaṅ ca (*4,1.97) - saudhātakiḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:913: ṣaṣṭhī-nirdiṣṭasya ya ucyate ādeśaḥ, so 'ntyasya alaḥ sthāne veditavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:917: ṅit ca ya ādeśaḥ so 'neka-al api alo 'ntyasya sthāne bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:920: tātaṅi ṅit-karaṇasya guṇa-vṛddhi-pratiṣedha-arthatvāt sarva-ādeśaḥ tātaṅ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:924: parasya kāryaṃ śiṣyamāṇam āder alaḥ pratyetavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:925: kva ca parasya kāryam śiṣyate ? yatra pañcamī-nirdeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:932: aneka-al ya ādeśaḥ śit ca, sa sarvasya ṣaṣṭhī-nirdiṣṭasya sthāne bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:936: śit khalv api - jaś-śasoḥ śiḥ (*7,1.20) -kuṇḍāni tiṣṭhanti /
GS24jvkasipu:939: sthāny-ādeśayoḥ pṛthaktvāt sthāny-āśrayaṃ kāryam ādeśe na prāpnoti ity ayam-atideśa ārabhyate
GS24jvkasipu:948: ārdhadhātuka-viśaye prāg eva-ādeśeṣu kṛteṣu dhātoḥ (*3,1.91) iti
GS24jvkasipu:959: kimaḥ kaḥ (*7,2.103) iti ka-ādeśe kṛte 'ṅga-āśrayā ina-dīrghatva-aisbhāvāḥ
GS24jvkasipu:963: ktvo lyab-ādeśe kṛte hrasvasya piti kṛti tuk (*6,1.71) iti tug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:978: pada-ādeśaḥ padavad bhavati -- grāmo vaḥ svaṃ /
GS24jvkasipu:981: vat-karanaṃ kim ? sthānī ādeśasya sañjñā mā vijñāyi iti /
GS24jvkasipu:983: āṅo yama-hanaḥ (*1,3.28) - āhata, āvadhiṣṭa iti ātmanepadam ubhayatra api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:984: ādeśa-grahaṇaṃ kim ? ānumānikasya apy ādeśasya sthānivadbhāvo yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:986: anal-vidhau iti kim ? dyupathitad-ādeśā na sthānivad bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:988: hal-ṅy-ābbho dīrghāt su-ti-sy-apṛktaṃ hal (*6,1.68) iti su-lopo na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:996: aj-ādeśaḥ paranimittakaḥ pūrvavidau kartavye sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1000: paṭumācaṣṭe iti ṇiciṭi-lope kṛte tasya sthānivad-bhāvāt ata upadhāyāḥ (*7,2.116) iti vṛddhir na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1001: avadhīt -- ato lopasya sthānivad-bhāvad ato hal-āder laghoḥ (*7,2.7) iti
GS24jvkasipu:1003: bahukhaṭvakaḥ iti āpo 'nyatarasyām (*7,4.15) iti hrasvasya sthānivad-bhāvād hrasvānte 'ntyāt pūrvam (*6,2.174) iti svaro na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1007: praśnaḥ iti praccheḥ naṅpratyaye c-cḥ-v-oḥ śūḍ-anunāsike ca (*6,4.19) iti
GS24jvkasipu:1008: cha-kārasya śa-kāraḥ paranimittakas tuki kartavye na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1009: ākrāṣṭām iti jhalo jhali (*8,2.26) iti sico lopaḥ paranimittakaḥ kṛṣeḥ ṣa-kārasya ṣaḍhoḥ kaḥ si (*8,2.41) iti ka-kāre kartavye na sthānivad
GS24jvkasipu:1011: āgatya iti vā lyapi (*6,4.38) ity anunāsika-lopaḥ paranimittakaḥ tuki kartavye na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1015: yuvajāniḥ iti jāyāyāḥ niṅ (*5,4.134) na paranimittakaḥ, tena ya-lope na sthānivad bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:1016: vaiyāghrapadyaḥ iti na paranimittakaḥ pādasya antalopaḥ padbhāvaṃ na pratibadhnāti /
GS24jvkasipu:1018: yi-i-varṇayor dīdhī-vevyoḥ (*7,4.53) iti lopo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1022: he gauḥ iti vṛddhir aj-ādeśaḥ sambuddhi-lope kartavye na sthānivad bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:1023: bābhravīyāḥ iti bābravyasya amī cchātrāḥ iti vṛddhāc chaḥ (*4,2.114) iti chaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1024: halas taddhitasya (*6,4.150) iti ya-kāral-ope kartavye av-ādeśo na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1025: naidheyaḥ -- āto lopa iṭi ca (*6,4.64) ity ā-kāra-lopaḥ, itaś ca aniñaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:1026: (*4,1.122) iti dvy-aj-lakṣaṇe pratyaya-vidhau na sthānivad bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:1029: pūrveṇa atiprasaktaḥ sthānivad-bhāva eteṣu vidhiṣu pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:1035: śna-sor al-lopaḥ kṅiti sārvadhātuke iti paranimittakaḥ, sa pūrva-vidhāv
GS24jvkasipu:1036: āv-ādeśe yaṇ-ādeśe ca kartavye sthānivat syāt, asmād vacanān na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1037: dvirvacana-vidhiḥ -- dvirvacana-vidhiṃ prati na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1040: yaṇ-ādeśaḥ paranimittakaḥ, tasya sthānivad-bhāvāt anaci ca (*8,4.47) iti
GS24jvkasipu:1041: dha-kārasya dvirvacanaṃ na syād asmād vacanād bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1042: varevidhiḥ -- vare yo 'j-ādeśaḥ sa pūrva-vidhiṃ prati na sthānivad bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:1044: yāteḥ yaṅ-antāt yaś ca yaṅaḥ (*3,2.176) iti varaci kṛte ato lopaḥ (*6,4.48) para-nimittakaḥ, tasya sthānivattvād ato lopa iṭi ca (*6,4.64)
GS24jvkasipu:1045: ity ā-kāra-lopaḥ syād, asmād vacanān na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1046: ya-lopa-vidhiḥ -- ya-lopa-vidhiṃ pratyaj-ādeśo na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1048: kaṇḍūyateḥ ktini kṛte, ato lopaḥ paranimittakaḥ, lopo v-yor vali (*6,1.66)
GS24jvkasipu:1049: iti yalope sthānivat syād asmād vacanān na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1050: svara-vidhiḥ -- svara-vidhiṃ prati aj-ādeśo na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1052: jihīrṣakaḥ ṇvuli kṛte ato lopaḥ paranimittakaḥ, liti (*6,1.193) pratyayāt pūrvam udāttam, iti svare kartavye na sthānivad bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:1053: savarṇa-vidhiḥ -- savarṇa-vidhiṃ prati ajādeśo na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1057: hitvadhitvaṣṭutvajaśtveṣu kṛteṣu, śnasor al-lopaḥ kṅiti sārvadhātuke paranimittakaḥ, anusvārasya yayi parasavarṇe kartavye na sthānivad bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:1058: anusvāra-vidhiḥ -- anusvāra-vidhiṃ prati aj-ādeśo na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1061: naś ca apadāntasya jhali (*8,3.24) iti anusvāre kartavye śnasorallopaḥ na sthānivad bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:1062: dīrgha-vidhiḥ -- dīrgha-vidhiṃ prati ajādeśo na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1065: pratidivan ity etasya bhasya (*6,4.129) ity adhikṛtya tṛtīya-ikavacane
GS24jvkasipu:1067: paranimittakaḥ, tasya sthānivadb-hāvād hali ca (*8,2.77) iti dīrghatvaṃ na
GS24jvkasipu:1068: syāt, na hy ayaṃ va-kāro hal-paraḥ iti, asmād vacanād bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1069: jaś-vidhiḥ -- jaś-vidhiṃ praty-aj-ādeśo na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1070: sagdhiś ca me sapītiś ca me /
GS24jvkasipu:1072: adeḥ ktini bahulaṃ chandasi (*2,4.39) iti ghas-la-ādeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1076: upadhā-lopasya sthānivattavāt jhalāṃ jas jhasi (*8,4.53) iti gha-kārasya
GS24jvkasipu:1077: jaśtvaṃ na syāt, asmād vacanād bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1081: babdhām iti bhaser-loḍ-dvivacane śapaḥ sluḥ, dvirvacanam, abhyāsa-kāryam,
GS24jvkasipu:1082: ghasi-bhasor hali ca (*6,4.100) iti upadhā-lopaḥ, jhalo jhali (*8,2.26) it
GS24jvkasipu:1083: sa-kāra-lopaḥ, jhaṣas ta-thor dho 'dhaḥ (*8,2.40) iti dhatvam /
GS24jvkasipu:1084: upadha-lopasya sthānivattvāt jhalām jaś jhaśi (*8,4.53) iti jaśtvaṃ na
GS24jvkasipu:1086: carvidhiḥ -- carvidhiṃ prati aj-ādeśo na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1091: gama-hana-jana-khana-ghasāṃ lopaḥ k-ṅity anaṅi (*6,4.98) iti upadhā-lopaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:1093: tatra upadhā-lopasya sthānivattvāt khari ca (*8,4.55) iti gha-kārasya
GS24jvkasipu:1094: cartvaṃ na syād, asmād vacanād bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1096: akṣan iti adeḥ luṅ bahuvacane ghas-la-ādeśaḥ, clerāgatasya mantre ghasa-hvara (*2,4.80) iti luk /
GS24jvkasipu:1097: gama-hana-jana-khana-ghasāṃ lopaḥ k-ṅity anaṅi (*6,4.98) ity upadhā-lopaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:1098: tasya sthānivattvāt khari ca (*8,4.55) iti cartvaṃ na syāt, asmād vacanād bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1101: tena bahukhaṭvakah, kiryoḥ, giryoḥ, vāyvoḥ iti sthānivattvāt
GS24jvkasipu:1104: dvirvacana-nimitte 'ci aj-ādeśaḥ sthānivad bhavati , dvirvacana eva kartavye /
GS24jvkasipu:1106: tena kṛte dvirvacane punar ādeśa rūpam eva avatiṣṭhate /
GS24jvkasipu:1110: āto lopa iṭi ca (*6,4.64) iti ā-kāra-lope kṛte tasya sthānivad-bhāvāt
GS24jvkasipu:1111: eka-aco dve prathamasya (*6,1.1) iti dvirvacanaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1114: gama-hana-jana-khana-ghasāṃ lopaḥ k-ṅity anaṅi (*6,4.98) ity aupadhā-lope
GS24jvkasipu:1115: kṛte anackatvād dvirvacanaṃ na syāt, asmād vacanād bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1117: aṭateḥ ṇici luṅi caṅi ṇilope kṛte tasya sthānivattvād aj-āder dvitīyasya
GS24jvkasipu:1121: karoteḥ atusi usi ca yaṇ-ādeśe kṛte anackatvād dvirvacanaṃ na syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:1125: nayateḥ lunāteś ca uttame ṇali guṇe kṛte vṛddhau ca ay-av-āy-āv-ādeśāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:1126: teṣāṃ sthānivattvān ne nai lo lau iti dvirvacanaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1127: dvirvacane kaṛtavya iti kim ? jagle, mamle /
GS24jvkasipu:1132: ī ghrā-dhmoḥ (*7,4.31) yaṅi ca (*7,4.30) iti ī-kāra-ādeśaḥ, tasya sthānivadbhāvād ā-kārasya dvirvacanaṃ syāt, aj-grahaṇān na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:1134: adarśanam, aśravaṇam, anuccāranam, anupalabdhiḥ, abhāvo, varṇavināśaḥ ity anartha-antaram
GS24jvkasipu:1135: etaiḥ śabdairyo 'rtho 'bhidhīyate, tasya lopaḥ iti iyaṃ sañjñā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1144: lopa-pradeśāḥ-lopo vyor vali (*6,1.66) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:1147: pratyaya. adarśanasya luk, ślu, lup ity etāḥ sañjñā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:1150: ślu-sañjñā-bhāvitaṃ ślu-sañjñaṃ bhavati, lup-sañjñā bhāvitaṃ lup-sañjñaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:1162: pratyaya-nimittaṃ kāryam asaty api pratyaye kathaṃ nu nāma syāt it sūtram idam ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:1163: pratyaya-lope kṛte pratyaya-lakṣaṇaṃ pratyaya-hetukaṃ karyaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1164: agnicit, somasut, adhok, ity atra sup-tiṅoḥ luptayoḥ sup-tiṅ-antaṃ padam
GS24jvkasipu:1166: adhok iti duheḥ laṅi tipi śabluki tilope ghatva-bhaṣbhāva-jaśtva-cartveṣu
GS24jvkasipu:1168: pratyaya iti vartamāne punaḥ pratyaya-grahaṇaṃ kim ? kṛtsna-pratyaya-lope
GS24jvkasipu:1173: sīyuṭ-sa-kāra-lopaḥ pratyaya-ikadeśa-lopaḥ, tatra pratyaya-lakṣaṇena jhali ity anunāsikalopo na bhavati (*6,4.37) /
GS24jvkasipu:1174: pratyaya-lakṣaṇam iti kim ? rāyaḥ kulaṃ raikulam /
GS24jvkasipu:1178: pūrveṇa atiprasaktaṃ pratyaya-lakṣaṇam iti viśeṣe pratiṣedhaḥ ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:1179: lumatā śabdena lupte pratyaye yad-aṅgaṃ, tasya pratyaya-lakṣaṇaṃ kāryaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1183: yañ-śapor lumatā luptayor aṅgasya vṛddhi-guṇau na bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1192: acāṃ sanniviṣṭāmāṃ, yo 'ntyo 'c tad-ādi śabda-rūpaṃ ṭi-sañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1197: ṭi-pradeśāḥ--ṭita ātmanepadānaṃ ṭere (*3,4.79) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:1199: dhātv-ādau varṇa-samudāye 'ntyād alaḥ pūrvo yo varṇaḥ so 'l eva
GS24jvkasipu:1209: tasmin iti saptamy-artha-nirdeśe pūrvasya-iva kāryaṃ bhavati, na-uttarasya
GS24jvkasipu:1217: tasmāt iti pañcamy-artha-nirdeśa uttarasya-iva kāryaṃ bhavati, na pūrvasya /
GS24jvkasipu:1219: iha na bhavati -- pacaty odanam iti //
GS24jvkasipu:1221: śāstre svam eva rūpaṃ śabdasya grāhyaṃ bodhyaṃ pratyāyyaṃ bhavati, na bāhyo 'rthaḥ, śabda-sañjñāṃ varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:1222: śabdena artha-avagater arthe kāryasya asambhavāt tad-vācinām śabdānām sampratyayo mā bhūt iti sūtram idam ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:1224: agni-śabdo 'gni-śabdasya-iva grāhako bhavati, na jvalanaḥ, pāvakaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:1229: takram, ariṣṭaṃ, kālaśeyaṃ, daṇḍāhataṃ, mathitam, iti na ataḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1230: aśabda-sañjñā iti kim ? dā-dhā ghv-adāp (*1,1.20) tarap-tamapau ghaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:1231: (*1,1.23), ghu-grahaṇeṣu gha-grahaneṣu ca sañjñināṃ grahanam, na sañjñāyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1234: tato vaktavyam tad-viśeṣāṇāṃ grahaṇaṃ bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:1241: tato vaktavyam paryāya-vacanasya grahaṇaṃ bhavati, ca-kārāt svasya rūpasya tad-viśeṣāṇāṃ ca iti /
GS24jvkasipu:1251: tato vaktavyam paryāya-vacanasya-iva grahanaṃ bhavati iti, na svarūpasya,
GS24jvkasipu:1261: tato vaktavyam tasya ca grahaṇaṃ bhavati tad-viśaṣāṇāṃ ca iti /
GS24jvkasipu:1266: paryāyāṇāṃ na bhavati--ajihmān hanti, animiṣān hanti iti /
GS24jvkasipu:1270: aṇ gṛhyamāṇa udic ca savarṇānāṃ grāhako bhavati, svasya ca rūpasya,
GS24jvkasipu:1272: ād guṇaḥ (*6,1.87), asya cvau (*7,4.32), yasya-īti ca (*6,4.148) /
GS24jvkasipu:1277: apratyayaḥ iti kim ? san-āśaṃsa-bhikṣa uḥ (*3,2.168), a sāmpratike (*4,3.9), dīrgho na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:1279: taḥ paro yasmāt so 'yaṃ taparaḥ, tād api paraḥ taparaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1280: tapro varṇas tat-kālasya, ātmanā tulya-kālasya guṇa-antara-yuktasya
GS24jvkasipu:1281: savarṇasya grāhako bhavati, svasya ca rūpasya /
GS24jvkasipu:1284: aṇāmanyeṣāṃ ca taparāṇām idam eva grahaṇaka-śāstram /
GS24jvkasipu:1285: ato bhisa ais (*7,1.9) ity evam ādiṣu pūrva-grahaṇaka-śāstraṃ na pravartata eva /
GS24jvkasipu:1287: kim udāharaṇam ? ato bhisa ais (*7,1.9)-- vṛkṣaiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1293: ādir antyena it-sañjñakena saha gṛhyamāṇas tan-madyapatitānāṃ varṇānāṃ grāhako bhavati, svasya ca rūpasya /
GS24jvkasipu:1300: antyena iti kim ? suṭ iti tṛtīya-ikavacanena ṭā ity anena grahaṇaṃ mā bhūt
GS24jvkasipu:1302: yena viśeṣaṇena vidhir-vidhīyate sa tad-antasya ātmān tasya samudāyasay
GS24jvkasipu:1307: or āvaśyake (*3,1.125), u-varṇa-antād ṇyad bhavati-- avaśyalāvyam /
GS24jvkasipu:1311: iha mā bhūt -- kaṣṭaṃ paramaśrita iti /
GS24jvkasipu:1312: pratyaya-vidhau -- naḍa-ādibhyaḥ phak (*4,1.99), naḍasya apatyaṃ nāḍāyanaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:1313: iha mā bhūt-- sūtra-naḍasya apatyaṃ sautranāḍiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1316: ugitaś ca (*4,1.6) iti ṅīp-pratyayaḥ tad-antād api bhavati -- bhavatī,
GS24jvkasipu:1321: al-grahaṇeṣu yasmin vidhistad ādau iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:1322: aci śnu-dhātu-bhruvāṃ yvor iyaṅ-uvaṅau (*6,4.77) iti-- śriyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1324: vṛddhir yasya acām ādis tad vṛddham (*1,1.73) /
GS24jvkasipu:1326: acāṃ madye yasya vṛddhi-sañjñaka ādi-bhūtaḥ, tac-chabda-rūpaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:1333: ādiḥ iti kim ? sabhāsannayate bhavaḥ sābhāsannayanaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1364: eṅ yasya acām ādiḥ tat prācāṃ deśābhidhāne vṛddha-saṃjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1370: prācām iti kim ? devadatto nāma bāhīkeṣu grāmah, tatra bhavaḥ daivadattaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:1371: deśe iti kim ? gomatyāṃ bhavā matsyāḥ gaumatāḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:1372: prāg udañcau vibhajate haṃsaḥ kṣīrodake yathā /
GS24jvkasipu:1373: viduṣāṃ śabda-siddhy-arthaṃ sā naḥ pātu śarāvatī //
GS24jvkasipu:1374: iti śrījayādityaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyām vṛttau prathamādhyāyasay prathamaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:1378: gāṅ iti iṅ-ādeśo rhyate, na gāṅ gatau iti, ṅa-kārasya ananya-arthatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:1379: kuṭādayo 'pi kuṭa kauṭilye ityeta dārabhya yāvat kuṅ śabde iti /
GS24jvkasipu:1380: egyo gāṅ-kuṭādibhyaḥ pare añṇitaḥ pratyayā ṅito bhavanti ṅidvad bhavanti ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1400: ovijī bhaya-calanayoḥ, asmāt paraḥ iḍ-ādiḥ pratyayo ṅidvad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1409: ūr-ṇuñ ācchādane, asmāt paraḥ iḍādiḥ pratyayo vibhāṣā ṅidvad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1416: sārvadhātukaṃ yad apit tan ṅidvad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1430: asaṃyogāntād dhātoḥ paro liṭ pratyayaḥ apit kid bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1443: indhi bhavati ity etābhyāṃ paro liṭ pratyayaḥ kiḍ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1457: mṛḍa mṛda gudha kuṣa kliśa vada vasa ity etebhyaḥ paraḥ ktvā-pratyayaḥ kid bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1458: na ktvā seṭ (*1,2.18) iti pratiṣedhaṃ vakṣyati tasyāyaṃ purastādapakarṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1459: gudha-kuṣa-kliśīnāṃ tu ralo v-y-upadhād-dhal-ādeḥ saṃś ca (*1,2.26) iti vikalpe prāpte nitya-arthaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:1469: ruda vida muṣa grahi svapi praccha ity etebhyaḥ saṃśca ktvā ca kitau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1470: ruda-vida-muṣīṇāṃ ralo vyupadhād-dhal-ādeḥ saṃśca (*1,2.23) iti vikalpe prāpte nitya-arthaṃ grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:1481: kiraś ca pañcabhyaḥ (*7,2.75) iti praccher iḍ-āgamaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:1486: igantād dhātoḥ paro jhal-ādiḥ san kid bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1493: kim artham idam ucyate ? guṇo mā bhūt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:1494: aj-jhana-gamāṃ sani (*6,4.16) iti dīrghatvaṃ guṇasya bādhakaṃ bhaviṣyati ?
GS24jvkasipu:1495: yatha-iva tarhi dīrghatvaṃ guṇaṃ bādhate tathā ṇilopamapi badheta /
GS24jvkasipu:1496: tasmād dīrghatvasya avakāśa-dānāya kittvam idam ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:1497: cicīṣati ity ādiṣu sāvakāśaṃ dīrghatvaṃ partvād ṇilopena bādhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:1499: ikaḥ kittvaṃ guṇo mā bhūt dīrgha-ārambhāt kṛte bhatet /
GS24jvkasipu:1500: anarthakam tu hrasva-arthaṃ dīrghāṇāṃ tu prasajyate //1//
GS24jvkasipu:1505: halantād iko jhal kit iti vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:1518: sṛji-dṛśor jhaly-am-akiti (*6,1.58) ity am-āgamo na syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:1527: ṛ-varṇa-antād dhātoḥ parau liṅ-sicau ātmanepadeśu jhal-ādī kitau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1539: gamer-dhātoḥ paru liṅ-sicau ātmanepadeṣu jhal-ādī vā kitau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1546: hanter dhātoḥ paraḥ sic kid bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1552: iha tu parasmaipade hanter vadhabhāvasya nityatvāt kittvasya prayojanaṃ na asti //
GS24jvkasipu:1556: yamer dhātor gandhane vartamānāt paraḥ sic pratyayaḥ kid bhavati ātmanepadeṣu parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1570: yamer dhātoḥ upayamane vartamānāt paraḥ sic-pratyayao vibhāṣā kid bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:1574: upayamanaṃ svīkaraṇaṃ, vivāhaḥ, dārakarma, pāṇi-grahaṇam ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1579: tiṣṭhater dhātoḥ ghu-sañjñakānāṃ ca i-kāraś ca antād eśaḥ sic ca kid
GS24jvkasipu:1584: icca kasya takārettvaṃ dīrgho mā bhūd ṛte 'pi saḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1585: anantare pluto mā bhūt plutaś ca viṣaye smṛtaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:1588: ktvā pratyayaḥ seṇ na kid bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1591: seṭ iti kim ? iṛtvā ' gutvā ' ktvā-grahaṇaṃ kim ? nigṛhītiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1601: śīṅ svidi midi kṣvidi dhṛṣ ity etebhyaḥ pro niṣṭhā-pratyayaḥ seṇ na kid
GS24jvkasipu:1609: svid-ādīnam āditaś ca (*7,2.16) iti niṣṭhāyāmiṭ pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:1610: vibhāṣā bhāva-ādikarmaṇoḥ (*7,2.17) iti pakṣe 'bhyanujñāyate sa viṣayaḥ kittva-pratiṣedhasya
GS24jvkasipu:1613: mṛṣer dhātoḥ titikṣāyām arthe niṣṭhā seṇ na kid bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1616: titikṣāyām iti kim ? apamṛṣitaṃ vākyam āha //
GS24jvkasipu:1619: niṣṭhā seṇ na kit iti vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:1620: udupadhād dhātoḥ paro bhāve ādikarmaṇi ca vartamāno niṣṭhā-pratyayaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:1626: bhāva-ādikarmaṇoḥ iti kim? rucitaṃ kārṣāpaṇaṃ dadāti /
GS24jvkasipu:1631: gudha pariveṣṭane, gudhitam ity atra na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:1637: pūḍaśca iṭ vihitaḥ kilśaḥ ktvā-niṣṭhayoḥ (*7,2.50), pūṅaś ca (*7,2.51) iti
GS24jvkasipu:1638: pūḍaḥ paro niṣṭhā-pratyayaḥ itvā ca seṇ na kid bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1640: ktvā-pratyayasaya na ktvā seṭ (*1,2.18) iti seddha eva pratiṣedhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1642: tathā ca-uktaṃ nityam akittvam iḍādyoḥ ktvā-niṣṭhayoḥ ktvā-grahaṇam
GS24jvkasipu:1647: nikāra-upadhād dhātoḥ thakārāntāt phakarāntāc ca paraḥ ktvā pratyayaḥ seḍ va na kid bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:1657: vañci luñci ṛt ity etebhyaḥ paraḥ ktvā pratyayaḥ seḍ vā na kid bhvati /
GS24jvkasipu:1663: sa yatra pakṣe na asti tatra-idam udāharaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:1668: na ktvā seṭ (*1,2.18) iti pratiṣedhe prāpe kittvaṃ vikalpyate /
GS24jvkasipu:1669: tṛṣi mṛṣi kṛśi ity etebhyaḥ paraḥ krvā pratyayaḥ seṭ kāśyapasya ācāryasya mate vā na kiḍ bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:1677: vā iti vartate seṭ iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:1680: ukāra-upadha-adikāra-upadhac ca dhāto ralantād-dhalādeḥ paraḥ saṃś ca ktvā ca seṭau va kitau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1692: ū iti trayāṇām ayaṃ mātrika-dvimātrika-trimātrikāṇāṃ praśliṣṭa-nirdeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1694: u ū ū3 ity evaṃ kālo aj yathā-kramaṃ hrasva-dīrgha-plutaḥ ity evaṃ sañjño
GS24jvkasipu:1703: ālūya, pralūya, hrasvasya piti kṛti tuk (*6,1.71) iti tuṅ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1705: pratakṣya, prarakṣya, hrasvāśrayas tuṅ mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:1706: titaucchātram, dīrghāt (*6,1.75), padāntād vā (*6,1.76) iti vibhāṣā tuṅ mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:1712: paribhāṣā iyaṃ sthāni-niyama-arthā hrasva-dīrgha-plutaḥ svasañjñayā śiṣyamāṇā aca eva sthāne veditavyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1735: udātta-ādi-śabdāḥ svare varṇadharme loka-vedayoḥ prasiddhā eva /
GS24jvkasipu:1737: uccair upalabhyamāno yo 'c sa udātta-sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1738: uccaiḥ iti ca śruti-prakarṣo na gṛhyate, uccair bhāṣate, ucaiḥ paṭhati iti
GS24jvkasipu:1739: kiṃ tarhi ? sthāna-kṛtam uccatvaṃ sañjñino viśeṣaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:1740: tālv-ādiṣu hi bhāgavatsu sthāneṣu varṇā niṣpadyante /
GS24jvkasipu:1741: tatra yaḥ samāne sthāne ūrdhva-bhaga-niṣpanno 'c sa udātta-sañjño bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:1742: yasminn ucāryamāṇe gātrāṇāmāyāmo nigraho bhavati, rūkṣatā asnigdhatā svarasya, saṃvṛtatā kṇṭhavivarasya /
GS24jvkasipu:1752: yasminn uccāryamāṇe gātrāṇām anvavasargo mārdavaṃ bhavati, svarasya mṛdutā snigdhatā, kaṇṭha-vivarasya urutā mahattā /
GS24jvkasipu:1755: anudāttapradeśāḥ- anudāttau sup-pitau (*3,1.4) ity evam ādyaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:1760: sāmarthyāc ca atra loka-vedayoḥ prasiddhau guṇāv eva varṇa-dharmāv
GS24jvkasipu:1762: tau samāhriyete yasminn aci tasya svaritaḥ ity eṣā saṃjñā vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:1767: svarita-pradeśāḥ-- tit svaritam (*6,1.175) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:1771: tatra na jñāyate kasminnaṃśe udāttaḥ kasminn anudāttaḥ, kiyān vā udāttaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:1774: tasya svaritasya ādāv ardha-hrasvam udāttam, pariśiṣṭam anudāttam /
GS24jvkasipu:1777: sarveṣām eva hrasva-dīrgha-plutānāṃ svaritānām eṣa svara-vibhāgaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1778: śikyam ity atra ardha-mātrā ādita udātta, apara-ardha-mātrā anudāttā,
GS24jvkasipu:1780: kanyā ity atra ardha-mātrā ādita udattā adhyardha-mātrā anudāttā /
GS24jvkasipu:1781: māṇavaka3 māṇavaka (*8,2.103) ity atra ardha-mātrā ādita udāttā ardha-tṛtīya-mātrā anudāttā
GS24jvkasipu:1784: traisvarye padānāṃ prāpte dūrāt sambuddhāv-aikaśrutyaṃ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:1785: ekā śrutir yasya tad idam ekaśruti /
GS24jvkasipu:1787: dūrāt sambodhayati yena vākyena tat sambodhanaṃ sambuddhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1789: svarāṇām udāttādīnām avibhāgo bhedati rodhānam ekaśrutiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1791: dūrāt iti kim ? āgaccha bho māṇavaka devadatta //
GS24jvkasipu:1795: teṣāṃ yajña-kriyāyām api tatha-iva prayoge prāpte eka-śrutir vidhīyate
GS24jvkasipu:1798: agnir mūrdhā divaḥ kakut patiḥ pṛthivyā ayam /
GS24jvkasipu:1800: yajña-karmaṇi iti kim ? sampāṭhe mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:1801: ajapeṣv-iti kim ? mamāgne varco vihaveṣv astu /
GS24jvkasipu:1805: asāmasu iti kim ? viśvaṃ samatriṇaṃ daha /
GS24jvkasipu:1811: yajña-karmaṇi vaṣaṭkāraḥ uccaistarāṃ vā bhavati eka-śrutir vā /
GS24jvkasipu:1814: yady evaṃ vauṣaḍ-grahaṇam eva kasmān na kṛtam ? vaicitrya-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:1822: vā iti prakṛte vibhāṣā-grahanaṃ yajña-karmaṇi ity asya nivṛtty-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:1823: tena ayaṃ svādhyāya-kāle 'pi pākṣika aikaśrutya-vidhir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1832: na subrahmaṇyāyāṃ svaritasya tu udāttaḥ || PS_1,2.37 ||
GS24jvkasipu:1834: subrahmaṇyā nāma nigadas tatra yajña-karmaṇi iti vibhāṣā chandasi
GS24jvkasipu:1837: yas tu lakṣaṇa-prāptaḥ svaritas tasya-udātta ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1839: indrāgaccha, hariva āgaccha, medhātithermeṣa vṛṣaṇaśvasya mene /
GS24jvkasipu:1840: gaurāva-skandinnahalyāyai jāra kauśikabrāhmaṇa gautamabruvāṇa śvaḥ sutyāmāgaccha maghavan
GS24jvkasipu:1841: atra subrahmaṇyom ity okāras titsvareṇa svaritas tasya-udātto vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:1844: udāttād anudātasya svaritaḥ iti svaritaḥ prasaktas tasya anena-udāttaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:1846: tad evam indra āgaccha iti catvāra udāttāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1848: hariva āgaccha ityanayaiva prakriyayā catvāra udāttāḥ dvāv anudāttau /
GS24jvkasipu:1849: medhātitheḥ iti ṣaṣṭyantaṃ parama-amantritam anupraviśati subāmantrite parāṅgavatsvare (*2,1.2) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:1850: tataḥ sakalasyā mantritādy-udāttatve iṛte dvitīyam akṣaram anudāttaṃ,
GS24jvkasipu:1851: tasya udāttād anudāttasya svaritaḥ (*8,4.66) iti svaritatve prāpte
GS24jvkasipu:1856: gaurāvaskandin iti tatha-iva dve ādye akṣare udātte, śeṣam anudāttam /
GS24jvkasipu:1857: ahalyāyai jāra iti subantasya amantrita-anupraveśāt t advadeva svaraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1859: kauśikabrahmaṇa iti samastamāmantritamādy-udāttaṃ tatra pūrvavad dvāv
GS24jvkasipu:1861: evam gautama-bruvāṇa iti dvāv udāttau śeṣam anudāttām /
GS24jvkasipu:1862: śvaḥ sutyāmāgaccha maghavan iti śvaḥ-śabda udāttaḥ sutyām ity antodāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1863: sañjñāyāṃ samajaniṣadanipatamanavidaṣuñ śīṅbhṛñiṇaḥ (*3,3.99) iti kyapo vidhāne udāttaḥ iti vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:1869: subrahmaṇyāyām eva devā brahmāṇaḥ iti paṭhyate, tatra pūrveṇa svaritasya+udātte prāapte 'nena-anudātto vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:1872: dvayor api padayor āmantrita-ādy-udāttatve śeṣanighāte ca+udāttād
GS24jvkasipu:1877: saṃhitāyaṃ viśaye svaritāt pareṣām anudāttānām ekaśrutir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1878: imaṃ me gaṅge yamune sarasvati śutudri /
GS24jvkasipu:1880: imam ity anta-udāttaṃ, me iti anudāttaṃ vidhi-kāla eva nighāta-vidhānāt /
GS24jvkasipu:1881: tat punaḥ udāttād anudātasya svaritaḥ (*8,4.66) iti svaritaṃ sampadyate /
GS24jvkasipu:1882: tasmāt svaritāt pareṣām anudāttānāṃ gaṅgeprabhṛtīnām ekaśrutir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1884: māṇavaka jaṭilaka iti prathamam āmantritamādyudāttaṃ, tasya dvitīyam akṣaram svaritaṃ, tataḥ pareṣām anudāttānām ekaśrutir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1890: udāttaḥ paro yasmāt sa udāttaparaḥ svaritaḥ paro yasmāt sa svaritaparaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1891: udāttaparasya svaritaparasya ca anudāttasya sannatara ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1896: tatra anudāttayor ekādeśa okāro 'nudāttaḥ tasya-udātte parabhūte sannatara ādeśo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:1897: imaṃ me gaṅge yamune sarasvati śutudri /
GS24jvkasipu:1899: śutudri ity etad āmantritaṃ pādādau tasmān na nihanyate, anudāttaṃ sarvam apādādau (*8,1.18) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:1900: tasya prathamam akṣaram udāttaṃ tasmin parabhūte pūrvasya sarasvati iti ikārasya sannatara ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1902: kva iti svaritas tasmin parabhūte ka iti anudattas tasya sannatara ādeśo bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:1905: apṛktaḥ iti iyaṃ sañjñā bhavati eka-al yaḥ pratyayas tasya /
GS24jvkasipu:1913: apṛkta-pradeśāḥ -- ver apṛktasya (*6,1.67) ity evam ādyaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:1922: akarmadhāraye rājyam (*6,2.130) ity uttarapada-ādy-udāttaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1929: prathamayā vibhāktyā yan nirdiśyate samāsa-śāstre tadupasarjana-sañjñaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:1934: dvidīyā-samāse dvitīyā ity etat prathamā-nirdiṣṭaṃ, tṛtīyā-samāse tṛtīyā
GS24jvkasipu:1935: iti, caturthī-samāse caturthī iti, pañcamī-samāse pañcamī iti,
GS24jvkasipu:1936: ṣaṣṭhī-samāse ṣaṣṭhī iti, saptamī-samāse saptamī iti /
GS24jvkasipu:1943: upasarjana-pradeśāḥ - upasarjanaṃ pūrvam (*2,2.30) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:1946: eka vibhāktir yasya tad idam eka-vibhākti /
GS24jvkasipu:1947: samāse vidhīyamāne yan niyata-vibhaktikaṃ, dvitīye sambandhini bahubhir-vibhaktibhir yujyamāne 'py ekayaiva vibhaktyā yujyate
GS24jvkasipu:1951: pūrva-pade nānāvibhaktike 'py uttarapadaṃ pañcmyantam eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1961: apūrva-nipāte iti kim ? na hi bhavati kauśāmbīniḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:1971: arthavat iti kim ? vanam, dhanam iti na antasya avadher mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:1978: hrasvo napuṃsake prātipadikasya (*1,2.47) iti hrasvaḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:1982: prātipadika-pradeśāḥ -- hrasvo napuṃsake prātipadikasya (*1,2.47) ity evam ādyaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:1985: kṛtas taddhitāḥ samāsāś ca prātipadika-sañjñā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:1986: apratyayaḥ iti pūrvatra paryudāsat kṛdantasya taddhitāntasya ca anena prātipadika-sañjñā vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:1996: samāsa-grahaṇasya niyama-arthatvād vākyasya arthavataḥ sañjñā na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:1999: napuṃsaka-liṅge 'rthe yat prātipadikaṃ vartate tasya hrasvo bhavati ādeśaḥ alo 'nyasya acaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:2010: go iti svarūpa-grahaṇaṃ strī iti pratyaya-grahaṇaṃ svaritatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:2014: upasarjana-go-śabdāntasya upasarjana-strīpratyaya-antasya ca prātipadikasya hrasvo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:2032: taddhita-luki sati strī-pratyayasya upasrjanasya lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2057: lupi iti lup-sanñjñayā luptasya pratyayasya artha ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2059: yuktavat iti niṣṭhā-pratyayena ktavatunā prakṛtyartha ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2062: atha vā yuktaḥ prakṛty-arthaḥ pratyaya-arthena sambaddhaḥ, tasminn-iva
GS24jvkasipu:2065: vyaktivacane iti ca liṅga-saṅkhyayoḥ pūrvācarya-nirdeśaḥ, tad-īyam
GS24jvkasipu:2067: tathā ca asya pratyākhyānaṃ bhaviṣyate, tad aśiṣyaṃ sañjñā-pramāṇatvāt
GS24jvkasipu:2073: yathā teṣu kṣatriyeṣu vyaktivacane tadvajjanapade bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2082: lupi iti kim ? luki mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:2086: vyaktivacane iti kim ? śirīṣāṇām adūrabhavo grāmaḥ śirīṣāḥ, tasya vanaṃ śirīṣavanam /
GS24jvkasipu:2091: khalatikasya parvatasya adūrabhavāni vanāni khalatikaṃ vanāni //
GS24jvkasipu:2095: lub-arthasya yāni viśeṣaṇāni teṣām api ca yuktavad vyakti-vacane bhavataḥ jātiṃ varjayitvā
GS24jvkasipu:2101: tena jāt-idvāreṇa yāni viśeṣaṇāni teṣām api yuktavadbhāvo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2113: pañcālāḥ, varaṇā iti ca, na+ete yoga-śabdāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2115: tatra liṅgaṃ vacanaṃ ca svabhāva-saṃsiddham eva na yatna-pratipādyam,
GS24jvkasipu:2116: yathā āpaḥ, dārāḥ, gṛhāḥ, sikatāḥ, varṣāḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:2120: yo 'yaṃ janapade lup (*4,2.81), varaṇā-ādibhyaś ca (*4,2.82) iti lub ucyate,
GS24jvkasipu:2123: na hi pañcāla varaṇāḥ iti yogaḥ sambadhaḥ prakhyāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2126: tasmād atra tasya nivāsaḥ (*4,2 69), adūra-bhavaś ca (*4,2.70) iti taddhito na+eva+utpadyate, kiṃ lupo vidhānena //
GS24jvkasipu:2129: pañcāla-ādayaḥ sañjñā-śabdāḥ, na yoga-nimittāḥ ity uktam /
GS24jvkasipu:2132: yadi pañcālādi-śabdo yogasya pramāṇaṃ yogasya vācakaḥ syāt tatas tadabhāve
GS24jvkasipu:2134: dṛśyate ca samprati vanaiva kṣatriya-sambandhena janapadeṣu
GS24jvkasipu:2136: kiṃ tarhi ? rūḍhirūpeṇaiva tatra pravṛttaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:2141: tābhyām artha-vacanam artha-abhidhānam anena prakāreṇa bhavati iti
GS24jvkasipu:2143: pradhāna-upasarjane ca pradhāna-arthaṃ saha brūtaḥ, prakrti-pratyayau
GS24jvkasipu:2145: tat pāṇinir ācaryaḥ pratyācaṣṭe, aśiṣyam etat arthasya anyapramāṇatvāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:2147: śabdair artha-abhidhānam svābhāvikaṃ na pāribhaṣākam aśakyatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:2149: yair api vyākaraṇaṃ na śrutaṃ te 'pi rāja-puruṣam ānaya ity ukte
GS24jvkasipu:2150: rājaviśiṣṭaṃ puruṣam ānayanti na rājanam na api puruṣa-mātram /
GS24jvkasipu:2151: aupagavam ānaya ity ukte upaguviśiṣṭam apatyam ānayanti, na+upaguṃ na apy apatya-mātraṃ, na+ubhau /
GS24jvkasipu:2152: yaś ca lokato 'rthaḥ siddhaḥ kiṃ tatra yatnena //
GS24jvkasipu:2161: iha anye vaiyākaraṇāḥ kāla-upasarjanayoḥ paribhāṣāṃ kurvanti /
GS24jvkasipu:2162: ānyāyyād utthānād ānyāyyāc ca saṃveśanāt, eṣo 'dyatanaḥ kālaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2167: yairapi vyākaraṇam na śrutaṃ te 'py āhur idam asmābhir adya kartavyam idaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:2168: śvaḥ kartavyam idam hayaḥ kṛtam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:2170: tathā-upasarjanam, vayamatra gṛhe grāme vā upasarjanam apradhānam iti gamyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2171: yśca lokato 'rthaḥ siddhaḥ kiṃ tatra yatnena /
GS24jvkasipu:2172: yady evaṃ pūrvasūtra eva kāla-upasarjana-grahaṇam kasmān na kriyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:2175: tathā ca pūrvācāryāḥ paribhaṣante matvarthe bahuvrīhiḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:2177: tatpuruṣah, ubhayapadārtha-pradhāno dvandvaḥ ity evam ādi, tad-aśiṣyam iti
GS24jvkasipu:2182: tad-abhidhāne ekavacanam eva prāptam ata idam udyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2184: jāty-ākhyāyām ekasminn arthe vahuvacanam anyatarasyāṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2186: tena tadviśeṣaṇānām ajāti-śabdānām api sampannādīnāṃ bahuvacanam
GS24jvkasipu:2190: pūrvavayā brāhmaṇaḥ pratyuttheyaḥ, pūrvavayaso brāhmaṇāḥ pratyuttheyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2194: bhavatyayaṃ jāti-śabdo na tvanena jātir ākhyāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2201: asmado yo 'rthas tasya+ekatve dvitve ca bahuvacanam anyatarasyāṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2209: tvaṃ me guruḥ, yūyaṃ me guravaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:2213: phalgunyor dvayoḥ proṣṭhapadayoś ca dvayor nakṣatrayor bahuvacanam anyatarasyāṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2214: kadā pūrve phalgunyau, kadā pūrvāḥ phalgunyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2215: kadā pūrve proṣṭhapade, kadā pūrvāḥ proṣṭhapadāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2220: dvayor dvivacane prāpte punarvasvoś chandasi viṣaye ekavacanam anyatarasyāṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2229: dvivacane prāpte chandasi viṣaye viśākhayor ekavacanam anyatarasyāṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2235: niṣyaḥ ekaḥ, punarvasū dvau, teṣaṃ dvandvo bahv-arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2237: niṣyapunarvasvoḥ nakṣatra-viṣaye dvandve bahuvacana-prasaṅgo nityaṃ dvivacanaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2240: nakṣatre iti kim ? tiṣyaś ca māṇavakaḥ, punarvasū māṇavakau,
GS24jvkasipu:2242: nanu ca prakṛtam eva nakṣatra-grahaṇaṃ kim-arthaṃ punar ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2247: dvandve iti kim ? yastiṣyastau punarvasū yeṣāṃ te ime tiṣya-punarvasavaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2248: unmugdhāḥ tiṣyādaya eva viparyayeṇa dṛśyamānā bahuvrīhiṇocyante /
GS24jvkasipu:2250: bahuvacanasya iti kim ? ekavacanasya mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:2252: sarvo dvandvo vibhāṣā ekavad bhavati ity asya+etada eva jñāpakam /
GS24jvkasipu:2257: sarūpāṇāṃ śabdānaṃ ekavibhaktau parata ekaśeṣo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2260: vṛkṣaś ca vṛkṣaś ca Vrkṣaś ca vṛkṣāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2268: ekagrahaṇaṃ kim ? dvibahvoḥ śeṣo mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:2270: ekavibhaktau iti kim ? payaḥ payo jarayati /
GS24jvkasipu:2271: brāhmaṇābhyāṃ ca kṛtaṃ brāhmaṇābhyāṃ ca dehi //
GS24jvkasipu:2272: vṛddho yūnā tal-lakṣaṇaś ced-eva viśeṣaḥ || PS_1,2.65 ||
GS24jvkasipu:2276: vṛddho yūnā sahavacane śiṣyate yuvā nivartate /
GS24jvkasipu:2277: vṛddha-śabdaḥ pūrvācārya-sañjñā gotrasya apatyam antarhitaṃ vṛddham iti /
GS24jvkasipu:2278: vṛddha-yūnoḥ sahavacane vṛddhaḥ śiṣyate tal-lakṣaṇaś ced eva viśeṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2284: vṛddha-yuva-nimittakam eva yadi vairūpayam bhavati tato vṛddhiḥ śiṣyate,
GS24jvkasipu:2289: vṛddhaḥ iti kim ? gargaś ca gārgyāyaṇaś ca gargagārgāyaṇau /
GS24jvkasipu:2290: yū nā iti kim ? gārgyaś ca gargaś ca gārgya-gargau /
GS24jvkasipu:2294: kutsā sauvīratvaṃ ca bhāgavittikasya aparo viśeṣo vidyate //
GS24jvkasipu:2297: śeṣaḥ iti vartate, vṛddho yūnā iti ca sarvam strī vṛddhā yūnā sahavacane
GS24jvkasipu:2308: striyā sahavacane pumān śiṣyate strī nivartate /
GS24jvkasipu:2314: pumān iti kim ? prāk ca prāci ca prākprācyau /
GS24jvkasipu:2318: yathā saṅkhyaṃ bhrātṛ-putra-śabdau śiṣyete sahavacane svasṛ-duhitṛbhyam /
GS24jvkasipu:2326: napuṃsaka-anapuṃsaka-mātra-kṛte viśeṣe 'napuṃsakena sahavacane napuṃsakaṃ śiṣyate, ekavac ca asya kāryaṃ bhavati anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:2327: śuklaś ca kambalaḥ, śuklā ca bṛhatikā, śuklam ca vastraṃ, tadidaṃ śuklam /
GS24jvkasipu:2329: anapuṃsakena iti kim ? śuklaṃ ca śuklaṃ ca śuklaṃ ca suklāni /
GS24jvkasipu:2333: anyatarasyām iti vartate, na ekavat iti /
GS24jvkasipu:2335: mātā ca pitā ca pitarau, matā-pitarau iti vā //
GS24jvkasipu:2340: śvaśuraś ca śvaśrūś ca śvaśurau, śvasrū-śvaśurau iti vā //
GS24jvkasipu:2343: tayd-ādīni śabda-rūpāṇi sarvaiḥ sahavacane nityaṃ śiṣyante tyad-ādibhir
GS24jvkasipu:2349: tyad-ādīnāṃ mitho yadyat paraṃ tattac chisyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2356: pumān striyā (*1,2.67) iti puṃsaḥ śeṣe prāpte strī-śeṣo vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2364: saṅgheṣu iti kim ? etau gavau carataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2370: iti srījayādityaviracitāyaṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau prathamādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:2373: bhū ity evam ādayaḥ śabdāḥ kriyāvacanā dhātusañjñā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:2379: tad iha api pūrvācarya-sañjñāśrayaṇāt kriyāvācinām eva bhūvādīnāṃ
GS24jvkasipu:2382: bhūvo vārthaṃ vadanti iti bhv-arthā vā vādayaḥ smaṛtāḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:2386: upadiśyate 'nena ity upadeśaḥ śāstravākyāni, sūtrapāṭhaḥ, khilapāṭhaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:2387: tatra yo 'c anunāsikaḥ sa itsañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2391: upadeśe iti kim ? abhra āṃ apaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2392: ac iti kim ? ato manin-kvanib-vanipaś ca (*3,2.74) /
GS24jvkasipu:2393: anunāsikaḥ iti kim ? sarvasya aco mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:2394: it-pradeśāḥ - ād-itaś ca (*7,2.16) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:2399: dhātvādeḥ samudāyasya yad-antyam hal, tad itsañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2407: hasya l hal iti dvitīyam atra hal-grahaṇaṃ tantreṇa+upāttaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:2408: tena pratyāhāra-pāṭhe hal ity atra lakārasya itsañjñā kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2409: tathā ca sati halantyam ity atra pratyāhāre na+itaretarāśraya-doṣo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:2419: bibhaktau iti kim ? aco yat (*3,1.97), ūrṇāyā yus (*5,2.123), rudhādibhyaḥ śnam (*3,1.78)
GS24jvkasipu:2420: kimo 't (*5,3.12), iṭo 't (*3,4.106) ity atra pratiṣedho na bhvati ,
GS24jvkasipu:2422: idamas thamuḥ (*5,3.24) ity ukāra-anubandha-nirdeśād anityatvam upalakṣyate //
GS24jvkasipu:2427: ñi-ṭu-ḍu ity eteṣāṃ samudayānām ādito vartamānānām ity sañjñā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2444: pratyayasya iti kim ? ṣoḍaḥ, ṣaṇḍaḥ, ṣaḍikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2445: ādiḥ ity eva - avimahyoṣṭiṣac - aviṣaḥ, mahiṣaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:2460: avāt kuṭārac ca (*5,2.30), nate nāsikāyāḥ sañjñāyāṃ ṭiṭañ-nāṭj-bhraṭacaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:2472: glā-ji-sthaś ca gsnuḥ (*3,2.139) - glāsnuḥ, jiṣṇuḥ, bhūṣṇuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2482: tasya grahaṇaṃ sarvalopa-artham, alo 'ntyasay (*1,1.52) mā bhūt ādir
GS24jvkasipu:2490: samānāṃ samasaṅkhyānaṃ samaparipahitānām uddeśinām anudeśināṃ ca
GS24jvkasipu:2493: prathamāt prathamaḥ, dvitīyād dvitīyaḥ ity ādi /
GS24jvkasipu:2500: lakṣaṇādayaś catvāro 'rthāḥ, pratyādayas trayaḥ, sarveṣaṃ sarvatra karmapravacanīya-sañjñā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2501: iha kasmān na bhavati veśo-yaśa-āder bhagād yal (*4,4.131) kha ca (*4,4.132) iti ? svaritena liṅgena yathā-saṅkhyam /
GS24jvkasipu:2502: yatra eṣyate, tatra svaritatvaṃ na pratijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2503: svaritena adhikāraḥ (*1,3.11) iti svarita-grhaṇaṃ pūrveṇa api sambadhyate
GS24jvkasipu:2520: aviśeṣeṇa dhātor ātmanepadaṃ parsmaipadaṃ ca vidhāsyate, tatra ayaṃ niyamaḥ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2521: anudātta-ito ye dhatavo ṅitaś ca, tebhya eva ātmanepadaṃ bhavati na anyebhyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2528: laḥ karmaṇi ca bhāve ca akarmakebhyaḥ (*3,4.69) iti bhāva-karmaṇor
GS24jvkasipu:2530: tatra-idam ucyate, bhāve karmaṇi ca ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2531: bhāve - glāyte bhavatā, supyate bhavatā, āsyate bhavatā /
GS24jvkasipu:2533: karmakartari, lūyate kedāraḥ svayam eva iti, parasmaipadaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2535: tena kartiva yaḥ kartā tatra prasmaipadaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:2540: yatra-anya-sambandhinīṃ kriyāmanyaḥ karoti, itara-sambandhinīṃ cetaraḥ, sa
GS24jvkasipu:2546: kartṛ-grahaṇam uttara-arthaṃ śeṣāt kartari parasmaipadam (*1,3.78) iti //
GS24jvkasipu:2550: gaty-arthebhyo hiṃsā-arthebhyaś ca dhātughyaḥ karma-vyatihare ātmanepadaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2563: itaretaraḥ, anyonyaḥ ity evam upapadād dhātoḥ karma-vyatihāre ātmanepadaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2570: śaṣāt kartari parsmaipadam (*1,3.78) iti prasmaipade prāpte ni-pūrvād viśa ātmanepadaṃ vidhīyate
GS24jvkasipu:2575: ya-dāgamās tad-grahaṇena gṛhyante tena aṭā na asti vyavadhānam /
GS24jvkasipu:2577: ner upasargasya grahaṇam, arthavad-grahane na anarthakasya grahaṇam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:2578: tasmād iha na bhavati, madhuni viśānti bhramarāḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:2588: paryādaya upasargā gṛhyante tena+iha na bhavati, vahuvi krīṇāti vanam //
GS24jvkasipu:2591: śeṣāt kartari parasmaipadam (*1,3.78) ity asya apavādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2592: viparā pūrvāj jayater dhātor ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2596: tena+iha na bhavati, bahuvi jayati vanam, parā jayati senā iti //
GS24jvkasipu:2600: āṅ-pūrvād dadāter anāsya-viharaṇe vartamānād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2607: iha mā bhūt, vyādadate pipīlikāḥ pataṅgasya mukham //
GS24jvkasipu:2610: krīḍṛ vihāre, etasmād anu sam pari ity evaṃ pūrvād āṅ-pūrvāc
GS24jvkasipu:2616: samā sāhacaryād anvādir upasargo gṛhyate, tena+iha
GS24jvkasipu:2648: sam ava pra vi ity evaṃ pūrvāt tiṣṭhater ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2662: prakāśane stheya-ākhyāyāṃ ca tiṣṭhater ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2671: utpūrvāt tiṣṭhater anūrdhva-karmaṇi vartamānād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2678: iha mā bhūt, asmād grāmāt śatam uttiṣṭhati /
GS24jvkasipu:2680: īhagrahaṇam anūrdhva-karmaṇa eva viśeṣanaṃ, na apavādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2684: upapūrvāt tiṣthater mantrakaraṇe 'rthe vartamānād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2687: mantrakaraṇe iti kim ? bhartāram upatiṣṭhati yauvanena /
GS24jvkasipu:2694: mitrakaraṇaṃ tu vināpy upaśleṣeṇa maitrīsam Bandhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2697: bhikṣuko brāhmaṇa-kulam upatiṣthate, upatiṣṭhati iti vā //
GS24jvkasipu:2701: upapūrvāt tiṣṭhater akarmakāt akarmaka-kriyāvacanād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2710: ut vi ity evaṃ pūrvāt tapater akarmaka-triyāvacanād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2720: svāṅgaṃ ca+iha na pāribhāṣikaṃ gṛhyate adravaṃ mūrtimat svāṅgam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:2722: tena+iha na bhavati, devadatto yajñadattasya pṛṣṭham uttapati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:2727: yama uparame, hana hiṃsāgatyoḥ iti parasmaipadinau /
GS24jvkasipu:2730: hanaḥ khalv api -- āhate, āghnāte, āghnate /
GS24jvkasipu:2739: tena+iha na bhavati , āhanti śiraḥ parakīyam iti //
GS24jvkasipu:2743: śeṣāt kartari parasmaipadam (*1,3.78) iti prāpte sampūrvebhyo gami ṛcchi pracchi svarati arti śru vidi ity etebhyo 'karmakebhyo dhātubhya ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2752: bahulaṃ chandasy amāṅyoge 'pi (*6,4.75) ity āṭ pratiṣadhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2757: arty-ādeśasya tv arti ity eva siddham ātmanepadam /
GS24jvkasipu:2758: artirubhayatra paṭhyate, ṛ gati-prāpaṇayoḥ iti bhvādau, ṛ sṛ gatau iti
GS24jvkasipu:2761: viderjñāna-arthasya grahanam, parasmaipadibhir gamādibhiḥ sāhacaryāt, na
GS24jvkasipu:2771: ni sam upa vi ity evaṃ pūrvāt hvayater dhātor ātnamepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2783: spardhāyāṃ viṣaye āṅ-pūrvād hvayater ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2784: spardhā saṅgharṣaḥ, parābhibhavechā, sa viṣayo dhātv-arthasya /
GS24jvkasipu:2789: spardhāyām iti kim ? gām āhvayati gopālaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:2795: gandhana-ādiṣv artheṣu vartamānat karoter ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2797: tathā hi, basta gandha ardane, arda hiṃsāyām iti cur-ādau pathyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2815: tasya sato guṇantarādhānaṃ karoti ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2827: adhipūrvāt karoteḥ prasahane vartamānāt ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2830: tam abhivabhūva, na tena prājitaḥ ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2836: vipūrvat karoter akartrabhiprāye kriyāphale śabdakarmaṇa ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2844: vipūrvāt karoter akarmakād akarmaka-kriyāvacanād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2846: sādhu dāntāḥ śobhanaṃ valganti ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2854: ṇīñ prāpṇe ity etasmāt dhātor ātmanepadaṃ bhavati sammānana-ādiṣu
GS24jvkasipu:2858: sa lokāyate śāstre pada-arthān nayate, upapattibhiḥ sthirīkṛtya śiṣyebhyaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:2860: te yuktibhiḥ sthāpyamānāḥ sammānitāḥ pūjitā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:2863: ācārya-karaṇam ācāryakriyā -- māṇavakam īdṛśena vidhinā ātma-samīpaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:2864: prāpyati yathā sa upanetā svayam ācāryaḥ sampadyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2866: ātmānam ācāryīkurvan māṇavakam ātma-samīpaṃ prāpayati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2871: vigaṇanam ṛṇāder niryātanam -- madrāḥ karam vinayante /
GS24jvkasipu:2877: eteṣu iti kim ? ajāṃ nayati grāmam //
GS24jvkasipu:2881: kartṛsthe karmaṇy aśarīre sati nayater ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2885: kartṛsthe iti kim ? devadatto yajñadattasya krodhaṃ vinayatei /
GS24jvkasipu:2892: śeṣat kartari parasmaipade prāpte vṛtty-ādiśv artheśu karmer dhator
GS24jvkasipu:2908: upaparāpūrvāt kramater vṛtty-ādiśv artheṣu vartamānād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:2910: sopasargād upa-parā-pūrvād eva, na anya-pūrvāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:2919: āṅ-pūrvāt kramater udgamane vartamānād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2923: udganame iti kim ? ākrāmati māṇavakaḥ kutupam /
GS24jvkasipu:2925: iha mā bhūt, ākramati dhūmo harmyatalāt //
GS24jvkasipu:2928: vi-pūrvāt kramateḥ pada-viharaṇe 'rthe vartamānād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2933: yady api kramiḥ pāda-viharaṇa eva paṭhyate, kramu pāda-vikṣepe iti,
GS24jvkasipu:2938: pra up ity etābhyāṃ parasmāt kramater ātmanepadaṃ bhavati, tau cet propau
GS24jvkasipu:2947: atha upaparābhyām (*1,3.39) ity anena ātmanepadam atra karmān na bhāti ?
GS24jvkasipu:2960: śeṣāt kartari prasmaipade prāpte jānater apahnavi vartamanād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2962: sopasargaś ca ayam-apahnave vartate, na kevalaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2966: apahnave iti kim ? na tvaṃ kiñcad api jānāsi //
GS24jvkasipu:2970: kartr-abhiprāye hi anupasargāj jñaḥ (*1,3.76) iti vakṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:2974: kathaṃ ca ayam akarmakaḥ ? na atra sarpir-ādi jñeyatvena vivakṣitam /
GS24jvkasipu:2976: tathā ca jño 'vid-arthasya karaṇe (*2,3.51) iti ṣaṣṭhī vidhīyate --
GS24jvkasipu:2979: akarmakāt iti kim ? svareṇa putraṃ jānāti //
GS24jvkasipu:2984: sam prati ity evaṃ pūrvāj jānāter anādhyāne vartamānād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:2995: śeṣāt kartari parasmaipade prāpte bhāsana-ādiśu viśeṣaṇeṣu satsu vadater
GS24jvkasipu:2998: bhāsamāno dīpyamānas tatra padārthān vyaktīkaroti ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3012: eteṣu iti kim ? yat kiñcid vadati //
GS24jvkasipu:3018: nanu vada vyaktāyāṃ vāci ity eva paṭhyate, tatra kiṃ vyaktavācām iti viśeṣaṇena ? prasiddhy-upasaṃgraha-artham etat /
GS24jvkasipu:3028: vadaḥ iti, vyaktavācām iti ca vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:3029: anupūrvād vadater akarmakād vyaktavāgviṣayād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3033: yathā kalāpo 'dhīyāno vadati tathā kaṭhaḥ ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3034: akarmakāt iti kim ? pūrvam eva yajuruditam anuvadati /
GS24jvkasipu:3039: vadaḥ iti vartate, vyaktavācāṃ samuccāraṇe iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:3040: vipralāpātmake vyaktavācāṃ samuccārane vartamānād vadater ātmanepadaṃ bhavati vibhāṣā /
GS24jvkasipu:3044: yugapat paraspara-pratiṣedhena viruddhaṃ vadanti ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3052: gṝ nigaraṇe iti tudādau paṭhyate, tasya+idaṃ grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:3053: na tu gṝ śabde iti kryādipaṭhitasya /
GS24jvkasipu:3054: tasya hy avapūrvasya prayoga eva na asti /
GS24jvkasipu:3055: śeṣāt kartari parsmaipade prāpte avapūrvād girater ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3061: saṃpūrvāt girateḥ pratijñāne vartamānād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3068: śeṣāt kartari parasmaipade prāpte utpūrvāc carateḥ sakarmaka-kriyāavacanād
GS24jvkasipu:3078: tṛtīyā iti tṛtīyā-vibhaktir gṛhyate, tayā carater arthadvārako yogaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3080: tṛtīyā-yuktāt iti kim ? ubhau lokau sañcarasi imaṃ ca amuṃ ca devala /
GS24jvkasipu:3081: yady apy atra tad-artha-yogaḥ sambhavati, tṛtīyā tu na śrūyate, iti pratyudāharaṇaṃ bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:3082: dāṇaś ca sā cec caturthy-arthe || PS_1,3.55 ||
GS24jvkasipu:3085: tataḥ sampūrvāt tṛtīyā-yuktāt ātmanepadaṃ bhavati, sā cet tṛtīyā
GS24jvkasipu:3087: kathaṃ punas tṛtīyā caturthy-arthe syāt ? vaktavyam eva+etat --
GS24jvkasipu:3088: aśiṣṭavyavahāre tṛtīyā caturthy-arthe bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:3091: kāmukaḥ san dāsyai dadāti ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3093: samaḥ praśabdena vyavadhāne katham ātmanepadaṃ bhavati ? samaḥ iti viśeṣaṇe ṣaṣṭhī, na pañcamī //
GS24jvkasipu:3096: śeṣāt kartari parasmaipade prāpte upapūrvāt yamaḥ svakaraṇe vartamānād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:3097: pāṇi-grahaṇa-viśiṣṭam iha svakaranam gṛhyate, na svakaraṇa-mātram /
GS24jvkasipu:3099: svakaraṇe iti kim ? devadatto yajñadattasya bhāryām upayacchati //
GS24jvkasipu:3102: jñā śru samṛ dṛś ity eteṣāṃ sannantānām ātmanepdaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3103: tatra jānāteḥ apahnave jñaḥ (*1,3.44) iti tribhiḥ sūtrair ātmanepadaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:3104: vihitam, śru-dṛśor api samo gamyṛcchi (*1,3.29) ity atra vihitam /
GS24jvkasipu:3105: tasmin viṣaye pūrvavat sanaḥ (*1,3.62) ity eva siddham ātmanepadam /
GS24jvkasipu:3112: sanaḥ iti kim ? jānāti, śṛṇoti, smarati, paṣyati //
GS24jvkasipu:3116: anupūrvāj jānāteḥ sannantād ātmanepadaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3117: tathā ca sati sakarmakasya+eva ayaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ sampadyate /
GS24jvkasipu:3122: prati āṅ ity evaṃ pūrvāc-chṛṇoteḥ sannantād ātmanepadaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3125: upasarga-grahaṇaṃ cedaṃ, tasmād iha pratiṣedho na bhavati , devadattaṃ prati śuśrūṣate //
GS24jvkasipu:3128: śadlṛ śātane parasmaipadī, tasmād ātmanepadaṃ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:3129: śadiryaḥ śit, śidbhāvī, śito vā sambandhī tasmād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3139: mriyater luṅ-liṅoḥ śitaś ca-ātmanepadaṃ bhavati, anyatra na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3142: śitaḥ khalv api - mriyate, mriyete, mriyante /
GS24jvkasipu:3147: sanaḥ pūrvo yo dhātuḥ ātmanepadī, tadvat sannantād ātmanepadam bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3148: yena nimittena pūrvasmād ātmanepadaṃ vidhīyate tena+eva sannantādapi bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3150: sannantād api tad eva nimittam - āsisiṣate, śiśayiṣate /
GS24jvkasipu:3155: kiṃ tarhi ? śidādy api, tac ca+iha na asti /
GS24jvkasipu:3156: yasya ca pūrvatra+eva nimitta-bhāvaḥ pratiśidhyate, tat sannanteśv apy
GS24jvkasipu:3159: iha jugupsate, mīmāṃsate iti ? anudātta-ṅita ity eva siddham ātmanepdam /
GS24jvkasipu:3160: avayave kṛtaṃ liṅgaṃ samudāyasya viśeṣakaṃ bhavati iti //
GS24jvkasipu:3168: yadi vidhy-artham etat, tarhi udubjāñcakāra, udumbhāñcakāra iti kartr-abhiprāye kriyāphale atmanepadaṃ prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:3170: ubhayam anena kriyate, vidhiḥ niyamaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:3175: kathaṃ punar asya anuprayogaḥ yāvatā kṛñ ca anuprayujyate liti (*3,1.40)
GS24jvkasipu:3176: ity ucyate ? kṛñ iti pratyāhāra-grahaṇaṃ tatra vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:3178: sampadyakartari cviḥ (*5,4.50) iti kṛ-śabdād ārabhya yāvat kṛño
GS24jvkasipu:3183: tasya kartr-abhiprāye kriyā-phale siddham eva ātmanepadam /
GS24jvkasipu:3185: pra upa ity evaṃ pūrvāt yujer ayajña-pātra-prayogaviṣayād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3188: ayajñapātreṣu iti kim ? dvandvaṃ nyañca pātrāṇi prayunakti
GS24jvkasipu:3198: samo gamy-ṛcchi (*1,3.29) ity atra+eva kasmān na paṭhitaḥ ? akarmakāt iti tatra vartate
GS24jvkasipu:3206: anavane iti kim ? bhunakty enam agnir āhitaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3207: anavana iti pratiṣedhena raudhādikasya-eva grahanaṃ vijñāyate, na taudādikasya bhujo kauṭilye ity asya /
GS24jvkasipu:3209: ṇe raṇau yat karma ṇau cet sa kartā 'nādhyāne || PS_1,3.67 ||
GS24jvkasipu:3211: ṇicś ca (*1,3.74) iti kartr-abhiprāye kriyā-phale siddham eva ātmanepadam
GS24jvkasipu:3214: katham ? aṇau yat karma ṇau cet tad eva karma, sa eva kartā bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:3216: ārohanti hastinaṃ hastipakāḥ, arohayate hastī svayam eva /
GS24jvkasipu:3217: upasiñcanti hastinaṃ hastipakāḥ, upasecayate hastī svayam eva /
GS24jvkasipu:3218: paśyanti bhṛtyā rājānam, darśayate rājā svayam eva /
GS24jvkasipu:3219: ṇeḥ iti kim ? ārohanti hastinaṃ hastipakāḥ, ārohayamāṇo hastī sādhvārohati
GS24jvkasipu:3220: aṇau iti kim ? ganayati ganaṃ gopālakaḥ, ganayati gaṇaḥ svayam eva /
GS24jvkasipu:3221: karma-grahaṇaṃ kim ? lunāti dātrena, lāvyati dātram svayam eva /
GS24jvkasipu:3222: ṇau ced-grahanaṃ samāna-kriya-artham -- ārohanti hastinaṃ hastipakāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:3225: ārohanti hastinaṃ hastipakāḥ, ārohayamāṇo hastī sthalamārohayati manuṣyān
GS24jvkasipu:3226: kartā iti kim ? ārohanti hastinam hastipakāḥ, tānarohayati mahāmātraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3227: anādhyāne iti kim ? smarati vaṅgulmasya kokilaḥ, samarayatyenaṃ vaṅgulmaḥ svayam eva /
GS24jvkasipu:3230: kim artham idam ucyate ? karmasthabhāvakānāṃ karmasthakriyāṇāṃ ca
GS24jvkasipu:3233: tathā ca ruhiḥ kartṛstha-kriyaḥ, dṛśiḥ kartṛsthabhāvakaḥ udāhṛtaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:3238: vibheteḥ smayateś ca ṇy-antād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati hetubhaye /
GS24jvkasipu:3239: hetuḥ prayojakaḥ kartā lakāra-vācyaḥ, tataś ced bhayaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3240: bhaya-grahaṇam upalakṣaṇa-artham, vismayo 'pi tata eva ? jaṭilo bhīṣayate /
GS24jvkasipu:3246: atra kuñcikā bhayasya karaṇam, na hetuḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:3251: gṛdhu abhikāṅkṣāyām, vañcu gatau ity etayor ṇy-anatayoḥ pralambhane vartamānāyor ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3256: gardhanam asya-utpādayati ity arthaḥ ahiṃ vañcayati /
GS24jvkasipu:3262: līṅ śleṣaṇe iti divādau paṭhyate lī śleṣaṇe iti ca kryādau /
GS24jvkasipu:3264: liyo ṇy-antāt saṃmānane śālīnīkaraṇe ca vartamānād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3272: vibhāṣā līyateḥ (*6,1.51) iti vā ātvaṃ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:3280: ṇyantāt karoter mithyopapadād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati abhyāse /
GS24jvkasipu:3283: sāpacāraṃ svarādiduṣṭam asakṛd uccārayati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3284: mithyopapadat iti kim ? padaṃ suṣṭhu kārayati /
GS24jvkasipu:3285: kṛñaḥ iti kim ? padaṃ mithyā vācayati /
GS24jvkasipu:3286: abhyāse iti kim ? padaṃ mithyā kārayati /
GS24jvkasipu:3291: śeṣāt kartari parasmaipade prapte svariteto ye dhātavo ñitaś ca tebhyaḥ ātmanepadaṃ bhavati, kartāraṃ cet kriyāphalam abhipraiti /
GS24jvkasipu:3292: kriyāyāḥ phalaṃ kriyāphalaṃ pradhāna-bhūtam, yad-artham asau kriyā ārabhyate tac cet kartur lakāra-vācyasya bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3301: yady api dakṣiṇā bhṛtiś ca kartuḥ phalmihāsti tathā api na tad-arthaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:3306: apapūrvad vadateḥ kartr-abhiprāye kriyāphale ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3316: kartr-abhiprāye ity eva, kaṭaṃ kārayati parasya //
GS24jvkasipu:3320: sam ud āṅ ity evaṃ pūrvād yameḥ kartr-abhiprāye kriyāphale ātmanepadaṃ bhavati, grantha-viśayaś cet prayogo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3324: āṅ-pūrvād akarmakāt āṅo yamahanaḥ (*1,3.28) iti siddham eva-ātmanepadam /
GS24jvkasipu:3326: agranthe iti kim ? udhyacchati cikitsāṃ vaidyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3333: anupasargāj jānāteḥ kartr-abhiprāye kriyāphale ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3336: anupasargāt iti kim ? svargaṃ lokaṃ na prajānāti mūḍhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3337: kartr-abhiprāye ity eva, devadattasya gaṃ jānāti //
GS24jvkasipu:3340: svaritañitaḥ (*1,3.72) iti pañcabhiḥ sutrair ātmanepadaṃ kartr-abhiprāye
GS24jvkasipu:3342: tad-upapadena dyotite na prāpnoti iti vacanam ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:3344: tena pratīyamāne kartr-abhiprāye kriyāphale vibhāśā ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3345: svaṃ jajñaṃ yajate, savaṃ yajñaṃ yajati /
GS24jvkasipu:3346: savaṃ kaṭhaṃ kurute, svaṃ kathaṃ karoti /
GS24jvkasipu:3347: svaṃ putram apavadate, svaṃ putram apavadati /
GS24jvkasipu:3351: pūrveṇa prakaraṇena ātmanepada-niyamaḥ kṛtaḥ, na prasmaipada-niyamaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3352: tat sarvataḥ prāpnoti, tad-artham idam ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:3353: yebhyo dhātubhyo yena viśeṣaṇena ātmanepadam uktaṃ tato yad-anyat sa śeṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3365: karmakartari kasmāt parasmaipadaṃ na bhavati, pacyate odanaḥ svayam eva ?
GS24jvkasipu:3366: kartari karma-vyatihāre (*1,3.14) iti dvitīyaṃ kartṛ-grahaṇam anuvartate,
GS24jvkasipu:3367: tena kartā-eva yaḥ kartā tatra prasmaipadam bhavati, karmakartari na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:3370: kartr-abhiprāye kriyāphale gandhanādiṣu ca karoter ātmanepadaṃ vihitam /
GS24jvkasipu:3372: anu parā ity evaṃ pūrvāt karoteḥ parasmaipadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3378: tataḥ kartr-abhiprāya-kriyāphala-vivakṣāyām ātmanepade prāpte parasmaipadaṃ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:3379: abhi prati ati ity evaṃ pūrvāt kṣipaḥ parasmaipadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3384: dvitīyam api kartṛ-grahaṇam anuvartate, tena+iha na bhavati, abhikṣipyate svayam eva //
GS24jvkasipu:3388: tatra kartr-abhiprāya-kriyāphala-vivakṣāyām ātmanepade prāpte parasmaipadaṃ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:3395: tataḥ tathā+eva ātmanepade prāpte parasmaipadaṃ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:3399: vahatim api kecid atra anuvartayanti - parivahati //
GS24jvkasipu:3404: viāṅ pari ity evaṃ pūrvāt ramateḥ parasmaipadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3418: akarmakād vibhāṣāṃ vakṣyati, sā upapūrvād eva yathā syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:3422: pūrveṇa nitye parasmaipade prāpte vikalpa ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:3423: upapūrvad ramater akarmakād vibhāṣā parasmaipadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3424: yāvad bhuktam auparamati, yāvad bhuktam uparamate /
GS24jvkasipu:3428: ṇicaś ca (*1,3.74) iti kartr-abhiprāya-triyāphala-vivakṣāyām ātmanepade prāpte parasmaipadaṃ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:3429: budha yudha naśa jana iṅ pru dru sru ity etebhyo ṇyantemyaḥ parasmaipadam bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3438: ye 'tra-akarmakās teṣām aṇāv-akarmakāc cittavat-kartṛkāt (*1,3.88) ity evaṃ siddhe vacanam idam acittavat-kartṛka-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:3443: ye 'tra calana-artha api teṣām nigaraṇa-calana-arthebhyaś ca (*1,3.87) iti siddhe yadā na calana-arthās tad-arthaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:3466: ayam api yogaḥ sakarmaka-arthaḥ, acittavat-kartṛkārthaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:3473: aṇyanto yo dhatur akarmakaś cittavat-kartṛkaś ca tasmād ṇyantāt
GS24jvkasipu:3477: aṇau iti kim ? cetayamānaṃ prayojayati cetayate, iti kecit pratyudāharanti
GS24jvkasipu:3481: tasmād iha cetayati iti parasmaipadena+eva bhavitavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:3482: idaṃ tu pratyudaharaṇam -- ārohayamāṇaṃ prayuḍkte ārohayate /
GS24jvkasipu:3483: akarmakāt iti kim ? kaṭhaṃ kurvāṇaṃ prayuṅkte kārayate /
GS24jvkasipu:3484: citavatkartṛkāt iti kim ? śuṣyanti vrīhayaḥ, śoṣayate vrīhīnātapaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:3490: yat kartrabhiprāya-viṣayam ātmanepadaṃ tad-avasthitam eva, na pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:3491: pā dami aṅyama āṅyasa parimuha ruci nṛti vada vasa ity etebhyo ṇy-antebhyaḥ parasmaipadaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3515: atha atra prasmaipadena mukte katham ātmanepadaṃ labhyate, yāvatā anudāttaṅita ātmanepadam (*1,3.12) ity evam ādinā prakarṇena tan niyatam ?
GS24jvkasipu:3516: evaṃ tarhi ātmanepadam eva atra vikalpitaṃ vidhīyate, tac ca anantaraṃ
GS24jvkasipu:3518: tena mukte, śeṣāt kartari parasmaipadam bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:3523: tats-āhacaryād luṭhādayo 'pi kṛpū paryantās tathā+eva vyapadiśyante /
GS24jvkasipu:3525: anudāttettvān nityam eva ātmanepade prāpte dyutādibhyo luṅi vā parasmaipadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3532: vṛtu vartate, vṛdhu vṛddhau śṛdhu śabda-kutsāyām, syandū prasravaṇe, kṛpū
GS24jvkasipu:3533: sāmarthye, etebhyo dhatubhyaḥ sye sani ca parato vā parasmaipadaṃ bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:3549: vṛtāditvād eva syasanor vikalpaḥ siddho luṭi vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:3550: cakāras tarhi syasanor anukarṣaṇa-artho na vaktavyaḥ, evaṃ tarhi iyaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:3551: prāptiḥ pūrvāṃ prāptiṃ bādheta, tasmāc cakaraḥ syasanor anukarṣaṇā-rthaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:3553: luṭi ca syasanoś ca klṛpeḥ parasmaipadaṃ vā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3562: iti śrījayādityaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau prathamādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:3566: ā etasmāt sūtrāvadheryadita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ, tatra ekā sañjñā
GS24jvkasipu:3568: kā punar asau ? yā parā anavakāśā ca /
GS24jvkasipu:3569: anyatra sañjāsamāveśān niyama-arthaṃ vacanam ekaiva sañjñā bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:3570: vakṣyati - hrasvaṃ laghu (*1,4.10), bhidi, chidi - bhettā, chettā /
GS24jvkasipu:3571: saṃyoge guru (*1,4.11), śikṣi, bhikṣi - śikṣā, bhikṣā /
GS24jvkasipu:3572: saṃyoga-parasya hrasvasya laghusañjñā prāpnoti, gurusañjñā ca /
GS24jvkasipu:3573: ekā sañjñā iti vacanād gurusañjñā eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3574: atatakṣat, ararakṣat, sanvallaghuni caṅpare 'naglope (*7,4.93) ity eṣa vidhir na bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:3578: yatra dvau prasaṅgāv anyārthav ekasmin yugapat prāpnutaḥ, sa
GS24jvkasipu:3581: utsarga-apavāda-nitya-anitya-antaraṅga-vahiraṅgeṣu tulyabalatā na asti iti na ayam asya yogasya viṣayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3583: apravṛttau, paryāyeṇa vā pravṛttau prāptāyāṃ vacanam ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:3584: ato dīrgho yañi (*7,3.101), supi ca (*7,3.102) ity asya avakāśaḥ -
GS24jvkasipu:3586: vahuvacane jhalyet (*7,3.103) ity asya avakāśaḥ - vṛkṣeṣu, plakṣeṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:3595: īkāra-antam ūkara-antaṃ ca stryākhyaṃ śabda-rūpaṃ nadīsañjñaṃ bhavati /
