GS24jvkasipu:3607: ākhyā-grahaṇaṃ kim ? śabda-arthe strītva eva yathā syāt, padāntarākhye mā bhūt, grāmanye striyai /
GS24jvkasipu:3614: iyaṅ-uvaṅoḥ iti iyaṅ-uvaṅ-sthānau, tau yū nadīsañjñau na bhavataḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:3621: pūrveṇa nitye pratiṣedhe prāpte āmi vikalpaḥ kriyte /
GS24jvkasipu:3622: iyaṅ-uvaṅ-sthānau yū āmi parato vā nadīsañjñau na bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3628: dīrghasya nadīsañjñā vihitā, hrasvasya na prāpnoti, iyaṅ-uvaṅ-sthānayoś ca pratiṣiddhā /
GS24jvkasipu:3630: ṅiti parato hrasvaś ca yvoḥ sambandhī yaḥ stryākhyaḥ, stryākhyau
GS24jvkasipu:3631: iyaṅ-uvaṅ-sthānau ca yū vā nadī sañjñau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3644: kaś ca śeṣaḥ ? hrasvam ivarṇa-uvarṇa-antaṃ yan na stryākhyam, stryākhyaṃ ca yan na nadīsañjñakaṃ, sa śeṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3653: ghi-pradeśāḥ -- dvandve ghi (*2,2.32) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:3656: pati-śabdasya ghisañjñāyāṃ siddhāyām ayaṃ niyamaḥ kriyate, pati-śabdaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:3668: pūrveṇa niyamena asamāse na prāpnoti iti vacanam ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:3669: ṣaṣṭhyantena yuktaḥ pati-śabdaḥ chandasi vaṣaye vā ghisañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3670: kuluñcānāṃ pataye namaḥ, kuluñcānāṃ patye namaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3675: mātrikasya hrasvasañjñā kṛtā tasya anena laghusañjñā vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:3681: laghu-pradeśāḥ - puganta-laghu-upadhasya ca ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:3686: saṃyoge prato hrasvam akṣaraṃ gurusañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3690: guru-pradeśāḥ - guroś ca halaḥ (*3,3.103) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:3700: yasmāt pratyayo vidhīyate dhātor vā prātipadikād vā tad-ādi śabda-rūpaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:3708: yasmāt iti sañjñi-nirdeśa-artham, tad-ādi iti sambandhāt /
GS24jvkasipu:3711: ner biśaḥ (*1,3.17) ity upasargād vidhir asti, tad-āder aṅgasañjñā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:3712: vidhi-grahaṇaṃ kim ? pratyaya-paratvam ātre mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:3718: punaḥ pratyaya-grahaṇaṃ kim artham ? lupta-pratyaye mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:3725: subantaṃ tiṅantaṃ ca śabda-rūpaṃ padasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3730: pada-pradeśāḥ - padasya (*8,1.13), padāt (*8,1.17) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:3733: kye iti kyac - kyaṅ - kyaśāṃ sāmānya-grahanam /
GS24jvkasipu:3734: na-antaṃ śabda-rūpaṃ kye parataḥ padasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3739: na-antam eva kye parataḥ padasamñjñam bhavati, na anyat /
GS24jvkasipu:3746: siti pratyaye parataḥ pūrvaṃ padasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3755: pūrveṇa padasañjñāyāṃ prāptāyāṃ tad-apavādo bhasañjñā vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:3756: yakārādāv ajādau ca svādau sarvanāmasthāna-varjite pratyaye parataḥ pūrvaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:3767: vṛṣan ity etat vasvaśvayoḥ prato bhasañjñaṃ bhavati chandasi viśaye /
GS24jvkasipu:3774: takāra-antaṃ sakāra-antaṃ śabda-rūpaṃ matv-arthe pratyaye parato bhasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3782: ayasmaya-ādīni śabdarūpāṇi chandasi viśaye sādhūni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:3783: bhapada-sañjña-adhikāre vidhanāt tena sukhena sadhutvam ayasmaya-ādīnāṃ
GS24jvkasipu:3789: padatvāt kutvaṃ, bhatvāj jaśtvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3794: ṅy-āp prātipadikāt svādayaḥ, lasya tibādayaḥ iti sāmānyena bahuvacanaṃ vihitaṃ, tasya anena bahutva-saṅkhyā vācyatvena vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:3796: bahutvam asya vācyaṃ bhavati iti yāvat /
GS24jvkasipu:3801: yatra ca saṅkhyā sambhavati tatra ayam upadeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3802: avyayebhyas tu niḥ-saṅkhyebhyaḥ sāmānya-vihitāḥ svādayo vidyanta eva //
GS24jvkasipu:3815: yad ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ kārake ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:3821: kārake iti kim ? vṛkṣasya parṇaṃ patati /
GS24jvkasipu:3823: akathitaṃ ca (*1,3.51), akathitaṃ ca kārakaṃ karmasañjñaṃ bhavati -
GS24jvkasipu:3825: karake iti kim ? māṇavakasya pitaraṃ panthānaṃ pṛcchati /
GS24jvkasipu:3826: kārakasaṃśabdaneṣu ca anena eva viśeṣaṇena vyavahāro vijñāyate //
GS24jvkasipu:3829: dhruvaṃ yad apāyayuktam apāye sādhye yad avadhibhūtaṃ tat kārakam apādānasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3838: apādānapradeśāḥ - apādāne pañcamī (*2,3.28) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:3841: bibhety-arthānāṃ trāyaty-arthānāṃ ca dhātūnāṃ prayoge bhaya-hetur yaḥ stat kārakam apādānasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3850: parāpūrvasya jayateḥ prayoge 'soḍho, yo 'rthaḥ soḍhuṃ na śakyate, tat kārakam apādānasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3855: vāraṇa-arthānām dhātūnām prayoge ya īpsito 'rthaḥ tat kārakam apādānasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3859: īpsitaḥ iti kim ? yavebhyo gā vārayati kṣetre //
GS24jvkasipu:3863: antardhi-nimittaṃ yena adarśanam ātmana icchati tat kārakam apādānasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3867: antardhau iti kim ? caurān na didṛkṣate /
GS24jvkasipu:3868: icchati-grahaṇaṃ kim ? adarśanecchāyāṃ satyāṃ saty api darśane yathā syāt
GS24jvkasipu:3873: upayoge sādhye ya ākhyātā tat kārakam apādānasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3880: jany-arthasya janmanaḥ kartā jāyamānaḥ, tasya yā prakṛtiḥ kāraṇam, hetuḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:3889: bhū-kartuḥ prabhavo yaḥ, tat kārakam apādānasaṃjñam bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3893: karmaṇā yam abhipraiti sa sampradānam || PS_1,4.32 ||
GS24jvkasipu:3895: karmaṇā karaṇa-bhūtena kartā yam abhipraiti tat kārakaṃ sampradānasañjñaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:3905: sampradānapradeśāḥ - caturthī sampradāne (*2,3.13) ity evam ādayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3906: karmaṇaḥ karaṇasañjñā vaktavyā sampradānasya ca karmasañjñā /
GS24jvkasipu:3912: rucy-arthānāṃ dhātūnāṃ prayoge prīyamāṇo yo 'rthaḥ, tat kārakaṃ sampradānā-sañjñam bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:3916: prīyamāṇaḥ iti kim ? devadattāya rocate modakaḥ pathi //
GS24jvkasipu:3919: ślāgha hnuṅ sthā śapa ity eteṣām jñīpsyamāno yo 'rthah, tat kārakaṃ sampradāna-sañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3922: devadattaṃ ślāghamānastām ślāghāṃ tam eva jñapayitum icchati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3929: jñīpsyamānaḥ iti kim ? deadattāya ślāghate pathi //
GS24jvkasipu:3932: dhārayateḥ prayoge uttamarṇo yo 'rthaḥ, tat kārakaṃ sampradānasañjñaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:3936: dhanasvāmī prayoktā uttamarṇaḥ, sa sampradānasañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3939: uttārṇaḥ iti kim ? devadattāya śatam dharayati grāme //
GS24jvkasipu:3943: tasya īpsito yo 'rthaḥ, tat kārakaṃ sampradāna-sañjñam bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3947: īpsitaḥ iti kim ? puśpebhyo vane spṛhayati //
GS24jvkasipu:3954: krudhādy-arthānām prayoge yaṃ prati kopaḥ, tat kārakaṃ sampradānasañjñam
GS24jvkasipu:3958: tasmāt sāmānyena viśesaṇam yaṃ prati kopaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:3963: yam prati kopaḥ iti kim ? bhāryām īrṣyati, mā enām anyo drākṣīt iti //
GS24jvkasipu:3967: krudha-druhor upasṛṣṭayor upasarga-sambaddhayoḥ yaṃ prati kopaḥ, tat kārakaṃ karmasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3974: rādher īkṣeś ca kārakam sampradāna-sañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3977: sa kasya bhavati ? yasya śubhāśubhaṃ pṛcchyate /
GS24jvkasipu:3980: naimittikaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ san devadattasya daivaṃ paryālocayati ity arthaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:3983: prati āṅ ity evaṃ pūrvasya śṛṇoteḥ kārakam sampradāna-sañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3985: pratipūrva āṅpūrvaś ca śṛṇoti rabhyupagame pratijñāne vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:3986: sa ca abhyupagamaḥ parena prayuktasya sato bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3987: tatra prayoktā pūrvasyāḥ kriyāyā kartā sampradānasañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3994: anupūrvasya pratipūrvasya ca gṛṇāteḥ kārakam pūrvasyāḥ kriyāyaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:3997: hotā prathamaṃ śaṃsati, tam anyaḥ protsāhayati /
GS24jvkasipu:3998: anugaraḥ, pratigaraḥ iti hi saṃsituḥ protsāhane vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:4002: kriyā-siddhau yat prakṛṣṭopakārakaṃ vivakṣitam tat sādhakatamaṃ kārakam
GS24jvkasipu:4008: karaṇapradeśāḥ -- kartṛ-karaṇayos tṛtīyā (*2,3.18) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:4011: pūrveṇa karaṇa-sañjñāyāṃ karana-sañjñāyāṃ prāptāyām karmasañjñā vidhīyate
GS24jvkasipu:4012: divaḥ sādhakatamaṃ yat kārakam tat karmasañjñam bhavati, cakārāt karaṇasañjñam ca /
GS24jvkasipu:4017: pūrvena karaṇa-sañjñāyāṃ prāptāyā sampradāna-sajñā pakṣe vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:4018: parikrayaṇe sādhakatamaṃ kārakam anyatarasyāṃ sampradāna-sañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4019: parikrayaṇam niyatakālaṃ vetanādinā svīkaraṇam, natyantikaḥ kraya eva /
GS24jvkasipu:4025: kartṛ-karmaṇoḥ kriyāśrayabhūtayoḥ dhāraṇakriyāṃ prati ya ādhārah, tat kārakam adhikaraṇasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4029: adhikarana-pradeśāḥ -- saptamy-adhikaraṇe ca (*2,3.36) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:4033: adhipūrvāṇāṃ śīṅ sthā ās ity eteṣām ādhāro yaḥ, tat kārakaṃ karma-sañjñaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:4040: abhinipūrvasya viśater ādhāro yaḥ, tat kārakam karma-sañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4042: kathaṃ kalyāṇe 'bhiniveśaḥ, pāpe 'bhiniveśaḥ, yā yā sañjñā yasmin yasmin sañjñiny abhiniviśate iti ? anyatarasyām iti vartate, parikrayaṇe sampradānam anyatarasyām (*1,4.44) ity ataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4046: upa anu adhi ā ity evaṃ pūrvasya vasater ādhāro yaḥ, tat kārakaṃ karmasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4057: kartuḥ kriyayā yad āptum iṣṭatamaṃ tat kārakaṃ karmasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4062: tam abgrahaṇaṃ kim ? payasā odanaṃ bhuṅkte /
GS24jvkasipu:4064: itarathā ādhārasya+eva hi syāt gehaṃ praviśati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:4065: odanaṃ pacati, saktūn pibati ity ādiṣu na syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:4067: karma-pradeśāḥ -- karmaṇi dvitīyā (*2,3.2) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:4070: yena prakāreṇa kartur īpsitatamaṃ kriyayā yujyate, tena+eva cet prakārena yad anīpsitaṃ yuktaṃ bhavati, tasya karmasañjñā vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:4071: īpsitād anyat sarvam anīpsitam, dveṣyama, itarac ca /
GS24jvkasipu:4077: akathitaṃ ca yat kārakaṃ tat karmasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4080: bruviśāsiguṇena ca yat sacate tad akīrtitam ācaritaṃ kavinā //
GS24jvkasipu:4085: pāṇyādikam apy upayoga-nimittaṃ, tasya 86 kasmān na bhavati ? na+etad asti
GS24jvkasipu:4089: bruviśāsyor guṇaḥ sādhanam, pradhānaṃ, pradhānaṃ karma, dharma-adikam,
GS24jvkasipu:4090: tena yat sambadhyate, tadakīrtitam ācaritaṃ kavinā, tadakathitam auktaṃ sūtrakāreṇa /
GS24jvkasipu:4102: gaty-arthānāṃ buddhy-arthānāṃ pratyavasāna-arthānam ca dhātūnāṃ, tatha
GS24jvkasipu:4103: śabda-karmakāṇām akarmakanām ca aṇy-antānām yaḥ kartā, sa ṇy-antānāṃ
GS24jvkasipu:4105: gacchati māṇavako grāmam, gamayati māṇavakaṃ grāmam /
GS24jvkasipu:4106: yāti māṇavako grāmam, yāpayati māṇavakaṃ grāmam /
GS24jvkasipu:4108: nayati bhāram devadattaḥ, nāyayati bhāram devadattena /
GS24jvkasipu:4109: vahati bhāram devadattaḥ, vāhyati bhāraṃ devadattena /
GS24jvkasipu:4111: iha praitṣedho mā bhūt, vahanti yavān balīvardāḥ, vāhayati yavān balīvardān iti /
GS24jvkasipu:4112: buddhiḥ - budhyate māṇavako dharmam, bodhayati māṇavakaṃ dahrmam /
GS24jvkasipu:4113: vetti māṇavako dharmam, vedayati māṇavakaṃ dharmam /
GS24jvkasipu:4115: bhuṅkte māṇavaka odanam, bhojayati māṇavakam odanam /
GS24jvkasipu:4118: atti māṇavaka odanam, ādayate māṇavakena odanam /
GS24jvkasipu:4121: bhakṣayati piṇḍīṃ devadattaḥ, bhakṣayati piṇḍīṃ devadattena iti /
GS24jvkasipu:4122: ahiṃsa-arthasya iti kim ? bhakṣayanti balīvardāḥ sasyam, bhakṣayanti balīvardān sasyam /
GS24jvkasipu:4123: śabda-karmaṇām -- adhīte mānavako vedam, adhyāpayati māṇavakaṃ vedam /
GS24jvkasipu:4128: eteṣām iti kim ? pacaty odanaṃ devadattaḥ, pācayaty odanaṃ devadattena iti
GS24jvkasipu:4129: aṇyantānām iti kim ? gamayati devadatto yajñadattam, tam aparaḥ prayuṅkte,
GS24jvkasipu:4133: ani karta sa ṇau iti vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:4134: harateḥ karoteś ca aṇyantayor yaḥ kartā sa ṇyantayor anyatarasyāṃ karmasañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4135: harati bhāraṃ mānavakaḥ, harayati bhāraṃ mānavakaṃ, mānavakena iti vā /
GS24jvkasipu:4136: karoti kaṭaṃ devadattaḥ, kārayati kaṭaṃ devadattaṃ, devadattena iti vā /
GS24jvkasipu:4138: abhivadati guruṃ devadattaḥ, abhivādayate guruṃ devadattaṃ, devadattena iti vā /
GS24jvkasipu:4139: paśyanti bhṛtyā rājānam, darśayate bhṛtyān rājānam, bhṛtyaiḥ iti vā /
GS24jvkasipu:4140: ātmanepade iti kim ? darśayati caitraṃ maitramaparaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4147: aguṇī-bhūto, yaḥ kriyā-siddhau svatantryeṇa vivakṣyate, tat kārakṃ kartṛsañjñaṃ bhavti
GS24jvkasipu:4150: kartṛ-pradeśāḥ - kartṛ-karaṇayos tṛtīyā (*2,3.18) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:4156: svatantrasya prayojako yo 'rthaḥ, tat-kārakaṃ hetu-sañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4161: hetutvad ṇico nimittaṃ kartṛtvāc ca kartṛ-pratyayena+ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:4162: hetu-pradeśāḥ - hetumati ca (*3,1.26) ity evam adayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:4166: prāg etasmād avadheryānita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ, nipāta-sañjñāste
GS24jvkasipu:4168: vakṣyati - ca-adayo 'sattve (*1,4.57), ca, vā, ha, aha /
GS24jvkasipu:4171: rephoccāraṇam iśvare tosun-kasunau (*3,4.13) ity ayam avadhirmā vijñāyi iti /
GS24jvkasipu:4172: rīśvarādvīśvarān mā bhūt kṛnmejantaḥ paro 'pi saḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4176: ca-ādayo nipāta-sañjñā bhavanti, na cet sattve vartante /
GS24jvkasipu:4201: māṅo ṅakāro viśeṣaṇārthaḥ, māṅi luṅ (*3,3.175) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:4202: iha na bhavati, mā bhavatu, ma bhaviṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:4318: upasarga-pratirūpakāḥ -- avadattam vidattaṃ ca pradataṃ ca adikarmaṇi /
GS24jvkasipu:4319: sudattam anudattaṃ ca nidattam iti ceṣyate //
GS24jvkasipu:4320: aca upasargāt taḥ (*7,4.47) iti tatvam na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4325: asattve iti kim ? paśur vai puruṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4326: paśuḥ puroḍaśaḥ nipāta-pradeśāḥ -- svara-ādi-nipatam avyayam (*1,1.37) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:4351: upasargāḥ kriyā-yoge (*1,4.59) iti ca-ādīnām upasarga-sañjñā mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:4352: asattve ity eva, parā jayati senā //
GS24jvkasipu:4360: kriyā-yoge iti kim ? pragato nāyako 'smād deśāt, pranāyako deśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4363: sañjñāvidhānasāmarthyādanajantatve 'pi aca upasargāt taḥ (*7,4.47) iti tattvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4366: upasarga. pradeśāḥ -- upasarge ghoḥ kiḥ (*3,3.93) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:4376: ūrīsyāt ity atra upasarga-prādurbhyām astir y-ac-paraḥ (*8,3.87) iti ṣatvaṃ prasajyeta /
GS24jvkasipu:4380: gatir anantaraḥ (*6,2.49) iti svaraḥ, upasargāt (*8,4.14) (*8,3.65) iti ṇatvaṣatve ca bhavataḥ
GS24jvkasipu:4385: punaścanasau chandasi gatisañjñau bhavata iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:4393: ūry-ādayaḥ śabdāḥ cvy-antā ḍaj-antāś ca kriyā-yoge gati-sañjñā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:4395: tat-sāhacaryād ūry-ādīnām api tair eva yoge gati-sañjñā vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:4419: phalū, phalī, viklī, āklī iti vikāre - phalū kṛtya /
GS24jvkasipu:4452: anitiparam iti kim ? khāḍiti kṛtvā niraṣṭhīvat //
GS24jvkasipu:4464: ādara-anādarayoḥ iti kim ? satkṛtvā kāṇḍaṃ gataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4468: alam iti pratiṣedhe, sāmarthye, paryāptau, bhūṣaṇe ca iti viśeṣanam upādīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:4473: bhūṣaṇe iti kim ? alaṃ bhuktvā odanaṃ gataḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:4482: aparigrahe iti kim ? antarhatvā bhūṣikām śyeno gataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4490: kaṇe-śabdo manas-śabdaś ca śraddhā-pratīghāte gati-sañjñau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4493: tāvat pibati yāvad asya abhilāśo nivṛttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4495: śraddhā-pratīghāte iti kim ? kaṇe hatvā gataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4519: sa gaty-artheṣu dhātuṣu vadatau ca gatisañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4526: avyayam ity eva, udakam acchaṃ gacchati //
GS24jvkasipu:4531: svayam eva tu yadā buddhyā parām ṛśati tadā na asty upadeśaḥ iti so 'sya
GS24jvkasipu:4536: anupadeśe iti kim ? adaḥ kṛtvā kāṇḍaṃ gataḥ iti parasya kathayati //
GS24jvkasipu:4544: antardhau iti kim ? tiro bhūtvā sthitaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4550: tiraḥ-śabdaḥ karotau parato vibhāṣā gati-sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4555: antardhau ity eva, tiraḥ-kṛtvā kāṣṭhaṃ tiṣṭhati //
GS24jvkasipu:4559: upāje 'nvāje-śabdau vibhakti-pratirūpakau nipātau durbalasya sāmarthyādhāne vartete /
GS24jvkasipu:4566: sākṣāt-prabhṛtīni śabdarūpāṇi kṛñi vibhāṣā gati-sañjñāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:4604: atyādhānam upaśleṣaṇam, tad-abhāve 'natyādhāne urasi-manasī śabdau vibhāṣā kṛñi gati-sañjñau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4607: anatyāvāne iti kim ? urasi kṛtvā pāṇiṃ śete //
GS24jvkasipu:4612: madye pade nivacane ity ete śabdā anatyādhāne vibhāṣā kṛñi gati-sajñā
GS24jvkasipu:4618: vācam niyamya ity arthaḥ anatyādhāne ity eva, hastitaḥ pade kṛtvā śiraḥ śete //
GS24jvkasipu:4622: haste pāṇau ity etau śabdau kṛñi nityaṃ gatisañjñau bhavataḥ upayamane /
GS24jvkasipu:4627: upayamane iti kim ? haste kṛtvā kārṣāpanaṃ gataḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:4632: tad-ānukūlyaṃ vandhana-hetukaṃ yadā bhavati tadā prādhvaṃśabdaḥ kṛñi nityaṃ gatisañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4634: bandhne iti kim ? prādhvaṃ kṛtvā śakaṭaṃ gataḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:4638: jīvikā upaniṣad ity etau śabdau aupamye viṣahe kṛñi gatisañjñau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4641: aupamye iti kim ? jīvikām kṛtvā gataḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:4650: prāk prayoge prapte chandasi pare 'pi abhyanujñāyante /
GS24jvkasipu:4651: chandasi viṣaye gatyupasarga-sañjñakāḥ pre 'pi pūrve 'pi prayoktavyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4652: na ca preṣāṃ prayujyamānānāṃ sañjñā-kāryaṃ kiñcid asti /
GS24jvkasipu:4653: kevalaṃ praprayoge 'pi kriyāyoge eṣām asti iti jñāpyate /
GS24jvkasipu:4658: vyavahitāś ca gatyupasarga-sañjñakāḥ chandasi dṛśyante ā mandrairindra haribhiryāhi mayūraromabhiḥ
GS24jvkasipu:4663: yānita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ karmapravacanīya. sañjñāste veditavyāḥ adhir
GS24jvkasipu:4665: karmapravacanīya-pradeśāḥ -- karmapravacanīya-yukte dvitīyā (*2,3.8) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:4672: kim artham idam ucyate, yāvatā lakṣana-ittham bhūta-ākhyāna (*1,4.90) iti siddhaivānoḥ karmapravacanīya-sañjñā ? hetv-arthaṃ tu vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:4682: hīnaḥ iti nyūnaḥ ucyate, sa ca+utkṛṣṭāpekṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4684: hīne dyotye ayam anuḥ karmapravacanīya-sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4689: upa-śabdaḥ adhike hīne ca dyotye karmapravacanīya-sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4695: apa-parī śabdau varjane dyotye karmapravacanīya-sañjñau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4702: āṅ ity eṣā śabdo maryādā-vacane karmapravacanīya-sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4709: maryādā-vacane iti kim ? īṣad-arthe kriyāyoge ca mā bhūt //
GS24jvkasipu:4712: lakṣaṇe, itthaṃ-bhūta-ākhyāne, bhāge, vīpsāyāṃ ca viśāya-bhūtāyāṃ prati pari anu ity ete karmapravacanīya-sañjñā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:4713: lakṣaṇe tāvat - vṛkṣaṃ prati vidyotate vidyut /
GS24jvkasipu:4719: bhāge - yad atra māṃ prati syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:4726: atha pariśabda-yoge pañcamī kasmān na bhavati pañcamy-apa-aṅ-paribhiḥ
GS24jvkasipu:4730: lakṣana-ādiṣu eva bhāga-varjiteṣu abhiḥ karmapravacanīya-sañño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4735: yad atra mama abhiṣyat tad dīyatām /
GS24jvkasipu:4736: yadatra mama bhavati tad dīyatām ity arthaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:4741: pratinidhiviṣaye pratidānaviṣaye ca pratiḥ karmapravacanīya-sañjño bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:4758: pūjāyām iti kim ? suṣiktaṃ kiṃ tavātra //
GS24jvkasipu:4761: ati-śabdaḥ atikramaṇe, ca-kārāt pūjayaṃ ca karmapravacanīya-sañjño bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:4770: padārthe, sambhāvane, anvavasarge, garhāyām, samuccaye ca vartamānaḥ apiḥ
GS24jvkasipu:4772: padāntarasya aprayujyamānasya arthaḥ padārthaḥ - sarpiṣo 'pi syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:4774: mātrā, binduḥ, stokam ity asya arthe 'pi śabdo vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:4775: sambhāvanam adhikārtha-vacanena śakter apratighātāviṣkaranam - api siñcen mūlaka-sahasram
GS24jvkasipu:4779: garhā nindā - dhig jālmaṃ devadattam, api siñcet palāṇḍum /
GS24jvkasipu:4787: īśvaraḥ svāmī, sa ca svam apekṣate /
GS24jvkasipu:4788: tad ayam svasvāmi-sambandhe adhiḥ karmapravacanīya-sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4789: tatra kadācit svāminaḥ karmapravacanīya-vibhaktiḥ saptamī bhavati, kadācit svāt /
GS24jvkasipu:4805: śatṛkvasū ca parasmaipada-pradeśāḥ - sici vṛddhiḥ prasmaipadeṣu (*7,2.1)
GS24jvkasipu:4818: ātmanepada-pradeśāḥ - anudatta-ṅita ātmanepadam (*1,3.12) ity evam ādayaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:4828: ātmanepadeṣu - ta, ātām, jha iti prathamaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4831: prathama-madhyama-uttama-pradeśāḥ - śeṣe prathamaḥ (*1,4.108) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:4838: supaś ca trīṇi trīṇi padāni ekaśa ekavacana-dvivacana-bahuvacana-sañjñāni
GS24jvkasipu:4847: trīṇi trīṇi vibhakti-sañjñāś ca bhavanti supas tiṅaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:4848: vibhakti-pradeśāḥ - aṣṭana ā vibhaktau (*7,2.84) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:4849: yuṣmady-upapade samāna-adhikaraṇe sthāniny api madhyamaḥ || PS_1,4.105 ||
GS24jvkasipu:4851: lasya (*3,4.77) ity adhikṛtya sāmānyena tib-ādayo vihitāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4853: yuṣmady-upapade sati vyavahite cāvyavahite sati samānādhikaraṇe samāna-abhidheye tulya-kārake sthānini prayujyamāne 'py aprayujyamāne 'pi
GS24jvkasipu:4861: prahāse ca manya-upapade manyater uttama ekavac ca || PS_1,4.106 ||
GS24jvkasipu:4864: prahāse gamyamāne manya-upapade dhātor madhyama-puruṣo bhavati, manyateś
GS24jvkasipu:4866: ehi manye odanam bhokṣyase iti, na hi bhokṣyase, bhuktaḥ so 'tithibhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4867: ehi manye rathena yāsyasi, na hi yāsyasi, yātstena te pitā /
GS24jvkasipu:4869: prahāse iti kim ? ehi manyase odanaṃ bhokṣye iti /
GS24jvkasipu:4886: yatra yuṣmad-asmadī samanādhikaraṇe upapade na staḥ, tatra śeṣe prathamapuruṣo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:4894: paro yaḥ sannikarṣaḥ, varṇānām ardhamātrākālavyavadhānaṃ, sa saṃhitāsañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4907: avasāna-pradeśāḥ - khar-avasānayor visarjanīyaḥ (*8,3.15) ity evam ādayaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:4908: iti śrījayādityaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau prathamādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:4913: yaḥ kaścidiha śāstre padavidhiḥ śrūyate sa samartho viditavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4918: vigrahavākyārthabhidhāne yaḥ śaktaḥ sa samartho vidhitavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4923: samartha-grahaṇaṃ kim ? paśya devadatta kaṣṭaṃ, śrito viṣṇumitro gurukulam
GS24jvkasipu:4924: tṛtīyā tatkṛta-arthena guṇavacanena (*2,1.30) - śaṅkulayā khaṇḍaḥ śaṅkulākhaṇḍaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4925: samartha-grahaṇaṃ kim ? kiṃ tvaṃ kariṣyasi śaṅkulayā, khaṇḍo devadatta upalena /
GS24jvkasipu:4927: samartha-grahaṇaṃ kim ? gaccha tvaṃ yūpāya, dāru devadattasya grehe /
GS24jvkasipu:4929: samartha-grahaṇaṃ kim ? gaccha tvaṃ mā vṛkebhyo, bhayaṃ devadattasya yajñadattāt /
GS24jvkasipu:4931: samartha-grahaṇaṃ kim ? bhāryā rājñaḥ, puruṣo devadattasya /
GS24jvkasipu:4933: samartha-grahaṇaṃ kim ? śaktastvaṃ akṣeṣu, śauṇḍaḥ pibati pānāgāre /
GS24jvkasipu:4934: pada-grahaṇaṃ kim ? varṇavidhau samarthaparibhāśā mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:4940: subantam āmantrite parataḥ parasya aṅgavad bhavati, svare svara-lakṣaṇe
GS24jvkasipu:4955: aṅga-grahaṇaṃ kim ? yathā mṛtpiṇḍībhūtaḥ svaraṃ labheta /
GS24jvkasipu:4957: vatkaraṇaṃ kim ? svāśrayam api yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:4959: āma eka-antaram āmantritam anantike (*8,1.55) ity ekāntaratā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4972: kaḍāra-saṃśabdanāt prāg yānita urdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ, te samāsasañjñā veditavyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4980: sup iti saha iti supā iti ca trayam api adhikṛtaṃ veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:4981: yad ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ, tatra+idam upasthitaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:4984: dvitīya-antaṃ śritādibhiḥ saha samasyate, kaṣṭaṃ śritaḥ kaṣṭaśritaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4985: saha-grahaṇaṃ yogavibhāga-artham, tiṅāpi saha yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:4991: yānita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ, avyayībhāva-sañjñā aste veditavyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4994: anvartha-sañjñā ceyaṃ mahatī pūrvapadārtha-prādhānyam avyayībhāvasya darśayati /
GS24jvkasipu:4995: avyayībhāva-pradeśāḥ - avyayībhāvaś ca (*2,4.18) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:5000: vibhaktyādiśv artheṣu yadavyayaṃ vartate tat samarthena sub-antena saha
GS24jvkasipu:5003: vibhaktivacane tāvat -- strīṣvadhikṛtya kathā pravartate adhistri /
GS24jvkasipu:5008: samṛddhir ṛddher ādhikyam -- samṛddhir madrāṇāṃ sumadram /
GS24jvkasipu:5010: vyṛddhir ṛddher abhāvaḥ -- gavadikānām ṛddher abhāvaḥ durgavadikam /
GS24jvkasipu:5014: atyayaḥ abhūtatvam, atikramaḥ -- atītāni himāni atihimam /
GS24jvkasipu:5018: taisṛkamācchādanam, tasya ayam upabhogakālo na bhavati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5025: yathā-arthe yad avyayaṃ vartate tat samasyate /
GS24jvkasipu:5026: yogyatā vipsā padārthānativṛttiḥ sādṛśyaṃ ca iti yathārthāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5036: kim-artham idam ucyate, yathārtha ity eva siddham ? guṇabhūte 'pi sādṛśye yathā syāt, sadṛśaḥ kikhyā rākikhi /
GS24jvkasipu:5037: sampattiḥ anurūpa ātmabhāvaḥ samṛddheranyaḥ -- sabrahma bābhravāṇām /
GS24jvkasipu:5041: na kiṃcid abhyāvahāryaṃ parityajati ity ayamartho 'dhikārthavacanena
GS24jvkasipu:5047: iyaṃ samāptirasakale 'py adhyayane bhavati iti sākalyāt pṛthag ucyate //
GS24jvkasipu:5050: yathā ity etad avyayam asādṛśye vartamānaṃ supā saha samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:5055: asādṛśye iti kim ? yathā devadattaḥ tathā yajñadattaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5056: yathārthe yadavyayam iti pūrveṇa+eva siddhe samāse vacanam idaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:5060: yāvat ity etad avyayam avadhāraṇe vartamānaṃ supā saha samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:5064: yāvantyamatrāṇi sambhavanti pañca ṣaṭ vā tāvata āmantrayasva /
GS24jvkasipu:5065: avadhāraṇe iti kim ? yāvad ṛttaṃ tāvad bhuktam /
GS24jvkasipu:5066: na avadhārayāmi kiyan mayā bhuktam iti //
GS24jvkasipu:5069: mātrā binduḥ, stokam, alpam iti paryāyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5070: mātrā-arthe vartamānena pratinā saha subantaṃ samasyate, avyayībhāvaś ca samāso bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:5073: mātrā-arthe iti kim ? vṛkṣaṃ prati vidhotate vidyut /
GS24jvkasipu:5074: sup iti vartamāne punaḥ sub-grahaṇam avyayanivṛtty-artham //
GS24jvkasipu:5077: akṣa-śabdaḥ, śalākā-śabdaḥ, saṅkhyā-śabdaś ca pariṇā saha samasyante,
GS24jvkasipu:5080: pañcikā nāma dyūtaṃ pañcabhir akṣaiḥ śalākābhir vā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5081: tatra yadā sarve uttānāḥ patanti avāñco vā, tadā pātyitā jyati, tasya+eva
GS24jvkasipu:5083: akṣeṇa+idaṃ na tathā vṛttaṃ yathā pūrvaṃ jaye akṣapari /
GS24jvkasipu:5090: akṣādayas tṛtīyāntāḥ pūrvoktasya yathā na tat /
GS24jvkasipu:5095: yad ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ, tad vibhāṣā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5101: apa pari bahis añcu ity ete subantāḥ pañcamyantena saha vibhāṣā
GS24jvkasipu:5110: āṅ ity etan maryādāyām abhividhau ca vartamānam pajcamyantena saha vibhāṣā
GS24jvkasipu:5113: abhividhau - ākumāraṃ yaśaḥ pāṇineḥ, ā kumārebhyaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:5116: lakṣaṇaṃ cihnaṃ, tad-vācinā subantena saha abhipratī śabda-avābhimukhye
GS24jvkasipu:5117: vartamānau vibhāṣā samasyete, avyayībhāvaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5120: agniṃ lakṣyīkṛtya abhimukhaṃ patanti ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5123: abhipratī iti kim ? yena agnis tena gataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5130: anuryasya samīpa-vācī tena lakṣaṇa-bhūtena saha vibhāṣā samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:5134: yatsamayā iti kim ? vṛkṣamanu vidyotate vidyut /
GS24jvkasipu:5135: avyayaṃ vibhakti-samīpa (*2,1.6) ity eva siddhe punarvacanam
GS24jvkasipu:5141: anuryasyāyāmavācī tena lakṣaṇabhūtena saha vibhāṣā samasyate, avyayībhāvaś ca samāso bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:5145: āyāmaḥ iti kim ? vṛkṣamanu vidhyotate vidyut //
GS24jvkasipu:5151: tiṣṭhanti gāvo yasmin kāle dohanāya sa tiṣṭhadgu kālaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5155: aparaḥ samāso na bhavati, paramatiṣṭhadgu iti /
GS24jvkasipu:5192: pāra-ṃdhya-śabdau ṣaṣṭhyantena saha vibhāṣā samasyete, avyayībhāvaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5201: vidyayā janmanā vā prāṇinām ekalakṣaṇasantāno vaṃśaḥ ity abhidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:5203: tad-vācinā subantena saha saṅkhyā samasyate, avyayībhāvaś ca samāso
GS24jvkasipu:5205: dvau munī vyākaraṇasya vaṃśyau dvimuni vyākaranasya /
GS24jvkasipu:5207: yadā tu vidyaya tadvatām abhedavivakṣā tadā sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5214: nadīvacanaiḥ śabdaiḥ saha saṅkhyā samasyate, avyayībhāvaś ca samāso
GS24jvkasipu:5225: nadībhiḥ saha subantam anyapadārthe vartamānaṃ sañjñāyāṃ viṣye samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:5242: pūrvācāryasañjñā ceyaṃ mahatī, tadaṅgīkaraṇaupādher api tadīyasya
GS24jvkasipu:5260: dvitīyāntaṃ subantam śrita-adibhiḥ saha samasyate, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso
GS24jvkasipu:5278: svayam etad avyayam ātmanā ity asyārthe vartate, tasya dvitīyayā sambandho
GS24jvkasipu:5280: svayam ity etat subantaṃ ktāntena saha samasyate, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso
GS24jvkasipu:5287: khaṭvā-śabdo dvitīyāntaḥ ktāntena saha kṣepe gamyamāne samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:5289: kṣepo nindā, sa ca samāsa-artha eva, tena vibhāṣā 'dhikāre 'pi nityasamāsa eva ayam /
GS24jvkasipu:5292: sarva eva avinītaḥ khaṭvārūḍhaḥ ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:5299: sāmi ity etad avyayam ardhaśabda-paryāyaḥ, tasya asattvavācitvād dvitīyayā
GS24jvkasipu:5301: tat subantaṃ ktantena saha samasyate, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5309: kālavācinaḥ śabdāḥ dvitīyāntāḥ ktāntena saha samasyante vibhāṣa,
GS24jvkasipu:5313: ṣaṇmuhūrtāścarācarāḥ, te kadācit ahargacchanti kadācit rātrim /
GS24jvkasipu:5322: atyantasaṃyogaḥ kṛtsna-saṃyogaḥ, kālasya svena sambandhinā vyāptiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5323: kālavācinaḥ śabdā dvitīyāntā atyantasaṃyoge gamyamāne supā saha samasyante vibhāṣā, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5331: tṛtīyāntam guṇavacanena arthaśabdena ca saha saṃsyate, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5341: pūrva sadṛśa sama ūnārtha kalaha nipuṇa miśra ślakṣṇa ity etaiḥ saha tṛtīyāntaṃ samasyate, tatpuruṣaś ca samaso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5342: asmād eva vacanāt pūrvādibhir yoge tṛtīyā bhavati, hetau vā draṣṭavyā /
GS24jvkasipu:5365: kartari karaṇe ca yā tṛtīyā tadantaṃ kṛdantena saha bahulaṃ samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:5372: bahula-grahanam kim ? dātreṇa lūnavān, paraśunā chinnavān, iha samāso na
GS24jvkasipu:5374: pādahārakaḥ, gale copakaḥ iti ca bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:5378: kartṛkaraṇayo yā tṛtīyā tadantaṃ subantaṃ kṛtaiḥ saha samasyate 'dhikārthavacane gamyamāne vibhāṣā, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5385: iha mā bhūt, kākaiḥ pātavyā iti //
GS24jvkasipu:5389: vyañjñavāci tṛtīyāntam anavācinā subantena sahā samasyate, vibhāśā tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:5396: miśrīkarana-vāci tṛtīyāntam bhakṣya-vācinā subantena saha samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:5406: tat iti sarvanāmnā caturthyantasya arthaḥ parāmṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:5408: tadartha artha bali hita sukha rakṣita ity etaiḥ saha caturthyantaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:5413: iha na bhavati, randhanāya sthalī, avahananāya ulūkhalam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:5414: tādarthye caturthī ca asmād eva jñāpakād bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5431: subantena saha samasyate vibhāṣā, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5440: tathā ca grāmanirgataḥ, adharmajugupsuḥ ity evam ādi siddhaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:5443: apeta apoḍha mukta patita apatrasta ity etaiḥ saha pajcamyantaṃ samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:5452: prāsādāt patitaḥ, bhojanād apatrastaḥ ity evam adau na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5453: kartṛkarane kṛtā bahulam (*2,1.32) ity asya+eva ayam prapañcaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:5456: stoka antika dūra ity evam arthāḥ śabdāḥ kṛcchra-śabdaś ca pañcamyantāḥ ktāntena saha samasyante, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5472: saptamyantaṃ śauṇḍa-ādibhiḥ saha samasyate, tatpuruṣāś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5493: siddha śuṣka pakva bandha ity etaiḥ saha saptamyantaṃ samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:5506: dhavāgkṣavācinā subantena saha saptamyantaṃ subantaṃ subantaṃ samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:5507: tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati kṣepe gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:5516: kṛtya-pratyayāntaiḥ saha saptamyantaṃ samasyate, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso
GS24jvkasipu:5522: ṛṇagrahaṇaṃ niyogopalakṣaṇa-arthaṃ, tena+iha api samāso bhavati, pūrvāhṇe geyaṃ sāma pūrvāhṇageyam
GS24jvkasipu:5524: ṛṇe iti kim ? māse deyā bhikṣā //
GS24jvkasipu:5527: sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye saptayantaṃ supā saha samasyate, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso
GS24jvkasipu:5530: tena nityasamāsa eva ayam, na hi vākyena sañjñā gamyate /
GS24jvkasipu:5539: aharavayavāḥ rātryavayavāś ca saptamyantāḥ ktāntena saha samasyante,
GS24jvkasipu:5545: avayava-grahanam kim ? etat tu te divā vṛttaṃ rātrau vṛttaṃ ca drakṣyasi /
GS24jvkasipu:5552: tatra ity etat saptamyantaṃ ktāntena saha samasyate, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso
GS24jvkasipu:5561: kṣepe gamyamāne saptamyantaṃ ktāntena saha samasyate, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso
GS24jvkasipu:5564: cāpalam etat, anavasthitatvaṃ tavaitat ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5568: niṣphalaṃ yat kriyate tad evam uchyate /
GS24jvkasipu:5573: pātresamita-ādayaḥ śabdas tatpuruṣa-sañjñā bhavanti kṣepe gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:5574: ye ca atra ktāntena saha samāsāḥ, teṣāṃ pūrvena+eva siddhe punaḥ pāṭho
GS24jvkasipu:5576: yuktarohyādiṣu hi pātresamitādayaś ca iti paṭhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:5579: avadhāraṇena kṣepo gamyate, pātre eva samitā na punaḥ kvacit kārye iti /
GS24jvkasipu:5619: cakāro 'vadhāraṇa-arthaḥ, tena samāsāntaraṃ na bhavati, paramapātresamitāḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:5624: pūrvakāla eka sarva jarat purāṇa nava kevala ity ete subantāḥ samānādhikaraṇena supā saha samasyante, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5647: digvācinaḥ śabdāḥ saṅkhyā ca samānādhikaraṇena subantena saha samasyante,
GS24jvkasipu:5648: tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati sañjñayāṃ vaṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:5658: taddhita-arthe viṣaye uttarapade ca parataḥ samāhāre ca abhidheye
GS24jvkasipu:5659: dik-saṅkhye samānādhikaraṇena supā saha samasyete, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso
GS24jvkasipu:5661: taddhita-arthe tāvat - pūrvasyāṃ śālāyāṃ bhavaḥ, dikpūrvapadād asañjñāyāṃ ñaḥ (*4,2.107), paurvaśālaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5680: taddhita-arthe tāvat - pañcasu kapāleśu saṃskṛtaḥ pañcakapālaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5682: saṃskṛtaṃ bhakṣāḥ (*4,2.16) iti iha aṇ, tasya dvigor lug-anapatye
GS24jvkasipu:5691: kutsita-vācīni subantāni kutsana-vacanaiḥ subantaiḥ saha samasyante,
GS24jvkasipu:5694: viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyeṇa bahulam (*2,1.57) iti paranipāte prāpte viśeṣyasya
GS24jvkasipu:5707: pāpāṇaka-śabdau kutsanābhidhāyinau, tayoḥ pūrveṇa samāse paranipātaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:5709: pāpa aṇaka ity ete subante kutsita-vacanaiḥ saha samasyete, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:5717: upamāna-vācīni subantāni sāmānya-vacanaiḥ subantaiḥ saha samasyante,
GS24jvkasipu:5726: sāmānya-vacanaiḥ iti kim ? phālā iva taṇḍulāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5730: upameyam upamitaṃ , tadvāci subantaṃ vyāghra-ādibhiḥ sāmarthyād
GS24jvkasipu:5731: upamāna-vacanaiḥ saha sāmasyate, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati, na cet sāmānyavācī śabdaḥ prayujyate /
GS24jvkasipu:5732: viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyeṇa bahulam (*2,1.57) iti paranipāte prāpte viśeṣyasya
GS24jvkasipu:5736: sāmānya-aprayoge iti im ? puruṣo 'yaṃ vyāghra iva śūraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5751: akṛtiganaś ca ayam, tena+idam api bhavati - mukhapadmam, mukhakamalam,
GS24jvkasipu:5756: viśeṣaṇa-vāci subantaṃ viśeṣya-vācinā samānādhikaraṇena subantena saha
GS24jvkasipu:5757: bahulaṃ samasyate, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5762: kvacin na bhavaty eva, rāmo jāmadagnyaḥ, arjunaḥ kārtavīryaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5768: pūrva apara prathama carama jaghanya samāna madhya madhyama vīra ity ete subantāḥ samānādhikaraṇena supā saha samasyante, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso
GS24jvkasipu:5782: śreṇya-ādayaḥ subantāḥ kṛta-ādibhiḥ samānadhikaraṇaiḥ sahaḥ samasyante,
GS24jvkasipu:5790: cvyantānāṃ tu ku-gati-pra-ādayaḥ (*2,2.18) ity anena nityasamāsaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5834: nañaiva viśeṣo yasya, sarvamanyat prakṛtyādikaṃ tulyaṃ, tan nañ-viśiṣṭam,
GS24jvkasipu:5835: tena nañviśiṣṭena ktāntena samānādhikaraṇena saha anañ ktāntaṃ samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:5860: sat mahat parama uttama utkṛṣṭa ity ete pūjyamānaiḥ saha samasyante,
GS24jvkasipu:5862: pūjyamānaiḥ iti vacanāt pūjāvacanāḥ sadādayo vijñāyante /
GS24jvkasipu:5868: pūjyamānaiḥ iti kim ? utkṛṣṭo gauḥ kadarmāt //
GS24jvkasipu:5871: vṛndāraka nāga kuñjara ity etaiḥ saha pūjyamāna-vāci subantaṃ samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:5873: pūjyamānam iti vacanāt pūjāvacanā vṛndāraka-ādayo gṛhyante /
GS24jvkasipu:5883: katara-katamau jātiparipraśne vṛtamānau samarthena supā saha samasyete,
GS24jvkasipu:5889: nanu katama-śabdastāvaj jātiparipraśna eva vyutpāditaḥ, katara-śabdo 'pi
GS24jvkasipu:5890: sāhacaryāt tadartha-vṛttir eva grahīṣyate, kiṃ jātiparipraśna-grahaṇena ?
GS24jvkasipu:5891: evaṃ tarhy etaj jñāpayati katama-śabdo 'nyatra api vartate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:5892: tathā ca pratyudāharanam - kataro bhavator devadattaḥ, katamo bhavatāṃ devadattaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:5895: kim ity etat kṣepe gamyamāne supā saha samasyate taturuṣaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5899: kimaḥ kṣepe (*5,4.70) iti samāsānto na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5900: kṣepe iti kim ? ko rājā pāṭaliputre //
GS24jvkasipu:5910: poṭādibhiḥ saha jātivāci subantaṃ samasyate, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:5929: jātivāci subantaṃ praśaṃsā-vacanaiḥ saha samasyate, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso
GS24jvkasipu:5932: te ca āviṣṭaliṅgatvād anyaliṅge 'pi jāti-śabde svaliṅgopādānā eva samānāhikaranā bhavanti
GS24jvkasipu:5943: samānādhikaraṇaiḥ saha yuva-śabdaḥ samasyate, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:5944: jaratībhiḥ iti strīliṅgena nirdeśaḥ, prātipādika-grahaṇe liṅgaviśiṣṭasya api grahanam iti jñāpaka-arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5955: kṛtyapratyaya-antās tulyaparyāyāś ca subantā ajāti-vacanena samasyante,
GS24jvkasipu:5967: varṇaviśeṣavāci subantaṃ varṇaviśeṣavācinā subantena samānādhikaraṇena saha samasyte, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5972: avayavadvārena kṛṣṇaśabdaḥ samudāye vartamānaḥ samānādhikaraṇo bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:5975: kumāra-śabdaḥ śramaṇā-ādibhiḥ saha samasyate, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:5976: ye 'tra strīliṅgāḥ paṭhyante, śramaṇā, pravrajitā, kulaṭā ity evam ādayaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:5977: taiḥ saha strīliṅgaḥ eva kumāra-śabdaḥ samasyate /
GS24jvkasipu:5978: ye tu puṃliṅgāḥ, adhyāpakaḥ, abhirūpakaḥ, paṇḍitaḥ iti, tair ubhayathā,
GS24jvkasipu:5998: catuṣpād-vācinaḥ subantā garbhiṇī-śabdena samasyante, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso
GS24jvkasipu:6003: iha mā bhūt - kālākṣī garbhaṇī, svastimatī garbhiṇī /
GS24jvkasipu:6009: cakāro 'vadhāraṇa-arthaḥ , paramamayūravyaṃsakaḥ iti samāsāntaraṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6075: iti śrījayādityaviracitāyām kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau dvitīyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:6079: ekadeśo 'sya asti ity ekadeśī, avayavī, tadvācinā subantena saha pūrva apara adhara uttara ity ete śabdāḥ sāmarthyād ekadeśabacanāḥ samasyante,
GS24jvkasipu:6082: ekaṃ ced adhikaraṇam ekadravyam ekadeśi bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6088: ekadeśinā iti kim ? pūrvaṃ na abheḥ kāyasya /
GS24jvkasipu:6089: ekādhikaraṇe iti kim ? pūrvaṃ chātrāṇām āmantraya /
GS24jvkasipu:6090: kathaṃ madhyāhnaḥ, sāyāhnaḥ iti ? saṅkhyā-vi-sāy-apūrvasya ahnasya ahann anyatarasyāṃ ṅau (*6,3.110) iti jñāpakāt sarvaṇaikadeśa-śabdena ahnaḥ samāso bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:6095: ardham ity etad napuṃsakam ekadeśinā-ekādhikaraṇena samasyate, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:6101: ekadeśinā ity eva, ardhaṃ pasor devadattasya /
GS24jvkasipu:6109: pūraṇa-guṇa (*2,2.11) iti pratiṣedhaś ca ata eva anyatarasyāṃ
GS24jvkasipu:6115: ekadeśinā ity eva, dvitīyaṃ bhikṣāyā bhikṣukasya /
GS24jvkasipu:6122: prāpta āpanna ity etau dvitīyāntena saha samasyete, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso
GS24jvkasipu:6124: prāpto jīvikām prāptajīvikaḥ, jīvikāprāptaḥ iti vā /
GS24jvkasipu:6125: āpanno jīvikam āpannajīvikaḥ, jīvikāpannaḥ iti vā //
GS24jvkasipu:6128: parimāṇamasya asti iti parimāṇī, tadbācinā subantena saha sāmarthyāt parimāṇavacanāḥ kāla-śabdāḥ samasyante, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6136: nañ samarthena subantena saha samasyate, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6141: īṣat ity ayaṃ śabdo 'kṛdantena supā saha samasyate, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso
GS24jvkasipu:6150: guṇavacanena iti kim ? iha na bhavati, īṣad gārgyaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:6153: ṣaṣṭhyantaṃ subantaṃ samarthena subantena saha samasyate, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:6156: kṛdyogā ca ṣaṣṭhī samasyata iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:6159: kim artham idam ucyate ? pratipadavidhānā ca ṣaṣṭhī na samasyate iti
GS24jvkasipu:6163: pūrveṇa samāsaḥ siddha eva, tasya kartari ca (*2,2.16) iti pratiṣedhe prāpte vacanam idam ārabhyate pratiprasavārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:6164: yājakādibhiḥ saha ṣaṣṭhī samasyate, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6180: tatsthaiś ca guṇaiḥ ṣaṣṭhī samasyate iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:6186: na nirdhāraṇe (*2,2.10) iti pratiṣedhe prāpte vacanam idam /
GS24jvkasipu:6191: nirdhārane yā ṣaṣṭhī sā na samasyate /
GS24jvkasipu:6196: pratipadavidhānā ca ṣaṣṭhī na samasyate iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:6201: pūraṇa guna suhitārtha sat avyaya tavya samānādhikaraṇa ity etaiḥ saha ṣaṣṭhī na samasyate
GS24jvkasipu:6202: artha-śabdaḥ pratyekam abhisambadhyate, tena svarūpa-vidhir na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6214: tavyatā sānubandhakena samāso bhavaty eva, brāhmaṇa-kartavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:6218: kiṃ ca syāt ? pūrvanipātasya aniyamaḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:6219: anantarāyāṃ tu prāptau pratiṣiddhāyāṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyeṇa bahulam
GS24jvkasipu:6227: kto yaḥ pūjāyāṃ vihitastena ṣaṣṭhī na samasyate /
GS24jvkasipu:6231: pūjāyām iti kim ? chātrasya hasitam chātrahasitam //
GS24jvkasipu:6243: karmaṇi ca yā ṣaṣṭhī sā na samasyate /
GS24jvkasipu:6244: ubhaya-prāptau karmaṇi (*2,3.66) iti ṣaṣṭhyā idaṃ grahanam /
GS24jvkasipu:6252: kartari yā ṣaṣṭhī sā tṛcā akena ca saha na samasyate /
GS24jvkasipu:6256: tṛc cartaryeva vidhīyate, tatprayoge kartari ṣaṣṭhī na asti /
GS24jvkasipu:6258: kartari iti kim ? ikṣubhakṣikāṃ me dhārayasi //
GS24jvkasipu:6261: kartari ca yau tṛj-akau tābhyāṃ saha ṣaṣṭhī na samasyate /
GS24jvkasipu:6262: sāmarthyād akasya viśeṣaṇa-arthaṃ kartṛ-grahaṇam, itaratra vyabhicārābhāvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:6266: nanu ca bhartṛ-śabdo hy ayaṃ yājakādiṣu paṭhyate ? sambandhi-śabdasya
GS24jvkasipu:6274: kriḍāyāṃ jīvikāyāṃ ca nityaṃ ṣaṣṭhī samasyate, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso
GS24jvkasipu:6276: tṛc kriḍā-jīvikayor na asti ity aka eva+udāhriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:6286: ku-gati-prādayaḥ samarthena śabdāntareṇa saha nityaṃ samasyante,
GS24jvkasipu:6317: ivena saha samāso vibhaktya-lopaḥ pūrvapada-prakṛtisvaratvaṃ ca vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:6326: upapadam atiṅantaṃ samarthena śabdāntareṇa saha samasyate nityam,
GS24jvkasipu:6331: nanu ca sup supā iti vartate, tatra kutas tiṅantena samāsa-prasaṅgaḥ ?
GS24jvkasipu:6332: evaṃ tarhi jñāpayati etayor yogayoḥ sup supeti na sambadhyate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:6333: tena gatikārakopapadānāṃ kṛdbhiḥ saha samāsavacanaṃ prāk subutpatteḥ ity etad upapannaṃ bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:6340: avyayena-upapadasya yaḥ samāsaḥ so 'mā+eva bhavati, na anyena /
GS24jvkasipu:6344: amā+eva iti kim ? kāla-samaya-velāsu tumun (*3,3.167) - kāle bhoktum /
GS24jvkasipu:6346: amā+eva yat tulya-vidhānam upapadaṃ tasya samāso yathā syāt, amā ca anyena
GS24jvkasipu:6347: ca yat tulya-vihdhānaṃ tasya mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:6352: upadaṃśas tṛtīyāyām (*3,4.47) ity ataḥ prabhṛti yāny upapadāni tāni
GS24jvkasipu:6353: amā+eva avyayena saha-anyatarasyāṃ samasyante, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso
GS24jvkasipu:6356: yad amā+eva tulyavidhānam upapadaṃ tasya prāpte, yathā upadaṃśas tṛtīyāyām
GS24jvkasipu:6358: yat punar amā ca anyena ca tulyavidhānaṃ tasya prāpte, yathā avyaye 'yathābhipretākhyāne kṛñaḥ ktvāṇamulau (*3,4..59) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:6361: amā+eva ity eva, paryaptivacaneṣv alamartheṣu (*3,4.66), paryāpto bhoktum /
GS24jvkasipu:6366: tena anyatra na prāpnoti iti vacanam ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:6367: ktvāpratyayena saha tṛtīyā-prabhṛtīni upapadāny anyatarasyāṃ samasyante,
GS24jvkasipu:6385: bahuvrīhi-pradeśāḥ - na bahuvrīhau (*1,1.29) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:6388: anekaṃ subantamanyapdārthe vartamānaṃ supā saha samasyate, bahuvrīhiś ca samāso bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:6389: prathamārtham ekaṃ varjayitvā sarveṣu vibhakty-artheṣu bahuvrīhir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6390: prāptam udakaṃ yaṃ grāmaṃ prāptodako grāmaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:6398: aneka-grahanaṃ kim ? bahūnām api yathā syāt, susūkṣmajaṭakeśena sugajājinavāsasā /
GS24jvkasipu:6399: samantaśitir andhreṇa dvayor vṛttau na sidhyati //
GS24jvkasipu:6408: uṣṭrasya mukham iva mukhaṃ yasya sa uṣṭramukhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:6410: samudāya-vikāraṣaṣṭhyāś ca bahuvrīhir uttarapada-lopaś ca+iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:6411: keśānāṃ saṅghātaḥ keśasaṅghātaḥ, keśasaṅghātaḥ cūḍā 'sya keśacūḍaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:6413: prādibhyo dhatujasya+uttarapadasya lopaś ca vā bahuvrīhir vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:6424: saṅkhyeye yā saṅkhyā vartate tayā saha avyaya-āsanna-adūra-adhika-saṅkhyāḥ
GS24jvkasipu:6439: saṅkhyeye iti kim ? adhikā viṃśatir gavām //
GS24jvkasipu:6443: diṅnāmāni subantāni antarāle vācye samasyante, bahuvrīhiś ca samāso
GS24jvkasipu:6445: dakṣiṇasyāś ca pūrvasyāś ca diśor yad-antarālaṃ dakṣiṇa-pūrvā dik /
GS24jvkasipu:6451: iha ma bhūt, aindryāś ca kauberyāś ca ciśor yad-antarālam iti //
GS24jvkasipu:6457: tatra iti saptamyante sarūpe pade teneti ca tṛtīyānte idam ity etasminn arthe saṃsyete, bahuvrīhiś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6458: itikaranaś ca+iha vivakṣārtho laukikam artham anusārayati /
GS24jvkasipu:6459: tato grahaṇaṃ, praharanaṃ karmavyatīhāro, yuddhaṃ ca samāsa-arthaḥ iti sarvam itikaranāllabhyate
GS24jvkasipu:6460: yat tatra iti nirdiṣṭaṃ grahaṇam cet tad bhavati, yat tena iti nirdiṣṭaṃ praharanaṃ cet tad bhavati, yat idam iti nirdiṣṭaṃ yuddhaṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6461: keśeṣu keśeṣu ca gṛhītvā idaṃ yuddhaṃ pravṛttaṃ keśākeśi /
GS24jvkasipu:6463: daṇḍaiś ca daṇḍaiś ca pragṛtya idaṃ yuddhaṃ pravṛttaṃ daṇḍādaṇḍi /
GS24jvkasipu:6465: ic karmavyatīhāre (*5,4.127) iti ic samāsāntaḥ, sa ca avyayam /
GS24jvkasipu:6466: anyeṣām api dṛśyate (*6,3.137) iti pūrvapadasya dīrghatvam /
GS24jvkasipu:6467: sarūpa-grahaṇaṃ kim ? halaiś ca musalaiś ca prahṛtya idaṃ yuddhaṃ pravṛttam //
GS24jvkasipu:6470: saha ity etac chābdarūpaṃ tulyayoge vartamānaṃ tena iti tṛtīyāntena saha
GS24jvkasipu:6475: tulyayoge iti kim ? sahaiva daśabhiḥ putrairbhāraṃ bahati gardabhī /
GS24jvkasipu:6476: vidyamātair eva daśabhiḥ putrairbhāraṃ vahati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:6477: kathaṃ sakarmakaḥ, salomakaḥ, sapakṣakaḥ iti ? na hy atra tulyayogo gamyate /
GS24jvkasipu:6484: anekaṃ subantaṃ ca-arthe vartamānam samasyate, dvandva-sañjñaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6486: tatra samuccayānvācayayor asāmarthyāt na asti samāsaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:6489: dhavaś ca khadiraś ca palāśaś ca dhava-khadira-palāśāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:6492: dvandva-pradeśāḥ - dvandve ca (*1,1.31) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:6509: na kevalam upasarjanasya, anyasya api yathā lakṣaṇaṃ vihitasya pūrvanipātasya ayam apavādaḥ paranipāto vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:6573: anekaprāptāv ekasya niyamaḥ, śeṣe tv aniyamaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:6580: aj-ādy-ad-antaṃ śabdarūpaṃ dvandve samāse pūrvaṃ prayoktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:6589: taparakaraṇaṃ kim ? aśvāvṛṣau, vṛṣāśve iti vā //
GS24jvkasipu:6593: alpāctaraṃ śabdarūpaṃ dvandve samāse pūrvaṃ prayoktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:6605: abhyarhitaṃ ca pūrvaṃ nipatati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:6620: sarvopasarjanatvād bahuvrīher aniyame prāpte niyama-arthaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:6621: saptamyantaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ ca bahuvrīhi-samāse pūrvaṃ prayoktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:6631: anayor eva mithaḥ saṃpradhāraṇāyāṃ pratvāt saṅkhyāyāḥ pūrvanipātaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:6636: saptamyāḥ pūrvanipāte prapte gaḍvādibhyaḥ saptamyantaṃ param /
GS24jvkasipu:6647: nanu ca viśeṣaṇam eva atra niṣṭhā ? na+eṣa niyamaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:6649: kathe kṛtam anena iti vā vigrahītavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:6657: kathaṃ kṛtakaṭaḥ, bhuktaudanaḥ ? prāptasya cābādhā vyākhyeyā /
GS24jvkasipu:6658: praharaṇārthebhyaś ca pare niṣṭhāsaptamyau bhavata iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:6661: katham udyatagadaḥ, udyatāsiḥ ? prāptasya cābādhā vyākhyeyā //
GS24jvkasipu:6664: niṣṭhā iti pūrvanipāte prāpte vikalpa ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:6675: ākṛtiganaś ca ayam, tena gaḍukaṇṭhaprabhṛtaya iha+eva draṣṭavyāḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:6678: guna-śabdānāṃ viśeṣanatvāt pūrvanipāte prāpte vikalpa ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:6696: iti śrījayādityaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau dvitīyādhyāyasya dvitīya pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:6701: yad ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ, anabhihite ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:6702: anabhihite anukte, anirdiṣṭe karmādau vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6706: anabhihite iti kim ? tiṅ - kriyate kaṭaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:6710: samāsaḥ - prāptam udakaṃ yaṃ grāmaṃ prāptodako grāmaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:6711: parisaṅkhyānaṃ kim ? kaṭaṃ karoti bhīṣmamudāraṃ darśanīyam /
GS24jvkasipu:6712: vahuṣu bahuvacanam ity evam ādinā saṅkhyā vacyatvena vibhaktīnām upadiṣṭāḥ, tatra viśeṣaṇa-artham idam ārabhyate -
GS24jvkasipu:6716: dvitīyādayaḥ śabdāḥ pūrvācāryaiḥ supāṃ trikeṣu samaryante, tair eva atra
GS24jvkasipu:6718: karmaṇi kārake yā saṅkhyā tatra dvitīyā vibhaktirbhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6741: chandasi viṣaye juhoteḥ karmaṇi kārake tṛtīyā vibhaktir bhavati, dvitīyā ca /
GS24jvkasipu:6744: chandasi iti kim ? yavāgūm agnihotraṃ juhoti //
GS24jvkasipu:6752: antareṇa śabdas tu tac ca vinārthaṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:6753: antarā tvāṃ ca māṃ ca kamaṇḍaluḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:6754: antareṇa tvāṃ ca māṃ ca kamaṇḍaluḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:6756: yukta-grahaṇaṃ kim ? antarā takṣaśilāṃ ca pāṭaliputraṃ srughnasya prākāraḥ
GS24jvkasipu:6759: kāla-śabdebhyo 'dhva-śabdebhyaś ca dvitīyā vibhaktir bhavati atyantasaṃyoge gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:6779: apavarge gamyamāne kāla-adhvanor atyantasaṃyoge tṛtīyā vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6786: kartavyādṛttau phala-siddher abhāvāt tṛtīyā na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6787: māsam adhīto 'nuvākaḥ, na ca anena gṛhītaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:6791: kārakayor madhye yau kāla-adhvānau tābhyāṃ saptamī-pañcamyau vibhaktī bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:6792: adya bhuktavā devadatto dvyahe bhoktā dvyahād vā bhoktā /
GS24jvkasipu:6795: iha stho 'yam iṣvāsaḥ krośe lakṣyaṃ vidhyati /
GS24jvkasipu:6797: kartṛ-karmaṇoḥ kārakayoḥ karma-apādānayoḥ karma-adhikaraṇayor vā madhye krośaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:6804: yasmād adhikaṃ yasya ca+īśvara-vacanaṃ tatra saptamī || PS_2,3.9 ||
GS24jvkasipu:6807: yasamā dadhikaṃ yasya ca+īśvaravacanaṃ karmapravacanīyair yukte tatra
GS24jvkasipu:6811: yasya ca+īśvaravacanam iti svasvāminordvayor api paryāyeṇa saptamī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6812: adhi brahmadatte pañcālāḥ, adhi pañcāleṣu brahmadattaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:6816: apa āṅ pari ity etaiḥ karmapravacanīyair yoge pajcamī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6820: apena sāhacaryāt parervarjana-arthasya grahaṇam, tena+iha na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:6826: yasmāt pratinidhiryataś ca pratidānaṃ tatra karmapravacanīya-yukte pañcamī vibhaktir bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:6830: nanu ca pratinidhi-pratidāne karmapravacanīya-yukte, na tu yataḥ
GS24jvkasipu:6831: pratinidhi-pratidāne ? na+eṣa doṣaḥ, sambandha-sambandhāt tasya api yogo
GS24jvkasipu:6835: gatyarthānāṃ dhātūnāṃ ceṣtākriyāṇāṃ parispandakriyāṇāṃ karmaṇi kārake
GS24jvkasipu:6841: deṣṭāyam iti kim ? manasā pāṭaliputraṃ gacchati /
GS24jvkasipu:6848: yatra tu utpathena panthānaṃ gacchati, tatra bhavitavyam eva caturthyā,
GS24jvkasipu:6850: dvitīyā-grahanaṃ kim ? na catrthy eva viklpyeta, apavāda-viṣaye 'pi yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:6873: pītā varṣāya vijñeyā durbhikṣāya sitā bhavet //
GS24jvkasipu:6879: kriyārthā kriyā upapadaṃ yasya so 'yaṃ kriyārthopapāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:6880: tumun-ṇvulau kriyāyāṃ kriyārthāyām (*3,3.10) ity eṣa viṣayo lakṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:6881: kriyārthopapadasya ca sthānino 'prayujyamānasya dhātoḥ karmaṇi kārake
GS24jvkasipu:6885: puṣpebhyo vrajati kriyārthopapadasya iti kim ? praviśa piṇḍīm /
GS24jvkasipu:6887: bhakṣir atra sthānī, na tu kriyārthopapadaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:6888: karmaṇi iti kim ? edhebhyo vrajati śakaṭena /
GS24jvkasipu:6894: bhāvavacanāś ca (*3,3.11) iti vakṣyati, tasya+idaṃ grahanam /
GS24jvkasipu:6905: namaḥ svasti svāhā svadhā alam vaṣaṭ ity etair yoge caturthī vibhaktir bhvati /
GS24jvkasipu:6917: tena āśīrvivakṣāyām api ṣaṣṭhīṃ vādhitvā caturthy eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6923: manyakarmaṇi prāṇivarjite vibhāṣā caturthī vibhaktir bhavati anādare gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:6925: na tvā tṛṇaṃ manye, na tvā tṛṇāya manye /
GS24jvkasipu:6926: na tvā busaṃ manye, na tvā busāya manye /
GS24jvkasipu:6927: manyati-grahaṇaṃ kim ? na tvā tṛṇaṃ cintayāmi /
GS24jvkasipu:6928: vikaraṇa-nirdeśaḥ kim arthaḥ ? na tvā tṛṇaṃ manve /
GS24jvkasipu:6929: anādare iti kim ? aśmānaṃ dṛṣadaṃ manye manye kaṣṭhamulūkhalam /
GS24jvkasipu:6930: andhāyāstaṃ sutaṃ manye yasya mātā na paśyati //
GS24jvkasipu:6931: aprāniṣu iti kim ? na tvā śṛgālaṃ manye /
GS24jvkasipu:6932: yad etad aprāṇiṣviti tad anāvādiṣviti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:6934: na tvā nāvaṃ manye yāvad uttīrṇaṃ na nāvyam /
GS24jvkasipu:6935: na tvā 'nnaṃ manye yāvan na bhuktaṃ śrāddham /
GS24jvkasipu:6939: iha caturthī dvitīyā ca bhavataḥ - na tvā śvānaṃ manye, na tvā śune manye
GS24jvkasipu:6940: yuṣmadaḥ kasmān na bhavati caturthī, etad api hi manyateḥ karma ?
GS24jvkasipu:6944: kartari karaṇe ca kārake tṛtīyā vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6962: saha-arthena yukte apradhāne tṛtīyā vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6965: pitur atra kriyādi-sambandhaḥ śabdena+ucyate, putrasya tu pratīyamāna iti tasyāprādhānyam
GS24jvkasipu:6966: sahārthena ca yoge tṛtīyā-vidhānāt paryāya-prayoge 'pi bhavati, putreṇa sārdham iti /
GS24jvkasipu:6967: vinā 'pi saha-śabdena bhavati, vṛddho yūnā (*1,2.65) iti nidarśanāt /
GS24jvkasipu:6968: apradhāne iti kim ? śiṣyeṇa sahopādyāyasya gauḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:6971: aṅga-śabdo 'tra aṅga-samudāye śarīre vartate, yena iti ca tadavayavo hetutvena nirdiśyate
GS24jvkasipu:6972: yena aṅgena vikṛtena aṅgino vikāro lakṣyate, tatas tṛtīyā vibhaktir
GS24jvkasipu:6986: iha na bhavati, kamaṇḍlupāniśchātraḥ iti, lakṣaṇasya samāse 'ntarbhūtatvāt
GS24jvkasipu:6987: itthambhūtaḥ iti kim ? vṛkṣaṃ prati vidyotanam //
GS24jvkasipu:6990: sampūrvasya jānāteḥ karmaṇi karake dvitīyāyāṃ prāptāyām anyatarasyāṃ tṛtīyāvibhaktir bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:7003: kartṛ-varjitaṃ yadṛṇaṃ hetuḥ, tataḥ pañcamī vibhaktir bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:7008: śatamṛṇaṃ ca bhavati, prayojakatvāc ca kartṛsañjñakam //
GS24jvkasipu:7012: guṇe hetāv astrīliṅge vibhāṣā pañcamī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7021: hetu-śabdasya prayoge hetau dyotye ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7025: sarvanāmno hetu-śabda-prayoge hetau dyotye tṛtīyā vibhaktir bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:7027: pūrveṇa ṣaṣṭhyām eva prāptāyām idam ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:7028: kena hetunā vasati, kasya hetor vasati /
GS24jvkasipu:7029: yena hetunā vasati, yasya hetor vasati /
GS24jvkasipu:7031: kiṃnimittaṃ vasati, kena nimittena vasati, kasmai nimittāya vasati, kasmān nimittād vasati, kasya nimittasya vasati, kasmin nimitte vasati /
GS24jvkasipu:7035: tena+iha api bhavati - kiṃ prpayojanaṃ vasati, kena prayojanena vasati,
GS24jvkasipu:7036: kasmai prayojanāya vasati, kasmāt prayojanād vasati, kasya prayojanasya vasati, kasmin prayojane vasati //
GS24jvkasipu:7057: gavīdhumataḥ sāṅkāśyaṃ catvāri yojanāni, caturṣu yojaneṣu vā //
GS24jvkasipu:7060: anya ārāt itara ṛte dik-śabda añcu-uttarapada āc āhi ity etair yoge pañcamī vibhaktir bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:7081: dvik-śabda ity atra śabda-grahanaṃ deśakālavṛttinā 'pi dik-śabdena yoge yathā syāt, itarathā hi dig-vṛttinaiva syāt, ityamasyāḥ pūrvā iti /
GS24jvkasipu:7082: iha tu na syāt, ayam asmāt pūrvaḥ kālaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:7086: ṣaṣṭhy-atasartha-prayayena (*2,3.30) iti vakṣyati, tasya ayaṃ purastādapakarṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:7093: dakṣiṇa-uttarābhyām atasuc (*5,3.28) iti vakṣyati, tasya+idaṃ grahanam /
GS24jvkasipu:7094: atas-arthena pratyayena yukte ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7114: pṛthak vinā nānā ity etair yoge tṛtīyā vibhaktir bhavati, anyatarasyāṃ pañcamī ca /
GS24jvkasipu:7119: vinā vātaṃ vinā varṣaṃ vidyut-prapatanaṃ vinā /
GS24jvkasipu:7120: vinā hastikṛtān doṣān kenemau pātitau drumau //
GS24jvkasipu:7123: stoka alpa kṛcchra katipaya ity etebhyo 'sattva-vacanebhyaḥ karaṇe kārake 'nyatarasyāṃ tṛtīyā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7124: pañcamy atra pakṣe vidhīyate, tṛtīyā tu karaṇe ity eva siddhā /
GS24jvkasipu:7125: yadā tu dharma-mātraṃ karaṇāyā vivakṣyate na dravyam, tadā stoka-ādīnām
GS24jvkasipu:7131: asattva-vacanasya iti kim ? stokena viṣeṇa hataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:7133: karaṇe iti kim ? kriyāviśeṣaṇe karmaṇi mā bhūt, stokaṃ muñcati //
GS24jvkasipu:7137: dūra-antika-arthaiḥ śabdair yoge ṣaṣthī vibhaktir bhavati, anyatarasyāṃ pañcamī ca /
GS24jvkasipu:7147: dūra-antika-arthebhyaḥ śabdebhyo dvitīyā vibhaktir bhavati, cakārāt pañcamī tṛtīyā 'pi samucchīyate
GS24jvkasipu:7148: dūraṃ grāmasya, dūrād grāmasya, dūreṇ grāmasya /
GS24jvkasipu:7149: antikaṃ grāmasya, antikād grāmasya, antikena grāmasya /
GS24jvkasipu:7153: dūraḥ panthāḥ, dūrāya pathe dehi, dūrasya pathaḥ svam //
GS24jvkasipu:7156: saptamī vibhaktir bhavaty adhikaraṇe kārake, cakārād
GS24jvkasipu:7183: carmaṇi dvīpinaṃ hanti dantayor hanti kuñjaram /
GS24jvkasipu:7184: keśeṣu camarīṃ hanti sīmni puṣkalako hataḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:7189: yasya ca bhāvena yasya ca kriyayā kriyāntaraṃ lakṣyate, tato bhāvavataḥ saptamī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7193: bhāvena iti kim ? yo jaṭābhiḥ sa bhuṅkte /
GS24jvkasipu:7194: punar bhāva-grahaṇaṃ kim ? yo bhuṅkte sa devadattaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:7197: pūrveṇa saptamyāṃ prāptāyāṃ ṣaṣṭhī vidhīyate, cakārāt sā 'pi bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7198: anādara-adhike bhāva-lakṣane bhāvavataḥ ṣaṣṭhī-saptamyau vibhaktī bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:7199: rudataḥ prāvrājīt, rudati prāvrājīt krośataḥ prāvrājīt, krośati prāvrājīt /
GS24jvkasipu:7204: svāmin īśvara adhipati dāyāda sākṣin pratibhū prasūta ity etair yoge
GS24jvkasipu:7213: ṣaṣṭhyām eva prāptayāṃ pakṣe saptamīvidhāna-arthaṃ vacanam //
GS24jvkasipu:7217: āyukataḥ vyāpāritaḥ, kuśalaḥ nipuṇaḥ, tābhyāṃ yoge āsevāyāṃ gamyamānāyāṃ
GS24jvkasipu:7220: āyuktaḥ kaṭakaraṇasya, āyuktaḥ kaṭakaraṇe kuśalaḥ kaṭakaranasya, kuślaḥ kaṭakaraṇe /
GS24jvkasipu:7221: āsevāyām iti kim ? āyukto gauḥ śakaṭe /
GS24jvkasipu:7226: jāti-guṇa-kriyābhiḥ samudāyād ekadeśasya pṛthak karanaṃ nirdhāranam /
GS24jvkasipu:7227: yato nirdhāranaṃ tataḥ ṣaṣṭhī saptamyau vibhaktī bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:7228: manuṣyāṇām kṣatriyaḥ śūratamaḥ, manuṣyeṣu kṣatriyaḥ śūratamaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:7229: gavaṃ kṛṣṇā sampanna-kṣīratamā, goṣu kṛṣṇā sampanna-kṣīratamā adhvagānāṃ dhavantaḥ śīghratamā, adhvageṣu dhāvantaḥ śīghratamāḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:7235: yasmin nirdhāraṇa-āśraye vibhaktam asya asti tataḥ pajcamī vibhaktir
GS24jvkasipu:7240: sādhu nipuṇa ity etābhyām yoge 'rcāyāṃ gamyamānāyāṃ saptamī vibhaktir
GS24jvkasipu:7248: aprateḥ iti kim ? sādhur devadatto mātaraṃ prati /
GS24jvkasipu:7254: prasita utsuka ity etābhyāṃ yoge tṛtīyā vibhaktir bhavati, cakārāt saptamī ca /
GS24jvkasipu:7255: prasitaḥ prasaktaḥ, yas tatra nityam eva avabaddhaḥ sa
GS24jvkasipu:7267: iha kasmān na bhavati, adya pusyaḥ, adya kṛttikā ? adhikaraṇe iti vartate
GS24jvkasipu:7276: prātipadikārtha-mātre, liṅga-mātre, primāṇa-mātre, vacana-mātre prathamā vibhaktir bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:7279: liṅga-grahaṇaṃ kim ? kumārī, vṛkṣaḥ, kuṇḍam ity atra api yathā syat /
GS24jvkasipu:7280: parimāṇa-grahaṇaṃ kim ? droṇaḥ, khārī, āḍhakam ity atra api yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:7281: vacana-grahanaṃ kim ? ekatva-ādiṣu ukteṣv api yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:7283: prātipadika-grahanaṃ kim ? nipātasya anarthakasya prātipadikatvam uktaṃ,
GS24jvkasipu:7289: ābhimukhya-karaṇaṃ, tad-adhike prātipadika-arthe prathamā na prāpnoti iti vacanam ārabhyate
GS24jvkasipu:7296: sambodhane yā prathamā tad-antaṃ śabda-rūpam āmantritasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7298: āmantrita-pradeśāḥ -- āmantritaṃ pūrvam avidyamānavat (*8,1.72) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:7301: āmantrita-prathamāyā yad ekavānaṃ, tat sambuddhi-sañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7304: sambuddhi-pradeśāḥ - eṅ-hrasvāt sambuddheḥ (*6,1.69) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:7314: jānāter avidarthasya ajñāna-arthasya karaṇe kārake ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7321: cittabhrāntyā tadātmanā sarvam eva grāhyaṃ pratipadyate /
GS24jvkasipu:7323: avid-arthasya iti kim ? svareṇa putraṃ jānāti //
GS24jvkasipu:7327: adhi-ig-arthāḥ smarana-arthāḥ, daya dānagatirakṣaneṣu, īśa eśvarye, eteṣaṃ karmaṇi kārake śeṣatvena vivakṣite ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7333: karmaṇi ity eva, mātur guṇaiḥ smarati /
GS24jvkasipu:7338: karoteḥ karmaṇi kārake śeṣatvena vivakṣite pratiyatne gamyamāne ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7340: śastrapatrasyopaskurute pratiyatne iti kim ? kaṭaṃ karoti /
GS24jvkasipu:7346: karmaṇi kārake śeṣatvena vivakṣite ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7349: rujārthānām iti kim ? eti jīvantamānando naraṃ varṣaśatād api /
GS24jvkasipu:7350: jīva putraka mā maivaṃ tapaḥ sāhasamācara //
GS24jvkasipu:7351: bhāvavacanānām iti kim ? nadī kūlāni rujati /
GS24jvkasipu:7352: ajvareḥ iti kim ? cauraṃ jvarayati jvaraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:7355: śeṣe ity eva, cauraṃ rujati rogaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:7358: nāthṛ nādhṛ yācñopatāpaiśvaryāśīḥṣu pathyate, tasyāśīḥkriyasya karmaṇi kārake śeṣatvena vivakṣite ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7361: āśiṣi iti kim ? mānavakam upanāthati aṅga putrakādhīṣva //
GS24jvkasipu:7364: jāsi niprahaṇa nāṭa krātha piṣ ity eteṣāṃ dhātūnāṃ hiṃsā-kriyāṇāṃ karmaṇi kārake ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7365: jasu hiṃsāyām, jasu tāḍane iti ca curādau paṭhyate, tasya+idaṃ grahaṇaṃ,
GS24jvkasipu:7366: na daivādikasya jasu mokṣaṇe ity asya /
GS24jvkasipu:7379: ayaṃ hi ghaṭādau paṭhyate, śratha knatha kratha klatha hiṃsa-arthāḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:7380: tatra ghaṭādayo mitaḥ iti mitsañjñāyāṃ mitāṃ hrasvaḥ (*6,4.92) iti hrasvatvaṃ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:7389: vyavahṛ paṇa ity etayoḥ samarthayoḥ samānārthayoḥ karmaṇi kārake ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:7395: āya-pratyayaḥ kasmān na bhavati ? stuty-arthasya panaterāya-pratyaya
GS24jvkasipu:7403: vyavahṛpaṇisamāna-arthasya dīvyateḥ karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7410: divas tadarthasya (*2,3.58) iti nityaṃ ṣaṣṭhyāṃ prāptāyāṃ sopasargasya vikalpa ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:7411: upasarge sati divas tadarthasya karmaṇi kārake vibhāṣā ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7420: brāhmaṇaviṣaye prayoge divas tadarthasya karmaṇi kārake dvitīyā vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7427: tatsāhacaryād bruvir api tadviṣaya eva gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:7428: preṣyabruvorhaviṣaḥ karmaṇaḥ ṣaṣthī vibhaktir bhavati devatāsampradāne sati /
GS24jvkasipu:7429: agnaye chāgasya haviṣo vapāyā medasaḥ pre3ṣya /
GS24jvkasipu:7431: preṣyabruvoḥ iti kim ? agnaye chāgaṃ havirvapāṃ medo juhudhi /
GS24jvkasipu:7432: haviṣaḥ iti kim ? agnaye gomayāni preṣya /
GS24jvkasipu:7433: devatāsampradāne iti kim ? māṇavakāya puroḍāśaṃ preṣya /
GS24jvkasipu:7435: indrāgnibhyāṃ chāgaṃ havirvapāṃ medaḥ prasthitaṃ preṣya3 //
GS24jvkasipu:7438: chandasi viṣaye caturthy-arthe ṣaṣthī vibhaktir bhavati bahulam /
GS24jvkasipu:7446: yā kharveṇa pivati tasyai kharvo jāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:7455: yajer dhātoḥ karaṇe kārake chandasi bahulaṃ ṣaṣthī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7461: kṛtvo 'rthānāṃ prayoge kāle 'dhikaraṇe ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7467: gamyate hi dvis traś catur veti, na tv aprayujyamāne bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7469: adhikaraṇe iti kim ? dvir ahno bhuṅkte /
GS24jvkasipu:7470: śeṣe ity eva, dvir ahany adhīte //
GS24jvkasipu:7473: kṛt-prayoge kartari karmaṇi ca ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7480: kṛti iti kim ? taddhita-prayoge mā bhūt, kṛtapūrvī kaṭam /
GS24jvkasipu:7483: itarathā hi kartari ca kṛti ity evaṃ brūyāt //
GS24jvkasipu:7488: ubhayoḥ prāptir yasmin kṛti, so 'yam ubhayaprāptiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:7489: tatra karmaṇy eva ṣaṣthī vibhaktir bhavati, na kartari /
GS24jvkasipu:7493: bahuvrīhivijñānād iha niyamo na bhavati, āścaryam idam odanasya nāma pāko brāhmaṇānaṃ ca prādurbhāvaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:7498: akākārayoḥ strīpratyayayorgrahanāt tadapekṣayā śeṣaḥ strīpratyaya eva gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:7499: śobhanā hi sūtrasya kṛtiḥ pāṇineḥ pāṇininā vā /
GS24jvkasipu:7500: kecid aviśeṣeṇaiva vibhāṣām icchanti, śabdānām anuśāsanam ācāryaṇa
GS24jvkasipu:7504: na la-u-uka-avyaya. niṣṭhākhalartha-tṛnām (*2,3.69) iti pratiṣedhe prāpte
GS24jvkasipu:7506: ktasya vartamāna-kāla-vihitasya prayoge ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7517: tathā ca kartṛvivakṣāyāṃ tṛtīyā 'pi bhavati, chāatreṇa hasitam iti //
GS24jvkasipu:7529: dvikarmakāṇāṃ prayoge kartari kṛti dvayor api ṣaṣṭhī dvitīyāvat /
GS24jvkasipu:7535: kartṛ-karmaṇoḥ kṛti (*2,3.65) iti prāptā ṣaṣṭhī pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:7536: la u uka avyaya niṣṭhā khalartha tṛn ity eteṣāṃ prayoge ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7537: la iti śatṛśānacau, kānac-kvasū, kikinau ca gṛhyante /
GS24jvkasipu:7560: laṭaḥ śatṛ-śānacāv aprathamā. samānādhikaraṇe (*3,2.124) ity ārabhya ā
GS24jvkasipu:7572: akasya bhaviṣyati kāle vihitasya, inas tu bhaviṣyati cādhamarṇye ca vihitasya prayoge ṣaṣthī vibhaktir na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7582: iha kasmān na bhavati, varṣaśatasya pūrakaḥ, putrapautrāṇāṃ darśakaḥ iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:7586: kartṛ-karmaṇoḥ kṛti (*2,3.65) iti nityaṃ ṣaṣthī prāptā kartari vikalpyate
GS24jvkasipu:7587: kṛtyānāṃ prayoge kartari vā ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati, na karmaṇi /
GS24jvkasipu:7588: bhavatā kaṭaḥ kartavyaḥ, bhavataḥ kaṭaḥ kartavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:7589: kartari iti kim ? geyo māṇavakaḥ sāmnām /
GS24jvkasipu:7595: tulyārthaiḥ śabdair yoge tṛtīyā vibhaktir bhavaty anyatarasyām, pakṣe ṣaṣthī ca, tulā-upamā-śabdau varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:7596: śeṣe viṣaye tṛtīyā-vidhānāt tayā mukte ṣaṣthy eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7599: atulopamābhyām iti kim ? tulā devadattasya na asti /
GS24jvkasipu:7601: vā iti vartamāne 'nyatarasyāṃ grahanam uttarasūtre tasya cakārena
GS24jvkasipu:7606: āśiṣi gayamānāyām āyuṣya madra bhadra kuśala sukha artha hita ity etair yoge caturthī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7608: śeṣe caturthī-vidhānāt tayā mukte ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7610: āyuṣyaṃ devadattāya bhūyāt, āyuṣyaṃ devadattasya bhūyāt /
GS24jvkasipu:7611: ciraṃ jīvitaṃ devadattāya devadattasya vā bhuyāt /
GS24jvkasipu:7622: āśiṣi iti kim ? āyuṣyaṃ devadattasya tapaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:7623: iti śrījayādityaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau dvitīyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:7629: ekasya arthasya vācako bhavati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:7630: tadanena prakāreṇa dvigv-arthasya+ekavad bhāvo vidhīyate, dvigv-artha
GS24jvkasipu:7635: dvigv-arthasy)a e)katvād anuprayoge 'py ekavacanaṃ bhavati, pañca-pūlīyaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:7640: aṅga-śabdasya pratyekaṃ vākya-parisamāptyā trīṇi vākyāni sampadyante /
GS24jvkasipu:7641: prāṇy-aṅgānāṃ dvandva ekavad bhavati, tathā tūrya-aṅgānāṃ senā-aṅgānāṃ ca
GS24jvkasipu:7648: hasty-aśva-ādiṣu paratvāt paśud-vandve vibhāṣayā eakvad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7651: idaṃ tu prakaraṇaṃ viṣaya-vibhāga-artham, prāṇy-aṅga-ādīnāṃ samāhāra eva dvandvaḥ, dadhipaya-ādīnām itaretara-yoga eva, vṛkṣa-mṛga-ādīnām ubhayatra iti //
GS24jvkasipu:7655: caraṇānāṃ dvandvaḥ ekavad bhavati anuvāde gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:7659: kaṭhakālāpa-ādīnām udaya-pratiṣṭhe pramāṇa-antaravagate yadā punaḥ śabdena
GS24jvkasipu:7670: adhvaryukratu-vācināṃ śabdānām anapuṃsaka-liṅgānāṃ dvandvaḥ ekavad bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:7671: adhvaryukratur anapuṃsakaṃ dvandvaḥ iti gauṇo nirdeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:7677: iha kasmān na bhavati, darśapaurṇamāsau ? kratu-śabdaḥ somayāgeṣu rūḍhaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:7680: adhyayanena nimittena yeṣām aviprakṛṣṭā pratyāsannā ākhyā, teṣāṃ dvandvaḥ ekavad bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:7688: jāti-vācināṃ śabdānāṃ dvandva ekavad bhavati prāṇino varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:7693: nañiva-yuktanyāyena dravya-jātīnām ayam ekavadbhāvaḥ, na guṇa-kriyājātīnām
GS24jvkasipu:7696: jāti paratve ca jāti-śabdānām ayam ekavadbhāvo vidhīyate, na
GS24jvkasipu:7697: niyata-dravya-vivakṣāyām - iha kuṇḍe badarāmalakāni tiṣṭhanti iti //
GS24jvkasipu:7700: viśiṣta-liṅgānāṃ bhinna-liṅgānāṃ nadī-vācināṃ śabdānāṃ deśavacināṃ ca
GS24jvkasipu:7704: nadī deśaḥ ity asamāsa-nirdeśa eva ayam /
GS24jvkasipu:7705: uddhyaś ca irāvatī ca uddhyer āvati /
GS24jvkasipu:7707: deśaḥ khalv api - kuravaś ca kurukṣetraṃ ca kurukurukṣetram /
GS24jvkasipu:7712: agrāmāḥ iti kim ? jāmbavaś ca śālūkinī ca jāmbava-śālūkinyau /
GS24jvkasipu:7715: tathā ca parvatānāṃ grahaṇaṃ na bhavati, kailāsaś ca gandhamādanaṃ ca
GS24jvkasipu:7717: agrāmā ity atra nagarānāṃ pratiṣedho vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:7718: iha mā bhūt, mathurā ca pāṭaliputraṃ ca mathurā-pāṭaliputram /
GS24jvkasipu:7720: sauryaṃ ca nagaraṃ, ketavataṃ ca grāmaḥ saurya-ketavate //
GS24jvkasipu:7728: kṣudra-janturanasthiḥ syād atha vā kṣudra eva yaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:7729: śataṃ vā prasuṛtau yeṣāṃ kecidā nakulād api //
GS24jvkasipu:7730: ā nakulād api iti iyam eva smṛtiḥ pramāṇam, itarāsāṃ tadvirodhāt //
GS24jvkasipu:7735: yeṣāṃ śāśvatiko virodhaḥ tadvācināṃ śabdānāṃ dvandva ekavad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7740: tena paśuśakuni-dvandve virodhinām anena nityam ekavad bhāvo bhavati -
GS24jvkasipu:7748: yair bhukte pātraṃ saṃskāreṇa api na śudhyati te niravasitāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:7756: gavāśva-prabhṛtīni ca kṛta-ekavad-bhāvani dvandva-rūpāṇi sādhūni bhavnti /
GS24jvkasipu:7783: rūpāntare tu na ayaṃ vidhir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7789: vṛkṣa mṛga tṛṇa dhanya vyañjana paśu śakuni aśvavaḍava pūrvāpara adharottara ity eteṣām dvandvo vibhāṣā ekavad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7801: eṣāṃ bahuprakṛtir eva dvandva ekavad bhavati, na dviprakṛtiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:7822: yathāyatham ekavad bhāve prāpte pratiṣedha ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:7848: tasya+etāvattve parimāṇe gamyamāne dvandvo na+ekavad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7854: adhikaraṇa-etāvattvasya samīpe vibhāṣā dvandvaḥ ekavad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7861: yasya ayam ekavad bhāvo vihitaḥ sa napuṃsaka-liṅgo bhavati dvigur dvandvaś
GS24jvkasipu:7873: ano nalopaś ca vā ca dviguḥ striyām /
GS24jvkasipu:7903: nañ-samāsaṃ karmadhārayaṃ ca varjayitvā 'nyas tatpuruṣo napuṃsaka-liṅgo
GS24jvkasipu:7904: bhavati ity etad adhikṛtaṃ viditavyam, yad ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmas tatra /
GS24jvkasipu:7907: tatpuruṣaḥ iti kim ? dṛḍhaseno rājā anañ iti kim ? asenā /
GS24jvkasipu:7911: sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye kanthā-anatas tatpuruṣo napuṃsaka-liṅgo bhavati, sā cet kanthā uśīnaresu bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7922: tadantas tatpuruṣo napuṃsaka-liṅgo bhavati tad-ādy-ācikhyāsāyām, tayor upajñopakramayor āder ācikhyāsāyāṃ gamyamānāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:7924: yady upajñeyasya+upakramyasya ca arthasya ādir ākhyātum iṣyate tata etad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7926: pāṇiner upajñānena pratham ataḥ praṇītam akālakaṃ vyākaraṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:7939: chāyā-antas tatpuruṣo napuṃsaka-liṅgo bhavati bāhulye gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:7947: sabhāntas tatpuruṣo napuṃsaka-liṅgo bhavati, sā cet sabhā rājapūrvā,
GS24jvkasipu:7951: iha kasmān na bhavati, rājasabhā ? paryāya-vacanasya+eva+iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:7955: iha kasmān na bhavati, kāṣṭhasabhā ? amanuṣya-śabdo rūḍhirūpeṇ rakṣaḥpiśācādiṣv eva vartate
GS24jvkasipu:7959: aśālā ca yā sabhā tadantas tatpuruṣo napuṃsaka-liṅgo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7968: senā surā chāyā śālā niśā ity evam antas tatpuruṣo napuṃsaka-liṅgo bhavati vibhāṣā /
GS24jvkasipu:7979: parasya yal liṅgaṃ tat bhavati dvandvasya tatpuruṣasya ca /
GS24jvkasipu:7987: dviguḥ - pañcasu kapālesu saṃskṛtaḥ puroḍāśaḥ pañcakapālaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:7995: tatra+ekavad-bhāvād anyatra paravilliṅgatāyāṃ prāptāyām idam ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:8000: vacana-antare 'pi pūrvavalliṅgatā bhavati, aśva-vaḍavān, aśva-vaḍavaiḥ iti
GS24jvkasipu:8004: hemanta-śiśirau ahorātre ity etayoś chandasi viṣaye pūrvavalliṅgaṃ bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:8008: artha-atideśaś ca ayaṃ na nipātanaṃ, tena dvivacanamatantram /
GS24jvkasipu:8014: chandasi liṅgavyatyaya uktaḥ, tasya+eva ayaṃ prapañcaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:8018: rātra ahna aha ity ete puṃsi bhāṣyante /
GS24jvkasipu:8037: iha kasmān na bhavati, apatho deśaḥ, apathā nagarī ? tatpuruṣaḥ iti vartate //
GS24jvkasipu:8040: ardharcādayaḥ śabdāḥ puṃsi napuṃsake ca bhāṣyante /
GS24jvkasipu:8045: śabda-rūpa-āśrayā ca+iyaṃ dvi-liṅgatā kvacid arthabhedena api
GS24jvkasipu:8046: vyavatiṣṭhate, yathā - paḍmaśaṅkha-śabdau nidhi-vacanau puṃliṅgau, jalaje
GS24jvkasipu:8050: sāra-śabda utkarṣe puṃliṅgaḥ, nyāyādanapete napuṃsakam, naitat sāram iti /
GS24jvkasipu:8051: dharmaḥ ity apūrve puṃliṅgaḥ, tatsādhane napuṃsakam /
GS24jvkasipu:8265: idamo 'nvādeśa-viṣayasya aś-ādeśo bhavaty anudāttaḥ, tṛtīya-adau vibhaktau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:8267: asmai chātrāya kambalaṃ dehi, atho 'smai śāṭakam api dehi /
GS24jvkasipu:8268: asya chātrasya śobhanaṃ śīlam, atho 'sya prabhūtaṃ svam /
GS24jvkasipu:8272: kiṃ tarhi ? ekasya+eva abhidheyasya pūrvaṃ śabdena pratipāditasya dvitīyaṃ pratipādanam anvādeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:8273: tena+iha na bhavati, devadattaṃ bhojaya, imaṃ ca yajñadattam iti //
GS24jvkasipu:8274: etadas tra-tasos tra-tasau ca anudātau || PS_2,4.33 ||
GS24jvkasipu:8277: etado 'nvādeśa-viṣayasya aśādeśo bhavati anudāttaḥ tra-tasoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:8278: tau ca api tra-tasāv anudāttau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:8279: etasmin grāme sukhaṃ vasāmaḥ, atho atra yuktā adhīmahe /
GS24jvkasipu:8280: etasmāc chātrācchanto 'dhīṣva, atho ato vyākaraṇam apy adhīṣva /
GS24jvkasipu:8282: etado 'ś ity ādeśe labhe punar vacanam anudātta-artham //
GS24jvkasipu:8286: dvitīyā ṭā os ity eteṣu parata idam etador anvādeśa-viṣayayoḥ ena-śabda
GS24jvkasipu:8289: imaṃ chātraṃ chando 'dhyāpaya, atho enaṃ vyākaraṇamadhyāpaya /
GS24jvkasipu:8291: anayośchātrayoḥ śobhanaṃ śīlam, atho enayoḥ prabhūtaṃ svam /
GS24jvkasipu:8292: etadaḥ khalv api -- etaṃ chātraṃ chanto 'dhyāpaya, atho enaṃ vyākaraṇamapyadhyāpaya /
GS24jvkasipu:8294: etayoś chātrayoḥ śobhanaṃ śīlam, atho enayoḥ prabhūtaṃ svam /
GS24jvkasipu:8298: iha kasmān na bhavati, ayaṃ daṇḍo harānena, etamātaṃ ṅitaṃ vidyāt iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:8299: yatra kiñcid vidhāya vākyāntareṇa punar anyadupadiśyate so 'nvādeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:8300: iha tu vastu-nirdeśamātraṃ kṛtvā ekam eva vidhānam //
GS24jvkasipu:8303: ārdhadhātuke ity adhikāro 'yam, ṇya-kṣatriya-ārṣa-ñito yūni lug-aṇ-iñoḥ
GS24jvkasipu:8305: yadita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyamast ad ārdhadhātuke veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:8309: tena ārdhadhātuka-vivakṣāyām ādeśeṣu kṛteṣu paścād yathā-prāptaṃ pratyayā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:8313: ado jagdhir lyap ti kiti || PS_2,4.36 ||
GS24jvkasipu:8315: ado jagdhiḥ ādeśo bhavati lyapi parataḥ, takārādau ca kiti pratyaye /
GS24jvkasipu:8323: iha kasmān na bhavati, annam ? annāṇṇaḥ (*4,4.85) iti nipātanāt /
GS24jvkasipu:8330: luṅi sani ca parato 'do ghasḷ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8338: ghañi api ca parataḥ ado ghasḷ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8344: chandasi viṣaye bahulam ado ghasḷ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8349: anyatarasya aṃgrahaṇam eva kasmān na kriyate tad eva+uttara-artham api bhaviṣyati ? kāryāntara-arthaṃ bahula-grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:8359: veño vayiḥ ādeśo bhavati anyatrasyāṃ liṭi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:8363: liṭi vayo yaḥ (*6,1.38) iti yakārasya samprasāraṇaṃ pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:8364: vaś ca anyatarasyāṃ kiti (*6,1.39) iti va-kāro vidhīyate -- vavau,
GS24jvkasipu:8369: hanter dhātoḥ vadha ity ayam ādeśo bhavati liṅi parata ārdhadhātuke /
GS24jvkasipu:8373: tasya sthānivadbhāvād avadhīt iti halanta-lakṣanā vṛddhiḥ na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:8376: luṅi ca parataḥ hano vadha ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8379: ātmanepadeṣu luṅi vikalpo yathā syāl liṅi mā bhūt //
GS24jvkasipu:8383: ātmanepadeṣu parato hano luṅy anyatarasyāṃ vadha ity ayamādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8389: iṇaḥ gā ity ayam āveśo bhavati luṅi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:8391: luṅi iti vartamāne punar luṅ-grahaṇam ātmanepadeṣv anyatarasyām (*2,4.44)
GS24jvkasipu:8407: sani parataḥ iṇo 'bodhana-arthasya gamir ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8415: iṅaś ca sani parato gamir ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8419: gāṅ adeśo bhavati iṅo liṭi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:8422: ity atra asya grahaṇaṃ yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:8423: na hi sthānivadbhāvena gāṅ iti rūpaṃ labhyate //
GS24jvkasipu:8426: lugi ḷṅi ca parata iṅo vibhāṣā gāṅ-ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8427: ādeśa-pakṣe gāṅ kuṭādibhyo 'ñṇin ḍit (*1,2.1) iti ṅittvam,
GS24jvkasipu:8432: ḷṅi khalv api - adhyagīṣyata, adhyagīṣyetām, adhyagīṣyanta /
GS24jvkasipu:8438: ṇau iti iṅ-apekṣayā parasaptamī, saṃś-caṅoḥ iti ca ṇy-apekṣayā /
GS24jvkasipu:8439: ṇau sanpare caṅpare ca parataḥ iṅo vibhāṣā gāṅ-ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8448: aster dhātor bhūḥ it ayam ādeśo bhavati ārdhadhātuke /
GS24jvkasipu:8452: iha kasmān na bhavati, īhāmāsa, īhāmāsatuḥ, īhāmāsuḥ ? kṛñ ca anuprayujyate liṭi (*3,1.40) iti pratyāhāra-grahaṇena aster
GS24jvkasipu:8454: tathā cocyate - anupratoge tu bhuvā 'styabādhanam smaranti kartur vacanān
GS24jvkasipu:8492: liṭi parataścakṣiṅaḥ khyāñ ādeśaḥ vā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8498: ajer dhātoḥ vī ity ayam ādeśo bhavaty ārdhadhātuke parato ghañapau varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:8516: yau prabhūte aje rvā vī ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8522: ṇyāntāt kṣatriyagotrād ārṣād ñitaś ca prayoḥ aṇḍañoryūni lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8523: ṇyāntāt tāvat -- kurv-ādibhyo ṇyaḥ (*4,1.151) , tasmād yūni iñ, tasya luk /
GS24jvkasipu:8526: nanu ca kauravya-śabdaḥ tikādiṣu paṭhyate, tataḥ phiñā bhavitavyam,
GS24jvkasipu:8527: kauravyāyaṇiḥ iti ? kṣatriyagotrasya tatra grahaṇam, kuru-n-ādibhyo ṇyaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:8528: (*4,1.172) ity anena vihitasya, idaṃ tu brāhmaṇagotram, kurv-ādibhyo ṇyaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:8530: kṣatriya -- ṛṣy-andhaka-vṛṣṇi-kurubhyaś ca (*4,1.114) it yaṇ, tasmād yūni iñ, tasya luk
GS24jvkasipu:8533: ārṣa -- ṛṣyaṇ (*4,1.114), tasmād yūni iñ, tasya luk /
GS24jvkasipu:8536: ñit - anṛṣy-ānantarye vida-ādibhyo 'ñ (*4,1.104), tasmād yūni iñ, tasya luk /
GS24jvkasipu:8539: aṇaḥ khalv api -- tika-ādibhyaḥ phiñ (*4,1.154), tasmād yūni prāg dīvyato
GS24jvkasipu:8543: etebhyaḥ iti kim ? śiva-ādibhyo 'ṇ (*4,1.112), tasmād yūni ata iñ
GS24jvkasipu:8547: yūni iti kim ? vāmarathyasya chātrāḥ vāmarathāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:8548: kurv-ādibhyo ṇyaḥ (*4,1.151) iti ṇyaḥ, tasmāt kaṇva-ādibhyo gotre
GS24jvkasipu:8551: aṇiñoḥ iti kim ? dākṣerapatyaṃ yuvā dākṣāyaṇaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:8561: śālva-avayava-lakṣana iñ, tasmāt phak, tasya luk /
GS24jvkasipu:8565: paila ity evam ādibhyaś ca yuva-pratyayasya lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8566: pīlāyā vā (*4,1.118) ityaṇ, tasmad aṇo dvyacaḥ (*4,1.156) iti phiñ, tasya luk /
GS24jvkasipu:8569: anye paila-ādayaḥ iñantāḥ tebhyaḥ iñaḥ prācām (*2,4.60) iti luki siddhe
GS24jvkasipu:8591: gotre ya iñ tadantād yuva-pratyayasya lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8594: yañ-iñoś ca (*4,1.101) iti phak, tasya luk /
GS24jvkasipu:8604: taulvaly-ādibhyaḥ parasya yuvapratyayasya na lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8636: te tadrājāḥ (*4,1.172), ñya-ādayas tadrājāḥ (*5,3.119) iti vakṣyati, tasya
GS24jvkasipu:8637: tadrāja-sañjñasya pratyayasya bahuṣu vartamānasya astrīliṅgasya lug bhavati, tena+eva cet tadrājena kṛtaṃ bahutvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8647: tena+eva grahaṇaṃ kim ? priyo vāṅgo yeṣāṃ te ime priyavāṅgāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:8651: bahuṣu tena+eva astriyām iti sarvam anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:8652: yaska ity evam ādibhyaḥ parasya gotra-pratyayasya bahuṣu vartamānasya astrīliṅgasya lug bhavati, tena+eva ced gotra-pratyayena kṛtaṃ bahutvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8653: pratyaya-vidheś ca anyatra laukikasya gotrasya grahaṇam ity anantarāpatye
GS24jvkasipu:8674: tataḥ parebhyaś caturbhyaḥ gṛṣṭy-ādibhyaś ca (*4,1.136) iti ḍhañ /
GS24jvkasipu:8704: bahuṣu tena+eva astriyām, gotre iti ca anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:8705: yaño 'jś ca gotrapratyayasya bahuṣu vartamānasya astrīliṅgasya luṅ bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:8708: añaḥ khalv api, anṛṣy-ānantarye bida-ādibhyo 'ñ (*4,1.104) -- bidāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:8716: gotre ity eva, dvīpādanusamudraṃ yañ (*4,3.10) -- dvaipyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:8718: yañādīnām ekadvayor vā tatpuruṣe ṣaṣṭhyā upasaṅkhyānam /
GS24jvkasipu:8721: evaṃ baidasya kulaṃ baidakulaṃ bidakulaṃ vā /
GS24jvkasipu:8724: ekadvayoḥ iti kim ? gārgāṇāṃ kulaṃ gargakulam /
GS24jvkasipu:8725: tatpuruṣe iti kim ? gārgasya samīpam upagārgyam /
GS24jvkasipu:8729: atry-ādibhyaḥ parasya gotrapratyayasya bahuṣu lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8730: atri-śabdāt itaś ca aniñaḥ (*4,1.122) iti ḍhak /
GS24jvkasipu:8744: bahvacaḥ prātipadikāt ya iñ vihitaḥ prācya-gotre bharatagotre ca vartate,
GS24jvkasipu:8754: bharatāḥ prācyā eva, teṣāṃ punar grahaṇaṃ jñāpana-artham anyatra prāg grahaṇe bharata-grahaṇaṃ na bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:8755: tena iñaḥ prācām (*2,4.60) iti bharatānāṃ yuvapratyayasya lug na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8760: gopavana-ādibhyaḥ prasya gotrapratyayasya lug na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8762: tato 'ño gotrapratyayasya yañ-añoś ca (*2,4.64) iti luk prāptaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:8777: tebhyaś ca bahuṣu lug bhavaty eva, haritaḥ, kiṃdāsāḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:8780: tika-ādibhyaḥ kitava-ādibhyaś ca dvandve gotrapratyayasya bahuṣu lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8781: taikāyanayaś ca kaitavāyanayaś ca, tika-ādibhyaḥ phiñ (*4,1.158), tasya
GS24jvkasipu:8783: vāṅkharayaś ca bhānḍīrathayaś ca, ata iñ (*4,1.95), tasya luk,
GS24jvkasipu:8785: aupakāyanāś ca lāmakāyanāś ca, naḍādibhyaḥ phak (*4,1.99), tasya luk,
GS24jvkasipu:8787: pāphakayaś ca nārakayaś ca, ata iñ (*4,1.95), tasya luk, paphakanarakāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:8788: bākanakhayaś ca śvāgudapariṇaddhayaś ca, ata iñ (*4,1.95), tasya luk,
GS24jvkasipu:8791: tayor luk, aubjayaś ca kākubhāś ca ubjakakubhāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:8792: lāṅkayaś ca śāntamukhayaś ca, ata iñ (*4,1.95) tasya luk, laṅkaśāntamukhāḥ
GS24jvkasipu:8793: urasaśabdastikādiṣu paṭhyate, tataḥ phiñ, laṅkaṭaśabdād iñ, tayor luk,
GS24jvkasipu:8795: bhrāṣṭakayaś ca kāpiṣṭhalayaś ca, ata iñ (*4,1.95), tasya luk,
GS24jvkasipu:8797: kārṣṇājinayaś ca kārṣṇasundarayaś ca, ata iñ (*4,1.95), tasya luk,
GS24jvkasipu:8799: āgniveśyaś ca dāserakayaś ca, agniveśaśabdāt gargādibhyo yañ (*4,1.105),
GS24jvkasipu:8803: upaka ity evam ādibhyaḥ parasya gotrapratyayasya bahuṣu lug bhavati anyatarasyāṃ dvandve ca advandve ca /
GS24jvkasipu:8805: eteṣaṃ ca madye trayo dvandvāstikakitav ādiṣu paṭhyante - upakalamakāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:8807: teṣāṃ pūrveṇa+eva nityam eva lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8808: advandve tv anena vikalpaḥ - upakāḥ, aupakāyanāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:8814: pariśiṣṭānāṃ ca dvandve 'dvandve ca vikalpaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:8843: āgastya-kauṇḍinyayor gotrapratyayayoḥ aṇo yañaś ca bahuṣu lug bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:8844: pariśiṣṭasya ca prakṛti-bhāgasya yathā-saṅkhyam agasti, kuṇḍinac ity etāv
