GS24jvkasipu:8849: madyodātto hi kuṇḍinī-śabdas tadādeśo 'pi tathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:8851: tayoḥ gotre 'lug-aci (*4,1.89) iti luki pratiṣiddhe āgastīyāḥ chatrāḥ iti
GS24jvkasipu:8853: kauṇḍinye tvaṇaiva bhavitavyam, kaṇvādibhyo gotre (*4,2.111) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:8858: supo vibhakter dhātu-sañjñāyāḥ prātipadika-sañjñāyāś ca lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8874: chandasi viṣaye śapo bhaulaṃ lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8875: adiprabhṛtibhya uktas tato na bhavaty api - vṛtraṃ hanti /
GS24jvkasipu:8877: anyebhyaś ca bhavati - trādhvaṃ no devāḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:8880: yaṅo lug bhavati aci pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:8881: cakārena bahula-grahanam anukṛṣyate, na tu chandasi iti /
GS24jvkasipu:8882: tena chandasi bhāṣāyāṃ ca yaṅo lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8900: chandasi viṣaye bahulaṃ śapaḥ ślur bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8901: yatroktaṃ tatraṃ na bhavati, anyatra api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8902: juhoty-ādibhyast āvan na bhavati - dāti priyāṇi /
GS24jvkasipu:8909: gāti sthā ghu pā bhū ity etebhyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:8910: parasya sico lug bhavati, parasmaipadeṣu parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:8921: parasmaipadeṣu iti kim ? agāsātāṃ grāmau devadattena //
GS24jvkasipu:8924: ghrā gheṭ śā chā sā ity etebhya uttarasya sicaḥ prasmaipadeṣu vibhāṣā lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8925: dheṭaḥ pūrveṇa prāpte vibhāṣa-arthaṃ vacanam, pariśiṣṭānām aprāpte /
GS24jvkasipu:8931: parasmaipadeṣu ity eva, aghrāsātāṃ sumanasau devadattena //
GS24jvkasipu:8934: tan-ādibhya uttarasya sicaḥ ta-thāsoḥ parato vibhāṣā lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8944: mantra-viṣaye ghasa hvara naśa vṛ daha āt vṛca kṛ gami jani ity etebhyaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:8947: hvara iti hvṛ kauṭilye - mā hvārmitrasya tvā /
GS24jvkasipu:8949: vṛ iti vṛṅvṛñoḥ sāmānyena grahanam -- suruco vena āvaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:8953: vṛc -- mā no asmin mahādhane parā vṛg bhārabhṛdyathā /
GS24jvkasipu:8967: avyayād uttarasya āpaḥ supaś ca lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8972: na avyayībhāvād ato 'm tv apañcamyāḥ || PS_2,4.83 ||
GS24jvkasipu:8975: dantād avyayībhāvād uttarasya supo na lug bhavati, amādeśas tu tasya supo bhavaty apañcamyāḥ
GS24jvkasipu:8976: etasmin pratiṣiddhe pañcamyāḥ śravanam eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8986: pūrveṇa nityam ambhāve prāpte vacanam idam /
GS24jvkasipu:8987: tṛtīyā-saptamyoḥ vibhaktyor bahulam ambhāvo bhavati avyayībhāve /
GS24jvkasipu:8998: luḍ-ādeśasya prathamapuruṣasya prasmaipadasya ātmanepadasya ca yathākramam ḍā rau ras ity ete ādeśā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:9003: iti śrījayādityaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau dvitīyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:9014: pratyayapradeśāḥ - pratyayalope pratyayalakṣaṇam (*1,1.62) ity evam ādayaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:9017: ayam apy adhikāro yoge yoge upatiṣṭhate, paribhāṣā vā /
GS24jvkasipu:9018: paraś ca sa bhavati dhātor vā prātipadikād vā yaḥ pratyaya-sañjñaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9027: ādy-udāttaś ca sa bhavati yaḥ pratyaya-sañjñaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9028: aniyatasvara-pratyaya-prasaṅge 'nekākṣu ca pratyayeṣu deśasya aniyame sati vacanam idam āder udātta-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:9034: supaḥ pitaś ca pratyayā anudāttā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:9041: gupa gopane, tija niśāne, kita nivāse etebhyo dhātubhyaḥ san pratyayo
GS24jvkasipu:9055: mān pūjāyām, badha bandhane, dāna avakhaṇḍane, śāna avatejate, ity etebhyo dhātubhyaḥ san pratyayo bhavati, abhyāsasya ca ikārasya dīrghādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9060: uttarasūtre vāgrahaṇaṃ sarvasya śeṣo vijñāyate, tena kvacin na bhavaty api /
GS24jvkasipu:9066: māner jijñāsāyām, badher vairūpye, dāner ārjave, śāner niśāne //
GS24jvkasipu:9067: dhātoḥ karmaṇaḥ samāna-kartṛkād icchāyāṃ vā || PS_3,1.7 ||
GS24jvkasipu:9069: iṣikarma yo dhatur iṣiṇaiva samānakartṛkaḥ, tasmād icchāyām arthe vā san pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:9074: dhātu-grahanaṃ kim ? sopasargād utpattir mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:9076: karmaṇaḥ iti kim ? karaṇān mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:9078: samānakartṛkat iti kim ? devadattasya bhojanam icchati yajñadattaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9081: dhātoḥ iti vidhānād atra sanaḥ ārdhadhātuka-sañjñā bhavati, na pūrvatra /
GS24jvkasipu:9090: sarūpaḥ pratyayo neṣṭaḥ sanantān na saniṣyate //
GS24jvkasipu:9094: iṣikarmaṇaḥ eṣituḥ eva ātmasambandhinaḥ subantād icchāyām arthe vā kyac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9098: ātmanaḥ iti kim ? rājñaḥ putram icchati /
GS24jvkasipu:9109: subantāt karmaṇaḥ ātmecchāyāṃ kāmyac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9113: kakārasya it-sajñā prayojana-abhāvān na bhavati, cakārāditvād va kāmyacaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:9118: upamanāt karmaṇaḥ subantād ācāre 'rthe vā kyac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9128: upamānāt kartuḥ subantād ācāre 'rthe vā kyaṅ-prattyayo bhavati, sakārasya ca lopo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:9129: anvācayaśiṣtaḥ salopaḥ, tadabhāve 'pi kyaṅ bhavaty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:9132: salopa-vidhāv api vā-grahaṇaṃ sambadhyate, sā ca vyavasthita-vibhāṣā
GS24jvkasipu:9135: {sakārasyeṣyate lopaḥ śabdaśāstravicakṣanaiḥ} ojāyamānaṃ yo ahiṃ jaghāna /
GS24jvkasipu:9138: salopa-vidhau ca kartuḥ iti sthāna-ṣaṣṭhī sampadyate, tatra alo 'ntya-niyame sati haṃsāyate, sārasāyate iti salopo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9146: bhṛśādibhyo bhuvy-acver lopaś ca halaḥ || PS_3,1.12 ||
GS24jvkasipu:9148: bhṛśa ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyo 'cvyantebhyo bhuvi bhavaty arthe
GS24jvkasipu:9149: kyaṅ pratyayo bhavati, halantānāṃ ca lopaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9151: kim arthaṃ puna ridam ucyate, yāvatā bhavati yoge cvir vidhīyate,
GS24jvkasipu:9181: lohitādibhyo ḍājantebhyaś ca bhavaty arthe kyaṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9185: yāni lohitādiṣu paṭhyante tebhyaḥ kyaṅ eva, aparipaṭhitebhyas tu kyaṣ eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9191: yathā ca kakāraḥ sāmānyagrahaṇārtho 'nubadhyate naḥ kye (*1,4.15) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:9192: na hi paṭhitānāṃ madhye nakārāntaḥ śabdo 'sti /
GS24jvkasipu:9193: kṛbhvastibhir iva kyaṣā 'pi yoge ḍāj bhavati ity etad eva vacanam jñāpakam /
GS24jvkasipu:9194: acveḥ ity anuvṛtter abhūta-tadbhāve kyaṣ vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:9206: kaṣṭa-śabdāc caturthīsamarthāt kramaṇe 'rthe 'nārjave kyaṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9210: kanvacikīrṣā pāpacikīrṣā, tasyāmetebhyaḥ kyaṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9216: kaṇvacikīrṣāyām iti kim ? ajaḥ kaṣṭam krāmati //
GS24jvkasipu:9219: romantha-śabdāt tapaḥ-śabdāc ca karmaṇo yathākramaṃ varticaror arthayoḥ kyaṅ pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:9222: iha mā bhūt, kīṭo romanthaṃ vartayati /
GS24jvkasipu:9228: bāṣpa-śabdād ūṣma-śabdāc ca karmana udvamane 'rthe kyaṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9235: śabda vaira kalaha abhra kanva megha ity etebhayaḥ karaṇe karoty arthe kyaṅ pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:9258: sukha ity evam ādibhyaḥ karmabhyaḥ vedanāyām arthe 'nubhave kyaṅ pratyayo bhavati, vedayituścet kartuḥ sambandhīni sukhādīni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:9261: kartṛ-grahaṇaṃ kim ? sukhaṃ vedayate prasādhako devadattasya /
GS24jvkasipu:9277: namas varivas citraṅ ity etebhyo vā kyac pratyayo bhavati, karaṇaviśeṣe pūjādau /
GS24jvkasipu:9285: puccha bhāṇḍa cīvara ity etebhyo ṇiṅ pratyayo bhavati karaṇaviśeṣe /
GS24jvkasipu:9297: muṇḍa miśra ślakṣṇa lavaṇa vrata vastra hala kala kṛta tūsta ity etebhyaḥ karaṇe ṇic pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9302: vratāt bhojane tannivṛttau ca - payo vratayati /
GS24jvkasipu:9313: dhātor eka-aco hala-ādeḥ kriyāsamabhihāre yaṅ || PS_3,1.22 ||
GS24jvkasipu:9315: eka-aj yo dhātur halādiḥ kriyāsamabhihāre vartate tasmād yaṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9321: dhātoḥ iti kim ? sopasargād utpattir mā bhūt, bhṛśaṃ prāṭati /
GS24jvkasipu:9332: bhṛśaṃ śobhate, bhṛśaṃ rocate ity atra neṣyate, anabhidhānāt //
GS24jvkasipu:9335: gativacanād dhatoḥ kauṭilye gamyamāne nityaṃ yaṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9338: nitya-grahaṇaṃ viṣayaniyama-arthaṃ, gativacanān nityam kauṭilya eva
GS24jvkasipu:9343: lupa sada cara japa jabha daha daśa gṝ ityetebhyo bhāva-garhāyāṃ
GS24jvkasipu:9354: bhāva-grahaṇam kim ? sādhanagarhāyāṃ mā bhūt, mantraṃ japati vṛṣalaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9356: etebhyo nityaṃ bhāvagarhāyām eva bhavati, na tu kriyāsamabhihāre /
GS24jvkasipu:9361: satya-ādibhyaś cūrṇaparyantebhyaḥ, curādibhyaś ca ṇic pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9385: hetuḥ svatantraya kartuḥ prayojakaḥ, tadīyo vyāpāraḥ preṣanādi-lakṣaṇo
GS24jvkasipu:9386: hetumān, tasminn abhidheye dhātoḥ ṇic pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9389: tat karoti ity upasaṅkhyānaṃ sūtrayati ity ādyartham /
GS24jvkasipu:9391: ākhyānāt kṛtas tad ācaṣṭa iti ṇic kṛlluk prakṛtipratyāpattiḥ prakṛtivac ca kārakam /
GS24jvkasipu:9392: ākhyānāt kṛdanttaṇ ṇic vaktavyaḥ tad ācaṣṭe ity etasminn arthe, kṛl-luk,
GS24jvkasipu:9400: ujjayinyāḥ prasthito māhiṣmatyāṃ sūryodgamanaṃ sambhāvayate sūryam udgamayati /
GS24jvkasipu:9406: kaṇḍūñ ity evam ādibhyo yak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9408: tatra dhātvadhikārād dhatubhyaḥ eva pratyayo vidhīyate, na tu prātipadikebhyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9411: āha ca ayam imaṃ dīrghaṃ manye dhatur vibhāṣitaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:9450: gupū rakṣaṇe, dhūpa santāpe, viccha gatau, paṇa vyavahāre stutau ca, pana ca ity etebhyo dhātubhyaḥ āya-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9456: stuty-arthena paninā sāhacaryāt tadarthaḥ paṇiḥ pratyayam utpādayati na
GS24jvkasipu:9460: anubandhaś ca kevale carita-arthaḥ, tena āya-pratyaya-antānn ātmanepadaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:9463: ṛtiḥ sautro dhatuḥ dhṛṇāyāṃ vartate, tataḥ īyaṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9466: īyaṅ-vacanaṃ jñāpana-arthaṃ, dhātu-vihitānāṃ pratyayānām āyanādayo na
GS24jvkasipu:9476: ārdhadhātuka-viṣaye ārdhadhātuka-vivakṣāyām āyādayaḥ pratyayā vā bhavanti
GS24jvkasipu:9480: nityaṃ pratyayaprasaṅge tad utpattir ārdhadhātuka-viṣaye vikalpyate, tatra yathāyathaṃ pratyayā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:9488: pratyaya-grahaṇa-paribhāṣā+eva pada-sañjñāyām antavacanena liṅgena pratiṣiddhā satī punar iha antavacanena pratiprasūyate /
GS24jvkasipu:9495: tasmin luṭi ca parato dhātor yathā-saṅkhyaṃ syatāsī pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9504: dhātoḥ sip pratyayo bhavati bahulaṃ leti parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9513: kāsṛ śabda-kutsāyām, tataḥ pratyayāntebhyaś ca dhātubhyaḥ ām pratyayo
GS24jvkasipu:9526: ij-ādir yo dhātur gurumān ṛcchati-varjitaḥ, tasmāc ca liṭi parata ām pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9535: anṛcchaḥ iti kim ? ānarccha, ānarcchatuḥ, ānarcchauḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9538: atha vā -- vācya ūrṇorṇuvadbhāvo yaṅ-prasiddhiḥ prayojanam /
GS24jvkasipu:9542: daya dānagati-rakṣaṇeṣu, aya gatau, āsa upaveṣane, etebhyaś ca liṭi parata ām pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:9548: uṣa dāhe, vida jñāne, jagṛ nidrākṣaye, etebhyo liṭi parato 'nyatarasyām ām pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:9555: ñibhī bhaye, hrī lajjāyām, ḍubhṛñ dhāraṇapoṣaṇayoḥ, hu dānādānayoḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:9556: etebhyo liṭi parataḥ ām pratyayo bhavati anyatarasyām, ślāviva ca asmin
GS24jvkasipu:9558: kiṃ punas tat ? dvitvam ittvaṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:9565: ām-pratyayasya paścāt kṛñ anuprayujyate liṭi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9566: kṛñ iti pratyāhāreṇa kṛbhvastayo gṛhyante, tat sāmarthyād aster bhūbhāvaḥ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9573: kiṃ punar iha nipātyate ? vider loṭi ām pratyayaḥ, guṇābhāvaḥ, loṭo luk,
GS24jvkasipu:9576: iti-karaṇaḥ pradarśana-arthaḥ, na kevalaṃ prathamapuruṣa-bahuvacanaṃ, kiṃ tarhi sarvāṇy eva loḍ-vacanāny anuprayujyante, vidāṅ karotu, vidāṅ
GS24jvkasipu:9577: kurutāt, vidāṅ kurutām, vidāṅ kuru, vidāṅ kurutam ity ādi //
GS24jvkasipu:9581: abhyutsādayām ity evam ādayaḥ chandasi viṣaye 'nyatarasyāṃ nipātyante /
GS24jvkasipu:9582: sadijaniramīṇāṃ ṇyantānāṃ luḍi ām pratyayo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:9583: cinoter api tatra+eva+aampratyayo dvirvacanaṃ kutvaṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:9584: akar iti caturbhir api pratyekam anuprayogaḥ sambadhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:9585: pāvayām kriyāt iti pavateḥ punāter vā ṇyantasya liṅi ām nipātyate,
GS24jvkasipu:9586: guṇābhāvaś ca, akran iti ca asya anuprayogaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9587: vidām-akran iti vider luṅi ām nipātyate, gunabhāvaś ca, akran iti ca asya anuprayogaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9602: dhātoḥ cliḥ pratyayo bhavati luḍi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9612: āgamān udāttatvaṃ hi pratyaya-svaram iva citsvaram api badheta iti sthāninyādeśe ca dviś cakāro 'nubadhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:9621: śalanto yo dhātur ig-upadhas tasmāt parasya cleḥ aniṭaḥ kṣa ādeśo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:9631: śliṣeḥ dhātoḥ āliṅgana-kriyāvacanāt parasya cleḥ kṣaḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9639: dṛśeḥ dhātoḥ parasya cleḥ kṣa-ādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9640: asmin pratiṣiddhe irito vā (*3,1.45) iti aṅsicau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9645: ṇy-antebhyo dhātubhyaḥ, śri dru sru ity etebhyaś ca parasya cleḥ caṅ-ādeśo
GS24jvkasipu:9654: kartari iti kim ? akārayiṣātāṃ kaṭau devadattena /
GS24jvkasipu:9656: āyādayaḥ ārdhadhātuke vā (*3,1.31) iti yadā ṇiṅ na asti tadaa+etat
GS24jvkasipu:9665: dheṭ pāne, ṭuośvi gati-vṛddhyoḥ, etābhyām uttarasya cler vibhāṣā caṅ-ādeśo
GS24jvkasipu:9676: kartari ity eva, adhiṣātāṃ gavau vatsena //
GS24jvkasipu:9679: gupeḥ parasya cleḥ chandasi viṣaye vibhāṣā caṅ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9680: yatra āya-pratyayo nāsti tatra ayaṃ vidhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9683: bhāśāyāṃ tu caṅantaṃ varjayitvā śiṣṭaṃ rūpatrayaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:9686: ūna parihāṇe, dhvana śabde, ila preraṇe, arda gatau yācane ca, etebhyo dhātubhyaḥ ṇyantebhyaḥ pūrveṇa cleścaṅi prāpte chandasi viṣaye na bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:9697: asu kṣepane, vaca paribhāṣaṇe brūñ-ādeśo vā, khyā prakathane cakṣiṅ-ādeśo
GS24jvkasipu:9698: vā, ebhyaḥ parasya cler aṅ-ādeśo bhavati kartṛ-vācini lugi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9699: asyateḥ puṣādipāṭhādevāṅi siddhe punar grahaṇam ātmanepada-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:9703: kartari iti kim ? paryāsiṣātāṃ gāvau vatsena //
GS24jvkasipu:9706: lipa upadehe ṣica kṣarane, hveñ spardhāyām, etebhyaś ca parasya cleḥ aṅ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9714: lipi-sici-hva ātmanepadeṣu parataḥ cleḥ aṅ-ādeśo bhavati anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:9721: dyutādibhyaś ca dhātubhyaḥ parasya cleḥ parasmaipadeṣu parataḥ aṅādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9732: sṛ gatau, śāsu anuśiṣṭau ṛ gatau ity etebhyaḥ parasya cleḥ aṅ-ādeśo
GS24jvkasipu:9739: cakāraḥ parasmaipadeṣu ity anukarṣaṇa-arthaḥ taccottaratropayogaṃ yāsyati //
GS24jvkasipu:9742: irito dhātoḥ parasya cleḥ aṅ-ādeśo vā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9750: jṝṣ vayohānau, stambhuḥ sautro dhātuḥ, mrucu, mlucu gatyarthe, grucu,
GS24jvkasipu:9751: glucu steyakaraṇe, gluñcu, ṣasja gatau, ṭuośvi gati-vṛddhyoḥ, etebhyo dhātubhyaḥ parasya cler vā aṅ-ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9760: glucu-glujcvor anyataropādāne 'pi rūpatrayaṃ sidhyati, arthabhidāt tu dvayor upādānaṃ kṛtam
GS24jvkasipu:9761: kecit tu varnayanti dvayor upādāna-sāmarthyād gluñcer anunāsikalopo na
GS24jvkasipu:9765: kṛ mṛ dṛ ity etebhyaḥ parasya cleḥ chandasi viṣaye aṅ-ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9777: pada gatau, asmād dhātoḥ parasya cleḥ ciṇ-ādeso bhavati taśabde parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9786: dīpī dīptau, janī prādurbhāve, budha avagamane, pūrī āpyāyane, tāyṛ
GS24jvkasipu:9787: santānapālanayoḥ, opyāayī vṛddhau, etebhyaḥ parasya cleḥ taśabde parato 'nyatarasyāṃ ciṇ-ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9796: ajantād dhātoḥ parasya cleḥ karmakrtari ta-śabde parataḥ ciṇādeṣo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:9798: akāri kaṭaḥ svayam eva, akṛta kaṭaḥ svayam eva /
GS24jvkasipu:9799: alāvi kedāraḥ svayam eva, alaviṣṭa kedāraḥ svayam eva /
GS24jvkasipu:9800: acaḥ iti kim ? abhedi kāṣṭhaṃ svayam eva /
GS24jvkasipu:9801: karmakartari iti kim ? akāri kaṭo devadattena //
GS24jvkasipu:9804: duha prapūraṇe, asmāt parasya cleḥ ciṇādeśo bhavaty anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:9805: adohi gauḥ svayam eva, agugdha gauḥ svayam eva /
GS24jvkasipu:9809: rudhir āvaraṇe, asmāt parasya cleḥ karmakrtari ciṇ-ādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9811: karmakartari ity eva, anvavārodhi gauḥ gopālakena //
GS24jvkasipu:9815: tapa santāpe, asmāt parasya cleḥ ciṇādeśo na bhavati karmakartari anutāpe ca /
GS24jvkasipu:9817: tasya grahaṇam karmakartrarthaṃ, tatra hi bhāvakarmaṇor api pratiṣedho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9822: dhātoḥ parasya cleḥ ciṇ-ādeśo bhavati bhāve karmaṇi ta-śabde parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9824: karmaṇi khalv api -- akāri kaṭo devadattena /
GS24jvkasipu:9829: bhāvakarma-vācini sārvadhātuke parato dhatoḥ yak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9841: kartṛ-vācini sārvadhātuke parato dhātoḥ śap pratyayao bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9848: div ity evam ādibhyaḥ dhātubhyaḥ śyan partyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9857: ṭubhrāśṛ, dubhlāśṛ dīptau, bhramu anavasthāne, bhramu calane, dvayor api grahaṇam, kramu pādavikṣepe, klamu glānau, trasī udvege, truṭī chedane,
GS24jvkasipu:9858: laṣa kāntau, etebhyo vā śyan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9870: tasmān nityaṃ śyani prāpte 'nupasargād vikalpa ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:9878: sampūrvāc ca yaseḥ vā śyan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9882: ṣūñ abhiṣave, ity evam ādibhyo dhātubhyaḥ śnupratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9888: śruvaḥ śnu-pratyayo bhavati, tatsaṃniyogena śruvaḥ śṛ ity ayam ādeśo
GS24jvkasipu:9899: takṣū tvakṣū tanū-karaṇe, asmāt tanūkaraṇe vartamānāt anatarasyāṃ
GS24jvkasipu:9906: tuda vyathane ity evam ādibhyo dhātubhyaḥ śa-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9913: rudhir āvaraṇe ity evam ādibhyo dhātubhyaḥ śnam pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9921: tanu vistāre ity evam ādibhyo dhātubhyaḥ kṛñaś ca u-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9927: tanādi-pāṭhād eva u-pratyaye siddhe karoter upādānaṃ niyama-artham, anyat
GS24jvkasipu:9930: iti vibhāṣā sico lug na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9935: hivi, dhivi jivi prīṇana-arthāḥ, kṛvi hiṃsākaraṇayoḥ, ity etayoḥ dhātvoḥ
GS24jvkasipu:9939: ato lopasya sthānivadbhāvāt guṇo na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:9942: ḍukrīñ dravyavinimaye ity evam ādibhyaḥ dhātubhyaḥ śnā pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9949: ādyāś catvāro dhātavaḥ sautrāḥ, skuñ āpravaṇe, etebhyaḥ śnā pratyayo
GS24jvkasipu:9956: udittva-pratijñānāt sautrāṇām api dhātūnāṃ sarvārthatvaṃ vijñāyate,
GS24jvkasipu:9960: hala uttarasya śnā-pratyayasya śanaj-ādeśo bhavati hau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9966: itarathā hi pratyaya-antaram eva sarvaviṣayaṃ vijñāyeta //
GS24jvkasipu:9969: chandasi viṣaye śnaḥ śāyac ādeśo bhavati, śānaj api /
GS24jvkasipu:9971: śānacaḥ khalv api - badhāna deva savitaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:9974: yathāyathaṃ vikaraṇāḥ śabādayo vihitāḥ, teṣāṃ chandasi viṣaye bahulaṃ vyatyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9976: viṣayāntare vidhānam, kvacid dvivikaraṇatā, kvacit trivikaraṇatā ca /
GS24jvkasipu:9987: vyatyayamicchati śāstrakṛdeṣāṃ so 'pi ca sidhyati bahulakena //
GS24jvkasipu:9990: āśiṣi viṣaye yo liṅ tasmin parataḥ chandasi viṣaye aṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10005: karmaṇi kriyā karma, karmasthayā kriyayā tulyakriyaḥ kartā karmavad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10006: yasmin karmaṇi kartṛbhūte 'pi tadvat kriyā lakṣyate yathā karmaṇi, sa kartā karmavad bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:10008: kartari śap (*3,1.68) iti kartṛ-grahaṇam iha anuvṛttaṃ prathamayā
GS24jvkasipu:10014: vatkaraṇaṃ svāśrayam api yathā syāt, bhidyate kusūlena iti /
GS24jvkasipu:10017: tatra lānuvṛtter lāntasya kartā karmavad bhavati iti kusūlād dvitīyā na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10018: karmaṇā iti kim ? karaṇa-adhikaraṇa-abhyāṃ tulyakriyasya mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:10022: iha na bhavati, pacaty odanaṃ devadattaḥ, rādhyanty odanaṃ svayam eva iti /
GS24jvkasipu:10023: karmasthabhāvakānāṃ karmasthakriyāṇāṃ ca kartā karmavadbhavati, na kartṛsthābhāvakānāṃ na vā kartṛstha-kriyāṇām /
GS24jvkasipu:10024: karmasthaḥ pacater bhāvaḥ karmasthā ca bhideḥ kriyā /
GS24jvkasipu:10025: māsāsibhāvaḥ kartṛsthaḥ kartṛsthā ca gameḥ kriyā //
GS24jvkasipu:10028: tapa santāpe, asya kartā karmavadbhāvati, sa ca tapaḥ-karmakasya+eva na anyakarmakasya /
GS24jvkasipu:10037: tapaḥkarmakasya+eva iti kim ? uttapati suvarṇaṃ suvarṇakāraḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:10040: duha sanu nam it yeteṣaṃ karmakartari yak-ciṇau karmavadbhāva-apadiṣṭau na bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:10042: ciṇ tu duhaś ca (*3,1.63) iti pūrvam eva vibhāṣitaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:10070: āvadhiṣṭa mānavakaḥ svayam eva, āhata iti vā /
GS24jvkasipu:10073: kuṣi-rajoḥ prācāṃ śyan parasmaipadaṃ ca || PS_3,1.90 ||
GS24jvkasipu:10075: kuṣa niṣkarṣe, rañja rāge, anayor dhātvoḥ karmakartari prācām ācāryāṇāṃ matena śyan pratyayo bhavati, parasmaipadaṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:10083: tena liṭ-liṅoḥ syādi-viṣaye ca na bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:10095: ātṛtīyādhyāya-parisamāpteḥ yadita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmo dhātoḥ ity evaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:10101: kṛdupapada-sajña-arthaṃ tarhi, asmin dhātv-adhikāre te yathā syātāṃ,
GS24jvkasipu:10104: dhātoḥ ity evaṃ vihitasya yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:10105: iha mā bhūt, lūbhyām, lūbhiḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:10108: tatra+etasmin dhātv-adhikāre tṛtīye yat saptamī-nirdiṣṭaṃ tad
GS24jvkasipu:10113: itarathā hi saptamī śrūyate yatra tatra+eva syāt, stamberamaḥ, karṇejapaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:10114: yatra vā saptamī-śrutir asti saptamyāṃ janer ḍaḥ (*3,2.97) iti,
GS24jvkasipu:10119: paṣya kumbhaṃ, karoti kaṭam iti pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10120: upapada-pradeśāḥ - upapadam atiṅ (*2,2.19) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:10123: asmin dhātv-adhikāre tiṅ-varjitaḥ pratyayaḥ kṛt-sajñako bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10128: kṛtpradeśāḥ -- kṛt-taddhita-samāsaś ca (*1,2.46) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:10131: asmin dhātv-adhikāre 'smānarūpaḥ pratyayo 'pavādo vā bādhako bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:10136: asarūpa iti kim ? karmaṇy-aṇ (*3,2.1) ity utsargaḥ, āto 'nupasarge kaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:10141: astriyām iti kim ? striyāṃ kitan (*3,3.94) ity utsargaḥ, a pratyayāt (*3,3.102) ity apavadaḥ, sa bādhaka eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10146: prāg etasmāṇ ṇvulsaṃśabdanād yānita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:10149: kṛtya-pradeśaḥ - kṛtyair adhika-ārtha-vacane (*2,1.33), kṛtyānāṃ kartari vā (*2,3.71) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:10153: dhātoḥ tavyat, tavya, anīyar ity ete prayayā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:10172: aj-grahaṇaṃ kiṃ yāvatā halantāṇ ṇyataṃ vakṣyati ? ajantabhūta-pūrvād api yathā syāt, ditsyam, dhitsyam /
GS24jvkasipu:10182: pavarga-antād dhātoḥ akāropadhāt yat prayayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10194: śakḷ śaktau, ṣaha marṣaṇe, anayordhātvoḥ yat prayayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10199: gada vyaktāyāṃ vāci, madī harṣe, cara gatibhakṣaṇayoḥ, yama uparame,
GS24jvkasipu:10200: etebhyaś ca anupasargebhyo yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10213: avadya paṇya varyā ity ete śabdā nipātyante garhya paṇitavya anirodha ity eteṣv artheṣu yathā-saṅkhyam
GS24jvkasipu:10214: avadhyam iti nipātyate garhyaṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10218: paṇyam iti nipātyate, paṇitavyaṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10222: varyā iti striyāṃ nipātyate, anirodhaś ced bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10230: vaher dhātoḥ karaṇe yat pratyayo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:10235: ṛ gatau, asmāṇ ṇyati prāpte svāmi-vaiśyayoḥ abhidheyayoḥ yat pratyayo
GS24jvkasipu:10239: yato 'nāvaḥ (*6,1.213) ity ādy-udāttatve prāpte - svāminyantodāttatvaṃ ca vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:10243: upasaryā iti nipātyate kālyā cet prajane bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10250: kālyā prajane iti kim ? upasāryā śaradi madhurā //
GS24jvkasipu:10253: ajaryam iti nipātyate, saṅgataṃ ced bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10254: jīryateḥ nañpūrvāt saṅgate saṅgamane kartari yat prayayo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:10262: vader dhātoḥ subantoḥ upapade anupasarge kyap pratyayo bhavati, cakārād yat ca /
GS24jvkasipu:10270: bhavater dhātoḥ subante upapade 'nupasarge bhāve kyap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10279: supy anupasarge iti vartate, bhāve iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:10280: hanter dhātoḥ subanta upapade 'nupasarge bhāve kyap pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:10285: ṇyat tu bhāve na bhavty anabhidhānāt /
GS24jvkasipu:10291: eti stu śās vṛ dṛ juṣ ity etebhyaḥ kyap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10298: kyap iti vartamāne punaḥ kyab-grahaṇaṃ bādhaka-bādhana-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:10299: or āvaśyake (*3,1.125) iti ṇyataṃ bādhitvā kyab eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10301: vṛ-grahaṇe vṛño grahaṇam iṣyate, na vṛṅaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:10308: katham upeyam ? eḥ etad rūpaṃ, na iṇaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:10311: ṛkāra-upadhāc ca dhātoḥ kyap pratyayo bhavati kḷpi-cṛtī varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:10313: vṛdhu - vṛdhyam akḷpi-cṛteḥ iti kim ? kalpyam /
GS24jvkasipu:10323: khaner dhātoḥ kyap pratyayo bhavati, īkāraś ca antādeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:10326: tatra dvitīya ikāro ye vibhāṣā (*6,4.43) iti āttvabādhanārthaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:10329: bhṛño dhatoḥ asañjñāyāṃ viṣaye kyap prayayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10332: asañjñāyām iti kim ? bhāryo nāma kṣatriyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:10335: sañjñāyāṃ puṃsi dṛṣṭatvān na te bhāryā prasidhyati /
GS24jvkasipu:10339: mṛjer dhātoḥ vibhāṣā kyap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10344: rājasuya surya mṛṣodya rucya kupya kṛṣṭapacya avyathya ity ete śabdāḥ kyapi nipātyante /
GS24jvkasipu:10345: rājñā sotavyaḥ, rājā vā iha sūyate rājasūyaḥ kratuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:10346: sūsartibhyāṃ kyap, sarter utvaṃ, subater vā ruḍāgamaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:10348: mṛṣāpūrvasya vadateḥ pakṣe yati prāpte nityaṃ kyab nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:10360: bhider ujjheś ca kyap nipātyate nade 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:10368: puṣeḥ sidheś ca adhikaraṇe kyap nipātyate nakṣatre abhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:10375: nipūya vinīya jitya ity ete śabdā nipātyante yathā-saṅkhyaṃ muñja kalka hali ity eteṣu artheṣu vodhyeṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:10376: vipūrvāt pavater nayateś ca tathā jayater yati prāpte karmaṇi kyab nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:10385: prati api ity evaṃ pūrvād graheḥ kyap pratyayo bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:10392: pade asvairiṇi bāhyāyāṃ pakṣye carthe graher dhātoḥ kyap pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:10393: pade tāvat -- pragṛhyaṃ padam, yasya pragṛhya-sañjñā vihitā /
GS24jvkasipu:10408: kṛño vṛṣaś ca vibhāṣā kyap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10409: karoter ṇyati prāpte varṣateḥ ṛdupadhatvāt nitye kyapi prāpte vibhāṣārbhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:10414: yugyam iti nipātyate patraṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10424: tasminn upapade vaser dhātoḥ kāle 'dhikaraṇe ṇyat pratyayo bhavati, tatra anyatarasyāṃ vṛddhyabhāvo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:10425: saha vasato 'smin kāle sūryācandramasau iti amāvāsya, amāvasyā /
GS24jvkasipu:10426: ekadeśavikṛtasya ananyatvād amāvāsyāyā vā (*4,3.30) ity atra amāvasyā-śabdasya api grahaṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10428: tathaikavṛttitā tayoḥ svaraś ca me prasidhyati //
GS24jvkasipu:10433: yad iha lakṣaṇena anupapannaṃ tat sarvaṃ nipātanāt siddham /
GS24jvkasipu:10434: niṣṭarkyaḥ iti kṛtī chedane ity asmān nispūrvāt kyapi prāpte ṇyat,
GS24jvkasipu:10435: ādyanta-viparyayaś ca, nisaś ca ṣatvaṃ nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:10437: devaśabde upapade hvayater juhoter vā kyap, dīrghastugabhāvaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:10444: mṛṅ prāṇatyāge, stṛñ ācchandane, dhvṛ hūrcchane, etebhyo yat pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:10462: bhavateḥ stauteś ca ṇyat, āvadeśaś ca bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10470: niṣṭarkye vyatyayaṃ vidyān nisaḥ ṣatvaṃ nipātanāt /
GS24jvkasipu:10472: ṇyadekasmāc caturghyaḥ kyap caturbhyaś ca yato vidhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:10473: ṇyadekasmād ya-śabdaś ca dvau kyapau ṇyadvidhiś catuḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:10477: ṛvarṇa-antād dhātor halantāc ca ṇyat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10485: uvarṇa-antād dhātoḥ ṇyat prayayo bhavati āvaśyake dyotye /
GS24jvkasipu:10490: āvaśyake dyotye iti vet, svarasamāsa-anupapattiḥ, avaśyalāvyam,
GS24jvkasipu:10496: āṅ-pūrvāt sunoteḥ yu vapi rapi lapi trapi cama ity etebhyaś ca ṇyat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10514: yaśca gārhapatyād ānīyate dakṣiṇāgnir āhavanīyena saha ekayoniḥ, tatra tan nipātanaṃ, na dakṣiṇāgnim ātre /
GS24jvkasipu:10515: tasya hi yonir vikalpyate vaiśyakulād vittavato bhrāṣṭrādvā gārhapatyād vā iti /
GS24jvkasipu:10516: ānāyyo 'nitya iti ced dakṣiṇāgnau kṛtaṃ bhavet /
GS24jvkasipu:10517: ekayonau tu taṃ vidyād āneyo hy anyathā bhavet //
GS24jvkasipu:10525: yady evaṃ katham etat, jyeṣṭhāya putrāya pitā brahma brūyāt praṇāyyāntevāsine, na anyasmai kasmaicana iti ? sammatir abhilāṣo 'py
GS24jvkasipu:10527: tad abhāvena niṣkāmatayā asammatir antevāsī bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10528: tasmai niṣkāmāya mokṣa-arthaṃ yatamānāyāntevāsine praṇāyyāya brahma brūyāt iti yujyate //
GS24jvkasipu:10531: pāyyādayaḥ śabdā nipātyante yathā-saṅkhyaṃ māne haviṣi nivāse sāmidhenyāṃ ca abhidheyāyām
GS24jvkasipu:10532: pāyya iti māṅo ṇyat-pratyayaḥ, ādeḥ patvaṃ ca nipātyate māne /
GS24jvkasipu:10542: tatra ca dhāyyā iti na sarvā sāmidhenī ucyate, kiṃ tarhi, kācid eva /
GS24jvkasipu:10544: tathā ca asāmidhenyām api dṛśyate, dhāyyāḥ śaṃsatyagnirnetā taṃ
GS24jvkasipu:10548: kuṇḍapāyya sañcāyya ity etau śabdau nipātyete kratāv abhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:10549: kuṇḍa-śabde tṛtīyānta upapade pibater dhātor adhikaraṇe yat pratyayo nipātyate yuk ca /
GS24jvkasipu:10550: kuṇḍena pīyate 'smin somaḥ iti kuṇḍapāyyaḥ kratuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:10558: paricāyya upacāyya samūhya ity ete śabdā nipātyante agnāv abhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:10559: paripūrvat upapūrvāc ca cinoter ṇya dāyādeśau nipātyete /
GS24jvkasipu:10562: sampūrvād vaheḥ samprasāraṇaṃ dīrghatvaṃ ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:10589: tribhyo gaṇebhyaḥ trayaḥ pratyayāḥ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:10591: nandi-graha-pacādayaś ca na dhātu-pāṭhataḥ sanniviṣṭā gṛhyante, kiṃ tarhi,
GS24jvkasipu:10592: nandana ramaṇa ity evam ādiṣu prātipadika-gaṇeṣu apoddhṛtya prakṛtayo nirdiśyante /
GS24jvkasipu:10703: ig-upadhebhyaḥ jānāteḥ prīṇāteḥ kirateś ca kapratyayaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10714: ākārāntebhyo dhātubhyaḥ upasarga upapade kapratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10721: pādibhyo dhātubhyaḥ upasarge upapade śa-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10758: dāño dhāñaś ca vibhāṣā śa-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10766: jvala dīptau ity evam ādibhyo dhātubhyaḥ kasa gatau ity evam antebhyo vibhāṣā ṇa-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10775: anupasargāt iti, vibhāṣā iti ca nivṛttam /
GS24jvkasipu:10776: śyaiṅaḥ, ākāra-antebhyaś ca dhātubhyaḥ, vyadha āsrau saṃsrau atīṇ avasā avahṛ liha śliṣa śvasa ity etebhyaś ca ṇa pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10777: ākāra-antatvād eva śyāyateḥ pratyatye siddhe punar vacanaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:10795: dunoter nayateś ca anupasarge ṇa-pratyayo bhavti /
GS24jvkasipu:10812: graher dhātoḥ ka-pratyayo bhavati gehe kartari /
GS24jvkasipu:10819: dhātoḥ ṣvun pratyayo bhavati śilpini kartari /
GS24jvkasipu:10830: gāyateḥ thakan pratyayo bhavati śilpini kartari /
GS24jvkasipu:10835: gāyateḥ ṇyuṭ pratyayo bhavati śilpini kartari /
GS24jvkasipu:10841: gāyateḥ ṇyuṭ pratyayo bhavati śilpiti kartari /
GS24jvkasipu:10846: pru sṛ lū ity etebhyaḥ dhātubhyaḥ samabhihāre vun pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10851: sādhukāriṇi vun vidhānāt sakṛd api yaḥ suṣṭhu karoti tatra bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10852: bahuśo yo duṣṭaṃ karoti tatra na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:10855: āśiṣi gamyamānāyāṃ dhātum ātrāt vun pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10860: amuṣyāḥ kriyāyaḥ kartā bhavet ity evam āśāsyate //
GS24jvkasipu:10861: iti śrījyādityaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau tṛtīyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:10865: trividhaṃ karma, nirvartyaṃ, vikāryaṃ, prāpyaṃ ca+iti /
GS24jvkasipu:10866: sarvatra karmaṇi upapade dhātoḥ aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10873: grāmaṃ gacchati, ādityaṃ paśyati, himavantaṃ śṛṇoti ity atra na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:10885: hveñ spardhāyāṃ śabde ca, veñ tantusantāne, māṅ māne ity etebhyaś ca karmaṇy-upapade aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10916: iti uttaraṃ karmaṇi iti ca supi iti ca dvayam apy anuavartate /
GS24jvkasipu:10917: tatra sakarmakeṣu dhātuṣu krmaṇi ity etad upatiṣṭhate /
GS24jvkasipu:10921: tunda-śokayoḥ karmaṇor upapadayoḥ parimṛja-apanudoḥ dhātvoḥ kapratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10938: dadāteḥ jānāteś ca dhātoḥ preṇopasṛṣṭāt karmaṇy-upapade kapratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10946: saṃpūrvāt khyā ity etasmād dhātoḥ karmaṇy-upapade kapratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10952: gāyateḥ pibateś ca dhātoḥ karmaṇy-upapade 'nupasarge ṭak pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:10960: pibateḥ iti kim ? surāṃ pāti iti surāpā /
GS24jvkasipu:10964: yā bāhmaṇī surāpī bhavati naināṃ devāḥ patilokaṃ nayanti /
GS24jvkasipu:10965: yā brahmaṇī surāpā bhavati naināṃ devāḥ patilokaṃ nayanti //
GS24jvkasipu:10968: harater dhātor anudyamane vartamānāt karmaṇi upapade ac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10989: vayasi gamyamāne harateḥ karmaṇy-upapade ac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10992: yad udyamanaṃ kriyamāṇaṃ sambhāvyamānaṃ vā vayo gamayati, tatra ayaṃ vidhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:10997: āṅ-pūrvād harateḥ karmaṇy-upapade ac pratyayo bhavati tācchīlye gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:11001: puṣpādy-āharane svābhāvikī phalānapekṣā pravṛttir asya ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:11002: tācchīoye iti kim ? bhāram āharati iti bhārāhāraḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:11005: arha pūjāyām, asmād dhātoḥ karmaṇy-upapade acpratyayao bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11013: stamba karṇa ity etayoḥ subantayor upapadayor yathā-saṅkhyaṃ rami-japoḥ
GS24jvkasipu:11015: rameḥ akarmakatvāt, japeḥ śabda-karmakatvāt karma na sambhavati iti supi ity etad iha abhisambadhyate
GS24jvkasipu:11023: śamy upapade dhātu-mātrāt sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye acpratyayao bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11027: dhātu-grahaṇaṃ kiṃ yāvatā dhātoḥ iti vartata eva ? śami-sañjñāyām iti siddhe dhātu-grahaṇaṃ kṛño hetvādiṣu ṭapratiṣedha-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:11034: śeter dhātor adhikaraṇe subanta upapade ac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11051: carer dhātor adhikaraṇe subanta upapade ṭapratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11060: bhikṣā senā ādāya ity eteṣu upapadeṣu careḥ dhatoḥ ṭapratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11066: puras agratas agre ity eteṣu upapadeṣu sarteḥ dhātoḥ ṭapratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11072: pūrva-śabde kartṛ-vāciny-upapade sarter dhātoḥ ṭapratyayaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11074: kartari iti kim ? pūrvaṃ deśaṃ sarati iti pūrvasāraḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:11077: karmaṇi upapade karoteḥ dhātoḥ ṭapratyayo bhavati hetau tācchīlye ānulomye ca gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:11092: karmaṇi supi iti ca dvayam apy anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:11094: divā-ādiṣu upapadeṣu karoter dhātoḥ ṭapratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11096: divā-śabdo adhikaraṇa-vacanaḥ supi ity asya viśeṣaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:11134: karama-śabde upapade karma-vācini karoteḥ ṭapratyayo bhavati bhṛtau gamyamānāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:11136: karma karoti iti karmakaraḥ bhṛtakaḥ ityarthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:11140: śabdādiṣu upapadeṣu karoteḥ ṭapratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11154: stamba śakṛt ity etayoḥ karmaṇor upapadayoḥ inpratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11162: dṛti nātha ity etayoḥ karmaṇor upapadayoḥ harater dhātoḥ paśau kartari in pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:11169: phalegrahiḥ ātmambhariḥ ity etau śabdau nipātyete /
GS24jvkasipu:11170: phala-śabdasya upapadasya ekārāntatvam inpratyayaś ca graher nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:11172: ātma-śabdasya upapadasya mumāgama inpratyayaś ca bhṛño nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:11179: vana ṣaṇa sambhaktau, rakṣa pālane, mantha viloḍane, etebhyaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:11181: brahmavaniṃ tvā kṣatravaniṃ suprajāvaniṃ rāyaspoṣavaniṃ paryūhāmi /
GS24jvkasipu:11187: ejṛ kampane ity asmāt ṇyantāt karmaṇy-upapade khaś pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11199: nāsikāstanayoḥ karmaṇorupapadayoḥ dhmādheṭordhātvoḥ khaś pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:11203: nāsikāyāṃ tu dhmaś ca dheṭaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:11205: tac ca+etan nāsika-stanayor iti lakṣaṇavyabhicāracihnād alpāctarasya
GS24jvkasipu:11207: dheṭaḥ ṭitvāt striyāṃ ṅīp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11211: nāḍī muṣti ity etayoḥ karmaṇor upapadayoḥ dhmādheṭoḥ khaśpratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:11227: rujo bhaṅge, vaha prāpaṇe ity etābhyām utpūrvābhyāṃ kūle karmaṇi upapade khaś pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11232: vaha abhra ity etayoḥ karamṇor upapadayoḥ liher dhātoḥ khaś pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11237: parimāṇaṃ prasthādi, tasmin karmaṇy-upapade paceḥ khaś pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11243: mita nakha ity etayoḥ karmaṇor upapadayoḥ paceḥ khaś pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11249: vidhu arus ity etayoḥ karmaṇor upapadayoḥ tuder dhātoḥ khaś pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11254: asūrya lalāṭa ity etayoḥ karmaṇor upapadayoḥ dṛśi-tapoḥ dhātvoḥ khaś pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11257: asūrya iti ca asamartha-samāso 'yaṃ, dṛśinā nañaḥ sambandhāt, sūryaṃ na paśyanti iti /
GS24jvkasipu:11259: evaṃ nāma guptā yad aparihārya-darśanaṃ sūryam api na paśyanti iti //
GS24jvkasipu:11262: ugrampaśya irammada pāṇindhama ity ete śabdā nipātyante /
GS24jvkasipu:11265: pāṇayo dhmāyante eṣu iti pāṇindhamāḥ panthānaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:11268: priya vaśa ity etayoḥ karamṇoḥ upapadayoḥ vadeḥ dhātoḥ khac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11285: dviṣat-parayoḥ karmaṇor upapadayoḥ tāpeḥ chātoḥ khac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11286: tapa dāhe curādiḥ, tapasantāpe bhvādiḥ, dvayor api grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:11294: vākśabde karmaṇi upapade yameḥ dhātoḥ khac prayayo bhavati vrate gamyamāne
GS24jvkasipu:11300: pur sarva ity etayoḥ karamaṇoḥ upapadayoḥ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ dārisahoḥ dhātvoḥ khac pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:11307: sarvakūla abhra karīra ity eteṣu karmasu upapadeṣu kaṣeḥ dhātoḥ khac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11314: megha ṛti bhaya ity eteṣu karmasu upapadeṣu kaṛñaḥ khac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11322: kṣema priya madra ity eteṣu karmasu upapadeṣu karoteḥ aṇ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:11327: vā iti vaktavye punar aṇ-grahanaṃ hetvādiṣu ṭapratiṣedha-artham //
GS24jvkasipu:11331: āśita-śabde subante upapade bhavater dhātoḥ karaṇe bhāve ca-arthe khac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11336: karmaṇi iti supi iti ca prakṛtaṃ sajñāvaśād yathāsambhavaṃ sambadhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:11337: bhṛ tṝ vṛ ji dhāri sahi tapi dama ity etebhyo dhātubhyaḥ sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye khac pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:11346: sajñāyām iti kim ? kuṭumbaṃ bibharti iti kuṭumbabhāraḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:11349: gameḥ dhātoḥ supi upapade sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye khac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11355: anta atyanta adhvan dura pāra sarva ananta ity eteṣu karmasu upapadeṣu gameḥ ḍapratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:11363: ḍakaraḥ ṭilopārthaḥ, ḍityabhasya apy anubandhakaraṇa-sāmarthyāt iti //
GS24jvkasipu:11374: apra āha - ḍaprakaraṇe 'nyeṣv api dṛśyate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:11381: āśiṣi gamyamānāyāṃ hanter dhātoḥ karmaṇy-upapade ḍaprayayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11386: dārāv upapade āṅpūrvād hanteḥ aṇ pratyayo bhavati, antasya ca ṭa kārādeśo
GS24jvkasipu:11390: āṅpūrvāt hanteś cārāv upapade aṇ, antasya vā ṭakārādeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:11393: karmaṇy-upapade sampūrvāt hanteḥ dhātoḥ aṇ pratyayo bhavati, antasya ca vā
GS24jvkasipu:11399: apapūrvāt hanteḥ dhātoḥ kleśa-tamasoḥ karmaṇor upapadayoḥ ḍapratyayo
GS24jvkasipu:11407: kumāra śīrṣa ity etayoḥ upapadayoḥ hanteḥ ṇiniḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11413: hanteḥ jāyāpatyoḥ karmaṇoḥ uapapadayoḥ lakṣaṇavati kartari ṭak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11415: atha vā lakṣaṇe dyotye ṭak pratyayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:11418: amanuṣyakartṛke vartamānād hanteḥ dhātoḥ karmaṇi upapade ṭak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11424: iha karmān na bhavati, cauraghāto hastī ? kṛtya-lyuṭo bahulam (*3,3.113)
GS24jvkasipu:11428: śaktau gamyamānāyāṃ hasti kapāṭayoḥ karmaṇor upapadayoḥ hanteḥ ṭak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11432: śaktau iti kim ? viṣeṇa hastinaṃ hanti hastighātaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:11435: pāṇigha tāḍagha ity etau śabdau nipātyete śilpini kartari /
GS24jvkasipu:11436: pāṇi tāḍa ity etayoḥ karmaṇoḥ upapadayoḥ hanteḥ dhatoḥ ṭak pratyayo
GS24jvkasipu:11438: tasmiṃśca parato hanteḥ ṭilopo ghatvaṃ ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:11445: āḍhya-subhaga-sthūla-palita-nagna-andha-priyeṣu cvy-artheṣv acvau kṛñaḥ karaṇe khyun || _____START JKv_3,2.56:
GS24jvkasipu:11446: āḍhyādiṣu karmasu upapadeṣu cvy-artheṣu acvyanteṣu karoteḥ dhātoḥ karaṇe kārake khyun pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11447: cver vikalpena vidhānād dvividhāḥ cvyarthāḥ, cvyantā acvyantā śca /
GS24jvkasipu:11456: cvyartheṣu iti kim ? āḍhyaṃ tailena kurvanti abhyañjayanti ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:11459: nanu ca khyunā mukte lyuṭā bhavitavyam, na ca lyuṭaḥ khyunaś ca viśeṣo
GS24jvkasipu:11460: 'sti, tatra kiṃ pratiṣedhena ? evaṃ tarhi pratiṣedha-sāmarthyāt khyuni asati lyuḍ api na bhavati, tena lyuṭo 'py ayam arthataḥ pratiṣedhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:11464: āḍhyādisu subanteṣu upapadeṣu cvyartheṣu acvyanteṣu bhavater dhātoḥ kartari kārake khiṣṇuc, khukañ ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:11472: kartari iti kim ? karaṇe mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:11479: spṛśe rdhātor anudake subanta upapade kvin pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11480: nanu sakarmakatvāt spṛśeḥ karmaivopapadaṃ prāpnoti ? na+eṣa doṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:11481: kartari iti pūrvasūtrād anuvartate, tat kartṛpracaya-arthaṃ vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:11482: subantamātre ca+upapade kartṛpacayo labhyate ghṛtaṃ spṛśati ghṛtaspṛk /
GS24jvkasipu:11489: ṛtvigādayaḥ pañca-śabdāḥ kvin-pratyayāntāḥ nipātyante, apare trayo dhātvo
GS24jvkasipu:11491: ṛtu-śabda upapade yajer dhatoḥ kvin pratyayo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:11492: ṛtau yajati, ṛtuṃ vā yajati, ṛtuprayukto vā yajati ṛtvik /
GS24jvkasipu:11494: dhṛṣeḥ kvin pratyayaḥ, dvirvacanam, antodāttatvaṃ ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:11496: sṛjeḥ karmaṇi kvin, amāgamaḥ ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:11500: utpūrvāt sniheḥ kvin, upasargānta-lopaḥ, ṣatvaṃ ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:11502: añcu yuji kruñca ity eteṣāṃ dhātūnāṃ kvin pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11503: nipātanaiḥ saha nirdeśāt atra api kiṃcid alākṣaṇikaṃ kāryam asti /
GS24jvkasipu:11504: añcateḥ subnata-mātra upapade kvin pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11510: sopapadāt tu satsūdviṣa (*3,2.61) ity ādinā kvip bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11516: tyadādiṣu upapadeṣu dṛśer dhātor anālocane 'rthe vartamānāt kañ pratyayo
GS24jvkasipu:11521: kaño ñakāro viśeṣaṇa-arthaḥ, ṭhak ṭhañ kañ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:11522: anālocane iti kim ? taṃ paśyati taddarśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:11523: tādṛgādayo hi rūḍhiśabda-prakārāḥ, na+eva atra darśanakriyā vidyate /
GS24jvkasipu:11536: karma-grahaṇaṃ tu spṛśo 'nudake kvin (*3,2.58) ity ataḥ prabhṛti na vyāpriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:11537: sadādibhyaḥ dhātubhyaḥ subante upapade upasarge 'pi anupasarge 'pi kvip pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11538: upasarga-grahaṇam jñāpanārtham, anyatra sub-grahaṇe upasarga-grahaṇaṃ na bhavati iti, vadaḥ supi kyap ca (*3,1.106) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:11539: sū iti dviṣā sāhacaryāt sūteḥ ādādikasya grahaṇaṃ, na suvateḥ taudādikasya
GS24jvkasipu:11540: yujir yoge, yuja samādhau, dvayor api grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:11541: vida jñāne, vida sattāyām, vida vicāraṇe, trayāṇām api grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:11570: katham atra ṇatvam ? sa eṣāṃ grāmaṇīḥ (*5,2.78) iti nipātanāt, nayateḥ pūrvapadāt sajñāyām agaḥ (*8,4.3) iti ṇatvam /
GS24jvkasipu:11574: mo rāji samaḥ kvau (*8,2.35) iti matvam /
GS24jvkasipu:11575: anyebhyo 'pi dṛśyate (*3,2.178), kvip ca (*3,2.76) iti sāmānyena vakṣyati,
GS24jvkasipu:11580: bhajer dhātoḥ subanta upapade upasarge 'pi - prabhāk //
GS24jvkasipu:11584: chandasi viṣaye saher dhātoḥ subante upapade ṇvi-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11586: saheḥ sāḍaḥ saḥ (*8,3.56) iti ṣatvam, anyeṣām api dṛśyate (*6,3.137) iti dīrghatvam //
GS24jvkasipu:11589: vaher dhātoḥ chandasi viṣaye subanta upapade ṇvipratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11595: kavya purīṣa purīṣya ity eteṣu upapadeṣu chandasi viṣaye vaher dhātoḥ ṇyuṭ pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:11601: havya-śabde upapade chandasi viṣaye vaher dhātoḥ ñyuṭ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:11603: agniś ca havya-vāhanaḥ anantaḥpādam iti kim ? havyavāḍagnirajaraḥ pitā naḥ
GS24jvkasipu:11607: jana janane, janī pradurbhāve, dvayor api grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:11608: tathā ṣaṇu dāne, vana ṣane saṃbhaktau, dvayor api grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:11609: janādibhyaḥ dhātubhyaḥ subanta upapade chandasi viṣaye viṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11621: ader dhātor ananne supy upapade viṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11627: kravya-śabda upapade ader dhātoḥ viṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11631: kathaṃ tarhi kravyādaḥ ? kṛttavikṛtta-śabde upapade aṇ, tasya ca pṛṣodarādipāṭhāt kravyabhāvaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:11632: kṛttavikṛttapakvamāṃsabhakṣaḥ kravyāda ucyate, āmamāṃsabhakṣaḥ kravyāt iti
GS24jvkasipu:11635: duher dhātoḥ supy upapade kap pratyayo bhavati, ghakāraś cāntādeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:11641: śvetavaha ukthaśas puroḍāś ity etebhyo ṇvin pratyayo bhavati mantre viṣaye
GS24jvkasipu:11644: śveta-śabde kartṛ-vācini upapade vaher dhātoḥ karaṇi kārake ṇvin pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11646: uktha-śabde karmaṇi karaṇe vā upapade śaṃsater dhātoḥ ṇvin pratyayo bhavati, nalopaś ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:11647: ukthāni śaṃsati, ukthair vā śaṃsati, ukthaśā yajamānaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:11648: dāśṛ dāne ity etasya puraḥpūrvasya ḍatvam, karmaṇi ca pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:11657: ave upapade yajeḥ dhātoḥ ṇvin pratyayo bhavati mantre viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:11662: upe upapade yajeḥ chandasi viṣaye vic pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11666: vicaḥ citkaraṇaṃ sāmānya-grahaṇa-avighāta-artham ver apṛktasya (*6,1.67) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:11668: kim artham idam ucyate, yāvata anyebhyo 'pi dṛśyante (*3,2.75) iti yajer api vic siddha eva ? yajer niyama-artham etat, upayajeḥ chandasya+iva, na bhāṣāyām iti //
GS24jvkasipu:11671: chandsi iti vartate, supi upasarge 'pi iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:11672: ākārāntebhyo dhātubhyaḥ supi upapde chandsi viṣaye manin kvanip vanip ity ete pratyayā bhavanti
GS24jvkasipu:11686: anyebhyo 'pi dhātubhyo 'nākārāntebhyo manin kyanip vanip ity ete pratyayā
GS24jvkasipu:11701: sarvadhātubhyaḥ sopapadebhyo nirupapadebhyaś ca chandasi bhāṣāyāṃ ca kvip pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:11709: sthā ity etasmād dhātoḥ supi upapade kapratyayo bhavati, kvip ca /
GS24jvkasipu:11710: kimartham idam ucyate, yavatā supi sthaḥ (*3,2.4) iti kaḥ siddha eva,
GS24jvkasipu:11711: anyebhyo 'pi dṛśyate (*3,2.178) iti kvip? bādhakabādhana-arthaṃ punar vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:11712: śami dhātoḥ sañjñāyām (*3,2.14) acaṃ bādhate - śaṃsthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:11716: ajāti-vācini subanta upapade tācchīlye gamyamāne dhātoḥ ṇiniḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11720: tāchhīlye iti kim ? uṣṇaṃ bhuṅkte kadācit /
GS24jvkasipu:11721: supi iti vartamāne punaḥ sub-grahaṇam upasarganivṛtty-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:11732: kartṛ-vācini upamāne upapade dhātoḥ ṇini-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11737: kartari iti kim ? apūpān iva bhakṣayati māṣān /
GS24jvkasipu:11741: vrata iti śāstrato niyama ucyate vrate gamyamāne subanta upapade dhātoḥ ṇiniḥ pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:11747: sati śayane sthaṇḍila eva śete na anyatra /
GS24jvkasipu:11748: sati bhojane 'śrāddham eva bhuṅkte na śrāddham iti /
GS24jvkasipu:11749: vrate iti kim ? sthāṇḍile śete devadattaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:11753: ābhīkṣṇye gamyamāne dhātoḥ bahulaṃ ṇiniḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11759: bahula-grahaṇat kulmāṣakhādaḥ ity atra na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:11763: manyateḥ subante upapade ṇiniḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11767: uttarasūtre hi khaś-pratyaye vikaraṇakṛto viśeṣaḥ syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:11771: ātmamāne vartamānān manyateḥ supy upapade khaś-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11773: yadā pratyaya-arthaḥ kartā ātmānam eva darśanīyatvādinā dharmeṇa yuktaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:11777: ātmamāne iti kim ? darśanīyamanī devadattasya yajñadattaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:11780: bhūte ity adhikāro vartamane laṭ (*3,2.123) iti yavat /
GS24jvkasipu:11781: yadita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ bhūte ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:11782: dhātv-adhikārāc ca dhātv-arthe bhūte iti vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:11783: vakṣyati - karaṇe yajaḥ (*3,2.85), agniṣṭomena iṣṭavān agniṣṭomayājī /
GS24jvkasipu:11788: yajater dhātoḥ karaṇe upapade ṇinipratyayo bhavati bhūte /
GS24jvkasipu:11793: karaṇi upapade hanter dhātoḥ ṇiniḥ pratyayo bhavati bhūte kale /
GS24jvkasipu:11801: brahmādiṣu karmasu upapadeṣu hanter dhātoḥ kvip pratyayo bhavati bhūte /
GS24jvkasipu:11805: kimartham idam ucyate yāvatā sarvadhātubhyaḥ kvip vihita eva ? brahmādiṣu hanteḥ kvib-vacanaṃ niyama-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:11807: brahmādiṣv eva hanteḥ, na anyasminnaupapade, puruṣaṃ hatavān iti /
GS24jvkasipu:11808: brahmādiṣu hanter eva, na anyasmāt syāt, brahma adhītavān iti /
GS24jvkasipu:11809: brahmādiṣu hanter bhūtakāle kvip eva na anyaḥ pratyayaḥ, tathā bhūtakāle eva na anyasmin, brahmāṇaṃ hanti haniṣyati vā iti /
GS24jvkasipu:11813: pūrveṇa niyamād aprāptaḥ kvip pratyayaḥ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:11814: chandasi viṣaye upapadantareṣv api hanter bahulaṃ kvip pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11823: tad-asambhavāt su-śabdam varjayitvā pariśiṣṭānāṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11824: svādiṣu karmasu upapadeṣu karoter dhātoḥ kvip pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11833: dhator aniyatatvād anyasminn upapade api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11839: some karmaṇi upapade sunoter dhātoḥ kvip pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11842: caturvidhaś ca atra niyamaḥ iṣyate, dhātukāla-upapada-pratyaya-viṣayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:11846: agnau karmaṇy upapade cinoter dhātoḥ kvip pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11848: atra api pūrvavac caturvidho niyama iṣyate //
GS24jvkasipu:11852: karmaṇi upapade cinoteḥ karmaṇy eva kārake kvip pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:11857: agny-artho hi iṣṭakācaya ucyate śyenacit iti //
GS24jvkasipu:11860: karmaṇi upapade vi-pūrvat krīṇāter dhātoḥ iniḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11861: karmaṇi iti vartamāṇe punaḥ karma-grahaṇaṃ kartuḥ kutsānimitte karmaṇi
GS24jvkasipu:11869: dṛśeḥ dhātoḥ karmaṇi upapade kvanip pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11872: anyebhyo 'pi dṛśyante (*3,2.75) iti kvanipi siddhe punarvacanaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:11877: rājan-śabde karmaṇi upapade yudhyateḥ karoteś ca kvanip pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11878: nanu ca yudhir akarmakaḥ ? antarbhāvitaṇy-arthaḥ sakarmako bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11884: saha-śabde ca+upapade yudhikṛñoḥ dhātvoḥ kvanip pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11890: saptamyanta upapade janer dhatoḥ ḍaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11895: pañcamyanta upapade jātivarjite janer ḍaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11903: upasarge ca upapade janeḥ ḍaḥ pratyayo bhavati sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:11908: anupūrvāt janeḥ karmaṇi upapade ḍaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11913: anyeṣv api upapadeṣu kārakeṣu janeḥ ḍaḥ pratyayo dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:11914: saptamyām ity ukatama saptamyām api dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:11917: pañcamyām ajātau (*3,2.98) ity uktaṃ, jātav api dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:11920: upasarge ca sañjñāyām (*3,2.99) ity uktam, asañjñāyām api dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:11922: anu karmaṇi (*3,2.100) ity uktam, akarmaṇy api dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:11930: ktaktavatū niṣṭhā (*1,1.26) ity uktaṃ, sa niṣṭha-sañjñakaḥ pratyayo bhūte bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11936: sañjñāyāṃ ktaktavatū bhāvyete, satoścānayoḥ sañjñāyā bhāvyam /
GS24jvkasipu:11939: sa bhūte bhavati, yasyotpannasya niṣṭhā ity eṣā sañjñā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11946: sunoter yajateś ca ṅvanip pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11958: chandasi viṣaye dhātoḥ liṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11961: nanu ca chndasi luḍ-laṅ-liṭaḥ (*3,4.6) iti sāmānyena liṭ vihita eva ?
GS24jvkasipu:11962: dhātu-sambandhe sa vidhiḥ, ayaṃ tv aviṣeṣeṇa //
GS24jvkasipu:11972: liḍ-grahaṇaṃ kim, na pūrvasya+eva prakṛtasya ādeśāvidhāne vibhakti-vipariṇāmo bhaviṣyati ? liṇmātrasya yathā syāt, yo 'pi parokṣe vihitas tasya apy ayam ādeśo bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:11983: sada vasa śru ity etebhyaḥ parasya liṭo bhāṣāyāṃ viṣaye vā kvasur ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12001: upeyivān anāśvān anūcāna ity ete śabdā nipātyante /
GS24jvkasipu:12002: upapūrvād iṇaḥ kvasuḥ, dvirvacanam abhyāsa-dīrghatvaṃ tatsāmarthyād
GS24jvkasipu:12003: ekādeśa-pratibandhaḥ, tatra vasv eka-aj-ād-dhasām (*7,2.67) ity anekāctvādiṇ na prāpnoti, sa nipātyate, abhyāsasya śravaṇaṃ dhāturūpasya
GS24jvkasipu:12006: krādiniyamāt prāptaś ca vasv eka-aj-ād-dhasām (*7,2.67) iti pratiṣiddhaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:12007: sa punar iṭ pratiprasūyate, tena ajādau na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12010: na ca atra+upasargās tantram, anyopasarga-pūrvān nirupasargāc ca bhavaty
GS24jvkasipu:12018: aśnāter nañpūrvāt kvasur nipatyate, iḍabhāvaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:12031: būte 'rthe vartamānād dhātoḥ luṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12041: avidyamānādyatane bhūte 'rthe vartamānād dhātor laṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12044: bahuvrīhi-nirdeśaḥ kim arthaḥ ? adya hyo vā abhukṣmahi iti vyāmiśre mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:12045: parokṣe ca lokavijñāte prayoktur darśana-viṣaye laṅ vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:12051: tadvacane upapade bhūtānadyatane lṛṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12053: vacana-grahaṇaṃ paryāya-artham, abhijānāsi, smarasi, budyase, cetayase iti //
GS24jvkasipu:12056: yac-chabda-sahite abhijñā-vacana upapade lṛṭ pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12059: vāsamātraṃ smaryate, na tu aparaṃ kiṃcil lakṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:12065: abhijñā-vacane upapade yac-chabda-sahite kevale ca vibhāṣā lṛṭ pratyayo bhavati, sākāṅkṣaś cet prayoktā /
GS24jvkasipu:12067: abhijānasi devadatta kaśmīreṣu vatsyāmas tatra udanaṃ bhokṣyāmahe /
GS24jvkasipu:12068: abhijānāsi devadatta magadheṣu vatsyāmaḥ, tatra udanaṃ bhokṣyāmahe /
GS24jvkasipu:12069: yadi khalv api - abhijānāsi devadatta yat kaśmīreṣu vatsyāmaḥ, yat tatra udanaṃ bhokṣyāmahe
GS24jvkasipu:12070: abhijānasi devadatta yat kaśmīreṣv avasāma, yat tatra udanam abhuñjmahi /
GS24jvkasipu:12076: ghūtānadyatana-parokṣe 'rthe vartamanād dhātḥ liṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12077: nanu dhātv-arthaḥ sarvaḥ parokṣa eva ? satyam etat /
GS24jvkasipu:12078: asti tu loke dhātv-arthena api kārakeṣu pratyakṣābhimanaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:12079: sa yatra na asti tat parokṣam ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:12089: bhūtānadyatana-parokṣe 'rthe liṭi prāpte hāśvatoḥ upapadayoḥ laṅ pratyayo
GS24jvkasipu:12091: iti ha akarot, iti ha cakāra /
GS24jvkasipu:12098: āsanakāle pṛcchyamane bhūtānadyatana-parokṣe 'rthe vartamānād dhātoḥ laṅ-liṭau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:12100: agacchad devadattaḥ ? jagāma devadattaḥ ? ayajad devadattaḥ ? iyāja devadattaḥ ? praśne iti kim ? jagāma devadattaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:12101: āsanakāle iti kim ? bhavantaṃ pṛcchāmi, jaghāna kaṃsaṃ kila vāsudevaḥ ? //
GS24jvkasipu:12105: sma-śabde upapade bhūtānadyatana-parokṣe laṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12111: aparokṣe ca bhūtānadyatane 'rthe vartamānād dhātoḥ sme upapade laṭ pratyayao bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12118: nanu-śabde upapade praśna-pūrvake prativacane bhūte 'rthe laṭ prayayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12120: akārṣīḥ kaṭaṃ devadatta ? nanu karomi bhoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:12121: avocas tatra kiṃcid devadatta ? nanu bravīmi bhoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:12122: pṛṣṭa-prativacane iti kim ? nanu akārṣīt māṇavakaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:12126: na-śabde nu-śabde ca upapade pṛṣṭa-prativacane vibhaṣā laṭ pratyayo
GS24jvkasipu:12128: akārṣīḥ kaṭaṃ devadatta ? na kromi bhoḥ, nākārṣam /
GS24jvkasipu:12129: ahaṃ nu karomi, ahaṃ nu akārṣam //
GS24jvkasipu:12133: purā-śabde upapade sma-śabda-varjite bhūtānadyatane 'rthe vibhāṣā luṅ pratyayo bhavati, laṭ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:12134: tābhyāṃ mukte pakṣe yathā-viṣayamanye 'pi pratyayā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:12135: vasanti iha purā chātrāḥ, avātsur iha purā chātrāḥ, avasanniha purā chātrāḥ, ūṣur iha purā chātrāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:12136: asme iti kim ? naḍena sam purā adhīyate //
GS24jvkasipu:12140: tasmin vartamāne 'rthe vartamanād dhātoḥ laṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12145: laṭaḥ śatṛśānacau ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ, aprathamāntena cet tasya
GS24jvkasipu:12152: laṭ iti vartamane punar laṅ-grahaṇam adhikavidhāna-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:12165: kecid vibhāṣā-grahaṇam anuvartayanti na-nvor vibhāṣā (*3,2.121) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:12171: sambhodhane ca viṣaye laṭaḥ śatṛśānacau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:12179: l akṣaṇe hetau ca arthe vartamanāda dhātoḥ parasya laṭaḥ śatṛśānacau ādeśau bhavataḥ, tau cel lakṣaṇa-hetū kriyā-viṣayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:12185: kriyāyāḥ iti kim ? dravya-guṇayor mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:12203: pūṅo yajeś ca dhātoḥ śānan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12206: yadi pratyayāḥ śānannādayaḥ na la-ādeśāḥ, kathaṃ somaṃ pavamānaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:12207: naḍamāghnānaḥ iti ṣaṣṭhī-pratiṣedhaḥ ? tṛn iti pratyāhāra-nirdeśāt /
GS24jvkasipu:12209: aprathamā-samānādhikaraṇe (*3,2.124) ity ataḥ prabhṛti ā tṛno nakārāt /
GS24jvkasipu:12226: iṅo dhāreś ca dhātvoḥ śatṛpratyayo bhavati akṛcchriṇi kartari /
GS24jvkasipu:12227: akṛcchraḥ sukhasādyo yasay kartur dhātv-arthaḥ so 'kṛcchrī /
GS24jvkasipu:12235: amitre kartari dviṣer dhātoḥ śatṛ-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12237: amitre iti kim ? dveṣṭi bhāryā patim //
GS24jvkasipu:12241: yajñasaṃyukte 'bhiṣave vartamānāt sunoter dhātoḥ śatṛ-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12253: praśaṃsāyām iti kim ? arhati cauro vadham //
GS24jvkasipu:12257: ā etasmāt kvip saṃ-śabdād yānita ūrdhvam-anukramiṣyāmas tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu te veditavyāḥ
GS24jvkasipu:12261: tacchīlo yaḥ svabhāvataḥ phala-nirapekṣas tatra pravartate /
GS24jvkasipu:12262: taddharmā tadācāraḥ, yaḥ svadharme mamāyamiti pravartate vināpi śīlena /
GS24jvkasipu:12285: tviṣer devatāyām akāraś ca+upadhāyā aniṭtvaṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:12296: alaṅ-kṛñ-ādibhyo dhātubhyaḥ tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu iṣṇuc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12312: ṇyantād dhātoḥ chandasi viṣaye tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu iṣṇuc pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:12317: bhavater dhatoḥ chandasi viṣaye tacchīlādiṣu iṣṇuc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12325: glā ji sthā ity etebhyo dhātubhyaḥ, cakārāt bhuvaś ca tacchīlādiṣu kṣnuḥ pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:12332: kṅiti ca (*1,1.5) ity atra gakāro 'pi cartvabhūto nirdiśyate, tena guṇo na
GS24jvkasipu:12334: śryukaḥ kiti (*7,2.11) ity atra api gakaro nirdiśyate, tena bhuva iḍ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12341: tras-ādibhyo dhatubhyaḥ tacchīlādiṣu knuḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12349: śamādibhyo dhātubhyo 'ṣṭābhyaḥ tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu ghinuṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12350: śama upaśame ity ataḥ prabhṛti madī harṣe ity evam antaḥ śamādir divādyantargaṇaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:12368: pṛcī samparke iti rudhādir gṛhyate natvadādir lug-vikaraṇatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:12371: yuja samādhau divādiḥ, yujir yoge rudhādiḥ dvayor api grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:12372: rañja rāge ity asya nipātanād anunāsika-lopaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:12402: kaṣa hiṃsa-arthaḥ, lasa śleṣaṇa-krīḍanayoḥ, kattha ślāghāyām, srambhu
GS24jvkasipu:12403: viśvāse, etebhyo dhātubhyo vi-śabde upapade ghinuṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12410: laṣa kāntau, asmād dhātoḥ apa upapade, cakārād vau ca ghinuṇ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12422: vasaḥ iti vasa nivāse ity asya grahaṇaṃ nācchādana-arthasya,
GS24jvkasipu:12427: ninda-ādibhyo dhātubhyaḥ tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu vuñ pratayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12441: ṇvulaiva siddha vuñ-vidhānaṃ jñāpana-arthaṃ, tācchīlikeṣu vā 'sarūpanyāyena tṛjādayo na bhavanti iti //
GS24jvkasipu:12444: devayateḥ kruśeś ca upasarge upapade vuñ patyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12453: calana-arthebhyaḥ śabda-arthebhyaś ca akarmakebhyo dhātubhyas tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu yuc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12461: anudātted yo dhatuḥ halādir akarmakaḥ, tataś ca yuc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12471: ju-praghṛtibhyo dhatubhyo yuc pratyayo bhavati tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:12483: calanārthānāṃ padeś ca grahaṇaṃ sakarmaka-artham iha /
GS24jvkasipu:12484: jñāpana-arthaṃ ca padi-grahaṇam anye varṇayanti, tācchīlikeṣu mitho vā+asarūpa-vidhir na asti iti /
GS24jvkasipu:12485: tena alaṅkṛñaḥ tṛn na bhavati alaṅkartā iti /
GS24jvkasipu:12486: tathā hi paderukañā viśeṣa-vihitena sāmānya-vihitasya yuco 'sarūpatvāt
GS24jvkasipu:12487: samāveśo bhavedeva, kim anena vidhānena ? jñāpana-arthaṃ punar vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:12489: kvacit samāveśa iṣyata eva, gantā kheṭaṃ vikatthanaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:12492: krudhakope, maḍi bhūṣāyām ity etad arthebhyaḥ ca dhatubhyo yuc pratyayo
GS24jvkasipu:12500: yakārāntāt dhatoḥ yuc pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12506: sūda dīpa dīkṣa ity etebhyaś ca yuc pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12511: nanu ca dīper viśeṣa-vihito ra-pratyayaḥ dṛśyate,
GS24jvkasipu:12512: nami-kampi-smy-ajasa-kama-hiṃsa-dīpo raḥ (*3,2.167) iti, sa eva vādhako
GS24jvkasipu:12513: bhaviṣyati, kiṃ pratiṣedhena ? vā 'sarūpeṇa yuj api prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:12514: tācchīlikeṣu ca vā+asarūpa-vidhir na asti iti prāyikam etad ity uktam /
GS24jvkasipu:12515: tathā ca samāveśo dṛśyate, kamrā yuvatiḥ, kamanā yuvatiḥ, iti
GS24jvkasipu:12521: laṣa-ādibhyo dhātubhaḥ tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu ukañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12534: jalpa-ādibhyo dhātubhyaḥ tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu ṣākan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12544: pra-pūrvāj javateḥ tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu iniḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12550: kṣi kṣaye, kṣi nivāsagatyoḥ iti dvayor api grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:12551: prasū iti ṣū preraṇe ity asay grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:12552: jiprabhṛtibhyo dhātubhyaḥ iniḥ pratyayo bhavati tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:12565: spṛha īpsāyām, graha grahane, pata gatau, curādau adantāḥ paṭhyante /
GS24jvkasipu:12567: drā kutsāyāṃ gatau, nipūrvas tatpūrvaś ca, tado nakārāntatā ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:12569: etebhyas tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu āluc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12581: dā dheṭ si śada sada ity etebhyaḥ ruḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12583: dhārurvatso mātaram na la-uka-avyaya-niṣṭhā-khalartha-tṛnām (*2,3.69) iti ukārapraśleṣāt ṣaṣṭhī na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12589: sṛ ghasi ada ity etebhyo dhātubhyaḥ tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu kmarac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12595: bhañja bhāsa mida ity etebhyo ghurac pratyayo bhavati tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu bhaṅguraṃ kāṣṭham
GS24jvkasipu:12602: jñāna-arthasya videḥ grahaṇaṃ na lābhādy-arthasya, svabhāvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:12603: vidādibhyo dhātubhyaḥ tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu kurac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12612: iṇ naś ji sarti ity etebhyo dhātubhyaḥ tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu kvarap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12630: jāgarteḥ ūkaḥ pratyayo bhavati tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:12634: yajādīnāṃ yaṅantānām ūkaḥ pratyayo bhavati tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:12640: namyādibhyaḥ dhātubhyaḥ tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu raḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12647: ajasram iti jasu mokṣaṇe nañpūrvo rapratyayāntaḥ krayāsātatye vartate //
GS24jvkasipu:12650: san iti sanpratyayānto gṛhyate na sanirdhātuḥ, anabhidhānāt vyāptinyāyād vā /
GS24jvkasipu:12651: sannantebhyo dhātubhyaḥ āśaṃser bhikṣeś ca tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu uḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12656: āṅaḥ śasi icchāyām ity asya grahaṇaṃ, na śaṃṣeḥ stuty-arthasya //
GS24jvkasipu:12659: vider num-āgamaḥ, iṣeḥ chatvam ukāraś ca pratyayo nipātyate tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:12665: kya-pratyayāntād dhātoḥ chandasi viṣaye tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu ukāra-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12667: na chandasy aputrasya (*7,4.35) iti pratiṣedhād na dhīrghaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:12672: ā-kārāntebhyaḥ ṛ-varṇāntebhyaḥ gama hana jana ity etebhyaś ca chandasi viṣaye tacchīlādiṣu ki-kinau pratayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:12674: āt iti takāro mukha-sukha-arthaḥ, na tvayaṃ aparaḥ, mā bhūttād api paraḥ taparaḥ iti ṛkāre tatkāla-grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:12681: atha kimarthaṃ kittvam, yāvatā asaṃyogāl liṭ kit (*1,2.5) iti kittvaṃ siddham eva ? ṛcchaty-ṛ-ṛtām (*7,4.11) iti liṭi guṇaḥ pratiṣedha-viṣaya
GS24jvkasipu:12701: svapeḥ tṛṣeś ca tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu nijiṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12708: śṝ hiṃsāyām, vadi abhivādanastutyoḥ, etābhyāṃ dhātubhyāṃ tacchīlādiṣu
GS24jvkasipu:12714: ñibhī bhaye, asmād dhātoḥ tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu kru-klukanau pratyayu bhavāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:12720: ṣṭhā gati-nivṛttau, īśa aiśvarye, bhāsṛ dīptau, pisṛ pesṛ gatau, kasa
GS24jvkasipu:12721: gatau, etebhyas tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu varac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12729: yā prāpane, asmād yaṅantāt tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu varac pratyayo havati /
GS24jvkasipu:12733: bhrājādibhyaḥ dhātubhyas tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu kvip pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12743: kimartham idam ucyate, yāvatā anyebhyo 'pi dṛśyante (*3,2.75), kvip ca (*3,2.76) iti kvip siddha eva ? tācchīlikair bādhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:12749: anyebhyo 'pi dhātubhyaḥ tācchīlikeṣu kvip pratyayo dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:12754: kvacid dīrghaḥ, kvacid dvirvacanam, kvacit samprasāraṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:12755: tathā ca āha -- kvibvacipracchāyatastukaṭaprujuśrīṇāṃ dīrgho 'saṃprasāraṇaṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:12762: jugrahanena atra na arthaḥ, bhrājādi sūtra eva gṛhītatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:12768: dṝ bhye ity asya hrasvaś ca dve ca /
GS24jvkasipu:12774: bhavater dhātoḥ sañjñāyām antare ca gamyamāne kvip pratyayo bhavti /
GS24jvkasipu:12777: dhanikādhamarṇayor antare yas tiṣṭhati sa pratibhūr ucyate //
GS24jvkasipu:12781: vi pra sam ity evaṃ pūrvād bhavater dhātoḥ ḍu-pratayo bhavati, na cet sañjñā gamyate /
GS24jvkasipu:12791: dhayater dadhāteś ca karmaṇi kārake ṣṭran pratyayaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12793: dhayanti tāṃ dadhati vā bhaiṣajyārtham iti dhātrī /
GS24jvkasipu:12797: dāp lavane, ṇīñ prāpaṇe, śasu hiṃsāyām, yu miśraṇe, yujir yoge, ṣṭuñ
GS24jvkasipu:12798: stutau, tuda vyathane, ṣiñ bandhane, ṣicir kṣaraṇe, miha secane, patḷ
GS24jvkasipu:12799: gatau, daṃśa daśane, ṇaha bandhane, etebhyo dhātubhyaḥ karaṇe kārake ṣṭran pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:12813: daṃśer anunāsikalopena nirdeśo jñāpanarthaḥ, kṅito 'nyasminn api pratyaye nalopaḥ kvacid bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:12820: asmād dhātoḥ karaṇe kārake ṣṭran pratyayo bhavati, taccet karaṇaṃ hala,sūkarayor avayavo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12827: ṛ gatrau, lūñ chedane, dhū vidhūnane, ṣū preraṇe, khanu avadārane, ṣaha
GS24jvkasipu:12828: marṣaṇe, cara gatibhakṣaṇayoḥ, etebhyo dhātubhyaḥ karaṇe kārake itraḥ patyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12839: pavater dhatoḥ karaṇe kārake itra-pratyayo bhavati, samudāyena cet sañjñā
GS24jvkasipu:12846: puvaḥ karane kartari ca itra-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12850: devatāyām - agniḥ pavitraṃ sa mā punātu /
GS24jvkasipu:12851: vāyuḥ somaḥ sūrya indraḥ pavitraṃ te mā punantu //
GS24jvkasipu:12856: bhūte niṣṭhā vihitā, vartamane na prāpnoti iti vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:12865: etad arthebhyaś ca dhātubhyo vartamāna-arthe kta-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12873: śīlito rakṣitaḥ kṣānta ākruṣṭo juṣṭa ity api /
GS24jvkasipu:12876: kaṣṭaṃ bhaviṣyati ity āhur amṛtaḥ pūrvavat samṛtaḥ //2//
GS24jvkasipu:12880: tathā suptaḥ, śayitaḥ, āśitaḥ, liptaḥ, tṛptaḥ ity evam ādayo 'pi vartamāne dṛaṣṭavyāḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:12881: itiśrījayādityaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau tṛtīyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:12885: vartamāna ity eva, sañjñāyām iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:12886: uṇādayaḥ pratyayāḥ vartamāne 'rthe sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye bahulaṃ bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:12898: bāhulakaṃ prakṛtes tanudṛṣṭeḥ prāya-samuccayanād api teṣām /
GS24jvkasipu:12899: kāryasaśeṣavidheś ca taduktaṃ naigamarūḍhibhavaṃ hi susādhu //1//
GS24jvkasipu:12900: nāma ca dhātujamāha nirukte vyākaraṇe śakaṭasya ca tokam /
GS24jvkasipu:12901: yan na padārtha-viśeṣa-samutthaṃ pratyayataḥ prakṛteś ca tad ūhyam //2//
GS24jvkasipu:12902: sañjñāsu dhāturūpāṇi pratyayāś ca tataḥ pare /
GS24jvkasipu:12903: kāryād vidyād anubandham etac chāstram uṇādiṣu //3//
GS24jvkasipu:12914: bhaviṣyati kāle gamyādayaḥ śabdāḥ sādhavo bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:12931: yāvat-purā-śabdayor nipātayor upapadayoḥ bhaviṣyati kāle dhātor laṭ
GS24jvkasipu:12935: nipātayoḥ iti kim ? yāvad dāsyati tāvad bhokṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:12939: kadā karhi ity etayoḥ upapadayor vibhāṣā bhaviṣyati kāle dhātoḥ laṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12940: kadā bhuṅkte, kadā bhokṣyate, kadā bhoktā /
GS24jvkasipu:12941: karhi bhuṅkte, karhi bhokṣyate, karhi bhokṭā //
GS24jvkasipu:12948: kiṃvṛtte upapade lipsāyāṃ bhaviṣyati kāle dhātoḥ vibhāṣā laṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12950: kaṃ bhavanto bhojayanti, kaṃ bhavanto bhojayitāraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:12951: labdhukāmaḥ pṛcchati kataro bhikṣāṃ dāsyati, dadāti, dātā vā /
GS24jvkasipu:12952: katamo bhikṣāṃ dāsyati, dadāti, dātā vā /
GS24jvkasipu:12953: lipsāyām iti kim ? kaḥ pāṭaliputraṃ gamiṣyati //
GS24jvkasipu:12958: lipsyamāna-siddhau gamyamānāyāṃ bhaviṣyati kāle dhātoḥ vibhāṣā laṭ
GS24jvkasipu:12961: yo bhaktaṃ dadāti sa svargaṃ gacchati, yo bhaktaṃ dāsyati sa svargaṃ gamiṣyati, yo bhaktaṃ dāta sa svargaṃ gantā /
GS24jvkasipu:12965: loḍ-arthaḥ praiṣādir lakṣyate yena sa loḍ-arthalakṣaṇo dhātv-arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:12966: tatra vartamānād dhātoḥ bhaviṣyati kāle vibhāṣā laṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12967: upādhyāyaś ced āgacchati, upādhyāyaś ced āgamiṣyati, upādhyāyaś ced āgantā, atha tvaṃ chando 'dhīṣva, atha tvaṃ vyākaraṇam adhīṣva /
GS24jvkasipu:12971: bhaviṣyati, vibhāṣā, loḍ-arthalakṣaṇe iti sarvam anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:12972: ūrdhva-mauhūrtike bhaviṣyati kāle loḍ-arthalakṣaṇa-arthe vartamānāt dhātor vibhāṣā liṅ-pratyayo bhavati, cakārāl laṭ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:12976: ūrdhvaṃ muhūrtāt upari muhūrtasya upādhyāyaś ced āgacchet, upādhyāyaś ced āgacchati, upādhyāyaś ced āgamiṣyati, upādhyāyaś ced āgantā, atha tvaṃ chando 'dhīṣva, atha tvaṃ vyākaraṇam adhīṣva tumun-ṇvulau kriyāyāṃ kriya-arthāyām || PS_3,3.10 ||
GS24jvkasipu:12979: kriya-arthāyāṃ kriyāyām upapade dhātor bhavisyati kale tumun-ṇvulau
GS24jvkasipu:12984: kriyāyām iti kim ? bhikṣiṣya ity asya jaṭāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:12985: kriya-arthāyām iti kim ? dhāvataste patiṣyati daṇḍaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:12986: atha kimarthaṃ ṇvul vidhīyate yāvatā ṇvul-tṛcau (*3,1.133) iti sāmānyena vihita eva so 'sminn api viṣaye bhavisyati ? lṛṭā kriyārtha-upapadena
GS24jvkasipu:12988: vā 'sarūpa-vidhinā so 'pi bhavisyati ? evaṃ tarhi etad jñāpyate, kriyāyām upapade kriyārthāyāṃ vā 'sarūpeṇa tṛjādayo na bhavanti iti /
GS24jvkasipu:12989: tena kartā vrajati, vikṣipo vrajati ity evam ādi nivartyate //
GS24jvkasipu:12993: bhāve (*3,3.18) iti prakṛtya ye ghañ-ādayo vihitās te ca bhāva-vacanāḥ
GS24jvkasipu:12994: bhavisyati kāle kriyāyām upapade kriyārthāyāṃ bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:12995: kimartham idaṃ yāvatā vihitā eva te ? kriyartha-upapade vihitena asmin viṣaye tumunā bādhyeran
GS24jvkasipu:12996: vā 'sarūpa-vidhiś ca atra na asti ity uktam /
GS24jvkasipu:12997: atha vacana-grahaṇaṃ kimartham ? vācakā yathā syuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:12998: kathaṃ ca vācakā bhavanti ? yābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyo yena viśeṣaṇena vihitā yadi tābhyas tathā+eva bhavanti, nāsāmañjasyena iti /
GS24jvkasipu:13006: dhātoḥ aṇ pratyayo bhavati bhaviṣyati kāle karmaṇy upapade kriyāyāṃ ca kriyārthāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:13007: karmaṇyaṇ (*3,2.1) iti sāmānyena vihito vā 'sarūpa-vidher abhāvād ṇvulā bādhitaḥ punar aṇ vidhīyate, so 'pavādatvād ṇvulaṃ bādhate, paratvāt kādīn /
GS24jvkasipu:13017: śeṣe śuddhe bhaviṣyati kāle, cakārāt kriyāyāṃ ca upapade kriyārthāyāṃ dhātoḥ lṛṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13024: lṛṭaḥ sthāne satsañjñau śatṛśānacau vā bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:13026: tena yathā laṭaḥ śatṛśānacau tathā asya api bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:13040: bhaviṣyadanadyatane 'rthe vartamānād dhatoḥ luṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13048: iyaṃ nu kadā gantā, yā evaṃ pādau nidadhāti /
GS24jvkasipu:13049: ayaṃ nu kadā 'dhyetā, ya evam anabhiyuktaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:13053: ita uttaraṃ triṣv api kāleṣu pratyayāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:13065: sarteḥ dhātoḥ sthire kartari ghañ pratayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13067: sa ciraṃ tiṣṭhan kālantaraṃ sarati iti dhātv-arthasya kartā yujyate /
GS24jvkasipu:13078: bhāve vācye dhātoḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13083: tena artha-nirdeśaḥ kriyamāṇaḥ sarvadhātu-viṣayaḥ kṛto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13085: yastasya siddhatā nāma dharmaḥ tatra ghañ-ādayaḥ pratyayāḥ vidhīyante /
GS24jvkasipu:13086: puṃliṅga-ekavacanaṃ ca atra na tantraṃ, liṅgāntare vacanāntare 'pi ca atra pratyayā bhavanty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:13090: kartṛ-varjite kārake sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye dhātoḥ ghañ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13102: tat kriyate prasajya-pratiṣedhe 'pi samāso 'sti iti jñāpana-artham, ād-eca
GS24jvkasipu:13104: ita uttaraṃ bhāve, akartari ca kārake iti dvayam anuvartate //
GS24jvkasipu:13107: parimāṇa-ākhyāyāṃ gamyamānāyāṃ sarvebhyo dhātubhyaḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:13113: purastād apavāda-nyāyena hy acam eva bādheta, na apam /
GS24jvkasipu:13116: tena saṅkhyā 'pi gṛhyate, na prasthādy eva /
GS24jvkasipu:13117: ghañ-anukramaṇam ajapor viṣaye, strī-pratyayās tu na bādhyante /
GS24jvkasipu:13129: apādāne striyām upasaṅkhyānaṃ tadantāc ca vā ṅīṣ /
GS24jvkasipu:13138: upasarge upapade rauter dhātor ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13145: sami upapade yu dru du ity etebhyaḥ dhātubhyaḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13152: śri ṇī bhū ity etebhyo dhātubhyo 'nupasargebhyo ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13160: kathaṃ prabhāvo rājñāḥ ? prakṛṣṭo bhāvaḥ iti prādisamāso bhaviṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:13161: kathaṃ ca nayo rājñaḥ ? kṛtya-lyuṭo bahulam (*3,3.113) iti ac bhaviṣyati
GS24jvkasipu:13164: vāv-upapade kṣu śru ity etābhyāṃ dhātubhyāṃ ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13172: ava ut ity etayor upapadayoḥ nayater dhātoḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13175: katham unnayaḥ padārthānām ? kṛtya-lyuṭo bahulam (*3,3.113) iti ac bhaviṣyati //
GS24jvkasipu:13178: pra-śabde upapade dru stu sru ity etebhyo dhātubhyo ghañ pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:13190: nirabhipūrvayoḥ pū-lvor dhātvoḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13197: gṝ śabde, gṝ nigaraṇe, dvayor api grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:13198: unnyor upapadayoḥ gṝ ity etasmād dhātoḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13205: kṝ ity etasmād dhātor unnyoḥ upapadayoḥ ghañ pratayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:13207: vikṣepa-arthasya kirater grahaṇaṃ, na hiṃsa-arthasya, anabhidhānāt utkāro dhānyasya /
GS24jvkasipu:13213: yajña-viṣaye prayoge sampūrvāt stauter ghañ partyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13215: sametya stuvanti yasmin deśe chandogāḥ sa deśaḥ saṃstāvaḥ ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:13219: stṛñ ācchādane, asmād dhātoḥ pra-śabde upapade ghañ pratyayo bhavati na ced yajña-viṣayaḥ prayogo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13224: stṝñ ācchādane, asmād dhātoḥ vi-śabde upapade ghañ patyayo bhavati prathane gamyamāne, tac cet prathanaṃ śabda-viṣayaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13232: vipūrvāt stṛnāteḥ chandonāmni ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13233: vṛttam atra chando gṛhyate yasya gāyatryādayo viśeṣāḥ, na mantrabrahmaṇam , nāma-grahaṇāt
GS24jvkasipu:13241: udi upapade graher dhātoḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13246: udgrābhaṃ ca nigrābhaṃ ca brahma devā avīvṛdhan //
GS24jvkasipu:13250: sami upapade graher dhātoḥ ghañ bhavati, muṣṭiviṣayaś ced dhātvartho
GS24jvkasipu:13259: pari-śabde ni-śabde ca upapade yathāsaṅkhyaṃ niyaḥ iṇaś ca dhātoḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:13261: dyūtābhreṣayoḥ, atra api yathāsaṅkhyam eva sambandhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:13262: dyūta-viṣayaḥ cen nayater arthaḥ, abhreṣa-viṣayaś ced iṇ-arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:13271: pari-śabde upapade iṇo dhātoḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati, anupatyaye gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:13279: vi upa ity etayoḥ upapadayoḥ śeter dhātoḥ ghañ bhavati paryāye gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:13283: tava rājānam upaśayituṃ paryāyaḥ ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:13288: hastādāne gamyamāne cinoter dhātoḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati, na cet steyaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:13293: hastādane iti kim ? vṛkṣaśikhare phalapracayaṃ karoti /
GS24jvkasipu:13303: eteṣv artheṣu cinoteḥ ghañ pratyayaḥ bhavati, dhātor ādeś ca kakāra ādeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:13309: iha kasmān na bhavati mahān kāṣṭhanicayaḥ ? bahutvam atra vivakṣitaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:13318: saṅghe vācye cinoter dhātoḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati ādeś ca kaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:13330: karma-vyatihāre gamyamāne dhātoḥ ṇac patyayo bhavati strīliṅge vācye /
GS24jvkasipu:13332: cakāro viśeṣaṇa-arthaḥ ṇacaḥ striyām añ (*5,4.14) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:13341: tad etad vaicitryaṃ kathaṃ labhyate ? kṛtya-lyuṭo bahulam (*3,3.113) iti bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:13345: abhividhau gamyamāne dhātoḥ bhave inuṇ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13352: bhāve iti vartamane punar bhāva-grahaṇaṃ vāsarūpanirāsa-artham, tena ghañ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13358: dṛṣṭa-anuvṛtti-sāmarthyād ghañ anuvartate, na anantara inuṇ /
GS24jvkasipu:13359: ava ni ity etayoḥ uapadayoḥ graher dhātoḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati ākrośe gamyamane /
GS24jvkasipu:13368: pra-śabde upapade graher dhāto ghañ pratyayo bhavati lipsāyāṃ gamyamānāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:13374: pari-śabde upapade graheḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati, yajñaviṣayaś cet pratyayānta-abhidheyaḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:13381: ni-śabde upapade vṛ ity etasmād dhātoḥ dhānya-viśeṣe 'bhidheye ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13387: uc-chabde upapade śrayaty-ādibhyo ghañ pratayayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13393: kathaṃ patanāntāḥ samucchrayāḥ ? vakṣyamāṇaṃ vibhāṣā-grahaṇam iha siṃhāvalokitanyāyena sambadhyate
GS24jvkasipu:13396: āṅi upapade rauteḥ plavateś ca vibhāṣā ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13402: ave upapade graheḥ dhātoḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati vibhāṣā varṣapratibandhe
GS24jvkasipu:13404: praptakālasya varṣasya kutaścin nimittād abhāvo varṣapratibandhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:13411: pra-śabde upapade graher dhātoḥ vibhāṣā ghañ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:13413: vaṇik-sambandhena ca tulāsūtraṃ lakṣyate, na tu vaṇijas tantram /
GS24jvkasipu:13414: tulā pragṛhyate yena sūtreṇa sa śabda-arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:13415: tulāpragrāheṇa carati, tulāpragraheṇa carati vaṇiganyo vā /
GS24jvkasipu:13420: pra-śabde upapade graher dhātoḥ vibhāṣā ghañ pratyayo bhavati, raśmiś cet pratyayāntena abhidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:13421: rathādiyuktānām aśvādīnāṃ saṃyamana-arthā rajjū raśmir iha gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:13426: praśabde upapade vṛṇoteḥ dhātoḥ vibhāṣā ghañ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:13433: pariśabde upapade bhavateḥ dhātoḥ vibhāṣā ghañ pratyayo bhavati avajñāne gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:13436: avajñāne iti kim ? sarvataḥ bhavanaṃ paribhavaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:13439: bhāve, akartari ca kārake iti prakṛtam anuvartate yāvat kṛtya-lyuṭo
GS24jvkasipu:13441: i-varṇāntād dhātoḥ bhāve, akartari ca kārake sañjñāyām ac pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:13458: ṝ-kārāntebhyaḥ u-varṇāntebhyaḥ ca ap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13492: upasarge upapade ader dhātoḥ ap prayayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13498: ni-śabde upapade adeḥ dhātoḥ ṇa-pratyayo bhavati, cakārād ap ca /
GS24jvkasipu:13502: vyadha japa ity etayoḥ anupasargayoḥ ap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13511: svana-hasoḥ anupasargayor vā ap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13519: sam upa ni vi ity eteṣu upapadeṣu anupasarge 'pi yamer vā ap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13529: ni-śabde upapade gada nada paṭha svana ity etebhyaḥ dhatubhyaḥ vā ap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13538: kvaṇateḥ dhātoḥ nipūrvād anupasargāc ca vīṇāyāṃ vā ap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13547: paṇa vyavahāre stutau ca, asmād dhātor nityam ap pratyayo bhavati parimāṇe gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:13551: saṃvyavahārāya mūlakādīnāṃ yaḥ parimito muṣṭir badhyate, tasya+idam
GS24jvkasipu:13556: madeḥ dhātoḥ anupasargāt ap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13565: pramada sammada ity etau śabdau nipātyete harṣe 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:13574: samudor upapadayoḥ ajaer dhātoḥ paśu-viṣaye dhātv-arthe ap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13577: sa sampūrvaḥ samudāye vartate, utpūrvaś ca preraṇe /
GS24jvkasipu:13586: glahaḥ iti nipātyate, akṣa-viṣayaś ced dhātv-artho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13587: graher ap siddha eva, latva-arthaṃ nipātanam /
GS24jvkasipu:13595: sarteḥ dhātoḥ prajane viṣaye ap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13600: strīgavīṣu puṃgavānām garbhādhānāya prathamam upasaraṇam ucyate //
GS24jvkasipu:13603: ni abhi upa vi ity eteṣu upapadeṣu hvayateḥ dhātoḥ samprasāraṇam ap pratyayaḥ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:13612: āṅi upapade hvayater dhātoḥ samprasāraṇam ap pratyayaś ca bhavati yuddhe
GS24jvkasipu:13618: āṅ pūrvasya hvayater dhātoḥ samprasāraṇam, ap-pratyayo, vṛddhiś ca nipātyate nipānaṃ ced abhidheyaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13619: nipibanty asminn iti nipānam udakādhāra ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:13621: kūpopasareṣu ya udakādhāras tatra hi pānāya paśava āhūyante /
GS24jvkasipu:13625: anupargasya hvayateḥ samprasāraṇam ap pratyayaś ca bhavati bhāve abhidheye
GS24jvkasipu:13629: bhāva-grahaṇam akartari ca kārake sañjñāyām (*3,3.19) ity asya nirāsa-artham //
GS24jvkasipu:13633: hanter dhātoḥ anupasarge bhāve ap pratyayo bhavati, tatsaṃniyogena ca bhadhādeśaḥ, sa cāntodāttaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:13641: ap ca, yaś ca aparaḥ prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:13648: mūrtau abhidheyāyāṃ hanteḥ ap pratyayo bhavati, ghanaś cādeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:13651: kathaṃ ghanaṃ dadhi iti ? dharma-śabdena dharmī bhaṇyate //
GS24jvkasipu:13654: antaḥ pūrvāt hanteḥ ap pratyayo bhavati, ghanādeśaś ca bhavati deśe
GS24jvkasipu:13658: anye ṇakāraṃ paṭhanti antarghaṇo deśaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:13663: pra-pūrvasya hanteḥ praghaṇaḥ praghāṇaḥ ity etau śabdau nipātyete agāraikadeśe vācye /
GS24jvkasipu:13669: ut-pūrvāt hanteḥ udghanaḥ iti nipātyate 'tyādhānaṃ ced bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13671: yasmin kāṣṭhe sthāpayitvā anyāni kāṣṭhāni takṣyante tad abhidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:13675: apa-pūrvasya hanteḥ apaghanaḥ iti nipātyate, aṅgaṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13678: kiṃ tarhi ? pāṇiḥ pādaś ca abhidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:13683: ayas vi dru ity eteṣu upapadeṣu hanteḥ dhātoḥ karaṇe kārake ap pratyayo
GS24jvkasipu:13694: stamba-śabde upapade karaṇe kārake hanteḥ kaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13702: pari-śabde upapade anter dhātoḥ ap pratyayo bahvati karaṇe kārake,
GS24jvkasipu:13708: upa-pūrvāt hanteḥ ap pratyayaḥ upadhā-lopaś ca nipātyate āśraye 'bhidheye
GS24jvkasipu:13712: āśraye iti kim ? parvatopaghāta eva anyaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:13715: samudoḥ upapadayoḥ hanteḥ dhātoḥ ap pratyayo bhavati, ṭi-lopaḥ ghatvaṃ ca nipātyate, yathāsaṅkhyaṃ gaṇe 'bhidheye, praśaṃsāyāṃ gamyamānāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:13721: nighaḥ iti ni-pūrvād hanteḥ ap pratyayaḥ, ṭi-lopo ghatvam ca nipātyate,
GS24jvkasipu:13730: ḍu it yasya tasmād ḍvito dhātoḥ ktriḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13731: trermam nityam (*4,4.20) iti vacanāt kevalo na prayujyate /
GS24jvkasipu:13737: ṭu it yasya, tasmāt ṭvito dhātoḥ athuc pratyayo bhavati bhāvādau /
GS24jvkasipu:13743: bhāve akartari ca kārake iti vartate /
