GS24jvkasipu:13752: praccheḥ asamprasāraṇaṃ jñāpakāt praśne ca āsanna-kāle (*3,2.117) iti //
GS24jvkasipu:13760: bhāve akartari ca kārake iti vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:13761: upasarge upapade ghu-sañjñakebhyaḥ dhātubhyaḥ kiḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13769: karmaṇy upapade ghu-sañjñakebhyo dhātubhyaḥ kiḥ pratyayo bhavati adhikaraṇe kārake /
GS24jvkasipu:13776: bhāve akartari ca kārake ti vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:13777: strīliṅge bhāvādau dhātoḥ ktin pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13799: ṝkāralvādibhyaḥ ktin niṣṭhāvad bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:13816: sthādibhyo dhātubhyaḥ strīliṅge bhāve ktin pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13822: iti jñāpakāt nātyantāya bādhā bhavati iti //
GS24jvkasipu:13826: mantre viṣaye vṛṣādibhyaḥ dhātubhyaḥ ktin pratyayo bhavati udāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:13837: sarvatra sarvadhātubhyaḥ sāmānyena vihita eva ktin /
GS24jvkasipu:13839: iṣestu icchā (*3,3.101) iti nipātanaṃ vakṣyati, tataḥ ktinn api vidhīyate
GS24jvkasipu:13846: avateḥ jvara-tvara-srivy-avi-mavām upadhāyāś ca (*6,4.20) iti ūṭḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:13852: syateḥ itvābhāvo nipātyate, sanoter vā jana-sana-khanāṃ sañjñāloḥ
GS24jvkasipu:13859: vraja-yajoḥ dhātvoḥ strī-liṅge bhāve kyap pratyayo bhavati udāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:13868: samajādibhyo dhātubhyaḥ striyāṃ kyap pratyayo bhavati udāttaḥ sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:13878: kathaṃ taduktam striyāṃ bhāvādhikāro 'sti tena bhāryā prasidhyati iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:13879: bhāvādhikāro bhāvavyāpāraḥ vācyatvena vivakṣitaḥ, na tu śāstrīyo 'dhikāraḥ
GS24jvkasipu:13882: karoter dhātoḥ striyāṃ śaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13884: yogavibhāgo 'tra kartavyaḥ, ktinn api yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:13888: iṣeḥ dhātoḥ śaḥ pratyayo yagabhāvaś ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:13899: pratyayāntebhyo dhātubhyaḥ stiryām akāraḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13909: halanto yo dhātuḥ gurumān, tataḥ striyām akāraḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13919: ṣidbhyaḥ bhidādibhyaś ca striyām aṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13955: citi smṛtyām, pūja pūjāyām, katha vākyaprabandhe, kubi ācchādane, carca adhyayane curādiḥ, ebhyo dhātubhyaḥ yuci prāpte striyām aṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13965: ākārāntebhyaḥ upasarge upapade striyam aṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13975: ṇyantebhyo dhātubhyaḥ, āsa śrantha ity etābhyām ca striyām yuc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13983: śranthiḥ kryādirgṛhyate śrantha vimocanapratiharṣayoḥ iti , na curādiḥ śrantha grantha sandarbhe iti /
GS24jvkasipu:13989: ghaṭṭeḥ bhauvādikasya grahaṇaṃ ghaṭṭa calane iti, na cuarādikasya, tasya ṇeḥ ity eva siddhatvāt
GS24jvkasipu:13997: rogākhyāyāṃ gamyamānāyāṃ dhātoḥ ṇvul pratyayo bahulaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13999: ākhyā-grahaṇaṃ rogasya cet pratyayāntena sañjñā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14032: sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye dhātoḥ ṇvul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14043: paripraśne ākhyāne ca gamyamāne dhatoḥ iñ pratyayo bhavati, cakārāt ṇvul api /
GS24jvkasipu:14044: vibhāṣa-grahaṇāt paro 'pi yaḥ prāpnoti, so 'pi bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14045: kāṃ tvaṃ kārimakārṣīḥ, kāṃ kārikām akārṣīḥ, kāṃ kriyāmakārṣīḥ, kāṃ
GS24jvkasipu:14046: kṛtyāmakārṣīḥ, kā kṛtimakārṣīḥ ? sarvāṃ kārimakārṣam, sarvāṃ kārikām akārṣam, sarvāṃ kriyāmakārṣam, sarvāṃ kṛtyāmakārṣam, sarvāṃ kṛtimakārṣam /
GS24jvkasipu:14047: kāṃ gaṇimajīgaṇaḥ, kāṃ gaṇikāmajīgaṇaḥ, kāṃ gaṇanāmajīgaṇaḥ ? sarvāṃ
GS24jvkasipu:14049: evaṃ kāṃ yājim, kāṃ yājikām, kāṃ yācim, kāṃ yacikām, kāṃ pācim, kāṃ pācikām kāṃ pacām, kāṃ paktim, kāṃ pāṭhim, kāṃ pāṭhikām, kāṃ paṭhitim iti
GS24jvkasipu:14059: eteṣv artheṣu dhātoḥ ṇvuc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14076: ākrośe gamyamāne nañi upapade dhātoḥ aniḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14080: nañi iti kim ? mṛtiste vṛṣala bhūyāt //
GS24jvkasipu:14083: bhāve, akartari ca kārake iti nivṛtam /
GS24jvkasipu:14084: kṛtya-sañjñakāḥ pratyayāḥ lyuṭ ca bhaulam artheṣu bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:14097: bahula-grahaṇād anye 'pi kṛtaḥ yathāprāptam abhidheyaṃ vyabhicaranti /
GS24jvkasipu:14102: napuṃsaka-liṅge bhāve dhatoḥ ktaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14108: napuṃsaka-liṅge bhāve dhātoḥ lyuṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14115: karmaṇi ca yena saṃsparśāt kartuḥ śarīra-sukham || PS_3,3.116 ||
GS24jvkasipu:14117: yena karmaṇā saṃspṛśyamānasya kartuḥ śarīra-sukham utpadyate, tasmin karmaṇi upapade dhatoḥ napuṃsaka-liṅge bhāve lyuṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14122: karmaṇi iti kim ? tūlikāyā utthānaṃ sukham /
GS24jvkasipu:14123: saṃsparśāt iti kim ? agnikuṇḍasya upāsanaṃ sukham /
GS24jvkasipu:14124: kartuḥ iti kim ? guroḥ snāpanaṃ sukham /
GS24jvkasipu:14125: snāpayateḥ na guruḥ kartā, kiṃ tarhi, karma /
GS24jvkasipu:14128: sukham iti kim ? kaṇṭkānāṃ mardanaṃ duḥkham /
GS24jvkasipu:14132: karaṇe 'dhikaraṇe ca kārake dhātoḥ lyuṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14140: puṃliṅgayoḥ karaṇa-adhikaranayor abhidheyayoḥ dhātoḥ ghaḥ pratyayo bhavati samudāyena cet sañjñā gamyate /
GS24jvkasipu:14144: adhikaraṇe khalv api - etya tasmin kurvanti iti ākaraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14151: gocarādayaḥ śabdāḥ gha-prayayāntā nipātyante pūrvasminn eva arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:14153: iti ghañaṃ vakṣyati, tasya ayam apavādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14159: nipātanāt ajer vyaghañapoḥ (*2,4.56) iti vībhāvo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14167: ave upapade tarateḥ stṛṇāteś ca dhātoḥ karana-adhikaraṇayoḥ sañjñāyām ghañ pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:14173: katham avatāro nadyāḥ, na hīyaṃ sajñā ? prāya-anuvṛtteḥ asañjñāyām api bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:14176: puṃsi saññāyām, karaṇa-adhikaraṇayoś ca iti sarvam anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:14177: halantād dhātoḥ karaṇa-adhikaraṇayoḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14189: puṃsi sañjñāyāṃ ghe prāpte ghañ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:14201: udaṅka iti nipātyate anudaka-viṣayaś ced dhātv-artho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14204: iti siddha eva ghañ ? udake pratiṣedha-artham idaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:14211: ānāyaḥ iti nipātyate jālaṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14217: khanateḥ dhātoḥ karaṇa-adhikaraṇayoḥ ghaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14231: īṣat dus su ity eteṣu upapadeṣu kṛcchrākṛcchra-artheṣu dhatoḥ khal pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14240: īṣadādiṣu iti kim ? kṛcchreṇa kāryaḥ kaṭaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14246: bhavateḥ karoteś ca dhātoḥ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ kartari karmaṇi ca+upapade,
GS24jvkasipu:14247: cakārād īṣadādiṣu ca khal pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14258: kṛcchrākṛcchra-artheṣu īṣadādiṣu upapadeṣu ākārāntebhyo dhatubhyaḥ yuc pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:14268: īṣadādisu kṛcchrākṛcchra-artheṣu upapadeṣu gaty-arthebhyo dhātubhyaḥ chandasi viṣaye yuc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14274: anyebhyo 'pi dhātubhyaḥ gaty-arthebhyaḥ chandasi viṣaye yuc pratyayo dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:14287: vartamāna-samīpe bhūte bhaviṣyati ca vartamānād dhātoḥ vartamānavat
GS24jvkasipu:14289: vartamane laṭ (*3,2.123) ity ārabhya yāvad uṇādayo bahulam (*3,3.1) iti vartāmāne pratyayā uktāḥ, te bhūta-bhaviṣyator vidhīyante /
GS24jvkasipu:14299: yena viśeṣaṇena vartamāne pratyayāḥ vihitāḥ prakṛtyopapadopādhinā
GS24jvkasipu:14304: sāmīpya-grahaṇaṃ kim ? viprakarṣa-vivakṣāyāṃ mā bhūt, parudagacchat pāṭaliputram /
GS24jvkasipu:14306: yo manyate gacchāmi iti padaṃ vartamāne kāle eva vartate, kālāntaragatis tu vākyād bhavati, na ca vākyagamyaḥ kālaḥ padasaṃskāravelāyām upayujyate
GS24jvkasipu:14307: iti tādṛśaṃ vākyārtha-pratipattāraṃ prati prakaraṇam idaṃ nārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:14308: tathā ca śvaḥ kariṣyati, varṣeṇa gamiṣyati iti sarvam upapadyate //
GS24jvkasipu:14313: āśaṃsanam āśaṃsā, aprāptasya priyārthasya prāptum icchā /
GS24jvkasipu:14315: tatra bhaviṣyati kāle āśaṃsāyāṃ gamyamānāyāṃ dhātoḥ vā bhūtavat pratyayā
GS24jvkasipu:14317: upādhyāyaś ced āgamat, āgataḥ, āgacchati, āgamiṣyati, ete vyākaraṇam adhyagīṣmahi, ete vyākaraṇam adhītavantaḥ, adhīmahe, adhyeṣyāmahe /
GS24jvkasipu:14323: kṣipravacane upapade āśaṃsāyāṃ gamyamānāyāṃ dhātoḥ lṛṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14324: bhūtavac ca ity asya ayam apavādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14325: upādhyāyaś cet kṣipram āgamiṣyati, kṣipraṃ vyākaraṇam adhyeṣyāmahe /
GS24jvkasipu:14328: na iti vaktavye lṛḍ-grahaṇaṃ luṭo 'pi viṣaye yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:14333: tasminn upapade dhātor liṅ pratyayo bhavati bhūtavac ca ity asya ayam apavādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14339: bhūtānadyatane bhaviṣyadanadyatane ca laṅ-luṭau vihitau, tayor ayaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14340: anadyatanavat pratyaya-vidhir na bhavati kriyāprabandhe sāmīpye ca gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:14347: sāmīpye khalv api - yeyaṃ paurṇamāsyatikrāntā, etasyāmupādhyāyo
GS24jvkasipu:14358: yo 'yamadhvā gantavya āpāṭaliputrāt, tasya yadavaraṃ kauśāmbyāḥ, tatra dvirodanaṃ bhokṣyāmahe, tatra saktūn pāsyāmaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14359: bhaviṣyati iti kim ? yo 'yamadhvā gataḥ āpāṭaliputrāt, tasya yadavaraṃ kauśāmbyāḥ, tatra yuktā adhyaimahi, tatra dvirodanam abhuñjmahi, tatra saktūnapibāma /
GS24jvkasipu:14360: maryādāvacane iti kim ? yo 'yamadhvā niravadhiko gantavyaḥ, tasya yadavaraṃ kauśāmbyāḥ, tatra dvirodanaṃ bhoktāsmahe, saktūn pātā smaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14361: avarasmin iti kim ? yo 'yamadhvā gantavyaḥ āpāṭaliputrāt, tasya yatparam kauśāmbyāḥ, tatra dvirodanaṃ bhoktāsmahe, tatra saktūn pātāsmaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14362: iha sūtre deśakṛtā maryādā, uttaratra kālakṛtā /
GS24jvkasipu:14368: pratyayavidhirna bhavati, na ced aho-rātra-sambhandhī vibhāgaḥ, taisteṣāṃ ca vibhāge pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:14371: yo 'yaṃ saṃvatsara āgāmī, tatra yadavaramāgrahāyaṇyāḥ, tatra yuktā adhyeṣyāmahe, tatraudanaṃ bhokṣyāmahe /
GS24jvkasipu:14373: yo 'yaṃ vatsaro 'tītaḥ, tasya yadavaramāgrahāyaṇyāḥ, tatra yuktā adhyaimahi, tatraudanamabhuñjamahi
GS24jvkasipu:14375: yo 'yaṃ niravadhikaḥ kāla āgāmī, tasya yadavaramāgrahāyaṇyāḥ, tatra yuktā adhyetāsmahe, tatraudanaṃ bhoktāsmahe /
GS24jvkasipu:14378: aho-rātrāṇām iti kim ? trividham udāharaṇam - yo 'yaṃ māsa āgāmī, tasya yo 'varaḥ pañcadaśarātraḥ, yo 'yaṃ triṃśadrātra āgāmī, tasya yo 'varo
GS24jvkasipu:14380: pañcadaśa-rātraḥ, tatra yuktā adhyetāsamahe, tatra saktūn pātāsmaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14384: bhaviṣyati maryādā-vacane kālavibhāge ca anahorātrāṇām iti sarvam anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:14385: kālamaryādāvibhāge sati bhavisyati kāle parasmin pravibhāge vibhāṣā anadyatanavat pratyayavidhir na bhavati, na ced aho-rātra-sambandhī
GS24jvkasipu:14388: avarasmin pūrveṇa pratiṣedha uktaḥ, samprati parasminn aprāpta eva vikalpa ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:14389: yo 'yaṃ saṃvatsara āgāmī, tasya yat paramāgrahāyaṇyāḥ tatra yuktā adhyeṣyāmahe, adhyetāsmahe, tatra saktūn pāsyāmaḥ, tatra saktūn pātāsmaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14391: yo 'yaṃ triṃśadrātra āgāmī, tasya yaḥ paraḥ pañcadaśa-rātraḥ, tatra yuktā adhyetāsmahe, tatra saktūn pātāsmaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14393: yo 'yaṃ saṃvatsaro 'tītaḥ, tasya yat paramāgrahāyaṇyāḥ, tatra yuktā adhyaimahi, tatraudanamabhuñjmahi
GS24jvkasipu:14395: yo 'yaṃ saṃvatsaro niravadhikaḥ kāla agāmī, tasya yat pramāgrahāyaṇyāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:14396: tatra yuktā adhyetāsmahe, tatra saktūn pātāsmaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14398: yo 'yamadhvā gantavya āpāṭaliputrāt, tasya yat paraṃ kauśāmbyāḥ, tatra yuktā adhyetāsmahe, odanaṃ bhoktāsmahe /
GS24jvkasipu:14403: hetu-hetumator liṅ (*3,3.156) ity evam ādikaṃ liṅo nimittam /
GS24jvkasipu:14404: tatra liṅ-nimitte bhaviṣyati kāle lṛṅ pratyayo bhavati kriyātipattau
GS24jvkasipu:14407: dakṣiṇena ced āyāsyan na śakaṭaṃ paryabhavisyat /
GS24jvkasipu:14411: bhavisyad aparyābhavanaṃ ca hetumat, tatra hetubhūtaṃ ca kamalakāhvānam /
GS24jvkasipu:14412: liṅgiliṅge buddhavā tadatipattiṃ ca pramāṇāntarād avagamya vaktā vākyaṃ prayuṅkte, yadi kamalakamāhvāsyanna śakṭaṃ paryābhaviṣyat iti /
GS24jvkasipu:14413: hetuhetumator āhvānāparyābhavanayoḥ bhaviṣyat kāla-viṣayayoḥ atipattiḥ ito vākyād avagamyate
GS24jvkasipu:14416: liṅ-nimitte lṛṅ kriya-atipattau iti sarvam anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:14417: pūrvena bhaviṣyati vihitaḥ samprati bhūte vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:14418: bhūte ca kāle liṅ-nimitte kriya-atipattau satyāṃ lṛṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14419: uta-apyoḥ samarthayor liṅ (*3,3.152) ity ārabhya liṅ-nimitteṣu vidhānam etat /
GS24jvkasipu:14421: dṛṣṭo mayā bhavatputro 'nnārthī caṅkramyamāṇaḥ, aparaś ca dvijo
GS24jvkasipu:14422: brāhmaṇārthī, yadi sa tena dṛṣṭo 'bhaviṣyat, tadā abhikṣyata /
GS24jvkasipu:14423: na tu bhuktavān, anyena pathā sa gataḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:14426: bhūte liṅ-nimitte lṛṅ kriya-atipattau iti sarvam anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:14430: prāgetasmāt sūtrāvadheḥ yadita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ, tatra bhūte liṅ-nimitte kriya-atipattau lṛṅ vā bhavati ity etad adhikṛtaṃ veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:14431: vakṣyati, vibhāṣā kathami liṅ ca (*3,3.143) - kathaṃ nāma tatra bhavān vṛṣalam ayājayiṣyat
GS24jvkasipu:14436: garhāyāṃ gamyamānāyām api-jātvoḥ upapadayoḥ dhātoḥ laṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14437: vartamane laṭ uktaḥ kāla-sāmānye na prāpnoti iti vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:14438: kālaviśeṣa-vihitāṃś ca api pratyayān ayaṃ paratvād asmin viṣaye vādhate /
GS24jvkasipu:14439: api tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayati, jātu tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayati,
GS24jvkasipu:14441: liṅ-nimittābhāvād iha kriya-atipattau lṛṅ na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:14445: kathami upapade garhāyāṃ gamyamānāyaṃ dhātoḥ liṅ pratyayo bhavati, cakārāl laṭ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:14447: kathaṃ nāma tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayet, kathaṃ nāma tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayati /
GS24jvkasipu:14452: kathaṃ nāma tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yāyajāṃ cakāra /
GS24jvkasipu:14453: atra liṅ-nimittam asti iti bhūta-vivakṣāyāṃ kriya-atipattau vā lṛṅ /
GS24jvkasipu:14454: bhaviṣyad vivakṣāyāṃ sarvatra nityena+eva lṛṅā bhavitavyam //
GS24jvkasipu:14457: garhāyām ity eva vibhāṣā na svaryate /
GS24jvkasipu:14458: kiṃvṛtte upapade garhāyāṃ gamyamānāyāṃ dhātoḥ liṅ-lṛṭau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14461: ko nāma vṛṣalo yaṃ tatrabhavān yājayet, yaṃ tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:14463: kataro nāma, katamo nāma yāṃ tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayet, yājayiṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:14466: ko nāma vṛṣalo yaṃ tatrabhavān ayājayiṣyat //
GS24jvkasipu:14477: anavaklṛptau tāvat - na avakalpayāmi, na sambhāvayāmi, na śraddadhe tatrabhavān nāma vṛṣalaṃ yājayet, tatrabhavān nāma vṛṣalaṃ yājayiṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:14478: ko nāma vṛṣalo yaṃ tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayet, ko nāma tatrabhavān
GS24jvkasipu:14480: amarṣe - na marṣayāmi tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayet, yājayiṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:14481: ko nāma vṛṣalo yaṃ tatrabhavān yājayet, yājayiṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:14482: bhūta-vivakṣāyāṃ tu kriya-atipattau vā lṛṅ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14484: na avakalpayāmi tatrabhavān nāma vṛṣalam ayājayiṣyat //
GS24jvkasipu:14490: kiṃkila-asty-artheṣu upapadeṣu anavaklṛpty-amarṣayoḥ dhātoḥ lṛṭ pratyayo
GS24jvkasipu:14493: kiṃ - kila nāma tatrabhavan vṛṣalaṃ yājayiṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:14498: liṅ-nimittam iha na asti tena lṛṅ na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:14502: jātu yadā ity etayoḥ upapadayoḥ anavaklṛpty-amarṣayoḥ gamyamānayoḥ dhātoḥ liṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14504: jātu tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayet, yan nāma tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayet, na
GS24jvkasipu:14507: yadā bhavad-vidhaḥ kṣatriyaṃ yājayet, yadi bhavad-vidhaḥ kṣatriyaṃ yājyet,
GS24jvkasipu:14514: yac ca yatra ity etayoḥ upapadayor anavaklṛpty-amarṣayoḥ gamyamānayoḥ dhātoḥ liṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14525: yac ca yatra ity etayoḥ upapadayor dhatoḥ liṅ pratyayo bhavati garhāyāṃ gamyamānāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:14527: yac ca tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayet, yatra tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayed ṛddho vṛddhaḥ san brāhmaṇaḥ, garhāmahe, aho anyāyyam etat /
GS24jvkasipu:14533: yaccayatrayoḥ upapadayoḥ citrīkaraṇe gamyamāne dhātoḥ liṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14535: yac ca tatrahbavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayet, yatra tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayet,
GS24jvkasipu:14541: śeṣe uapapade citrīkaraṇe gamyamāne dhātoḥ lṛṭ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:14544: āścaryam, citram adbhutam, andho nāma parvatamārokṣyati, badhiro nāma vyākaranamadhyeṣyate
GS24jvkasipu:14545: ayadau iti kim ? āścaryaṃ yadi sa bhuñjīta, yadi so 'dhīyīta /
GS24jvkasipu:14546: liṅ - nimitābhāvāt iha lṛṅ na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:14549: uta api ity etayoḥ samarthayoḥ dhātoḥ liṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14551: bāḍham ity asminn arthe samānārthatvam anayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14557: samarthayoḥ iti kim? uta daṇḍaḥ patiṣyati ? api dvāraṃ dhāsyati /
GS24jvkasipu:14560: itaḥ prabhṛṭi bhūte 'pi liṅ-nimitte kriya-atipattau nityaṃ lṛṅ /
GS24jvkasipu:14567: tasmin gamyamāne akacciti upapade dhātor liṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14571: akacciti iti kim ? kaccij jīvati te mātā kaccij jīvati te pitā /
GS24jvkasipu:14572: mārāvida tvāṃ pṛcchāmi kaccij jīvati pārvatī //
GS24jvkasipu:14581: kva ca asau siddhaḥ ? yatra gamyate ca-artho na ca asau prayujyate /
GS24jvkasipu:14582: tadīdṛśe sambhāvanopādhike 'rthe vartamānād dhātoḥ liṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14586: alam iti kim ? videśasthāyī devadattaḥ prāyena gamiṣyati grāmam /
GS24jvkasipu:14587: siddhāprayoge iti kim ? alaṃ devadatto hastinaṃ haniṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:14588: kriyātipattau bhūte bhaviṣyati ca nityaṃ lṛṅ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:14591: sambhāvane 'lam iti cet siddha-aprayoge iti sarvam anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:14593: sambhāvana-vacane dhātāv upapade yac chabda-varjite dhātor vibhāṣā liṅ
GS24jvkasipu:14596: sambhāvayāmi bhuñjīta bhavān, sambhāvayāmi bhokṣyate bhavān /
GS24jvkasipu:14599: ayadi iti kim ? sambhāvayāmi yad bhuñjīta bhavān //
GS24jvkasipu:14604: hetubhūte hetumati cārthe vartamānād dhātoḥ liṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14608: dakṣiṇena ced yāsyati na śakaṭaṃ paryābhaviṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:14609: tatra vibhāṣāgrahaṇaṃ tāvad anantaram eva anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:14610: liṅ iti vartamāne punar liṅ-grahaṇaṃ kālav-iśeṣa-pratipatty-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:14611: tena+iha na bhavati, hanti iti palāyate, varṣati iti dhāvati /
GS24jvkasipu:14615: icchārtheṣu dhatuṣu upapadeṣu dhatoḥ liṅ-loṭau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14625: icchārtheṣu dhātuṣu samāna-kartṛkeṣu upapadeṣu dhātoḥ tumun pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14631: samāna-kartṛkeṣu iti kim ? devadattam bhuñjānam icchati yajñadattaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14632: iha kasmān na bhavati, icchan karoti ? anabhidhānāt //
GS24jvkasipu:14635: icchārtheṣu samānakartṛkeṣu dhātuṣu upapadeṣu dhātoḥ liṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14642: ichārthebhyo dhatubhyo vartamāne kāle vibhāṣā liṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14655: vidhyādiṣv artheṣu dhātoḥ liṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14666: sampraśne - kiṃ nu khalu bho vyākaranam adhīyīya /
GS24jvkasipu:14667: prārthane - bhavati me prārthanā vyākaranam adhīyīya //
GS24jvkasipu:14670: loṭ pratyayo bhavati dhātoḥ vidhyādiṣu artheṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:14672: vidhau tāvat - kaṭaṃ tāvat bhavān karotu /
GS24jvkasipu:14677: adhīṣṭe - adhīcchāmo bhavantaṃ māṇavakaṃ bhavān adhyāpayatu, māṇāvakaṃ bhavān upanayatām /
GS24jvkasipu:14678: sampraśne - kiṃ nu khalu bho vyākranam adhyayai /
GS24jvkasipu:14679: prārthane - bhavati me prārthanā vyākaraṇam adhyayai, chando 'dhyayai //
GS24jvkasipu:14685: eteṣv artheṣu dhātoḥ kṛtya-sañjñakāḥ pratyayāḥ bhavanti, cakārāl loṭ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:14686: bhavatā kaṭaḥ karaṇīyaḥ, kartavyaḥ, kṛtyaḥ, kāryaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14687: loṭ khalv api - karotu kaṭaṃ bhavān iha preṣitaḥ, bhavān atisṛṣṭah,
GS24jvkasipu:14689: kimarthaṃ praiṣādiṣu kṛtyā vidhīyante na sāmānyena, bhāva-karmaṇor vihitā eva te praiṣādiṣv anyatra ca bhaviṣyanti ? viśeṣa-vihitena anena loṭā bādyante /
GS24jvkasipu:14690: vāsarūpa-vidhinā bhavisyanti ? evaṃ tarhi jñāpayati, stry-adhikārāt pareṇa
GS24jvkasipu:14692: vidhipraiṣayoḥ ko viśeṣa ? kecid āhuḥ, ajñātajñāpanaṃ vidhiḥ, preṣaṇaṃ praiṣaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:14696: praiṣādiṣu gamyamāneṣu ūrdhva-mauhūrtike 'rthe vartamānād dhātoḥ liṅ
GS24jvkasipu:14697: pratyayo bhavati, cakārād yathā prāptaṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:14698: ūrdhvaṃ muhūrtāt, upari muhūrtasya bhavatā khalu kaṭaḥ kartavyaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:14700: bhavān khalu kaṭaṃ kuryāt, bhavān khalu karotu /
GS24jvkasipu:14710: ūrdhvaṃ muhūrtād bhavān kaṭaṃ kaortu sma, grāmaṃ gacchatu sma,
GS24jvkasipu:14716: sma-śabde upapade 'dhīṣṭe gamyamāne dhātoḥ loṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14722: kālādiṣu upapadesu dhātoḥ tumun pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14725: iha kasmān na bhavati, kālaḥ pacati bhūtāni iti ? praiṣādi-grahaṇam iha abhisambadhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:14727: kālo bhojanasya ? vāsarūpena lyuḍ api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14728: uktam idam, stry-adhikārāt paratra vāsarūpa-vidhir anityaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:14732: yacchabde upapade kālādiṣu dhātoḥ liṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14740: arhe kartari vācye gamyamāne vā dhātoḥ kṛtya-tṛcaḥ pratyayā bhavanti,
GS24jvkasipu:14742: bhavatā khalu kanyā voḍhavyā, vāhyā, vahanīyā /
GS24jvkasipu:14746: atha kasmād arhe kṛtyatṛco vidhīyante, yāvatā sāmānena vihitatvād arhe 'pi
GS24jvkasipu:14747: bhavisyanti ? yo 'yam iha liṅ vidhīyate, tena bādhā mā bhūt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:14753: avaśyaṃ bhāvaviśiṣṭe ādhamarṇyaviśiṣṭe ca kartari vācye dhātoḥ ṇiniḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14756: ādhamarṇye khalv api - śatam dāyī sahasraṃ dāyī /
GS24jvkasipu:14761: kṛtya-sañjākāś ca pratyayā āvaśyaka-ādhamarṇyayor upādhibhūtayoḥ dhātor bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:14762: bhavatā khalu avaśyaṃ kaṭaḥ kartavyaḥ, avaśyaṃ karaṇīyaḥ, avaśyaṃ kāryaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:14766: kimartham idam, yāvatā sāmāgyena vihitā asminn api viṣaye bhavisyanti ?
GS24jvkasipu:14768: kartari ṇiniḥ, bhāva-karmaṇoḥ kṛtyāḥ, tatra kuto bādhaprasaṅgaḥ ? tatra kecid āhuḥ, bhavyageyādayaḥ kartṛ-vācinaḥ kṛtyāḥ, ta iha+udāharaṇam iti //
GS24jvkasipu:14772: śaknoty-arthopādhike dhātv-arthe liṅ pratyayo bhavati, cakārāt kṛtyāś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:14773: bhavatā khalu bhāro voḍhavyaḥ, vahanīyaḥ, vāhyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14776: sāmānya-vihitānāṃ punar vacanam liṅā bādhā mā bhūt iti //
GS24jvkasipu:14779: āśaṃsanam āśīḥ, apraptasya+iṣṭasya arthasya prāptum icchā /
GS24jvkasipu:14781: aśīrviśiṣṭe 'rthe vartamānād dhātoḥ liṅ-loṭau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14784: āśiṣi iti kim ? ciraṃ jīvati devadattaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:14788: āśiṣi viṣaye dhātoḥ ktic-ktau pratyayau bhavataḥ, samudāyena cet sañjñā
GS24jvkasipu:14794: ktaḥ khalv api - devā enaṃ deyāsuḥ devadattaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14795: sāmānyena vihitaḥ ktaḥ punar ucyate, kticā bādhā mā bhūt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:14796: cakāro viśeṣaṇa-arthaḥ, na ktici dīrghaś ca (*6,4.39) iti //
GS24jvkasipu:14799: māṅi upapade dhātoḥ luṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14803: katham mā bhavatu tasya pāpam, mā bhaviṣyati iti ? asādhur eva ayam /
GS24jvkasipu:14804: kecid āhuḥ, aṅidaparo mā-śabdo vidyate, tasya ayaṃ prayogaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:14807: sma-śabda-uttare māṅi upapade dhātoḥ laṅ pratyayo bhavati, cakārāl lug ca
GS24jvkasipu:14812: iti śrījayādityaviracitāyām kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau tṛtīyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:14819: tasmin sati ayathākāloktā api pratyayāḥ sādhavo bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:14823: agniṣṭomayājī iti bhūtakālaḥ, janitā iti bhaviṣyatkālaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14824: tatra bhūtaḥ kālaḥ bhaviṣyatkālena abhisambadhyamānaḥ sādhur bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14825: viśeṣaṇaṃ guṇatvād viśeṣyakālam anurudhyate, tena viparyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14827: adhātv-adhikāra-vihitā api pratyayāḥ taddhitā dhātu-sambandhe sati kālabhede sādhavo yathā syuḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:14830: gāvo vidyante 'sya iti vartamāna-vihito matup, āsīt bhavitā iti
GS24jvkasipu:14832: kriyāsam-abhihāre loṭ loṭo hi-svau vā ca ta-dhvamoḥ || PS_3,4.2 ||
GS24jvkasipu:14837: samabhihāra-viśiṣṭa-kriyāvacanād dhātoḥ loṭ pratyayo bhavati sarveṣu kāleṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:14838: sarvalakārāṇām apavādaḥ tasya ca loṭo hi sva ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14841: kriyā-samabhihāre loḍ bhavati, tato loṭo hisvau /
GS24jvkasipu:14842: loṭ ity eva, loḍ-dharmāṇau hisvau bhavataḥ ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14843: tena ātmanepada-parasmaipadatvaṃ bhedena avatiṣṭhate, tiṅtvaṃ ca dvayor
GS24jvkasipu:14845: lunīhi lunīhi ity eva ayaṃ lunāti, imau lunītaḥ, ime lunanti /
GS24jvkasipu:14846: lunīhi lunīhi ity eva tvaṃ lunāsi, yuvāṃ lunīthaḥ, yūyaṃ lunītha /
GS24jvkasipu:14847: atha vā, lunīta lunīta+ity eva yūyaṃ lunītha /
GS24jvkasipu:14848: lunīhi lunīhi ity eva ahaṃ lunāmi, āvāṃ lunīvaḥ, vayaṃ lunīmaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14849: bhūte - lunīhi lunīhi ity eva ayam alāvīt, alāviṣṭām, alāviṣuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14851: bhaviṣyati - lunīhi lunihi ity eva ayaṃ laviṣyati, laviṣyataḥ, laviṣyanti
GS24jvkasipu:14853: adhīṣvādhīṣvety eva ayam adhīte, imāvadhīyate, ime 'dhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:14854: adhīṣvādhīṣvety eva tvam adhīṣe, yuvām adhīyāthe, yūyam adhīdhve /
GS24jvkasipu:14855: atha vā, adhīdhvam adhīdhvam ity eva yūyam adhīdhve /
GS24jvkasipu:14856: adhīṣvādhīṣvety eva aham adhīye, āvām adhīvahe, vayam adhīmahe /
GS24jvkasipu:14860: yaṅ-pratyayaḥ punar asminn eva arthe vidhīyamānaḥ svayam eva śaktatvān na
GS24jvkasipu:14865: samuccīyamāna-kriyāvacanād dhātor anyatarasyāṃ loṭ pratyayo bhavati, tasya loṭo hi-svau ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14867: bhrāṣṭramaṭa, maṭhamaṭa, khadūramaṭa, sthālyapidhānam aṭa ity eva ayam aṭati, imāv aṭataḥ, ime 'ṭanti /
GS24jvkasipu:14868: bhrāṣṭramaṭa, maṭhamaṭa, khadūram aṭa, sthālyapidhānam aṭa+ity eva tvam aṭasi, yuvām aṭathaḥ, yūyam aṭatha /
GS24jvkasipu:14869: atha vā, bhrāṣṭram aṭata, maṭham aṭata, khadūram aṭata, sthālyupidhānam aṭata ity eva yūyam aṭatha /
GS24jvkasipu:14870: bhrāṣṭram aṭa, maṭham aṭa, khadūram aṭa, sthālyupidhānam aṭa ity eva aham aṭāmi, āvām aṭāvaḥ, vayam aṭāmaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14871: atha vā, bhrāṣṭram aṭati, maṭham aṭati, khadūram aṭati, sthālyupidhānam aṭati ity eva ayam aṭati, imā vaṭataḥ, ime 'ṭanti /
GS24jvkasipu:14872: bhrāṣṭram aṭasi, maṭham aṭasi, khadūram aṭasi, sthālyupidhānam aṭasi, ity eva tvam aṭasi, yuvām aṭathaḥ, yūyam aṭatha /
GS24jvkasipu:14873: bhrāṣṭram aṭāmi, maṭham aṭāmi, khadūram aṭāmi, sthālyupidhānam aṭāmi ity
GS24jvkasipu:14874: eva aham aṭāmi, āvām aṭāvaḥ, vayam aṭAamaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14875: chando 'dhīṣva, vyākaraṇam adhīṣva, niruktam adhīṣva ity eva ayam adhīte,
GS24jvkasipu:14877: chando 'dhīṣva, vyākaraṇam adhīdhvam ity eva yūyam adhīdhve /
GS24jvkasipu:14878: chando 'dhīṣva, vyākaraṇam adhīṣva, niruktam adhīṣva ity eva aham adhīye,
GS24jvkasipu:14880: atha vā, chando 'dhīte, vyākaraṇam adhīte, niruktamadhīte, ity eva ayam
GS24jvkasipu:14882: chando 'dhīṣe, vyākaraṇam adhīṣe, niruktam adhīṣe ity eva tvam adhīṣe,
GS24jvkasipu:14884: chando 'dhīye, vyākaraṇam adhīye, niruktam adhīye ity eva aham adhīye,
GS24jvkasipu:14889: yasmād dhātoḥ loḍ vihitaḥ sa eva dhātur anuprayoktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14892: tathā ca+eva+udāhṛtam lunīhi lunīhi ity eva ayaṃ lunīti iti /
GS24jvkasipu:14898: dvitīye loḍvidhāne samuccaye sāmānya-vacanasya dhātor anuprayogaḥ kartavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14899: odanaṃ bhuṅkṣva, saktūn piba, dhānāḥ khāda ity eva ayam abhyavaharati /
GS24jvkasipu:14901: lāghavaṃ ca laukike śabda-vyavahāre na adriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:14902: bhrāṣṭram aṭa, maṭham aṭa, khadūram aṭa, sthālyupidhānam aṭa ity eva ayam aṭati ity atra api kāraka-bhedāt kriyābhede sati sāmānya-vacanatā
GS24jvkasipu:14907: chandasi viṣaye dhātu-sambandhe sarveṣu luṅ-laṅ-liṭaḥ pratyayā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:14912: laṅ - agnim adya hotāram avṛṇītāyaṃ yajamānaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14918: liṅ-arthe, yatra liṅ vidhīyate vidhyādiḥ, hetuhetumator liṅ (*3,3.156) ity evam ādiḥ, tatra chandasi viṣaye 'nyatarasyāṃ leṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14927: upasaṃvādaḥ paribhāṣaṇam, kartavye paṇabandhaḥ, yadi me bhavān idaṃ kuryād aham api bhavate idaṃ dāsyāmi iti /
GS24jvkasipu:14929: upasaṃvāde āśaṅkāyāṃ ca gamyamānāyāṃ chandasi viṣaye leṭ pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:14931: madagrā eva vo grahā gṛhyāntai iti /
GS24jvkasipu:14935: liṅ-artha eva ayam, nitya-arthaṃ tu vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:14942: tatra chandasi viṣaye dhātoḥ sayādayaḥ pratyayā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:14944: kathaṃ jñāyate ? vacanasāmarthyāt tāvad ayam kartur apakṛṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:14945: na ca ayam anyasminn arthe tumun ādiśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:14967: prayai rohiṣyai avyathiṣyai ity ete śabdā nipātyante chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:14977: dṛśe vikhye ity etau chandasi viṣaye nipātyete /
GS24jvkasipu:14985: śaknotau dhātāv upapade chandasi viṣaye tumarthe ṇamul kamul ity etau pratyayu bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14996: īśvara-śabda upapade chandasi viṣaye tumarthe dhatoḥ tosun-kasun-pratyayau
GS24jvkasipu:15008: tasmin kṛtya-arthe chandasi viṣaye tavai ken kenya tvan ity ete pratyayā
GS24jvkasipu:15024: tumarthe chandasi iti sayādi-sūtre 'pi tavai vihitaḥ, tasya tumarthādanyatra kārake vidhir draṣtavyaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:15036: bhāvo lakṣyate yena tasminn arthe vartamānebhyaḥ sthādibhyo dhātubhyaḥ chandasi viṣaye tumarthe tosun pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15049: sṛpi-tṛdor dhātvoḥ bhāva-lakṣaṇe 'rthe vartamānayoḥ chandasi viṣaye
GS24jvkasipu:15056: alam khalu ity etayoḥ pratiṣedha-vācinor upapadayoḥ dhātoḥ ktvā pratyayo bhavati prācām ācāryāṇāṃ matena /
GS24jvkasipu:15068: māṅo dhātoḥ vyatīhāre vartamānād udīcām ācāryāṇāṃ matena ktvā pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15075: meṅaḥ kṛtātvasya ayaṃ nirdeśaḥ kṛto jñāpana-arthaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:15077: tena dā-dhā ghv-adāp (*1,1.20) iti daipo 'pi pratiṣedho bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:15081: pareṇa pūrvasya yoge gamyamāne avareṇa ca parasya dhātoḥ ktvā pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15082: pareṇa tāvat - aprāpya nadīṃ parvataḥ sthitaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15084: avarayoge - atikramya tu parvataṃ nadī sthitā /
GS24jvkasipu:15088: samānaḥ kartā yayoḥ dhātv-arthayos tatra pūrvakāle dhātv-arthe vartamānād dhātoḥ ktvā pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15094: samāna-kartuṛkayoḥ iti kim ? bhuktavati brāhmaṇe gacchati devadattaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15095: pūrvakāle iti kim ? vrajati ca jalpati ca /
GS24jvkasipu:15096: āsyaṃ vyādāya svapiti cakṣuḥ saṃmīlya hasti ity upasaṃkhyānam apūrvakālatvāt //
GS24jvkasipu:15102: ābhīkṣṇya-viśiṣṭe 'rthe vartamānād dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati, cakārāt ktva ca /
GS24jvkasipu:15103: dvirvacana-sahitau ktvāṇamulāv ābhīkṣṇyaṃ dyotayataḥ, na kevalau /
GS24jvkasipu:15104: ābhīkṣṇye dve bhavataḥ ity upasaṅkhyānād dvirvacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:15105: bhojaṃ bhojaṃ vrajati, bhuktvā bhuktvā vrajati /
GS24jvkasipu:15106: pāyaṃ pāyaṃ vrajati, pītvā pītvā vrajati //
GS24jvkasipu:15109: yacchabde upapade dhātoḥ ktvā-ṇamulau pratyayau na bhavato 'nākāṅkṣe vācye
GS24jvkasipu:15110: yatra pūrvottare kriye staḥ, tacced vākyaṃ na paraṃ kiñcid ākāṅkṣate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:15114: anākāṅkṣe iti kim ? yad ayaṃ bhuktvā vrajati adhīte eva tataḥ param //
GS24jvkasipu:15119: agre prathama pūrva ity eteṣu upapadeṣu samānakartṛkayoḥ pūrvakāle dhātoḥ ktvāṇamulau pratyayu vibhāṣā bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15120: agre bhojaṃ vrajati, agre bhuktvā vrajati /
GS24jvkasipu:15121: prathamaṃ bhojaṃ vrajati, prathamaṃ bhuktvā vrajati /
GS24jvkasipu:15122: pūrvaṃ bhojaṃ vrajati, pūrvaṃ bhuktvā vrajati /
GS24jvkasipu:15123: vibhāṣāgrahaṇam etābhyāṃ mukte laḍādayo 'pi yathā syuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15125: nanu ca vāsarūpa iti bhavisyati ? ktvāṇamulau yatra saha vidhīyete tatra vāsarūpavidhir na asti ity etad anena jñāpyate, tena ābhīkṣṇye laḍādayo na bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:15126: upapadasamāsaḥ kasmān na kriyate ? uktaṃ tatra+eva kārasya prayojanam,
GS24jvkasipu:15127: amaiva yat tulya-vidhānam upapadaṃ tat samasyate, na anyat iti //
GS24jvkasipu:15130: karmaṇy-upapade kṛjo dhātoḥ khamuñ pratyayo bhavati ākrośe gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:15133: corakaraṇam ākrośasam pādanārtham eva, na tv asau coraḥ kriyate //
GS24jvkasipu:15136: samānakartṛkayoḥ pūrvakāle kṛñaḥ iti ca anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:15138: svādvartheṣu upapadeṣu kṛño ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15142: svādumi iti makārānta-nipātanam īkārābhāva-artham, cvyantasya api makāra-arthaṃ dīrghābhāva-arthaṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:15143: asvādvīṃ svādvīṃ kṛtvā bhuṅkte svāduṅ-kāraṃ bhuṅkte /
GS24jvkasipu:15144: vāsarūpeṇa ktvā api bhavati, svāduṃ kṛtvā bhuṅkte /
GS24jvkasipu:15145: tumartha-adhikārāc ca sarva ete bhāve pratyayāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15146: yady evam, svāduṅkāraṃ bhuṅkte devadattaḥ iti ṇamulā kartur anabhihitatvāt kartari kasmāt tṛtīyā na bhavati ? bhujipratyayena abhihitaḥ kartā, na ca asmin prakaraṇe śaktiśaktimatorbhedo vivakṣyte, samānakartṛkatvaṃ hi virudhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:15151: anyathādiṣu upapadesu kṛño ṇamul pratyayo bhavati, siddhāprayogaścet karoter bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15152: kathaṃ punar asau siddhāprayogaḥ ? nirarthakatvān na prayogam arhati iti evam eva prayujyate
GS24jvkasipu:15153: anyathā bhuṅkte iti yavānarthastāvān eva anyathākāraṃ bhugkte iti gamyate
GS24jvkasipu:15158: sidhāprayogaḥ iti kim ? anyathā kṛtvā śiro bhuṅkte //
GS24jvkasipu:15162: yathātatha-śabdayor upapadayoḥ kṛño ṇamul pratyayo bhavati asūyāprativacane gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:15163: yadyasūyan pṛcchati prativakti tatra prativacanam , yathākāram ahaṃ bhokṣye, tathākāram ahaṃ, kiṃ tavānena ? asūyāprativacane iti kim ? yathā kṛtvā 'haṃ bhokṣye, tathā tvaṃ drakṣyasi siddhāprayoge ity eva, yathā kṛtvā 'haṃ śiro bhokṣye, kiṃ tavānena //
GS24jvkasipu:15166: karmaṇy-upapade sākalya-viśiṣte 'rthe dṛśividoḥ dhātvoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15168: yāḥ yāḥ kanyāḥ paśyati tāstāḥ varyati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15170: yaṃ yaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ jānāti labhate vicārayati vā tān sarvān bhojayati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15171: sākalye iti kim ? brāhmaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhojayati //
GS24jvkasipu:15174: yāvac-chabda upapade vindater jīvateś ca ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15182: carmodarayoḥ karmaṇor upapadayoḥ pūryateḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15185: varṣa-pramāṇa ūlopaś ca asya anyatrasyām || PS_3,4.32 ||
GS24jvkasipu:15188: pūrayateḥ dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyay bhavati, ūlopaś ca asya pūrayter anyatarasyāṃ bhavati, samudāyena ced varṣasya pramāṇam iyattā gamyate /
GS24jvkasipu:15189: goṣpadapūraṃ vṛṣṭo devaḥ, goṣpadapraṃ vṛṣṭo devaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15190: sītāpūraṃ vṛṣṭo devaḥ, sītāpraṃ vṛṣṭo devaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15197: knūyī śabde undane ca, asmāṇṇyantād dhātoḥ cel-artheṣu karmasu upapadeṣu ṇamul pratyayo bhavati, varṣapramāṇe gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:15204: nimūla-samūla-śabdayoḥ karmavācinor upapadayoḥ kaṣeḥ dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo
GS24jvkasipu:15209: itaḥ prabhṛti kaṣādīn yān vakṣyati tatra kaṣādiṣu yathā-vidhy-anuprayogaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:15214: śuṣkādiṣu karmavāciṣu upapadeṣu piṣer dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15224: samūla akṛta jīva ity eteṣu śabdeṣu karmasu upapadeṣu yathāsaṅkhyaṃ han kṛñ graha ity etebhyo dhātubhyo ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15231: karaṇe upapade hanter dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15245: snehana-vācini karaṇe upapade piṣer dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15254: hasta-vācini karaṇe upapade vartayateḥ gṛhṇāteś ca ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15258: graheḥ khalv api - hastena gṛhṇāti, hastagrāhaṃ gṛhṇāti /
GS24jvkasipu:15265: sva-vācini karaṇe upapade puṣer dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15276: adhikaraṇa-vācini upapade badhnāteḥ dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15284: sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye badhnāteḥ dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15292: jīva-puruṣayoḥ kartṛ-vācinor upapadayoḥ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ naśi-vahoḥ dhātvoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:15296: puruṣaḥ preṣyo bhūtvā vahati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15302: ūrdhva-śabde kartṛ-vācini upapade śuṣiṣuroḥ dhātvoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:15310: upmāne karmaṇi upapade, cakārāt kartari, dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15323: yasmād dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati sa eva anuprayoktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15324: nanu dhātu-sambandhe pratyaya-vidhānād anuprayogaḥ siddha eva ? yathāvidhi iti niyama-arthaṃ vacanam, tathā ca+eva+udāhṛtam //
GS24jvkasipu:15327: daṃśa daśane, asmād dhator upapūrvāt tṛtīyānte upapade ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15333: sarvasminn eva atra ṇamul-prakaraṇe kriyābhede sati vāsarūpa-vidhinā
GS24jvkasipu:15340: tadarthānāṃ dhātūnām anuprayoga-dhātunā samāna-karmakāṇāṃ tṛtīyānte upapade ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15343: samānakarmakāṇām iti kim ? coraṃ daṇḍenopahatya gopālako gāḥ kālayati //
GS24jvkasipu:15347: upapūrvebhyaḥ pīḍa-rudha-karṣebhyaḥ saptamyante upapade, cakārāt tṛtīyānte upapade, ṇamula pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15348: pārśvopapīḍaṃ śete, pārśvayor upapīḍam, pārśvābhyām upapīḍam /
GS24jvkasipu:15349: vrajoparodhaṃ gāḥ sthāpyati, vraje uparodham, vrajenoparodham /
GS24jvkasipu:15356: samāsattau gamyamānāyāṃ tṛtīyā-saptamyoḥ upapadayoḥ dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15357: keśagrāhaṃ yudhyante, keśeṣu grāham, keśair grāham /
GS24jvkasipu:15364: pramāṇe gamyamane tṛtīyā-saptamyoḥ upapadayoḥ dhātor ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15371: parīpsāyāṃ gamyamānāyām apādāne upapade dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15373: evaṃ nāma tvarate yadavaśyaṃkartavyam api na apekṣate /
GS24jvkasipu:15377: parīpsāyām iti kim ? āsanād utthāya gacchati //
GS24jvkasipu:15381: dvitīyānta upapade parīpsāyāṃ gamyamānāyāṃ dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15384: evaṃ nāma tvarate yadāyudha-grahaṇam api na adriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:15385: loṣtādikaṃ yat kiṃcid āsannaṃ tad gṛhṇāti //
GS24jvkasipu:15389: agruve svāṅga-vācini dvitīyānta upapade dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15392: aghruve iti kim ? utkṣipya śiraḥ kathayati /
GS24jvkasipu:15393: yasmin aṅge chinne 'pi prāṇī na mriyate tadaghruvam /
GS24jvkasipu:15398: parikliśyamāne svāṅga-vācini dvitīyānte upapade dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15407: dvitīyānte upapade viśyādibhyo dhātubhyo ṇamul pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:15409: viśyādibhiḥ kriyābhir anavayavena padārthānāṃ sambandho vyāptiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15413: samāsena vyāptyāsevayor uktatvāt nitya-vīpsayoḥ (*8,1.4) iti dvirvacanaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15416: tathā ca vakṣyati - supsu vīpsa, tiṅkṣu nityatā iti /
GS24jvkasipu:15419: pati - geha-anuprapātam āste gehaṃ geham anuprapātam āste, geham anuprapātam anuprapātam āste
GS24jvkasipu:15420: padi - geha-anuprapādam āste, gehaṃ geham anuprapādam, geham anuprapādam anuprapādam /
GS24jvkasipu:15421: skandi - geha-avaskandam āste, gehaṃ geham avaskandam, geham avaskandam avaskandam /
GS24jvkasipu:15422: vyāpyam ānāsevyamānayoḥ iti kim ? geham anupraviśya bhuṅkte /
GS24jvkasipu:15423: nanu ābhīkṣṇye ṇamul vihita eva, āsevā ābhīkṣṇyam eva, kim arthaṃ punar
GS24jvkasipu:15424: āsevāyāṃ ṇamul ucyate ? ktvānivṛtty-artham iti cet, na, iṣṭatvāt tasya /
GS24jvkasipu:15425: dvitīyopapada-arthaṃ tarhi vacanam, upapadasamāsaḥ pakṣe yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:15433: dvyahātyāsaṃ gāḥ pāyayati, dvyahamatyāsaṃ gāḥ pāyayati /
GS24jvkasipu:15434: tryahātyāsaṃ gāḥ pāyayati, tryahamatyāsaṃ gāḥ pāyayati /
GS24jvkasipu:15435: dvyahatarṣaṃ gāḥ pāyayati, dvyahaṃtarṣaṃ gāḥ pāyayati /
GS24jvkasipu:15436: atyasanena tarṣaṇena ca gavāṃ pānakriyā vyavadhīyate vicchidyate /
GS24jvkasipu:15437: adya pāyayitvā dvyahamatikramya punaḥ pāyayati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15439: kriyāntare iti kim ? aharatyasya iṣūn gataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15441: kāleṣu iti kim ? yojanam atyasya gāḥ pāyayati /
GS24jvkasipu:15446: nāma-śabde dvitīyānte upapade ādiśer graheś ca dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15451: avyaye upapade ayathabhipreta-ākhyāne gamyamāne karoteḥ ktvā-ṇamulau
GS24jvkasipu:15454: kiṃ tarhi vṛṣala, nīcaiḥ kṛṭyācakṣe, nīcaiḥ kṛtvā, nīcaiḥ kāram /
GS24jvkasipu:15457: kiṃ tarhi vṛṣala, uccaiḥ kṛtyācakṣe, uccaiḥ kṛtvā, uccaiḥ kāram /
GS24jvkasipu:15459: ayathābhipreta-ākhyāne iti kim ? uccaiḥ kṛtvācaṣṭe putraste jātaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:15460: ktvā-grahaṇaṃ kim, yāvatā sarvasminn eva atra prakaraṇe vāsarūpeṇa ktvā bhavati ity uktam ? samāsa-arthaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:15461: tathā ca ktvā ca (*2,2.22) ity asmin sūtre tṛtīyā-prabhṛtīny-anyatarasyām
GS24jvkasipu:15467: tiryak-śabde upapade kṛñaḥ ktvāṇamulau pratyayau bhavataḥ, apavarge gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:15469: tiryak-kṛtya gataḥ, tiryak-kṛtvā gataḥ, tiryak-kāraṃ gataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15471: apavarge iti kim ? tiryak-kṛtvā kāṣṭhaṃ gataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15477: tas-pratyayo yataḥ sva-aṅgāt tad evam ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:15478: tas-pratyaye svāṅga-vācini upapade karoteḥ bhavateś ca dhātvoḥ ktvāṇamulau
GS24jvkasipu:15481: mukhataḥ-kṛtya gataḥ, mukhataḥ kṛtvā gataḥ, mukhataḥ-kāraṃ gataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15482: mukhatobhūya tiṣṭhati, mukhato bhūtvā tiṣṭhati, mukhatobhāvaṃ tiṣṭhati /
GS24jvkasipu:15483: pṛṣṭhataḥkṛtya gataḥ, pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā gataḥ, pṛṣṭhataḥ kāraṃ gataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15485: svāṅge iti kim ? sarvataḥ kṛtvā gataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15488: pratyaya-grahaṇaṃ kim ? mukhe tasyati iti mukhataḥ, mukhataḥ kṛtvā gataḥ
GS24jvkasipu:15491: nā-artho dhā-arthaś ca pratyayo yasmāt sa evam ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:15492: nādhārthapratyaye śabde cvy-arthe upapade kṛbhvoḥ dhātvoḥ ktvāṇamulau pratyayu bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15493: anānā nānā kṛtvā gataḥ nānākṛtya gataḥ, nānā kṛtvā gataḥ, nānākāraṃ gataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15494: vinākṛtya gataḥ, vinā kṛtvā gataḥ, vinākāraṃ gataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15495: nānābhūya gataḥ, nānā bhūtvā gataḥ, nānābhāvaṃ gataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15496: vinābhūya gataḥ, vinā bhūtvā gataḥ, dvinābhāvaṃ gataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15497: dvidhākṛtya gataḥ, dvidhā kṛtvā gataḥ, dvidhākāraṃ gataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15498: dvidhābhūya gataḥ, dvidhā bhūtvā gataḥ, dvidhābhāvaṃ gataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15499: dvaidhaṃkṛtya gataḥ, dvaidhaṃ kṛtvā gataḥ, dvaidhaṃkāraṃ gataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15500: dvaidhaṃbhūya gataḥ, dvaidhaṃ bhūtvā gataḥ, dvaidhaṃbhāvaṃ gataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15503: cvy-arthe iti kim ? nānā kṛtvā kāṣṭhāni gataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15504: dhārtham artha-grahaṇam, nā punar eka eva, vinañbhyāṃ nānāñau iti //
GS24jvkasipu:15507: tūṣṇīṃ-śabde upapade bhavateḥ dhātoḥ ktvāṇamulau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15512: anvak-śabde upapade bhavater dhātoḥ ānulomye ktvāṇamulau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15514: anvagbhūya āste, anvag bhūtvā āste, anvagbhāvam āste /
GS24jvkasipu:15515: ānulomye iti kim ? anvag bhūtvā tiṣṭhati //
GS24jvkasipu:15518: śaka-ādiṣu upapadeṣu asty-artheṣu vā dhātumātrāt tumun pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15535: paryāpti-vacaneṣu alamartheṣu upapadeṣu dhātostumun pratyao bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15541: pūrvasūtre śakigrahaṇam analamartham, śakyam evaṃ kartum iti //
GS24jvkasipu:15546: tatra yeṣu artha-nirdeśo nāsti tatra+idam upatiṣṭhate, arthākāṅkṣatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:15547: na khyunnādi-vākyeṣu, sākṣād artha-nirdeśe sati teṣām nirākāṅkṣatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:15557: iti bhāva-karmaṇoḥ prāptayoḥ kartā ca vācyaḥ pakṣe ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:15558: bhavaty asau bhavyaḥ, bhavyam anena iti vā /
GS24jvkasipu:15559: geyo māṇavakaḥ sāmnām, geyāni māṇavakena sāmāni iti vā /
GS24jvkasipu:15560: pravacanīyo guruḥ svādhyāyasya, pravacanīyo guruṇā svādhyāya iti vā /
GS24jvkasipu:15561: upasthānīyo 'ntevāsī guroḥ, upasthānīyaḥ śiṣyeṇa vā guruḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15564: āpatati asāvāpātyaḥ, āpātyam anena iti vā //
GS24jvkasipu:15565: laḥ karmaṇi ca bhāve ca akramakebhyaḥ || PS_3,4.69 ||
GS24jvkasipu:15567: laḥ ity utsṛṣṭānaubandhaṃ sāmānyaṃ gṛhyate, prathamābahuvacanāntaṃ caa+eat
GS24jvkasipu:15568: lakārāḥ karmaṇi kārake bhavanti, cakārāt kartari ca akarmakebhyo dhātubhyo bhāve bhavanti, punaś cakārāt kartari ca /
GS24jvkasipu:15576: tayor eva bhāvakarmaṇoḥ kṛtya-sañjñākāḥ kta-khal-arthāś ca pratyayā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:15591: bhāvo cākramakebhyaḥ ity anuvṛtteḥ sakarmakebhyo bhāve na bhavanti //
GS24jvkasipu:15594: ādikarmaṇi yaḥ kto vihitaḥ sa kartari bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15596: ādibhūtaḥ kriyākṣaṇa ādikarma, tasminn ādikarmaṇi bhūtatvena vivakṣite yaḥ kto vihitaḥ, tasya ayam artha-nirdeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15597: prakṛtaḥ kaṭaṃ devadattaḥ, prakṛtaḥ kto devadattena, prakṛtam devadattena /
GS24jvkasipu:15598: prabhukta odanaṃ devadattaḥ, prabhukta odano devadattena, prabhuktaṃ devadattena //
GS24jvkasipu:15601: gaty-arthabhyo dhātubhyo 'karmakebhya śliṣādibhyaś ca yaḥ ktaḥ, sa kartari bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15603: gato devadatto grāmam, gato devadattena grāman, gato devadattena grāmaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:15607: śliṣa - upaśliṣṭo guruṃ bhavān, upaśliṣṭo gururbhavatā, upaśliṣṭaṃ bhavatā /
GS24jvkasipu:15608: śīṅ - upaśayito guruṃ bhavān, upaśayito gururbhavatā, upaśayitaṃ bhavatā /
GS24jvkasipu:15609: sthā - upasthito guruṃ bhavān, upasthito gururbhavatā, upasthitaṃ bhavatā /
GS24jvkasipu:15610: āsa - upāsito guruṃ bhavān, upāsito gururbhavatā, upāsitaṃ bhavatā /
GS24jvkasipu:15611: vasa - anūṣito guruṃ bhavān, anūṣito gururbhavatā, anūṣitaṃ bhavatā /
GS24jvkasipu:15612: jana - anujāto māṇavako māṇa - vikām, anujātā māṇavakena māṇavikā,
GS24jvkasipu:15614: ruha - ārūḍho vṛkṣaṃ bhavān, ārūḍho vṛkṣo bhavatā, ārūḍhaṃ bhavatā /
GS24jvkasipu:15615: jīryati - anujīrṇo vṛṣalīṃ devadattaḥ, anujīrṇā vṛpalī devadattena,
GS24jvkasipu:15617: śliṣādayaḥ sopasargāḥ sakarmakā bhavanti, tadartham eṣām upādānam //
GS24jvkasipu:15622: sa kṛtsañjñakatvāt kartari prāptaḥ, sampradāne nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:15624: āgatāya tasmai dātuṃ gāṃ hanti iti goghnaḥ, arghārho 'tithiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15626: nipātana-sāmarthyād eva goghnaḥ ṛtvig-ādir ucyate, na tu caṇḍālādiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15627: asaty api ca gohanane tasya yogyatayā goghnaḥ ity abhidhīyate //
GS24jvkasipu:15631: uṇādi-pratyayāntā ete, iṣiyudhīndhidasiśyādhūsūbhyo mak, bhiyaṣṣuk grasvaś ca ity evam ādayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15632: tābhyām anyatra-uṇādayaḥ (*3,4.75) iti paryadāse prāpte nipātanam ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:15648: uṇādayaḥ śabdāḥ tābhyām apādāna-sampradānābhyām anyatra kārake bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:15649: kṛttvāt kartary eva prāptāḥ karmādiṣu kathyante /
GS24jvkasipu:15650: tābhyām iti sampradāna-arthaḥ pratyavamarśaḥ, anyathā hy apādānam eva
GS24jvkasipu:15666: bhrauvya-arthebhyaḥ tāvat - āsito devadattaḥ, āsitaṃ tena, idam eṣām āsitam /
GS24jvkasipu:15667: gaty-arthebhyaḥ - yāto devadatto grāmam, yāto devadattena grāmaḥ, yātaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:15669: pratyavasāna-arthebhyaḥ - bhuktaḥ odano devadattena, devadattena bhuktam,
GS24jvkasipu:15671: kathaṃ bhuktā brāhmaṇāḥ, pītā gāvaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:15672: akāro matvarthīyaḥ, bhuktam eṣām asti, pītam eṣām asti iti //
GS24jvkasipu:15678: yad iti ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ lasya ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:15679: kiṃ ca+idaṃ lasya iti ? daśa lakārā anubandha-viśiṣṭā vihitā artha-viśeṣe
GS24jvkasipu:15681: teṣāṃ viśeṣakarān anubandhān utsṛjya yat sāmānyaṃ tad gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:15695: atha lakāramātrasya grahaṇam kasmān na bhavati, lunāti, cūḍālaḥ iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:15701: iṭaṣṭakāraḥ iṭo 't (*3,4.106) iti viśeṣaṇa-arthaḥ, tib-ādibhir ādeśais tulyatvān na deśa-vidhyarthaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:15712: ṭito lakārasya sthāne yāny ātmanepadāni teṣām ṭeḥ ekāra-ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15714: iha kasmān na bhavati pacamānaḥ, yajamānaḥ ? prakṛtais tibādibhiḥ ātmanepadāni viśeṣyante
GS24jvkasipu:15718: ṭito lakārasya yaḥ thās tasya seśabda ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15725: liḍ-ādeśayoḥ ta-jhayoḥ yathāsaṅkhyam eś irec ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15743: vida jñāne, asmād dhātoḥ pareṣāṃ laḍādeśānāṃ parasmaipadānāṃ ṇalādayo nava vikalpena ādeśā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:15751: bruvaḥ pañcānām ādita āho bruvaḥ || PS_3,4.84 ||
GS24jvkasipu:15753: parasmaipadānām ity eva, laṭo vā iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:15754: bruvaḥ parasya laṭaḥ parasmaipadānāṃ pañcānāma adibhūtānāṃ pañcaiva ṇalādaya ādeśā bhavanti, tatsanniyogena ca bruva āhaśabda ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15762: āditaḥ iti kim ? pareṣāṃ mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:15763: bruvaḥ iti punar vacanaṃ sthāny-artham, prasmaipadānām eva hi syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:15774: aḍāṭau kasmān na bhavataḥ, tathā jher jus-ādeśaḥ laṅaḥ śākaṭāyanasya+eva
GS24jvkasipu:15775: (*3,4.111) iti vāntu, yāntu ? vido laṭo vā (*3,4.83) ity ato vā-grahaṇam
GS24jvkasipu:15785: atha vā vā iti vartate, sā ca vyavashita-vibhāṣā //
GS24jvkasipu:15789: loḍ-ādeśasya seḥ hi ity ayam ādeśo bhavati, apic ca bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15798: la-ādeśaḥ chandasi viṣaye hi-śabdo vā apid bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15812: loṭ sambadhinaḥ ekārasya am ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15817: sakāra-vakārābhyām uttarasya loṭ-sambandhina ekārasya yathāsaṅkhyaṃ ca am ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15824: loṭ-sambandhinaḥ uttamapuruṣasya āḍāgamo bhavati, sa ca+uttamapuruṣaḥ pid bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15833: iha kasmān na bhavati, pacāvedam, yajāvedam ? bahiraṅga-lakṣaṇatvād
GS24jvkasipu:15858: āta ai (*3,4.95) ity etad viṣayaṃ varjayitvā eta ai bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15864: yatra kva ca te mano dakṣaṃ dadhasa uttaram /
GS24jvkasipu:15876: prajāpatir udadhiṃ cyāvayāti parasmaipada-grahaṇam, iḍvahimahiḍāṃ mā bhūt
GS24jvkasipu:15879: leṭaḥ iti vā iti ca vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:15880: leṭ-sambhandhina uttamapuruṣasya sakārasya vā lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15888: ṅito lakārasya ya uttamaḥ, tasya nityaṃ sakārasya lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15901: ṅillakāra-sambandhināṃ caturṇām yathāsaṅkhyaṃ tām-ādayaḥ adeśā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:15917: yāsuṭ parasmaipadesu udātto ṅic ca || PS_3,4.103 ||
GS24jvkasipu:15920: parasamaipada-viṣayasay liṅo yāsuḍ-āgamo bhavati, sa ca+udātto bhavati ṅic ca /
GS24jvkasipu:15922: āgama-anudāttatve prāpte, ṅittvaṃ tu liṅa eva vidhīyate, tatra tatkāryāṇāṃ sambhavād, na āgamasya /
GS24jvkasipu:15924: sthanivadbhāvād eva liṅādeśasya ṅittve siddhe yāsuṭo ṅid-vacanaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:15925: jñāpana-artham, lakārāśrayaṅittvam ādeśānāṃ na bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:15930: āśiṣi yo liṅ, tasya yāsuḍāgamo bhavati, sa ca+udāttaḥ kidvad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15933: guṇavṛddhi-pratiṣedhaḥ tulyaḥ, samprasāraṇam, jāgarter guṇe ca viśeṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15941: jhasya liṅ-ādeśasya ran ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15948: liṅādeśasya iaḥ ata ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15953: takārasya itsañjñā-pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti, na vibhaktau tusmāḥ (*1,3.4) iti
GS24jvkasipu:15954: ? na+eva ayam ādeśa-avayavas takāraḥ, kiṃ tarhi, mukhasukha-artha
GS24jvkasipu:15956: āgamasya+iṭo grahaṇaṃ na bhavati, arthavad-grahaṇe nānārthakasya grahaṇam iti //
GS24jvkasipu:15963: tena bhinna-viṣayatvāt suṭā bādhanaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15979: sicaḥ parasya, abhyasta-sañjñakebhyo, vetteś ca+uttarasya jher jus, ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15991: sica ākārāntāc ca parasya jheḥ jus-ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15992: katham ābhyāmānantaryam ? sico luki kṛte pratyayalakṣaṇena sico 'nantaraḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:15998: pūrveṇa+eva sidhddhe niyama-arthaṃ vacanam, āta eva sijlugantāt, na anyasmāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:16000: pratyayalakṣanena jus prāptaḥ pratiṣidhyate, tulyajātīyāpekṣatvān niyamasya /
GS24jvkasipu:16001: śrūyamāne hi sici bhavaty eva, akārṣuḥ, ahārṣuḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:16005: ākārāntād uttarasya laṅādeśasya jheḥ jus ādeśo bhavati śākaṭāyanasya ācāryasya matena /
GS24jvkasipu:16010: atra laṅ eva akārāntād anantaro ṅit sambhavati na anyaḥ, tat kiṃ laṅ-grahaṇena ? evaṃ tarthi laṅ eva yo laṅ vihitaḥ tasya yathā syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:16011: laṅvad-bhāvena yas tasya mā bhūt, loṭo laṅvat (*3,4.85) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:16014: sija-bhyasta-vidibhyaś ca (*3,4.109) ity ayam api jher jus loṭo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16023: dviṣaḥ parasya laṅ-ādeśasya jher jusādeśo bhavati, śākaṭāyanasya ācāryasya matena /
GS24jvkasipu:16028: tiṅaḥ śitaś ca prayayāḥ sārvadhātuka-sañjñā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:16035: sārvadhātuka-pradeśāḥ - sārvadhātuke yak (*3,1.67) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:16038: tiṅaḥ śitaś ca varjayitvā anyaḥ pratyayaḥ śeṣo dhātu-saṃśabdanena vihitaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:16057: nanu ca ekasañjña-adhikārād anyatra samāveśo bhavati ? satyam etat /
GS24jvkasipu:16058: iha tu evakāro 'nuvartate, sa niyamaṃ karisyati //
GS24jvkasipu:16061: āśiṣi viṣaye yo liṅ sa ārdhadhātuka-sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16070: chandasi viṣaye ubhayathā bhavati, sārvadhātukam ārdhadhātukaṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:16071: kiṃ liṅ eva anantaraḥ sambadhyate ? na+etad asti, sarvam eva prakaraṇam
GS24jvkasipu:16078: ktinaḥ sārvadhātukatvād aster bhūbhāvo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16084: vyatyayo bahulam (*3,1.85) ity asya+eva ayaṃ prapñcaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:16085: iti śrījayādityaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau tṛtīyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:16093: ṅīb-ṅīṣ-ṅīnāṃ sāmānyena grahaṇaṃ ṅī iti, ṭāb-ḍāp-cāpām āp iti,
GS24jvkasipu:16094: prātipadikam uktam arthavat, kṛt-taddhita-samāsāś ca (*1,2.46) iti, teṣāṃ
GS24jvkasipu:16096: yady api ca pratyaya-paratvena pāriśeṣyād iyam eva prakṛtir labhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:16098: tat-saṃpratyaya-arthaṃ ṅy-āp-prātipadika-grahaṇaṃ kartavyam, itarathā hi samartha-viśeṣaṇam etat syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:16099: atha ṅy-āp-grahaṇaṃ kim, na prātipadika-grahaṇe liṅga-viśiṣṭasya api grahaṇaṃ bhavati ity eva siddham ? na+etad asti /
GS24jvkasipu:16102: tathā ca yuvā khalati-palita-valina-jaratībhiḥ (*2,1.67) iti jñāpakamasyāstādṛśam eva /
GS24jvkasipu:16103: kiṃ ca tadantāt taddhita-vidhāna-arthaṃ ṅy-āb-grahaṇam, kālitarā,
GS24jvkasipu:16113: saṅkhyākarmādayaś ca svādīnām arthāḥ śāstrāntareṇa vihitās tena saha asya+ekavākyatā /
GS24jvkasipu:16148: yad iti ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ striyām ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:16149: ṅy-āp-prātipadikāt (*4,1.1) iti sarvādhikāre 'pi prātipadika-mātram atra prakaraṇe sambadhyate, ṇy-āpor anena+eva vidhānāt /
GS24jvkasipu:16151: keyaṃ strī nāma ? sāmānya-viśeṣāḥ strītvādayo gotvādaya iva bahuprakārā vyaktayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16152: kvacid āśraya-viśeṣābhāvāt upadeśa-vyaṅgayā eva bhavanti, yathā brāhmaṇatvādayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16154: prakṛtyartha-viśeṣaṇaṃ ca ity ubhayathā api prayujyate, striyām abhidheyāyāṃ striyāṃ vā yat prātipadikaṃ vartate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:16163: ajādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ akārāntāc ca prātipadikāt striyāṃ ṭāp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16175: hal-ṅy-ābbhyo dīrghāt su-ti-sy-apṛktaṃ hal (*6,1.68) iti su-lopaḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:16176: ajādi-grahaṇaṃ tu kvacij jāti-lakṣaṇe ṅīṣi prāpte, kvacit tu puṃyoga-lakṣaṇe, kvacit tu puṣpa-phala-uttaralakṣaṇe, kvacit tu vayo-lakṣaṇe ṅīpi, kvaciṭ ṭillakṣaṇe /
GS24jvkasipu:16177: halantānāṃ tavaprāpta eva kasmiṃścid āb vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:16178: śūdrā ca amahatpūrvā jātiḥ iti paṭhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:16180: śūdra-śabdaṣ ṭāpam utpādayati jātiś ced bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16186: mahāśūdra-śabdo hy ābhīrajātivacanaḥ, tatra tadanta-vidhinā ṭāp prāptaḥ pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:16187: grahaṇavatā prātipadikena tadanta-vidhir na iti kathaṃ tadanta-vidhiḥ ?
GS24jvkasipu:16188: etad eva jñāpakaṃ bhavati asmin prakaraṇe tadanta-vidhiḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:16189: tena atidhīvarī, atipīvarī, atibhavatī, atimahatī iti bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16190: ajā, eḍakā, caṭakā, aśvā, mūsikā iti jātiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16191: bālā, hoḍhā, pākā, vatsā, mandā, vilātā iti vayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16218: ṛ-kārāntebhyo na-kārāntebhyaś ca prātipadikebhyaḥ striyāṃ ṅīp pratyayo bhavati ṅa-kāraḥ sāmānyagrahaṇa-arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16225: ug iti yatra sambhavati yathākathaṃcit tadugic-chābda-rūpaṃ, tadantāt striyāṃ ṅīp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16239: vannantāt prātipadikāt striyāṃ ṅīp pratyayo bhavati, rephaś cāntādeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16244: ṛn-nebhyo ṅīp (*4,1.5) ity eva ṅīpi siddhe tat-sanniyogena
GS24jvkasipu:16252: pādantāt prātipadikād anyatarasyāṃ striyāṃ ṅīp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16261: ṛci vācyāyāṃ pādantāt prātipadikāt striyāṃ ṭāp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16269: ṣaṭ-sañjñākebhyaḥ svasrādibhyaś ca prātipadikebhyaḥ strī-pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16270: yo yataḥ prāpnoti sa sarvaḥ pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:16282: ṣaṭsañjñānāmante lupte ṭābutpattiḥ kasmān na syat /
GS24jvkasipu:16283: pratyāhārāc cāpā siddhaṃ doṣastvittve tasmān na+ubhau //
GS24jvkasipu:16286: mannantāt prātipadikāt ṅīp pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16287: ṛn-nemyo ṅīp (*4,1.5) iti ṅīp prāpto manaḥ iti sūtreṇa pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:16290: aninasmaṅgrahaṇānyarthavatā ca anarthakena ca tadantavidhiṃ prayojayanti /
GS24jvkasipu:16295: annantād bahuvrīheḥ striyāṃ ṅīp pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16300: bahuvrīheḥ iti kim ? atikrāntā rājānam atirājī //
GS24jvkasipu:16303: ḍāp pratyayo bhavati ubhābhyāṃ mannantāt prātipadikāt anantāc ca bahuvrīher anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:16314: anyatarasyāṃ-grahaṇaṃ kimartham ? bahuvrīhau, vano ra ca (*4,1.7) ity asya api vikaopo yathā yāt /
GS24jvkasipu:16321: yad iti ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmo 'nupasarjanāt ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:16325: anupasarjanāt iti kim ? bahukurucarā, bahumadracarā madhurā /
GS24jvkasipu:16329: anupasarjanāt iti kim ? bahukukkuṭā, bahuśūkarā madhurā /
GS24jvkasipu:16330: kathaṃ punar upasarjanāt pratyayaprasṅgaḥ ? tad antavidhinā /
GS24jvkasipu:16331: jñāpitaṃ ca+etad asty atra prakaraṇe tadantavidhiḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:16335: na ca aṇ iti kṛd-grahaṇaṃ, taddhito 'py aṇ asti //
GS24jvkasipu:16340: ṭid-ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ striyāṃ ṅīp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16344: iha kasmān na bhavati, pacamānā, yajamānā ? dvy-anubandhakatvāl laṭaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16347: paṭhitā vidyā iti ? āgamaṭittvam animittaṃ, ṭyuṭyulau tuṭ ca iti liṅgāt /
GS24jvkasipu:16350: niranubandhako ḍha-śabdaḥ striyāṃ na asti iti niranubandhaka-paribhāṣā na pravartate /
GS24jvkasipu:16356: dāṇḍā, mauṣṭā ity atra na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16359: śārṅgarava-ādy-año ṅīn (*4,1.73) iti punar año grahaṇaṃ jātilakṣaṇaṃ ṅīṣaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:16389: yañantāc ca prātipadikāt striyāṃ ṅīp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16393: iha mā bhūt, dvīpād anusamudraṃ yañ (*4,3.10) dvaipyā /
GS24jvkasipu:16398: prācām ācāryāṇāṃ matena yañantāt striyāṃ ṣphaḥ pratyayo bhavati, sa ca taddhita-sañjñaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:16407: āvaṭyāt cāpaṃ vakṣyati, tam api bādhitvā prācāṃ ṣpha eva yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:16413: sarvatra lohitādibhyaḥ kataparyantebhyaḥ yañantebhyaḥ striyāṃ ṣphaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16414: kataśabdaḥ svatantraṃ yat prātipadikaṃ tadavadhitvena parigṛhyate
GS24jvkasipu:16415: kapi-śabdāt paraḥ kapi kata iti , na pratipadikāvayavaḥ kurukateti /
GS24jvkasipu:16418: kaṇvāt tu śakalaḥ pūrvaḥ katād uttara iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:16420: prātipadikeṣv anyathā pāṭhaḥ, sa evaṃ vyavasthāpayitavyaḥ iti manyate /
GS24jvkasipu:16421: katantebhyaḥ iti bahuvrīhi-tatpuruṣayor ekaśeṣaḥ, tathā kaṇvādibhyo gotre
GS24jvkasipu:16423: tatra tatpuruṣa-vṛttyā saṃgṛhīto madhyapātī śakala-śabdo yañantaḥ pratyayadvayam api pratipadyate
GS24jvkasipu:16428: kauravya māṇḍūka ity etābhyāṃ striyāṃ ṣphaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16429: kurvādibhyo ṇye kṛte, ḍhak ca mṇḍūkāt (*4,1.119) ity aṇi ca /
GS24jvkasipu:16433: kathaṃ kauravī senā ? tasya+idaṃ vivakṣāyām aṇi kṛte bhaviṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:16436: śaiṣikeṣv artheṣu iñś ca (*4,2.112) ity aṇi prāpte chapratyaya iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:16441: prathame vayasi yat prātipadikaṃ śrutyā vartate tataḥ striyāṃ ṅīp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16453: kathaṃ kanyā ? kanyāyāḥ kanīna ca (*4,1.116) iti jñāpakāt /
GS24jvkasipu:16457: dvigu-sañjñakāt prātipadikāt striyāṃ ṅīp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16464: aparimāṇa-antāt dvigoḥ bista-ācitakambaly-āntāc ca taddhitaluki sati ṅīp pratyayo na bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:16467: aparimāṇa-antāt tāvat - pañcabhir aśvaiḥ krītā pañcāśvā /
GS24jvkasipu:16485: kāṇḍa-śabda-antāt dvigos taddhitaluki sati kṣetre vācye ṅīp pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16486: dve kaṇḍe pramāṇam asyāḥ kṣetra-bhakteḥ, pramaṇe dvayasaj-daghnañ-mātracaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:16487: (*5,2.37) iti vihitasya taddhitasya pramāṇe lo dvigor nityam iti luki
GS24jvkasipu:16490: kāṇḍa-śabdasya aparimāṇavācitvāt pūrveṇa+eva pratiṣedhe siddhe kṣetre
GS24jvkasipu:16492: iha mā bhūt, dvikāṇḍī rajjuḥ, trikāṇḍī rajjuḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:16497: pramāṇe yaḥ puruṣa-śabdaḥ, tadantād dvigoḥ taddhitaluki sati anyatarasyāṃ na ṅīp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16498: dvau puruṣau pramāṇam asyāḥ parikhāyāḥ dvipuruṣā, dvipuruṣī /
GS24jvkasipu:16500: aparimāṇāntatvān nitye pratiṣedhe prāpte vikalpārthaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:16501: pramāṇe iti kim ? dvābhyāṃ puruṣābhyāṃ krītā dvipuruṣā /
GS24jvkasipu:16508: ūdhas-śabdāntād bahuvrīheḥ striyāṃ ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16509: ūdhaso 'naṅ (*5,4.131) iti samāsānte kṛte ano bahuvrīheḥ (*4,1.12) iti
GS24jvkasipu:16513: bahuvrīheḥ iti kim ? prāptā ūdhaḥ prāptodhāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16514: ana upadhālopino 'nyatarasyām (*4,1.28) ity asya api ṅīpo 'yam uttaratra anuvṛtter bādhaka iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:16516: iha na bhavati, mahodhāḥ parjanyaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:16520: saṅkhyādeḥ avyayādeś ca bahuvrīher ūdhas-śabdāntād ṅīp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16525: ādi-grahaṇaṃ kim ? dvividhodhnī, trividhodhnī ity atra api yathā syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:16530: saṅkhyādeḥ bahuvrīheḥ dāma-śabdāntāt hāyana-śabdāntāt ca striyāṃ ṅīp
GS24jvkasipu:16543: ṇatvam api tricaturbhyām hāyanasya iti vayasya+iva smaryate //
GS24jvkasipu:16547: ann-anto yo bahuvrīhiḥ upadhālopī, tasmād anyatarasyāṃ ṅīp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16549: kimarthaṃ tarhi idam ucyate, nanu siddhā eva ḍāp-pratiṣedhaṅīpaḥ ?
GS24jvkasipu:16554: upadhālopinaḥ iti kim ? suparvā, suparve, suparvāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16559: annantād bahuvrīher upadhā-lopinaḥ sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye chandasi ca nityaṃ ṅīp
GS24jvkasipu:16571: kevala-ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ sañjñāyāṃ, chandasi viṣaye striyāṃ ṅīp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16592: jasviṣayādanyatra sañjñāyāṃ chandasi ca rātri-śabdāt ṅīp pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:16598: kathaṃ timirapaṭalairavaguṇṭhitāś ca ratryaḥ ? ṅīṣayaṃ bahvādi-lakṣaṇaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16599: tatra hi paṭhyate kṛdikārādaktinaḥ, sarvato 'ktinn-arthāt ity eke iti //
GS24jvkasipu:16603: antarvat-pativator nuk bhavati ṅīp ca pratyayaḥ, sa tu nakārāntatvād eva siddhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16606: iha na bhavati, antarasyāṃ śālāyāṃ vidyate /
GS24jvkasipu:16608: antarvat iti matub nipātyate, vatvaṃ siddham /
GS24jvkasipu:16609: pativat iti vatvaṃ nipātyate, matup siddhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16613: garbhiṇyāṃ jīvapatyāṃ ca vā chandasi tu nug-vidhiḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:16620: patiśabdasya nakārādeśaḥ striyāṃ vidhīyate, ṅīp pratyayas tu nakārāntatvād eva siddhaḥ yajñasaṃyoge
GS24jvkasipu:16624: yajñasaṃyoge iti kim ? grāmasya patiriyaṃ brāhmaṇī kathaṃ vṛṣalasya patnī
GS24jvkasipu:16629: pati-śabda-antasya prātipadikasya sapūrvasya anupasarjanasya striyāṃ vibhāṣā nakāra-ādeśo bhavati, ṅīp tu labhyate eva /
GS24jvkasipu:16633: sapūrvasya iti kim ? patiriyaṃ brāhmaṇī grāmasya //
GS24jvkasipu:16636: saptnyādiṣu nityaṃ patyurnakārādeśo bhavati, ṅīp tu labhyate eva /
GS24jvkasipu:16641: samānādiṣv iti vaktavye samānasya sabhāva-arthaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:16651: pūtakratu-śabdasya striyām aikāraścāntādeśo bhavati, ṅīp pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16654: yayā hi pūtāḥ kratavaḥ pūtakratuḥ sā bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:16657: vṛṣākapy-ādīnām udātta aikārādeśo bhavati striyām, ṅīp ca pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16668: manu-śabdāt striyāṃ ṅīp pratyayo bhavati, aukāraścāntādeśaḥ, aikāraśca udāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16678: varṇa-vācinaḥ prātipadikāt anudāttāntāt takāropadhād vā ṅīp pratyayo
GS24jvkasipu:16683: sarve ete ādyudāttāḥ, varṇānāṃ taṇatinitāntānām iti vacanāt /
GS24jvkasipu:16689: topadhāt iti kim ? anyato ṅīṣaṃ vakṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:16704: varṇād anudāttāt iti vartate, topadhāpekṣam anyatvam /
GS24jvkasipu:16705: varṇa-vācinaḥ prātipadikād anudāttāntāt striyāṃ ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16716: ṣidbhyaḥ prātipadikebhyo gaurādibhyaś ca striyām ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16839: mātāmaha-pitāmahayoḥ mātari ṣic ca (*4,2.36) iti ṣittvād eva siddhe
GS24jvkasipu:16840: jñāpana-arthaṃ vacanam, anityaḥ ṣil-lakṣaṇo ṅīṣ iti, tena daṃṣṭrā ity
GS24jvkasipu:16845: jānapada-ādibhya ekādaśabhyaḥ prātipadikebhya ekādaśasu vṛttyādiṣv artheṣu yathāsaṅkhyaṃ ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16862: nāgaśabdo guṇavacanaḥ sthaulye ṅīṣamutpādayati, anyatra guṇa eva ṭāpam /
GS24jvkasipu:16885: śoṇa-śabdāt prācām ācāryāṇāṃ matena striyāṃ ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16890: guṇavacanāt prātipadikād ukārāntāt striyāṃ vā ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16901: ādheyaś ca akriyājaś ca so 'sattvaprakṛtir guṇaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:16904: bahu ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ striyāṃ vā ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16942: bahv-ādibhyaḥ chandasi viṣaye nityaṃ striyāṃ ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16948: chandasi viṣaye striyāṃ bhuvo nityaṃ ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16952: iha kasmān na bhavati, svayambhūḥ ? utaḥ iti taparakaraṇam anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:16958: puṃyogād dhetor yat prātipadikaṃ striyāṃ vartate puṃsa ākhyābhūtaṃ tasmād ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:16963: puṃsi śabdapravṛtti-nimittasya sambhavāt puṃśabdā ete, tadyogāt striyāṃ vartante /
GS24jvkasipu:16968: puṃyogād ete śabdāḥ striyāṃ vartante, na tu pumāṃsamācakṣate /
GS24jvkasipu:16976: indrādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ striyām ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati, ānuk ca āgamaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:16977: yeṣām atra puṃyoga eva iṣyate, teṣām ānugāgamamātraṃ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:17001: vinā puṃyogena svārtha eva ayaṃ vidhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17009: karaṇaṃ pūrvam asminn iti karaṇapūrvaṃ pratipadikam /
GS24jvkasipu:17010: krīta-śabdāntāt prātipadikāt karaṇa-pūrvāt striyāṃ ṅīp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17015: iha kasmān na bhavati, sā hī tasya dhanakrītī prāṇebhyo 'pi garīyasī iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:17018: gatikārakopapadānāṃ kṛdbhiḥ saha samāsavacanaṃ prāk subutpatteḥ iti bahulaṃ taducyate, kartṛkaraṇe kṛtā bahulam (*2,1.32) iti //
GS24jvkasipu:17022: karaṇapūrvāt prātipadikāt ktāntād alpākhyāyāṃ ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavti /
GS24jvkasipu:17031: bahuvrīhir yo 'ntodāttaḥ, tasmāt striyāṃ ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17044: yasya astu kathañcit pāṇir gṛhyate pāṇigṛhītā sā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17058: asvāṅgapūrvapadād antodāttāt ktāntād bahuvrīheḥ striyāṃ vā ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17069: pravṛddhā ca asau vilūnā ca iti /
GS24jvkasipu:17073: bahuvrīheḥ ktāntād antodāttāt iti sarvaṃ nivṛttam /
GS24jvkasipu:17075: svāṅgaṃ yad upasarjanam asaṃyogopadhaṃ tad antāt prātipadikāt striyāṃ vā ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:17087: atatsthaṃ tatra dṛṣṭaṃ cet tena cettattathāyutam //
GS24jvkasipu:17091: bahvaj-lakṣaṇe saṃyogopadha-lakṣaṇe ca pratiṣedhe prāpte vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:17093: nāsikā-ādyantāt prātipadikāt striyāṃ vā ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17114: kroḍādyantāt bahvajantāt prātipadikāt striyāṃ ṅīṣ pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17131: svāṅgāc ca+upasarjanāt iti, nāsika-udara-oṣṭha-jaṅghā-danta-karṇa. śṛggāc ca (*4,1.55) iti ca prāpto ṅīṣ pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:17132: saha nañ vidyamāna evaṃ pūrvāt prātipadikāt striyāṃ ṅīṣ pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17141: nakha-mukhāntāt prātipadikāt sañjñāyām viṣaye striyāṃ ṅīṣ pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17157: svāṅgāc ca+upasarjanāt ity evam ādividhi-pratiṣedha-viṣayaḥ sarvo 'py
GS24jvkasipu:17159: yatra ṅīṣ vihitas tatra tad apavādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17164: iha na bhavati, prāggulphā, prākkroḍā, prāgjaghanā iti //
GS24jvkasipu:17170: bahantāt prātipadikāt striyāṃ ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17175: sakhī aśiśvī ity etau śabdau ṅīṣantau bhāṣāyāṃ nipātyete /
GS24jvkasipu:17177: na asyāḥ śiśur asti iti aśiśvī /
GS24jvkasipu:17178: bhāṣāyām iti kim ? sakhā saptapadī bhava /
GS24jvkasipu:17182: jātivāci yat prātipadikaṃ na ca striyām eva niyatam astrīviṣayam ayakāropadhaṃ ca tasmāt striyāṃ ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17183: ākṛti-grahaṇā jātir liṅgānāṃ ca na sarvabhāk /
GS24jvkasipu:17204: pāka-ādy-uttarapadāt jātivācinaḥ prātipadikāt striyāṃ ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:17205: strī-viṣayatvād eteṣāṃ pūrveṇa aprāptaḥ pratyayo bidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:17213: puṣpa-phala-mūla-uttarapadāt tu yato neṣyate tadajādiṣu paṭhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:17218: ikārāntāt prātipadikāt manuṣyajāti-vācinaḥ striyāṃ ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17226: jāteḥ iti vartamāne punar jāti-grahaṇaṃ yopadhād api yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:17235: ukārāntāt manusyajāti-vācinaḥ prātipadikāt striyām ūṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17251: bāhu-śabdāntāt prātipadikāt sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye striyāṃ ūṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17254: sañjñāyām iti kim ? vṛttau bāhū asyāḥ vṛttabāhuḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:17263: ūru-uttarapadāt prātipadikāt aupamye gamyamāne striyām ūṅ pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:17270: saṃhita śapha lakṣaṇa vāma ity evam ādeḥ prātipadikād ūru-uttarapadāt
GS24jvkasipu:17282: kadru-śabdāt kamaṇḍalu-śabdāc ca chandasi ciṣaye striyāṃ ūṅ pratyayo
GS24jvkasipu:17295: kadru-kamaṇḍalu-śabdābhyāṃ sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye striyām ūṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17303: śārṅgaravādibhyo 'ñantebhyaś ca prātipadikebhyaḥ striyāṃ ṅīn pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17309: tena jāti-lakṣaṇo ṅīṣ anena bādhyate, na puṃyoga-lakṣaṇaḥ, baidasya strī baidī /
GS24jvkasipu:17337: atra yathāyogaṃ ṅībādiṣu prāpteṣu ṅīn vidhīyate //
GS24jvkasipu:17340: yaṅantāt prātipadikāt striyāṃ cāp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17349: ṣāt paro yo yañ tadantāc cāp vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17356: avaṭa-śabdo gargādiḥ, tasmād yañi kṛte ṅīpi prāpte vacanam etat /
GS24jvkasipu:17357: āvaṭyāc ca striyāṃ cāp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17358: āvaṭyā prācāṃ ṣpha eva, sarvatra grahaṇāt /
GS24jvkasipu:17363: āpañcamādhyāyaparisamāpteḥ yānita ūrdhvam anukramisyāmaḥ taddhitasañjñāste veditavyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17366: pṛthivyā ñāñau (*4,1.85), agrādipaścāḍ ḍimac (*4,3.23) ity evam ādi
GS24jvkasipu:17368: taddhita-pradeśāḥ - kṛt-taddhita-samāsāś ca (*1,2.46) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:17371: yuvan-śabdāt prātipadikāt striyāṃ tiḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17375: aṇ-iñor anārṣayor guru-upottamayoḥ ṣyaṅ gotre || PS_4,1.78 ||
GS24jvkasipu:17377: gotre yāv aṇiñau vihitāv anārṣau tadantayoḥ prātipadikayor gurūpottamayoḥ striyāṃ ṣyaṅ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17378: nirdiṣyamānasya ādeśā bhavanti ity aṇiñor eva vijñāyate, na tu samudāyasya
GS24jvkasipu:17383: guru upottamaṃ yasya tad gurūpottamaṃ prātipadikam /
GS24jvkasipu:17396: aṇiñoḥ iti kim ? ṛtabhāgasyāpatyaṃ, badāditvādañ, ārtabhāgī /
GS24jvkasipu:17397: gurūpottamādikaṃ sarvam asti iti na staṇiñau /
GS24jvkasipu:17403: gotre iti kim ? tatra jātāḥ (*4,3.25) - āhicchatrī /
GS24jvkasipu:17409: tato gotre vihitayor aṇiñoḥ striyāṃ ṣyaṅ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17414: yeṣāṃ svanantarāpatye 'pi iṣyate daivadattyā, yājñādattyā iti , te krauḍyādiṣu draṣṭavyāḥ
GS24jvkasipu:17417: krauḍi ity evam ādibhyaś ca striyāṃ ṣyaṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17443: daivayajñi śaucivṛkṣi sātyamugri kāṇṭheviddhi ity eteṣām anyatarasyāṃ ṣyaṅ pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:17444: iñantā ete, gotra-grahaṇaṃ ca na anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:17446: gotre pūrveṇa ṣyaṅādeśaḥ prāpto vikalpyate, agotre tvanantare 'patye pakṣe vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:17447: tena mukte ito manusyajāte (*4,1.65) iti ṅīṣ eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17454: trayam apy adhikriyate samarthānām iti ca, prathamād iti ca, vā iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:17455: svārthika-pratyayāvadhiścāyam adhikāraḥ, prāgdiśo vibhaktiḥ (*5,3.1) iti vāvat /
GS24jvkasipu:17456: svārthikeṣu hy asya+upayogo na asti, vikalpo 'pi tatra anavasthitaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17458: lakṣaṇavākyāni tasya apatyam (*4,1.92), tena raktaṃ rāgāt (*4,2.1) tatra bhavaḥ (*4,3.53) ity evam ādīni bhaviṣyanti /
GS24jvkasipu:17459: teṣu sāmarthye sati prathama-nirdiṣṭād eva vikalpena pratyayo bhavati iti veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:17465: samarthānām iti kim ? kambala upagoḥ, apatyaṃ devadattasya /
GS24jvkasipu:17466: prathamāt iti kim ? ṣaṣṭhyāntād yathā syāt, prathamāntān mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:17467: vā iti kim ? vākyam api yathā syāt upagor apatyam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:17468: yady evaṃ samāsa-vṛttiḥ taddhita-vṛttyā bādhyeta upagvapatyam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:17476: prāg - dīvyatsaṃśabdanād yānita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyamaḥ, aṇ pratyayas tatra
GS24jvkasipu:17478: adhikāraḥ, paribhāṣā, cidhirvā iti triṣv api darśaneṣv apavādaviṣayaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:17484: aśvapatyādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ prāgdīvyatīyeṣv artheṣu aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17504: diti aditi āditya ity etebhyaḥ, patyuttarapadāt ca prātipadikāt
GS24jvkasipu:17541: ajādi-pratyaya-prasaṅge iti kim ? gobhyo hetubhya āgataṃ gorūpyam /
GS24jvkasipu:17546: kathaṃ daiteyaḥ ? diti-śabdāt kṛdikārād aktinaḥ, sarvato 'ktinn-arthād ity eke iti ṅīṣaṃ kṛtvā strībhyo ḍhak kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:17551: utsādibhyaḥ prāgdīvyatīyeṣu artheṣu añ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17585: sacchabdo matubanta āgatanuṅko gṛhyate sattvantu iti /
GS24jvkasipu:17596: chandaś ca+iha vṛttaṃ gṛhyate, na vedaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:17599: dhānyānāṃ bhavane kṣetre khañ (*5,2.1) iti vakṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:17601: prāgbhavanasaṃśabdanād ye 'rthās teṣu strī-śabdāt puṃs-śabdāc ca yathākramaṃ nañsnañau pratyayu bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17610: striyāḥ puṃvat iti jñāpakād vatyarthe na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17611: yoga-apekṣaṃ ca jñāpakam iti strīvad ity api siddham //
GS24jvkasipu:17614: prāgdīvyataḥ iti vartate, na bhavanāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:17616: dvigor yaḥ sambandhī nimittatvena taddhitaḥ prāgdīvyatīyo 'patya-pratyayaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:17625: dvigu-nimittavijñānād iha na bhavati, pañcakapālasya+idaṃ pāñcakapālam /
GS24jvkasipu:17626: atha vā dvigor eva ayaṃ lug vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:17628: nanu ca pratyayādarśanasya+eṣā sañjñā ? satyam etat /
GS24jvkasipu:17629: upacāreṇa tu lakṣaṇayā dvigu-nimitta-bhūtaḥ pratyaya eva dviguḥ, tasya lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17630: dvigu-nimittako 'pi tarhi guṇakalpanayā kasmān na dvigur ucyate
GS24jvkasipu:17631: pājcakapālam iti ? na tasya dvigutvam nimittam /
GS24jvkasipu:17632: itaras tu dvigutvasya+eva nimittam ity asti viśeṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17633: yady evam iha kathaṃ pañcakapālyāṃ saṃskṛtaḥ pañcakapālaḥ iti ? na+eva
GS24jvkasipu:17636: traiśabdyaṃ hi sādhyaṃ, pañcasu kapāleṣu saṃskṛtaḥ, pañcakapālyāṃ saṃskṛtaḥ pañcakapālaḥ iti
GS24jvkasipu:17637: tatra dvayoḥ śabdayoḥ samānārthayor ekena vigrahaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17639: atha+iha kasmān na bhavati, pañcabhyo gargebhya āgataṃ pajcagargarūpayam,
GS24jvkasipu:17640: pañcagargam ayam iti vā ity anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:17646: ity ādinā yeṣāṃ gotrapratyayānāṃ lug uktaḥ, teṣāmajādau prāgdīvyatīye viśayabhūte pratiṣidhyate
GS24jvkasipu:17653: aci iti kim ? gargebhya āgatam gargarūpyam /
GS24jvkasipu:17655: prāgdīvyataḥ ity eva, gargebhyo hi tam gārgīyam /
GS24jvkasipu:17656: gotrasya bahuṣu lopino bahuvacanāntasya pravṛttau dvyekayor aluk /
GS24jvkasipu:17657: bidānām apatyaṃ yuvā, yuvānau baidaḥ, baidau /
GS24jvkasipu:17658: vaida-śabdāt ataḥ iñ kṛte tasya ca iñaḥ ṇya-kṣatriya-ārṣa-ñito yūni
GS24jvkasipu:17660: ekavacana-dvivacana-antasya pravṛttau bahuṣu lopo yūni, baidasya baidayor vā apatyaṃ bahavo māṇavakāḥ bidāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17664: prāg dīvyataḥ iti vartate, aci ca /
GS24jvkasipu:17665: prāgdīvyatīye ajādau pratyaye vivakṣite buddhisthe 'nutpanna eva
GS24jvkasipu:17667: tasman nivṛtte sati yo yataḥ prāpnoti sa tato bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17671: tasya chāatrāḥ iti vivakṣite 'rthe buddhisthe yuva-pratyaysya lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17673: tasmāt iñaś ca (*4,2.112) ity aṇ bhavati, phāṇṭāhṛtāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17675: tasya apatyaṃ yuvā, vṛddhāṭ ṭhak sauvīreṣu bahulam (*4,1.148) iti ṭhak,
GS24jvkasipu:17677: tasya chātrāḥ, pūrvavad yuvapratyaye nivṛtte, iñaś ca (*4,2.112) ity aṇ,
GS24jvkasipu:17680: tasya apatyaṃ yuvā, pheś cha ca (*4,1.149) iti chaḥ, taikāyanīyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17681: tasya chātraḥ, yuva-pratyaye nivṛtte vṛddhāc chaḥ (*4,2.114), taikāyanīyāḥ
GS24jvkasipu:17683: tasya apatyaṃ yuvā, kurvādibhyo ṇyaḥ (*4,1.151), kāpiñjalādyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17684: tasya chātrāḥ, ṇye nivṛtte iñaś ca (*4,2.112) ity aṇ, kāpiñjalādāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17685: glucukasya apatyaṃ, prācām avṛddhāt phin bahulam (*4,1.160) iti glucukāyaniḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17687: tasya chātrāḥ, yuva-pratyaye nivṛtte sa eva aṇ, glaucukāyanāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17690: prāgdīvyataḥ ity eva, bhāgavittikāya hitaṃ bhāgavittikīyam //
GS24jvkasipu:17694: pūrvasūtreṇa nitye luki prāpte vikalpa ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:17695: phakphiñor yuva-pratyayayoḥ prāgdīvyatīye 'jādau pratyaye vivakṣite 'nyatarasyāṃ lug bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:17696: gargādibhyo yañi kṛte yañiñoś ca (*4,1.101) iti phak, gārgyāyaṇaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17699: phiñaḥ khalv api yaskasya apatyaṃ, śivādibhyo 'ṇ (*4,1.112), yāskaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17700: tasya apatyaṃ yuvā, aṇo dvyacaḥ (*4,1.156) iti phiñ, yāskāyaniḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17704: artha-nirdeśo 'yaṃ, pūrvair uttaraiś ca pratyayair abhisambadhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:17705: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt apatyam ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17715: utsargaḥ śeṣa eva asau vṛddhāny asya prayojanam //
GS24jvkasipu:17721: tasman vivakṣite bhedena pratyapatyaṃ pratyayotpatti-prasṅge niyamaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:17722: kriyate, gotre eka eva pratyayo bhavati, sarve 'patyena yujyante /
GS24jvkasipu:17724: yo 'pi vyavahitena janitaḥ, so 'pi prathamaprakṛter apatyaṃ bhavaty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:17727: tatputro 'pi vyavahitena janitaḥ, so 'pi prathamaprakṛter apatyaṃ bhavaty
GS24jvkasipu:17732: sarvasmin vyavahitajanite 'pi gotrāpatye garga-śabdād yañ eva bhavati iti pratyayo niyamyate
GS24jvkasipu:17733: athavā gotrāpatye vivakṣite eka eva śabdaḥ prathamā prakṛtiḥ pratyayam utpādayati iti prakṛtir niyamyate /
GS24jvkasipu:17739: yūny apatye vivakṣite gotrād eva pratyayo bhavati, na paramaprakṛtyanantarayuvabhyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17748: kiṃ punar atra pratiṣidhyate ? yadi niyamaḥ, striyām aniyamaḥ prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:17749: atha yuvapratyayaḥ, striyā gotraprayayena abhidhānaṃ na prāpnoti gora-sañjñāyāḥ yuva-sañjñayā bādhitatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:17753: yūni yad uktaṃ tat striyāṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17754: yuvasañjñā+eva pratiṣidhyate, tena strī gotrapratyayena abhidhāsyate //
GS24jvkasipu:17761: taparakaraṇaṃ kim ? śubhaṃyāḥ, kīlālapāḥ ity ato mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:17762: kathaṃ pradīyatāṃ dāśarathāya maithili ? śeṣavivakṣayā bhaviṣyati //
GS24jvkasipu:17765: bāhu ity evam ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyo 'patye iñ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17816: bāhvādiprabhṛtiṣu yeṣāṃ darśanaṃ gotrabhāve laukike tato 'nyatra teṣāṃ pratiṣedhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17828: sudhātṛ-śabdād apatye iñ pratyayo bhavati, tatsaṃniyogena ca tasya akaṅ adeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17839: gotrasañjñake 'patye vācye kuñjādibhyaḥ cphañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17845: gotre iti kim ? kuñjasya apatyam anantaraṃ kauñjiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17847: bahuvacane tu kauñjāyanāḥ iti, param api ñitsvaraṃ tyaktvā citsvara eva+iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:17865: naḍ ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ gotrāpatye phak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17869: śalaṅku śalaṅkaṃ ca ity atra paṭhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:17874: tat katham ? gotra-viśeṣe kauśike phakaṃ smaranti, iñ eva anyatra śālaṅkiḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:17875: athavā pailādipāṭha eva jñāpakaḥ iño bhāvasya /
GS24jvkasipu:17951: na ca gotrādaparo gotrapratyayo bhavati eko gotre (*4,1.93) iti vacanāt ?
GS24jvkasipu:17953: iha tu gotrādhikāre 'pi sāmarthyād yūni pratyayo vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:17957: yañantāt iñantāc ca prātipadikād apatye phak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17962: dvīpād anusamudraṃ yañ (*4,3.10), sutaṅ-gamādibhya iñ (*4,2.80) ity ato na
GS24jvkasipu:17965: tadantāt tu yūny eva ayaṃ pratyayaḥ, gotrād yūni pratyayo bhavati iti vacanāt //
GS24jvkasipu:17969: śaradvat śunaka darbha ity etebhyo gotrāpatye phak pratyayo bhavati yathāsaṅkhyaṃ bhṛguvatsāgrāyaṇeṣu artheṣu apatya-viśeṣeṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:17981: droṇādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyo gotrāpatye 'nyatarasyāṃ phak pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:17986: katham anantaraḥ aśvatthāmā drauṇāyanaḥ ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:17997: ye punar atra anṛṣi-śabdāḥ putrādayastebhyo 'nantarāpatye eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18000: anṛṣyānantaryasya ayam arthaḥ, anṛṣibhyo 'nantare bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:18001: yady ayam arthaḥ, ṛṣyapatye nairantarya-pratiṣedho na kṛtaḥ syāt ?
GS24jvkasipu:18002: tatra+idaṃ na sidhyati, indrabhūḥ saptamaḥ kāśyapānām /
GS24jvkasipu:18005: ṛṣyapatye nairantaryaviṣaye pratiṣedhe vijñāyamāne kauśiko viśvāmitraḥ iti duṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:18007: nanu ca ṛṣyaṇā bhavitavyam ? bāhvādiḥ ākṛtigaṇaḥ, tena iñ eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18058: tatra katham mānavī prajā ? gotre ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:18060: katham anantaro rāmo jāmadagnyaḥ, vyāsaḥ pārāśaryaḥ iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:18062: anantarāpatyavivakṣāyāṃ tu ṛṣyaṇaiva bhavitavyaṃ jāmadagnaḥ, pārāśaraḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:18154: madhu-śabdād babhru-śabdāc ca gotrāpatye yañ pratyayo bhavati yathāsaṅkhyam brāhmaṇe kauśike vācye /
GS24jvkasipu:18159: babhru-śabdo gargādiṣu paṭhyate, tataḥ siddhe yañi kauśike niyama-arthaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:18166: kapi-bodha-śabdābhyām āṅgirase 'patya-viśeṣe gotre yañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18172: tasya niyamarthaṃ vacanam, āṅgirase yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:18178: vataṇḍa-śabdād āṅgirase 'patyaviśeṣe gotre yañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18181: kim artham idaṃ yāvatā gargādiṣv ayaṃ paṭhyate ? śivādiṣu api ayaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:18184: anāṅgirase tu ubhayatra pāṭhasāmarthyāt pratyayadvayam api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18189: vataṇḍa-śabdād āṅgirasyāṃ striyāṃ yapratyayasya luk bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18200: ye tv atra pratyayāntāḥ paṭhyante tebhyaḥ sāmārthyād yūni pratyayo vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:18273: bharga-śabdād apatye viśeṣe traigarte gotre phañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18287: gaṅgā-śabdaḥ paṭhyate tikādiphiñā śumrādiḍhakā ca samāveśa-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:18364: vṛddhir yasya acām ādis tad vṛddham (*1,1.73) /
GS24jvkasipu:18365: avṛddhābhyaḥ iti śabda-dharmaḥ, nadī-mānuṣībhyaḥ iti arthadharmaḥ, tena abhedāt prakṛtayo nirdiśyante /
GS24jvkasipu:18367: avṛddhāni yāni nadīnāṃ mānuṣīṇāṃ ca nāmadheyāni, tebhyo 'patye aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18373: mānuṣībhyaḥ khalv api - śikṣitāyāḥ apatyaṃ śaikṣitaḥ /
