GS24jvkasipu:18375: avṛddhābhyaḥ iti kim ? candrabhāgāyāḥ apatyaṃ cāndrabhāgeyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:18386: atryādibhyas tu paratvāḍ ḍhagādibhir eva bhavitavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:18395: kathaṃ punar nityānāṃ śabdānāmandhakādivaṃśasamāśrayeṇa anvākhyānaṃ yujyate ? kecid āhuḥ katham api kākatālīyanyāyena kurvādivaṃśeṣvasaṃkareṇa+eva nakulasahadevādayaḥ śabdāḥ subahavaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:18396: saṅkalitāḥ, tānupādāya pāṇininā smṛtir upanibaddhā iti /
GS24jvkasipu:18397: athavāndhakavṛṣṇikuruvaṃśā api nityā eva, teṣu ye śabdāḥ prayujyante
GS24jvkasipu:18401: matṛ-śabdāt saṅkhyā-pūrvāt saṃ-pūrvāt bhadra-pūrvāc ca apatye aṇ pratyayo
GS24jvkasipu:18407: ukāra-adeśa-arthaṃ vacanaṃ, pratyayaḥ punar utsargeṇa+eva siddhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:18408: strīliṅga-nirdeśo 'rtha-apekṣaḥ, tena dhānyamātur grahaṇaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18419: vikarṇ-aśuṅga-chaṅgala-śabdebhyaḥ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ vatsabharadvājātriṣu apatya-viśeṣeṣu aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18426: śuṅgā-śabdaṃ strīliṅga-manye paṭhanti, tato ḍhakaṃ pratyudāharanti
GS24jvkasipu:18428: dvayam api ca+etat pramāṇam, ubhayathā sūtra-praṇayanāt //
GS24jvkasipu:18431: tannāmikāṇo bādhake dvyaca iti ḍhaki prāpte aṇ pratyayaḥ pakṣe vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:18432: pīlāyāḥ apatye vā aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18446: strīpratyaya-vijñāpanād asatyartha-grahaṇe iha na bhavati, iḍabiḍo 'patyam
GS24jvkasipu:18458: dvyacaḥ strī-pratyayāntād apatye ḍhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18467: ikārāntāt prātipadikād aniñ-antād apatye ḍhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18474: dvyacaḥ ity eva, marīcer aptyaṃ mārīcaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:18477: śubhra ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ ḍhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18482: pāṇḍaveyaḥ ity evam ādi siddhaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18544: vikarṇa-śabdāt kuṣītaka-śabdāc ca kāṣyape 'patya-viśeṣe ḍhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18551: bhrūśabdādaptye ḍhak pratyayo bhavati, tatsanniyogena ca vugāgamaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:18555: kalyāṇī ity evam ādīnāṃ śabdānām apatye ḍhak pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:18579: kulaṭāyāḥ apatye ḍhak pratyayo bhavati, tatsanniyogena ca vā inaṅ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18580: ādeśa-arthaṃ vacanaṃ, pratyayaś ca pūrveṇa+eva siddhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:18582: yā tu kulānyaṭantī śīlaṃ bhinatti, tataḥ kṣudrābhyo vā (*4,1.131) iti paratvāḍ ḍhrakā bhavitavyam
GS24jvkasipu:18596: śubhrādiṣv ayaṃ paṭhyate, tena gaudheyaḥ api bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:18599: godhāyāḥ apatye udīcām ācāryāṇāṃ matena ārak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18601: ācārya-grahaṇaṃ pūja-arthaṃ, vacanasāmrthyād eva pūrveṇa samāveśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18602: ārag-vacanam anarthakaṃ, rakā siddhatvāt ? jñāpakaṃ tvayam anyebhyo 'pi
GS24jvkasipu:18611: kṣudrābhyo vā apatye dṛak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18621: pitṛṣVasuḥ apatya-pratyaye ḍhaki parato lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18623: kathaṃ punar iha ḍhak pratyayaḥ ? etad eva jñāpakaṃ ḍhako bhāvasya //
GS24jvkasipu:18627: pitṛṣvasur yad uktaṃ tan mātṛṣvasur api bhavati, chanṇ-pratyayo ḍhaki lopaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:18670: uttara-sūtre pūrva-pratiṣedhād iha tadantaḥ kevalaś ca dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:18671: kula-śabda-antāt prātipadikāt kevalāc ca apatye khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18680: apūrvapadāt kula-śabdāt anyatarasyāṃ yat ḍhakañ ity etau pratyayau
GS24jvkasipu:18684: pada-grahaṇaṃ kim ? bahucpūrvād api yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:18714: bhrātṛ-śabdād vyan pratyayo bhavati samudāyena ca+idam itraḥ sapatna ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:18720: revatī ity evam ādibhyo 'patye ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18736: gotraṃ yā strī tadabhidhāyinaḥ śabdād apatye ṇaḥ pratyayo bhavati, cakārāṭ ṭhak ca, kutsane gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:18748: vṛddhāt sauvīragotrād apatye bahulaṃ ṭhak pratyayo bhavati kutsane gamyamane /
GS24jvkasipu:18757: tṛtīyas tvākaśāpeyo gotrāṭ ṭhag bahulaṃ tataḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:18762: gotrastriyāḥ ity ārabhya catvāro yogās teṣu prathamaḥ kutsana eva, antyaḥ sauvīragotra eva, madhyamau dvayor api /
GS24jvkasipu:18766: kutsane ity eva, sauvīreṣu iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:18767: pheḥ iti phiño grahaṇaṃ na phinaḥ, vṛddha-adhikārāt /
GS24jvkasipu:18768: phiñantāt prātipadikāt sauvīragotrād apatye chaḥ pratyayo bhavati, cakārāṭ
GS24jvkasipu:18773: phiñantād autsargikasya aṇa āgatasya ṇya-kṣatriya-arṣa-ñito yūni lug aṇ-iñoḥ (*2,4.58) iti luk /
GS24jvkasipu:18775: yamundaś ca suyāmā ca vārṣyāyaṇiḥ phiñaḥ smṛtāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:18776: sauvīreṣu ca kutsāyāṃ dvau yogau śabdavit samaret //
GS24jvkasipu:18781: phāṇṭāhṛtimimataśabdābhyāṃ sauvīra-viṣayābhyām apatye ṇa-phiñau pratyayu bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:18783: alpāctarasya apūrvanipāto lakṣaṇa-vyabhicāra-cihnaṃ, tena yathāsaṅkhyam iha na bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:18793: kuru ity evam ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyo 'patye ṇyaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18799: tasya bahuṣu lukā bhavitavyam, ayaṃ tu śrūyata eva /
GS24jvkasipu:18801: kauravyaśabdasya kṣatriya-vacanasya tikādiṣu pāṭhāt phiñ api bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:18805: kāriṇas tu rathakāra-śabdād uttarasūtreṇa+eva ṇyaḥ siddhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:18809: katham bhāṣāyāṃ vainyo rājā iti ? chandasa eva ayaṃ pramādāt kavibhiḥ prayuktaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:18810: vāmaratha-śabdaḥ paṭhyate, tasya kaṇvādivat kāryam iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:18818: svaras tu ṇyapratyayasya+eva bhavati, na atideśikamādyudāttatvam /
GS24jvkasipu:18861: senāntāt prātipadikāt lakṣaṇa-śabdāt kāri-vacanebhyaś ca apatye ṇyaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:18873: senānta-lakṣaṇa-kāribhyo 'patye iñ pratyayo bhavati udīcāṃ matena /
GS24jvkasipu:18881: takṣan-śabdaḥ śivādiḥ, tena aṇā ayam iñ bādhyate, na tu ṇyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:18885: tika ity evam ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyo 'patye phiñ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18888: vṛṣa-śabdo 'tra paṭhyate, tasya pratyaya-sanniyogena yakārantatvam iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:18890: kauravya-śabdaḥ paṭhyate, sa ca kṣatraya-vacanaḥ, aurasa-śabdena
GS24jvkasipu:18892: yas tu kurv-ādihyo ṇyaḥ (*4,1.151) , tadantād iñaiva bhavitavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:18893: tathā ca ṇyakṣatriyārṣañito yūni lugaṇiñoḥ (*2,4.58) ity atra udāhṛtaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:18940: paramaprakṛter eva ayaṃ pratayayaḥ iṣyate, kauśalasya apatyaṃ, karmārasya patyam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:18942: yathā ca smṛtyantaram, dagukosalakarmāracchāgavṛṣāṇāṃ yuṭ vādiṣṭasya iti /
GS24jvkasipu:18950: aṇantād dvyacaḥ prātipadikād apatye phiñ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18963: vṛddhaṃ yacchabda-rūpam agotraṃ, tasmād apatye phiñ pratyayo bhavati udīcām ācāryāṇāṃ matena
GS24jvkasipu:18966: kāriśabdād api vṛddhād agotrāt paratvād anena+eva bhavitavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:18973: vākina ity evam ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyo 'patye phiñ pratyayo bhavati, tat saṃniyogena ca+eṣāṃ kug-āgamaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:18974: yadiha vṛddham agotraṃ śabdarūpaṃ tasya āgama-artham eva grahaṇam, anyeṣām
GS24jvkasipu:18979: udīcām ity adhikārāt pakṣe te 'pi bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:18991: putrāntam agotram iti pūrveṇa+eva pratyayḥ siddhaḥ, tasminn anena kug-āgamo 'nyatarasyāṃ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:18992: putrāntāt prātipdikāt yaḥ phiñ pratyayḥ, tasmin parabhūte 'nyatarasyāṃ
GS24jvkasipu:18999: avṛddhāc chabdarūpād apatye phin pratyayo bhavati bahulaṃ prācāṃ matena /
GS24jvkasipu:19004: udīcāṃ prācām anyatarasyāṃ bahulam iti sarva ete vikalpa-arthas teṣām
GS24jvkasipu:19010: manor jātāv añ-ayatau ṣuk ca || PS_4,1.161 ||
GS24jvkasipu:19012: manu-śabdād añ yat ity etau pratyau bhavataḥ, tat sanniyogena ṣug-āgamaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:19017: tathā ca mānuṣāḥ iti bahuṣu na lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19020: apatye kutsite mūḍhe manor autsargikaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19021: nakārasya ca mūrdhanyas tena sidhyati māṇavaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:19024: pautraprabhṛti yad apatyaṃ tad gotra-sañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19025: sambandhi-śabdatvād apatya-śabdasya yad apatyaṃ tad apekṣayā
GS24jvkasipu:19030: pautra-prabhṛti iti kim ? anyasya mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:19033: gotra-pradeśāḥ - eko gotre (*4,1.93) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:19038: tasmin jīvati sati pautraprabhṛty-apatyaṃ yuva-sañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19039: pautraprabhṛti iti ca na sāmānāadhikaraṇyena apatyaṃ viśeṣayati, kiṃ
GS24jvkasipu:19040: tarhi, ṣaṣṭhyā vipariṇamyate pautra-prabhṛter yad apatyam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:19048: bhratari jyayasi jīvati kanīyān bhrātā yuva-sañjño bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:19050: gārgyasya dvau putrau, tayoḥ kanīyān mṛte pitrādau vaṃśye bhrātari jyāyasi jīvati yuva-sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19055: gārgye jīvati, gārgyāyaṇo asya kanīyān bhrātā /
GS24jvkasipu:19059: vā anyasmin sapiṇḍe sthaviratare jivati || PS_4,1.165 ||
GS24jvkasipu:19062: yeṣām ubhayatra daśāhāni kulasyannaṃ na bhujyate ity evam ādikāyāṃ kriyāyām anadhikāraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19063: bhrātur anyasmin sapiṇḍe sthaviratare jīvati pautraprabhṛter apatyaṃ jīvadeva yuvasañjñam vā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19064: prakṛtaṃ jīvati-grahaṇaṃ sapiṇḍasya viśeṣaṇam, idaṃ tu sañjñinaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19066: sthānena vayasā ca+utkṛṣṭe yathā syāt pitṛvye pitāmahe bhrātari vayasādhike jivati /
GS24jvkasipu:19070: sthaviratare iti kim ? sthānavayonayūne gārgya eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19071: jīvati iti kim ? mṛte mṛto vā gārgya eva bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:19074: apatyam antarhitaṃ vṛddham iti śāstrāntare paribhāṣaṇād gotraṃ vṛddham ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:19075: vṛddhasya yuvasañjñā vā bhavati pūjāyāṃ gamyamānāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:19077: vṛddhasya iti ṣaṣṭhī-nirdeśo vicitrā sūtrasya kṛtiḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:19085: kutsāyāṃ gamyamanāyāṃ yūno vā yuvasañjñā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19096: janapadaśabdo yaḥ kṣatriya-vācī, tasmād apatye añ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19099: janapadaśabdāt iti kim ? druhyor apatyaṃ drauhyavaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19101: kṣatriyāt iti kim ? brāhmaṇasya pañcālasya apatyaṃ pāñcāliḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19110: janapadaśabdāv etau kṣatriyābhidhāyinau tābhyām añapavāde vṛddhād iti ñyaṅi prāte punar añ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:19113: tasya rājani ity eva, sālveyo rājā /
GS24jvkasipu:19117: janapadaśabdāt kṣatriyābhidhāyino dvy-acaḥ, magadha kaliṅga sūramasa iti etebhyaś ca apatye aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19125: tasya rājani ity eva, āṅgo rājā //
GS24jvkasipu:19129: vṛddhāt prātipadikāt ikārāntāt ca, kosala-ajāda-śabdābhyāṃ ca aptya ñyaṅ
GS24jvkasipu:19139: taparakaranam kim ? kumārī nāma janapadasamānaśabdaḥ kṣatriyaḥ, tasya apatyaṃ kaumāraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19143: tasya rājani ity eva, āmbaṣṭhyo rājā /
GS24jvkasipu:19151: kuruśabdāt nādibhyaś ca prātipadikebhyo ṇyaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19156: tasya rājani ity eva, kauravyo rājā //
GS24jvkasipu:19160: salvā nāma akṣatriyā tannāmikā, tasyā apatyaṃ, dvyacaḥ (*4,2.121) iti
GS24jvkasipu:19164: tad avyavā udumbarādayaḥ, tebhyaḥ kṣatriya-vṛttibhya idaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:19166: sālvāvayavebhyaḥ pratyagratha-kalakūṭa-aśmaka-śabdebhyaś cāpatye iñ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19177: tasya rājani ity eva, audumbarī rājā /
GS24jvkasipu:19182: janpadaśabdāt kṣatriyād añ (*4,1.168) ity evam ādayaḥ pratyayāḥ sarvanāmnā pratyavamṛśyante, na tu pūrve, gotrayuvasañjñākānḍena vyavahitatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:19185: tadrājapradeśāḥ - tadrājasya bahuṣu tena+eva astriyām (*2,4.62) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:19188: janapadaśabdāt kṣatriyāt ity anena vihitasya año lug ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:19196: tasya rājani ity eva, kambojo rājā //
GS24jvkasipu:19199: avanti-kunti-kuru-śabdebhya utpannasya tadrājasya stiryām abhidheyāyāṃ lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19210: akāra-pratyayasya tadrājasya striyām abhidheyāyām lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19215: avantyādibhyo lugvacanāt tadantavidhiratra nāsti, teneha na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:19220: prācyebhyaḥ bhargādibhyaḥ yaudheyādibhyaś ca utpannasya lugna bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19221: ataś ca (*4,1.177) ity anena striyāṃ luk prāptaḥ pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:19233: kasya punar akārasya pratyayasya yaudheyādibhyo luk prāptaḥ pratiṣidhyate ? pāñcamikasyañaḥ, parśvādiyaudheyādibhyām anañau ity etasya /
GS24jvkasipu:19234: kathaṃ punas tasya bhinnaprakaraṇasthasya anena luk prāpnoti ? etad eva vijñāpayati pāścamikasya api tadrājasya ataś ca ity anena lug bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:19235: kim etasya jñāpanena prayojanam ? parśvādyāṇaḥ striyāṃ luk siddho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19239: tathā ca+uktaṃ yaudheyādi-pratiṣedho jñāpakaḥ parśvādyaṇo luk iti /
GS24jvkasipu:19259: iti śrījayādityaviracitāyām kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau caturthādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:19265: tena iti tṛtīyāsamarthād rāgaviśeṣa-vācinaḥ śabdād raktam ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitam pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19269: rāgāt iti kim ? devadattena raktaṃ vastram /
GS24jvkasipu:19270: kathaṃ kāṣāyau gardabhasya karṇau, hāridrau kukkuṭasya padau iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:19271: upamānād bhaviṣyati, kāṣāyau iva kāṣāyau, hāridrāv iva hāridrau /
GS24jvkasipu:19276: lākṣādibhyo rāgavacanebhyas tṛtīyāsamarthebhyo raktam ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:19295: tena iti tṛtīyāsamarthād nakṣatraviśeṣa-vācinaḥ śabdād yuktaḥ ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19298: kathaṃ punar nakṣatreṇa puṣyādinā kālo yujyate ? puṣyādi-samīpasthe
GS24jvkasipu:19299: candramasi vartamānāḥ puṣyādi-śabdāḥ pratyayamutpādayanti puṣyeṇa yuktaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:19306: nakṣatreṇa iti kim ? candramasā yuktā rātriḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19307: kālaḥ iti kim ? puṣyeṇa yuktaś candramāḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:19310: pūrveṇa vihitasya pratyayasya lub bhavati aviśeṣe /
GS24jvkasipu:19312: yāvan kāle nakṣatreṇa yujyate ahorātraḥ, tasya aviśeṣe lub bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19319: aviśeṣe lup vihitaḥ pūrveṇa, viśeṣa-artho 'yam ārambhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19320: śravana-śabdād aśvattha-śabdāc ca+utpannasya pratyayasya lub bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:19324: lupi yuktavad-bhāvaḥ kasmān na bhavati ? nipātanāt vibhāṣā phālgunī-śravaṇā-kārtikī-caitrībhyaḥ (*4,2.23) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:19325: sañjñāyām iti kim ? śrāvaṇī, āśvatthī rātriḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:19328: nakṣatradvandvāt tṛtīyāsamarthād yukte kāle chaḥ pratyayo bhavati, viśeṣe ca aviśeṣe ca /
GS24jvkasipu:19336: tena iti tṛtīyāsamarthād dṛṣṭaṃ sāma ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati, yad dṛṣṭaṃ sāma cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19342: kali-śabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthād dṛṣṭaṃ sāma ity etasminn arthe ḍhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19347: evam agnau bhavam, agner āgatam, agneḥ svam iti sarvatra ḍhag eva bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:19350: dṛṣṭe sāmani aṇ vā ḍid bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:19352: jāte ca arthe yo 'nyena bādhitaḥ punar aṇ vidhīyate sa vā ḍid bhavati iti
GS24jvkasipu:19355: iti punar vidhiyate sa vā ḍid bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:19370: dṛṣṭe sāmani jāte ca dviraṇ ḍidvā vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:19374: vāmadeva-śabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthāt dṛṣṭaṃ sāma ity etasminn arthe ḍyat ḍya ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19378: ḍitkaraṇaṃ kim artham ? ya-yatoś ca atadarthe (*6,2.156) iti naña uttarasya antodāttatve vidhīyamāne 'nyor grahaṇaṃ mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:19382: siddhe yasya+iti lopena kimarthaṃ yayatau ḍitau /
GS24jvkasipu:19386: tena iti tṛtīyāsamarthāt parivṛtaḥ ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati, yo 'sau parivṛtaḥ rathaś cet sa bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19390: rathaḥ iti kim ? vastreṇa parivṛtaḥ kāyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19392: yasya kaścid avayavo vastrādibhir aveṣṭitaḥ, tatra na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19396: pāṇḍukambala-śabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthāt parivṛto rathaḥ ity etasminn arthe
GS24jvkasipu:19404: dvīpi-vyāghrayor vikarabhūte carmaṇo dvaipa-vaiyāghre, tābhyāṃ tṛtīyāsamarthābhyāṃ parivṛto rathaḥ ity etasminn arthe añ pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:19414: apūrvapatiṃ kumārīṃ patir upapannaḥ kaumāraḥ patiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19416: apūrvapatiḥ kumārī patim upapannā kaumārī bhāryā /
GS24jvkasipu:19419: apūrvatvaṃ yadā tasyāḥ kumāryāṃ bhavati iti vā //
GS24jvkasipu:19420: kumāryāṃ bhavaḥ kaumāraḥ patiḥ, tasya strī kaumārī bhāryā iti siddham //
GS24jvkasipu:19423: tatra iti saptamīsamarthād amatra-vācinaḥ śabdād uddhṛtam ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19424: bhuktocchiṣṭam uddhṛtam ucyate, yasya+uddharaṇam iti prasiddhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19430: tatra iti saptamī samarthavibhaktiḥ kṣīrāḍ ḍhañ (*4,2.20) iti yāvad anuvartate //
GS24jvkasipu:19438: vrate iti kim ? sthāṇḍile śete brahmadattaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:19441: tatra iti saptamīsamarthāt saṃskṛtam ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati, yat saṃskṛtaṃ bhakṣāḥ cet te bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:19447: bhakṣāḥ iti kim ? puṣpapuṭe saṃskṛto mālāguṇaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:19450: śūla-śabdād ukhā-śabdāc ca saptamīsamarthāt saṃskṛtaṃ bhakṣāḥ ity etasminn
GS24jvkasipu:19457: dadhi-śabdāt saptamīsamarthāt saṃskṛtaṃ bhakṣāḥ ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19459: nanu ca saṃskṛta-arthe prāgvahateḥ ṭhakaṃ vakṣyati, tena+eva siddham ? na sidhyati /
GS24jvkasipu:19460: dadhnā hi tat saṃskṛtaṃ yasya dadhikṛtam eva+utkarṣādhānam, iha tu dadhi
GS24jvkasipu:19464: udaśvic-chabdāt saptamīsamarthāt saṃskṛtaṃ bhakṣāḥ it yetasminn arthe
GS24jvkasipu:19465: anyatarasyāṃ ṭhak pratyayo bhavati, pakṣe yathāprāptamaṇ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19469: kṣīra-śabdāt saptamīsamarthāt saṃskṛtaṃ bhakṣāḥ ity etasminn arthe ḍhañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19474: sā iti prathamāsamarthād asminn iti saptamy-arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati, yat tat prathamāsamarthaṃ paurṇamāsī ced bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19476: sañjñāyām iti samudāyopādhiḥ, pratyayāntena cet sañjñā gamyate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:19481: iha na bhavati, pauṣī paurṇamāsī asmin daśarātre iti /
GS24jvkasipu:19483: itikaraṇasya sañjñāśabdasya ca tulyam eva phalaṃ prayoga-anusaraṇaṃ, tatra kimarthaṃ dvayam upādīyate ? sañjñāśabdena tulyatām iti karaṇasya
GS24jvkasipu:19484: jñāpayituṃ, na hy ayaṃ loke tathā prasiddhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19485: sañjñārthatve tu samprati jñāpite yat tatra tatra+ucyate itikaraṇas tataś ced vivakṣā iti tadupapannaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19488: athavā pūrṇo māḥ pūrṇamāḥ, pūrṇamāsa iyaṃ paurṇamāsī /
GS24jvkasipu:19492: sā asmin paurṇamāsī iti sarvam anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:19493: āgrahāyaṇī-śabdād aśvattha-śabdāc ca prathamasamarthāt paurṇamāsy-upādhikād asminn iti saptamyarthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19499: phalguny-ādayaḥ paurṇamāsī-śabdāḥ tebhyo vibhāṣā ṭhak pratyayo bhavati, sā
GS24jvkasipu:19500: 'smin paurṇamāsī iti sajñāyām (*4,2.21) ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:19501: nityam aṇi prāpte pakṣe ṭhag vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:19508: sā iti prathamāsamarthād asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati, yat prathamāsamarthaṃ devatā cet sā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19509: yāgasaṃpradānaṃ devatā, deyasya puroḍāśādeḥ svāminī, tasminn abhidheye pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19514: devatā iti kim ? kanyā devatā asya /
GS24jvkasipu:19515: katham aindro mantraḥ ? mantrastutyam api devatā ity upacaranti /
GS24jvkasipu:19516: katham āgneyo vai brāhmaṇo devatā iti ? upamānād bhaviṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:19517: mahārājaproṣṭhapadāṭ ṭhañ (*4,2.35) iti yāvat sā 'sya devatā ity adhikāraḥ
GS24jvkasipu:19518: sā iti prakṛte punaḥ samartha-vibhakti nirdeśaḥ sañjñā-nivṛtty-arthaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:19521: ka-śabdo devatāyāṃ prajāpater vācakaḥ, tataḥ pūrvena+eva aṇ pratyayaḥ siddhaḥ, i-kārādeśa-artham vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:19527: śukra-śabdāt sā 'sya devatā ity asinnn arthe ghan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19533: aponaptṛ apāṃnaptṛ ity etābhyāṃ ghaḥ pratyayo bhavati sā 'sya devatā ity asmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:19536: aponapād apāṃnapād iti devatāyā nāmadheye ete /
GS24jvkasipu:19537: tayos tu patyayasanniyogena rūpam idaṃ nipatyate //
GS24jvkasipu:19540: aponaptṛ apāṃnaptṛ ity etābhyāṃ cha-kāraḥ pratyayo bhavati sā asya devatā iti yasmin viṣaye
GS24jvkasipu:19551: mahendra-śabdāt ghāṇau pratyayau bhavataḥ, cakārāc chaś ca, sā 'sya devatā ity asmin viṣaye
GS24jvkasipu:19552: mahendro devatā asya mahendriyam haviḥ, māhendram, mahendrīyam //
GS24jvkasipu:19555: soma-śabdāt ṭyaṇ pratyayo bhavati sā 'sya devatā ity asmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:19564: vāyv-ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ yat pratyayo bhavat sā 'sya devatā ity etasmin
GS24jvkasipu:19573: dyāvāpṛthivy-ādibbhyaḥ chaḥ pratyayo bhavati sā 'sya devatā ity asmin
GS24jvkasipu:19576: dyauś ca pṛthivī ca dyāvāpṛthivyau devate asya dyāvāpṛthivīyam,
GS24jvkasipu:19578: śunaś ca sīraś ca tau devate asya iti śunāsīrīyam, śaunāsīryam /
GS24jvkasipu:19587: agni-śabdād ḍhak pratyayo bhavati sā+asya devatā ity asmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:19593: kālaviśeṣa-vācibhyaḥ śabdebhyo bhavavat pratyayā bhavanti sā 'sya devatā ity asmin viṣaye
GS24jvkasipu:19594: kālāṭ ṭhañ (*4,3.11) iti prakaraṇe bhave pratyayā vidhāsyante te sā 'sya
GS24jvkasipu:19595: devatā ity asmin arthe tathā+eva+iṣyante, tadartham idam ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:19609: mahārāja-śabdāt proṣṭhapada-śabdāc ca ṭhañ prayayo bhavati sā 'sya devatā ity asmin viṣaye
GS24jvkasipu:19612: ṭhañ-prakaraṇe tadasmin vartata iti navayajñādibhya upasaṅkhyānam /
GS24jvkasipu:19620: samarthavibhaktiḥ, pratyayaḥ, pratyayārtho 'nubandhaḥ iti sarvaṃ nipātanād
GS24jvkasipu:19622: pitṛmātṛbhyāṃ bhrātaryabhidheye vyat ḍulac ity etau pratyayu nipātyete /
GS24jvkasipu:19626: tābhyām eva pitari ḍāmahac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19640: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt samūhaḥ ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19641: kim iha+udāharaṇam ? cittavadadyudāttamagotraṃ yasya ca na anyat pratipadaṃ grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:19642: acittāt ṭhakaṃ vakṣyati, anudāttāderañ (*4,2.44), gotrād vuñ, pratipadaṃ ca kedārād yañca (*4,2.40) ity evam ādi, tatparihāreṇa atra+udāharaṇaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:19658: bhikṣā ity evam ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyo 'ṇ pratyayo bhavati tasya samūhaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye
GS24jvkasipu:19661: gārbhiṇam yuvati-śabdo 'tra paṭhyate, tasya grahaṇa-sāmarthyād pumbadbhāvo na bhavati bhasyāḍhe taddhite (*6,3.35) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:19679: gotrādibhyo vuñ pratyayo bhavati tasya samūhaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:19680: apatya-adhikārād anyatra laukikaṃ gotraṃ gṛhyate 'patyamātraṃ, na tu pautraprabhṛtyeva
GS24jvkasipu:19692: prakṛtyā 'ke rājanyamanuṣyayuvānaḥ iti yalopo na bhavati, āpatyasay ca taddhite 'nāti (*6,4.151) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:19697: kedāra-śabdād yañ pratyayo bhavati, ca-kārād vuñ ca, tasya samūhaḥ ity
GS24jvkasipu:19705: kavacin śabdāt ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati tasya samūhaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:19711: brāhmaṇādibhyaḥ śabdebhyo yan pratyayo bhavati tasya samūhaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:19729: grāmādibhyaḥ tal pratyayo bhavati tasya samūhaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:19738: anudāttādeḥ śabdād añ pratyayo bhavati tasya samūhaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:19744: khaṇdikā ity evam ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyo 'ñ pratyayo bhavati tasya samūhaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye
GS24jvkasipu:19749: kṣudrakāś ca mālavāś ca iti kṣatriya-dvandvaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19750: tataḥ pūrveṇa+eva añi siddhe vacanaṃ gotravuñ bādhana-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:19751: nanu ca paratvādañā vuñ bādhiṣyate, na ca gotrasamudāyo gotraṃ, na ca tadantavidhir atra asti ? evaṃ tarhi etaj jñāpayati vuñi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ, samūhikeṣu ca tadantavidhir asti iti /
GS24jvkasipu:19752: pratyojanam aupagavakaṃ kāpaṭavakam iti vuñ bhavati, vānahastikaṃ gaudhenukam iti ca tadantavidhiḥ
GS24jvkasipu:19753: kṣudrakamālavāt ity etāvatā yogavibhāgena pūrvaviprateṣedhas tadantavidhiś ca jñāpitaḥ, punar asyaa+eva niyamārtham ucyate senāsañjñāyām iti /
GS24jvkasipu:19758: gotrād vuñ na ca tadgotraṃ tadantān na ca sarvataḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:19759: jñāpakaṃ syāt tadantatve tathā ca api śalier vidhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19760: senāyāṃ niyama-arthaṃ ca yathā badhyeta cāñ vuñā //
GS24jvkasipu:19776: gotracaraṇād vuñ ity ārabhya pratyayā vakṣyante, tatra ced amucyate
GS24jvkasipu:19777: caraṇād dharmāmnāyayoḥ iti, tena dharmavat ity atideśaḥ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:19791: acitta-arthebhyo hasti-dhenu-śabdābhyāṃ ca ṭhak pratyayo bhavati tasya samūhaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:19801: keśa aśva ity etyābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ yañ cha ity etau pratyayau bhavato 'nyatarasyāṃ tasya samūhaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:19806: pāśadibhyaḥ yaḥ pratyayo bhavati tasya samūhaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:19824: khala-go-ratha-śabdebhyaḥ yaḥ pratyaya bhavat tasya samūhaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:19831: khala-go-ratha-śabdebhyo yathāsaṅkhyam ini tra kaṭyac ity ete pratyayā bhavanti tasya samūhaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:19863: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthād viṣayaḥ ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo
GS24jvkasipu:19864: bhavati, yo 'sau viṣayaḥ deśaś cet sa bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19866: kvacid grāmasamudāye vartate, viṣayo labdhaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:19867: kvacid indriyagrāhye, cakṣur viṣayo rūpam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:19868: kvacid atyantaśīlite jñeye, devadattasya viṣayo 'nuvākaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:19869: kvācid anyatra abhāve, matsyānām viṣayo jalam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:19876: rājanyādibhyaḥ śabdebhyo vuñ pratyayo bhavati viṣayo deśe ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:19901: bhairikyādibhyaḥ aiṣukāryādibhyaś ca yathāsaṅkhyaṃ vidhal bhaktal ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ viṣayo deśe ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:19948: sa iti prathamāsamarthād asya ti ṣaṣṭyārthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:19949: yat prathamāsamarthaṃ chandaś cet tadādir bhavati, yat tadasya iti
GS24jvkasipu:19950: nirdiṣṭaṃ pragāthāś cet te bhavanti, iti-karaṇas tataś ced vivakṣā /
GS24jvkasipu:19954: ādiḥ iti kim ? anuṣṭubḥ madhyam asya pragāthasya /
GS24jvkasipu:19955: chandasaḥ iti kim ? udutya-śabda ādir asya pragāthasya /
GS24jvkasipu:19956: pragātheṣu iti kim ? paṅktir ādir asya anuvākasya /
GS24jvkasipu:19957: pragātha-śabdaḥ kriyānimittakaḥ kvacid eva mantraviśeṣe vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:19958: yatra dve ṛcau pragrathanena tisraḥ kriyante, sa pragrathanāt prakarṣagānād vā pragāthaḥ ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:19964: so 'sya iti samarthavibhaktiḥ, pratyayārthaś ca anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:19967: prayojanavācibhyaḥ yoddhṛvācibhyaś ca śabdebhyaḥ prathamāsamarthebhyaḥ asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe saṅgrāme 'bhidheye yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19968: bhadrā prayojanam asya saṅgrāmasya bhadraḥ saṅgrāmaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19974: saṅgrāme iti kim ? subhadrā prayojanam asya dānasya /
GS24jvkasipu:19975: prayojana-yoddhṛbhyaḥ iti kim ? subhadrā prekṣikā 'sya saṅgrāmasya //
GS24jvkasipu:19976: tad asyāṃ praharaṇam iti krīḍāyāṃ ṇaḥ || PS_4,2.57 ||
GS24jvkasipu:19978: tat iti prathamāsamarthād asyām iti saptamy-arthe ṇaḥ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:19979: yat tat iti nirdiṣṭaṃ praharaṇaṃ cet bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19980: yad asyām iti nirdiṣṭaṃ krīḍā tad cet sā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19984: praharaṇam iti kim ? mālā bhūṣaṇam asyāṃ krīḍāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:19985: krīḍāyām iti kim ? khaṅgaḥ praharaṇam asyāṃ senāyām //
GS24jvkasipu:19993: ghañantāt kiyāvācinaḥ prathamāsamarthād asyām iti saptamyarthe strīliṅge ñaḥ prayayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:19994: ghañaḥ iti kṛd-grahaṇam, tatra gatikāraka-pūrvam api gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:19996: tailaṃpātā ghañaḥ iti kim ? śyenapatanam asyāṃ vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:19998: atha samarthavibhaktiḥ pratyayārthaś ca kasmāt punar upādiyate, yāvatā dvayam api prakṛtam eva ? krīḍāyām ity anena tatsambaddham,
GS24jvkasipu:20005: tat iti dvitīyāsamarthāt adhīte veda ity etayoḥ arthayoḥ yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20015: kratuviśeṣa-vācibhyaḥ ukthādibhyaś ca sūtrāntāc ca ṭhak pratyayo bhavati tadadhīte tadveda ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:20027: yajñāyajñīyāt pareṇa yāni gīyante, na ca tāny adhīyāne pratyaya iṣyate,
GS24jvkasipu:20028: kiṃ tarhi, sāmalakṣaṇe aukthikye vartamānaḥ uktha-śabdaḥ pratyayam utpādayati /
GS24jvkasipu:20031: aukthikya-śabdāc ca pratyayo na bhavaty eva, anabhidhānāt /
GS24jvkasipu:20109: krama ity evam ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ vun pratyayo bhavati tadadhīte tadveda ity etasmin viṣaye
GS24jvkasipu:20120: anubrāhmaṇa-śabdāt iniḥ pratyayo bhavati tadadhīte tadveda ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:20125: mattvarthena ata ini-ṭhanau (*5,2.115) iti ininā siddham ? tatra+etasmāṭ
GS24jvkasipu:20127: anabhidhānān na bhaviṣyati ? aṇo nivṛtty-arthaṃ tarhi vacanam //
GS24jvkasipu:20130: vasanta ity evam ādibhyaḥ ṭhak pratyayo bhavati tadadhīte tadveda ity asmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:20156: sūtra-vācinaḥ ka-kāra+upadhād upannasya pratyayasya lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20163: iha mā bhūt, mahāvārttikaṃ sūtram adhīte māhāvārttikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:20165: kopadhāt iti kim ? catuṣṭayam adhīte cātuṣṭayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:20169: chandāṃsi brāhmaṇāni ca proktapratyayāntāni tadviṣayāṇy eva bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:20172: tena svātantryam upādhyāntarayogo vakyaṃ ca nivartate /
GS24jvkasipu:20182: brāhmaṇa-grahaṇaṃ kiṃ, yāvatā chanda eva tad ?
GS24jvkasipu:20184: iha tadviṣayatā mā bhūt, yājñavalkyena proktāni brāhmanṇāni yājñavalkyāni
GS24jvkasipu:20195: tad asminn asti iti deśe tannāmni || PS_4,2.67 ||
GS24jvkasipu:20202: tat iti rathamāsamarthād asmin iti saptamyarthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati, yat prathamāsamartham asti cet tad bhavati yad asmin iti
GS24jvkasipu:20203: nirdiṣṭaṃ deśaś cet sa tannāmā bhavati, pratyayāntanāmā, iti-karaṇas tataś ced vivakṣā /
GS24jvkasipu:20210: tena iti tṛtīyāsamarthāt nirvṛttam ity etasmin viṣaye yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati deśanāmadheye gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:20211: deśe tannamni iti caturṣv api yogeṣu sambadhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:20214: hetau kartari ca yathāyogaṃ tṛtīyā samartha-vibhaktiḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:20217: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthān nivāsaḥ ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati deśanāmadheye gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:20225: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt adūrabhavaḥ ityetasminnarthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20228: cakāraḥ pūrveṣāṃ trayāṇām arthānām iha sannidhāna-arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:20234: u-varṇāntāt prātipadikāt yathavihitaṃ samarthavibhakti-yuktāt añ pratyayo bhavati tad asminn asti ity evam ādiṣv artheṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:20244: bahvac aṅgaṃ yasya asau bahvajaṅgao matup, tadantāt prātipadikāt añ
GS24jvkasipu:20251: aṅga-grahaṇaṃ bahvaj iti tad viśeṣaṇam yathā vijñāyate, matvanta-viśeṣaṇaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:20256: bahvacaḥ prātipadikāt añ pratyayo bhavati cāturarthikaḥ kūpeṣv abhidheyesu /
GS24jvkasipu:20263: vipāśaḥ uttare kūle ye kūpāsteṣv abhidheyeṣu añ pratyayo bhavati cāturarthikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:20268: udak iti kim ? dakṣiṇato vipāśaḥ kūpeṣu aṇ eva dāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:20275: saṅkala ity evam ādibhyaḥ añ pratyayo bhavati cāturarthikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:20319: deśe tannamni ity asya viśeṣanaṃ sauvīrādayaḥ, strītvaṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:20320: ṅyāpprātipadikāt añ pratyayo bhavati cāturarthikaḥ, aṇo 'pavādaḥ, sauvīre strīliṅge deśe vācye sālve prāci /
GS24jvkasipu:20321: sauvīre tāvat - dattamitreṇa nirvṛttā nagarī dāttāmitrī /
GS24jvkasipu:20323: prāci khalv api - kakandena nirvṛttā kākandī /
GS24jvkasipu:20329: subāstu ity evam ādibhyaḥ aṇ pratyayo bhavati cāturarthikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:20356: roṇī iti ko 'yaṃ nirdeśo, yāvatā pratyayavidhau pañcamī yuktā ?
GS24jvkasipu:20358: roṇī-śabdaḥ sarvavastho 'ṇ-pratyayam utpādayati, kevalas tadantaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:20364: ka-kāra-upadhāt ca prātipadikāt an pratyayo bhavati cāturarthikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:20377: tatra yathāsaṅkhyaṃ saptadaśabhyaḥ prātipadikagaṇebhyaḥ saptadaśa pratyayāḥ bhavanti cāturarthikāḥ
GS24jvkasipu:20676: śirīṣa-śabdo 'rīhaṇādiṣu, kumudādiṣu, varāhādiṣu ca paṭhyate, autsargiko
GS24jvkasipu:20677: 'pi tata iṣyate, tasya ca varaṇādiṣu darśanāl lub bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20678: tathā ca+uktam, śirīṣāṇāmadūrabhavo grāmaḥ śirīṣāḥ, tasya vanaṃ śirīṣavanam iti //
GS24jvkasipu:20681: deśe tannāmni yaś cāturarthikaḥ pratyayaḥ bhavati, tasya deśaviśeṣe anapade 'bhidheye lub bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20691: iha kasmān na bhavati, udumbarāḥ asmin santi audumbaro janapadaḥ, vaidiśo janapadaḥ iti ? tannāmni iti vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:20692: na ca atra lubantaṃ tannāmadheyaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:20695: varaṇa ity evam ādibhyaḥ utpannasya cāturarthikasya pratyayasya lup bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20722: śarkarā-śabdād utpannasya cāturarthikasya pratyayasya vā lub bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20723: vā-grahaṇaṃ kim, yāvatā śarkarā-śabdaḥ kumudādiṣu varāhādiṣu ca paṭhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:20724: tatra pāṭhasamarthyāt pratyayasya pakṣe śravaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati ? evaṃ tarhy etaj jñāpayati, śarkarā-śabdād autsargiko bhavati, tasya ayaṃ vikalpito
GS24jvkasipu:20728: gaṇapāṭhāc ca śravaṇam uttarasūtre vihitau ca dvau pratyayau, tad evaṃ ṣaḍ
GS24jvkasipu:20730: śarkarā, śārkaram, śarkarikam, śārkarakam , śārkarikam, śarkarīyam iti //
GS24jvkasipu:20733: śarkarā-śabdāt ṭhak cha ity etau pratyayau bhavataś cāturarthikau /
GS24jvkasipu:20739: nadyām abhidheyāyāṃ matup pratyayo bhavati cāturarthikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:20747: iha kasmān na bhavati, bhāgīrathī, bhaimarathī ? matubantasya atannāmadheyatvāt //
GS24jvkasipu:20750: madhu ity evam ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyo matup pratyayo bhavati cāturarthikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:20784: kumuda naḍa vetasa ity etebhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ ḍmatup pratyayo bhavati cāturarthikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:20801: matup-prakaraṇe 'pi śikhāyā valacaṃ vakṣyati, tadadeśārthaṃ vacanam //
GS24jvkasipu:20804: utkara ity evam ādibhyaḥ chaḥ pratyayo bhavati cāturarthikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:20854: naḍa ity evam ādīnāṃ kugāgamo bhavati, chaś ca pratyayaś cāturarthikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:20873: yānita ūrdhvaṃ pratyayān anukramiṣyāmaḥ, śeṣe 'rthe te veditavyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:20877: tasya idaṃ viśeṣā hy apatyasamūhādayaḥ, teṣu ghādayo mā bhūvan iti śeṣādhikāraḥ kriyate
GS24jvkasipu:20878: kiṃ ca sarveṣu jātādiṣu ghādayo yathā syuḥ anantareṇa+ev ārthādeśena sambandhitvena kṛtārthatā mā jñāyi iti sākalyārthaṃ śeṣa-vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:20884: śeṣe iti lakṣaṇaṃ ca adhikāraś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:20894: rāṣṭra avārapāra ity etābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ gha-khau ity etau pratyayau
GS24jvkasipu:20904: teṣāṃ tu jātādayo 'rthāḥ samartha-vibhaktayaś ca purastād vakṣyante //
GS24jvkasipu:20906: grāma-śabdāt ya khañ ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:20910: katri ity evam ādibhyo ḍhakañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20930: kula-kukṣi-grīvā-śabdebhyo yathāsaṅkhyaṃ śvan asi alaṅkāra ity eteṣu
GS24jvkasipu:20940: nadī ity evam ādibhyo ḍhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20945: kecit tu pūrvanagirī iti paṭhanti, vicchidya ca pratyayaṃ kurvanti,
GS24jvkasipu:20966: dakṣiṇā paścāt puras ity etebhyaḥ tyak prayayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:20982: raṅku-śabdād aṇ pratyayo bhavati, cakārāt ṣphak ca śaiṣiko 'manusye
GS24jvkasipu:20986: nanu ca raṅku-śabdaḥ kacchādiṣu paṭhyate, tatra ca manuṣya-tasthayor vuñ
GS24jvkasipu:20988: kacchādipāṭhādamanusye aṇ api siddhaḥ, kim iha manusya-pratiṣedhena
GS24jvkasipu:20989: aṇgrahanena ca ? tad ucyate, na+eva ayam manusyapratiṣedhaḥ, kiṃ tarhi,
GS24jvkasipu:20991: tena rāṅkavaḥ kambalaḥ iti ṣphak na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20992: viśeṣavihitena ca ṣphakā aṇo bādhā mā bhūt ity aṇ-grahaṇam api kriyate //
GS24jvkasipu:20995: div prāc apāc udac pratyac ity etebhyo yat pratyayo bhavati śaisikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21001: avyayāt tu kālavācinaḥ paratvāt ṭyuṭyulau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21010: varṇau yā kanthā tasyā vuk pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21019: ninirbhyāṃ ghruvagatyoś ca praveśo niyame tathā //
GS24jvkasipu:21035: āvis śabdāc chandasi tyap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21045: aiṣamas hyas śvas ity etebhyo 'nyatarasyāṃ tyap patyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21049: śvasastuṭ ca (*4,3.15) iti ṭhañ api tṛtīyo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21053: tīra-uttarapadāt rūpya-uttarapadāc ca prātipadikād yathāsaṅkhyam añ ña ity
GS24jvkasipu:21060: tīrarūpyāntāt iti noktaṃ bahuc-pratyaya-pūrvād mā bhūt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:21066: dik-pūrvapadāt prātipadikāt asañjñā-viṣayāt ñaḥ patyayo hbavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21079: dik-pūrvapadāt madra-śabdād añ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21086: udīcyagrāmavācinaḥ prātipadikād bahvaco 'ntodāttād añ pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:21098: prasthottarapadāta paladyādibhyaḥ kakāropadhāt ca prātipadikād aṇ pratyayo bhavati śaisikaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:21106: paladyādiṣu yo vāhīkagrāmaḥ, tataḥ ṭhaññiṭhayoḥ apavādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21108: gomatī-śabdaḥ paṭhyate, tato ropadhetoḥ prācām (*4,2.123) iti vuño 'pavādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21109: vāhīka-śabdaḥ kopadho 'pi punaḥ paṭhyate paraṃ chaṃ (*4,2.114) bādhitum /
GS24jvkasipu:21133: gotram iha na pratyaya-artho na ca prakṛtiviśeṣaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:21134: tarhy evaṃ sambadhyate, kaṇvādibhyo gotre yaḥ pratyayo vihitaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:21135: tadantebhya eva aṇ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21142: gotre ya iñ vihitaḥ tadantāt prātipdikāt aṇ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21147: gore ity eva, sautaṅgamer idaṃ sautaṅgamīyam //
GS24jvkasipu:21150: dvy-acaḥ prātipadikāt prācya-bharata-gotrād iñantād aṇ pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21160: kāśīyāḥ iti katham udāhṛtaṃ, yāvatā kāśyādibhyaṣ ṭhañ - ñiṭhābhyāṃ bhavitavyam ? na+etad asti
GS24jvkasipu:21161: deśavācinaḥ kāśiśabdasya tatra grahaṇaṃ caidi-śabdena sāhacaryāt /
GS24jvkasipu:21163: jñāpakād anyatra prācya-grahaṇena bharata-grahaṇaṃ na bhavati iti
GS24jvkasipu:21169: vṛddhāt prātipadikāt chaḥ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21179: bhavac-chabdād vṛddhāt ṭhak-chasau pratyayau bhavataḥ śaiṣikau /
GS24jvkasipu:21188: kāśi ity evam ādibhyaḥ ṭhañ ñiṭha ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ śaiṣikau /
GS24jvkasipu:21197: ye tu avṛddhāḥ paṭhyante, vacanaprāmāṇyāt tebhyaḥ pratyaya-vidhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21198: devadatta-śabdaḥ paṭhyate, tasya eṅ prācāṃ deśe (*1,1.75) iti vṛddhasañjñā /
GS24jvkasipu:21202: kathaṃ bhāṣye udāhṛtaṃ vā nāmadheyasya vṛddhasañjñā veditavyā
GS24jvkasipu:21203: devadattīyāḥ, daivadattāḥ iti, yāvatā vṛddhasañjñā-apakṣe kāśyāditvāt ṭhaññiṭhābhyāṃ bhavitavyam ? tatra+evaṃ varṇayanti, vā nāmadheyasya iti
GS24jvkasipu:21204: vyavasthita-vibhāṣeyam, sā che kartavye bhavati, ṭhaññiṭhayor na bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:21238: vāhīkagrāma-vācibhyaḥ vṛddhebhyaḥ ṭhaññiṭhau pratyayau bhavataḥ śaiṣikau /
GS24jvkasipu:21244: vṛddhāt iti vartate, vāhīkagrāmebhyaḥ iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:21245: uśīnaresu ye vāhīkagrāmāḥ, tadvācibhyo vṛddhebhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:21252: u-varṇāntāt deśavācinaḥ prātipadikāt ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21256: ṭhaññiṭhayoḥ prakaraṇe ṭhañaḥ kevalasya anuvṛttiḥ na labhyate iti ṭhañ-grahaṇaṃ kṛtam //
GS24jvkasipu:21265: pūrveṇa+eva ṭhañi siddhe niyamārthaṃ vacanam, vṛddhād eva prācām avṛddhān na bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:21269: vṛddhāt iti vartate, deśe iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:21270: dhanva-vācino ya-kāra-upadhāc ca deśa-abhidhāyino vṛddhāt prātipadikāt vuñ
GS24jvkasipu:21279: vṛddhāt ity eva, deśe iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:21281: prasthapura vaha ity evam antāt deśa-vācinaḥ prātipadikād vṛddhād vuñ
GS24jvkasipu:21289: purānto ropadhastataḥ uttarasūtraiṇaiva siddham aprāgartham iha grahaṇam
GS24jvkasipu:21292: vṛddhat ity eva, deśe iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:21294: ra-upadhāt īkārāntāc ca pragdeśa-vācino vṛddhād vuñ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21305: vṛddhāt ity eva, deśe iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:21307: vṛddhāj janapada-vācinaḥ tadavadhi-vācinaś ca prātipadikāt vuñ pratyayo bhavati śaisikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21313: tadavadher api janapā eva gṛhyate na grāmaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21315: gartottarapadāc chaṃ bādhitvā vuñ eva janapada-avadher bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21320: avṛddhād vṛddhāc ca janapadāt tadavadhi-vācinaś ca bahuvanaca-viṣayāt
GS24jvkasipu:21345: apigrahaṇaṃ kim yāvatā vṛddhāta pūrveṇa+eva siddham ?
GS24jvkasipu:21346: takrakauṇḍinyanyāyena bādhā mā vijñāyi iti samuccīyate //
GS24jvkasipu:21349: deśe ity eva uttarapada-śabdaḥ pratyekam abhisambadhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:21351: prātipadikāc ca avṛddhād vṛddhāc ca vuñ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21363: dhūmādibhyo deśavacibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ vuñ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21367: pātheya-śabdaḥ paṭhyate, tasya yopadhātvād eva vuñi siddhe sāmarthyād
GS24jvkasipu:21369: tathā videha-anartaśabdayoḥ janapada-lakṣaṇe vuñi siddhe 'deśārthaḥ pāṭhaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:21372: samudra-śabdaḥ paṭhyate, tasya nāvi manuṣye ca vuñ iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:21375: anyatra na bhavati, sāmudraṃ jalam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:21419: nagara-śabdāt vuñ pratyayo bhavati śaisikaḥ kutsane prāvīṇye ca gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:21420: pratyayārtha-viśeṣaṇaṃ ca+etat, kutsane prāvīṇye ca jātādau pratyayārtha iti /
GS24jvkasipu:21423: kena ayaṃ muṣitaḥ panthā gātre pakṣamālidhūsaraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21424: iha nagare manuṣyeṇa sambhāvyata etan nāgarakeṇa /
GS24jvkasipu:21427: iha nagare manuṣyeṇa sambhāvyata etan nāgarakeṇa /
GS24jvkasipu:21430: katryādiṣu tu sañjñāśabdena sāhacaryāt sañjñānāgaraṃ paṭhyate, tasmin nāgareyakam iti pratyudāhāryam
GS24jvkasipu:21433: araṇya-śabdād vuñ pratyayo bhavati śaisiko manusye 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:21448: kuru yugandhara ity etābhyāṃ vibhāṣā vuñ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21451: janapada-śabdāv etau, tābhyām avṛddhād api iti nitye vuñi prāpte vikalpa ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:21452: kuru-śabdaḥ kacchādiṣv api paṭhyate, tatra vacanād aṇ api bhaviṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:21454: manuṣyatatsthayoḥ tu kuru-śabdān nitya eva vuñ pratyayo bhavati, kauravako
GS24jvkasipu:21465: ka-kāra-upadhāt prātipadikād aṇ pratyayo bhavati śaisikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21467: anyatra janapadaṃ muktvā pūrveṇa+eva kopadhād aṇi siddham /
GS24jvkasipu:21470: aṇ-grahaṇam u-varṇāntād api yathā syāt, ikṣvākuṣu jātaḥ aikṣvākaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:21474: kaccha ity evam ādibhyo deśavācibhyaḥ aṇ pratyayo bhavati śaisikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21479: kaccha-śabdo na bahuvacana-viṣayaḥ, tasya manusya-tatsthayor vuñarthaḥ pāṭhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21480: vijāpaka-śabdaḥ paṭhyate, tasya kopadhatvād eva aṇi siddhe grahanam
GS24jvkasipu:21503: manuṣye manuṣyasthe ca jātādau pratyayārthe kacchādibhyo vuñ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21515: sālva-śabdaḥ kacchādisu paṭhyate, tataḥ pūrveṇa+eva manusya-tatsthayoḥ
GS24jvkasipu:21517: apadātāv eva manusye manaṣyasthe ca sālva-śabdād vuñ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21523: gavi yavāgvām ca jātādau pratyayārthe sālva-śabdād buñ pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:21532: garta-uttarapadāt deśa-vācinaḥ prātipadikāt chaḥ pratyayo bhavati śaisikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21542: gaha ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ chaḥ pratyayo bhavati śaisikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21547: madhyamadhyamaṃ cāṇ caraṇe iti paṭhyate, tasyāyamarthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21550: caraṇe tu pratyayarthe aṇ bhavati, mādhyamāḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:21620: prāgdeśa-vācinaḥ kaṭādeḥ prātipadikāt chaḥ pratyayo bhavati śaisikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21628: rājñaḥ kakāraś ca antādeśo bhavti chaś ca pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21630: ādeśamātram iha vidheyaṃ, pratyaystu vṛddhāc chaḥ (*4,2.114) ity eva siddhaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:21634: vṛddhād deśa-vācinaḥ aka ika ity evam antāt khakāropadhāc ca prātipadikāt chaḥ pratyayo bhavati śaisikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21636: vāhīkagrāma-lakṣaṇasya ca pratyayasya, ropadhetoḥ prācām (*4,2.123) iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:21649: deśe ity eva, vṛddhāt iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:21650: kanthādy-uttarapadād deśa-vācino vṛddhāt prātipadikāc chaḥ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21670: parvataśabdāc chaḥ pratyayo bhavati vā amanuṣye vācye /
GS24jvkasipu:21686: iti śrījayādityaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau caturthādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:21694: tad ete trayaḥ pratyayāḥ bhavanti, tatra vaiṣamyād yathāsaṅkhyaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21695: tyadāditvād vṛddha-sañjñakayor yuṣmad-asmadoḥ che prāpte pratyekaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:21705: tasmin iti sākṣād vihitaḥ khañ nirdiṣyate, na cakāra-anukṛṣṭaḥ chaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21706: tasmin khañi aṇi ca yuṣmad-asmador yathāsaṅkhyaṃ yuṣmāka asmāka ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ
GS24jvkasipu:21707: nimittayor ādeśau prati yathāsaṅkhaṃ kasmān na bhavati ? yogavibhāgaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:21708: kariṣyate, tasmin khañi yuṣmad-asmadoḥ yuṣmāka-asmākau bhavataḥ, tato 'ṇi
GS24jvkasipu:21714: tasmin aṇi ca iti kim ? yuṣmadīyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21718: ekavacana-parayor yuṣmad-asmadoḥ tavaka mamaka ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ
GS24jvkasipu:21719: yathāsaṅkhyaṃ tasmin khañi aṇi ca parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21720: nimittayos tu yathāsaṅkhyaṃ pūrvavad eva na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21721: nanu ca na lumatā aṅgasya (*1,1.63) iti pratyayalakṣaṇa-pratiṣedhād
GS24jvkasipu:21722: ekavacana-paratā yuṣmad-asmador na sambhavati ? vacanāt pratyayalakṣaṇam bhaviṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:21723: atha vā na+eva+idaṃ pratyayalakṣaṇaṃ, kiṃ tarhy anvartha-grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:21724: ekavacane yuṣmad-asamādī ekasya arthasya vācake tavaka-mamakāv ādeśau pratipadyete iti sūtra-arthaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:21729: tasminn aṇi ca ity eva, tvadīyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21741: para avara adhama uttama ity evaṃ pūrvāc ca ardhāt yat pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21746: pūrva-grahaṇaṃ kim ? para-avara-adhama-uttamebhyaḥ ity eva+ucyate, ardhāt iti vartate, tasya tatpūrvatā vijñāsyate ? para-avara-śabdāv adig-grahaṇāv
GS24jvkasipu:21747: api staḥ paraṃ sukham, avaram sukham iti /
GS24jvkasipu:21748: tatra kṛta-arthatvād dik-śabdapakṣe pareṇa ṭhañyatau syātām /
GS24jvkasipu:21749: asmāt pūrva-grahaṇād yat pratyayo bhavati parārdhyam, avarārdhyam iti //
GS24jvkasipu:21752: dik-pūrvapadād ardhāntāt prātipadikāt ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati, cakārād yat ca śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21761: grāma-ekadeśa-vācino janapada-ekadeśavācinaś ca prātipadikād dik-pūrvapadād ardhāntād añ-ṭhañau pratyayau bhavataḥ śaiṣikau /
GS24jvkasipu:21763: ime khalv asmākaṃ grāmasya janapadasya vā paurvārdhaḥ, paurvārdhikāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21777: a-kāraḥ pratyayo bhavati madhya-śabdāt sāmpratike jātādau pratyaya-arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:21785: samudra-samīpe yo dvīpaḥ, tasmād yañ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21793: kāla-viśeṣa-vācinaḥ prātipadikāt ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21799: yathākathañcid guṇa-vṛttyā api kāle vartamānāt pratyaya iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:21805: śarac-chabdāt ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati śrāddhe 'bhidheye śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21807: śrāddhe iti ca karma gṛhyate, na śraddhāvān puruṣaḥ, anabhidhānāt /
GS24jvkasipu:21813: roge ātape ca abhidheye śarac-chabdāṭ ṭhañ pratyayo vā bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21822: niśā-pradoṣa-śabdābhyāṃ ca vibhāṣā ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21823: kālāṭ ṭhañ (*4,3.11) iti nitye ṭhañi prāpte vikalpa ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:21829: śvaḥ-śabdād vibhāṣa ṭhañ pratyayo hbavati, tasya ca tuḍ-āgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21830: tyap-pratyayo 'py ato vihitaḥ, aiṣamohyaḥ śvaso 'nyatrasyām (*4,2.105) iti
GS24jvkasipu:21836: sandhivela-ādibhyaḥ ṛtubhyo nakṣatrebhyaś ca kāla-vṛttibhyo 'ṇ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21862: varṣa-śabdāṭ ṭhak pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ ṛtvaṇo 'pavādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21867: varṣa-śabdāt chandasi viṣaye ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21874: vasanta-śabdāc chandasi viṣaye ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21880: hemanta-śabdāc chandasi viṣaye ṭhaj pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21884: sarvatra aṇ ca talopaś ca || PS_4,3.22 ||
GS24jvkasipu:21886: hemanta-śabdād aṇ pratyayo bhavati, tatsaṃniyogena ca asya takāra-lopaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21891: nanu ca chandasi iti na anuvartiṣyate ? saivān anuvṛttiḥ śabdena akhyāyate pratyatnādhikyena pūrvasūtre 'pi sambandha-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:21892: haimantikam iti bhāṣāyām api ṭhañaṃ smaranti /
GS24jvkasipu:21893: atha aṇ ca iti cakāraḥ kim arthaḥ ? aṇ, yathāprāptaṃ ca ṛtvaṇ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:21894: kaḥ punar anayor viśeṣaḥ ? ṛtvaṇi hi takāralopo na asti haimanti paṅktī paṅktiḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:21895: tad evaṃ trīṇi rūpāṇi bhavanti, haimantikam, haimantam, haimanam iti //
GS24jvkasipu:21899: sāyaṃ ciraṃ prāhṇe prage ity etebhyaḥ avyayebhyaś ca kālavācibhyaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:21900: ṭyu-ṭyulau pratyayau bhavataḥ, tayoś ca adiṣṭayoḥ tuḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21907: sāyam iti makārāntaṃ padam avyayam, tato 'vyayād eva siddhaḥ pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21908: yastu syaterantakarmaṇo ghañi sāya-śabdas tasya+idaṃ makārāntatvaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:21926: pūrvāhṇa-aparāhṇā-śabdābhyāṃ vibhāṣā ṭyu-ṭyulau pratyayau bhavataḥ, tuṭ ca tayor āgamaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:21927: kālāṭ ṭhañ (*4,3.11) iti ṭhañi prāpte vacanaṃ, pakṣe so 'pi bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21933: yadā tu na saptamī samartha-vibhaktiḥ pūrvāhṇaḥ soḍhaḥ asya iti tadā pūrvāhṇatanaḥ iti bhavitavyam //
GS24jvkasipu:21936: aṇ-ādayo ghādayaś ca pratyayāḥ prakṛtāḥ, teṣām ataḥ prabhṛti arthāḥ
GS24jvkasipu:21938: tatra iti saptamīsamarthāt jātaḥ ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21953: prāvṛṭ-śabdāt saptamīsamarthāj jātaḥ ity etasminn arthe ṭhap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21959: śarac-chabdāt saptamī-samarthāj jātaḥ ity etasminn arthe vuñ pratyayo
GS24jvkasipu:21960: bhavati ṛtvaṇaḥ apavādaḥ, samudāyena cet sañjñā gamyate /
GS24jvkasipu:21965: sañjñādhikāraṃ kecit kṛtalabdhakrītakuśalāḥ (*4,3.38) iti yāvad anuvartayanti //
GS24jvkasipu:21968: pūrvāhṇa-ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ vun pratyayo bhavati tatra jātaḥ (*4,3.25)
GS24jvkasipu:21980: asañjñāyāṃ tu yathāprāptaṃ ṭhañādayaḥ eva bhavanti //
GS24jvkasipu:21983: pathi-śabdād vun pratyayo bhavati, tatra jātaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye 'ṇo
GS24jvkasipu:21985: pratyaya. saṃniyogena ca pathaḥ pantha ity ayam ādeśaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21989: amāvāsyā-śabdād vun pratyayo bhavati vā tatra jātaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:21996: amāvāsyā-śabdāt akāraḥ pratyayo bhavati tatra jātaḥ (*4,3.25) ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:21997: pūrveṇa vunnaṇoḥ prāptayoḥ ayaṃ tṛtīyaḥ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:22002: sindhu-śabdād apakara-śabdāc ca kan pratyayo bhavati tatra jāta (*4,3.25)
GS24jvkasipu:22004: sindhu-śabdaḥ kacchādiḥ, tato 'ṇi manuṣyavuñi ca prāpte vidhānam /
GS24jvkasipu:22010: sindhv-apakara-śabdābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyam aṇañau pratyayau bhavataḥ tatra jātaḥ (*4,3.25) it yetasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:22017: śraviṣṭhā-ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ nakṣatrebhyaḥ āgatasya jātārthe lug bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:22018: tasmin strīpratyayasya api luk taddhitaluki (*1,2.49) iti bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22042: sthānāntāt prātipadikāt gośāla-śabdāt kharaśāla-śabdāt ca jāta-arthe
GS24jvkasipu:22050: vatsaśālādibhyaḥ parasya jāta-arthe pratyayasya lug vā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22058: nakṣatrebhyaḥ uttarasya jāta-arthe pratyayasya bahulaṃ lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22064: saptamī-samārthāt kṛtādiṣv artheṣu yathāvihitaṃ pratyayaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22065: srudhne kṛto vā labdho vā krīto vā kuśalo vā sraughanaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:22068: nanu ca yad yatra kṛtaṃ jātam api tatra bhavati, yac ca yatra krītaṃ labdham api tatra+eva bhavati kimarthaṃ bhedena+upādānaṃ kriyate,
GS24jvkasipu:22069: śabda-arthasya abhinnatvāt ? vastumātreṇa krītaṃ labdhaṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:22074: saptamī-samarthāt ṅy-āp-prātipadikāt prāyabhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye
GS24jvkasipu:22081: anityabhavaḥ prāyabhavaḥ iti ced, mukta-saṃśayena tulyam //
GS24jvkasipu:22084: upajānv-ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ saptamī-samarthebhyaḥ prāyabhava ity etasmin
GS24jvkasipu:22093: saptamī-samarthād ṅy-āp-prātipadikāt sambhūte ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:22094: avaklṛptiḥ pramāṇānatirekaś ca sambhavaty arthaḥ iha gṛhyate, na+utpattiḥ
GS24jvkasipu:22101: kośa-śabdāt ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati tatra sambhūte ity asmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:22104: rūḍhir eṣā, tena krimau na bhavati, khaṅgakośāc ca //
GS24jvkasipu:22107: tatra ity eva kāla-viśeṣa-vācibhyaḥ saptamī-samārthebhyaḥ sādhv-ādiṣv
GS24jvkasipu:22117: tatra ity eva, kālāt iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:22118: saptamī-samarthāt kālavācinaḥ prātipadikāt upte 'rthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22131: grīṣma-vasanta-śabdābhyām anyatarasyāṃ vuñ pratyayo bhavati upte 'rthe /
GS24jvkasipu:22137: tatra ity eva, kālāt iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:22138: saptamī-samārthāt kālavācinaḥ prātipadikāt deyam ity asminn arthe
GS24jvkasipu:22139: yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati, yad deyam ṛṇaṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22143: ṛṇe iti kim ? māse deyā bhikṣā //
GS24jvkasipu:22147: kalāpin aśvattha yavabusa ity etebhyaḥ kālavācibhyaḥ saptamī-samarthebhyo
GS24jvkasipu:22148: deyam ṛṇam ity etasminn arthe vun pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22150: yasmin kāle mayūśaḥ kalāpino bhavanti sa kalāpī /
GS24jvkasipu:22158: grīṣma avarasama-śabdābhyāṃ vuñ pratyayo bhavati deyam ṛṇam ity
GS24jvkasipu:22167: saṃvatsara-āgrahāyaṇī-śabdābhyāṃ ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati, cakārād vuñ ca
GS24jvkasipu:22168: deyam ṛṇam ity etasminn arthe saṃvatsare deyam ṛṇaṃ sāṃvatsarikam,
GS24jvkasipu:22171: vā iti vaktavye ṭhañ-grahaṇaṃ sandhivelādiṣu saṃvatsarāt phalaparvaṇoḥ iti
GS24jvkasipu:22172: paṭhyate, tatra phale ṛṇatvena vivakṣite 'ṇaṃ bādhitvā ṭhañ eva yathā syāt iti //
GS24jvkasipu:22175: tatra ity eva, kālāt iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:22176: kālavācinaḥ saptamī-samarthāt prātipadikāt vyāharati mṛgaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22179: mṛgaḥ iti kim ? niśāyāṃ vyāharati ulūkaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:22183: tad iti prathamā-samarthāt kālavācinaḥ prātipadikāt asya iti ṣaṣṭhy-arthe
GS24jvkasipu:22184: yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati yat prathamā-samarthaṃ soḍhaṃ cet tad
GS24jvkasipu:22187: niśāsahacaritam adhyayanaṃ niśā, tat soḍham asya chātrasya naiśaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:22193: tatra iti saptamī-samarthāt ṅy-āp-prātipadikāt bhavaḥ ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22194: sattā bhavatyartho gṛhyate, na janma, tatra jātaḥ (*4,3.25) iti gatārthatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:22198: punas tatra-grahaṇaṃ tad asya iti nivṛtty-artham //
GS24jvkasipu:22201: diś ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ yat pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye
GS24jvkasipu:22238: śarīraṃ prāṇikāyaḥ śarīra-avayava-vācinaḥ prātipadikād yat pratyayo
GS24jvkasipu:22239: bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:22246: dṛtyādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ ḍhañ pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:22256: grīvā-śabdād aṇ pratyayo bhavati, cakārāḍ ḍhañ ca, tatra bhavaḥ ity
GS24jvkasipu:22260: grīvā-śabdo dhamanīvacanas tāsāṃ bahutvād bahuvacanaṃ kṛtam //
GS24jvkasipu:22263: gambhīra-śabdād ñyaḥ pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:22272: avyayībhāva-sañjñākāt prātipadikāc ca ñyaḥ pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye
GS24jvkasipu:22274: na ca sarvasmādavyayībhāvād bhavati, kiṃ tarhi, parimukhādeḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:22275: parimukhādīnāṃ ca gaṇapāṭhasya etad eva prayojanam /
GS24jvkasipu:22301: atapūrvapadāt avyayībhāvāṭ ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:22343: īyaḥ kāryo 'tha madhyasya maṇmīyau pratyayau tathā //
GS24jvkasipu:22344: madhyo madhyaṃ dinaṇ ca asmāt sthāmno lugajināt tathā //
GS24jvkasipu:22348: grāma-śabdāntād avyayībhāvāt pari anu ity evaṃ pūrvāt ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:22354: jihvāmūla-śabdād aṅguli-śabdāt ca chanḥ pratayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:22360: varga-śabdāntāt ca prātipadikāc chaḥ pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:22367: śabdād anyasmin pratyaya-arthe vargāntāt prātipadikād anyatarasyāṃ yatkhau pratyayau bhavataḥ tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:22375: karṇalalāṭa-śabdābhyāṃ kan pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye 'laṅkāre 'bhidheye
GS24jvkasipu:22381: tasya vyākhyāna iti ca vyākhyātavyanāmnaḥ || PS_4,3.66 ||
GS24jvkasipu:22383: vyākhyāyate 'nena iti vyākhyānaṃ, vyākhyātavyasya nāma vyākhyātavyanāma /
GS24jvkasipu:22384: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt vyākhayātavyanāmnaḥ prātipadikād vyākhyāne
GS24jvkasipu:22385: 'bhidheye yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati tatra bhave ca /
GS24jvkasipu:22386: vākyārthasamīpe cakāraḥ śrūyamāṇaḥ pūrvavākhya-artham eva samuccinoti tatra bhava (*4,3.53) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:22393: vyākhyātavyanāmnaḥ iti kim ? pātaliputrasya vyākhyānī sukośalā,
GS24jvkasipu:22394: pāṭaliputraḥ sukośalayā vyākhyāyate, evaṃ saṃniveśaṃ pāṭaliputram iti, na tu pāṭaliputro vyākhyātavyanāma
GS24jvkasipu:22399: bahvaco vyākhyātavyanāmnaḥ prātipadikād antodāttād bhavavyākhyānayoḥ ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:22404: bahvacaḥ iti kim ? dvyacaḥ ṭhakaṃ vakṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:22413: kratubhyo yajñebhyaś ca vyākhyātavyanamabhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ bhavavyākhyānayor arthayoḥ ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22415: kratubhyas tāvat - agniṣṭomasya vyākhyānaḥ, tatra bhavaḥ āgniṣṭomikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:22421: kratubhyaḥ ity eva siddhe yajña-grahaṇam asomayāgebhyo 'pi yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:22427: ṛṣi-śabdāḥ pravarnāmadheyāni, tebhyaḥ ṛṣi-śabdebhyo bhavavyākhyānayoḥ arthayoḥ ṭhañ pratayo bhavati aṇo 'pavādaḥ adhyāyeṣveva pratyayārthe viśeṣaṇeṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:22428: vyākhyātavyanāmnaḥ ityanuvartate, tatsāhacaryād ṛṣiśabdair grantha ucyate
GS24jvkasipu:22429: vasiṣṭhasya vyākhyānaḥ tatra bhavo vā vāsiṣṭhiko 'dhyāyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:22434: paurāḍāśa-śabdāt puroḍāśa-śabdāc ca bhavavyākhyānayor arthayoḥ ṣṭhan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22435: puroḍāśāḥ piṣṭapiṇḍāḥ, teṣāṃ saṃskārako mantraḥ pauroḍāśaḥ, tasya vyākhyānaḥ tatra bhavo vā pauroḍāśikaḥ, pauroḍāśikī /
GS24jvkasipu:22436: puroḍāśasahacarito granthaḥ puroḍāśaḥ, tasya vyākhyānas tatra bhavo vā puroḍāśikaḥ, puroḍāśikī
GS24jvkasipu:22440: chandaḥ-śabdād bhavavyākhyānayor arthayoḥ yad aṇau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:22445: dvyajādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyo vyākhyātavyanāmabhyo bhavavyākhyānayor arthayoḥ ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22462: ṛgayana-ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyo bhavavyākhyānayor arthayoḥ aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22490: tataḥ iti pañcamī-samarthād āgataḥ ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22494: tataḥ iti mukhyam apādānaṃ vivakṣitaṃ yat tad iha gṛhyate, na nāntarīyakam /
GS24jvkasipu:22498: āya iti svāmigrāhyo bhāga ucyate, sa yasminn utpadyate tadāyasthānam /
GS24jvkasipu:22499: āyasthanavācibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ ṭhak pratyayo bhavati tata āgataḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:22507: śuṇḍika ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ aṇ pratyayo bhavati tataḥ āgataḥ ity etasmin viṣaye
GS24jvkasipu:22526: tadvācibhyaḥ śabdebhyo vuñ pratyayo bhavati tata āgataḥ ity etasmin viṣaye
GS24jvkasipu:22538: ṛ-kārāntebhyaḥ prātipadikebhyo vidyāyonisambandha-vācibhyaḥ ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati tata āgataḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:22549: pitṛ-śabdād yat pratyayo bhavati, ca-kārāṭ ṭhañ ca tat āgataḥ ity etasmin
GS24jvkasipu:22554: apatyādhikārād anyatra laukikaṃ gotram apatyamātraṃ gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:22555: gotra-pratyayāntāt prātipadikād aṅkavat pratyaya-vidhirb havati tataḥ āgataḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:22557: tasmād vuñ atidiṣyate, na aṇ, saṅgha-aṅka-lakṣaṇeṣv añ-yañ-iñām aṇ
GS24jvkasipu:22569: hetubhyo manusyebhyaś ca anyatarasyāṃ rupyaḥ pratyayo bhavati tata āgataḥ ity etasmin viṣaye
GS24jvkasipu:22581: hetubhyo manuṣyebhyaḥ ca mayaṭ pratyayo bhavati tataḥ āgataḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:22592: pañcamī-samarthāt ṅyāp-prātipadikāt prabhavati ity etasmin viṣaye yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:22593: prabhavati prakāśate, prathamata upalabhyate ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:22598: vidūra-śabdāt ñyaḥ pratyayo bhavati tataḥ prabhavati ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:22601: nanu ca vālavāyād asau prabhavati, na vidūrāt, tatra tu saṃskriyate ? evaṃ tarhi - vālavāyo vidūraṃ ca prakṛtyanataram eva vā /
GS24jvkasipu:22602: na vai tatra iti ced brūyāj jitvarīvad upācaret //
GS24jvkasipu:22605: tad iti dvitīyā-samarthād gacchati ity etasmin viṣaye yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati, yo 'sau gacchati panthāś cet sa bhavati dūto vā /
GS24jvkasipu:22606: srughnaṃ gacchati sraughnaḥ panthā dūto vā /
GS24jvkasipu:22608: tatstheṣu gacchatsu panthā gacchati ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:22610: pathidūtayoḥ iti kim ? srughnaṃ gacchati sārthaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:22614: tad iti dvitīyā-samarthād abhiniṣkrāmati ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati yat abhiniṣkrāmati dvāraṃ ced tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22619: dvāram abhiniṣkramaṇakriyāyāṃ karaṇaṃ prasiddhaṃ, tad iha svātantryeṇa
GS24jvkasipu:22621: dvāram iti kim ? srughnam abhiniṣkrāmati puruṣaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:22627: taditi dvitīyāsamarthād adhikṛtya kṛte ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati yat tat kṛtaṃ granthaś cet sa bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22631: granthe iti kim ? subhdrām adhikṛtya kṛtaḥ prāsādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:22640: tad ity eva, adhikṛtya kṛte granthe iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:22641: śiśukranda-ādibhyo dvitiyā-samarthebhyaḥ chaḥ pratyayo bhavati adhikṛtya kṛte granthe /
GS24jvkasipu:22643: śiśūnāṃ krandanaṃ śiśukrandaḥ, tam adhikṛtya kṛto granthaḥ śiśukrandīyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:22654: evaṃ sati devāsurādi-pratiṣedho 'pi na vaktavyaḥ, tataś cha-pratyayasya
GS24jvkasipu:22658: saḥ iti prathamā-samarthāt asya iti ṣaṣṭhy-arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati, yat prathamā-samarthaṃ nivāsaḥ cet sa bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22666: sa iti prathamā-samarthād asya+iti ṣaṣṭhy-arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati, yat prathamā-samartham abhijanaś cet sa bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22668: tatsambandhād deśo 'pi abhijanaḥ iti ucyate, yasmin pūrvabāndha-vairuṣitam
GS24jvkasipu:22669: tasmād iha deśavācinaḥ pratyayaḥ, na bandhubhyo, nivāsapratyāsatteḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:22673: nivāsābhijanayoḥ ko viśeṣaḥ ? yatra saṃpratyuṣyate sa nivāsaḥ, yatra pūrvairuṣitaṃ so 'bhijanaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:22678: āyudhajīvibhyaḥ iti tādarthye caturthī, parvate iti prakṛti-viśeṣaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:22679: parvatavācinaḥ prathamā-samarthād abhijanād asya+iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe chanḥ pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:22680: āyudhajīvibhyaḥ āyudhajīvyartham āyudhajīvino 'bhidhātuṃ pratyayo bhavati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:22684: āyudhajīvibhyaḥ iti kim ? ṛkṣodaḥ parvato 'bhijanaḥ eśāṃ brahmaṇānām ārkṣodā brāhmaṇāḥ
GS24jvkasipu:22688: śaṇḍika ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ ñyaḥ pratyayo bhavati so 'sya
GS24jvkasipu:22705: sindhv-ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ takṣaśilādibhyaś ca yathāsaṅkhyam aṇ-añau
GS24jvkasipu:22706: pratyayau bhavataḥ so 'sya abhijanaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:22720: ye tu kacchādiṣu paṭhyante sindhu-varṇu-prabhṛtayaḥ, tebhyas tata eva aṇi siddhe manuṣyavuño bādhanārthaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:22738: tūdyādibhyaś caturbhyaḥ śabdebhyo yathāsaṅkhyaṃ catvāra eva ḍhak chaṇ ḍhañ yak ity ete pratyayā bhavanti so 'sya abhijanaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:22748: sa iti prathamā-samarthāt asya iti ṣaṣṭhy-arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati, yat prathamā-samarthaṃ bhaktiś ced tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22755: deśa-kāla-vyatiriktād acittavācinaḥ prātipadikāṭ ṭhak pratyayo bhavati so
GS24jvkasipu:22767: mahārāja-śabdāt ṭhaj pratyayo bhavati so 'sya bhaktiḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:22773: vāsudeva-arjuna-śabdābhyāṃ vun pratyayo bhavati so 'sya bhaktiḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:22777: nanu ca vāsudeva-śabdād gotra-kṣatriya-ākhyebhyaḥ iti vuñ asty eva, na ca atra vun-vuñor viśeṣo vidyate, kimarthaṃ vāsudeva-grahaṇam ? sañjñaiṣā
GS24jvkasipu:22780: pūrva-nipātam akurvan jñāpayati abhyarhitaṃ pūrvam nipatati iti //
GS24jvkasipu:22783: gotra-ākhyebhyaḥ kṣatriya-ākhyebhyaś ca prātipadikebhyaḥ bahulaṃ vuñ pratyayo bhavati so 'sya bhaktiḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:22797: janapadināṃ janapadavat sarvaṃ janapadena samānaśabdānāṃ bahuvacane ||
GS24jvkasipu:22799: janapadino ye bahuvacane janapadena samānaśabdās teṣāṃ janapadavat sarvaṃ bhavati, pratyayaḥ prakṛtiś ca so 'sya bhaktiḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:22800: janapadatadavadhyoś ca ity atra prakaraṇe ye pratyayā vihitāḥ, te janapadibhyo 'sminn arthe 'tidiśyante /
GS24jvkasipu:22806: tadvat aṅgāḥ kṣatriyā bhaktir asya āṅgakaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:22810: janapadinām iti kim ? pañcālāḥ brāhmaṇā bhaktir asya pājcālaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:22811: sarva-grahaṇaṃ prakṛty-atideśa-arthaṃ, sa ca dvyekayoḥ prayojayati,
GS24jvkasipu:22812: vṛddhi-nimitteṣu ca vuñādiṣu viśeṣo na asti iti /
GS24jvkasipu:22816: sa bhaktir asya iti prakṛtinirhrāse kṛte, madrakaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:22818: janapadena samānaśabdānām iti kim ? anuṣṇḍo janapadaḥ pauravo rājā, sa bhaktir asya, pauravīyaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:22820: anyathā hi yatra+eva samānaśabdatā tatra+eva atideśaḥ syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:22821: ekavacan-advivacanayor na syāt, vāṅgo vaṅgau vā bhaktir asya iti /
GS24jvkasipu:22822: bahuvacane tu, bahuvacane samānaśabdānām ekavacana-dvivacanayoḥ saty api śabdabhede 'tideśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22823: vāṅgaḥ vāṅgau vā bhaktir asya vāṅgaka //
GS24jvkasipu:22826: tena iti tṛtīyā-samarthāt proktam ity asminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo
GS24jvkasipu:22828: prakarṣeṇa+uktam proktam ity ucyate, na tu kṛtam, kṛte granthe (*4,3.116)
GS24jvkasipu:22830: anyena kṛtā māthureṇa proktā māthurī vṛttiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:22836: tittiryādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ chaṇ pratyayo bhavati tena proktam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:22843: tittiriṇā proktaḥ ślokaḥ ity atra na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22844: śaunakādibhyaś chandasi (*4,3.106) ity atra asya anuvṛtteḥ chando 'dhikāra-vihitānāṃ ca tadviṣayatā iṣyate //
GS24jvkasipu:22847: kāśyapa-kauśikābhyām ṛṣibhyāṃ ṇiniḥ pratyayo bhavati tena proktam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:22852: śaunakādibhyaś chandasi (*4,3.106) ity atra anuvṛtteḥ chando
GS24jvkasipu:22856: ṛṣibhyām iti kim ? idānīṃtanena gotrakāśyapena proktaṃ kāśyapīyam //
GS24jvkasipu:22859: kalāpyantevāsināṃ vaiśampāyanāntevāsināṃ ca ye vācakāḥ śabdās tebhyo ṇiniḥ pratyayo bhavati tena proktam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:22862: tatra kalāpyantevāsinaścatvāraḥ - haridruḥ, chagalī, tumburuḥ, ulapaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:22863: vaiśampāyanāntevasinaḥ nava - ālambiḥ, palaṅgaḥ, kamalaḥ, ṛcābhaḥ, āruṇiḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:22865: pratyakṣa-kāriṇo gṛhyante na tu vyavahitāḥ śaiṣyaśiṣyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:22867: tathā hi vaiśampāyanāntevāsī kalāpī, tadantevāsino vaiśampāyanāntevāsina eva bhavanti, kiṃ kalāpi-grahaṇena ? tathā vaiśampāyanāntevāsī kaṭhas
GS24jvkasipu:22868: tadantevāsī khāṇḍāyanaḥ, tasya kiṃ śaunakādisu pāṭhena ? tad etat pratyakṣakāri-grahaṇasya liṅgam /
GS24jvkasipu:22869: kalāpyanatevāsibhyaḥ tāvat - haridruṇā proktam adhīyate hāridraviṇaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:22886: carakaḥ iti vaiśampāyanasyākhyā, tatsambandhena sarve tadantevāsinaścarakāḥ ity ucyante
GS24jvkasipu:22890: tṛtīyā-samarthāt prokte ṇiniḥ pratyayo bhavati yat proktaṃ purāṇa-proktāś
GS24jvkasipu:22899: āśmarathaḥ kalpaḥ yājñavalkyādayo 'cirakālā ity ākhyāneṣu vārtā /
GS24jvkasipu:22901: tadviṣayatā kasmān na bhavati ? pratipadaṃ brāhmaṇesu yaḥ pratyayas tasya tadviṣayatā vidhīyate ṇineḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:22903: na vā 'yaṃ yogaś chando 'dhikāram anuvartayati, tena kalpeṣv api na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22905: na vā+atyantabādhaiva, tena purātanam ity api bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:22908: śaunaka ity evam ādibhyaḥ ṇiniḥ pratyayo bhavati tena proktam ity etasmin viṣaye chandasy abhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:22913: kaṭhaśāṭha ity atra paṭhyate tatsaṃhatārthaṃ, kevalād dhi lukaṃ vakṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:22936: kaṭha-śabdād vaiśampāyana-anttevāsibhyaḥ iti ṇineḥ, caraka-śabdād apy aṇaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:22944: kalāpi-śabdād aṇ pratyayo bhavati tena proktam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:22947: inaṇyanapatye (*6,4.164) iti prakṛtibhāve prāpte, na antasya ṭilope
GS24jvkasipu:22951: athāṇ-grahaṇaṃ kim, yathāprāptam ity eva siddham ? adhikavidhānārthaṃ,
GS24jvkasipu:22952: tena māthurī vṛttiḥ, saulabhāni brāhmaṇāni ity evam ādi siddham //
GS24jvkasipu:22955: chaṅgalin-śabdāt ḍhinuk pratyayo bhavati tena proktam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:22961: pārāśaryaśilālibhyāṃ ṇiniḥ pratyayo bhavati tena proktam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:22973: karmanda-kṛśāśva-śabdābhyām iniḥ pratyayo bhavati tena proktam ity etasmin viṣaye yathāsaṅkhyaṃ bhikṣu-naṭasūtrayor abhidheyayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:22982: tena iti tṛtīyā-samarthād ekadik ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo
GS24jvkasipu:22989: tena iti prakṛte punaḥ samarthavibhakti-grahaṇaṃ chando
GS24jvkasipu:22994: tasiś ca pratyayo bhavati tena+ekadik ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:22995: pūrveṇ ghādisu aṇādiṣu ca prāpteṣu ayam aparaḥ pratyayo vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:23002: uras-śabdāt yat pratyayo bhavati, cakārāt tasiś ca, tena ekadik ity
GS24jvkasipu:23009: tṛtīyā-samarthāt upajñāte ity etasmin viṣaye yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:23010: vinā upadeśena jñātamaupajñātaṃ, svayam abhisambaddham ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23017: tṛtīyā-samarthāt kṛte ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:23018: yat tatkṛtaṃ granthaś cet sa bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23024: utpāditaṃ kṛtaṃ, vidyāmānām eva jñātam aupajñātam ity ayam anayor viśeṣaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:23027: tṛtīyā-samarthāt kṛte ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati samudāyena cet sañjñā jñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:23035: tena, kṛte, sañjñāyām iti ca+etat sarvam anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:23036: kulālādibhyaḥ vuñ pratyayo bhavati tena kṛtam ity etasminn arthe sañjñāyāṃ gamyamānāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:23060: tena, kṛte, sañjñāyām iti sarvam anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:23061: kṣudrādibhyaḥ añ pratyayo bhavati tena kṛte ity etasmin viṣaye sañjñāyāṃ gamyamānāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:23070: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhī-samarthād idam ity etasmin viṣaye yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo
GS24jvkasipu:23074: prakṛtipratyaya-arthayoḥ ṣaṣṭhy-arthamātraṃ tatsambandhimātraṃ ca vivakṣitaṃ, yadaparaṃ liṅga-saṅkhyā-pratyakṣa-parokṣādikaṃ tatsarvam avivakṣitam /
GS24jvkasipu:23079: anantarādiṣv anabhidhānān na bhavati, devadattasya anantaram iti /
GS24jvkasipu:23090: ratha-śabdāt yat pratyayo bhavati tasya+idam ity etasmn viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:23092: rathasya idam rathyaṃ, cakraṃ vā yugaṃ vā /
GS24jvkasipu:23099: patanti tena iti patram aśvādikaṃ vāhanam ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:23100: tatpūrvād ratha-śabdāt añ pratyayo bhavati tasya+idam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:23107: patraṃ vāhanam, tadvācinaḥ prātipadikāt adhvaryu-pariṣac-chabdābhyāṃ ca añ pratyayo bhavati tasya+idam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:23117: hala-sīra-śabdābhyāṃ ṭhak pratyayo bhavati tasya+idam ity asmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:23123: dvandva-sañjñākāt vun pratyayo bhavati tasya+idam ity etasmin viṣaye,
GS24jvkasipu:23138: gotra-vācibhyaḥ caraṇa-vācibhyaḥ ca prātipadikebhyo vuñ pratyayo bhavati tasya+idam ity etasmin viṣaye aṇo 'pavādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23149: saṅgha-ādiṣu pratayārtha-viśeṣaṇeṣu añanatād, yañantād, iñantāc ca prātipadikād aṇ pratyayo bhavati tasya+idam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:23165: aṅkalakṣaṇayoḥ ko viśeṣaḥ ? lakṣaṇaṃ lakṣyabhūtasya+eva cihnabhūtaṃ svaṃ yathā vidyā bidānām, aṅkastu gavādistho 'pi gavādīnāṃ svaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23170: śākala-śabdāt saṅghādiṣu pratyayārtha-viśeṣaneṣu vā aṇ-pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:23181: chandoga-ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyo ñyaḥ pratyayo bhavati tasya+idam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:23185: chandogānāṃ dharmo vā āmnāyo vā chandogyam /
GS24jvkasipu:23194: teṣv abhidheyeṣu vuñ pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23195: gotra-grahaṇam iha anuvartate, tena vuñ-pratiṣedho vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:23201: daivatika-ādibhyaḥ chaḥ pratayo bhavati tasya+idam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:23202: gotra-pratyayāntā ete, tataḥ pūrveṇa vuñi prāpte cha-vidhāna-arthaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:23215: kaupiñjala-hāstipada-śabdābhyam aṇ pratyayo bhavati tasya+idam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:23222: ātharvaṇika-śabdād aṇ pratyayo bhavati, tatsaṃnihogena ca ika-lopaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:23229: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhī-samarthād vikāraḥ ity etasmin viṣaye yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23231: kim iha+udāharaṇam ? aprāṇyādy-udāttam avṛddhaṃ, yasya ca na anyat pratipadaṃ vidhānam /
GS24jvkasipu:23238: tasya prakaraṇe tasya iti punar vacanaṃ śaiṣika-nivṛtty-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:23244: prāṇ-yoṣadhi-vṛkṣa-vācibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ ṣaṣṭhī-samarthebhyaḥ avayave yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati, cakārād vikāre ca /
GS24jvkasipu:23253: ita uttare pratyayāḥ prāṇyoṣadhivṛkṣebhyaḥ vikārāvayavayoḥ bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:23255: kathaṃ dvayam apy adhikriyate tasya vikāraḥ, avayave ca prāṇy-oṣadhi-vṛkṣebhyaḥ iti ? vikārāvayavayor yugapadadhikāro 'pavāda /
GS24jvkasipu:23260: bilva ity evam ādibhyo 'ṇ pratyayo bhavati vikāra-avayavayor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23263: gavedhukā-śabdo 'tra paṭhyate, tataḥ kopadhāt eva siddhe mayaḍbādhanārthaṃ grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:23280: ka-kāra-upadhāt prātipadikād aṇ pratyayo bhavati yathāyogaṃ vikāra-avayavayor arthayoḥ
GS24jvkasipu:23289: trapu-jatu-śabdābhyām aṇ pratyayo bhavati vikare, tatsanniyogena tayoḥ ṣugāgamo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:23296: u-varṇāntāt prātipadikāt añ pratayo bhavati vikāra-avayavayor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23303: anudāttādeḥ prātipadikāt añ pratyayo bhavati vikāra-avayavayor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23310: palāśa-ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ vā añ pratyayo bhavati vikāra-avayavayor
GS24jvkasipu:23328: śamī-śabdāṭ ṭlañ pratyayo bhavati vikārāvayavayor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23332: mayaḍ vaā+etayor bhāṣāyām abhakṣya ācchādanayoḥ || PS_4,3.143 ||
GS24jvkasipu:23334: prakṛtimātrād vā mayaṭ pratyayo bhavati bhakṣyācchādanavarjitayoḥ vikārāvayavayor arthayor bhāṣāyāṃ viṣaye yathāyathaṃ pratyayeṣu prāpteṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:23337: bhāṣāyām iti kim ? bailvaḥ khādiro vā yūpaḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:23340: etayoḥ ity anena kiṃ yāvatā vikāra-avayavau prakṛtāv eva ? ye
GS24jvkasipu:23341: viśeṣa-pratyayāḥ prāṇirajatādibhyo 'ñ (*4,3.154) ity evam ādayas tadviṣaye
GS24jvkasipu:23342: 'pi yathā syāt, kapotamayam, kāpotam, lohamayam, lauham iti //
GS24jvkasipu:23346: vṛddhebhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ śarādibhyaś ca abhakṣyācchādanayoḥ vikārāvayavayoḥ bhāṣāyāṃ viṣaye nityaṃ mayaṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23353: nitya-grahaṇaṃ kiṃ yāvatā ārambha-sāmarthyād eva nityaṃ bhavisyati ?
GS24jvkasipu:23354: eka-aco nityaṃ mayaṭamicchanti, tad anena kriyate, tvaṅmayam, sraṅmayam ,
GS24jvkasipu:23369: purīṣaṃ na vikāro na ca avayavaḥ, tasya+idaṃ viṣaye vidhānam /
GS24jvkasipu:23373: piṣṭa-śabdān nityaṃ mayaṭ pratyayo bhavati tasya vikāraḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:23378: piṣṭa-śabdāt kan pratyayo bhavati vikāre sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:23383: vrīhi-śabdān mayaṭ pratyayo bhavati puroḍaśe vikāre /
GS24jvkasipu:23389: tila-yava-śabdābhyām asañjñāviṣaye mayaṭ pratyayo bhavati vikārāvayavayor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23397: dvyacaḥ prātipadikāt chandasi viṣaye mayaṭ pratyayo bhavati vikārāvayavayor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23404: utvataḥ prātipadikād vardhra-bilva-śabdābhyāṃ ca mayaṭ pratyayao na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23415: tāla-ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ aṇ pratyayo bhavati vikārāvayavayor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23433: jātarūpa-vācibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ aṇ pratyayo bhavati parimāṇe vikāre /
GS24jvkasipu:23442: prāṇi-vācibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyo rajatadibhyaś ca añ pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:23445: anudāttādeḥ añ vihita eva pariśiṣṭam iha+udāharaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:23470: ñid yo vikārāvayavapratyayas tadantāt prātipadikāt añ pratyayo bhavati vikāravayavayoḥ eva
GS24jvkasipu:23474: luk ca (*4,3.168) ity ete pratyayāḥ gṛhyante /
GS24jvkasipu:23488: prāgvateṣṭhañ (*4,1.18) ity ata ārabhya krītārthe ye pratyayāḥ parimāṇād
GS24jvkasipu:23490: parimāṇāt krīta iva pratyayā bhavanti tasya vikāraḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:23492: saṅkhyā api parimāṇa-grahaṇena gṛhyate, na rūḍhiparimāṇam eva /
GS24jvkasipu:23499: adhyardhapūrvād dvigor lug asañjñāyām (*5,1.28) ity evam ādikam apy atidiśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:23509: umā-śabdād ūrṇā-śadac ca vā vuñ pratyayo bhavati vikārāvayavayor arthayoḥ
GS24jvkasipu:23514: eṇī-śabdād ḍhañ pratyayo bhavati vikārāvayavayor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23521: gopayas-śabdābhyāṃ yat pratyayo bhavati vikārāvayavayor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23524: sarvatra gorajādi-prasaṅge yad asty eva, mayḍviṣaye tu vidhīyate //
GS24jvkasipu:23527: dru-śabdād yat pratyayo bhavati vikārāvayavayor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23532: dra-śabdān māne vikāra-viśeṣe vayaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23537: vikārāvayavayor utpannasya phale tadviṣaye vivakṣite lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23541: phalitasya vṛkṣāsya phalam avayavo bhavati vikāraś ca, pallavitasya+iva
GS24jvkasipu:23546: plakṣa-ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ phale vikārāvayavatvena vivakṣite aṇ pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:23562: jambū-śabdāt phale 'bhidheye vā aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23564: atra aṇo vidhāna - samārthyāl lug na bhavati, añas tu bhavaty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:23569: jambvāḥ phale 'bhidheye pratyayasya vā lup bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23571: jambvāḥ phalam jambūḥ phalam, jambu phalam, jāmbavam iti vā /
GS24jvkasipu:23587: bahulavacanāt kvacid anyad api bhavati, kadambaṃ puṣpam, aśokam,
GS24jvkasipu:23591: harītakī ity evam ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ phale pratyayasya lub bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23592: luki prāpte lupo vidhāne yuktavadbhāve strī-pratyayaśravaṇe ca viśeṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23596: atra ca vyaktir yuktavadbhāvena+iṣyate, vacanaṃ tv abhidheyavad eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23620: kaṃsīya-paraśavya-śabdābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ yañ-añau pratyayau bhavataḥ tasya vikāraḥ ity etasmin viṣaye, tatsaṃniyogena ca kaṃsīya-paraśavyayoḥ
GS24jvkasipu:23625: paraśavya-śabdād anudātta-āditvād eva añi siddhe lug-arthaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:23626: nanu ca yasya+iti ca (*6,4.148) iti lope kṛte halas taddhitasya (*6,4.150)
GS24jvkasipu:23627: iti ya-lopo bhaviṣyati ? naa+ead asti, īti iti tatra vartate //
GS24jvkasipu:23628: iti śrījayādityaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau caturthādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:23634: prāgetasmād vahatisaṃśabdanād yānarthān anukramamiṣyāmaḥ, ṭhak pratyayas teṣv adhikṛto veditavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23635: vakṣyati - tena dīvyati khanati jayati jitam (*4,4.2) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:23652: tena dīvyati khanati jayati jitam || PS_4,4.2 ||
GS24jvkasipu:23654: tena iti tṛtīyā-samarthād dīvyati khanati jayati jitam ity eteṣv artheṣu ṭhak pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:23663: devadattena jitam iti pratyayo na bhavati, anabhidhānāt /
GS24jvkasipu:23669: tena iti tṛtīyā-samarthāt saṃskṛtam ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo
GS24jvkasipu:23678: kulattha-śabdāt ka-kāropadhāt śabdāc ca prātipadikād aṇ pratyayo hbavati
GS24jvkasipu:23686: tena iti tṛtīyāsamarthāt tarati ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo hbavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23692: gopuccha-śabdāṭ ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati tarati ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:23698: nau-śabdād dvyacaś ca prātipadikāṭ ṭhan pratyayo hbavati tarati ity etasmin arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:23708: vidhivākyāpekṣaṃ ca ṣaṭtvaṃ, pratyayās tu sapta //
GS24jvkasipu:23711: tena iti tṛtīyāsamarthāc carati ity etasminn arthe ṭhak patyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23718: ākarṣa-śabdād ṣthal pratyayo bhavati carati ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:23727: parpa ity evam ādibhyaḥ ṣṭhan pratyayo bhavati carati ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:23748: śvagaṇa-śabdāt ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati, cakārāt ṣṭhan, carati ity etasminn
GS24jvkasipu:23755: śva-āder iñi (*7,3.8) it yatra vakṣyati, ikārādi-grahaṇaṃ ca kartavyam śvāgaṇikādy-artham (*7,3.8) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:23759: tena iti tṛtīyāsamarthebhyaḥ vetanādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ jīvati ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23785: vasna-krayavikraya-śabdābhyāṃ tṛtīyāsamarthābhyāṃ ṭhan pratyayo bhavati jīvati ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:23794: āyudha-śabdāt cha pratyayo bhavati, cakārāṭ ṭhaṃś ca, jīvati ity etasmin
GS24jvkasipu:23800: utsaṅgādibhyas tṛtiyāsamarthebhyo harati ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23811: bhastrā ity evam ādibhyaḥ tṛtīyāsamrthebhyaḥ harati tiyetasminnarthe ṣṭhan pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:23827: vivadha-vīvadha-śabdābhyām tṛtīyāsamarthābhyāṃ vibhāṣā ṣṭhan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23835: vivadha-vīvadha-śabdau samānārthau pathi paryāhāre ca vartete //
GS24jvkasipu:23839: kuṭilikā-śabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthād aṇ pratyayo hbavati harati ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:23840: kuṭilikāyā harati mṛgo vyādhaṃ kauṭiliko mṛgaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23842: kuṭilikā vakragatiḥ, karmārāṇāmāyudhakarṣaṇī lohamayī yaṣṭiś ca+ucyate //
GS24jvkasipu:23846: akṣadyūtādibhyaḥ tṛtīyāsamarthebhyo nirvṛtte ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23861: ḍvitaḥ ktriḥ (*3,3.88) ity ayaṃ triśabdo gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:23862: tryantān nityaṃ map pratyayo bhavati tena virvṛtte ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:23867: map-pratyayāntam eva bhavati, viṣayāntare na prayoktavyam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:23876: apamitya-yācita-śabdābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ kak kan ity etau pratyayau
GS24jvkasipu:23883: tṛtīyāsamarthāt saṃsṛṣṭe ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23897: saṃsṛṣte (*4,3.22) ity anena+utpannasya ṭhako lavaṇa-śabdāl luk bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23901: dravya-vācī lavaṇa-śabdo lukaṃ prayojayati, na guṇavācī //
GS24jvkasipu:23904: mudga-śabdād aṇ pratyayo bhavati saṃsṛṣṭe ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:23911: vyañjana-vācibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ tṛtīyāsamarthebhyaḥ upasikte ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23918: ojas sahas ambhas ity etebhyaḥ tṛtīyāsamarthebhyo vartate ity arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:23925: prati anu ity evaṃ pūrvebhyaḥ īpa-loma-kūla-śabdebhyo dvitiyāsamarthebhyo vartate ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23926: nanu ca vṛtir akarmakaḥ, tasya kathaṃ karmaṇā sambandhaḥ ? kriyāviśṣaṇam akarmakāṇām api karma bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23935: parimukha-śabdād dvitīyāsamarthād vartate ity easminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23941: tat iti dvitīyāsamarthāt prayacchati ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo
GS24jvkasipu:23942: bhavati, yat tad dvitīyāsamarthaṃ garhyaṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23949: garhyam iti kim ? dviguṇaṃ prayacchaty adhamarṇaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:23955: kusīda-daśa-ekādaśaśabdābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ ṣṭhan ṣṭhac ity etau pratyayau
GS24jvkasipu:23956: bhavataḥ prayacchati garhyam ity etasmin viṣaye /
