GS24jvkasipu:23964: tad iti dvitīyāsamarthād ucchati ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:23971: tad iti dvitīyāsamarthād rakṣati ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:23976: tad iti dvitīyāsamarthābhyāṃ śabda-dardura-śabdābhyāṃ karoti ity etasminn
GS24jvkasipu:23983: pakṣyādibhyo dvitīyāsamarthebhyo hanti ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23984: svarūpasya paryāyāṇāṃ tadviśeṣāṇām ca grahaṇam iha+isyate /
GS24jvkasipu:23999: paripantha-śabdāt tad iti dvitīyāsamarthāt tiṣṭhati ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:24009: mātha-śabda-uttarapadāt prātipaikāt padavī anupada ity etābhyāṃ ca dhāvati ity etasminnarthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24018: atha vā ākrandyate ity ākrandaḥ ārtāyanam ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:24020: ākranda-śabdāt tad iti dvitīyāsamarthād dhāvati ity etasminn arthe ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati, cakārāṭ ṭhak ca /
GS24jvkasipu:24026: padaśabdaḥ uttarapadaṃ yasya tasmāt padottarapada-śabdāt tad iti dvitīyāsamarthād gṛhṇāti ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24029: padānatāt iti na+uktaṃ, bahucpūrvān mā bhūt iti //
GS24jvkasipu:24032: pratikaṇṭha-artha-lalāma-śabdebhyaḥ tad iti dvitīyāsamarthebhyaḥ gṛhṇāti ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24038: dharma-śabdāt tad iti dvitīyāsamarthāc carati ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:24045: pratipatha-śabdād dvitīyāsamarthād eti ity asminn arthe ṭhan pratyayo
GS24jvkasipu:24050: samavāyā-vācibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ tad iti dvitīyāsamarthebhyaḥ samavaiti ity
GS24jvkasipu:24054: samavaiti āgatya tadekadeśī bhavati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24061: pariṣadaḥ ṇyaḥ pratyayo bhavati samavāyān samavaiti ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:24066: senā-śabdād vā ṇyaḥ pratyayo bhavati samavāyān samavaiti ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:24072: lalāṭa-kukkuṭī-śabdābhyāṃ tad iti dvitīyāsamarthābhyāṃ paśyati ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:24077: tad anena lalāṭa-darśanena sevakasya svāminaṃ prati anupaśleṣaḥ kāryeṣu anupasthāyitvaṃ lakṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:24081: deśasya alpatayā hi bhikṣuravikṣiptadṛṣṭiḥ pādavikṣepadeśe cakṣuḥ saṃyamya gacchati sa ucyate kaukkuṭikaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:24084: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthād dharmyam ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24093: mahiṣī ity evam ādibhyaḥ aṇ pratyayo bhavati tasya dharmyam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:24110: ṛkārāntāt prātipadikāt añ pratyayo bhavati tasya dharmyam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:24123: ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt avakraya ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24129: nanu avakrayo 'pi dharmyam eva ? na+etad asti /
GS24jvkasipu:24133: tad iti prathamāsamarthād asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati yattatprathamāsamarthaṃ paṇyaṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24137: paṇyam iti viśeṣanaṃ taddhitavṛttāv antarbhūtam ataḥ paṇya-śabdo na prayujyate //
GS24jvkasipu:24140: lavaṇa-śabdāṭ ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati tad asya paṇyam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:24146: kiśara ity evam ādibhyaḥ ṣṭhan pratyayo tad asya paṇyam ity etasmin viṣaye
GS24jvkasipu:24165: śalālu-śabdād anyatarasyāṃ ṣṭhan pratyayo bhavati tad asya paṇyam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:24175: tad iti prathamāsamarthād asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati yattat prathamāsamarthaṃ śilpaṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24184: maḍḍuka-jharjhara-śabdābhyām anyatarasyām aṇ pratyayo bhavati tad asya
GS24jvkasipu:24192: tad iti prathamāsamarthād asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:24193: yattat prathamāsamarthaṃ praharaṇaṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24199: paraśvadha-śabdāt ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati, cakārāt ṭhak /
GS24jvkasipu:24204: śakti-yaṣṭi-śabdābhyām īkak pratyayo bhavati tad asya praharaṇam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:24211: tad iti prathamāsamarthebhyaḥ asti nāsti diṣṭa ity etebhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati yat tat prathamāsamarthaṃ matiś cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24215: na ca matisattāmātre pratyaya iṣyate, kiṃ tarhi, paraloko 'sti iti yasya matiḥ sa āstikaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:24219: asti-nāsti-śabdau nipātau, vacanasāmarthyād vā ākhyātād vākyāc ca pratyayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:24223: tad iti prathamāsamarthād asya iti ṣaṣṭyarthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati yattat prathamāsamarthaṃ śīlaṃ ced tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24228: bhakṣaṇakriyā tadviśeṣaṇaṃ ca śīlaṃ taddhitavṛttāv antarbhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:24231: chatra ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyo ṇaḥ pratyayo bhavati tad asya śīlam ity etasmin viṣaye
GS24jvkasipu:24236: sthā-śabdo 'tra paṭhyate, sa upasarga-pūrvo 'tra gṛhyate āsthā saṃsthā
GS24jvkasipu:24256: tad iti prathamāsamarthād asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati, yat tatprathamāsmarthaṃ karma cet tad vṛttam adhyayanaviṣayaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24260: ekamanyat iti vigṛhya taddhitārtha iti samāsaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24262: adhyayane karma vṛttam ity etat sarvaṃ taddhitavṛttāvantarbhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24263: yasya adhyayanaprayuktasya parīkṣākāle paṭhataḥ skhalitam apapāṭharūpam ekaṃ jātaṃ sa ucyate aikānyikaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:24267: bahvac pūrvapadaṃ yasya tasmād bahvacpūrvapadāt prātipadikāt ṭhac pratyayo bhavati tad asya karmādhyayane vṛttam ity etasminn arthe ṭhako 'pavādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24272: udātte kartavye yo 'nudāttaṃ karoti sa ucyate anyat tvaṃ karoṣi iti //
GS24jvkasipu:24276: tad iti prathamāsamarthādasya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati yat tatprathamāsamarthaṃ hitaṃ cet tad bhavati, tac ca bhakṣāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24277: nanu ca hitayoge caturthyā bhavitavyaṃ, tatra kathaṃ ṣaṣṭhyarthe pratyayo vidhīyate ? evaṃ tarhi sāmarthyād vibhaktivipariṇāmo bhaviṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:24284: tat iti prathamāsamarthād asmā iti caturthyartha ṭhak pratyayo bhavati yat tat prathamāsamarthaṃ tac ced dīyate niyuktam /
GS24jvkasipu:24287: agre bhojanam asmai niyuktaṃ dīyate āgrabhojanikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24294: śrāṇā-māṃsa-odana-śabdābhyāṃ ṭiṭhan pratyayo bhavati tad asmai dīyate
GS24jvkasipu:24303: atha ṭhañ eva kasmān na+uktaḥ, na hy atra ṭhañaṣ ṭiṭhano vā viśeṣo 'sti ?
GS24jvkasipu:24304: māṃsaudana-grahaṇaṃ saṅghātavigṛhīta-arthaṃ kecid icchanti, tatra vṛddhyabhāvo viśeṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24309: bhakta-śabdād aṇ pratyayo bhavati anyatrasyām tad asami dīyate niyuktam ity etasmin viṣaye
GS24jvkasipu:24312: bhaktam asmai dīyate niyuktam bhāktaḥ, bhaktikaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:24315: tatra iti saptamīsamarthān niyukta ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24324: agāra-śabdāntāt prātipadikāt ṭhan pratyayo bhavati tatra niyuktaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:24332: saptamīsamarthād adeśa-vācinaḥ paratipadikād akāla-vācinaḥ ca adhyāyinyabhidheye ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24333: adhyayanasya yau deśakālau śāstraṇa pratiṣiddhau tāvadeśakāla-śabdena+ucyete, tata idaṃ pratyayavidhānam /
GS24jvkasipu:24343: kaṭhina-śabdāntāt saptamīsamarthāt prastāra-saṃsthāna-śabdābhyāṃ ca ṭhak pratyayo bhavati vyavaharati ity etasmnn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:24351: nikaṭa-śābdāt saptamīsmarthāt vasati ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24352: yasya śāstrato nikaṭavāsas tatra ayaṃ vidhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24353: āraṇyakena bhikṣuṇā grāmāt krośe vastavyam iti śāstram /
GS24jvkasipu:24358: āvasatha-śabdāt saptamīsamarthāt vasati ity etasminn arthe ṣṭhal pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24363: ṭhakaḥ pūrṇo 'vadhiḥ, ataḥ paramanyaḥ pratyayo vidhīyate //
GS24jvkasipu:24367: prāg etasmād dhitasaṃśabdanād yānita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmo yat pratyayasteṣvadhikṛto veditavyaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:24375: tad iti dvitīyāsamarthebhyo rathayugaprāsaṅgebhyo vahati ity etasminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:24379: rathasītāhalebhyo yad vidhau iti tad anatavidhy-upasaṅkhyānāt
GS24jvkasipu:24384: dhur ity etasmād dvitīyāsamarthād vahati ity etasminn arthe yat ḍhak ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ
GS24jvkasipu:24389: sarvadhurā-śabdād dvitīyāsamarthāt vahati ity etasminn arthe khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24391: strīliṅge nyāyye sarvadhurāt iti prātipadikamātra-apekṣo nirdeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24398: ekadhurā-śabdād dvitīyāsamarthād vahati ity etasminn arthe khaḥ pratyayo
GS24jvkasipu:24405: śakaṭa-śabdād dvitīyāsamarthād vahati ity etasminn arthe aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24410: hala-sīra-śabdābhyāṃ dvitīyāsmarthābhyāṃ vahati ity etasminn arthe ṭhak
GS24jvkasipu:24417: janī-śabdād dvitīyāsamarthād vahati ity etasminn arthe yat pratyayo
GS24jvkasipu:24424: tat iti dvitīyāsamarthād vidhyati ity etasminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:24428: adhanuṣā iti kim ? pādau vidhyati dhanuṣā /
GS24jvkasipu:24429: nanu asamarthatvād anabhidhānāc ca pratyayo na bhavati, na hi dhanuṣā
GS24jvkasipu:24430: padya iti vivakṣito 'rthaḥ pratīyate ? evaṃ tarhi dhanuṣpratiṣedhena
GS24jvkasipu:24431: vyadhanakriyā viśeṣyate, yasyāṃ dhanuṣkaraṇam na sambhāvyate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:24432: tena iha na bhavati, cauraṃ vidhyati, śatruṃ vidhyati devadattaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:24436: dhanagaṇa-śabdābhyāṃ dvitīyāsamarthābhyām labdhā ity etasminn arthe yat
GS24jvkasipu:24440: labdhā iti tṛnnantaṃ, tena dvitīyā samarthā vibhaktir yujyate //
GS24jvkasipu:24443: anna-śabdāt tad iti dvitīyāsamarthāt labdhā ity etasmin arthe ṇaḥ pratyayo
GS24jvkasipu:24448: vaśa-śabdāt tad iti dvitīyāsamarthād gataḥ ity etasminn arthe yat pratyayo
GS24jvkasipu:24455: padaśabdāt prathamāsamarthād dṛśyārthopādhikād asminniti saptamyarthe yat pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:24459: śakyate yasmin padaṃ mūlyāḥ, suṣṭhu draṣṭuṃ pratimudrotpādanena sa padyaḥ kardamaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24463: mula-śabdāt prathamāsamarthād āvarhi ity evam upādhikādasya+iti
GS24jvkasipu:24468: yeṣāṃ mūlam āvṛhyate utpāṭyate te mūlyāḥ, suṣṭhu niṣpannāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24469: mūlotpāṭanena vinā saṅgrahītuṃ na śakyante ity arthaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:24474: dhenoḥ sugāgamo yaś ca pratyayaḥ nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:24476: yā dhenur uttamarṇāya ṛṇapradānād dohanārthaṃ dīyate sā dhenuṣyā /
GS24jvkasipu:24482: gṛhapati-śabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthāt saṃyukte ity etasminn arthe ñyaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24484: anyasya api gṛhapatinā saṃyogo 'sti, tatra sañjñādhikārād atiprasaṅga-nivṛttiḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:24488: nāvādhibhyo 'ṣṭabhyaḥ śabdebhyo 'ṣṭasv eva tāryādiṣv artheṣu yathāsaṅkhyaṃ yat pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:24495: tena vayasā tulye śatrau na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24497: nanu ca dharmādanapete iti vakṣyamāṇena+eva siddham ? na+etad asti /
GS24jvkasipu:24498: dharmaṃ yad anuvartate tad dharmād anapetam ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:24499: phalaṃ tu dharmād apety eva, kāryavirodhitvād dharmasya /
GS24jvkasipu:24504: paṭādīnām utpattikāraṇaṃ mūlaṃ tena tadabhibhūyate śeṣīkriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:24506: poradupadhāt (*3,1.98) iti yati prāpte ānāmyam iti nipātanāt ṇyat /
GS24jvkasipu:24511: rathasītāhalebhyo yad vidhau iti tad antavidhir api iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:24518: yathā tulā paricchinatti param evaṃ tad api iti //
GS24jvkasipu:24522: dharmādibhyaḥ pañcamīsamarthebhyo 'napetaḥ ity arthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24531: chandaḥ-śabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthān nirmite ity etasminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24538: uraḥśabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthān nirmite ity etasminn arthe 'ṇ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:24540: urasā nirmitaḥ aurasaḥ putraḥ, urasyaḥ putraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24545: hṛdaya-śabdāt ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt priyaḥ ity etasminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24549: iha na bhavati, hṛdayasya priyaḥ putraḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:24556: hṛdaya-śabdāt ṣaṣṭhīsamarthād bandhane ṛṣāvabhidheye yat pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:24559: parahṛdayaṃ yena badhyate vaśīkriyate sa vaśīkaraṇamantro hṛdyaḥ ity ucyate //
GS24jvkasipu:24562: matādibhyaḥ tribhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ triṣv eva karaṇādiṣv artheṣu yathāsaṅkhyaṃ yat pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:24573: tatra iti saptamīsamarthāt sādhuḥ ity etasminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:24578: sādhuḥ iha pravīṇo yogyo vā gṛhyate, na+upakārakaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24579: tatra hi paratvāt tasmai hitam (*5,1.5) ity anena vidhinā bhavitavyam //
GS24jvkasipu:24582: pratijanādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ khañ pratyayo bhavati tatra sādhuḥ ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:24601: yatra hitārtha eva sādhvarthastatra vacanāt prākkrītīyā bādhyante //
GS24jvkasipu:24604: bhakta-śabdāt ṇaḥ pratyayo bhavati tatra sādhuḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:24610: pariṣac-chabdād ṇyaḥ pratyayo bhavati tatra sādhuḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:24615: pariṣadaḥ ṇo bhavati, pariṣadi sādhuḥ pāriṣadaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24620: kathādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ ṭhak pratyayo bhavati tatra sādhuḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:24638: guḍa-ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati tatra sādhuḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:24657: pathy-ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ ḍhañ pratyayo bhavati tatra sādhuḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:24665: sabhā-śabdād yaḥ pratyayo bhavati tatra sādhuḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:24671: sabhā-śabdāḍ ḍhaḥ pratyayo bhavati tatra sādhuḥ ity etasmin viṣaye chandasi /
GS24jvkasipu:24678: samāanatīrtha-śabdāt tatra iti saptamīsamarthād vāsi ity etasminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:24684: samānodara-śabdāt saptamīsamarthāt śayitaḥ ity etasminn arthe yat pratyayo
GS24jvkasipu:24690: sodara-śabdāt saptamīsamarthāt śayitaḥ ity etsminn arthe yaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24692: iti sūtreṇa yakārādau pratyaye vivakṣite prāg eva samānasya sabhāvaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24699: sptamīsamarthāt bhava ity etasminn arthe chandasi viṣaye yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24701: sati darśane te 'pi bhavanti, sarvavidhīnām chandasi vyabhicārāt /
GS24jvkasipu:24702: namo medhyāya ca vidyutyāya ca namaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24704: bhavādhikāraś ca samudra-abhrād dhaḥ (*4,4.118) iti yāvat //
GS24jvkasipu:24707: pāthaḥ-śabdān nadī-śabdāc ca ḍyaṇ pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:24710: ca no dadhīta nādyo giro me /
GS24jvkasipu:24714: veśanta-śabdād dhimavaccha-śabdāc ca aṇ pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:24719: srotaḥ-śabdād vibhāṣā ḍyat dya ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ tatra bhavaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:24728: sagarbha-sayūtha-sanuta-śabdebhyo yan pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity
GS24jvkasipu:24738: tugra-śabdād ghan pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:24744: agra-śabdāt yat pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:24746: kim artham idaṃ yāvatā sāmānyena yad vihita eva ? ghacchau ca (*4,4.117)
GS24jvkasipu:24747: iti vakṣyati tābhyāṃ bādhā mā bhūt iti punar vidhīyate //
GS24jvkasipu:24750: agra-śabdāt yat gha-cchau ca pratyayā bhavanti tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:24752: cakāraḥ tugrād ghan (*4,4.115) ity asya anukarṣaṇa-arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24757: samudra-śabdāt abhra-śabdāc ca ghaḥ pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:24766: barhiḥ-śabdāt saptamīsamarthāt dattam ity etasmin arthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24771: dūta-śabdāt ṣaṣṭhīsamarthād bhāge karmaṇi ca abhidheye yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24779: rakṣaḥ-śabdād yātu-śabdāc ca ṣaṣṭhīsamarthād hananī ity etasminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:24781: yā vāṃ mitrāvaruṇau rakṣasyā tanū yātavyā /
GS24jvkasipu:24788: revaty-ādibhyaḥ ṣaṣṭhīsamarthebhyaḥ praśasye vācye yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24789: praśaṃsanaṃ praśasyam, bhāve kyap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24793: haviṣe hitā haviṣyāḥ, tāsāṃ praśaṃsnaṃ haviṣyam /
GS24jvkasipu:24794: yasya+iti ca (*6,4.148) iti lope kṛte halo yamāṃ yami lopaḥ (*8,4.64) iti lopaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:24797: asura-śabdāt ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt svam ity etasminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24799: asuryaṃ vā etat pātraṃ yat kulālakṛtaṃ cakravṛttam //
GS24jvkasipu:24802: asura-śabdāt ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt māyāyāṃ svaviśeṣe aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24805: tadvān āsām upadhāno mantra iti iṣṭakāsu luk ca matoḥ || PS_4,4.125 ||
GS24jvkasipu:24808: matub-antāt prātipadikāt prathamāsamarthād āsām iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe yat
GS24jvkasipu:24809: pratyayo bhavati, yat prathamāsamartham upadhāno mantraś cet sa bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:24810: yat tad āsām iti nirdiṣṭam iṣṭakāś cet tā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:24817: varcasvānupadhānamantraḥ āsām iṣṭakānām iti vigṛhya yati vihite mator luki
GS24jvkasipu:24821: tadvān iti kim ? mantrasamudāyād eva mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:24822: upadhānaḥ iti kim ? varcasvān upasthānamantraḥ āsām ity atra mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:24823: mantraḥ iti kim ? aṅgulimānupadhāno hastaḥ āsām ity atra mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:24824: iṣṭakāsu iti kim ? aṅgulimānupadhāno hasta āsām ity atra mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:24826: anekapadasambhave 'pi kenacid eva padena tadvān mantro gṛhyate, na sarveṇa //
GS24jvkasipu:24832: aśvimānupadhāno mantraḥ āsāmi ṣṭakānām iti vigṛhyāṇ vidhīyate, tatra matupo luki kṛte inaṇyanapatye (*6,4.164) iti prakṛtibhāvaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24836: vayasvānupadhāno mantro yāsāṃ tā vayasyāḥ, tāsv abhidheyāsu mūrdhno matup pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:24838: yasmin mantre vayaḥ-śabdo mūrdhan-śabdaś ca vidyate sa vayasvān api bhavati mūrdhanvān api, yathā mūrdhā vayaḥ prajāpatiś chandaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:24839: tatra vayasvacchabdād iva mūrdhavacchabdād api yati prāpte matup vidhāsyate /
GS24jvkasipu:24842: vayasyāsu iti kim ? yatra mūrdhan-śabda eva kevalo na vayaḥ-śabdasn tatra mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:24843: mūrdhanvataḥ iti vaktavye mūrdhnaḥ ity uktaṃ, matupo lukaṃ bhāvinaṃ citte kṛtvā //
GS24jvkasipu:24846: yasminn arthe matub vihitaḥ, tasminś chandasi viṣaye yat pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:24848: prathamāsamarthād asty upādhikāt ṣaṣṭhyārthe saptamyarthe ca yatpratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24850: nabhāṃsi vidyante asmin māse abhasyo māsaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24855: tanvā khalv api - ojo 'syāṃ vidyate ojasyā tanūḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24857: māsatanvoḥ iti kim ? madhumatā pātreṇa carati māsatanvor anantarārthe vā /
GS24jvkasipu:24858: madhv asminn asti madhv asminn anantaram iti vā madhvyo māsaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24870: madhu-śabdān matvarthe ñaḥ pratyayo bhavati, cakārād yat ca /
GS24jvkasipu:24873: tanvāṃ khalv api mādhavā, madhavyā, madhuḥ tanūḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:24882: matvarthe ity eva veśoyaśasī ādau yasya prātipadikasya tasmād veśoyaśāader bhagāntāt prātipadikāt matvarthe yal pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24883: lakāraḥ svarārthaḥ veśobhago vidyate yasya sa veśobhagyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24887: veśaś ca asau bhagaś ca śrīprabhṛtir veśobhagaḥ, so 'sya asti iti veśobhagyaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:24890: veśoyaśāader bhagāntāt prātipadikāt matvarthe khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24899: pūrvaśabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthāt kṛtam ity etasminn arthe ina ya ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24904: pūrvaiḥ iti bahuvacanān tena pūrvapuruṣāḥ ucyante /
GS24jvkasipu:24905: tatkṛtāḥ panthānaḥ praśastā iti pathāṃ praśaṃsā //
GS24jvkasipu:24909: ap-śabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthāt saṃskṛtam ity etasminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24915: sahasra-śabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthāt sammita ity etasminn arthe ghaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24920: tatra api samityā sammitaḥ eva lakṣayitavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24924: matvarthe ca sahasra-śabdāt ghaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24926: tapaḥ-sahasrābhyāṃ vini-inī (*5,2.102), aṇ ca (*5,2.103) ity asya apavādaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:24930: soma-śabdāt dvitīyāsamarthāt arhati ity etasminn arthe yaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24955: vasu-śabdāt samūhe vācye yat pratyayo bhavati, cakārānmayaḍarthe ca /
GS24jvkasipu:24965: eśa vai saptadaśākṣaraś chandasyaḥ prajāpatiraṃryajño mantre vihitaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24967: chandaḥśabdād akṣarasamūhe vartamānāt svārthe yat pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24980: sarvadeva-śabdābhyāṃ tātil pratyayo bhavati chandasi viṣaye svārthikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24987: śivādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ ṣaṣṭhīsamarthebhyaḥ kare ity etasminn arthe tātil pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:24993: bhāve cārthe chandasi viṣaye śivādibhyaḥ tātil pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24999: iti śrijayādityaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau caturthādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:25005: prāg etasmāt krīta-saṃśabdanād yān ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:25013: tena prāk ṭhañaḥ chanḥ iti noktam //
GS24jvkasipu:25017: u-varṇāntāt prātipadikāt gava-ādibhyaś ca yat pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:25026: tataḥ paratvāt carmaṇo 'ñ (*5,1.15) ity eṣa vidhiḥ prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:25029: tato vibhāṣā havir-apūpa-ādibhyaś ca (*5,1.3) ity eṣa vidhiḥ prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:25030: tatra sarvatra pūrvavipratiṣedhena yat-pratyay eva+iṣyate, sanaṅgavyaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:25032: gavādiṣu nābhi nabha ca iti paṭhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:25034: nābhi-śabdo yat-pratyayam utpādayati nabhaṃ cādeśam āpadyate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:25037: yas tu śarīra-avayavād yat (*5,1.6) iti yati kṛte, nābhaye hitaṃ nābhyaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:25039: gava-ādiṣu yatā sanniyukto nabhabhāvo 'tra na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25049: śunaḥ samprasāraṇaṃ vā ca dīrghatvaṃ tatsaniyogena cāntodāttatvam /
GS24jvkasipu:25051: cakārasya anukta-samuccaya-arthatvāt nas taddhite iti lopo na syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:25061: kambalāt prākkrītīyeṣv artheṣu yat pratyayo bhavati sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25071: haviśśabdāt tu gavādiṣu paṭhān nityam eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25095: tasmai iti caturthī-samarthād htam ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25106: śarīra-avayava-vācinaḥ prātipadikāt yat pratyayo bhavati tasmai hitam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25115: khala-ādibhyo yat pratyayo bhavati tasmai hitam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25123: vṛṣṇe hitam, brāhmaṇebhyo hitam iti vākyam eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25129: aja avi ity etābhyāṃ thyan pratyayo bhavati tasmai hitam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25135: ātman viśvajana ity etābhyāṃ bhogottarapadāc ca prātipadikāt khaḥ pratyayo bhavati tasmai hitam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25137: ātmann iti nalopo na kṛtaḥ prakṛti-parimāṇa-jñāpana-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:25138: tena+uttarapada-grahaṇam bhoga-śabdena+eva sambadhyate, na tu pratyekam /
GS24jvkasipu:25143: ṣaṣṭhī-samāsād bahuvrīheś ca cha eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25166: bhogottarapadābhyam eva khaḥ pratyayaḥ iṣyate, na kevalābhyām /
GS24jvkasipu:25170: kevalābhyāṃ vākyam eva bhavati, rājñe hitam, ācāryāya hitam iti //
GS24jvkasipu:25173: sarva-puruṣābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ ṇaḍañau pratyayau bhavataḥ tasmai hitam
GS24jvkasipu:25181: pauruṣeyo vadhaḥ, pauruṣeyo vikāraḥ, pauruṣeyaḥ samūho vā /
GS24jvkasipu:25185: māṇavacaraka-śabdābhyāṃ khañ pratyayo bhavati tasmai hitam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25191: prakṛtiḥ upādānakāraṇaṃ, tasya+eva uttaram avasthāntaraṃ vikṛtiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25192: vikṛti-vācinaḥ prātipādikāt prakṛtāv abhidheyāyāṃ yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25197: na prakṛtivikāra-sambhavam ātre pratyayaḥ, kiṃ tarhi, prakṛter ananyārthatve vivakṣite /
GS24jvkasipu:25198: pratyayārthasya ca tadarthatve sati sāmarthyāl labhyā caturthī samarthavibhaktiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25199: kecit tu tasmai hitam (*5,1.5) ity anuvartayanti /
GS24jvkasipu:25200: aṅgārebhyo hitāni etāni kāṣṭhāni aṅgārīyāṇi kāṣṭhāni /
GS24jvkasipu:25206: prakṛtyantar anivṛttir atra vivakṣitā na tādarthyam dhānānāṃ saktavaḥ, na lājānām iti /
GS24jvkasipu:25208: vikṛti-grahaṇe 'kriyamāṇe yā kācit prakrtir gṛhyate, na+upādānakāraṇam eva
GS24jvkasipu:25209: bhavati ca kūpa udakasya prakṛtiḥ, tatra+utpādanāt /
GS24jvkasipu:25210: na tu udakaṃ tasyaḥ vikṛtiḥ, atyantabhedāt prakṛtau iti kim ? asyarthā kośī /
GS24jvkasipu:25211: asirayaso vikṛtir bhavati, na tu kośī tasya prakṛtir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25212: dvayor api prakṛti-vikṛtyor grahaṇe vivakṣitaḥ prakṛtivikārabhāvo labhyate
GS24jvkasipu:25215: chadir-ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ ḍhañ pratyayo bhavati tadarthaṃ vikṛteḥ
GS24jvkasipu:25222: upadhīyate iti upadhiḥ rathāṅgaṃ aupadheyam api tad eva dāru //
GS24jvkasipu:25225: ṛṣabha upānaḥ ity rathāṅgaṃ aupadheyam api etābhyāṃ ñyaḥ pratyayo bhavati tadarthaṃ vikṛṭeḥ prakṛtau (*5,1.12) ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25229: carmaṇy api prakṛtitvena vivakṣite pūrvavipratiṣedhād ayam eva+iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:25234: carmaṇo yā vikṛtiḥ tadvācinaḥ prātipadikāt añ pratyayo bhavati tadarthaṃ vikṛteḥ prakṛtau (*5,1.12) ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25240: tad iti prathamā samarthavibhaktiḥ, asya iti pratyayārthaḥ, syāt iti prakṛtiviśeṣaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:25243: saptamy-arthe tu pratyaya ity etāvān viśeṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25244: prathamāsamarthāt ṣaṣṭhyarthe saptamyarthe ca yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo
GS24jvkasipu:25245: bhavati, yat tat prathamāsamarthaṃ syāc cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25249: saptamyarthe khalv api - prākāro 'smin deśe syāt prākārīyo deśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25251: syād iti sambhāvanāyāṃ liṅ, sambhāvane 'lam iti ced ity ādinā /
GS24jvkasipu:25252: iṣṭakānāṃ vahutvena tat sambhāvyate prākāra āsāmiṣṭakānāṃ syāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:25253: deśasya ca guṇena sambhāvyate prāsādo 'smin deśe syāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:25259: atha+iha kasmān na bhavati, prāsādo devadattasya syāt iti ? guṇavānayaṃ sambhāvyate prāsādalābho 'sya iti /
GS24jvkasipu:25263: parikhāś-abdāt ḍhañ pratyayo bhavati tad asya tad asmin syāt (*5,1.16) ity etasminn arthe
GS24jvkasipu:25270: tena tulyaṃ kriyā ced vatiḥ (*5,1.115) iti vakṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:25271: prāg etasmād vatisaṃ-śabdanād yānita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ ṭhañ pratyayas teṣv adhikṛto viditavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25279: ā etasmād arhasaṃśabdanād yān ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ ṭhak pratyayas teṣv adhikṛto veditavyaḥ, gopucchādīn varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:25280: abhividhāv ayam ākāraḥ, tena arhaty artho 'pi ṭhak bhavatyeva /
GS24jvkasipu:25285: agopucchasaṅkhyāparimāṇāt iti kim ? gopucchena krītaṃ gaupucchikam /
GS24jvkasipu:25290: saṅkhyāparimāṇayoḥ ko viśeṣaḥ ? bhedagaṇanaṃ saṅkhyā ekatvādiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25294: ūrdhvamānaṃ kilonmānaṃ parimāṇaṃ tu sarvataḥ āyāmastu pramāṇaṃ syāt saṅkhyā bāhyā tu sarvataḥ
GS24jvkasipu:25298: viṣkādibhyaḥ śabdebhyo 'samāse ṭhak pratyayo bhavati ārhīyeṣv artheṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:25306: ṭhaj eva bhavati, arimāṇāntasya ity uttarapadavṛddhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25307: atha kimartham asamāse ity ucyate yāvatā grahaṇavatā prātipadikena tadantavidhiḥ pratiṣidhyate ? niṣkādiṣv asamāsa-grahaṇaṃ jñāpakaṃ pūrvatra tadantāpratiṣedhasya /
GS24jvkasipu:25308: ugavādibhyo yat (*5,1.2) - gavyam, sugavyam, atisugavyam vibhāṣā havir-apūpādibhyaḥ (*5,1.4) - apūpyam, apūpīyam, yavāpūpyam, yavāpūpīyam /
GS24jvkasipu:25309: śarīra-avayavād yat (*5,2.6) - dantyam, rājadantyam ity evamādi sidhdaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25310: ita uttaraṃ ca saṅkhyāpūrvapadānāṃ tadantavidhir iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:25316: dviśūrpeṇa krītam iti tadantavidhi-pratiṣedhāt śūrpād añ anyatrasyām
GS24jvkasipu:25321: tathā ca+uktam, prāgvateḥ saṅkhyāpūrvapadānāṃ tadant-agrahaṇam aluki iti /
GS24jvkasipu:25333: śata-śabdāt ṭhanyatau pratyayau bhavataḥ aśate 'dhidheye ārhīyeṣv artheṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:25336: aśate iti kim ? śataṃ parimāṇam asya śatakaṃ nidānam /
GS24jvkasipu:25338: śatam eva vastutaḥ prakṛtyarthān na bhidyate /
GS24jvkasipu:25339: iha tu na bhavati, śatena krītaṃ śatyaṃ śāṭakaśatam, śatikaṃ śāṭakaśatam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:25340: vākyena hy atra pratyaya-arthasya tattvaṃ gamyate, na śrutyā /
GS24jvkasipu:25343: dvau ca śataṃ ca dviśataṃ, dviśatena krītaṃ dviśatakam /
GS24jvkasipu:25345: prāgvateḥ saṅkhyā-pūrvapadānāṃ tadantagrahaṇam aluki ity anayā iṣṭyā samāsād api prāpnoti
GS24jvkasipu:25349: saṅkhyāyā aty-antāyā aśad-antāyāś ca kan pratyayo bhavati ārhīyeṣu artheṣu
GS24jvkasipu:25356: arthavatastiśabdasya grahaṇāḍ ḍateḥ paryudāso na bhavati, katikaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:25359: vatvantasya saṅkhyātvāt kan siddha eva, tasya tvanena vā iḍ-āgamo
GS24jvkasipu:25361: vatoḥ parasya ano vā iḍ-āgamo bhavati ārhīyeṣv artheṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:25366: viṃśati-triṃśadbhyāṃ ḍvun pratyayo bhavati asañjñāyāṃ viṣaye ārhīyeṣv
GS24jvkasipu:25373: kathaṃ punar atra kan, yāvatā atiśadantāyāḥ iti paryudāsena bhavitavyam ?
GS24jvkasipu:25374: yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate, viṃśati-triṃśadbhyāṃ kan pratyayo bhavati, tato ḍvun asañjñāyāṃ iti
GS24jvkasipu:25377: kaṃsāṭ ṭiṭhan pratyayo bhavati ārhīyeṣv artheṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:25390: pratiśabdaś ca asya ādeśo vā vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25395: śūrpa-śabdād anyatarasyām añ pratyayo bhavati ārhīyeṣv artheṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:25401: śatamānādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ aṇ pratyayo bhavati ārhīyeṣv artheṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:25410: adhyardha-śabdaḥ pūrvo yasmin tasmād adhyardhapūrvāt prātipadikad dvigoś
GS24jvkasipu:25411: ca parasya ārhīyasya lug bhavati asañjñāyāṃ iti kim ? pāñcalohitikam /
GS24jvkasipu:25414: pratyayāntasya viśeṣaṇam asañjñā-grahaṇaṃ na cet pratyayāntaṃ sañjñā iti /
GS24jvkasipu:25416: kvacid asya saṅkhyākāryaṃ na bhavati, saṅkhyāyāḥ kriyā-abhyāvṛttigaṇane
GS24jvkasipu:25432: alukpakṣe saṅkhyāyāḥ saṃvatsara-saṅkhyasya ca ity uttarapadavṛddhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25442: dvitripūrvād dvigor niṣkāntāt ārhīya-pratyayasya vibhāṣā lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25451: dvi-tri-pūrvād bistāntād dvigoḥ parasya ārhīya-pratyayasya vibhāṣā lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25457: adhyardhapūrvāt prātipadikād dvigoś ca viṃśatika-śabdāntāt ārhīyeṣv artheṣu khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25464: adhyardhapūrvad dvigoḥ ity eva adhyardhapūrvāt prātipadikād dvigoś ca khārī-śabdānatāt ārhīyeṣv artheṣu īkan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25478: adhyardhapūrvād dvigoś ca paṇ-apāda-māṣa-śata-śabdāntāt ārhīyeṣv artheṣu yat pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:25485: padbhāvo na bhavati pad yaty-atadarthe (*6,3.53) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:25497: śāṇa-śabdād adhyardhapūrvād dvigor ārhīyeṣv artheṣu vā yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25499: pakṣe so 'pi bhavati, tasya ca luk /
GS24jvkasipu:25510: dvi-tri-pūrvāc chāṇāntāt prātipadikād ārhīyeṣv artheṣu aṇ pratyayo
GS24jvkasipu:25515: parimāṇāntasya asañjñāśāṇayoḥ (*7,3.17) iti paryudāsādivṛddhir eva bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:25519: teṣām itaḥ prabhṛti samartha-vibhaktayaḥ pratyayārthāś ca nirdiśyante tena iti tṛtīyāsamarthāt krītam ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo
GS24jvkasipu:25531: tena iti mūlyāt karaṇe tṛtīyā samartha-vibhaktiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25532: anyatrān abhidhānān na bhavati, devadattena krītam, pāṇinā krītam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:25533: dvivacana-bahuvacana-antāt pratayayo na bhavati, prasthābhyāṃ krītam,
GS24jvkasipu:25535: yatra tu prakṛtyarthasya saṅkhyābhedāvagame pramāṇam asti tatra
GS24jvkasipu:25542: na hy ekena mudgena krayaḥ sambhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:25545: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt nimittam ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati, yat tan nimittaṃ saṃyogaś cet sa bhavati utpāto vā
GS24jvkasipu:25547: mahābhūta-pariṇāmaḥ utpātaḥ śatasya nimitta dhanapatinā saṃyogaḥ śatyaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:25550: utpataḥ khalv api - śatasya nimittaṃ utpātaḥ dakṣiṇākṣispandanam śatyam,
GS24jvkasipu:25561: gośabdād dvyacaś ca prātipadikāt saṅkhyā-parimāṇa-aśvādivivarjitāt yat pratyayo bhavati tasya nimittaṃ saṃyoga-utpātau (*5,1.38) ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:25563: goḥ nimittaṃ saṃyogaḥ utpāto vā gavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25568: asaṅkhyā-parimāṇa-aśvāder iti kim ? pañcānāṃ nimittam pañcakam /
GS24jvkasipu:25587: putra-śabdāc chaḥ pratyayo bhavati, cakārād yat ca tasya nimittaṃ saṃyoga+utpātau (*5,1.38) ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25588: dvyacaḥ iti nitye yati prāpte vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:25589: putrasya nimittaṃ saṃyogaḥ utpāto vā putrīyam, putryam //
GS24jvkasipu:25592: sarvabhūmi-pṛthivī-śabdābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyam aṇañau pratyayu bhavataḥ tasya nimittaṃ saṃyoga-utpātau (*5,1.38) ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25594: sarvabhūmer nimittaṃ saṃyoga utpāto vā sārvabhaumaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25600: aṇ-añau pratyayau bhavataḥ īśvaraḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25604: anyathā saṃyogotpātāv iva īśvaro 'pi pratyayārthasya nimittasya viśeṣaṇaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:25609: aṇ-añau pratyayau bhavataḥ viditaḥ ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:25615: loka-sarvaloka-śabdābhyāṃ tatra iti saptamīsamarthābhyām viditaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25621: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthād vāpaḥ ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25628: pātra-śabdāt ṣṭhan pratyayo bhavati tasya vāpaḥ (*5,1.45) ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25637: tad iti prathamāsamarthād asminn iti saptamyarthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati, yat tat prathamāsamarthaṃ vṛddhyādi cet tad dīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:25638: dīyate ity ekavacanāntaṃ vṛddhyādibhiḥ pratyekam abhisambadhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:25639: tatra yad adhamarṇena uttamarṇāya mūladhanātiriktaṃ deyaṃ tad vṛddhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25644: pañca asmin vṛddhir vā āyo vā lābho vā śulko vā upadā vā dīyate pañcakaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25649: pañca asmai vṛddhir vā āyo vā lābho vā upadā vā dīyate pajcako devadattaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:25654: pūraṇa-vācinaḥ śabdāt ardha-śabdāc ca ṭhan pratyayo bhavati tad asmin
GS24jvkasipu:25655: vṛddhy-āya. lābhaśulka-upadā dīyate (*5,1.47) ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:25665: bhāga-śadād yat pratyayo bhavati, cakārāt ṭhan ca, tad asmin vṛddhy-āya-lābhaśulka-upadā dīyate (*5,1.47) ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:25668: vṛddhyādir asmin dīyate bhāgyaṃ, bhāgikaṃ śatam /
GS24jvkasipu:25671: tad dharati vahavty āvahati bhārād vaṃśādibhyaḥ || PS_5,1.50 ||
GS24jvkasipu:25673: tad iti dvitīyāsamarthād dharaty-ādiṣv artheṣu yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo
GS24jvkasipu:25676: vaṃśādibhyaḥ paro yo bhāra-śabdaḥ tadantāt prātipadikāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:25677: vaṃśabhāraṃ harati vahati āvahati vā vāṃśabhārikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25682: aparā vṛttiḥ - bhārād vaṃśādibhyaḥ iti, bhārabhūtebhyo vaṃśādibhyaḥ ity
GS24jvkasipu:25689: vaṃśādibhyāḥ iti kim ? bhārabhūtān vrīhīn vahati /
GS24jvkasipu:25690: sūtrārthadvayam api ca+etad ācāryeṇa śiṣyāḥ pratipāditāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25708: vasna-dravya-śabdābhyām dvitīyāsamarthābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ ṭhan kan ity aitau pratyayau bhavato haratyādiṣv artheṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:25714: tad iti dvitiyāsamarthāt sambhavatyādiṣv artheṣu yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25718: prasthaṃ sambhavati avaharati pacati vā prāsthikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25721: nanu ca pāke ca sambhavo 'sti ? na asty atra niyogaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25727: āḍhaka-ācita-pātra-śadebhyo dvitīyāsamarthabhyo 'nyatarasyāṃ saṃbhavādiṣv artheṣu khaḥ bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:25730: āḍhakaṃ saṃbhavati avaharati pacati vā āḍhakīnā, āḍhakikī /
GS24jvkasipu:25736: āḍhaka-ācita-pātra-antād dvigoḥ saṃbhavatyādiṣv artheṣu ṣṭhan pratyayo bhavati, cakārāt khaḥ, anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:25737: vidhānasāmarthyād eva anayor luk na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25738: ṭhañas tu pakṣe 'nujñātasya adhyardha-pūrva-dvigoḥ iti lug bhavaty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:25748: kulija-śabdānatād dvigoḥ saṃbhavatyādiṣv artheṣu lukkhau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25753: dve kulije saṃbhavati avaharati pacati vā dvikulijiki, dvikulijīnā,
GS24jvkasipu:25755: parimāṇāntasya asaṃjñāśāṇayoḥ (*7,3.17) ity atra kulija-grahaṇam apīṣyate,
GS24jvkasipu:25759: sa iti prathamāsamarthāt asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati yat prathamāsamartham aṃśavasnabhṛtayaś cet tā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25763: pañca aṃśo vasno vā bhṛtirvāsya pañcakaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25768: tat iti prathamāsamarthāt asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati yat prathamāsamarthaṃ parimāṇaṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25779: samarthavibhaktiḥ pratyayārthaś ca pūrvasūtrād eva anuvartiṣyate, kim arthaṃ punar anayor upādānam ? punar vidhānārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:25782: punar vidhāna-sāmarthyād adhyardha-pūrvadvigor luk na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:25786: saṅkhyā-vācinaḥ prātipadikāt parimāṇopādhikāt prathamāsamarthād asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25791: saṅgha - pañca parimāṇam asya pañcakaḥ saṅghaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25793: sūtra - aṣṭau adhyāyāḥ parimāṇam asya sūtrasya aṣṭakaṃ pāṇinīyam /
GS24jvkasipu:25796: nanu ca adhyāyasamūhaḥ sūtrasaṅgha eva bhavati ? na+etad asti /
GS24jvkasipu:25803: tasya saṅkhyāparimāṇaṃ pañcāvṛttayaḥ pañcavārāḥ pañca rūpāṇi asya adhyayanasya pañcakam adhyayanam
GS24jvkasipu:25805: pañcadaśa mantrāḥ parimāṇam asya pañcadaśaḥ stomaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25816: yad iha lakṣaṇena anupapannaṃ tat sarvaṃ nipātanāt siddham /
GS24jvkasipu:25819: dvayor daśatoḥ vinbhāvaḥ śatiś ca pratyayaḥ dvau daśatau praimāṇam asya saṅghasya viṃśatiḥ
GS24jvkasipu:25820: trayāṇāṃ daśatāṃ trinbhāvaḥ śat ca pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25822: caturṇāṃ daśatāṃ catvārinbhāvaḥ śat ca pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25824: pañcānāṃ daśatāṃ pañcābhāvaḥ śat ca pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25826: ṣaṇṇāṃ daśatāṃ ṣaḍbhāvaḥ, tiḥ pratyayo 'padatvaṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:25828: saptānāṃ daśatāṃ saptabhāvaḥ tiḥ pratyayaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:25830: aṣṭānāṃ daśatām aśībhāvaḥ tiḥ pratyayaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:25832: navānāṃ daśatāṃ navabhāvaḥ tiḥ pratyayaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:25834: daśanāṃ daśatāṃ śabhāvaḥ taś ca pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25835: daśa daśataḥ parimāṇam asya saṅghasya śatam /
GS24jvkasipu:25836: viṃśatyādayo guṇa-śabdāḥ, te yathā kathaṃcid vyutpādyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25838: tathā hi - paṅktiḥ iti kramasamniveśe 'pi vartate, brāhmaṇapaṅktiḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:25840: na ca atra avayavārthaḥ kaścid asti /
GS24jvkasipu:25841: yā ca+eṣāṃ viṣayabhedena guṇa-mātre guṇini ca vṛttiḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:25842: svaliṅga-saṅkhya-anuvidhānaṃ ca, etad api sarvaṃ svābhāvikam eva /
GS24jvkasipu:25843: sahasrādayo 'py evaṃ jātiyakāḥ tadvad eva draṣṭavyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25847: pañcat daśat ity etau nipātyete tad asya aprimāṇam ity asmin viṣaye varge
GS24jvkasipu:25857: varge ity eva, tad asya parimānam iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:25858: saptan śabdāc chandasi viṣaye 'ñ pratyayo bhavati varge 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:25864: triṃśac-catvariṃśac-chabdābhyāṃ sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye ḍaṇ pratyayo bhavati tad
GS24jvkasipu:25865: asya parimāṇam ity etasmin viṣaye brāhmaṇe 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:25868: triṃśad-adhyāyāḥ parimāṇam eṣāṃ brāhamaṇānāṃ traiśāni brāhmaṇāni /
GS24jvkasipu:25873: tat iti dvitīyāsamarthād arhati ity asminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25881: cheda-ādibhyo dvitīyāsamarthebhyo nityam arhati ity asminn arthe
GS24jvkasipu:25900: śīrṣaccheda-śabdād dvitīyāsamarthān nityam arhati ity asminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25907: daṇḍādibhyo dvitiyāsamarthebhyaḥ arhati ity asminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25927: prātipadikamātrāc chandasi viṣaye tad arhati ity asminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25934: pātra-śabdād ghan pratyayo bhavati cakārād yat ca, tad arhati ity asminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:25941: kaḍaṅkaradakṣiṇā-śabdābhyāṃ chaḥ pratyayo bhavati, cakārād yat ca, tad arhati ity asmin viṣaye
GS24jvkasipu:25944: dakṣiṇām arhati dakṣiṇīyo bhikṣuḥ, dakṣiṇyo brāhmaṇaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25945: dakṣiṇaśabdasya alpāctarasya apūrvanipātena lakṣaṇavyabhicāracihnena yathāsaṅkhyābhāvaṃ sūcayati
GS24jvkasipu:25948: chayatau anuvarttete sthālībila-śabdāc chayatau pratyayau bhavataḥ tad arhati ity asminn arthe
GS24jvkasipu:25954: yajña-śabdād ṛtvik-śabdāc ca yathāsaṅkhyaṃ gha-khañau pratyayau bhavataḥ tad arhati ity asmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25962: ataḥ paraṃ prāgvatīyaḥ ṭhañ eva bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:25967: pārāyaṇa-adibhyo dvitīyāsamarthebhyaḥ vartayati ity asminn arthe ṭhañ
GS24jvkasipu:25974: saṃśaya-śabdād dvitīyāsamarthāt āpannaḥ ity etasminn arthe ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25978: yojana-śabdāt dvitīyāsamarthād gacchati ity asminn arthe ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25983: tato 'bhigamanam arhati iti ca krośaśatayojanaśatayor upasaṅkhyānam /
GS24jvkasipu:25988: pathin-śabdād dvitīyāsamarthād gacchati ity asminn arthe ṣkan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25996: pathaḥ pantha ity ayam ādeśo bhavati ṇaś ca pratyayo nityaṃ gacchati ity asmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25997: panthānaṃ nityaṃ gacchati pāntho bhikṣāṃ yācate /
GS24jvkasipu:26002: uttarapatha-śabdād tṛtīyāsamarthāt āhṛtam ity etasmin viṣaye ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26003: cakāraḥ pratyayārthasam uccaye, gacchati iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:26017: ajapathena āhṛtam ājapathikam, gacchati vā ājapathikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26025: yad ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ kālāt ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:26031: kālāt ity adhikāraḥ vyuṣṭa-ādibhyo 'ṇ (*5,1.97) iti yāvat //
GS24jvkasipu:26033: tena iti tṛtīyāsamarthāt kāla-vācinaḥ prātipadikāt virvṛttam ity asminn arthe ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26037: tam adhīṣṭo bhṛto bhūto bhāvī || PS_5,1.80 ||
GS24jvkasipu:26039: tam iti dvitīyāsamarthāt kālavācinaḥ prātipadikāt adhīṣṭo bhṛto bhūto bhāvī vā ity asminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26049: nanu cādhyeṣaṇaṃ bharaṇaṃ ca muhūrtaṃ kriyate tena kathaṃ māso vyāpyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:26050: adhyeṣaṇabharaṇe kriyārthe, tatra phalabhūtayā kriyayā māso vyāpyamānas tābhyām eva vyāptaḥ ity ucyate //
GS24jvkasipu:26053: māsa-śabdād vayasy abhidheye yatkhañau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26055: adhīṣṭādīnāṃ caturṇām adhikāre 'pi sāmarthyād bhūta eva atra abhisambadhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:26061: māsāntād dvigor yap pratyayo bhavati vayasy abhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:26067: ṣaṇmāsa-śabdād vayasy abhidheye ṇyat pratyayo bhavati, yap ca /
GS24jvkasipu:26074: ṣaṇmāsa-śabdād vayasy abhidheye ṭhaṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26080: samā-śabdād dvitīyāsmārthād adhīṣṭādiṣu artheṣu khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26081: ṭhaño 'pavādaḥ samāmadhīṣṭo bhṛto bhūto bhāvī vā samīnaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26082: kecit tu tena nirvṛttam (*5,1.79) iti sarvatra anuvartayanti /
GS24jvkasipu:26087: samā-śabdāntād dvigoḥ nirvṛttādisu artheṣu pañcasu vā khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26089: prāgvateḥ saṅkhyāpūrvapadānāṃ tadanta-grahaṇam aluki (*7,3.17) iti prāptir asty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:26090: khena mukte pakṣe ṭhañ api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26095: rātri ahaḥ saṃvatsara ity evam antād dvigoḥ nirvṛttādiṣu artheṣu vā khaḥ pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:26096: khena mukte pakṣe ṭhañ api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26107: varṣāntād dvigor nirvṛttādiṣv artheṣu vā khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26117: cittavati pratyaya-arthe 'bhidheye varṣa-śabdāntād dvigor nirvṛttādiṣv artheṣu utpannasya pratyayasya nityaṃ lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26125: ṣaṣṭirātra-śabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthāt kan pratyayo nipātyate pacyante ity
GS24jvkasipu:26132: vatsarāntāt prātipadikāt nivṛttādiṣv artheṣu chandasi viṣaye chanḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26139: nirvṛttādiṣv arthesu khaḥ pratyayo bhavati, cakārāc chaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:26144: tena iti tṛtīyāsamarthāt kālavācinaḥ prātipadikāt parijayya, labhya, kāya,
GS24jvkasipu:26145: sukara ity eteṣv artheṣu ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26146: māsena parijayyaḥ, śakyate jetuṃ, māsiko vyādhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26157: kālasya vyāpakaṃ, pratyayārthasya ca svam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:26158: tad iti dvitīyāsamarthāt kālavācinaḥ prātipadikād asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati, brahmacaryaṃ ced gamyate /
GS24jvkasipu:26162: aparā vṛttiḥ - tad iti prathamāsamarthād asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati, yat tad asya iti nirdiṣṭaṃ brahmacaryaṃ ced tad bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:26166: pūrvatra brahamacārī pratyayārthaḥ, uttaratra brahamacaryam eva /
GS24jvkasipu:26173: mahānāmnya ṛcaḥ, tat sahacaritaṃ vrataṃ tacchabdena+ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:26177: bhasyāḍhe iti puṃbadbhāvena ṅīpi nivṛtte nas taddhite (*6,4.144) iti ṭilopaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26181: aṣṭācatvāriṃśato ḍvuṃś ca ḍiniś ca vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26182: aṣṭācatvāriṃśad varṣāṇi vrataṃ carati aṣṭācatvāriṃśakaḥ, aṣṭācatvariṃśī /
GS24jvkasipu:26183: cāturmāsyānāṃ yalopaś ca ḍvuṃś ca ḍiniś ca vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26194: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthebhyo yajñākhyebhyo dakṣiṇā ity etasminn arthe ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:26198: ākhyā-grahaṇam akālād api yajñavācino yathā sayāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:26199: itarathā hi kālādhikārād ekāhadvādaśāhaprabhṛtaya eva yajñā gṛhyeran /
GS24jvkasipu:26200: prāgvateḥ saṅkhyāpūrvapadānāṃ tadantagrahaṇam aluki (*7,3.17) iti kālādhikāre 'pi dvādaśāhādiṣv asti prāptiḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:26201: tatra ca dīyate kāryaṃ bhavavat || PS_5,1.96 ||
GS24jvkasipu:26203: tatra iti saptamīsamarthāt kālavācinaḥ prātipadikād dīyate, kāryam ity etayor arthayor bhavavat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26214: yogavibhāgaś ca atra kartavyaḥ, tatra ca dīyate, yajñākhyebhyaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:26222: tatra iti saptamīsamarthebhyaḥ vyuṣṭādibhyaḥ dīyate, kāryam ity etayor aṇ pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:26249: dīyate, kāryam ity etayor arthayoḥ pratyekam abhisambadhaḥ, yathāsaṅkhyaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:26252: tṛtīyārthamātraṃ ca atra saṃbhavati, na tu tṛtīyā samarthavibhaktiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26266: karma-veṣa-śabdābhyāṃ tṛtīyāsamarthābhyāṃ yat pratyayo bhavati sampādini ity etasmin viṣaye
GS24jvkasipu:26272: tasmai iti caturthīsamarthebhyaḥ santāpādibhyaḥ prabhavati ity asmin viṣaye ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26295: yoga-śabdāt yat pratyayo bhavati, cakārāt ṭhañ, tasmai prabhavati ity
GS24jvkasipu:26300: karman-śabdā ukañ pratyayo bhavati tasmai prabhavati ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:26306: samaya-śabdāt tat iti prathamāsamarthād asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati, yat tatprathamāsamarthaṃ prāptaṃ ced tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26313: ṛtu-śabdāt tad iti prathamāsamarthāt asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe aṇ pratyayo bhavati tad asya prāptam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:26320: ṛtu-śabdāc chandasi viṣaye ghas pratyayo bhavati tad asya prāptam ity
GS24jvkasipu:26326: kāla-śabdāt yat pratyayo bhavati tad asya prāptam ity asmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:26331: kālāt ity eva, tad asya iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:26334: prakarṣe vartamānāt kālāt prathamāsamarthād asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26341: tad iti prathamasamarthāt asya iti ṣaṣthyarthe ṭhañ prayayo bhavati, yat tat prathamāsamarthaṃ prayojanaṃ ced tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26346: viśākhā-ṣaḍhā-śabdābhyām aṇ pratyayo bhavati tad asya prayojanam ity etasmin viṣaye yathāsaṅkhyam mantha-daṇḍayor abhidheyayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26354: anupravacanādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ chaḥ pratyayo bhavati tad asya prayojanam ity asmin viṣaye ṭhaño 'pavādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26389: samāpana-śabdāt sapūrvapadāt vidyamānapūrvapadāc chaḥ pratyayo bhavati tad
GS24jvkasipu:26400: kim artham idaṃ nipātyate, yāvatā prayojanam ity eva siddhaṣṭhañ ? caure niyamārthaṃ vacanam
GS24jvkasipu:26401: iha mā bhūt, ekāgāraṃ prayojanam asya bhikṣoḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:26402: ṭhakāraḥ kāryāvadhāraṇa-arthaḥ, ṅīb eva bhavati na ñitsvaraḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:26403: apare punar ikaṭ pratyayaṃ vṛddhiṃ ca nipātayanti //
GS24jvkasipu:26418: tena tulyaṃ kriyā ced vatiḥ || PS_5,1.115 ||
GS24jvkasipu:26420: tena iti tṛtīyāsamarthāt tulyam ity etasminn arthe vatiḥ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:26421: yat tulyaṃ kriyā cet sā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26429: tatra iti saptamīsamarthāt tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāc ca iva-arthe vatiḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26432: ṣaṣthīsamarthāt - devadattasya iva devadattavat yajñādattasya gāvaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26436: tat iti dvitīyāsamarthāt arham ity etasminn arthe vatiḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26442: upasargāt sasādhane dhātvarthe vartamānāt svārthe vatiḥ pratyayo bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:26447: tasya iti ṣaṣthīsamarthād bhāvaḥ ity etasmninn arthe tavatalau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26455: ā etasmāt tvasaṃśabdanād yānita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ, tatra tvatalau pratyayāvadhikṛtau veditavyau /
GS24jvkasipu:26460: karmaṇi ca vidhānārthaṃ guṇavacana-brāhmaṇādibhyaḥ karmaṇi ca (*5,1.124) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:26468: ita uttare ye bhāva. pratyayāḥ, te nañ-pūrvāt tatpuruṣāt na bhavanti
GS24jvkasipu:26476: tatpuruṣāt iti kim ? na asya paṭavaḥ santi iti apaṭuḥ, tasya bhāvaḥ āpaṭavam /
GS24jvkasipu:26488: pṛthu ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ imanic pratyayo bhavati vā tasya bhāvaḥ ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:26493: ra ṛto halader laghoḥ (*6,4.161) iti rephādeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26531: varṇaviśeṣa-vācibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyo dṛḍha-ādibhyaś ca ṣyañ pratyayo
GS24jvkasipu:26532: bhavati, cakārāt imanic ca, tasya bhāvaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:26533: śuklasya bhāvaḥ śauklyam, śuklimā, śuklatvam, śuklatā /
GS24jvkasipu:26561: guṇavacanedhyo brāhmaṇādibhyaś ca tasya iti ṣaṣthīsamarthebhyaḥ karmaṇyabhidheye ṣyañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26635: stona-śabdāt ṣaṣṭhīsamarthād bhāvakarmaṇoḥ yat pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:26645: sakhiśabdāt yaḥ pratyayo bhavati bhāvakarmaṇor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26653: kapi-jñāti-śabdābhyāṃ ḍhak prayayo bhavati bhāvakarmaṇor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26656: yathāsaṅkhyam arthayoḥ sarvatra+eva atra prakaraṇe na+iṣyate //
GS24jvkasipu:26659: patyantāt prātipadikāt purohitādibhyaś ca yak pratyayo bhavati bhāvakarmaṇor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26697: prāṇabhṛjjātivācibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyo vayovacanebhya udgātrādibhyaś ca añ pratyayo bhavati bhāvakramaṇor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26717: hāyanāntebhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ yuvādibhaś ca aṇ pratyayo bhavati bhāvakarmaṇor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26752: igantāc ca laghupūrvāt aṇ pratyayo bhavati bhāvakarmaṇoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26757: laghuḥ pūrvo yasmād ikaḥ tadantān prātipadikād ity ayam artho vivakṣitaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26760: laghupūrva-grahanena sa eva viśeṣyate, paścāt tena prātipadikasya
GS24jvkasipu:26773: kathaṃ kāvyam iti ? brāhmaṇādiṣu kaviśabdo draṣtavyaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:26778: yakāropadhāt gurūpottamād vuñ pratyayo bhavati bhāvakarmaṇoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26787: dvandva-sañjñakebhyaḥ manojña-ādibhyaś ca vuñ pratyayo bhavati bhāvakarmaṇoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26817: gotravācinaḥ caranavācinaḥ ca prātipadikāt vuñ pratyayo bhavati, pratyekaṃ bhāvakarmaṇor arthayoḥ ślāghādiṣu viṣayabhūteṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:26825: gārgyatvena kaṭhatvena ca vikatthate ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26828: gārgyatvena kaṭhatvena ca parānadhikṣipati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26831: gārgyatvaṃ kaṭhatvaṃ ca prāptaḥ ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26850: brahman-śabdād hotrāvācinaḥ tvaḥ pratyayo bhavati bhāvakarmaṇoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26853: na iti vaktavye tvavacanaṃ talo bādhanārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:26854: yas tu jāti-śabdo brāhmaṇaparyāyo brahman-śabdaḥ, tataḥ tvatalau bhavata
GS24jvkasipu:26858: iti kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau pañcamādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:26863: dhānyaviśeṣa-vācibhyaḥ ṣaṣṭhīsamarthebhyo bhavane 'bhidheye khañ pratyayo bhavati, tac ced bhavanaṃ kṣetraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26864: bhavanam iti bhavanti jāyante 'sminn iti bhavanam /
GS24jvkasipu:26868: dhānyānām iti kim ? tṛṇānāṃ bhavanaṃ kṣetram ity atra na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26869: kṣetram iti kim ? mudgānāṃ bhavanaṃ kusūlam /
GS24jvkasipu:26873: vrīhi-śāli-śabdābhyāṃ ḍhak pratyayo bhavati bhavane kṣetre abhidheye khaño
GS24jvkasipu:26879: yavādibhyaḥ śabdebhyo yat pratyayo bhavati bhavane kṣetre 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:26886: tila māṣa umā bhaṅgā aṇu ity etebhyaḥ vibhāṣā yat pratyayo bhavati bhavane kṣetre 'bhidheye
GS24jvkasipu:26887: khañi prāpte vacanaṃ, pakṣe so 'pi bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26896: sarvacarman śabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthāt kṛtaḥ ity asminn arthe kha-khañau
GS24jvkasipu:26898: sarvaśabdaś ca atra pratyayārthena kṛtena sambadhyate, na carmaṇā /
GS24jvkasipu:26900: sarvaś carmaṇā kṛtaḥ ity etasmin vākyārthe vṛttiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26904: yathāmukha-śabdāt sammukha-śabdāt ṣaṣṭhīsamarthād darśanaḥ ity etasminn arthe khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26905: dṛśyate 'smin iti darśanaḥ ādarśādiḥ pratibimbāśraya ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:26914: sarva-ādeḥ prātipadikāt pathin aṅga karman patra pātra ity evam antād
GS24jvkasipu:26915: dvitīyāsamarthād vyāpnoti ity asminn arthe khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26926: āprapada-śabdāt tad iti dvitīyāsamarthāt prāpnoti ity etasminn arthe khaḥ pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:26928: śarīreṇa asambaddhasya api paṭasya pramāṇam ākhyāyate //
GS24jvkasipu:26931: anupada-ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ tad iti dvitīyāsamarthebhyaḥ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ baddhā bhakṣayati neya ity eteṣv artheṣu khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26937: pradakṣiṇaprasavyagāmināṃ śārāṇāṃ yasmin paraśāraiḥ padānāmasamāveśaḥ so
GS24jvkasipu:26943: parovara parampara putrapautra ity etebhyaḥ tad iti dvitīyāsamarthebhyaḥ anubhavati ity asmin arthe khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26949: paramparaśabdo vināpi pratyayena dṛśyate, mantriparamparā mantraṃ bhinatti iti /
GS24jvkasipu:26954: avārapāra atyanta anukāma ity etebhyo dvitīyāsamarthebhyaḥ gāmī ity etasminn arthe khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26955: gamiṣyati iti gāmī, bhaviṣyati gamyādayaḥ (*3,3.3) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:26972: garbhadhāraṇena sakalā 'pi samā vyāpyate iti atyantasaṃyoge dvitīyā /
GS24jvkasipu:26976: kecit tu samāyāṃ vijāyate iti vigṛhṇanti, garbhamocane tu vijanir vartate ity āhuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26977: teṣāṃ pūrvapade yalopamātraṃ nipātyate, pariśiṣṭasya alug vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26978: anutpattāv uttarapadasya ca vā yalopo vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26979: samāṃsamāṃvijāyate, samāyāṃ samāyāṃ vijāyate iti vā //
GS24jvkasipu:26983: adyaśvīna iti nipātyate avaṣṭabdhe vijane, āsanne prasave /
GS24jvkasipu:26984: āvidūrye hi mūrdhanyo vidhīyate avāc ca ālambana-āvidūryayoḥ (*8,3.68) iti
GS24jvkasipu:26985: adya vā śvo vā vijāyate 'dyaśvīnā gauḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26987: kecit tu vijāyate iti na anuvartayanti, avaṣṭabdhamātre nipātanam ity āhuḥ
GS24jvkasipu:26992: goḥ āṅpūrvād ā tasya goḥ pratipādanāt karmakāriṇi khaḥ pratyayo nipātyate
GS24jvkasipu:26994: yo gavā bhṛtaḥ karma karoti ā tasya goḥ pratyarpaṇāt //
GS24jvkasipu:26998: anugu-śabdād alaṅgāmī ity etasminn arthe khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27004: adhvan-śabdāt dvitīyāsamarthād alaṅgāmī ity etasminn arthe yat-khau
GS24jvkasipu:27007: ye ca abhavakarmaṇoḥ (*6,4.168), ātma-adhvānau khe (*6,4.169) iti prakṛtibhāvaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:27010: abhyamitra-śadāt dvitīyāsamarthāt alaṅgāmī ity asminn arthe chaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27019: goṣṭha-śabdād bhūtapūrvopādhikāt svārthe khañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27025: aśva-śabdād ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt ekāhagamaḥ ity etasminn arthe khañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27031: śālīna-kaupīna-śabdau nipātyete yathāsaṅkhyam adhṛṣṭe akārye ca abhidheye
GS24jvkasipu:27035: śālāpraveśanam arhati, kūpāvatāram arhati iti khañ pratyayaḥ uttarapadalopaś ca nipātyate
GS24jvkasipu:27041: vrāta-śabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthāt jīvati ity asminn arthe khañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27043: utsedhaḥ śarīraṃ, tadāyāsya ye jīvanti te utsedhajīvinaḥ, teṣā karma vrātam /
GS24jvkasipu:27052: kathaṃ sāptapadīnaḥ sakhā, sāptapadīnaṃ mitram iti ? yadā guṇapradhānaḥ sāptapadīna-śabdaḥ sakhibhāve tatkarmaṇi ca vartate tadā sakhya-śabdena
GS24jvkasipu:27053: sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ bhavati, yadā tu lakṣaṇayā vartate tadā puruṣeṇa
GS24jvkasipu:27058: hyogodohasya hiyaṅgavādeśaḥ, tasya vikāre khañ pratyayo bhavati sañjñāyām
GS24jvkasipu:27061: tena+iha na bhavati, hyogodohasya vikāra udaśvit //
GS24jvkasipu:27064: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthebhyaḥ pīlvādibhyaḥ karṇādibhyaś ca yathāsaṅkhyaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:27065: pāka-mūlayor arthayoḥ kuṇap jāhac ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27095: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt pakṣa-śabdāt mūle 'bhidheye tiḥ pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:27101: tena iti tṛtīyāsamarthāt vittaḥ ity etasminn arthe cuñcup caṇap ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ
GS24jvkasipu:27106: vi nañ ity etābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ nā nāñ ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27108: asahārthe pṛthagbhāve vartamānābhyāṃ vinañbhyāṃ savārthe nā-nāñau
GS24jvkasipu:27114: viśadāt śālac śaṅkaṭac ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27117: tadyogād gaur api viśālaḥ, viśaṅkaṭaḥ ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:27118: paramārthatas tu guṇa-śabdā ete yathākathañcid vyutpādyante /
GS24jvkasipu:27122: sam pra ud ity etebhyaḥ kaṭac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27162: nāsikāyāḥ sambandhini nate abhidheye ṭiṭac nāṭac bhraṭac ity ete pratyayā bhavanti sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:27164: tadyogān nāsikā 'pi tathā+ucyate, avaṭīṭaḥ, avanāṭaḥ, avabhraṭaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:27167: nate nāsikāyāḥ ity anuvartate, sañjñāyām iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:27168: ni-śabdān nāsikāyā nate 'bhidheye biḍac birīsac ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27172: kathaṃ nibiḍāḥ keśāḥ, nibiḍaṃ vastram ? upamānād bhaviṣyati //
GS24jvkasipu:27173: inac piṭac cika ci ca || PS_5,2.33 ||
GS24jvkasipu:27175: neḥ ity eva, nate nāsikāyāḥ iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:27176: ni-śabdān nāsikāyā nate 'bhidheye inac piṭac ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:27177: tatsaṃniyogena ca ni-śabdasya yathāsaṅkhyaṃ cika ci ity etāv ādeśau
GS24jvkasipu:27182: tathā ca+uktam - inac-piṭac-kāścikacicikādeśāś ca vaktavyāḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:27184: klinnasya cil pil ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ laś ca pratyayo 'sya cakṣuṣī ity etasminn arthe
GS24jvkasipu:27194: upa adhi ity etābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyam āsannārūḍhayor vartamānābhhyāṃ svārthe tyakan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27198: pratyayasthāt kātpūrvasya iti itvam atra na bhavati, sañjñādhikārād eva //
GS24jvkasipu:27202: karma-śabdāt saptamīsamarthād ghaṭaḥ ity etasminn arthe aṭhac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27205: tad asya sañjātaṃ tārakā-ādibhya itac || PS_5,2.36 ||
GS24jvkasipu:27207: tad iti prathamāsamarthebhyas tārakā-ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ asya iti
GS24jvkasipu:27210: tārakāḥ sañjātā asya nabhasaḥ tārakitaṃ nabhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27243: tad iti prathamāsamarthād asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe dvayasac daghnac mātrac ity ete pratyayā bhavanti yat tat prathamāsamarthaṃ pramāṇaṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27244: ūruḥ pramāṇam asya ūrudvayasam, ūrudaghnam, ūrumātram /
GS24jvkasipu:27248: prathamaś ca dvitiyaś ca ūrdhvamāne matau mama /
GS24jvkasipu:27251: mātrac punar aviśeṣeṇa, prasthamātram ity api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27253: pramāṇa-śabdā iti ye prasiddhāḥ, tebhya utpannasya pratyayasya lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27261: nitya-grahaṇaṃ kim ? saṃśaye śrāviṇaṃ vakṣyati, tatra api dvigor lug eva yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:27262: dve diṣṭī syātāṃ vā na vā dvidiṣṭiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27271: pramāṇaparimāṇābhyāṃ saṅkhyāyāś ca api saṃśaye mātrac vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27284: tad asya ity eva, pramāṇe iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:27285: puruṣahastibhyāṃ prathamāsamarthābhyāṃ pramāṇopādhikābhyām asya iti ṣaṣṭhyārthe aṇ pratyayo bhavati, cakārād dvayasajādayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27286: puruṣaḥ pramāṇam asya pauruṣam, puruṣadvayasam, puruṣadadhnam,
GS24jvkasipu:27301: yat-tad-etebhyaḥ prathamāsamarthebhyaḥ parimāṇopādhikebhyaḥ asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe vatup pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27309: na tvā vāṃ anyo divyo na pīrthivo a jāto na janisyate /
GS24jvkasipu:27314: kim-idam-bhyām uttarasya vatupo vakārasya ghakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27317: etad eva cādeśavidhānaṃ jñāpakaṃ kimidambhyāṃ vatup-pratyayo bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:27318: atha vā yogavibhāgena vatupaṃ vidhāya paścād vo gho vidhīyate //
GS24jvkasipu:27322: saṅkhyāparimāṇe vartamānāt kimaḥ prathamāsamarthād asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe ḍatiḥ pratyayo bhavati, cakārād vatup /
GS24jvkasipu:27324: pṛcchyamānatvāt paricchedopādhikāyāṃ saṅkhyāyāṃ vartamānāt kimaḥ pratyayo vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:27325: kā saṅkhyā parimāṇam eṣāṃ brāhmaṇānām kati brāhmaṇāḥ, kiyanto brāhmaṇāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27326: atha vā saṅkhyā+eva parimāṇātmikā paricchedasvabhāvā gṛhyate, kā saṅkhyā parimāṇaṃ yeṣāṃ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:27327: nanu ca saṅkhyā evamātmikaiva paricchedasvabhāvā, sā kimarthaṃ parimāṇena
GS24jvkasipu:27328: viśeṣyate ? yatra aparicchedakatvena vivakṣyate tatra mā bhūd iti /
GS24jvkasipu:27329: kṣepe hi paricchedo na asti, keyam eṣāṃ saṅkhyā daśānām iti //
GS24jvkasipu:27333: saṅkhyāyā avayave vartamānāyāḥ asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe tayap pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:27334: avayavāvayavinaḥ sambandhinaḥ iti sāmarthyāt avayavī pratyayārtho vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:27341: pūrveṇa vihitasya tayasya dvitribhyāṃ parasya vā ayajādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27346: tatra ko doṣaḥ ? trayī gatiḥ iti tayanibandhana īkāro na syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:27354: ubha-śabdāt parasya tayapo nityam ayajādeśo bhavati, sa codāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27356: ubhaśabdo yati laukikī saṅkhyā tataḥ pūrveṇa+eva vihitasya tayapa ādeśavidhānārthaṃ vacanam
GS24jvkasipu:27357: atha na saṅkhyā, tato yogavibhāgena tayapaṃ vidhāya tasya nityam ayajādeśo vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:27360: tad asminn adhikam iti daśāntāḍ ḍaḥ || PS_5,2.45 ||
GS24jvkasipu:27362: tat iti prathamāsamarthāt asmin iti saptamyarthe daśāntāt prātipadikāt ḍaḥ pratyayo bhavati yat tatprathamāsamartham adhikaṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27368: daśāntāt iti kim ? pañca adhikā asmin śate /
GS24jvkasipu:27370: pratyayārthena ca samānajātīye prakṛtyarthe sati pratyaya iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:27371: ekādaśa kārṣāpaṇā adhikā asmin kārṣāpaṇaśate ekādaśaṃ kārṣāpanaśatam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:27372: iha tu na bhavati, ekādaśa māṣā adhikā asmin kārṣāpaṇaśate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:27374: iha na bhavati, ekādaśādhikā asyāṃ triṃśati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:27375: itikaraṇo vivakṣārtha ity uktaṃ, tata idaṃ sarvaṃ labhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:27376: katham ekādaśam śatasahasram iti ? śatānāṃ sahasraṃ, sahasrāṇām vā śatam
GS24jvkasipu:27380: yasya saṅkhyā tadādhikye ḍaḥ kartavyo mato mama //
GS24jvkasipu:27383: tad asminn adhikam ity anuvartate, ḍaḥ iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:27384: śadantāt prātipadikāt viṃśateś ca ḍaḥ pratyayo bhavati tad asminn adhikam ity etasmin viṣaye
GS24jvkasipu:27386: śad-grahane 'nta-grahanaṃ pratyaya-grahaṇe yasmāt sa tadāder adhikārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:27390: iha mā bhūt, gotriṃśadadhikā asmin gośate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:27396: iha mā bhūt, goviṃśatir adhikā 'smin gośate iti //
GS24jvkasipu:27399: tad asya ity anuvartate tad asya sañjātam ity ataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27400: tad iti prathamāsamarthāt saṅkhyāvācinaḥ prātipadikāt asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe mayaṭ pratyayo bhavati yat tat prathamāsamarthaṃ guṇasya cen nimāne vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:27402: guṇo yena nimīyate mūlyabhūtena so 'pi sāmarthyād bhāga eva vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:27403: yavānāṃ dvau bhāgau nimānam asya udaśvidbhāgasya dvimayamudaśvid yavānām /
GS24jvkasipu:27406: bhāge 'pi tu vidhīyāmānaḥ pratyayaḥ prādhānyena bhāgavantamācaṣṭe /
GS24jvkasipu:27408: guṇasya iti caikatvaṃ vivakṣitaṃ, tena+iha na bhavati, dvau bhāgau yavānāṃ
GS24jvkasipu:27410: bhūyasaś ca vācikāyāḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ pratyaya iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:27411: iha na bhavati, eko bhāgo nimānamasya iti /
GS24jvkasipu:27412: bhūyasaḥ iti ca pratyayārthāt prakṛtyarthasya adhikyamātraṃ vivakṣitam /
GS24jvkasipu:27415: tena+iha na bhavati, dvau bhāgau yavānām adhyardha udaśvitaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:27417: nimeye vartamānāyāḥ saṅkhyāyā nimāne pratyayo dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:27418: udaśvito dvau bhāgau nimeyamasya yavabhāgasya dvimayā yavā udaśvitaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27421: guṇasya iti kim ? dvau vrīhiyavau nimānamasya+udaśvitaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27422: nimāne iti kim ? dvau guṇau kṣīrasya ekastailasya, dviguṇaṃ pacyate tailaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:27426: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt saṅkhyāvācinaḥ prātipadikāt pūraṇe ity asminn arthe ḍaṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27428: yena saṅkhyā saṅkhyānaṃ pūryate sampadyate, sa tasyāḥ pūraṇaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27431: yasminn upasañjāte 'nyā saṅkhyā sampadyate sa pratyayārthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27432: iha na bhavati, pañcānāṃ muṣṭikānāṃ pūraṇo ghaṭaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:27436: nakārāntāt saṅkhyāvācinaḥ prātipadikāt asaṃkhyādeḥ parasya ḍaṭo maḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27437: nāntāt iti pañcamī iṭa āgamasambandhe ṣaṣṭhīṃ prakalpayati /
GS24jvkasipu:27440: nāntāt iti kim ? viṃśateḥ pūraṇaḥ viṃśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27441: asaṅkhyādeḥ iti kim ? ekādaśānāṃ pūraṇaḥ ekādaśaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:27444: nāntād asaṅkhyādeḥ parasya ḍaṭaḥ chandasi viṣaye thaḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27454: ṣaṭ kati katipaya catur ity eṣāṃ ḍaṭi puratasthugāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27456: tasya asmād eva jñāpakāt ḍaṭ pratyayo vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:27466: bahu pūga gana saṅgha ity eteṣāṃ ḍaṭi parataḥ tithugāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27467: pūgasaṅghaśabdayor asaṅkhyātvādidam eva jñāpakaṃ ḍaṭo bhāvasya /
GS24jvkasipu:27476: vatvantasya saṃkhyātvāt pūrveṇa ḍaḍ vihitaḥ, tasminn ayam āgamaḥ vidhīyate
GS24jvkasipu:27482: dviśabdāt tīyaḥ pratyayo bhavati tasya pūraṇe ity asmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:27487: triśabdāt tīyaḥ pratyayaḥ bhavati tasya pūraṇe ity etad viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:27491: halaḥ (*6,4.2.) iti saṃprasāraṇasya dīrghatvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27492: aṇaḥ iti tatra anuvartate ḍhralope ity ataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27496: viṃśaty-ādibhyaḥ parasya ḍaṭaḥ tamaḍāgamo bhavaty anyatarasayām /
GS24jvkasipu:27507: evaṃ ca sati ṣaṣṭyādeś ca asaṅkhyādeḥ (*5,2.58) iti paryudāsoyujyata eva
GS24jvkasipu:27511: śatādibhyaḥ māsārdhamāsasaṃvatsaraśadebhyaś ca parasya ḍaṭo nityaṃ tamaḍāgamaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27512: māsādayaḥ saṃkhyāśabdā na bhavanti, tebhyo 'smād eva jñāpakāt ḍaṭ pratyayo vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:27519: ṣaṣṭyādeś ca asaṅkhyādeḥ (*5,2.58) iti vakṣyamāṇena siddhe śatādigrahaṇaṃ saṅkhyādyartham
GS24jvkasipu:27524: ṣaṣṭyādeḥ saṅkhyāśabdād asaṅkhyādeḥ parasya ḍaṭo nityaṃ tamaḍāgamaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27533: prātipadikān matvarthe chaḥ pratyayo bhavati sūkte sāmani ca abhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:27534: matvartha-grahaṇena samarthavibhaktiḥ, prakṛtiviśeṣanaṃ, pratyayārthaḥ iti sarvam ākṣipyate
GS24jvkasipu:27546: matvarthe utpannasya chasya luk bhavati adhyāyānuvākayoḥ abhidheyayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27547: kena punar adhyāyānuvākayoḥ pratyayaḥ ? idam eva lug-vacanaṃ jñāpakaṃ tadvidhānasya /
GS24jvkasipu:27549: gardabhāṇḍaśabdo 'sminn iti gardabhāṇḍo 'dhyāyaḥ, anuvāko vā gardabhānḍīyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27554: matau ity eva, adhyāyānuvākayoḥ iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:27587: matau ity eva, adhyāyānuvākayoḥ iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:27588: goṣadādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ vun pratyayo bhavati matvarthe
GS24jvkasipu:27609: tatra iti saptamīsamarthāt pathinśabdāt kuśalaḥ ity asminn arthe vun pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27613: tatra ity eva, kuśalaḥ iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:27614: ākarśādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ saptamīsamarthebhyaḥ kuśalaḥ ity etasminn arthe kan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27639: tatra ity eva, kan iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:27640: dhana-hiraṇya-śabdābhyāṃ tatra iti saptamīsamarthābhyāṃ kāme ity asminn
GS24jvkasipu:27647: tatra ity eva, kan iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:27648: svāṅgavācibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ tatra iti saptamīsamarthebhyaḥ prasite ity etasminn arthe kan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27657: tatra ity eva, prasite iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:27658: udaraśabdāt saptamīsamarthāt prasite ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27661: yo bubhukṣayā 'tyantaṃ pīḍyate sa evam ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:27666: kan pratyayaḥ ity eva svaryate, na ṭhak /
GS24jvkasipu:27668: sasya-śabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthāt parijātaḥ ity asminn arthe kan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27671: yo guṇaiḥ sambaddho jāyate, yasya kiñcid api vaiguṇyaṃ na asti, tasya+idam
GS24jvkasipu:27679: aṃśaśabdān nirdeśād eva dvitiyāsamarthād hārī ity etasminn arthe kan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27683: tatra ṣaṣṭhīpratiṣedhāt karmaṇi dvitīyā eva bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:27686: tantraśabdān nirdeśād eva pañcamīsamarthāt acirāpahṛte ity etasminn arthe kan pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:27693: brāhmaṇaka uṣṇika ity etau śabdau nipātyete kan pratyayāntau sañjñāyām viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:27696: yatra ayudhajīvino brāhmaṇāḥ santi tatra brāhmaṇakaḥ iti sañjñā /
GS24jvkasipu:27715: anuka abhika abhīka ity ete śabdāḥ kanpratyayāntā nipātyante kamitā ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:27722: pārśvaśabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthād anvicchati ity asminn arthe kan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27723: anṛjurupāyaḥ pārśvam, tena arthān anvicchati pārśvakaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27728: ayaḥśūla-daṇḍa-ajināhbyāṃ tṛtīyāsamarthābhyām anvicchati ity etasminn arthe ṭhakṭ-hañau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27730: tena anvicchati āyaḥśūlikaḥ sāhasikaḥ ity arthaḥ dambho daṇḍājinam, tena anvicchati dāṇḍājinikaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:27732: tāvatithaṃ grahaṇam iti lug vā || PS_5,2.77 ||
GS24jvkasipu:27737: pūraṇapratyayāntāt prātipadikāt grahaṇopādhikāt svārthe kan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27739: dvitīyena rūpeṇa granthaṃ gṛhṇāti dvikaṃ grahaṇam, dvitīyakam /
GS24jvkasipu:27742: tāvatithena gṛhṇāti iti kan vaktavyaḥ, pūraṇapratyayasya ca nityaṃ luk /
GS24jvkasipu:27743: ṣaṣṭhena rūpeṇa granthaṃ gṛhṇāti ṣaṭko devadattaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27747: tena granthaviṣayam eva grahaṇam vijñāyate, na anyaviṣayam //
GS24jvkasipu:27750: sa iti prathamāsamarthāt eṣām iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe kan pratyayo bhavati, yat tat prathamāsamarthaṃ grāmaṇīś cet sa bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27754: grāmaṇīḥ iti kim ? devadattaḥ śatrur eṣām //
GS24jvkasipu:27757: śṛṅkhala-śabdāt prathamāsamarthād asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe kan pratyayo
GS24jvkasipu:27758: bhavati, yat tat prathamāsamarthaṃ bandhanaṃ ced tad bhavati, yat tad asya
GS24jvkasipu:27759: iti nirdeṣṭaṃ karabhaś cet sa bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27762: teṣāṃ kāṣṭhamayaṃ pāśakaṃ pāde vyātiṣajyate, tad ucyate śṛṅkhalam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:27763: yadyapi rajjvādikam api tatra asti tathāpi śṛṅkhalam asya asvatantrīkaraṇe bhavati sādhanam iti bandhanam ity ucyate //
GS24jvkasipu:27766: utkaḥ iti nipātyate, unmanāś ced sa bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27768: uc-chabdāt sasādhanakriyāvacanāt tadvati kan pratyayo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:27775: kālāt prayojanāc ca yathāyogaṃ samarthavibhaktiyuktāt roge 'bhidheye kan pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:27786: tad asminn annaṃ prāye sañjñāyām || PS_5,2.82 ||
GS24jvkasipu:27788: tat iti prathamāsamarthād asmin iti saptamyarthe kan pratyayo bhavati, yat tat prathamāsamarthaṃ annaṃ cet prāyaviṣayaṃ tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27791: guḍāpūpāḥ prāyeṇa annam asyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ guḍāpūpikā /
GS24jvkasipu:27797: kulmāṣa-śabdāt añ pratyayo bhavati, tad asminn annaṃ prāye sañjñāyām (*5,2.82) ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:27802: śrotriyan iti nipātyate chando 'dhīte ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:27805: śrotriyaṃś chando 'dhīte iti vākyārthe padavacanam, chandaso vā śrotrabhāvaḥ, tadadhīte iti ghan ca pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27806: kathaṃ chando 'dhīte chandasaḥ ? bāgrahaṇam anuvartate tāvatithaṃ grahaṇam iti lug vā (*5,2.77) ity ataḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:27812: śrāddhaśabdād bhuktopādhikād anena ity asminn arthe iniṭhanau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27813: śrāddha-śabdaḥ karmanāmadheyam tat sādhanadravye vartitvā pratyayam utpādayati /
GS24jvkasipu:27815: iniṭhanoḥ samānakālagrahaṇaṃ kartavyam, adya bhukte śrāddhe śvaḥ śrāddhikaḥ iti mā bhūt //
GS24jvkasipu:27819: na ca kriyām antareṇa kartā sambhavati iti yāṃ kāñcit kriyāmadhyāhṛtya pratyayo vidheyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27820: pūrvāt anena ity asminn arthe iniḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27821: pūrvaṃ gatam anena pītam bhuktaṃ vā pūrvī, pūrviṇau, pūrviṇaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:27824: vidyamānaṃ pūrvaṃ yasmād iti sapūrvaṃ prātipadikam, tasya pūrvaśabdena tad
GS24jvkasipu:27826: sapūrvāt pratipadikāt pūrvaśabdāntāt anena ity asminn arthe iniḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27829: sup supā iti samāsaṃ kṛtvā taddhita utpādyate /
GS24jvkasipu:27830: yogadvayena ca anena pūrvādiniḥ (*5,2.86), sapūrvac ca (*5,2.87) iti paribhāṣādvayaṃ jñāpyate, vyapadeśivadbhāvo 'prātipadikena, grahaṇavatā prātipadikena tadantavidhir na asti iti //
GS24jvkasipu:27833: anena ity eva iṣṭādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ anena ity asminn arthe iniḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27879: paripanthin pariparin ity etau śabdau chandasi viṣaye nipātyete,
GS24jvkasipu:27882: mā tvā paripanthino vidan mā tvā paripariṇo vidan //
GS24jvkasipu:27885: anupadī iti nipātyate anveṣṭā cet sa bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27897: sañjñāgrahaṇād upadraṣṭā eva ucyate, na dātā grahītā vā //
GS24jvkasipu:27900: kṣetriyac iti nipātyate parakṣetre cikitsyaḥ ity etasmin vākyārthe padavacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:27901: parakṣetrād tatra iti saptamīsamarthāt cikitsyaḥ ity etasminn arthe ghac pratyayaḥ paraśabdalopaś ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:27907: atha vā kṣetriyaṃ viṣam yat parakṣetre paraśarīre saṃkramayya cikitsate /
GS24jvkasipu:27908: atha vā kṣetriyāṇi tṛṇāni yāni sasyārthe kṣetre jātāni cikitsyāni nāśayitavyāni /
GS24jvkasipu:27917: indra-śabdāt ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt liṅgam ity etasminn arthe ghac-pratyayo
GS24jvkasipu:27920: indra ātmā, sa cakṣurādinā karaṇena anumīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:27929: indreṇa dattam, ātmanā viṣayebhyo dattaṃ yathāyathaṃ grahaṇāya /
GS24jvkasipu:27931: sati sambhave vyutpattir anyathā 'pi kartavyā, rūḍheraniyamāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:27932: vāśabdaḥ pratyekam abhisambadhyamāno vikalpānāṃ svātantryam darśayati //
GS24jvkasipu:27933: tad asya asty asminn iti matup || PS_5,2.94 ||
GS24jvkasipu:27939: tad iti prathamāsamarthād asya+iti ṣaṣṭhyārthe 'sminn iti saptamyarthe vā
GS24jvkasipu:27940: matup pratyayo bhavati, yat tat prathamāsamartham asti cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27941: astyarthopādhikaṃ ced tad bhavati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27965: rasādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ matup pratyayo bhavati tad asya asty asmin ity etasmin viṣaye
GS24jvkasipu:27968: kimartham idam ucyate, na pūrvasūtreṇa+eva matup siddhaḥ ? rasādibhyaḥ punar vacanam anyanivṛttyartham, anye matvarthīyā mā bhūvann iti /
GS24jvkasipu:27969: kathaṃ rūpiṇī kanyā, rūpiko dārakaḥ ? prāyikam etad vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:27971: atha vā guṇāt iti atra paṭhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:27972: tena ye rasanendriyādigrāhyā guṇāḥ, teṣām atra pāṭhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27973: iha mā bhūt, rūpiṇī, rūpikaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:27987: prāṇisthavācinaḥ śabdāt ākārāntāt lac pratyayo bhavaty anyatarasyāṃ matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:27994: iha mā bhūt, cikīrṣā 'sya asti cikīrṣāvān, jihīrṣā 'sya asti jihīrṣāvān /
GS24jvkasipu:27995: pratyayasvareṇa+eva antodāttatve siddhe, cakāraś cūḍālo 'sti ity atra svarito vānudatte padādau (*8,2.6) iti svaritabādhanārthaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:27999: sidhmādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyo lac pratyayo bhavaty anyatarasyāṃ matvarthe
GS24jvkasipu:28002: anyatarasyāṃ grahaṇena matup samuccīyate, na tu pratyayo vikalpyate /
GS24jvkasipu:28003: tasmāt akārāntebhyaḥ iniṭhanau pratyayau na bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28059: vatsāṃsaśabdābhyām lac pratyayo bhavati yathāsaṅkhyaṃ kāmavati balavati ca arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:28062: vṛttiviṣaye vatsāṃsaśabdau svabhāvāt kāmabalayor vartamānau tadvati pratyayam utpādayataḥ
GS24jvkasipu:28063: na hy atra vatsārthaḥ aṃsārtho vā vidyate /
GS24jvkasipu:28064: vatsalaḥ iti snehavānucyate, vatsalaḥ svāmī, vatsalaḥ pitā iti /
GS24jvkasipu:28066: na ca ayam artho matupi sambhavati iti nityaṃ lajeva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28072: anyatarasyām grahaṇam matup samuccayārthaṃ sarvatra+eva anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:28076: lomādibhyaḥ pāmādibhyaḥ picchādibhyaś ca tribhyo gaṇebhyo yathāsaṅkhyaṃ śa na ilac ity ete pratyayā bhavanti matvarthe, matup ca /
GS24jvkasipu:28116: prajñā śraddhā arcā vṛtti ity etebhyaḥ ṇaḥ pratyayo bhavati matubarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:28124: tapaḥ-sahasra-śabdābhyāṃ vini ini ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:28125: pratyayārthayos tu yathāsaṅkhyaṃ sarvatra+eva asmin prakaraṇe nisyate /
GS24jvkasipu:28128: asantatvād adantatvāc ca siddhe pratyaye punar vacanam aṇā vakṣyamāṇena bādhā mā bhūt iti
GS24jvkasipu:28154: kasya punar ayaṃ lup ? matubādīnām anyatamasya, viśeṣābhāvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:28155: sikatā asmin vidyate sikatā deśaḥ, sikatilaḥ, saikataḥ, sikatāvān /
GS24jvkasipu:28156: evaṃ śarkarā deśaḥ, śarkarilaḥ, śārkaraḥ, śarkarāvān /
GS24jvkasipu:28162: dantaśabdād unatopādhikād urac pratyayo bhavati mavarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:28163: dantā unnatā asya santi danturaḥ unnata iti kim ? dantavān //
GS24jvkasipu:28166: ūṣa suṣi maṣka madhu ity etebhyo raḥ pratyayo bhavati matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:28172: iha na bhavati, ūṣo 'smin ghaṭe vidyate, madhu asmin ghaṭe vidyate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:28175: mukham asya asti iti sarvasmin vaktavye mukharaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28193: keśaśabdād vaḥ pratyayo bhavati matvarthe anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:28194: nanu ca prakṛtam anyatarasyāṃ grahaṇam anuvartata eva ? matup samucāyārthaṃ tad ity uktam
GS24jvkasipu:28196: tataś cātūrūpyaṃ bhavati, keśavaḥ, keśī, keśikaḥ, keśavān iti /
GS24jvkasipu:28219: gāṇdī ajaga ity etābhyāṃ vaḥ pratyayo bhavati sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:28222: hrasvād api bhavati gāṇḍivaṃ dhanuḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:28227: kāṇḍa aṇḍa ity etābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyam īrannīracau pratyayau bhavato matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:28232: rajaḥ-prabhṛtibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ valac pratyayo bhavati matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:28239: tena+iha na bhavati, rajo 'smin grāme vidyate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:28246: danta-śikhā-śabdābhyāṃ balac pratyayo bhavati matvarthe sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28253: jyotsnādayaḥ śabdāḥ nipātyante matvarthe sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28254: jyotiṣa upadhālopo naś ca pratyayo nipātyate - jyotsnā candraprabhā /
GS24jvkasipu:28255: tamasa upadhāyā ikāro raś ca - tamisrā rātriḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28256: strītvamatantram anyatra api dṛśyate - tamisraṃ nabhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28258: ūrjo 'sugāgamo nipātyate vinivalacau pratyayau - ūrjasvī, ūrjasvalaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28260: malaśabdād inajīmasacau pratyayau nipātyete - malinaḥ, malīmasaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:28266: anyatarasyām ity adhikārān matub api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28270: ekākṣarāt kṛto jāteḥ saptamyāṃ ca na tau smṛtau /
GS24jvkasipu:28276: saptamyām - danḍā asyāṃ santi daṇḍavatī śālā iti /
GS24jvkasipu:28277: itikaraṇo viṣayaniyamārthaḥ sarvatra sambadhyate ity uktam, tena kvacid bhavaty api, kāryī, hāryī, taṇḍulī, taṇdulikaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:28280: vrīhyādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ iniṭhanau pratyayau bhavato matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:28284: na ca vrīhyādibhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ pratyayadvayam iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:28285: kiṃ tarhi ? śikhādibhya inirvācya ikan yavakhadādiṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:28287: śikhā mekhalā sañjñā balākā mālā vīṇā vaḍavā aṣṭakā patākā karman carman haṃsā ity etebhya inir eva+iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:28288: yavakhada kumārī nau ity etebhya ikann eva+iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:28290: vrīhigrahaṇaṃ kimartham, yāvatā tundādiṣu vrīhiśabdaḥ paṭhyate, tatra iniṭhanau cakāreṇa vidhīyete ? evaṃ tarhi tundādisu vrīhigrahaṇam arthagrahaṇam vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:28291: śālayo 'sya santi śālinaḥ, śālī, śālikaḥ, śālimān iti /
GS24jvkasipu:28299: tundādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhya ilac pratyayo bhavati matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:28313: ekapūrvād gopūrvāc ca prātipadikān nityaṃ ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati matvarthe
GS24jvkasipu:28318: ata ity eva ekaviṃśatir asya asti iti na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28320: kathaṃ gauśakaṭikaḥ ? śakaṭīśabdena samānārthaḥ śakaṭaśabdo 'sti, tato bhaviṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:28321: avaśyaṃ ca ataḥ ity anuvartyam, dvandvopatāpagarhyāt ity evam ādyartham /
GS24jvkasipu:28327: śatāntāt sahasrāntāt ca prātipadikāt ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati matvarthe tau cet śatasahasraśabdau niṣkāt parau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28330: suvarṇaniṣkaśatam asya asti iti anabhidhānān na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:28334: āhatapraśaṃsāviśiṣṭārthe vartamānād rūpaśabdāt yap pratyayo bhavati matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:28338: praśastaṃ rūpam asya asti rūpyaḥ purusaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28339: nighātikātāḍanādinā dīnārādiṣu rūpaṃ yad utpadyate tad āhatamn ity ucyate
GS24jvkasipu:28346: asantāt prātipadikāt, māyā medhā sraj ity etebhyaś ca viniḥ pratyayo bhavati matvarthe
GS24jvkasipu:28352: māyāśabdād vrīhyādiṣu pāṭhāt iniṭhanau api bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28356: chandasi viṣaye bahulaṃ viniḥ pratyayo bhavati matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:28391: vātānāṃ samūhaḥ, vātaṃ na sahate iti vā vātūlaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28411: vācśabdāt prathamāsamarthād ālac āṭac ity etau pratyayau bhavato matvarthe bahubhāṣiṇi abhidheye
GS24jvkasipu:28416: yo hi samyag bahu bhāṣate vāgmīty eva sa bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:28420: svaśadād aiśvaryavācino matvarthe āmin pratyayo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:28421: svam asya asti iti aiśvaryam asya asti iti svāmī /
GS24jvkasipu:28427: arśas ity evam adibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyo 'c pratyayo bhavati matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:28431: yatra abhinnarūpeṇa śabdena tadvato 'bhidhānaṃ tat sarvam iha draṣṭavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:28451: tadviṣayebhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ prāṇisthārthavācibhyaḥ iniḥ pratyayo bhavati matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:28465: vāta-atisāraśabdābhyāṃ iniḥ pratyayo bhavati, tatsaṃniyogena ca tayoḥ
GS24jvkasipu:28467: vātātisārayor upatāpatvāt pūrveṇa+eva siddhe pratyaye kugartham eva+idaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:28478: pūraṇapratyayāntāt prātipadikāt iniḥ pratyayo bhavati matvarthe vayasi dyotye /
GS24jvkasipu:28479: pañcamo 'sya asti māsaḥ saṃvatsaro vā pañcamī uṣṭraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28482: siddhe sati niyamārthaṃ vacanam, inir eva bhavati, ṭhan na bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:28486: sukha ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ iniḥ pratyayo niyamyate matvarthe
GS24jvkasipu:28489: mālākṣepe iti paṭhyate, vrīhyādiṣu ca mālāśabdo 'sti, tad iha kṣepe
GS24jvkasipu:28509: brahmaṇānāṃ dharmo brāhmaṇadharmaḥ, so 'sya asti iti brāhmaṇadharmī /
GS24jvkasipu:28514: hastaśabdāt iniḥ pratyayo niyamyate matvarthe, samudāyena cej jātir
GS24jvkasipu:28521: varṇaśabdāt iniḥ pratyayo bhavati matvarthe samudāyena ced brahmacārī bhaṇyate /
GS24jvkasipu:28523: sa hi vidyāgrahaṇārtham upanīto brahama carati, niyamam āsevate ity arthaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:28529: puṣkara ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhya iniḥ pratyayo bhavati samudāyena ced deśo 'bhidhīyate
GS24jvkasipu:28589: mannantāt prātipadikān maśabdāntāc ca iniḥ pratyayo bhavati matvarthe,
GS24jvkasipu:28599: kam śam iti makārāntau udkasukhayor vācakau, tābhyāṃ ba bha yus ti tu ta yas ity ete sapta pratyayā bhavanti matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:28600: kambaḥ, kambhaḥ, kaṃyuḥ, kantiḥ, kantuḥ, kantaḥ, kaṃyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28601: śambaḥ, śambhaḥ, śaṃyuḥ, śantiḥ, śantuḥ, śantaḥ, śaṃyaḥ /
