GS24jvkasipu:28602: sakāraḥ padasañjñārthaḥ, tena anusvāraparasavarṇau siddhau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28603: sañjñāyāṃ hi asatyāṃ kamyaḥ, śamyaḥ iti syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:28606: tundi bali vaṭi ity etebhyo bhaḥ pratyayo bhavati matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:28607: tundiḥ iti vṛddhā nābhirucyate, sā asya asti iti tundibhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28610: valiśabdaḥ āmādiṣu paṭhyate, tena balinaḥ ity api bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:28613: aham iti śabdāntaram ahaṅkāre vartate, śubham ity avyayaṃ śubhaparyāyaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:28620: iti śrījayādityaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau pañcamādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:28626: prāg etasmād dikṣaṃ śabdanād yān ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmo vibhaktisañjñās te veditavyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28631: tasilādīnāṃ vibhaktitve prayojanaṃ tyadādividhayaḥ idamo vibhaktisvaraś ca
GS24jvkasipu:28634: ataḥ paraṃ svārthikāḥ pratyayāḥ, teṣu samarthādhikāraḥ prathamagrahaṇaṃ ca pratiyogyapekṣatvān na+upayujyate iti nivṛttam /
GS24jvkasipu:28636: tena vikalpena tasilādayo bhavanti, kutaḥ , kasmāt, kutra, kasmin iti //
GS24jvkasipu:28640: kimaḥ sarvanāmno bahuśabdāc ca prāgdiśaḥ pratyayāḥ veditavyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28651: sarvanāmatvād eva siddhe kimo grahaṇam dvyādiparyudāsāt /
GS24jvkasipu:28653: iha na bhavati, bahoḥ sūpāt, bahau sūpe iti //
GS24jvkasipu:28657: idam iś ity ayam ādeśo bhavati prāg-diśīyeṣu pratyayeśu parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28662: rephathakārādau prāg-diśīye pratyaye parataḥ idamaḥ eta-itau ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28670: etadaḥ prāg-diśīye parataḥ aś ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28675: etado rathoḥ parata eta it ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28677: ittham rephādeḥ anadyatane rhil anyatarasyām (*5,3.21) iti vidyata eva /
GS24jvkasipu:28681: sarvasya sa ity ayam ādeśo bhavati prāg-diśīye dakārādau pratyaye parato
GS24jvkasipu:28685: prāg-diśīye ity eva, sarvaṃ dadāti iti sarvadā brāhmaṇī //
GS24jvkasipu:28695: pratiyoge pañcamyās tasiḥ (*5,4.44) , apādāne ca ahīya-ruhoḥ (*5,4.45) iti vakṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:28696: tasya taseḥ kiṃsarvanāmabahubhyaḥ parasya tasilādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28704: pari abhi ity etābhyāṃ tasil pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28732: kimaḥ saptamyanatād vā haḥ pratyayo bhavati chandasi visaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28736: kutracidasya sā dūre kva brāhmaṇasya cāvakāḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:28741: dṛśigrahaṇam prāyikavidhyarthaṃ, tena bhavadādibhir yoga eva+etad vidhānam
GS24jvkasipu:28742: ke punar bhavadādayaḥ ? bhavān dīrghāyurāyuṣmān devānāṃ priyaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:28743: sa bhavān, tato bhavān, tatra bhavān /
GS24jvkasipu:28744: taṃ bhavantaṃ, tatra bhavantam, tato bhavantam /
GS24jvkasipu:28745: tena bhavatā, tatra bhavatā, tato bhavatā /
GS24jvkasipu:28748: tasmin bhavati, tatra bhavati, tato bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28752: saptamyāḥ iti vartate, na tu itarābhyaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:28764: saptamyāḥ ity eva, kāle iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:28765: idamaḥ saptamyantāt kāle vartamānāt rhil pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28777: idamaḥ saptamyantāt kāle vartamānād dānīṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28781: tadaḥ saptamyantāt kāle vartamānād dā pratyayo bhavati, cakārād dānīṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:28787: tayor idamaḥ tadaś ca yathāsaṅkhyaṃ dā-rhilau pratyayau bhavataś chandasi
GS24jvkasipu:28798: kiṃsarvanāmabahubhyaḥ saptamyantebhyaḥ anadyatane kālaviśeṣe vartamānebhyaḥ rhil pratyayo bhavaty antarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:28805: sptamyāḥ iti kāle iti ca vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:28807: prakṛtiḥ, pratyayaḥ, ādeśaḥ, kālaviśeṣaḥ iti sarvam etan nipātanāl labhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:28808: samānasya sabhāvo nipātyate dyaś ca pratyayaḥ ahany abhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:28810: pūrvapūrvatarayoḥ parabhāvo nipātyate udārī ca pratyayau saṃvatsare
GS24jvkasipu:28814: idama iśbhāvaḥ samasaṇ pratyayaḥ nipātyate saṃvatsare 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:28834: saptamyāḥ iti kāle iti ca nivṛttam /
GS24jvkasipu:28837: prakāravṛttibhyaḥ kiṃ-sarvanāma-bahubhyaḥ svārthe thāl pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28842: sa tu svabhāvāt prakāravati vartate, thāl punaḥ prakāramātre //
GS24jvkasipu:28855: kiṃśabdād dhetau vartamānāt thā pratyayo bhavati, cakārāt prakāravacane chandasi viṣaye
GS24jvkasipu:28856: hetau tāvat - kathā grāmaṃ na pṛcchasi /
GS24jvkasipu:28857: kena hetunā na pṛcchasi ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28872: dikśabdebhyaḥ iti kim ? aindryāṃ diśi vasati /
GS24jvkasipu:28873: saptamī-pañcamī-prathamābhyaḥ iti kim ? pūrvaṃ grāmaṃ gataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28874: dig-deśa-kālesu iti kim ? pūrvasmin gurau vasati /
GS24jvkasipu:28881: dakṣiṇā-śabdaḥ kāle na sambhavati iti digdeśavṛttiḥ parigṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:28891: para-avara-śabdābhyāṃ vibhāṣā atasuc pratyayo bhavati astāter arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:28906: añcatyantebhyo dikśabdebhya uttarasya astātipratyayasya lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28917: upari upariṣṭat ity etau śabdau nipātyete astāterarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:28918: ūrdhvasya upabhāvaḥ rilriṣṭātilau ca pratyayau nipātyete /
GS24jvkasipu:28929: aparasyāṃ diśi vasati paścād diśi vasati /
GS24jvkasipu:28932: dikpūrvapadasya aparasya paścabhāvo vaktavya ātiś ca pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28966: uttareṇa vasati, uttarād vasati, uttarato vasati /
GS24jvkasipu:28967: uttareṇa ramaṇīyam, uttarād ramaṇīyam, uttarato ramaṇīyam /
GS24jvkasipu:28968: adhreṇa vasati adharād vasati, aghastād vasati /
GS24jvkasipu:28969: adhareṇa ramaṇīyam, adharād ramaṇīyam, adhastād ramaṇīyam /
GS24jvkasipu:28970: dakṣiṇena vasati, dakṣiṇād vasati, dakṣiṇāto vasati /
GS24jvkasipu:28971: dakṣiṇena ramaṇīyam, dakṣiṇād ramaṇīyam, dakṣiṇato ramaṇīyam /
GS24jvkasipu:28992: dakṣiṇa-śabdād āhiḥ pratyayo bhavati astāterarthe, cakārād āc, dūre ced avadhimānavadher bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28999: uttara-śabdād ājāhī pratyayau bhavataḥ astāterarthe dūre ced
GS24jvkasipu:29010: tat saṃniogena ca+eṣām yathāsaṅkhyaṃ pur adḥ av ity ete ādeśā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:29024: astāti-pratyaye parataḥ purvādīnāṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ purādaya ādeśā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:29025: idam eva ādeśavidhānaṃ jñāpakam , astātir ebhyo bhavati, asi-pratyayena na ādhyate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:29035: avarasya astātau parato vibhāṣā av ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29044: saṅkhyāvācibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyo vidhārthe vartamāṇebhyo dhā pratyayo bhavati svārthe /
GS24jvkasipu:29045: vidhā prakāraḥ, sa ca sarvakriyāviṣaya eva gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:29057: adhikaraṇavicāle gamyamāne saṅkhyāyāḥ svārthe dhā pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29063: ekaśabdāt parasya dhā-pratyayasya dhyamuñ ādeśaḥ bhavaty anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:29066: prakaraṇād eva labdhe punar dhā-grahaṇam vidhārthe vihitasya api yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:29071: dvi-tryoḥ sambandhino dhā-prayayasya vidhārthe adhikaraṇavicāle ca
GS24jvkasipu:29081: dvi-tryoḥ sambandhino dhā-pratyayasya edhāc ādeśo bhavaty anyatrasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:29088: yāpye vartamānāt prātipadikāt svārthe pāśap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29091: yo vyākarana-śāstre pravīṇo duḥśīlaḥ, tatra kasmān na bhavati ? yasya guṇasya sadbhāvād dravye śabdaniveśaḥ, tasya kutsāyāṃ pratyayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:29094: pūraṇa-pratyayo yastīyaḥ, tadantāt prātipadikād bhāge vartamānāt svārthe an pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:29105: prāg ekādaśabhyaḥ saṅkhyāśabdebhyaḥ pūraṇapratyayāntebhyaḥ bhāge vartamānebhyaḥ svārthe 'n pratyayo bhavati acchandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:29116: bhāge ity eva, acchandasi iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:29117: ṣaṣṭha-aṣṭamabhyāṃ bhāge abhidheye acchandasi viṣaye ñaḥ pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:29124: ṣaṣṭha-aṣṭamābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ kan-lukau ca bhavato mānapaśvaṅgayor
GS24jvkasipu:29126: ṣaṣṭhako bhāgo mānaṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29127: aṣṭamo bhāgaḥ paśvaṅga cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29137: eka-śadād sahāya-vācinaḥ svārthe ākinic pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29143: tadupādāne hi dvibahvor na syāt, ekākinau, ekākinaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:29146: pūrva bhūtaḥ iti vigṛhya supsupeti samāsaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29149: bhūtapūrvatvaviśiṣṭe 'rthe vartamānāt prātipadikāt svārthe caraṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29158: ṣaṣṭhyantāt pratyayavidhānāt saṃprati bhūtapūrvagrahaṇaṃ pratyayārthasya viśeṣaṇaṃ, na tu prakṛtyarthaviśeṣaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:29165: atiśāyanaviśiṣṭe 'rthe vartamānāt prātipadikāt svārthe tamabiṣṭhanau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29167: sarva ime āḍhyāḥ, ayam eṣām atiśayena āḍhyaḥ āḍhyatamaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29173: yadā ca prakarṣavatāṃ punaḥ prakarṣo vivakṣyate tadātiśāyikāntād aparaḥ pratyayo bhavaty eva
GS24jvkasipu:29174: devo vaḥ savitā prārpayatu śreṣṭhatamāya karmaṇe /
GS24jvkasipu:29178: tiṅantāt ca atiśāyane dyotye tamap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29179: ṅy-āp-prātipadikāt (*4,1.1) ity adhikārāt tiṅo na prāpnoti iti idaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:29180: sarve ime pacanti iti, ayam eṣām atiśayena pacati pacatitamām /
GS24jvkasipu:29185: dvayor arthayor vacanaṃ dvivacanam vibhaktavyo vibhajyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29187: dvyarthe vibhajye ca+upapade prātipadikāt tiṅantāc ca atiśāyane tarabīyasunau pratyayau bhavataḥ
GS24jvkasipu:29190: dvāvimāvāḍhyau, ayam anayor atiśayena āḍhyaḥ āḍhyataraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29194: īyasun khalv api - dvāvimau paṭū, ayam anayor atiśayena paṭuḥ paṭīyān /
GS24jvkasipu:29201: iṣṭhannīyasunau ajādī sāmānyena vihitau, tayor ayaṃ viṣayaniyamaḥ kriyate,
GS24jvkasipu:29202: guṇavacanād eva bhavatastau na anyasmād iti /
GS24jvkasipu:29207: iha na bhavataḥ, pācakataraḥ, pācakatamaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:29208: eva kāraḥ iṣṭato 'vadhāraṇārthaḥ, pratyayaniyamo 'yaṃ na prakṛtiniyamaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:29214: trantāc chandasi viṣaye ajadī pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29215: pūrveṇa guṇavacanād eva niyame kṛte chandasi prakṛtyantarāṇy
GS24jvkasipu:29216: abhyanujñāyante, trantād apy ajādī bhavata iti /
GS24jvkasipu:29219: bhasyāḍhe taddhite iti puṃvadbhāve kṛte turiṣṭhemeyaḥsu (*3,4.154) iti tṛco nivṛttiḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:29222: praśasya śabdasya śra ity ayam ādeśe bhavati ajādyoḥ pratyayayoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29224: nanu ca praśasya śabdasya aguṇavacanatvād ajādī na sambhavataḥ ? evaṃ tarhi ādeśavidhānasāmarthyāt tadviṣayo niyamo na pravartate, ajādī guṇavacanād eva iti /
GS24jvkasipu:29226: sarve ime praśasyāḥ, ayam eṣām atiśayena praśasyaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29227: ubhāvimau praśasyau, ayam anayor atiśayena praśasyaḥ śreyān /
GS24jvkasipu:29229: prakṛtyau kāc iti prakṛtibhāvat śraśabdasya ṭilopayasyetilopau na bhavataḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:29232: praśasya śabdasya jya ity ayam ādeśo bhavati ajādyoḥ pratyayayoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29233: sarve ime praśasyāḥ, ayam eṣām atiśayena praśasyaḥ jyeṣṭhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29234: ubhāvimau praśasyau, ayam anayor atiśayena praśasyaḥ jyāyān /
GS24jvkasipu:29239: vṛddha-śabdasya ca jya ity ayam ādeśo bhavaty ajādyoḥ pratyayayoḥ parataḥ
GS24jvkasipu:29240: tayoś ca sattvaṃ niyamābhāvena pūrvavaj jñāpyate /
GS24jvkasipu:29241: sarve ime vṛddhāḥ, ayam eṣām atiśayena vṛddhaḥ jyeṣṭhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29242: ubhāvimau vṛddhau, ayam anayor atiśayena vṛddhaḥ jyāyān /
GS24jvkasipu:29244: priyasthira ity ādinā vṛddhaśabdasya varṣādeśo vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:29250: antika-bāḍhayoḥ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ neda sādha ity etāv ādeśau bhavato 'jādyoḥ
GS24jvkasipu:29255: ubhe ime antike, idam anayor atiśayena antikaṃ nedīyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29257: sarve ime bāḍhamadhīyate, ayam eṣām atiśayena bāḍham adhīte sadhiṣṭhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29258: ubhāvimau bāḍham adhīyāte, ayam anayor atiśayena bāḍham adhīte sādhīyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29262: yuva-alpa-śabdayoḥ kan ity ayam ādeśo bhavaty anyatarasyām ajadyoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29264: sarve ime yuvānaḥ, ayam eṣam atiśayena yuva kaniṣṭhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29265: dvāvimau yuvānau, ayam anayor atiśayena yuvā kanīyān /
GS24jvkasipu:29268: sarve ime 'lpāḥ, ayam eṣām atiśayena alpaḥ kaniṣṭhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29269: ubhāvimāv alpau, aym anayor atiśayena alpaḥ kanīyān /
GS24jvkasipu:29274: vino matupaś ca lug bhavati ajādyoḥ pratyayayoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29275: idam eva vacanaṃ jñāpakam ajādis adbhāvasya /
GS24jvkasipu:29276: sarve ime sragviṇaḥ, ayam eṣām atiśayena sragvī srajiṣṭhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29277: ubhāvimau sragviṇau, ayam anayor atiśayena sragvī srajiyān /
GS24jvkasipu:29279: sarve ime tvagvantaḥ, ayam eṣām atiśayena tvagvān tvaciṣṭhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29280: ubhāvimau tvagvantau, ayam anayor atiśayena tvagvān tvacīyān /
GS24jvkasipu:29286: praśaṃsāviśiṣṭe 'rthe vartamānāt prātipadikāt svārthe rūpap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29287: svārthikāś ca pratyayāḥ prakṛtyarthaviśeṣasya dyotakā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:29292: corarūpaḥ, dasyurūpaḥ, yo 'kṣṇor apy añjanaṃ haret /
GS24jvkasipu:29298: ekā ca kriyā iti rupappratyayāntād dvivacanabahuvacane na bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29305: īṣadasamāptiviśeṣṭe 'rthe vartamānāt prātipadikāt kalpap deśya deśīyar ity
GS24jvkasipu:29311: vibhāṣā supo bahuc parastāt tu || PS_5,3.68 ||
GS24jvkasipu:29313: īṣadasamāptiviśeṣṭe 'rthe vartamānāt subantāt vibhaṣā bahuc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29314: sa tu purastād eva bhavati, na parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29323: sāmānyasya bhedako viśeṣaḥ prakāraḥ, tasya vacane /
GS24jvkasipu:29325: subantāt prakāraviśiṣṭe 'rthe vartamānāt prātipadikāt svārthe jātīyar pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29334: prāk etasmād iva saṃśabdanād yānita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ kapratyayas teṣu adhikṛto veditavyaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:29339: tiṅaś ca (*5,3.56) ity anuvṛttam uttarasūtreṇa+eva sambandhanīm //
GS24jvkasipu:29343: avyayānām sarvanāmnāṃ ca prāgivīyeṣv artheṣu akac pratyayo bhavati, sa ca prāk ṭeḥ, na parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29351: prātipadikāt, supaḥ iti dvayam api iha anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:29353: kvacit prātipadikasya prāk ṭeḥ pratyayo bhavati, kvacit subantasya /
GS24jvkasipu:29354: yuṣmakābhiḥ , asmakābhiḥ, yuṣmakāsu, asmakāsu, yuvakayoḥ, āvakayoḥ, ity atra prātipadikasya
GS24jvkasipu:29355: tvayakā, mayakā, tvayaki, mayaki ity atra subantasya /
GS24jvkasipu:29357: sa ca mittvād antyāt acaḥ paro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29377: ajñātatvopādhike 'rthe vartamānāt prātipadikāt tiṅantāc ca svārthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29378: svena rūpeṇa jñāte padārthe viśeṣarūpeṇa ajñāte pratyayavidhānam etat /
GS24jvkasipu:29379: kasya ayam aśvaḥ iti svasvāmisambandhena ajñāte aśve pratyayaḥ, aśvakaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29382: evam anyatra api yathāyogam ajñātatā vijñeyā /
GS24jvkasipu:29393: kutsitasvopādhike 'rthe vartamānāt prātipadikāt svārthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29407: kasya apavādaḥ, pratyayāntena cet sañjñā gamyate /
GS24jvkasipu:29414: tasyā gamyamānāyāṃ subantāt tiṅantāc ca yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29424: nītau ca gamyamānāyāṃ tadyuktād anukampāyuktād yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29430: pūrveṇa pratyāsannānukampāsambandhāt anukampyamānād eva pratyayo vihitaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29431: saṃprati vyavahitād api yathā syād iti vacanam //
GS24jvkasipu:29434: anukampāyām (*5,3.76), nītau ca tadyuktāt (*5,3.77) iti vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:29435: bahvacaḥ prātipadikāt manuṣyanāmadheyād vā ṭhac pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:29447: bahvaco manusyanāmno ghan ilac ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29454: upaśabda ādiryasya tasmād upādeḥ prātipadikād bahvaco manusyanāmnaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29456: cakārād ghanilacau pratyayau bhavataḥ ṭhac ca vā /
GS24jvkasipu:29457: upaḍaḥ, upakaḥ, upiyaḥ, upilaḥ, upikaḥ, upendradattakaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29464: jātiśabdo yo manusyanāmadheyo vyāghra siṃha ity evam ādiḥ, tasmād anukampāyāṃ nītau ca kan-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29474: kan ity anuvartate, manusyanāmnaḥ iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:29477: vyāghrājino nām akaścin manusyaḥ, so 'nukampitaḥ vyāghrakaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29482: asmin prakaraṇe yaḥ ṭhaḥ ajādiś ca pratyayaḥ, tasmin parataḥ prakṛter
GS24jvkasipu:29483: dvitīyād aca ūrdhvaṃ yac chabdarūpaṃ tasya lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29497: lopaḥ pūrvapadasya ca ṭhājādāvanajādau ca vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29499: vinā 'pi pratyayena pūrvottarapadayoḥ vibhāṣā lopo vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29505: apratyaye tathā+eva+iṣṭa uvarṇāl la ilasya ca //
GS24jvkasipu:29506: dvitīyād aco lope sandhyakṣaradvitīyatve tadāder lopavacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:29513: kathaṃ ṣaḍaṅgulidattaḥ ṣaḍikaḥ iti ? ṣaṣaṣṭhājādivacanāt siddham //
GS24jvkasipu:29516: śevalādīnāṃ manuṣyanāmnāṃ ṭhājādau pratyaye parataḥ tṛtīyād acaḥ ūrdhvasya lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29523: śevalādīnāṃ tṛtīyādaco lopaḥ sa cākṛtasandhīnām iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:29524: śevalendradattaḥ, suparyāśīrdattaḥ śevalikaḥ, suparikaḥ iti yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:29530: alpatvaviśiṣṭe arthe vartamānāt prātipadikāt yathāvihitaṃ patyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:29541: hrasvatvaviśiṣṭe 'rthe vartamānāt prātipadikāt yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29549: hrasvatvahetukā yā sañjñā tasyāṃ gamyamānāyāṃ kan-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29559: kuṭī-śamī-śuṇḍābhyo hrasvārthe dyotye raḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29576: kāsū-goṇī-śabdābhyāṃ hrasvasve dyotye ṣṭarac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29585: vatsa ukṣan aśva ṛṣabha ity etebhyaḥ tanutve dyotye ṣṭarac-pratyayo
GS24jvkasipu:29587: yasya guṇasya hi bhāvād dravye śabdaniveśaḥ tasya tanutve pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29594: aśvena aśvāyām utpanno 'svaḥ, tasya tanutvam anyapitṛkatā /
GS24jvkasipu:29595: anuḍvān ṛṣabhaḥ, tasya tanutvaṃ bhāravahane mandaśaktitā //
GS24jvkasipu:29596: kiṃ-yat-tado nirdhāraṇe dvayor ekasya ḍatarac || PS_5,3.92 ||
GS24jvkasipu:29598: kim yat tat ity etebhyaḥ prātipadikebhya dvayor ekasya nirdhāraṇe ḍataracpratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:29600: jātyā, kriyayā, gunena, sañjñayā vā samudāyād ekadeśasya pṛthakkaraṇaṃ nirdhāraṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:29615: kiṃyattadaḥ iti vartate nirdhārane, ekasya iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:29617: bahunāṃ madhye ekasya nirdhārane gamyamāne jātiparipraśnaviṣayebhyaḥ kimādibhyaḥ vā ḍatamac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29625: jātiparipraśne iti kim ? ko bhavatām devadattaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29626: paripraśnagrahaṇaṃ ca kima eva viśeṣaṇaṃ, na yattadoḥ, asambhavāt /
GS24jvkasipu:29628: kimo 'smin viṣaye ḍataram api icchanti kecit, kataro bhavatāṃ kālāpaḥ iti
GS24jvkasipu:29629: tatra katarakatamau jātiaparipraśne (*2,1.63) iti vacanāt siddham //
GS24jvkasipu:29632: ekaśabdāt prācām ācāryāṇāṃ matena ḍatarac ḍatamac ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ svasmin viṣyae
GS24jvkasipu:29634: dvayor nirdhārane ḍatarac, bahūnāṃ nirdhārane ḍatamac /
GS24jvkasipu:29647: yat punaḥ svayam eva kutsitaṃ tatra kutsite (*5,3.74) ity anena kanpratyayo bhavati, devadattakaḥ, yajñadattakaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:29652: ivārthe yat prātipadikaṃ vartate tasmāt kan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29658: pratikṛtau iti kim ? gaur iva gavayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:29661: iva ity anuvartate, kan iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:29662: ivārthe gamyamāne kanpratyayo bhavati, samudāyena cet sañjñā gamyate /
GS24jvkasipu:29670: sañjñāyāṃ vihitasya kano manusye 'bhidheye lub bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29677: devapathāder ākṛtigaṇatvāt tasya+eva ayaṃ prapañco veditavyaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:29680: jīvikārthaṃ yad apaṇyam tasminn abhidheye kano lub bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29694: ive pratikṛtau (*5,3.96), sañjñāyāṃ ca (*5,3.97) vihitasya kano devapathādibhya uttarasya lub bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29726: itaḥ prabhṛti pratyayāḥ sāmānyena bhavanti, pratikṛtau capratikṛtau ca /
GS24jvkasipu:29727: vastiśabdād ivārthe dyotye ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29734: kecid atra ḍhañam api icchanti, tadarthaṃ yogavibhāgaḥ kartavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29741: śākhā ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ patpratyayo bhavati ivārthe śākheva śakhyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29760: dravyam, bhavyaḥ, ātmavān adhipretānām arthanāṃ pātrabhūta ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:29770: tad ity anena prakṛta ivārtho nirdeśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:29771: ivārthaviṣayāt samāsād aparasminn ivārthe eva chanḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29776: tat katham ? kākasyāgamanaṃ yādṛcchikam, tālasya patanaṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:29778: evam eva devadattasya tatrāgamanaṃ, dasyūnāṃ ca upanipātaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29780: tatra yo devadattasya dasyūnāṃ ca samāgamaḥ, sa kākatālasamāgamasadṛśaḥ ity ekaḥ upamārthaḥ, ataśca devadattasya vadhaḥ, sa kālatālavadhasadṛśaḥ iti dvitīyaḥ upamārthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29782: samāsaś ca ayam asmād eva jñāpakāt, na hy asya aparaṃ sakṣaṇam asti /
GS24jvkasipu:29787: śarkarā ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ ivārthe aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29833: pratna pūrva viśva ima ity etebhyaḥ ivārthe thālpratyayo bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:29839: pūgavācinaḥ prātipadikāt agrāmaṇīpūrvāt svārthe ñyaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29843: agrāmaṇīpūrvāt iti kim ? devadatto grāmaṇīreṣāṃ ta ime devadattakāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29848: vrātavācibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ ca svārthe ñyaḥ pratyayo bhavaty astriyām /
GS24jvkasipu:29851: cphañaḥ khalv api - kauñjāyanyaḥ, kauñjāyanayau, kauñjāyanāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29861: vāhīkeṣu ya āyudhajīvisaṅghaḥ, tadvācinaḥ prātipadikāt brāhmaṇarājanyavarjitāt svārthe ñyaṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29864: ṭakāro ṅībarthaḥ, tena astriyām iti na anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:29881: vṛkaśadāt āyudhajīvinaḥ svārthe ṭeṇyaṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29889: dāmanyādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ trigartaṣaṣṭhebhyaḥ ca āyudhajīvisaṅghavācibhyaḥ svārthe chaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29890: yeṣām āyudhajīvināṃ saṅghānāṃ ṣaḍantavargās teṣām ca trigartaḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29891: trigartaḥ ṣaṣṭho yeṣāṃ te trigartaṣaṣṭhāḥ ity ucyante /
GS24jvkasipu:29919: parśvādibhyaḥ yaudheyādibhyaś ca prātipadikebhyaḥ āyudhajīvisaṅghavācibhyaḥ svārthe 'ṇañau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29953: abhijidādibhyo 'ṇantebhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ svārthe yañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29963: abhijito muhurtaḥ, ābhijitaḥsthālīpākaḥ ity atra na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:29966: pūgāñ ñyo 'grāmaṇīpūrvāt (*5,3.112) ity ataḥ prabhṛti ye pratyayāḥ, te tadrājasañjñā bhavanti
GS24jvkasipu:29968: tadrājapradeśāḥ - tadrājasya bahusu ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:29969: iti śrījayādityaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau pañcamādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:29972: pādaśatasya saṅkhyāder vīpsāyāṃ vun lopaś ca || PS_5,4.1 ||
GS24jvkasipu:29974: pādaśatāntasya saṅkhyādeḥ prātipadikasya vīpsāyāṃ dyotyāyāṃ vun pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29976: yasya+iti lopena+eva siddhe punar vacanam anaimittikārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:29978: tasya sthānivadbhāvāt pādaḥ pat (*6,4.130) iti padbhāvo na syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:29980: dvau dvau pādau dadāti dvipadikāṃ dadāti /
GS24jvkasipu:29981: dve dve śate dadāti dviśatikāṃ dadāti /
GS24jvkasipu:29984: svabhāvāc ca vunpratyayāntaṃ striyām eva vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:29985: pādaśatasya iti kim ? dvau dvau māṣau dadāti /
GS24jvkasipu:29986: saṅkhyādeḥ iti kim ? pādaṃ pādaṃ dadāti /
GS24jvkasipu:29987: vīpsāyām iti kim ? dvau pādau dadāti /
GS24jvkasipu:29996: daṇḍavyavasargayoḥ gamyamānayoḥ pādaśatāntasya prātipadikasya saṅkhyādeḥ vunpratyayo bhavati, antalopaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:30016: teṣāṃ cañcakaḥ, bṛhakaḥ iti udāharaṇaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:30043: sāmivacane upapade ktāntāt kanpratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30049: sāmivacane pratiṣedhānarthakyam, prakṛtyābhihitatvāt ? evaṃ tarhi na+eva
GS24jvkasipu:30050: ayam anatyantagatau vihitasya kanaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ, kiṃ tarhi, svārthikasya /
GS24jvkasipu:30051: kena punaḥ svarthikaḥ kan vihitaḥ ? etad eva jñāpakaṃ bhavati svārthe kan iti /
GS24jvkasipu:30053: tatra yad etad ucyate, evaṃ hi sūtram abhinnatarakaṃ bhavati, etair hi bahutarakaṃ vyāpyate ity evam ādi, tadupapannaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:30057: bṛhatīśabdād ācchādane vartamānāt svārthe kan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30062: aṣaḍakṣa āśitaṅgu alagkarma alampuruṣa ity etebhyaḥ adhyuttarapadāt ca svārthe khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30064: bahuvrīhau sakthyakṣṇoḥ iti ṣac, tataḥ khapratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30066: yo dvābhyam eva kriyate na bahubhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30069: akaṅkarman, alampuruṣaḥ iti paryādayo glānadyarthe caturthyā iti samāsaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30075: nityaś ca ayaṃ pratyayaḥ, uttaratra vibhāṣāgrahaṇāt /
GS24jvkasipu:30076: anye 'pi svārthikā nityāḥ pratyayāḥ smaryante, tamabādayaḥ prakknaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:30077: ñyādayaḥ prāgvunaḥ, āmādayaḥ prāṅ mayaṭaḥ, bṛhatījātyantāḥ samānāntāś ca iti //
GS24jvkasipu:30081: añcatyantāt prātipadikāt adikṣtriyāṃ vartamānāt svārthe vibhāṣā khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30092: jātyantāt prātipadikāt bandhuni vartamānāt svārthe chaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30093: badhyate 'smiñ jātiḥ iti bandhuśabdena dravyam ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:30095: brāhmaṇamātīyaḥ, kṣatriyajātīyaḥ, vaiśyajātīyaḥ iti brāhmaṇādir eva+ucyate
GS24jvkasipu:30099: sthānāntāt prātipadikāt vibhāṣā chaḥ pratyayo bhavati sasthānena cet sthānāntamarthavad bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:30100: sasthānaḥ iti tulya ucyate, samānaṃ sthānam asya iti kṛtvā /
GS24jvkasipu:30107: tena bahuvrīhiḥ sasthānaśabdārtham upasthāpayati, na tatpuruṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30109: dvyor vibhāṣayor nityā vidhayaḥ iti pūrvatra nityavidhayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:30112: kima ekārāntāt tiṅantād avyayebhyaś ca yo vihito ghaḥ sa
GS24jvkasipu:30113: kimettiṅavyayaghaḥ, tadantāt prātipadikāt adravyaprakarṣe āmupratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30114: yady api dravyasya svataḥ prakarṣo na asti, tathā api kriyāguṇasthaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:30115: prakarṣo yadā dravye upacaryate tadā 'yaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30129: kimettiṅavyayaghād adravyaprakarṣe amu pratyayo bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:30133: svarādiṣu am ām iti paṭhyate, tasmāt tadantasya avyayatvam //
GS24jvkasipu:30142: iti ṇac vihitaḥ, tadantāt svārthe añ pratyayo bhavati striyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:30145: strīgrahaṇaṃ kimartham, yāvatā ṇac striyām eva vihitaḥ, tataḥ svārthikas tatra+eva bhaviṣyati ? evaṃ tarhy etaj jñāpayati - svārthikāḥ pratyayā prakṛtito liṅgavacanānyativartante 'pi iti /
GS24jvkasipu:30146: tena guḍakalpā drākṣā, tailakalpā prasannā, deva eva devatā ity evam ādi
GS24jvkasipu:30150: abhividhau bhāva inuṇ (*3,3.44) vihitaḥ, tadantāt svārthe aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30156: visārinśabdāt svārthe aṇ pratyayo bhavati matsye 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:30161: saṅkhyāśabdebhyaḥ kriyābhyāvṛttigaṇane vartamānebhyaḥ svārthe kṛtvasuc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30167: saṅkhyāyāḥ iti kim ? mūrīn vārān bhuṅkte /
GS24jvkasipu:30168: kriyāgrahaṇam kimartham, yāvatā abhyavṛttiḥ kriyāyā eva sambhavati, na dravyaguṇayoḥ ? uttarārthaṃ kriyāgrahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:30169: ekasya sakṛc ca (*5,4.19) ity atra kriya+eva gaṇyate, na abhyāvṛttiḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:30174: gaṇanagrahaṇaṃ kimartham, yāvatā gaṇanātmikaiva saṅkhyā ? akriyamāṇe gaṇanagrahaṇe kriyābhyāvṛttau vartamānebhyaḥ saṅkhyeyavacanebhya eva
GS24jvkasipu:30175: pratyayaḥ syāt, śatavārān bhuṅkte śatakṛtvaḥ iti ? iha na syāt, śataṃ vārāṇāṃ bhuṅkte iti ? na hy atra abhyāvṛttau śataśabdaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:30180: dvi tri catur ity etebhyaḥ saṅkhyāśabdebhyaḥ kriyābhyāvṛttigaṇane vartamānebhyaḥ suc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30188: ekaśabdasya sakṛt ity ayam ādeśo bhavati suc ca pratyayaḥ kriyāgaṇena /
GS24jvkasipu:30193: ekaḥ pākaḥ ity atra na bhavati, anabhidhānāt //
GS24jvkasipu:30196: bahuśabdāt kriyābhyāvṛtigaṇane vartamānāt vibhāṣā dhā pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30200: kriyāṇāmutpattayaś ced āsannakālāḥ bhavanti, na viprakṛṣṭakālāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30201: bahudhā divasasya bhuṅkte, bahukṛtvo divasasya bhuṅkte /
GS24jvkasipu:30202: aviprakṛṣṭakāle iti kim ? bahukṛtvo māsasya bhuṅkte //
GS24jvkasipu:30207: prathamāsamarthāt prakṛtopādhike 'rthe vartamānāt svārthe mayaṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30213: tad iti prathamāsamarthāt prakṛtavacane 'bhidheye mayaṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30221: bahusu prakṛteṣu ucyamānesu samūhavat pratyayā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:30223: modakāḥ prakṛtāḥ prācuryeṇa prastutāḥ maudakikam, modakamayam /
GS24jvkasipu:30226: dvitīye sūtrārthe - modakāḥ prakṛtāḥ asmin yajñe maudakiko yajñaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:30240: devatāśabdāntāt prātipadikāt caturthīsamarthāt tādarthe yatpratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30250: pādārghaśabdābhyāṃ caturthīsamarthābhyāṃ tādarthye abhidheye yatpratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30256: vasu, apas, oka, kavi, kṣema, udaka, varcas, niṣkevala, uktha, jana,
GS24jvkasipu:30257: pūrva, nava, sūra, marta, yaviṣṭha ity etebhyaḥ chandasi svārthe yatpratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30293: vāprakaranāc ca vikalpante etāny upasaṃkhyānāni, tena yathāprāptam api
GS24jvkasipu:30294: bhavati, āgnīghrā śālā, sādhāraṇā bhūḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:30301: atithiśabdāt caturthisamarthāt tādarthye abhidheye ñyaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30314: yāva ity evam ādibhyaḥ svārthe kanpratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30338: lohitaśabdāt maṇau vartamānāt svārthe kanpratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30343: anitye varṇe vartamānāt lohitaśabdāt svārthe kanpratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30353: lākṣādinā rakte yo lohitaśabdaḥ, tasmāt kanpratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30356: liṅgabādhanaṃ vā ity eva, lohitikā, kohinikā śāṭī //
GS24jvkasipu:30359: varne ca anitye (*5,4.31), rakte (*5,4.32) iti dvayam apy anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:30360: kālaśabdāt anitye vartamānāt rakte ca kanpratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30366: vinaya ity evam ādibhyaḥ svārthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30389: vyāhṛtaḥ prakāśito 'rtho yasyāstasyāṃ vāci vartamānād vācśabdāt svārthe ṭhakpratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:30393: vyāhṛtārthāyām iti kim ? madhurā vāk devadattasya //
GS24jvkasipu:30396: vyāhṛtārthayā vācā yat karma yuktaṃ, tadabhidhāyinaḥ karmaśabdāt svārthe
GS24jvkasipu:30399: vācikaṃ śrutvā tathaiva yat karma kriyate tat kārmaṇam ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:30428: ajātau iti kim ? oṣadhayaḥ kṣetre rūḍhā bhavanti //
GS24jvkasipu:30432: prajña ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ svārthe aṇpratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30435: yasya astu prajñā vidyate sā prājñā prajñā-śraddhā-arcā-vṛttibhyo ṇaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:30438: videḥ śatrantasya grahaṇaṃ, videḥ śaturvasuḥ (*7,2.36) ity ata eva
GS24jvkasipu:30440: anyatarasyāṃgrahaṇaṃ vā tatra anuvartate, tu-hyos tātaṅ āśiṣy-anyatarasyām
GS24jvkasipu:30485: praśaṃsopādhike 'rthe vartamānān mṛcchabdāt sa sna ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30488: nityaś ca ayaṃ pratyayaḥ, uttarasūtre 'nyatarasyāṃ grahaṇāt //
GS24jvkasipu:30492: vṛka-jyeṣṭhābhyāṃ praśaṃsopādhike 'rthe vartamānābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyam til-tātilau pratyayau bhavataḥ chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:30498: bahvarthāt alpārthāc ca kārakābhidhāyinaḥ śabdāt śaspratyayo bhavati anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:30514: yatra maṅgalaṃ gamyate tatra ayaṃ pratyaya isyate /
GS24jvkasipu:30519: saṅkhyāvācibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ ekavacanāc ca vīpsāyāṃ dyotyāyāṃ śaspratyayo bhavati anyatarasyām
GS24jvkasipu:30522: ekavacanāt khalv api - kārṣāpaṇaṃ kārṣāpaṇaṃ dadāti karṣāpaṇaśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30526: kārṣāpaṇādayaś ca parimāṇaśabdāḥ vṛttāvekārthā eva bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:30527: saṅkhyaikavacanāt iti kim ? ghaṭaṃ ghaṭaṃ dadāti /
GS24jvkasipu:30530: kārakāt ity eva, dvayor dvayoḥ svāmī /
GS24jvkasipu:30534: pratinā karmapravacanīyena yoge yā pañcamī vihitā tadantāt tasiḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30547: apādāne yā pañcamī tasyāḥ pañcamyāḥ vā tasiḥ pratyayo bhavati, tac ced apādānaṃ hīyaruhoḥ sambandhi na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30553: hīyate iti kvikāranirdeśo jahāteḥ pratipattyarthaḥ, jihīter mā bhūt,
GS24jvkasipu:30555: kathaṃ mantro hīnaḥ svarato varṇato vā iti /
GS24jvkasipu:30558: svareṇa varṇena vā hīnaḥ ity arthaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:30564: atigrahādiviṣaye yā tṛtīyā tadantād vā tasiḥ pratyayo bhavati, sā cet kartari na bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:30567: suṣṭhuvṛttavān anyān atikramya vṛttena gṛhyate ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30568: avyathane - vṛttena na vyathate vṛttato na vyathate /
GS24jvkasipu:30569: cāritreṇa na vyathate cāritrato na vyathate /
GS24jvkasipu:30578: hīyamānena pāpena ca yogo yasya tad vācinaḥ śabdāt parā yā tṛtīyā vibhaktir akartari tadantād vā tasiḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30583: kṣepasya ca avivakṣāyāṃ tat tv ākhyāyām idam udāharaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:30589: vyāśraye gamyamāne ṣaṣṭhyantād vā tasiḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30593: arjunasya pakṣe, karṇasya pakṣe ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30598: tad vācinaḥ śabdād yā ṣaṣthī vibhaktiḥ, tadantād vā tasiḥ pratyayo bhavati apanayane gamyamāne
GS24jvkasipu:30605: apanayane iti kim ? pravāhikāyāḥ prakopanaṃ kuru //
GS24jvkasipu:30608: kāraṇasya vikārarūpeṇa abhūtasya tadātmanā bhāvaḥ abhūtatadbhāvaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30610: sampadyakartari vartamānāt prātipadikāt abhūtatadbhāve gamyamāne kṛbhvastibhir dhātubhir yoge cviḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30611: aśuklaḥ śuklaḥ sampadyate, taṃ karoti śuklīkaroti /
GS24jvkasipu:30620: kṛbhvastiyoge iti kim ? aśuklaḥ śuklo jāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:30621: sampadyakrtari iti kim, yāvatā abhūtatadbhāvasāmarthyāl labdham eva sampadyakartṛtvam ? kārakāntarasampattau mā bhūt, adevagṛhe devagṛhe sampadyate /
GS24jvkasipu:30622: devagṛhasyādheyaviśeṣasambandhena abhūtatadbhāvaḥ sattvādhikaraṇasya, na kartuḥ iti ? //
GS24jvkasipu:30625: aruḥprabhrtīnām antasya lopo bhavati cviś ca pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30626: atra sarvaviśeṣaṇasambandhāt pūrveṇa+eva pratyayaḥ siddhaḥ, lopamātrārtha ārambhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30647: abhūtatadbhāve kṛbhvastiyoge sampadyakartari iti sarvam anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:30648: asmin viṣaye vibhāṣa sātiḥ prayayo bhavati kārtsnye gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:30649: yadi prakrtiḥ kṛtsnāṃ vikārātmatāmāpadyate ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30652: kārtsnye iti kim ? ekadeśena paṭaḥ śuklībhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30658: abhividhau gamyamāne cviviṣaye sātiḥ pratyayo bhavati sampadā yoge,
GS24jvkasipu:30661: sa tu kṛbhvastibhir eva yoge bhavati, na sampadā /
GS24jvkasipu:30666: athābhividheḥ kārtsnyasya ca ko viśeṣaḥ ? yatra+ekadeśena api sarvā prakṛtir vikāram āpadyate so 'bhividhiḥ, yathā+asyāṃ senāyām utpātena sarvaṃ śastram agnisātsampadyate, varṣāsu sarvaṃ lavaṇamudakasātsampadyate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:30668: kārtsnyaṃ tu sarvātmanā dravyasya vikārarūpāpattau bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:30675: svāmiviśeṣavācinaḥ prātipadikāt īśitavye 'bhidheye sātiḥ pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:30690: tadadhīne deye trā pratyayo bhavati, cakārāt sātiś ca kṛbhvastibhiḥ sampadā ca yoge /
GS24jvkasipu:30691: brāhmanebhyo deyam iti yad vijñātam, tad yadā teṣā samarpaṇena tadadhīnaṃ kriyate tadātrā pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30697: deye iti kim ? rājasād bhavati rāṣṭram //
GS24jvkasipu:30701: devādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ dvitīyāsaptamyantebhyaḥ trā pratyayo bhavati bahulam /
GS24jvkasipu:30712: bahulavacanād anyatra api bhavati, bahutrā jīvato manaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:30715: yatra dhvanāvakārādayo varṇā viśeṣarūpeṇa na vyajyante so 'vhyaktaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30719: yasya apakarṣe kriyamāṇe suṣṭhu nyūnamardhaṃ dvyackaṃ sampadyate, tasmād avyaktānukaraṇād anitiparāḍ ḍāc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30721: yasya ca dvirvacane kṛte dvyajavarārdhaṃ tataḥ pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30722: ḍāci bahulaṃ dve bhavataḥ iti viṣayasaptamī /
GS24jvkasipu:30723: ḍāci vivakṣite dvirvacanam eva pūrvaṃ kriyate, paścāt pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30736: paṭapaṭāsi, atra svarito vā 'nudātte padādau (*8,2.6) iti svarito na
GS24jvkasipu:30738: kecid dvyajavarārdhyād iti yakāraṃ paṭhanti, sa svarthiko vijñeyaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:30741: dvitīya-tṛtīyādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ kṛṣāvabhidheyāyāṃ ḍāc pratyayo bhavati kṛño yoge, na anyatra
GS24jvkasipu:30744: dvitīyaṃ karṣaṇaṃ vilekhanaṃ karoti ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30747: anulomakṛṣṭaṃ kṣetraṃ punaḥ pratilomaṃ kṛṣati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30749: saha bījena vilehanaṃ karoti ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30750: kṛṣau iti kim ? kvitīyaṃ karoti padam //
GS24jvkasipu:30753: kṛñaḥ iti anuvartate, kṛṣau iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:30754: saṅkhyāvācinaḥ śabdasya gunaśabdo 'nte samīpe yatra sambhavati sā saṅkhyā guṇāntā ity ucyate
GS24jvkasipu:30755: tādṛśāt prātipadikāt kṛṣāvabhidheyāyāṃ ḍāc pratyayo bhavati kṛño yoge /
GS24jvkasipu:30756: dviguṇaṃ vilekhanaṃ karoti kṣetrasya dviguṇākaroti kṣetram /
GS24jvkasipu:30758: kṛṣau iti kim ? kviguṇāṃ karoti rajjum //
GS24jvkasipu:30764: samayaśabdād yāpanāyāṃ gamyamānāyāṃ ḍāc pratyayo bhavati kṛño yoge /
GS24jvkasipu:30766: samayaṃ yāpayati, kālakṣepaṃ karoti ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30771: sapatra-niṣpatra-śabdābhyām ativyathane ḍāc pratyayo bhavati kṛño yoge
GS24jvkasipu:30775: sapatraṃ śaramasya śarīre praveśayati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30778: ativyathane iti kim ? saptraṃ vṛkṣaṃ karoti jalasecakaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30783: niṣkulaśabdāt niṣkoṣane vartamānāt kṛño yoge ḍāc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30787: niṣkoṣaṇe iti kim ? niṣkulān karoti śatrūn //
GS24jvkasipu:30790: sukha-priya-śabdābhyām ānulomye vartamānābhyāṃ kṛño yoge ḍāc pratyayo
GS24jvkasipu:30796: sukhaṃ priyaṃ vā kurvann apy ānulomye 'vasthita evam ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:30797: ānulomye iti kim ? sukhaṃ karoti, priyaṃ karoti auṣadhapānam //
GS24jvkasipu:30801: duḥkhaśabdāt prātipadikāt prātilomye gamyamāne ḍāc pratyayo bhavati kṛño yoge /
GS24jvkasipu:30805: prātilomye iti kim ? duḥkhaṃ karoti kadannam //
GS24jvkasipu:30809: śūlaśabdāt pākaviṣaye ḍāc pratyayo bhavti kṛño yoge /
GS24jvkasipu:30811: pāke iti kim ? śūlaṃ karoti kṛdannam //
GS24jvkasipu:30815: satyaśabdāt aśapathe ḍāc pratyayo bhavati kṛño yoge /
GS24jvkasipu:30817: kvacit tu śapathe ca vartate, satyena śāpayed dvijam iti, tasya ayaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30820: aśapathe iti kim ? satyaṃ karoti brāhmaṇaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:30824: madraśabdāt parivāpaṇe ḍāc pratyayo bhavati kṛño yoge /
GS24jvkasipu:30834: āpādaparisamāpteḥ ye pratyayāḥ vihitās te samāsāntāvayavā ekadeśāḥ
GS24jvkasipu:30839: na avyayībhāvāt ity eṣa vidhir bhavati, anaś ca (*5,4.108) iti ṭac /
GS24jvkasipu:30849: tatpuruṣe tulyārtha ity eṣa svaro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30852: bahuvrīhau prakṛtyā pūrvapadam (*6,2.1) ity etad bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:30855: yān śabdān upādāya samāsāntā vidhīyante rāja-ahaḥ-sakhibhyaṣ ṭac (*5,4.91)
GS24jvkasipu:30856: ity evam ādīn, yadā te pūjanāt pūjanavacanāt pare bhavanti tadā samāsānto na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30862: iha mā bhūt, paramarājaḥ, paramagavaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:30864: bahuvrīhau sakthyakṣṇoḥ ity evam ādau pratiṣedho na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30871: kṣepe yaḥ kiṃśabdaḥ tataḥ parasya samāsānto na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30876: kṣepe iti kim ? kasya rājā kiṃrājaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30881: nañaḥ pare vakṣyamāṇā ye rājādayas tadantāt tatpuruṣāt samāsānto na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30888: nañaḥ paro yaḥ pathinśabdaḥ, tadantāt tatpuruṣāt samāsānto vibhāṣā na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30893: saṅkhyeye yo bahuvrīhir vartate tasmād abahu-gaṇa-antāt ḍac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30894: saṅkhyayāvyayāsanna iti yo bahuvrīhiḥ tasya+idaṃ grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:30917: ṛk pur ap dhur pathin ity evam antānāṃ samāsānām akāraḥ pratyayo bhavati samāsānto 'kṣe na
GS24jvkasipu:30918: sāmarthyād dhura etad viśeṣaṇam, ṛgādīnāṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30919: akṣesambandhinī yā dhūḥ tadantasya na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30932: anṛco anakṣe iti kim ? akṣasya dhūḥ akṣadhūḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30937: anṛkkaṃ sāma, bahvṛkkaṃ sūktam ity atra na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:30940: prati anu ava ity evaṃ pūrvāt sāmāntāt lomāntāt ca samāsād ac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30948: godāvaryāś ca nadyāś ca saṅkhyāyā uttare yadi //
GS24jvkasipu:30955: bhūmer api saṅkhyāpūrvāyāḥ ac pratyaya iṣyate - dvibhūmaḥ prāsādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30957: daśabhūmakaṃ sutram anyatra api ca dṛśyate - padmanābhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30962: tad etat sarvam iha yogavibhāgaṃ kṛtvā sādhayanti //
GS24jvkasipu:30966: darśanād anyatra yo 'kṣiśabdaḥ tadantāt ac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30971: kathaṃ kabarākṣam, gavākṣam iti ? aśvādīnāṃ mukhapracchādanārthaṃ bahucchidraṃ kabarākṣam, tena api hi dṛśyate, gavākṣeṇa ca ? na+eṣa doṣaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:30976: samāse vyavasthā api nipātanād eva pratipattavyā /
GS24jvkasipu:30978: adṛśyāni avidyamānāni vā catvāri yasya so 'caturaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30983: iha na bhavati, striyāḥ pumān iti /
GS24jvkasipu:30998: nanu ca paryāyāvetau, katham anayor dvandvaḥ ? vīpsāyāṃ dvandvo nipātyate
GS24jvkasipu:31001: bahuvrīhau na bhavati, saha rajasā sarajaḥ paṅkajam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:31003: niḥśreyaskaḥ puruṣaḥ ity atra na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31005: dvandve na bhavati, puruṣaśca āyuśca puruṣāyuṣī /
GS24jvkasipu:31006: tato dvigū - dve āyuṣī samāhṛte dvyāyuṣam /
GS24jvkasipu:31008: iha na bhavati, dvyor āyuḥ dvyāyuḥ tryāyuḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:31009: tato dvandvaḥ - ṛk ca yajuś ca ṛgyajuṣam /
GS24jvkasipu:31010: iha na bhavati, ṛgyajurasya unmugdhasya ṛgyajurunmugdhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31024: brahmahastibhyāṃ paro yo varcaḥśabdas tadantāt samāsād ac pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:31032: ava sam andha ity etebhyo yaḥ paraḥ tamasśabdaḥ tadantāt samāsāt ac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31038: śvasaḥ parau yau vasīyas-śreyas-śabdau tadantāt samāsāt ac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31042: svabhāvāc ca+iha śvaḥśabdaḥ uttarapadārthasya praśaṃsāmāśīr viṣayām
GS24jvkasipu:31044: śobhanaṃ śreyas te bhūyāt ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31048: anu ava tapta ity etebhyaḥ paro yo rahasśabdaḥ tadantāt samāsād ac pratyayaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31054: prateḥ paro ya urasśabdaḥ tadantāt samāsāt ac pratyayo bhavati, sa ced urasśabdaḥ saptamīstho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31059: saptamīsthāt iti kim ? pratigatam uraḥ pratyuraḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:31068: dvistāvā tristāvā iti vediś ced abhidheyā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31070: yāvatī prakṛtau vediḥ tato dviguṇā vā triguṇā vā kasyāṃcid vikṛtau
GS24jvkasipu:31074: vediḥ iti kim ? dvistāvatī, tristāvatī rajjuḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:31077: upasargāt paro yo 'dhvanśabdaḥ tadantāt samāsāt ac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31086: aṅguliśabdāntasya tatpuruṣasya saṅkhyādeḥ avyayādeś ca ac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31090: pramāṇe lo dvigor nityam (*6,2.12) iti mātraco lopaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31098: aharādibhyaḥ paro yo rātriśabdaḥ tadantasya tatpuruṣasya ac pratyayo bhavati, cakārāt saṅkhyādeḥ avyayādeś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:31108: saṅkhyāvyāyadeḥ khalv api - dve rātrī samāhṛte dvirātraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31114: rāja-ahaḥ-sakhibhyaṣ ṭac (*5,4.91) iti vakṣyati, tasmin parabhūte ahan ity etasya ahnaḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati etebhya uttarasya /
GS24jvkasipu:31130: saṅkhyādes tatpuruṣasya samāhāre vartamānasya ahaḥśabdasya ahnādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31134: samāhāre iti kim ? dvayor ahnoḥ bhavaḥ dvyahnaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31136: taddhitārtha iti samāse kṛte aṇaḥ āgatasya dvigor lug anapatye (*4,1.88)
GS24jvkasipu:31140: uttamaikābhyāṃ ca parasya ahnaḥ ity ayam ādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31142: puṇyagrahaṇam eva na kṛtam vaicitryārtham puṇyāhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31144: kecit tu upottamasya api pratipattyarthaṃ varṇayanti /
GS24jvkasipu:31145: tena saṅkhyātaśabdād api parasya na bhavati, saṅkhyātāhaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:31148: rājan ahan sakhi ity evam antāt prātipadikāt ṭac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31155: iha kasmān na bhavati, madrāṇām rājñī madrarājñī ? liṅgaviśiṣṭaparibhāṣayā prāpnoti ? laghvakṣarasya pūrvanipāte prāpte rājaśabdasya savarṇadīrghārthaṃ prathamaṃ prayogaṃ kurvann etad jñāpayati yasya akāreṇa
GS24jvkasipu:31159: gośabdāntāt tatpuruṣāt ṭac pratyayo bhavati, sa cet tapuruṣas
GS24jvkasipu:31165: ataddhitaluki iti kim ? pañcabhir gobhiḥ krītaḥ paṇcaguḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31167: tena krītam (*5,1.37) ity āgatasya ārhīyasya ṭhako 'dhyardhapūrvād dvigoḥ iti luk /
GS24jvkasipu:31168: taddhitagrahaṇaṃ kim ? subluki pratiṣedho mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:31170: luggrahaṇaṃ kim ? taddhita eva mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:31175: urasśabdāntāt tatpuruṣāṭ ṭac pratyayo bhavati, sa ced urasśabdaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:31178: yathā śarīrāvayavānām ucyate uraḥ pradhānam, evam anyo 'pi pradhānabhūta
GS24jvkasipu:31183: agrākhyāyām iti kim ? devadattasya uraḥ devadattoraḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:31186: anas aśman ayas saras ity evam antāt tatpurusāt ṭac pratyayo bhavati jātau sañjñāyān ca viṣaye
GS24jvkasipu:31201: grāmakauṭābhyāṃ paro yaḥ takṣanśabdaḥ tadantāt tatpuruṣāt ṭac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31204: kuṭyāṃ bhavaḥ kauṭaḥ, tasya takṣā kauṭatakṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31205: svatantraḥ karmajīvī, na kasya cit pratibaddhaḥ ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31209: atiśabdāt paraḥ yaḥ śvanśabdaḥ tadantāt tatpuruṣāt ṭac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31218: upamānavācī yaḥ śvanśabdo 'prāṇiṣu vartate tadantāt tatpuruṣāt ṭac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31222: upamānāt iti kim ? na śvā aśvā loṣṭaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31223: aprāṇiṣu iti kim ? vānaraḥ śveva vānaraśvā //
GS24jvkasipu:31226: uttara mṛga pūrva ity etebhyaḥ paro yaḥ sakthiśabdaḥ, cakārād upamānaṃ ca,
GS24jvkasipu:31227: tadantāt tatpuruṣāṭ ṭac pratyayo bhavati samāsāntaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31231: upamānāt khalv api - phalakam iva sakthi phalakasaktham //
GS24jvkasipu:31234: nauśabdāntāt dvigoḥ ṭac pratyayo bhavati samāsāntaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31242: ataddhitaluki ity eva, pañcabhir naubhiḥ krītaḥ pañcanauḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31246: ardhaśabdāt paro yo nauśabdaḥ tadantāt tatpuruṣāṭ ṭac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31252: dvigoḥ, ardhac ca iti dvayam apy anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:31253: khārīśabdāntāt dvigor ardhāc ca paro yaḥ khārīśabdaḥ tadantāt tatpuruṣāṭ ṭac pratyayo bhavati prācām ācāryāṇāṃ matena /
GS24jvkasipu:31259: dvitribhyāṃ paro yo 'ñjaliśabdaḥ tadantāt tatpuruṣāt ṭac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31262: dvigoḥ ity eva, dvyor añjaliḥ dvyañjaliḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31263: ataddhitaluki ity eva, dvābhyām añjalibhyāṃ krītaḥ dvyañjaliḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31268: annantāt asantāt ca napuṃsakaliṅgāt tatpuruṣāt ṭac pratyayo bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:31274: napuṃsakāt iti kim ? sutrāmāṇaṃ pṛthivīṃ dyāmanehasam /
GS24jvkasipu:31280: brahmanśabdānatāt tatpuruṣāṭ ṭac pratyayo bhavati samāsena ced brahmaṇo jānapadatvam ākhyāyate
GS24jvkasipu:31282: yasya tatpruṣasya janapadaśabdaḥ pūrvapadaṃ tasmād etat pratyayavidhānam /
GS24jvkasipu:31289: kumahadbhyāṃ paro yo brahmā tadantāt tatpuruṣāṭ ṭac pratyayo bhavaty anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:31296: dvandvāt cavargāntāt, dakārāntāt, ṣakārāntāt, hakārāntāt ca ṭac pratyayo
GS24jvkasipu:31297: bhavati, sa ced dvandvaḥ samāhāre vartate, na+itaretarayoge /
GS24jvkasipu:31308: dvandvāt iti kim ? tatpuruṣān mā bhūt, pañca vācaḥ samāhṛtāḥ pañcavāk /
GS24jvkasipu:31313: śarat ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ ṭac pratyayo bhavati avyayībhāve
GS24jvkasipu:31318: ye 'tra jñayantaḥ paṭhyante teṣāṃ nityārthaṃ grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:31347: annantād avyayībhāvāt ṭac pratyayo bhavati samāsāntaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31356: annantaṃ yad napuṃsakaṃ tadantād avyayībhāvāt anyatarasyāṃ ṭac pratyayo bhavati samāsāntaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:31362: nadī paurṇamāsī āgrahāyaṇī ity evam antād avyayībhāvāt anyatarasyāṃ ṭac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31369: jñayantād avyayībhāvād anyatarasyām ṭac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31374: giriśabdāntāt avyayībhāvāṭ ṭac pratyayo bhavati senakasya ācāryasya matena /
GS24jvkasipu:31381: svāṅgavācī yaḥ sakthiśabdaḥ akṣiśabdaś ca tadantāt bahuvrīheḥ ṣac pratyayo bhavati samāsāntaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:31392: svāṅgāt iti kim ? dīrghaskthi śakaṭam sthulākṣiḥ ikṣuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31398: tatra yasmin pakṣe na asty udāttatvaṃ tatra ṅīpi sati udāttanivṛttisvarasya abhāvād anudāttaḥ śrūyeta /
GS24jvkasipu:31403: aṅguliśabdāntād bahuvrīheḥ ṣac pratyayo bhavati samāsāntaḥ dāruṇi samāsārthe /
GS24jvkasipu:31408: yasya tu dve aṅgulī pramāṇam dāruṇaḥ tatra taddhitārtha iti samāse iṛte tatpruṣasya aṅguleḥ ity acā bhavitavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:31412: dvitribhyāṃ paro yo mūrdhanśabdaḥ tadantād bahuvrīheḥ ṣapratyayaḥ bhavati samāsāntaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31420: pūraṇyanatāt pramāṇyantāt ca bhuvrīheḥ ap pratyayo bhavati samāsāntaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31421: kalyāṇī pañcamī āsāṃ rātrīṇāṃ tāḥ kalyāṇīpañcamā rātrayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31426: yatra anyapadārthe pūraṇī anupraviśati na kevalaṃ vartipadārtha eva, tatra pūraṇyāḥ prādhānyam
GS24jvkasipu:31428: iha na bhavati, kalyāṇī pañcamī asmin pakṣe kalyāṇapañcamīkaḥ pakṣaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:31430: mṛgo netā āsāṃ rātrīṇām mṛganetrā rātrayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31442: antar bahis ity etābhyāṃ paro yo lomanśabdaḥ tadantād bahuvrīheḥ ap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31445: añ nāsikāyāḥ sañjñāyāṃ nasaṃ ca asthūlāt || PS_5,4.118 ||
GS24jvkasipu:31447: nāsikāntāt bahuvrīheḥ ac pratyayo bhavati, nāsikāśabdaś ca na samādeśam āpadyate /
GS24jvkasipu:31448: asthūlāt iti nāsikāviśeṣaṇaṃ, na cet sthūlaśabdāt parā nāsikā bhavati iti
GS24jvkasipu:31462: śitināḥ, ahināḥ, arcanāḥ iti nigama iṣyate //
GS24jvkasipu:31465: upasargāt paro yo nāsikāśabdaḥ tadantāt bahuvrīheḥ ac pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:31476: anyad api ca ṭilopādikaṃ nipātanād eva siddham /
GS24jvkasipu:31487: nañ dus su ity etebhyaḥ parau yau hali-sakthi-śabdau tadantad bahuvrīher anyatarasyām ac pratyayo bhavati samāsāntaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31496: virūpā śaktiḥ asya duḥśaktaḥ, duḥśaktaḥ, duḥśaktiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31501: nañ dus su ity etebhyaḥ parau yau prajā-medhā-śabdau tadantād bahuvrīheḥ nityam asic pratyayo bhavati samāsāntaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31508: nityagrahaṇaṃ kim, yāvatā pūrvasūtre 'nyatarasyām grahaṇaṃ na+eva svaryate
GS24jvkasipu:31509: ? evaṃ tarhi nityagrahaṇād anyatra api bhavati iti sūcyate /
GS24jvkasipu:31519: kevalād yo dharmaśabdaḥ tadantād bahuvrīheḥ anic pratyayo bhavati samāsantaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31522: kevalāt iti im ? paramaḥ svo dharmaḥ asya paramasvadharmaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31523: yady evaṃ tripade bahuvrīhau prāpnoti, paramaḥ svo dharmaḥ asya iti ? evaṃ tarhi kevalāt iti pūrvapadaṃ nirdiśyate, kevalāt padād yo dharmaśabdo na padasamudāyāt, tadantād bhauvrīheḥ pratyayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:31526: bahuvrīhau samāse svādibhyaḥ paraṃ jambhā iti kṛtasamāsāntam uttarapadaṃ nipātyate jambhaśabdaḥ abhyavahāryavacī dantaviśeṣavācī ca /
GS24jvkasipu:31532: dantavacane - tṛṇam iva jambhaḥ asya, soma iva jambhaḥ asya iti vigrahītavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:31536: dakṣiṇermā iti kṛtasmāsāntaḥ nipātyate bahuvrīhau samāse lubdhayoge /
GS24jvkasipu:31539: dakṣiṇam aṅgaṃ vraṇitam asya vyādhena ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31543: karmavyatihāre yo bahuvrīhiḥ tasmād ic pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31544: tatra tena+idam iti sarūpe (*2,2.27) ity ayaṃ bahuvrīhir gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:31545: keśesu keśesu gṛhītvā idaṃ yuddhaṃ pravṛttaṃ keśākeśi /
GS24jvkasipu:31547: mṛsalaiś ca musalaiś ca prahṛtya idaṃ yuddhaṃ pravṛttaṃ musalāmusali /
GS24jvkasipu:31552: dvidaṇḍyādayaḥ śabdāḥ ic pratyayāntāḥ sādhavo bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:31553: dvidaṇḍyādibhyaḥ iti tādarthye eṣā caturthī, na pañcamī /
GS24jvkasipu:31554: dvidaṇḍyādyartham ic pratyayo bhavati tathā bhavati yathā dvidaṇḍyādayaḥ siddyanti ity arthaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:31558: iha na bhavati, dvidaṇḍā śālā iti /
GS24jvkasipu:31561: prohya pādau hastinaṃ vāhayati prodyapādi hastinaṃ vāhayati /
GS24jvkasipu:31587: pra sam ity etābhyām uttarasya jānuśabdasya jñurādeśo bhavati samāsānto bahuvrīhau /
GS24jvkasipu:31592: ūrdhvaśabdād uttarasya jānuśabdasya vibhāṣā jñuḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31596: ūdhasśabdāntasya bahuvrīheḥ anaṅ ādeśo bhavati samāsāntaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31597: kuṇḍam iva ūdhaḥ asyāḥ sā kuṇdodhnī /
GS24jvkasipu:31611: dhanuḥśabdāntād bahuvrīher anḍādeśo vā bhavati sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:31622: ut pūti su surabhi ity etebhyaḥ parasya gandhaśabdasya ikārādeśo bhavati samāsānto bahuvrīhau samāse /
GS24jvkasipu:31630: tena śobhanaḥ gandhaḥ asya sugandhaḥ āpaṇikaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:31633: alpākhyāyāṃ yogandhaśabdaḥ tasya ikārādeśo bhavati samāsānto bahuvrīhau samāse /
GS24jvkasipu:31640: upamānāt paro yo gandhaśabdaḥ tasya ikārādeśo bhavati samāsānto bahuvrīhau samāse /
GS24jvkasipu:31647: upamānāt ihastyādivarjitāt parasya pādaśabdasya lopo bhavati samāsānto bahuvrīhau samāse /
GS24jvkasipu:31665: pādasya lopo bhavati kumbhapadyādiviṣaye yathā kumbhapadyādayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31667: samudāyapāṭhasya ca prayojanaṃ viṣayaniyamaḥ - striyām eva, tatra ṅīppratyaye eva, na anyadā
GS24jvkasipu:31670: yac ca iha upamānapūrvaṃ saṅkhyāpūrvaṃ ca paṭhyate, tasya siddhe lope
GS24jvkasipu:31699: saṅkhyāpūrvasya supūrvasya ca bahuvrīheḥ pādaśabdāntasya lopo bhavati samāsāntaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31705: saṅkhyāpūrvasya supūrvasya ca bahuvrīheryo dantaśabdaḥ, tasya datṛ ity
GS24jvkasipu:31706: ayam ādeśo bhavati samāsāntaḥ vayasi gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:31711: śobhanā dantāḥ asya samastāḥ jātāḥ sudan kumāraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31716: chandasi ca dantaśadasya datṛ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati samāsāntaḥ bahuvrīhau samāse /
GS24jvkasipu:31721: striyām anyapadārthe sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye dantaśabdasya datṛ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31728: śyāva aroka ity etābhyāṃ parasya dantaśabdasya datṛ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati vibhāṣā samāsānto bahuvrīhau /
GS24jvkasipu:31737: agrāntāt śabdāt śuddha śubhra vṛṣa varāha ity etebhyaś ca parasya dantaśabdasya vibhāṣā datṛ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati samāsānto bahuvrīhau samāse /
GS24jvkasipu:31750: kakudaśabdāntasya bahuvrīher lopo bhavati samāsāntaḥ avasthāyāṃ gamyamānāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:31751: kālādikṛtā vastudharmā vayaḥprabhṛtayaḥ avasthā ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:31765: trikakudi bahuvrīhau kakudaśabdasya lopaḥ samāsānto nipātyate parvate
GS24jvkasipu:31768: kakudākāraṃ parvatasya śṛṅgaṃ kakudam ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:31774: ut vi ity etābhyāṃ parasya kākudaśabdasya lopo bhavati bahuvrīhau samāse /
GS24jvkasipu:31780: pūrṇāt parasya kākudaśabdasya vibhāṣā lopo bhavati bahuvrīhau samāse /
GS24jvkasipu:31784: suhṛt durhṛt iti nipātyate yathāsaṅkhyaṃ mitra-amitrayor abhidheyayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31785: suśabdāt parasya hṛdayaśabdasya hṛdbhāvo nipātyate bahuvrīhau, tathā duḥśabdāt parasya /
GS24jvkasipu:31796: pumān anaḍvān payaḥ nauḥ lakṣmīḥ iti vibhaktyantāḥ paṭhyante, na prātipadikāni /
GS24jvkasipu:31797: tatra+idaṃ prayojanam - ekavacanāntānām eva grahaṇam iha vijñāyeta,
GS24jvkasipu:31799: tatra śeṣad vibhāṣā (*5,4.154) iti vikalpa eva bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:31816: innantād bahuvrīheḥ kap pratyayo bhavati striyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:31817: bahavo daṇdinaḥ asyāṃ śālāyāṃ bahudaṇdikā śālā /
GS24jvkasipu:31821: striyām iti kim ? bahudaṇḍī rājā, bahudaṇḍikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31825: nadyantāt bahuvrīheḥ ṛkārāntāt ca kap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31826: bahvyaḥ kumārya asmin deśe bahukumārīkaḥ deśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31832: yasmād bahuvrīheḥ samāsānto na vihitaḥ sa śeṣaḥ tasmād vibhāṣā kap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31842: katham anṛkkaṃ sāma, bahvṛkkaṃ sūktam iti, yāvatā vihito 'tra sāmānyena samāsāntaḥ ṛṣpūḥ iti
GS24jvkasipu:31844: viśeṣe sa iṣyate, anṛco māṇadako jñeyo bahvṛcaś caraṇākhyāyām iti /
GS24jvkasipu:31849: sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye bahuvrīhau samāse kap pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31855: īyasantād bahuvrīheḥ kap pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31861: hrasvatvam api na bhavati, īyaso bahuvrīhau puṃvat iti vacanāt //
GS24jvkasipu:31864: vandite 'rthe yo bhrātṛśabdo vartate tadantād bahuvrīheḥ kap pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31871: ṛvarnāntād bahuvrīheḥ chandasi viṣaye kap pratyayo na bhavti /
GS24jvkasipu:31878: svāṅge yau nāḍīt-antrī-śabdau tadantād bahuvrīheḥ kap pratyayo na bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:31886: niṣpravāṇiḥ iti nadīlakṣaṇasya kapaḥ pratiṣedho nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:31894: iti śrīvāmanaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau pañcamādhyāyasya caturthaḥ padaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:31899: ekācaḥ iti ca, dve iti ca, prathamasya iti ca tritayam adhikṛtaṃ veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:31900: ita uttaraṃ yad vakṣyāmaḥ prāk saṃprasāraṇavidhānāt tatra ekācaḥ prathamasya dve bhavataḥ ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:31902: tatra dhātor avayavayasya anabhyāsasya prathamasya+ekāco dve bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31908: eko 'c yasya so 'yam ekāc ity avayavena vigrahaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31910: abhyantaraś ca samudāye 'vayavo bhavati iti sāckasya+eva dvirvacanaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31911: evaṃ ca pac ity atra yena+eva acā samudāyaḥ ekāc, tenaa+eva tadavayavo
GS24jvkasipu:31913: tatra pṛthag avayavaikāc na dvir ucyate, kiṃ tarhi, samudāyaikāj eva /
GS24jvkasipu:31916: iyāya, āra ity atra ekāctvam api vyapadeśibhāvād eva /
GS24jvkasipu:31919: tena sa eva śabdo dvir ucāryate, na ca śabdāntaraṃ tasya sthāne vidhīyate
GS24jvkasipu:31924: ac ādir yasya dhātoḥ tadavayavasya dvitīyasya ekāco dve bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31928: arteḥ smi-pūṅ-r-añjv-aśāṃ sani (*7,2.74) iti iṭ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:31929: tasmin kṛte guṇe ca raparatve ca dvirvacane 'ci (*1,2.59) iti sthānivadbhāvaḥ prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:31934: tathā hi - kṅinimittayor guṇavṛddhyoḥ pratiṣedho vidhīyamānaḥ śayitā ity
GS24jvkasipu:31935: atra na bhavati, na hi kāryiṇaḥ śīṅo guṇaṃ prati nimittabhāvaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:31936: atra kecid ajādeḥ iti karmadhārayāt pañcamīm icchanti /
GS24jvkasipu:31937: ac ca asau ādiś ca ity ajādiḥ, tasmāt ajāder uttarasya ekāco dve bhavataḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:31945: nakāradakārarephā dvitīyaikāco 'vayavabhūtāḥ saṃyogādayo na dvir udyante /
GS24jvkasipu:31953: kecid ajādeḥ ity api pañcamyantaṃ karmadhārayam anuvartayanti /
GS24jvkasipu:31955: ajāder anantaratvābhāvād dakāro dvir ucyata eva, nakāro na dvir ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:31960: yadā bakaropadha ubjir upadiśyate tadā ayaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31963: yakāraparasya rephasya pratiṣedho na bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:31966: tatra yaṅi ca (*7,4.30) iti guṇaḥ, tato dvirvacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:31967: īrṣyates tṛtīyasya dve bhavata iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:31968: kasya tṛtīyasya ? kecid āhur vyañjanasya iti /
GS24jvkasipu:31970: apare punaḥ tṛtīyasya ekācaḥ iti vyācakṣate /
GS24jvkasipu:31972: kaṇḍvādīnāṃ tṛtīyasya+eakāco dve bhavata iti vaktvyam /
GS24jvkasipu:31975: vā nāmadhātūnāṃ tṛtīyasya+ekāc dve bhavata iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:31978: apara āha - yathā+iṣṭaṃ nāmadhātuṣv iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:31986: dve iti prathamantaṃ yad anuvartate tad arthād iha ṣaṣṭhyantaṃ jāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:31987: tatra pratyāsatter asmin prakaraṇe ye dve vihite tayor yaḥ pūrvo 'vayavaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:31994: abhyāsapradeśās tu atra lopo 'bhyāsasya (*7,4.58) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:31998: ye eve vihite te ubhe api samudite abhyastasañjñe bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32002: ubhegrahaṇaṃ kim ? nenijati ity atra abhyastānām ādiḥ iti samudāye udāttatvaṃ yathā syāt, pratyekaṃ paryāyeṇa vā mā bhūt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:32003: abhyastapradeśāḥ - abhyastānām ādiḥ (*6,1.189) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:32007: jakṣa ity ayaṃ dhātuḥ ity ādayaś ca anye ṣaṭ dhātavaḥ abhyastasañjñā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:32009: jakṣa bhakṣahasanyoḥ ity ataḥ prabhṛti vevīṅ vetinā tulye iti yāvat /
GS24jvkasipu:32015: dīdhyate, vevyate ity atra abhyastānām ādiḥ ity eṣa svaraḥ prayojanam /
GS24jvkasipu:32016: dīdhyat iti ca śatari vyatyayena sampādite na abhyastāc chatuḥ (*7,1.78)
GS24jvkasipu:32021: kaś ca prakāraḥ ? tujer dīrgho 'bhyāsasya na vihitaḥ, dṛśyate ca /
GS24jvkasipu:32022: ye tathābhūtāḥ te tujādayaḥ, teṣām abhyāsasya dīrghaḥ sādhur bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32028: sa tūtāva dīrghaś ca+eṣāṃ chandasi pratyayaviśeṣe eva dṛśyate, tato
GS24jvkasipu:32033: liṭi parato 'nabhyāsasya dhātor avayavasya prathamasya+ekāco dvitīyasya vā yathāyogaṃ dve bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32037: vācya ūrṇorṇuvadbhāvaḥ iti vacanād ūrṇoteḥ ijādeḥ iti ām na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32040: dhātoḥ iti kim ? sasṛvāṃso viśṛṇvire ima indrāya sunvire anabhyāsasya iti kim ? kṛṣṇo nonāva vṛṣabho yadīdam nonūyaternonāva /
GS24jvkasipu:32050: sanantasya yaṅantasya ca anabhyāsasya dhātor avayavasya prathamasya+ekāco
GS24jvkasipu:32065: ślau parataḥ anabhyāsasya dhātor avayavasya prathamasya+ekāco dvitiyasya vā yathāyogaṃ dve bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32071: caṅi parato 'nabhyāsasya dhātor avayavasya prathamasya ekāco dvitīyasya vā
GS24jvkasipu:32078: pacādīnāṃ ṇyanatānām caṅi kṛte ṇilopaḥ, upadhāhrasvatvaṃ, dvirvacanam ity eṣāṃ kāryāṇāṃ pravṛttikramaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32079: tathā ca sanvallaghuni caṅpare iti sanvadbhāvo vidhīyamāno hrasvasya sthānivadbhāvān na pratiṣidhyate
GS24jvkasipu:32080: yo hy anādiṣṭād acaḥ pūrvaḥ tasya vidhiṃ prati sthānivadbhāvo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32081: na ca asmin kāryāṇāṃ krameṇāniṣṭād acaḥ pūrvo 'bhyāso bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:32082: āṭiṭat iti dvirvacane 'ci (*1,1.59) iti sthānivadbhāvāt dvitīyasya+ekācaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:32086: dāśvān sāhvān mīḍvān ity ete śadāḥ chandasi bhāṣāyām ca aviśeṣeṇa nipāyane /
GS24jvkasipu:32087: dāśvān iti dāśṛ dāne ity etasya dhātoḥ kvasau advirvacanam aniṭtvaṃ ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:32089: sāhvān iti ṣaha marṣaṇe ity etasya parasmaipadam, upadhādīrghatvam,
GS24jvkasipu:32092: mīḍvān iti miha secane ity etasya advirvacanam, aniṭtvam, upadhādīrghatvaṃ ḍhatvaṃ ca nipātanāt
GS24jvkasipu:32095: kṛñādīnāṃ ke dve bhavata iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:32098: kṛñaḥ klideś ca ghañarthe kavidhānam iti kaḥ pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32100: carādīnāṃ dhātūnām api pratyaye parataḥ dve bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32103: halādiśeṣe hi sayāgamasya ādeśasya ca viśeṣo na asti /
GS24jvkasipu:32109: tena caraḥ puruṣaḥ, calo rathaḥ , pataṃ yānam, vado manuṣyaḥ ity evam ādi siddhaṃ bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:32111: hanter aci pratyaye parato dve bhavataḥ, abhyāsasya ca hakārasya ca
GS24jvkasipu:32113: parasya abhyāsāc ca (*7,3.55) iti kutvam ghanāghanaḥ kṣobhaṇaścarṣaṇīnām /
GS24jvkasipu:32114: pāṭer ṇiluk cok ca dīrghaś ca abhyāsasya /
GS24jvkasipu:32115: pāṭer aci parato dve bhavato ṇiluk ca bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32116: abhyāsasya ca ūgāgamo dīrghaś ca bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32120: putra pati ity etasyor uttarapadayos tatpuruṣe samāse ṣyaṅaḥ saṃprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32121: yaṇaḥ sthāne ig bhavati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32126: karīṣasya+iva gandho 'sya, kumudasya+iva gandho 'sya iti bahuvrīhiḥ, tatra upamānāc ca (*5,4.137) iti gandhasya+idantādeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32127: karīṣagandheḥ apatyam ity aṇ, tadantāt striyām aṇ-iñor annarṣayor gurūpattamayoḥ ṣyaṅ gotre (*4,1.78) iti ṣyaṅ, tataś ca api vihite
GS24jvkasipu:32133: tatpuruṣe iti kim ? kārīṣagandhyā patir asya grāmasya kārīṣagandhyāpatiḥ ayaṃ grāmaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32134: ṣyaṅaḥ iti strīpratyayagrahaṇaṃ na strīpratyaye cānupasarjane iti pratyayagrahaṇaparibhāṣayā yasmāt sa vihitaḥ tadādeḥ ity eṣa niyamo na
GS24jvkasipu:32138: atikrāntā kārīṣagandhyām atikārīṣagandhyā, tasya putraḥ atikārīṣagandhyāputraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32140: putrapatyoḥ kevalayoḥ uttarapadayoḥ idaṃ samprasāraṇaṃ, tadādau tadante ca
GS24jvkasipu:32142: ṣyaṅante ca yady apy anye yaṇaḥ santi, tathāpi ṣyaṅaḥ eva samprasāraṇaṃ,
GS24jvkasipu:32144: samprasāraṇam iti cādhikriyate vibhāṣā pareḥ (*6,1.44) iti yāvat //
GS24jvkasipu:32148: bandhuśabde uttarapade bahuvrīhau samāse ṣyaṅaḥ samprasāraṇam bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32151: bahuvrīhau iti kim ? kārīṣagandhyāyāḥ bandhuḥ kārīṣagandhyābandhuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32154: atikārīṣagandhyābandhuḥ iti ca na bhavati, tathā
GS24jvkasipu:32156: bandhuni iti napuṃsakāliṅganirdeśaḥ śabdarūpāpekṣayā, puṃliṅgābhidheyas tu ayaṃ bandhuśabdaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:32158: ṣyaṅaḥ samprasāraṇaṃ bhavati vibhāṣayā bahuvrīhāv eva /
GS24jvkasipu:32159: kārīṣagandhyā mātā asya ity evaṃ bahuvrīhau kṛte etasmād eva upasaṅkhyānāt pakṣe matṛśabdasya mātajādeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32161: mātṛmātṛkaśabdayoś ca bhedena+upādānāt nadyṛtaś ca (*5,4.153) iti kabapi vikalpyate /
GS24jvkasipu:32168: vaci - vaca paribhāṣaṇe, bruvo vaciḥ (*2,4.53) iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:32170: yajādayaḥ - yaja devapūjāsaṃgatikaranadānesu ity ataḥ prabhṛti āgaṇāntāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32171: teṣāṃ vacisv api yajādīnāṃ kiti pratyaye parataḥ samprasāraṇam bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32194: tena+iha na bhavati, vācyate, vācikaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:32197: graha upādāne, jyā vayohānau, veño vayiḥ (*2,4.41), vyadha tāḍane, vaśa
GS24jvkasipu:32198: kāntau, vyac vyājīkaraṇe, ovraścū chedane, praccha jñīpsāyām, bhrasja pāke ity eteṣāṃ dhātūnāṃ ṅīti pratyaye parataḥ cakārāt kati ca saṃprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32207: halaḥ (*6,4.2) iti samprasāraṇadīrghe kṛte pvādīnāṃ iti hrasvaḥ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:32208: vayi - liṭi parataḥ veño vayiḥ ādeśaḥ, tasya ṅidabhāvāt kidevodāhriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:32211: yady evaṃ vayigrahaṇam anarthakam, yajādiṣu veñ paṭhyate ? na+evaṃ śakyam
GS24jvkasipu:32212: liṭi tasya veñaḥ (*6,1.40) iti pratiṣedho vakṣyate, tatra yathā+eva
GS24jvkasipu:32213: sthānivadbhāvād vyervidhiḥ evaṃ pratiṣedho 'pi prāpnoti ? na+eṣa doṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32214: liṭi vayo yaḥ (*6,1.38) iti yakārasya saṃprasāraṇapratiṣedhād vayervidhau grahaṇaṃ pratiṣedhe cāgrahaṇamanumāsyate ? satyam etat /
GS24jvkasipu:32215: eṣa eva arthaḥ sākṣān nirdeśena vyeḥ spaṣṭīkriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:32228: vyaceḥ kuṭāditvamanasi pratipāditam, tena sarvatra añṇiti pratyaye samprasāraṇaṃ bhavati, udvicitā, udvicitum, udvicitavyam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:32231: atha katham atra kutvaṃ, vraścabhrasja iti hi ṣatvena bhavitavyam ?
GS24jvkasipu:32233: tatra ṣtvaṃ prati natvasya siddhatvād jñalādir niṣṭhā na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32234: kutve tu kartavye tad asiddham eva iti pravartate kutvam /
GS24jvkasipu:32242: naṅi tu praśne ca āsannakāle (*3,2.117) iti nipātanād asaṃprasāraṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:32247: sakārasya jñalāṃ jaś jñaśi (*7,4.53) iti jaśtvena dakāraḥ, stoḥ ścunā ścuḥ
GS24jvkasipu:32251: ubhayeṣāṃ vacyādīnāṃ grahyādīnāṃ ca liṭi parato 'bhyāsasya samprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32273: vṛścateḥ satyasati vā yoge na asti viśeṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32274: yogārambhe tu sati yadi samprasāraṇam akṛtvā halādiśeṣeṇa repho nivartyate, tadā vakārasya samprasāraṇaṃ prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:32275: atha rephasya samprasāraṇaṃ kṛtvā uradatvaṃ raparatvaṃ ca kriyate, tadānī
GS24jvkasipu:32276: - muradatvasya sthānivadbhāvāt na samprasāraṇe samprasāraṇam (*6,1.37) iti pratiṣedho bhavati ity asti viśeṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32281: kiti hi paratvād dhātoḥ samprasāraṇe kṛte punaḥ prasaṅgavijñānād dvirvacanam, ūcatuḥ, ūcuḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:32282: adhikārād eva+ubhayeṣāṃ grahaṇe siddhe punar ubhayeṣām iti vacanaṃ halādiḥ śeṣam api bādhitvā samprasāraṇam eva yathā syāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:32289: dvirvacanāt pūrvam atra saṃprasāraṇam, tatra kṛte laghūpadhaguṇaḥ, tasya ṇau caṅyupadhāyāḥ hrasvatvam, tato dvirvacanam, dīrgho laghoḥ (*7,4.94)
GS24jvkasipu:32294: ṅiti iti kevalam iha anuvartate ity etad durvijñānam //
GS24jvkasipu:32297: ñiṣvapa śaye, syamu, svana, dhvana śabde, vyeñ saṃvaraṇe ity eteṣāṃ dhātūnāṃ yaṅi parataḥ samprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32305: vaśerdhātor yaṅi parataḥ saṃprasāraṇaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32312: cāyṛ pūjāniśāmanayoḥ ity etasya dhātoḥ yagi parataḥ kī ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32318: sphāyī opyāyī vṛddhau ity asay dhātoḥ niṣṭhāyāṃ parataḥ sphī ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32322: sphātībhavati ity etad api ktinnantasya+eva rūpaṃ, na niṣthāntasya /
GS24jvkasipu:32323: niṣṭhāyām ity etad adhīkrīyate liṅyaṅoś ca (*6,1.29) iti prāgetasmāt sūtrāt //
GS24jvkasipu:32326: niṣṭhāyām iti vartate, saṃprasāraṇam iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:32329: dvayor apy etayoḥ dhātvoḥ styārūpamāpannayoḥ sāmānyena grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:32330: styā ity asya prapūrvasya dhātor niṣṭhāyāṃ parataḥ samprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32335: prastyo 'nyatarasyām (*8,2.54) iti tu pakṣe makāraḥ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:32339: prastyaḥ ity eva siddhe pūrvagrahaṇam iha api ythā syāt, prasaṃstītaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:32341: tat kathaṃ prapūrvasya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe bahuvrīhiḥ ? praḥ pūrvo yasya
GS24jvkasipu:32342: dhātūpasargasamudāyasya sa prapūrvaḥ tadavayavasya styaḥ iti vyadhikaraṇe ṣaṣṭhyau /
GS24jvkasipu:32343: tatra prasaṃstītaḥ ity atra api prapūrvasamudāyāvayavaḥ styāśabdo bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:32346: dravamūrtau dravakāṭhinye, sparśe vartamānasya śyaiṅ gatau ity asya dhātor niṣṭhāyāṃ parataḥ samprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32355: guṇamātre tadvati ca asya śītaśabdasya vṛttir draṣṭavyā /
GS24jvkasipu:32360: prater uttarasya śyāyater niṣṭhāyāṃ parataḥ samprasaraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32363: dravamūrtisparśābhyām anyatra api yathā syāt iti sūtrārambhaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:32367: abhi ava ity evaṃ pūrvasya śyāyater niṣthāyāṃ vibhāṣā samprasāraṇam bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32376: pūrvagrahaṇasya ca prayojanam, sambhiśyānaṃ, samavaśyānam ity atra mā bhūt iti kecid vyacakṣate , nakilāyam abhyavapūrvaḥ samudāyaḥ iti yo 'tra
GS24jvkasipu:32377: abhyavapūrvaḥ samudāyastadāśrayo viklapaḥ kasmān na bhavati ? tasmāt atra bhavitavyam eva
GS24jvkasipu:32378: yadi tu na+iṣyate tato yatnānataramāstheyam asmād vihbāṣāvijñānāt /
GS24jvkasipu:32384: śrā pāke ity etasya dhātoḥ ṇyantasya aṇyantasya ca pāke 'bhidheye
GS24jvkasipu:32388: vyavasthitavibhāṣā ca+iyam, tena kṣīrahaviṣor nityaṃ śṛbhāvo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:32389: anyatra na bhavati śrāṇā yavāgūḥ śrapitā yavāgūḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:32390: yadā api bāhye prayojake dvitīyo ṇic utpadyate tadā api niṣyate, śrapitaṃ kṣīraṃ devadattena yajñadattena iti /
GS24jvkasipu:32391: śrātir ayam akarmakaḥ karmakartṛviṣayasya pacer arthe vartate, sa ṇyantaḥ api prākṛtaṃ pacyarthamāhuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32392: tad atra dvayor api śṛtam iti iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:32399: opyāyī vṛddhau ity asya dhātoḥ niṣṭhāyāṃ vibhāṣā pī ity ayam ādeśo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:32404: tena anupasargasya nityaṃ bhavati, sopasargasya tu na+esva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32406: āṅpūrvasyāndhūdhasoḥ bhavaty eva, āpīno 'ndhuḥ, āpīnamūdhaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:32410: pyāyaḥ pī (*6,1.28) ity etat caśabdena anukṛṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:32411: liṭi yaṅi ca parataḥ pyāyaḥ pī ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32413: paratvāt pībhāve kṛte punaḥ prasaṅgavijñānāt dvirvacanam, eranekācaḥ iti yaṇādeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32417: liḍyṅoḥ iti vartate, samprasaraṇam iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:32418: liṭi yaṅi ca śvayater dhātoḥ vibhāṣā samprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32422: tad atra yaṅi samprasāraṇam aprāptaṃ vibhāṣa vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:32423: liṭi tu kiti yajāditvāt nityaṃ prāptaṃ, tatra sarvatravikalpo bhavati ity eṣā ubhayatravibhāṣā
GS24jvkasipu:32424: yadā ca dhātor na bhavati tadā liṭy abhyāsasya+ubhayeṣām (*6,1.17) ity abhyāsasya api na bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:32428: sanpare caṅpare ca ṇau parataḥ śvayater dhātoḥ vibhāṣā samprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32431: samprasāraṇaṃ samprasāraṇāśrayaṃ ca balīyo bhavati iti vacanād antaraṅgam api vṛddhyādikaṃ samprasāraṇena bādhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:32432: kṛte tu saṃprasāraṇe vṛddhir āvādeśaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:32433: tataḥ oḥ pu-yaṇ-jy-apare (*7,4.80) ity etad vacanaṃ jñāpakaṃ ṇau kṛtasthānivadbhāvasya, iti sthānivadbhāvāt śuśabdo dvirucyate //
GS24jvkasipu:32437: sanpare caṅpare ca nau parato hvaḥ saṃprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32440: saṃprasāraṇasya balīyastvāt śācchāsāhvāvyāvepāṃ yuk (*7,3.37) iti prāgeva yuk na bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:32441: samprasāraṇam iti vartamāne punaḥ samprasāraṇam ity uktaṃ vibhāṣā ity asya nivṛttyartham /
GS24jvkasipu:32442: hvaḥ samprasāraṇam abhyastasya ity ekayogena siddhe pṛthagyogakaranam anabhyastanimittapratyayavyavadhāne samprasāraṇābhāvajñāpanārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:32447: hvaḥ iti vartate, tad abhyastasya ity anena vyadhikaraṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:32450: tena abhyastakāraṇasya hvayatiḥ prāg eva dvirvacanāt samprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32457: chandasi viṣaye hvayater dhātor bahulaṃ saṃprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32460: hveño laṭi ātmanepadottamaikavacane bahulaṃ chandasi iti śapo luki kṛte samprasāraṇamuvaṅādeśaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:32467: cāyater dhātoḥ chandasi viṣaye bahulaṃ kī ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32475: apaspṛdhethām iti spardha saṅgharṣe ity asya laṅi āthāmi dvivarcanaṃ rephasya saṃprasāraṇam akāralopaś ca nipātanāt /
GS24jvkasipu:32478: apara āha - spardheḥ apapūrvasya liṅi āthāmi samprasaraṇam akāralopaś ca nipātanāt /
GS24jvkasipu:32482: arca pūjāyām, arha pūjāyam ity anayor dhātvoliṭyusi samprasāraṇam
GS24jvkasipu:32484: tato dvirvacanam, uradatvam, ata ādeḥ (*7,4.70) iti dīrghatvam /
GS24jvkasipu:32490: cyuṅ gatau ity asya dhātoḥ liti seśabde abhyāsaya samprasāraṇam aniṭ ca nipātanāt /
GS24jvkasipu:32494: tyaja hānau ity asay dhātoḥ liṭi abhyāsasya samprasāraṇaṃ nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:32498: śrīñ pāke ity etasya dhātoḥ niṣṭhāyāṃ śrābhāvaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32503: anayoḥ śrābhāvaśribhāvayor viṣayavibhāgam icchati, someṣu bahuṣu śrābhāva
GS24jvkasipu:32505: somād anyatra kvacid ekasminn api śrābhāvo dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:32507: tasya śrātāḥ iti bahuvacanasya avivakṣitatvād upasaṃgraho draṣṭavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32509: tasya+eva śrīṇāter āṅpūrvasya kvipi niṣṭhāyāṃ ca śīrādeśaḥ, niṣṭhāyāś ca natvābhāvo nipātanāt
GS24jvkasipu:32515: samprasārane parataḥ pūrvasya yaṇaḥ samprasāraṇaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32519: ekayogalakṣanam api samprasāraṇam ata eva vacanāt prathamaṃ parasya yaṇaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:32521: samprasāraṇam iti vartamāne punaḥ samprasāranagrahaṇaṃ videśasthasya api samprasāraṇasya pratiṣedho yathā syāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:32524: samprasāraṇagrahaṇasāmarthyāt eva pūrvasya pratiṣedhe vaktavye svarṇadīrghatvam ekādeśo na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32527: ṛci parataḥ treḥ samprasāraṇam bhavati uttarapadād ilopaś ca chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:32528: tisra ṛcaḥ yasmin tat tṛcaṃ sūktam /
GS24jvkasipu:32533: rayiśabdasya chandasi viṣaye matau parato bahulaṃ samprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32540: liṭi parato vayo yakārasya samprasāraṇaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32543: vaś ca asya anyatarasyāṃ kiti || PS_6,1.39 ||
GS24jvkasipu:32545: asya vayo yakārasya kiti liṭi parato vakārādeśo bhavati anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:32553: veñ tantusantāne ity asya dhātoḥ liti parataḥ samprasāraṇaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32555: kiti yajāditvāt dhātoḥ prāptam akityapi liṭy abhyāsasya+ubhayeṣām
GS24jvkasipu:32560: lyapi ca parto veñaḥ samprasāraṇaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32567: jyā vayohānau ity asya dhātoḥ lyapi parataḥ samprasāraṇaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32573: vyeñ saṃvaraṇe ity etasya dhātoḥ lyapi parataḥ samprasāraṇaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32579: lyapi ca vyaś ca iti anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:32580: parer uttarasya vyeñ ity etasya dhātoḥ lyapi parataḥ vibhāṣā samprasāraṇaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32582: samprasāraṇe kṛte parapūrvatve ca hrasvasya iti tuka prāpnoti, sa halaḥ (*6,4.2) iti dīrghatvena paratvād bādhyate //
GS24jvkasipu:32586: ejanto yo dhātur upadeśe tasya akārādeśo bhavati, śiti tu pratyaye na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32599: kathaṃ jagle, mamle ? na+evaṃ vijñāyate, śakāra id yasya so 'yaṃ śit iti,
GS24jvkasipu:32600: kiṃ tarhi, śa eva it śit /
GS24jvkasipu:32601: tatra yasmin vidhistadādāvalgrahaṇe iti śidādau pratyaye pratiṣedhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32603: aśiti iti prasajyapratiṣedho 'yam, tena etad āttvam anaimittikaṃ prāg eva
GS24jvkasipu:32604: pratyayotpatter bhavati iti, suglaḥ, sumlaḥ iti ātaścopasarge (*3,1.136)
GS24jvkasipu:32605: iti kapratyayaḥ, suglānaḥ, sumlānaḥ iti āto yuc (*3,3.128) ity evam ādi
GS24jvkasipu:32610: vyeñ ity etasya dhātoḥ liṭi parata ākārādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32618: sphura sphula calane ity etayor dhātvoḥ ecaḥ sthāne ghañi parataḥ ākārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32622: viṣphālaḥ sphuratisphulatyor nir-ni-vibhyaḥ (*8,3.76) iti vā ṣatvam //
GS24jvkasipu:32625: ḍukrīñ dravyavinimaye, iṅ adhyayane ji jaye ity eteṣāṃ dhātūnāṃ ecaḥ sthāne ṇau parataḥ ākārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32632: ṣidhu hiṃsāsamrādhyoḥ ity asya dhātoḥ apāralaukike 'rthe vartamānasya ecaḥ sthāne ṇau parataḥ ākārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32637: atra hi sidhyatiḥ pāralaukike jñānaviśeṣe vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:32638: tāpasaḥ sidhyati jñānaviśeṣamāsādayati, taṃ tapaḥ prayuṅkte /
GS24jvkasipu:32639: sa ca jñānaviśeṣaḥ utpannaḥ paraloke janmāntare phalam abhyudayalakṣaṇam upasaṃharan paralokaprayojano bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32640: iha kasmān na bhavati, annaṃ sādhayati brāhmanebhyo dāsyāmi iti ? sidhyate
GS24jvkasipu:32643: tasya yad dānaṃ tat pāralaukikam, na punaḥ siddhir eva iti na ātvaṃ paryudasyate /
GS24jvkasipu:32644: sakṣāt paralokaprayojane ca sidhyarthe kṛtavakāśaṃ vacanam evaṃ viṣayaṃ na avagāhate /
GS24jvkasipu:32645: sidhyateḥ iti śyanā nirdeśaḥ, ṣidha gatyām ity asya bhauvādikasya nivṛttyarthaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:32649: mīñ hiṃsāyām, ḍumiñ prakṣepaṇe, dīṅ kṣaye ity eteṣaṃ dhātūnāṃ lyapi
GS24jvkasipu:32650: viṣaye, cakārād ecaśca viṣaye upadeśe eva prāk pratyayotpatteḥ alo 'nyasya
GS24jvkasipu:32664: upadeśe eva ātvavidhānād ivarṇāntalakṣaṇaḥ pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32669: lyapi iti vartate, ādeca upadeśe iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:32672: tayoḥ ubhayoḥ api yakā nirdeśaḥ smaryate /
GS24jvkasipu:32673: līyater dhatoḥ lyapi ca ecaśca viṣaye upadeśe eva alo 'ntyasya sthāne vibhāṣā ākārādeśo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:32690: evaṃ ca pralambhanaśālīnīkaranayoś ca ṇau nityamāttvaṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:32695: khida dainye ity asya dhātoḥ ecaḥ sthāne chandasi viṣaye vibhāṣā ākāraḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32701: gurī udyamane ity asya dhātoḥ apapūrasya ṇamuli parataḥ ecaḥ sthāne vibhāṣā ākāraḥ ādeśo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:32705: asyapagāram yudhyante, asyapagoram yudhyante ity atra dvitīyāyāṃ ca
GS24jvkasipu:32709: ciñ sphura ity etayoḥ dhātvoḥ ṇau parataḥ ecaḥ sthāne vibhāṣa ākārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32715: vī gatiprajanakāntyasanakhādaneṣu ity asya dhātoḥ prajane vartamānasya ṇau parataḥ vibhāṣā ākārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32716: purovāto gaḥ pravāpayati, purovāto gāḥ pravāyayati /
GS24jvkasipu:32721: ṇau iti vartate, vibhāṣā iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:32722: hetur iha pāribhāṣikaḥ svatantrasya prayojakaḥ, tato yad bhayam, sa yasya bhayasya sākṣād hetuḥ, tadbhayam hetubhayam /
GS24jvkasipu:32723: tatra vartamānasya ñibhī bhaye ity asya dhātoḥ ṇau parataḥ vibhāṣā ākārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32729: libhiyoḥ īkārapraśleṣanirdeśād īkārāntasya bhiyaḥ ṣuk vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:32731: atra hi kuñcikāto bhayaṃ karaṇāt, na hetor devadattāt //
GS24jvkasipu:32734: ṇau iti vartate, hetubhaye iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:32736: ṣmiṅ īṣaddhasane ity asya dhātoḥ hetubhaye 'rthe ṇau parato nityamakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32739: bhaye iti kim ? kuñcikayā enaṃ vismāpayati /
GS24jvkasipu:32741: na hi mukhye bhaye smayater vṛttir asti //
GS24jvkasipu:32744: sṛja visarge, dṛśir prekṣaṇe ity etayoḥ dhātvoḥ jñalādāvakiti pratyaye parataḥ am āgamo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:32754: sici vṛddhiḥ ami kṛte bhavati, pūrvaṃ tu bādhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:32759: dhātoḥ svarūpagrahaṇe tatprataye kāryavijñānād iha na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:32763: upadeśe iti vartate, jñalyam akiti iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:32764: upadeśe 'nudāttasya dhātoḥ ṛkāropadhasya jñalādāvakiti pratyaye parato 'nyatarasyām amāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32767: tṛpa prīṇane, dṛpa harṣamocanayoḥ, ity etau radhādī dhatū, tayoḥ iḍāgamaḥ radhādibhyaś ca (*7,2.45) iti vikalpyate /
GS24jvkasipu:32769: anudāttasya iti kim ? varḍhā, varḍhum, varḍhavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:32770: vṛhū udyamane ity ayam udāttopadeśaḥ ūditvāccāsyeḍ vikalopyate /
GS24jvkasipu:32779: śīrṣan iti śabdāntaraṃ śiraḥśabdena samānārthaṃ chandasi viṣaye nipātyate,
GS24jvkasipu:32782: śīrṣṇā hi tatra somaṃ krītaṃ haranti /
GS24jvkasipu:32789: sa katham ? taddhite iti hi paraṃ nimittam upādīyate, sa tadanurūpāṃ prakṛtiṃ śiraḥśabdam ākṣipati /
GS24jvkasipu:32790: yakārādau taddhite parataḥ śiraḥśabdasya śīrṣannādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32793: śirasi bhavaḥ iti śarīra-avayavāc ca (*4,3.55) iti yat, ye ca abhāva-karmaṇoḥ (*6,4.138) iti prakṛtibhāvaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32794: taddhite iti kim ? śiraḥ icchati śirasyati /
GS24jvkasipu:32800: śjādau taddhite śirasaḥ śīrṣaśabdaḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32804: śīrṣanbhāve hi an (*6,4.167) iti prakṛtibhāvaḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:32805: hāstiśīrṣiśabdāt striyām iño 'ṇ-iñor anārṣayoḥ ṣyaṅādeśe kṛte śīrṣasya śiraḥśabdagrahaṇena grahaṇāt śīrṣannādeśaḥ prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:32806: tatra prakṛtibhāve sati hāstiśīrṣaṇyā ity aniṣṭaṃ rūpaṃ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:32809: aṇiñantād vā paraḥ pratyayaḥ ṣyaṅāśrayitavyaḥ, tatra yasya+iti lopasya sthānivadbhāvād vyavadhānam
GS24jvkasipu:32813: pāda danta nāsikā māsa hṛdaya niśā asṛj yūṣa doṣa yakṛt śakṛt udaka āsana ity eteṣāṃ śabdānāṃ sthāne śasprabhṛtipratyayeṣu parataḥ pad dat nas mās hṛd niś asan yūṣan doṣan yakan śakan udan āsan ity ete ādeśāḥ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:32817: dat - yā dato dhāvate tasyai śyāvadan /
GS24jvkasipu:32829: śasprabhṛtiṣu iti kim ? pādau te pratipīḍyau /
GS24jvkasipu:32833: tathā hi bhāṣāyām api padādayaḥ śabdāḥ prayujyante /
GS24jvkasipu:32839: śasprabhṛtiṣu iti prakārārthe prabhṛtiśabda iti śalā doṣaṇī ity atra api doṣannādeśo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:32841: māṃsa pṛtanā sānu ity eteṣāṃ sthāne yathāsaṅkhyam māṃs pṛt snu ity ete ādeśāḥ bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:32846: na te divo na pṛthivyā adhisnuṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:32849: nāsikāyā nasbhāvo vaktavyaḥ yat tas kṣudra ity eteṣu parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32858: dhātor ādeḥ ṣakārasya sthāne sakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32868: ādeśa pratyayayoḥ (*8,3.59) ity atra ṣatvavyavasthārtham ṣādayo dhātavaḥ kecid upadiṣṭāḥ
GS24jvkasipu:32869: ke punas te ? ye tathā paṭhyante /
GS24jvkasipu:32870: athavā lakṣaṇaṃ kriyate, ajdantyaparāḥ sādayaḥ ṣopadeśāḥ
GS24jvkasipu:32878: tena teṣṭhīvyate, ṭeṣṭhīvyate iti ca abhyāsarūpaṃ dvidhā bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:32882: dhātor āder ṇakārasya nakāra ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32887: subdhātor ayam api neṣyate, ṇakāram icchati ṇakārīyati /
GS24jvkasipu:32888: upasargād asamāse 'pi ṇopadeśasya (*8,4.14) ity atra ṇatvavidher
GS24jvkasipu:32890: ke punas te ? ye tathā paṭhyante /
GS24jvkasipu:32891: athavā lakṣaṇaṃ kriyate, sarve ṇādayo ṇopadeśāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:32895: dhatoḥ iti prakṛtaṃ yat tad dhātvādeḥ iti punar dhātugrahaṇān nivṛttam /
GS24jvkasipu:32896: tena dhātor adhātośca vakārayakārayoḥ vali parato lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32906: uṇādayo bahulam (*3,3.1) iti bahulavacanāc ccḥ-voḥ ś-ūḍ-anunāsike ca
