GS24jvkasipu:32910: ūrvaṃ lopagrahaṇaṃ kim ? verapṛktalopāt pūrvaṃ vali lopo yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:32913: vraścādīnām upadeśasāmarthyāt vali lopo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32915: vavṛśca ity atra api hi samprasāraṇahalādiḥśeṣayor bahiraṅgatvāt prāpnoti //
GS24jvkasipu:32919: veḥ iti kvibādayo viśeṣān anubandhān utsṛjya sāmānyena gṛhyante /
GS24jvkasipu:32931: apṛktasya iti kim ? vṛdṛbhyāṃ kvin darviḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32937: tad iha laukikena arthavat karmasādhanaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:32939: halantād, ṅyantād ābantāc ca dīrghāt paraṃ su ti si ity etad apṛktaṃ hal
GS24jvkasipu:32953: bhṛño laṅi tipi ślau bhṛñāmit ity abhyāsasya ittvam /
GS24jvkasipu:32962: tipā sahacaritasya siśabdasya grahaṇāt sico grahaṇaṃ na asti /
GS24jvkasipu:32967: atha kimarthaṃ halantāt sutisināṃ lopo vidhīyate, saṃyogāntalopena+eva
GS24jvkasipu:32969: rājā, takṣā ity atra saṃyogāntalopasya asiddhatvān nalopo na syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:32970: ukhāsrat, parṇadhvat ity atra apadantatvād dattvaṃ ca na syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:32971: abhino 'tra ity atra ato roraplutādaplute (*6,1.113) ity uttvaṃ na syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:32972: abibhar bhavān ity atra tu rāt sasya (*8,3.24) iti niyamāl lopa eva na syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:32973: saṃyogāntasya lope hi nalopādir na sidhyati /
GS24jvkasipu:32974: rāttu te na+eva lopaḥ syād dhalas tasmād vidhīyate //
GS24jvkasipu:32977: lopaḥ iti vartate, hal iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:32978: apṛktam iti na adhikriyate, tathā ca pūrvasūtre punar apṛktagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam
GS24jvkasipu:32979: eṅantāt prātipadikāt hrasvantāc ca paro hal lupyate sa cet sambuddher bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32987: ami pūrvaḥ (*6,1.107) iti pūrvatve krte lahmātrasya makārasya lopaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32988: he katarat ity atra ḍidayam adḍādeśaḥ, tatra ṭilope sati hrasvābhāvān na asti sambuddhilopaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:32992: śi ity etasya bahulaṃ chandasi viṣaye lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32999: piti kṛti parato hrasvāntasya dhātoḥ tugāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33011: grāmaṇi brāhmaṇakulam ity atra hrasvasya bahiraṅgasya asiddhatvāt tug na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:33014: adhikāro 'yam anudāttaṃ padam ekavarjam (*6,1.158) iti yāvat /
GS24jvkasipu:33015: prāg etasmat sūtrād ita uttaraṃ yad vakṣyāmaḥ saṃhitāyām ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:33023: chakāre parataḥ saṃhitāyāṃ viṣaye hrasvasya tugāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33026: hrasva eva atra āgamī, na tu tadantaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33027: tena cicchadatuḥ, cicchiduḥ ity atra tuk abhyāsasya grahaṇena na gṛhyate iti haladiḥśeṣeṇa na nivartyate, nāvayavāvayavaḥ samudāyāvayavo bhavati iti //
GS24jvkasipu:33031: tuk iti anuvartate, che iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:33032: āṅo ṅita īṣadādiṣu caturṣvartheṣu vartamānasya, māṅaś ca pratiṣedhavacanasya chakāre paratastugāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33033: padāntād vā (*6,1.76) iti vikalpe prāpte nityaṃ tugāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33044: dīrghāt paro yaḥ chakāraḥ tasmin pūrvasya tasya+eva dīrghasya tugāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33052: padāntād dīrghāt paro yaḥ chakāraḥ tasmin pūrvasya tasya+eva dīrghasya pūrveṇa nityaṃ prāpto vā tugāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33055: viśvajanādīnāṃ chadasi vā tugāgamo bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:33068: aci iti ca ayam adhikāraḥ saṃprasāraṇāc ca (*6,1.108) iti yāvat //
GS24jvkasipu:33071: ecaḥ sthāne aci parataḥ ay av āy āv ity ete ādeśāḥ yathāsaṅkhyam bhavanti
GS24jvkasipu:33081: yo 'yam ecaḥ syāne vantādeśaḥ okārasya av, aukārasya āv, sa yakārādau pratyaye parato bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:33087: vāntaḥ iti kim ? rāyam icchati raiyati /
GS24jvkasipu:33093: gośabdasya yūtau parataḥ chandasi visaye vāntādeśo vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33101: ecaḥ iti vartate, vānto yi pratyaye iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:33102: dhātor ya ec tannimitto yakārādipratyayanimittaḥ, tasya yakārādau pratyaye
GS24jvkasipu:33108: dhātoḥ iti kim ? prātipadikasya niyamo ma bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:33109: tatra ko doṣaḥ ? bābhravyaḥ ity atraa+eva syāt, iha na syāt gavyam, nāvyam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:33110: tannimittasya iti kim ? atannimittasya mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:33116: evakārakaraṇam kim ? dhātvavadhāraṇam yathā syāt, tannimittāvadhāraṇam mā bhūt iti tānimittasya hi dhātoś ca adhātoś ca bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33122: kṣi ji ity etayor dhātvoḥ yati ratyaye parataḥ śakyārthe gamyamāne ekārasya ayādeśo nipātyate
GS24jvkasipu:33129: krīṇāteḥ dhātoḥ tadarthe krayārtheṃ yat tasminn abhidheye yati pratyaye parataḥ ayādeśo nipātyate
GS24jvkasipu:33133: tadarthe iti kim ? kreyaṃ no dhānyaṃ, na ca asti krayyam //
GS24jvkasipu:33136: bibheter dhātoḥ rapurvasya ca vī ity etasy yati pratyaye parataḥ chandasi viṣaye ayādeśaḥ nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:33139: bhayyeti kṛtyalyuṭo bahulam (*3,3.113) ity apadāne yat pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33146: hrade bhavā, bhave chandasi (*4,4.110) iti yat pratyayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:33150: khyatyāt parasya (*6,1.112) iti prāg etasmāt sūtrāt iti uttaraṃ yad vakṣyāmas tatra pūrvasya parasya dvayor api sthāne ekādeśo bhavati ity etad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:33152: tatra aci pūrvasya avarṇāt ca parasya sthāne eko guṇo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33154: pūrvaparagrahaṇaṃ dvayor api yugapadādeśapratipattyartham, ekasya+eva hi
GS24jvkasipu:33155: syāt, nobhe saptamīpañcamyau yugapat prakalpike bhavataḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:33156: ekagrahaṇam pṛthagādeśanivṛttyarthaṃ, sthānibhedād dhi bhinnādiṣu natvavad dvāvādeśau syātām
GS24jvkasipu:33159: ekaḥ iti vartate, pūrvaparayoḥ iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:33160: ekaḥ pūrvaparayoḥ (*6,1.84) iti yo 'yam ekādeśo vidhīyate sa pūrvasya antavad bhavati, parasyādivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33161: yathā tasyāntaḥ ādir vā tadantarbhūtaḥ tadgrahaṇena gṛhyate, tadvadekādeśo
GS24jvkasipu:33163: brahmabandhūḥ ity atra brahmabandhu iti prātipadikam, ūṅ iti aprātipadikam, tayoḥ prātipadikāprātipadikayor yaḥ ekādeśaḥ sa prātipadikasya antavad bhavati, yathā śakyate kartuṃ ṅyāp prātipadikāt (*4,1.1) iti svādividhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33164: vṛkṣau ity atra subaukāraḥ asubakāraḥ, tayoḥ subasupor ekādeśaḥ supaḥ ādivad bhavati, yathā śakyate vaktuṃ subantaṃ padam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:33166: tathā hi khaṭvābhiḥ ity atra antavadbhāvābhāvāt ato bhisa ais (*7,1.9) iti na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33167: hvayateḥ juhāva iti samprasāraṇapūrvatvasya ādivadbhāvāhāvāt āta au ṇalaḥ (*7,1.34) iti na bharvāta /
GS24jvkasipu:33168: asyai aśvaḥ, asyā aśvaḥ iti vṛddhir eci (*6,1.88) iti vṛddhiḥ, eṅaḥ padāntādati (*6,1.109) ity atra vidhau ādivan na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33169: pūrvaparasamudāya ekādeśasya sthānī, sa hi tena nivartayate /
GS24jvkasipu:33170: tatra avayavayor ānumānikaṃ sthānitvam iti tadāśrayaṃ kāryaṃ sthānivadbhāvād aprāptam ity antādivadbhāvo vidhīyate //
GS24jvkasipu:33173: ṣatve tuki ca kartavye ekadeśo 'siddho bhavati, siddhakāryaṃ na karoti ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33175: ko 'sicat ity atra eṅaḥ padāntādati (*6,1.109) iti ekādeśasya paraṃ
GS24jvkasipu:33176: pratyādivadbhāvāt apadāder iṇa uttarasya ādeśasya sakārasya ṣatvaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:33178: ko 'sya, yo 'sya, ko 'smai, yo 'smai ity ekādeśasya asiddhatvāt iṇaḥ iti ṣatvaṃ na bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:33179: tugvidhau - adhītya, preta ity atra+ekādeśasya asiddhatvāt hrasvasya piti
GS24jvkasipu:33186: ādguṇasya asiddhatvād hrasvalakṣaṇo nityo 'tra tuk prāpnoti, dīrghāt,
GS24jvkasipu:33191: avarnāt paro yo 'c ca pūrvo yo 'varṇaḥ tayoḥ pūrvaparayoḥ avarṇācoḥ sthāne eko guṇa ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33203: lṛkārasya sthāne yo 'ne yo 'ṇ tasya lapratvam iṣyate //
GS24jvkasipu:33207: avarṇāt paro ya ec, eci ca pūrvo yaḥ avarṇaḥ, tayoḥ pūrvaparayoḥ avarṇaicoḥ sthāne vṛddhir ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33219: vṛddhir eci iti vartate, āt iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:33220: tad etat ejgrahaṇam eter eva viśeṣaṇaṃ , na punar edhateḥ, avyabhicārāt,
GS24jvkasipu:33222: iṇ gatau ity etasmin dhātau eci, edha vṛddhau ity etasmin ūṭhi ca pūrvaṃ yad avarṇaṃ tataś ca paro yo 'c, tayoḥ pūrvaparyoḥ avarṇācoḥ sthāne vṛddhir ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33233: om-āṅoś ca (*6,1.95) ity etat tu pararūpaṃ na bādhyate, yena na aprāpte yo vidhir ārabhyate sa tasya bādhako bhavati iti, purastād apavādā anantarān
GS24jvkasipu:33235: tena+iha na bhavati, upa ā itaḥ upetaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:33250: ṛtaḥ iti kim ? sukhena itaḥ sukhetaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33265: āṭaḥ paro yo ac, aci ca pūrvo ya āṭ, tayoḥ pūrvaparayoḥ āḍacoḥ sthāne vṛddhir ekādeśo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:33272: cakāro 'dhikavidhānārthaḥ, usi om-āṅoś ca (*6,1.95) iti pararūpabādhanārthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33279: avarṇāntād upasargāt ṛkārādau dhātau parataḥ pūrvaparayoḥ sthāne vṛddhir ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33286: pragatā ṛ cchakā asmād deśāt prarcchako deśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33287: yatkriyāyuktāḥ prādayaḥ taṃ prati gatyupasargasañjñakāḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:33288: ṛti iti kim ? upa itaḥ upetaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33291: upasargagrahaṇād eva dhātugrahaṇe siddhe dhātugrahaṇaṃ śākalanivṛttyartham
GS24jvkasipu:33292: ṛtyakaḥ (*6,1.128) iti hi śākalyasya prakrtibhāvaḥ prāpnoti //
GS24jvkasipu:33295: āt ity eva, upasargāt ṛti dhātau iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:33296: subantāvayave dhātau ṛkārādau parataḥ avarṇāntāt upasargāt pūrvaparayoḥ āpiśaler ācāryasya matena vā vṛddhir ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33299: ṛkāralṛkārayoḥ sāvarṇyavidhiḥ iti ṛti iti lṛkāro 'pi gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:33300: āpiśaligrahaṇaṃ pūjartham, vā iti hy ucyate eva //
GS24jvkasipu:33303: otaḥ ami śasi ca parataḥ pūrvaparayoḥ ākāraḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33308: dyośabdo 'pi okārānta eva vidyate, tato 'pi paraṃ sarvanāmasthānaṃ ṇit
GS24jvkasipu:33309: iṣyate, tena nāprāptāyāṃ vṛddhau ayam ākāro vidhīyamānastāṃ bādhate /
GS24jvkasipu:33310: am iti dvitīyaikavacanaṃ gṛhyate, śasā sāhacaryāt, supi iti cādhikārāt /
GS24jvkasipu:33311: tena acinavam, asunavam ity atra na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:33314: āt ity eva, upasargād dhātau iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:33315: avarṇāntāt upasargāt eṅādau dhātau pūrvaparayoḥ pararūpam ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33321: kecit vā supyāpiśaleḥ (*6,1.92) ity anuvartyanti, tac ca vākyabhedena
GS24jvkasipu:33334: aniyoge iti kim ? ihaia bhava, mā anyatra gāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33338: samāse iti kim ? tiṣṭha devadattauṣṭhaṃ paśya /
GS24jvkasipu:33345: avarṇāntāt omi āṅi ca parataḥ pūrvaparayoḥ sthāne pararūpam ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33346: kā om ity avocat, kom ity avocat /
GS24jvkasipu:33348: āgi khalv api - ā ūḍhā oḍhā /
GS24jvkasipu:33353: iha tu ā ṛśyāt arśyāt, adya arśyāt adyarśyāt iti akaḥ savarṇe dīrghatvaṃ bādhate //
GS24jvkasipu:33357: avarṇāt apadāntāt usi pūrvaparayoḥ ādguṇāpavādaḥ pararūpam ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33362: apadāntāt iti kim ? kā usrā kosrā /
GS24jvkasipu:33369: akārāt apadantāt guṇe parataḥ pūrvaparayoḥ sthane pararūpam ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33373: pace, yaje ity atra vṛddhir eci iti vṛddhiḥ prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:33382: avyaktam aparisphuṭavarṇam, tadanukaraṇaṃ parisphuṭavarṇam eva kenacit sādṛśyena tadavyaktam anukaroti, tasya yo atśabdaḥ tasmāt itau pūrvaparayoḥ sthāne pararūpam ekādeśo bhavati paṭat iti paṭiti /
GS24jvkasipu:33386: avyaktānukaraṇasya iti kim ? jagat iti jagaditi /
GS24jvkasipu:33387: ataḥ iti kim ? maraṭ iti maraḍiti /
GS24jvkasipu:33388: itau iti kim ? paṭat atra paṭadatra /
GS24jvkasipu:33390: iha mā bhūt, śrat iti śraditi /
GS24jvkasipu:33391: katham ghaṭaditi gambhīramambudairnaditam iti ? dakārāntam etad anukaraṇaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:33393: na āmreḍitasya anatyasya tu vā || PS_6,1.99 ||
GS24jvkasipu:33395: avyaktānukaraṇasya āmreḍitasya yo atśabdaḥ itau tasya pararūpaṃ na bhavati, tasya yo 'ntyastakārastasya vā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33398: yadā tu samudāyānukaraṇaṃ tadā bhavaty eva pūrveṇa pararūpam, paṭatpaṭeti karoti //
GS24jvkasipu:33401: avyaktānukaraṇasya, ataḥ, antyasya iti ca anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:33402: ḍācparaṃ yad amreditaṃ tasmin pūrvasya avyaktānukaranasya acchabdasya yo 'ntyaḥ takāraḥ tasya pūrvasya parasya cādyasya varṇasya nityaṃ pararūpam ekadeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33405: paṭad ity asmāt avyaktānukaraṇāt iti ḍāci vihite ḍāci bahulam iti
GS24jvkasipu:33406: dvirvacanam, tac ca ṭilopāt pūrvam eva+iṣyate //
GS24jvkasipu:33409: akaḥ savarṇe aci parataḥ pūrvaparayoḥ sthāne dīrgha ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33417: nājjhalau (*1,1.10) ity atra yat ac iti pratyāhāragrahaṇaṃ tatra grahaṇakaśāstrasya anabhinirvṛttatvāt savarṇā na gṛhyanta iti savarnatvamīkāraśakārayor apratiṣiddham /
GS24jvkasipu:33419: ṛti savarṇe parabhūte tatra ṛ vā bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:33421: yadā na ṛ tadā dīrgha eva hotṝkāraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33423: lṭti savarṇe parato lṛ vā bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:33427: dīrghapakṣe tu samudāyāntaratamasya lṛvarṇasya dīrghasya abhāvāt ṛkāraḥ kriyate //
GS24jvkasipu:33431: prathamāśabdo vibhaktiviśeṣe rūḍhaḥ, tatsāhacaryād dvitīyā 'pi prathamā iti uktā /
GS24jvkasipu:33432: tasyāṃ prathamāyāṃ dvitīyāyāṃ ca vibhaktau aci akaḥ pūrvaparayoḥ sthāne pūrvasavarṇadīrghaḥ ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33439: ato guṇe (*6,1.97) iti yadakāre pararūpaṃ tat akaḥ savarṇe dīrghatvam eva bādhate, na tu pūrvasavarnadīrghatvam, purastād apavāda anantarān vidhīn bādhante na+uttarāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:33443: pūrvasavarnagrahaṇaṃ kim ? agnī ity atra pakṣe parasavarṇo mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:33447: tasmāt pūrvasavarṇadīrghāt uttarasya śaso 'vayavasya sakārasya puṃsi nakārādeśo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:33459: iha tu cañceva cañcā, lummanuṣye iti kano lupi kṛte lupi yuktavad vyaktivacane (*1,2.5) iti puṃso 'pi strīliṅgata, tena natvaṃ na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:33461: tasmāt iti kim ? etāṃścarato gāḥ paśya /
GS24jvkasipu:33478: dīrghāt jasi ici ca parataḥ pūrvasavarṇadīrghaḥ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33485: dīrghāt chandasi viṣaye jasi ca ici ca parato vā pūrvasavarnadīrgho na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33495: ami paratoṭakaḥ pūrvaparayoḥ sthāne pūrvarupam ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33500: pūrvagrahaṇam kim ? pūrva eva yathā syāt, pūrvasavarṇo 'ntaratamo mā bhūt iti, kumārīm ity atra hi trimātraḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:33501: vā chandasi (*6,1.106) ity eva, śamīṃ ca, śamyaṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:33506: samprasāraṇāt aci parataḥ pūrvaparayoḥ sthāne pūrvarūpam ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33510: samprasaraṇavidhānasāmarthyāt vigṛhītasya śravaṇe prāpte pūrvatvaṃ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:33511: vā chandasi (*6,1.106) ity eva, mitro no atra varuṇo yajyamānaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33512: parapūrvatvavidhāne satyarthavat samprasāraṇavidhānam iti iṣṭa ity evam ādiṣu pūrvatvabhāve yaṇādeśo bhavatyeva /
GS24jvkasipu:33513: antaraṅge ca aci iṛtārthaṃ vacanam iti bāhye paścāt sannipatite pūrvatvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33518: eṅ yaḥ padāntaḥ tasmād ati parataḥ pūrvaparayoḥ sthāne pūrvarūpam ekādśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33535: eṅaḥ iti vartate, ati iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:33536: eṅaḥ uttarayoḥ ṅasiṅasoḥ ati parataḥ pūrvaparayoḥ sthāne pūrvarūpam ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33545: ṛkārāntād uttarayoḥ ṅsiṅasoḥ ati parataḥ pūrvaparayoḥ ukāra ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33548: dvayoḥ ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭayoḥ sthāne yaḥ sa labhate 'nyataravyapadeśaṃ iti uraṇ raparaḥ (*1,1.51) iti raparatvam atra kṛtvā rāt sasya (*8,2.24) iti salopaḥ kartavyaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:33551: ṅasiṅasoḥ iti vartate, ut iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:33552: khyatyāt iti khiśabdakhīśabdayoḥ tiśabdatīśabdayoś ca kṛtayaṇādeśayor idaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:33553: grahaṇaṃ, tābhyāṃ parasya ṅasiṅasoḥ ata ukārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33558: khīśabdasya+udāharaṇam - saha khena vartate iti sakhaḥ, tam icchati iti
GS24jvkasipu:33560: sakha yateḥ kvip sakhīḥ, tasya ṅasiṅasoḥ sakhyuḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:33561: tīśabdasya api - lūnam icchati lūnīyati, lūnīyateḥ kvipi lupte, lūnyur āgcchati /
GS24jvkasipu:33564: vikṛtanirdeśād eva iha na bhavati, atisakher āgacchati, senāpater āgacchati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:33565: sakhiśabdasya kevalasya ghisañjñā pratiṣidhyate, na tadantasya //
GS24jvkasipu:33569: akārād aplutād uttarasya ro rephasya ukārānubandhaviśiṣṭasya akāre 'plute
GS24jvkasipu:33573: bho-bhago-agho-apūrvasya yo 'śi (*8,3.17) ity asmin prāpte utvaṃ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:33574: rutvam api āśrayāt pūrvatra asiddham (*8,2.1) iti asiddhaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33580: tasya api taparatvād atra na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33583: aplute iti kim ? tiṣṭhatu paya a3cśvin /
GS24jvkasipu:33584: atra plutasya asiddhatvāt utvaṃ prāpnoti iti aplutād aplute iti ucyate //
GS24jvkasipu:33587: haśi ca parataḥ ata uttarasya rorukārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33594: eṅaḥ iti yat pañcamyantam anuvartate, tadarthād iha prathamāntaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33596: antar iti avyayam adhikaranabhūtaṃ madhyam ācaṣṭe /
GS24jvkasipu:33597: pādaśabdena ca ṛkpādasya+eva grahaṇam iṣyate, na tu ślokapadasya /
GS24jvkasipu:33598: avakārayakārapare ati parataḥ eṅ prakṛtyā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33599: svabhāvena avatiṣṭhate kāraṇātmanā vā bhavati, na vikāram āpadyate /
GS24jvkasipu:33612: kecid idaṃ sūtraṃ na antaḥpādam avyapare iti paṭhanti, te saṃhitāyām iha
GS24jvkasipu:33613: yad ucyate tasya sarvasya pratiṣedhaṃ varṇayanti //
GS24jvkasipu:33616: avyāt avadyāt avakramuḥ avrata ayam avantu avasyu ity eteṣu
GS24jvkasipu:33617: vakāra-yakārapare 'py ati parataḥ antaḥpādam eṅ prakṛtyā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33627: uraḥśabdaḥ eṅantaḥ yajuṣi viṣaye ati rakṛtyā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33629: apare yajuṣyuro iti sūtraṃ paṭhanti, ukārāntam uruśabdaṃ sambuddhyantam
GS24jvkasipu:33630: adhīyate, te idam udāharanti uro antarikṣaṃ sajūḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:33635: āpo juṣāṇo vṛṣṇo varṣiṣṭhe ity ete śabdāḥ ambe ambāle ity etau ca yāvambike śabdāt pūrvau yajuṣi paṭhitau te ati parataḥ prakṛtyā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:33641: asmād eva nipātanāt ambārthanadyor hrasvaḥ (*7,6.107) iti hrasvatvaṃ na
GS24jvkasipu:33645: aṅgaśabde ya eṅ tadādau cākāre yaḥ pūrvaḥ sa yajusi viṣaye ati prakṛtyā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33652: anudātte ca ati kavargadhakārapare parato yajusi viṣaye eṅ prakṛtyā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33657: kudhapare iti kim ? so 'yam agniḥ sahasriyaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:33662: avapathāḥśabde 'nudātte akārādau parato yajuṣi viṣaye eṅ prakṛtyā bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:33664: vaper laṅi thāsi tiṅṅ-atiṅaḥ (*8,1.28) iti nighātena anudāttatvam /
GS24jvkasipu:33669: sarvatra chandasi bhāṣāyāṃ ca ati parato goḥ eṅ prakṛtyā bhavati vibhāṣā /
GS24jvkasipu:33671: chandasi - apaśavo vā anye goaśvebhyaḥ paśavo goaśvān //
GS24jvkasipu:33675: aci ity etat tv anuvartata eva /
GS24jvkasipu:33676: aci parataḥ goḥ sphoṭāyanasya ācāryasya matena avaṅ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33681: ādyudāttaś ca ayam ādeśo nipātyate, sa nipātanasvaro bahuvrīhau
GS24jvkasipu:33685: sphoṭāyanagrahaṇaṃ pūjārthaṃ, vibhāṣā ity eva hi vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:33686: vyavasthitavibhāṣā iyaṃ, tena gavākṣaḥ ity atra nityam avaṅ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:33689: indraśabdasthe aci parato gornityam avaṅ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33694: plutāś ca pragṛhyāś ca aci prakṛtyā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:33702: aci ity anuvartamāne punar ajgrahaṇam ādeśanimittasya aciḥ parigrahārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:33703: tena+iha na bhavati, jānu u asya rujati jānvasya rujati /
GS24jvkasipu:33704: pragṛhyād ukārāt parasya akārasya savarṇadīrghatvaṃ pratyanimittatvād atra prakṛtibhāvo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33706: plutapragṛhyāṇāṃ nityam ayam eva prakṛtibhāvo yathā syād, iko 'savarṇe
GS24jvkasipu:33707: śākalyasya hrasvaś ca (*6,1.127) ity etan mā bhūt iti //
GS24jvkasipu:33710: āṅo 'ci parataḥ saṃhitāyāṃ chandasi viṣaye 'nunāsikādeśo bhavati, sa ca prakṛtyā bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:33713: kecid āṅo 'nunāsikaś chandasi bahulam ity adhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:33718: iko 'savarne aci parataḥ śākalyasya ācāryasya matena prakṛtyā bhavanti,
GS24jvkasipu:33719: hrasvaś ca tasya ikaḥ sthāne bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33728: ārambhasāmarthyād eva hi yaṇādeśena saha vikalpaḥ siddhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33739: śākalyasya hrasvaś ca ity etad anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:33740: ṛkāre parataḥ śāklyasya ācāryasya matena akaḥ prakṛtyā bhavanti hrasvaś ca tasyakaḥ sthāne bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33751: upasthitaṃ nāma anārṣaḥ atikaraṇaḥ, samudāyād avacchidya padaṃ yena svarūpe 'vasthāpyate /
GS24jvkasipu:33756: vatkaraṇaṃ kim ? apluta iti ucyamāne pluta eva pratiṣidyate /
GS24jvkasipu:33757: tatra ko doṣaḥ ? pragṛhyāśraye prakṛtibhāve plutasya śravaṇaṃ na syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:33761: ī3kāraḥ pluto 'ci parataḥ cākravarmaṇasya ācāryasya matena plutavad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33762: astu hītyabrūtām, astu hī3 ity abrūtām /
GS24jvkasipu:33767: īkārād anyatra apy ayam aplutavadbhāva iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:33771: eṅaḥ padāntād ati (*6,1.109) ity ataḥ padagrahaṇam anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:33772: divaḥ iti prātipadikaṃ gṛhyate, na dhātuḥ, sānubandhakatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:33779: niranubandhakagrahaṇād iha na bhavati, akṣadyūbhyām, akṣadyūbhiḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:33780: taparakaranam ūṭho nivṛttyartham, dyubhyām, dyubhiḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:33786: etattadau yāvakakārau nañsamāse na vartate tayor yaḥ suśabdaḥ, kaś ca tayoḥ suśabdaḥ ? yaḥ tadarthena sambaddhaḥ, tasya saṃhitāyāṃ viṣaye hali parato lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33796: tanmadhyapatitastadgrahaṇena gṛhyate iti rūpabhede 'pi sākackāvetattadāv eva bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33799: uttarapadārthapradhānatvānnañsamāsasya etattador eva atra sambaddhaḥ suśabdaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33803: sya ity etasya chandasi hali parataḥ bahulaṃ sorlopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33804: uta sya vājī kṣipaṇiṃ turaṇyati grīvāyāṃ baddho api kakṣa āsani /
GS24jvkasipu:33805: eṣa sya te pavata indra somaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33806: na ca bhavati, yatra syo nipatet //
GS24jvkasipu:33809: saḥ ity etasya aci parataḥ sulopo bhavati, lope sati cet pādaḥ pūryate /
GS24jvkasipu:33812: lope cet pādapūraṇam iti kim ? sa iva vyāghro bhavet /
GS24jvkasipu:33814: pādagrahaṇena atra ślokapādasya api grahaṇaṃ kecid icchanti, tena+idaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:33816: saiṣa dāśarathī rāmaḥ saiṣa rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33817: saiṣa karṇo mahātyāgī saiṣā bhīmo mahābalaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:33820: adhikāro 'yam pāraskaraprabhṛtīnāṃ ca sañjñāyām (*6,1.175) iti yāvat /
GS24jvkasipu:33821: ita uttaraṃ yad vakṣyāmastatra suṭ iti , kāt pūrvaḥ iti ca+etad adhikṛtaṃ veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:33827: tathā hi saṃskṛṣīṣṭa, saṃskriyate iti saṃyogādilakṣaṇau iḍguṇau na bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33828: tiṅṅatiṅaḥ (*8,1.18) iti nighāto 'pi tarhi na prāpnoti, suṭā vyavahitatvāt ? svaravidhau vyañjanam avidyamānavat iti vacanān na asti vyavadhānam saṃcaskaratuḥ, saṃcaskaruḥ iti guṇaḥ katham ? tanmadhyapatitastadgrahaṇena gṛhyate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:33829: saṃyogopadhagrahaṇaṃ ca ṛtaśca saṃyogāder guṇaḥ (*7,4.10) ity atra kartavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:33833: aḍvyavāye, abhyāsavyavāye api suṭ kāt pūrvaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33838: kimarthaṃ punar idam ucyate, pūrvam dhātur upasargeṇa yujyate iti tatra
GS24jvkasipu:33839: dhātūpasargayoḥ karyam antaraṅgam iti pūrvaṃ suṭ kriyate paścād aṅabhyāsau
GS24jvkasipu:33840: ? abhaktaś ca suṭ ity uktam, tataḥ sakārād uttarāvaḍabhyāsau aniṣṭe deśe syātām /
GS24jvkasipu:33841: etasmiṃs tu satyata eva vacanāt kṛtayor aḍabhyāsayoḥ tadvyavāye api suṭ kāt pūrvaḥ kriyate iti siddham iṣṭaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:33844: sam pari upa ity etebhyaḥ bhuṣaṇārthe karotau parataḥ suṭ kāt pūrvo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33848: atra saṃpuṃkānāṃ satvam iti samo makārasya sakāraḥ, pūrvasya cākārasya anunāsikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33857: sampūrvasya kvacid abhūṣaṇe 'pi suḍiṣyate, saṃskṛtamannam iti //
GS24jvkasipu:33860: samavāyaḥ samudāyaḥ, tasmiṃś cārthe karotau samparyupebhyaḥ kāt pūrvaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:33868: sato guṇāntarādhānamādhikyāya vṛddhasya vā tādavasthyāya samīhā pratiyatnaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33872: eteṣv artheṣu gamyamānesu karotau dhātau parataḥ upāt suṭ kāt pūrvaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33883: upād uttarasmin kiratau dhātau lavanaviṣaye sut kat pūrvaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33892: upāt prateś ca uttarasmin kiratau suṭ kāt pūrvaḥ bhavati hiṃsayāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:33895: tathā te vṛṣala vikṣepo bhūyāt yathā hiṃsāmanubadhnāti ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33901: apāt uttarasmin kiratau catuṣpācchakuniṣu yadālekhanaṃ tasmin visaye sut kāt pūrvaḥ bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:33908: iha mā bhūt, apakirati śvā odanapiṇḍamāśitaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33912: kustumburūṇi iti suṭ nipātyate jātiś ced bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33915: jātiḥ iti kim ? kutsitāni tumburūṇi kutumburūṇi /
GS24jvkasipu:33916: tumburuśabdena tindukīphalāny ucyante, samāsena teṣāṃ kutsā //
GS24jvkasipu:33919: aparāsparā iti suṭ nipātyate kriyāsātatye gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:33922: kriyāsātatye iti kim ? aparaparāḥ sārthāḥ gacchanti /
GS24jvkasipu:33923: apare ca pare ca sakṛdeva gacchanti ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33925: kim idaṃ sātatyam iti ? satatasya bhāvaḥ sātatyam /
GS24jvkasipu:33926: kathaṃ satatam ? samastate vikalpena makāralopo vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:33931: goṣpadam iti suṭ nipātyate, tasya ca ṣatvaṃ sevite asevite pramāne ca viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:33933: gāvaḥ padyante yasmin deśe sa gobhiḥ sevito deśo goṣpadaḥ ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:33935: asevite goṣpadaśabdo na sambhavati ity agoṣpadaśabdārthaṃ nipātanam /
GS24jvkasipu:33936: yady evaṃ na artha etena, goṣpadapratiṣedhād agoṣpadaṃ bhavisyati ? satyam
GS24jvkasipu:33937: etat, yatra tu sevitaprasaṅgo 'sti tatra+eva syād agoṣpadam iti, yatra tvatyantāsambhava eva tatra na syāt, agoṣpadānyaraṇyāni iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:33939: yāni hi mahāntyaraṇāni yeṣu gavām atyantāsambhavas tāny evam ucyante /
GS24jvkasipu:33942: na atra goṣpadaṃ svārthapratipādanārtham upādīyate, kiṃ tarhi, kṣetrasya vṛṣṭeś ca paricchettumiyattām
GS24jvkasipu:33943: sevitāsevitapramāṇesu iti kim ? goḥ padam gopadam //
GS24jvkasipu:33946: ātmayāpanāya sthānaṃ pratiṣṭhā, tasyām āspadam iti suṭ nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:33948: pratiṣthāyām iti kim ? ā padāt āpadam //
GS24jvkasipu:33951: anityatayā viṣayabhūtayā adbhutatvam iha upalakṣyate, tasminn ācaryaṃ nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:33952: carerāṅi cāgurau iti yatpratyaye kṛte nipātanāt suṭ /
GS24jvkasipu:33956: anitye iti kim ? ācaryaṃ karma śobhanam //
GS24jvkasipu:33959: kutsitaṃ varcaḥ varcaskam annamalam, tasminn abhidheye 'vaskaraḥ iti nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:33960: avapūrvasya kirateḥ karmaṇi ṛdorap (*3,3.57) ityap, nipātanāp suṭ /
GS24jvkasipu:33961: avakīryate ity avaskaro 'nnamalam, tatsambandhāt deśo 'pi tathā+ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:33965: apaskaraḥ iti nipātyate rathāṅgaṃ ced bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33966: apapūrvāt kirateḥ ṛdorap (*6,6.57) ityap, nipātanāt suṭ /
GS24jvkasipu:33971: viṣkiraḥ iti kirateḥ vipūrvasya ig-upadha-jñā-prī-kiraḥ kaḥ (*3,1.135) iti kapratyaye vihite suṭ nipātyate śukuniś ced bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33974: viṣkiro vā śakunau iti va grahaṇād eva suḍvikalpe siddhe vikiragrahaṇam iha tasya api śakuner anyatra prayogo ma bhūt //
GS24jvkasipu:33977: candraśabde uttarapade hrasvāt paraḥ suḍāgamo bhavati mantravisaye /
GS24jvkasipu:33981: uttarapadaṃ samāsa eva bhavati iti prasiddham, tata iha na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:33985: kaśa gatiśāsanayoḥ ity etasya dhātoḥ pratipūrvasya pacādyaci kṛte suṭ
GS24jvkasipu:33987: grāmamadya pravekṣyāmi bhava me tvaṃ pratiṣkaśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33988: vārtāpuruṣaḥ, sahāyaḥ, puroyāyī vā pratiṣkaśaḥ ity abhidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:33991: atra yady api kaśer eva kaśāśabdaḥ, tathā api kaśer iti dhātor upādānaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:33996: praskaṇva hariścandra iti suṭ nipātyate ṛṣī ced abhidheyau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34004: maskara maskarin ity etau yathāsaṅkhyaṃ veṇau parivrājake ca nipātyete /
GS24jvkasipu:34005: makaraśabdo hy avyutpannaṃ prātipadikam, tasya veṇau abhidheye suṭ
GS24jvkasipu:34011: kecit punar atra māṅi upapade karoteḥ karaṇe 'cpratyayam api nipātayantik māṅś ca hrasvatvam suṭ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:34012: mā kriyate yena pratiṣidhyate sa maskaro veṇuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34013: veṇugrahaṇaṃ ca pradarśanārtham anyatra api bhavati, maskaro daṇḍaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:34014: parivrājake api māṅi upapade karotestācchīlye inirnipātyate, māṅo hrasvatvaṃ suṭ ca tathā+eva
GS24jvkasipu:34016: sa hy evam āha - mā kuruta karmāṇi śāntirvaḥ śreyasī iti //
GS24jvkasipu:34019: kāstīra ajastunda ity etau śabdau nipātyete nagare 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:34020: īṣattīramasya, ajasyeva tundamasya iti vyutpattireva kriyate, nagaraṃ tu vācyam etayoḥ
GS24jvkasipu:34027: kāraskara iti suṭ nipātyate vrkṣaś ced bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34028: kāraṃ karoti iti divāvibhāniśāprabhābhāskarānta iti ṭapratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34031: kecid idaṃ nādhīyate, pāraskaraprabhṛtiṣveva kāraskaro vṛkṣaḥ iti paṭhanti //
GS24jvkasipu:34034: pāraskaraprabhṛtīni ca śabdarūpāṇi nipātyante sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:34045: sañjñāgrahaṇād upādhiparigrahe siddhe gaṇe coradevatāgrahaṇaṃ prapañcārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:34047: tumpatau dhātau praśabdāt paraḥ suṭ bhavati gavi kartari /
GS24jvkasipu:34054: yad uktaṃ prāyasya citicittayoḥ suḍaskāro vā iti tat saṅgṛhītaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:34058: yatra anyaḥ svaraḥ udāttaḥ svarito vā vidhīyate, tatra anudāttaṃ padam
GS24jvkasipu:34059: ekaṃ varjayitvā bhavati ity etad upasthitaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:34061: kaḥ punar eko varjyate ? yasya asau svaro vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:34065: dhātor antyam acaṃ varjayitvā pariśiṣṭam anudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34081: vikārasya - asthani, dadhani ity anaṅsvaraḥ prakṛtisvaraṃ bādhate /
GS24jvkasipu:34089: yo hi yasmin sati śiṣyate sa tasya bādhako bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34090: tathā hi - gopāyati ity atra dhātusvarāpavādaḥ pratyayasvaraḥ, tena+eva
GS24jvkasipu:34092: kārṣṇottarāsaṅgaputraḥ ity atra ca samāsasvarāpavādo bahuvrihisvaraḥ satiśiṣṭena samāsāntodāttatvena vādhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:34093: vikaraṇasvaras tu satiśiṣṭo 'pi sārvadhātukasvaraṃ na bādhate /
GS24jvkasipu:34094: lunītaḥ iti tasa eva svaro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34096: atisraḥ ity atra tisṛbhyo jasaḥ (*6,1.166) iti satiśiṣṭo 'pi vibhaktisvaro nañsvareṇa bādhyate
GS24jvkasipu:34097: vibhaktinimittasvarāc ca nañsvaro balīyān iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:34099: yasya vibhaktir nimittamāmaḥ, tasya yad udāttatvaṃ tanaprasvareṇa bādyate /
GS24jvkasipu:34100: padagrahanaṃ kim ? devadatta gāmabhyāja śuklām iti vākye hi pratipadaṃ svaraḥpṛthag bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:34101: parimāṇārthaṃ ca+idaṃ padagrahaṇam padādhikārasya nivṛttiṃ karoti /
GS24jvkasipu:34102: tena prāg eva padavyapadeśāt svaravidhisamakālem eva śiṣṭasya anudāttatvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34103: tathā ca kuvalyā vikāraḥ kauvalam ity atra anudāttādilakṣaṇo 'ñ siddho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34104: tathā garbhiṇīśabdaś ca anudāttādilakṣaṇasya año bādhanarthaṃ bhikṣādiṣu paṭhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:34108: karṣater dhātor ākāravataś ca ghañantasyānta udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34117: taudādikasya ghañantasya karṣaḥ ity ādyudāttaḥ eva bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:34120: uccha ity evam ādīnām anta udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34121: uñchaḥ, mlecchaḥ, jañjaḥ, jalpaḥ ete ghañantāḥ iti ñitsvaraḥ prāptaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34122: japaḥ, vyadhaḥ ity abantau, tayor dhātusvaraḥ prāptaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34125: yujer ghañantasya nipātanād aguṇatvaṃ viśiṣṭaviṣaye ca nipātanam idam iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:34126: kālaviśeṣe rathādyupakaraṇe ca yugaśabdasya prayogaḥ anyatra hi yogaḥ eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34132: halaś ca (*3,3.121) iti ghañantā ete karaṇo 'ntodāttā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:34147: kecit tu bhāvagarhāyām ity atra api anuvartayanti /
GS24jvkasipu:34149: bhakṣirṇyanto 'pi ghañanta eva, erac (*3,3.56) aṇyantānām iti vacanāt //
GS24jvkasipu:34153: yasminn anudātte parataḥ udātto lupyate tasya anudāttasyādirudātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34155: kumāraśabdo 'ntodāttaḥ, tasya ṅīpy anudāte udātto lupyate /
GS24jvkasipu:34168: anudāttasya iti kim ? prāsaṅgaṃ vahati prāsaṅgyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34170: tasya yati titsvaritam iti svarite udātto lupyate ? na+etad asti, svarite hi vidhīyamāne pariśiṣṭam anudāttam, tat kuta udāttalopaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34172: antaḥ iti hi prakṛtatvād antasya syāt, mā hi dhukṣātām, mā hi dhukṣāthām /
GS24jvkasipu:34173: yatra iti kim ? bhargavaḥ, bhārgavau, bhṛgavaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34193: citi pratyaye prakṛtipratyayasamudāyasya anta udātta iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:34202: kim artham idam ? param api ñitsvaraṃ bādhitvā 'ntodāttatvam eva yathā syād iti //
GS24jvkasipu:34215: udātta-svaritayor yaṇaḥ svarito 'nudāttasya (*8,2.4) ity asya apavādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34216: śasi udāttayaṇo hal-pūrvāt (*6,1.174) iti siddhe 'nyatra bahuvacane ṣaṭtricaturbhyo halādiḥ (*6,1.179) iti vidhānāt jas eva labhyate iti
GS24jvkasipu:34217: jasgrahaṇam upasamastārtham eke icchanti atitistrau ity atra svaro mā bhūt iti //
GS24jvkasipu:34222: catasrādeśe ādyudāttanipātanād yaṇādeśasya ca pūrvavidhau sthānivattvād ayaṃ svaro na bhavati catasraḥ paśya iti //
GS24jvkasipu:34226: tatra sau ya ekāc tasmat parā tṛtīyādir vibhaktir udāttā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34243: saptamībahuvacanasya grahaṇād iha na bhavati tvayā, tvayi iti //
GS24jvkasipu:34246: ekācaḥ iti vartate, tṛtīyādir vibhaktir iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:34247: nityaśabdaḥ svaryate, tena nityādhikāravihitaḥ samāsaḥ paryudasyate /
GS24jvkasipu:34248: nityasamāsād anyatrānityasamāse yad uttarapadam antodāttam ekācca tasmāt parā tṛtīyādir vibhaktir anyatarasyām udāttā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34253: yadā vibhaktir udāttā na bhavati, tadā samāsāntodāttatvam eva /
GS24jvkasipu:34258: tatra tatpuruṣe tulyārtha-tṛtīyā-saptamy-upamāna. avyayaya (*6,-2.2.) iti pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaraḥ
GS24jvkasipu:34259: uttarapadagrahaṇam ekāctvena+uttarapadaṃ viśeṣayitum, anyathā hi samāsaviśeṣaṇam etat syāt
GS24jvkasipu:34260: tatra śunaḥ ūrka, śvorjā ity atra+eva ayaṃ vidhiḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:34263: somasutā upapadam atiṅ (*2,2.19) ity ayaṃ nityādhikāre samāso vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:34264: tatra gatikāraka-upapadāt kṛt (*6,2.139) ity uttarapadaprakṛtisvarena citśabdaḥ udāttaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:34265: yas tu vigrahābhāvena nityasamāsas tatra bhavaty eva vikalpaḥ, avācā
GS24jvkasipu:34270: añceḥ parā asarvanāmasthānavibhaktir udāttā bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:34273: tṛtīyādiḥ iti vartamānen śaso 'pi parigrahārtham asarvanāmasthānagrahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:34274: iha api yathā syāt, pratīco bāhūn pratibhaṅgdhyeṣām iti //
GS24jvkasipu:34277: ūṭḥ idam padādi ap pum rai div ity etebhyo 'sarvanāmasthānavibhaktir
GS24jvkasipu:34286: antodāttāt ity adhikārād anvādeśe na bhavati, atho ābhyāṃ nipuṇamadhītam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:34288: padādayaḥ paddannomāsa (*6,1.63) ity evam ādayo niśparyantā iha gṛhyante /
GS24jvkasipu:34314: ghṛtādipāṭhāt aṣṭanśabdo 'ntodāttaḥ, tatra jñaly upottamam (*6,1.180) ity asya apavādo vibhaktir eva+udāttatvaṃ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:34315: dīrghāt iti kim ? aṣṭasu prakrameṣu brāhmaṇo 'gnīnādadhīta /
GS24jvkasipu:34316: idam eva dīrghagrahaṇam aṣṭana āttvavikalpaṃ jñāpayati, kṛtātvasya ca ṣaṭsañjñāṃ jñāpayati
GS24jvkasipu:34318: svaraḥ paratvādanātvapakṣe ṣaṭsvareṇa bādhiṣyate iti kim dīrghagrahaṇena
GS24jvkasipu:34322: anum yaḥ śatṛpratyayas tadantāt parā nadī ajādir vibhaktir asarvanāmasthānam udāttā bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:34333: atra apy upadeśāt iti lasārvadhātukād anudāttatve ekādeśaḥ, tasya ekādeśa udāttena+udāttaḥ (*8,2.5) ity udāttatvam , tasya pūrvatra asiddhatvam
GS24jvkasipu:34348: udāttasthāne yo yaṇ halapūrvas tasmāt parā nadī ajādir yā asarvanāmavidbhaktir udāttā bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:34368: ūṅo dhātoś ca ya udāttayaṇ halapūrvaḥ, tasmāt parā tṛtīyādir vibhaktir
GS24jvkasipu:34375: tena saha ya ekādeśaḥ so 'py udāttaḥ iti udāttayaṇvakāraḥ, tasmād udāttatve pratiṣiddhe udāttasvaritayor yaṇaḥ svarito 'nudāttasya (*8,2.4)
GS24jvkasipu:34385: hrasvāntād antodāttān nuṭaś ca paro matub udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34393: vasuśabda ādyudāttaḥ, tasmān matub anudātta eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34394: atra ca svaravidhau vyañjanam avidyamānavat ity eṣā paribhāṣā na aśrīyate
GS24jvkasipu:34395: nuḍgrahaṇāt, tena marutvān ity atra na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34404: matupi yo hrasvaḥ, tadantād antodāttād anyatarasyāṃ nām udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34408: matupā hrasvaviśeṣanaṃ kim ? bhūtapūrve 'pi hrasve yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:34409: anyathā hi sāmpratika eva syāt, tisṛṇām, catasṛṇām iti /
GS24jvkasipu:34418: ṅyantāt chandasi viṣaye nāmudātto bhavati bahulam /
GS24jvkasipu:34426: ṣaṭsañjjākebhyaḥ, tri catur ity etābhyāṃ ca parā halādir vibhaktir udāttā
GS24jvkasipu:34441: ṣaṭtricaturbhyo yā jñālādir vibhaktiḥ tadante pade upottamaṃ udāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34442: triprabhṛtīnām antyam uttamam, tatsamīpe ca yat tadupottamam /
GS24jvkasipu:34453: ṣaṭ-tri-caturbhyo yā jhalādir vibhaktis tadante pade upottamam udāttaṃ bhavati vibhāṣā bhaṣāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:34460: go śvan, sāvavarṇaḥ sau prathamaikavacane yadavarṇāntam, rāḍ aṅ kruṅ kṛd ity etebhyo yad uktaṃ tan na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34462: sāv ekācas tṛtīyādir vibhaktiḥ (*6,1.168) iti prāptiḥ pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:34468: sāvavarṇaḥ - sau prathamaikavacane yad avarṇāntaṃ tasya grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:34475: aṅ - añcatiḥ kvibantaḥ, tasya sanakārasya grahaṇaṃ viṣayāvadhāraṇārtham,
GS24jvkasipu:34476: yatra asya nalopo na asti tatra pratiṣedho yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:34481: nalopaviṣaye tu bhavaty eva vibhakter udāttatvam /
GS24jvkasipu:34492: divaḥ parā jhalādir vibhaktiḥ na+udāttā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34500: nṛ ity etasmāt parā jhalādir vibhaktiḥ anyatarasyāṃ na+udāttā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34516: tāser anudātteto ṅito 'kārāntopadeśāc ca śabdāt paraṃ lasārvadhātukam anudāttaṃ ca bhavati hnuṅ iṅ ity etābhyāṃ paraṃ varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:34530: yady atra muk akāramātrasya syāt tadā lasārvadhātukam adupadeśād anantaram iti siddho nighātaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:34531: athākārāntasya aṅgasya, tathā api lasārvadhātukānudāttatve kartavye bahiraṅgatvāt asiddhaḥ iti siddham /
GS24jvkasipu:34535: ṅidayaṃ śnuḥ pūrvasya kāryaṃ prati na tu parasya /
GS24jvkasipu:34536: upadeśagrahaṇaṃ kim ? iha ca yathā syāt, pacāvaḥ, pacāmaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:34537: iha ca mā bhūt, hato, hathaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:34539: sārvadhātukam iti kim ? śiśye, śiśyāte, śiśiyare /
GS24jvkasipu:34546: mā hi kārṣṭām, mā hi kārṣṭām /
GS24jvkasipu:34548: mā hi lāviṣṭām, mā hi lāviṣṭām /
GS24jvkasipu:34551: sica ādyudāttatve 'niṭaḥ pitaḥ pakṣe udāttatvaṃ vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:34552: mā hi karṣam, mā hi kārṣam /
GS24jvkasipu:34553: aniṭaḥ iti kim ? mā hi lāvisam /
GS24jvkasipu:34557: lasārvadhātukagrahaṇaṃ yad anuvartate tad aci aniṭi iti sambandhād iha saptamyantam upajāyate svapādir āvṛtkaraṇāt /
GS24jvkasipu:34558: svapādīnāṃ hiṃseś ca ajādavaniṭi lasārvadhātuke parato 'nyatarasyām ādir udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34571: abhyastānām ajādāvaniti lasārvadhātuke parataḥ ādir udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34582: ādiḥ iti vartamāne punar ādigrahaṇaṃ nityārtham //
GS24jvkasipu:34585: avidyamānodātte ca lasārvadhātuke parato 'bhyastānām ādir udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34601: pratyayalakṣaṇe 'py ayaṃ svara iṣyate sarvastomaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:34607: bhī hrī bhṛ hu mada jana dhana daridrā jāgṛ ity eteṣāṃ abhyastānāṃ lasārvadhātuke piti pratyayāt pūrvam udāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34613: madeḥ bahulaṃ chandasi iti vikaraṇasya śluḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34615: jana janane ity asya pañcame lakāre rūpam /
GS24jvkasipu:34616: dhana dhānye ity asya pañcame lakāre dadhanat /
GS24jvkasipu:34634: āmreḍitānudāttatve kṛte pūrvo lolūyaṃśabda ekatrādyudāttaḥ, aparatra litsvareṇa madhyodāttaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:34638: ajantā ye upadeśe dhātavaḥ teṣāṃ kartṛyaki anyatarasyām ādir udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34639: lūyate kedāraḥ svayam eva, lūyate kedāraḥ svayam eva /
GS24jvkasipu:34640: stīryate kedāraḥ svayam eva, stīryate kedaraḥ svayam eva /
GS24jvkasipu:34641: yadā ādyudāttatvaṃ na bhavati tadā lasarvadhātukanighāte kṛte yaka eva svaro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34647: acaḥ iti kim ? bhidyate svayam eva /
GS24jvkasipu:34651: seṭi thali iṭ vā udātto bhavati anto vā ādir vā anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:34653: yadā na+ete trayaḥ svarāḥ , tadā liti pratyayāt pūrvam udāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34656: liti pratyayāt pūrvam udāttam ity ayam eva svaro bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:34659: ñiti niti ca nityam ādir udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34665: pratyayalakṣaṇam atra na+iṣyate, tena gargāḥ, bidāḥ, cañcāḥ ity atra yañi kani ca lupte na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:34672: lumatā 'pi lupte pratyayalakṣaṇam atra+iṣyate, sarpirāgaccha, saptāgaccha iti //
GS24jvkasipu:34676: tayoḥ sarvanāmasthāne parataḥ ādir udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34683: pathipriyaḥ ity atra pūrvapadaprakṛtisvareṇa antodāttaḥ pathiśabdaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:34686: tavaipratyayāntasya antaḥ, caśabdād ādiśca yugapadudāttau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34691: ekavarjam iti vacanād yaugapadyaṃ na syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:34696: puṃsi sañjñāyāṃ ghaḥ prayeṇa (*3,3.118) iti ghapratyayāntasya pratyayasvaraḥ prāptaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34698: nivāse iti kim ? kṣayo vartate dasyūnām /
GS24jvkasipu:34704: puṃsi sañjñāyāṃ ghaḥ prāyeṇa (*3,3.118) iti ghaḥ, tasya pratyayasvaraḥ prāptaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34706: karaṇam iti kim ? jayo vartate brāhmaṇānām /
GS24jvkasipu:34707: atra api erac (*3,3.56) ity ayam ajantaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:34710: vṛṣaḥ ity evam ādīnām ādir udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34718: gayaḥ ity atra gāyater nipātanād etvam /
GS24jvkasipu:34750: tatra kvacit pratyayasvaraḥ prāptaḥ, kvacit karṣātvato ghaño 'nta udāttaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:34762: tatra ive pratikṛtau (*5,3.96) iti yaḥ kan, tasya lummanuṣye (*5,3.98) iti lup /
GS24jvkasipu:34763: yady evaṃ kim artham idam ucyate pratyayalakṣaṇena siddham ādyudāttatvam ?
GS24jvkasipu:34764: etad eva jñāpayati kvacid iha svaravidhau pratyayalakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati iti
GS24jvkasipu:34770: niṣṭhāntaṃ dvyac sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye ādyudāttaṃ bhavati sa ced ādirākāro na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34786: śuṣka dhṛṣṭa ity etāv ādyudāttau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34795: tatra thā 'thaghañ (*6,2.144) iti prāptaḥ svaro bādhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:34803: sañjñāyām, niṣṭhā ca dvyaj anāt (*6,1.205) ity anena pūrvavipratiṣedhena
GS24jvkasipu:34807: juṣṭa arpita iti śabdarūpe chandasi viṣaye vibhāṣā ādyudātte bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34810: chandasi iti kim ? bhāṣāyāṃ pratyayasvareṇa antodāttav etau //
GS24jvkasipu:34813: juṣṭa arpita ity ete śabdarūpe mantraviṣaye nityam ādyudātte bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34817: kecid atra juṣṭa ity etad eva anuvartayanti /
GS24jvkasipu:34819: antodātto 'pi hy ayaṃ mantre paṭhayate, tasmin sākaṃ triśatā na śaṅkavo 'rpitāḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:34822: yuṣmadasmadī madikpratyayānte 'ntodātte, tayor ṅasi parataḥ ādiḥ udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34827: yuṣmadasmadoḥ iti vartate, ādir udāttaḥ iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:34828: ṅe ity etasmiṃś ca parato yuṣmadasmadoḥ ādir udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34836: yat pratyayāntasya dvyaca ādir udātto bhavati na cen nauśabdāt paro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34847: īḍa vanda vṛ śaṃsa duha ity eteṣāṃ yo ṇyat tadantasya ādir udātto bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:34853: dvyanubandhakatvāt ṇyato yad grahaṇena grahaṇaṃ na asti iti tit svaritam
GS24jvkasipu:34855: vāryam iti vṛṅ sambhaktau ity asya ayaṃ ṇyat /
GS24jvkasipu:34856: kyabvidhau hi vṛña eva grahaṇam iṣyate //
GS24jvkasipu:34859: veṇu indhāna ity etayoḥ vibhāṣā ādir udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34862: veṇuśabdo 'yam ajivṛrībhyo nicca iti ṇupratyayānto nitvān nityam
GS24jvkasipu:34865: atha śānajantas tadā lasārvadhatuka-anudāttatve kṛte udāttanivṛttisvareṇa madhyodāttaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:34866: tad evam indhāne sarvathā aprāptam udāttatvaṃ pakṣe vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:34867: veṇur iva veṇuḥ ity upamānaṃ yadā sañjñā bhavati, tadā sañjñāyām upamānam
GS24jvkasipu:34871: tyāga rāga hāsa kuha śvaṭha kratha ity eteṣāṃ vibhāṣā ādir udātto bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:34875: ete ghañantāḥ, teṣāṃ pakṣe karṣātvato ghaño 'nta udāttaḥ (*6,1.159) ity udāttatvam eva bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:34883: triprabhṛtīnām antyam uttamam tasya samīpe yat tad upottamam /
GS24jvkasipu:34892: mā hi cīkaratām, mā hi cīkaratām /
GS24jvkasipu:34893: na māṅyoge (*6,4.74) ity aṭi pratiṣiddhe hi ca (*8,1.34) iti nighāte 'dupadeśāt iti lasārvadhātukānudāttatve iṛte caṅa eva svare prāpte pakṣe dhātvakāra udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34894: upottamagrahaṇād dvyaco na bhavati, mā hi dadhat //
GS24jvkasipu:34897: matoḥ pūrvaḥ ākāra udātto bhavati tac cen matvantaṃ strīliṅge sañjñā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34917: avatyāḥ iti kim ucyate, na vatyā ity evam ucyeta ? na+evaṃ śakyam iha api
GS24jvkasipu:34919: svaravidhau nalopasya asiddhatvān na ayam avatīśabdaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34923: īvatīśabdāntasya anta udāto bhavati striyāṃ sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:34930: tasmin parataḥ pūrvasya anta udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34951: svaravidhau vyañjanamavidyamānavat iti halanteṣv apy antodāttatvaṃ bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:34953: iti kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau ṣaṣṭhādhyāyasya prathamāḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:34957: pūrvapadagrahaṇaṃ atra pūrvapadasthe svare udātte svarite vā vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:34958: bahuvrīhau samāse pūrvapadasya yaḥ svaraḥ sa prakṛtyā bhavati, svabhāvena
GS24jvkasipu:34960: samāsāntodāttatve hi sati anudāttaṃ padam ekavarjam (*6,1.158) iti so 'nudāttaḥ syāt iti samāsāntodāttatvāpavādo 'yam ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:34962: kṛṣṇo mṛgaḥ tasya vikāraḥ kārṣṇaḥ, prāṇi-rajata-ādibhyo 'ñ (*4,3.154) iti añpratyayānto ñisvareṇa ādyudāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34964: yūpaśabdaḥ uṇādiṣu kusuyubhyaś ca iti papratyayāntaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34965: tatra ca dīrghaḥ iti niditi ca vartate tena ādyudāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34976: udāttagrahaṇam svaritagrahaṇaṃ ca atra anuvartate, tena sarvānudātte pūrvapade vidhir eva na asti iti samāsāntodāttatvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34980: tatpuruṣe samāse tulyārthaṃ tṛtīyāntaṃ saptamyantam upamānavāci avyayaṃ dvitīyāntaṃ kṛtyāntaṃ ca yat pūrvapadaṃ tat prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34994: śaṅkupūrvāl lāteḥ ghañarthe kavidhānam iti vā kapratyayāntaḥ śaṅkulāśabdo 'ntodāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34995: kiriśabdo 'pi kirateḥ kṝgṝśṝpṝkuṭi bhidicchidibhyaś ca iti ikārapratyayaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:35011: kumudaśabdo 'pi kau modate iti mūlavibhujāditvāt kapratyayāntaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:35014: nyagrohati iti nyagrodhaḥ, pacāditvād acpratyayāntaḥ tasya nyagrodhasya ca kevalasya (*7,3.5) iti nipātanād hakārasya dhakāro madhyodāttatvaṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:35042: pāṇīyaharaṇīyaśabdayoḥ upottamaṃ riti (*6,1.217) iti īkāra udāttaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:35045: prakṛtyā pūrvapadam, tatpuruṣe iti ca vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:35046: varṇaṃ varṇavāci pūrvapadaṃ varnavāciṣv eva+uttarapadeṣū etaśabdavarjiteṣu paratas tatpuruṣe samase prakṛtisvaram bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35052: lohitaśabdo 'pi ruheraśca lo vā iti itanprayayāntaḥ ādyudāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35059: pramāṇavācini tatpuruṣe samāse gādha lavaṇa ity etayor uttarapadayoḥ pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35068: tatra śamerban iti banpratyayāntatvāc chambaśabda ādyudāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35071: aśvaśabdo aśūpruṣilaṭikaṇikhativiśibhyaḥ kvan iti kvanpratyayāntaḥ ādyudāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35072: pramāṇam iyattāparicchedamātram iha draṣṭavyaṃ na punarāyāma eva /
GS24jvkasipu:35078: tatpuruṣe samāse dāyādaśabde uttarapade dāyādyavāci pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35082: udāttaḥ iti ca tatra vartate, tena ayam antodāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35083: kṝpṝvṛjimandinidhāñbhyaḥ kyuḥ iti bahulavacanāt kevalād api dhāñaḥ kyuḥ pratyayaḥ, tena dhanaśabdaḥ pratyayasvareṇa ādyudāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35084: atha vidyādāyādaḥ iti kena ṣaṣṭhī ? svāmīrīśvarādhipatidāyāda iti /
GS24jvkasipu:35085: yady evaṃ pratipadavidhānā ca ṣaṣṭhī na samasyate iti samāsapratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti ? evaṃ tarhi śeṣalakṣaṇaivātra ṣaṣṭhī, tasyas tu saptamī
GS24jvkasipu:35086: vidhīyamānā bādhikā mā vijñāyi iti punar abhyanujñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:35091: tatpuruṣe samāse cirakṛcchrayor uttarapadayoḥ pratibandhivāci pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:35097: gamanaṃ ca yacciraṃ ca iti viśeṣaṇasamāso 'yam, mayūravyaṃsakādir vā eṣa
GS24jvkasipu:35099: gamanaṃ hi kāraṇavikalatayā virakālabhāvi kṛcchrayogi vā pratibandhi jāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:35103: apadeśo vyājaḥ, tadvācini tatpuruṣe samāse padaśabde uttarapade pūrvapadaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:35107: mūtraśabdaḥ sivimucyoṣṭerū ca iti ṣṭranpratyayāntaḥ, mūtrayater vā ghañantaḥ ādyudāttaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:35111: apadeśe iti kim ? viṣṇoḥ padam viṣṇupadam //
GS24jvkasipu:35114: nivātaśabde uttarapade vātatrāṇavācini tatpuruṣe samāse pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35119: niruddho vāto 'smin iti vā nivātam iti bahuvrīhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35120: tatra kuḍyādihetuke nivāte kuḍyādayo vartamānāḥ samānādhikaraṇena nivātaśabdena saha samasyante
GS24jvkasipu:35122: kuḍyaśabdo 'pi kavater yat ḍakkicca iti yatpratyayānta ādyudātta ity eke /
GS24jvkasipu:35130: anārtavavācini śāradaśabde uttarapade uttarapade tatpuruṣe samāse pūrvapadam prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35135: rajjuśadaḥ sṛjerasum ca iti upratyayāntaḥ ādilopaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:35136: dhānye nit iti ca tatra vartate, tena ādyudāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35137: dṛṣatśabdaḥ dṛṇāteḥ ṣuk hrasvaś ca iti adipratyayānto 'ntodāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35140: śaradi ṛtuviśeṣe bhavaṃ yat tad iha śāradam //
GS24jvkasipu:35143: adhvaryu kaṣāya ity etayoḥ jātivācini tatpuruṣe samāse pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35150: tataḥ kaṭhena proktam iti vaiśampāyana-antevāsibhyaś ca (*4,3.104) iti
GS24jvkasipu:35151: ṇiniḥ, tasya kaṭha-carakāl luk (*4,3.107) iti luk /
GS24jvkasipu:35152: kalāpinā proktam iti kalāpino 'ṇ (*4,3.108), tasmin in aṇy anapatye
GS24jvkasipu:35161: dauvārikaśabdo 'pi dvāri niyuktaḥ iti ṭhaki satyantodāttaḥ eva /
GS24jvkasipu:35166: sadṛśa pratirūpa ity etayoḥ uttarapadayoḥ sādṛśyavācini tatpruṣe samāse pūrvapadam prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35170: ṣaṣṭhīsamāsārthaṃ ca sadṛśagrahaṇam iha tadaluki ṣaṣṭhyāḥ prayojayati,
GS24jvkasipu:35172: atra dāsīvṛṣalīśabdayor antodāttatvād udāttayaṇo hal pūrvat (*6,1.174) iti vibhaktir antodāttā
GS24jvkasipu:35180: dvigāv uttarapade pramaṇavācini tatpuruṣe samāse pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35183: saptaśamāḥ pramāṇam asya iti mātracaḥ utpannasya pramāṇe laḥ dvigor nityam iti luk /
GS24jvkasipu:35184: prācyaś ca asau saptaśamaś ca prācyasaptaśamaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35187: dvigau iti kim ? vrīhiprasthaḥ pramāṇe iti kim ? paramasaptaśamam //
GS24jvkasipu:35190: vāṇijaśabde uttarapade tatpuruṣe samāse gantavyavāci paṇyavāci ca pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35198: gāndhāriśabdaḥ kardamādiṣu paṭhyate, tatra kardamādīnāṃ ca iti pakṣe ādyudātto bhavati, dvitīyo vā /
GS24jvkasipu:35207: mātrā upajñā upakrama chāyā eteṣu uttarapadeṣu napuṃsakavācini tatpuruṣe samāse pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35211: tatra bhikṣāyās tulyapramāṇam iti asvapadavigrahaḥ ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35212: tatra bhikṣāśabdaḥ guroś ca halaḥ (*3,3.103) ity apratyayānto 'ntodāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35213: samudraśabdo 'pi phiṣi pāṭalāpālaṅkāmbāsāgarārthānām ity antodātta eva /
GS24jvkasipu:35218: tatra paṇino 'ptyam ity aṇantaḥ pāṇinaśabdaḥ pratyayasvareṇa antodāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35235: upajñopakramāntasya tatpuruṣasya napuṃsakaliṅgatā upajñopakramaṃ tadādyācikhyāsāyām (*2,3.21) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:35238: iṣuśabdaḥ īṣeḥ kicca ity upratyayāntaḥ, tatra ca dhānye nit iti vartate,
GS24jvkasipu:35240: dhanuḥ śabdo 'pi nabviṣayasya anisantasya ity ādyudātta eva /
GS24jvkasipu:35246: sukha priya ity etayor uttarapadyor hitavācini tatpuruṣe samāse pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:35255: tad dhi hitaṃ yad āyatyaṃ prītiṃ karoti /
GS24jvkasipu:35261: prītau gamayamānāyāṃ sukha priya ity etayoḥ uttapadayoḥ tatpuruṣe samāse pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35272: svāmiśabde uttarapade tatpuruṣe samāse svavāci pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35280: patiśabde uttarapade aiśvaryavācini tatpuruṣe pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35285: gehe kaḥ (*3,1.144) iti prakṛtisvareṇa antodātto gṛhaśabdaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35286: saha inena vartate iti bahuvrīhau prakṛtyā pūrvapadam (*6,2.1) iti senāśabda ādyudāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35287: nṝ naye etasmād ṛdorap (*3,3.57) iti appratyayānta ādyudātto naraśabdaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35293: patiśabde uttarapade aiśvaryavācini tatpuruṣe samāse bhū vāk cit didhiṣū ity etāni pūrvapadāni prakṛtisvarāṇi na bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:35302: patiśabde uttarapade aiśvaryavācini tatpuruṣa samāse bhuvanaśabdaḥ pūrvapadaṃ vā prakṛtisvaram bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35305: rañjeḥ kyun iti vartamāne bhusūdhūbhrāsjibhyaś chandasi iti kyunpratyayānto bhuvanaśabdaḥ ādyudātto vyutpāditaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35306: kathaṃ bhuvanapatirādityaḥ iti ? uṇādayo bahulam (*3,3.1) iti bahulavacanād bhaṣāyām api prayujyate
GS24jvkasipu:35310: āśaṅka ābādha nediyas ity eteṣu uttarapadeṣu sambhāvanavācini tatpuruṣe samāse pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35327: pūrvaśade uttarapade bhūtapūrvavācini tatpuruṣe samāse pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35329: pūrvaśabdo vṛttiviṣaye bhūtapūrve vartate, tatra viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyeṇa iti
GS24jvkasipu:35335: atra pramaścāsau pūrvaś ca iti samāso, na tu paramo bhūtapūrvaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:35336: tathā hi sati udāharaṇam eva bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:35339: savidha sanīḍa samaryāda saveśa sadeśa ity eteṣu sāmīpyavācini tatpuruṣe samāse pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35356: savidhādīnāṃ saha vidhayā ity evam ādikā vyutpattir eva kevalam /
GS24jvkasipu:35359: samīpye iti kim ? saha maryādayā vartate samaryādaṃ kṣetram /
GS24jvkasipu:35364: vispaṣṭādini pūrvapadāni gunavāneṣu uttarapadeṣu prakṛtisvarāṇi bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:35371: vispaṣṭaṃ kaṭukam iti vigṛhya supsupā iti samāsaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35373: kaṭukādibhiś ca śabdair gunavad dravyam abhidhīyate ity asāmānādhikaranyam ato na asti karmadhārayaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:35378: vyaktaśabdaḥ udāttasvaritayor yaṇaḥ svarito 'nudāttasya (*8,2.4) ity ādisvaritaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35379: ye ca atra apare paṭhyante tatra sampannaśabdasthāthādisvareṇa antodāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35382: capalaśabdaścitsvareṇa antodāttaḥ, cuperaccopadhāyāḥ ity atra hi ciditi vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:35399: śra jya avama kan ity eteṣu pāpaśabdavati ca+uttarapade karmadhārye samāse bhāvavāci pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35411: śrajyakanām ādeśānāṃ grahaṇam iti sāmarthyāttadvaduttarapadaṃ gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:35413: bhāve iti kim ? gamyate 'nena iti gamanaṃ tat śreyaḥ, gamanaśreyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35414: karmadhāraye iti kim ? gamanaṃ śreyaḥ gamanaśreyaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:35417: kumāraśabdaḥ pūrvapadaṃ karmadhāraye samāse prakṛtisvaram bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35422: atra kecit lakṣaṇapratipadokayoḥ pratipadoktasya+eva grahaṇam it paribhāṣayā kumāraḥ śramaṇādibhiḥ (*2,1.70) ity atra+eva samāse svaram etam icchanti /
GS24jvkasipu:35427: pratigata enasā, pratigatameno vā yasya sa pratyenāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35428: tasminn uttarapade karmadhāraye kumārasya ādir udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35430: uadāttaḥ ity etad atra sāmarthyād veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:35431: pūrvapadaprakṛtisvara eva hy ayam āder upadiśyate //
GS24jvkasipu:35434: pūgā gaṇāḥ, tadvācini uttarapade karmadhāraye samāse kumārasya anyatarasyām ādir udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35439: cātakādayaḥ pūgaśabdāḥ, tebhyaḥ pūgāññyo 'grāmaṇīpūrvāt (*5,3.112) iti ñyaḥ pratyayaḥ, tasya tadrājasya bahuṣu tena+eva striyām (*2,4.62) iti luk /
GS24jvkasipu:35440: atra yadā ādyudāttatvaṃ na bhavati tadā kumāraś ca (*6,2.26) iti pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratvam eke kurvanti /
GS24jvkasipu:35441: ye tu tatra pratipadoktasya grahaṇam icchanti teṣāṃ samāsāntodāttatvam eva bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:35444: igante uttarapade, kālavācini, kapāla bhagāla śarāva ity eteṣu ca dvigau samāse pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35447: pañcāratnayaḥ pramāṇamasya, daśāratnayaḥ pramāṇamasya iti taddhitārthe
GS24jvkasipu:35448: dviguḥ, pramāṇe laḥ dvigor nityam iti mātraco lopaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35452: pañca māsān bhṛto bhūto bhāvī vā iti taddhitārthe dvigor yap (*5,1.82) /
GS24jvkasipu:35455: varṣāl luk ca (*5,1.88) iti ṭhaño luk /
GS24jvkasipu:35465: saṃskṛtaṃ bhakṣāḥ (*4,2.16) iti taddhitārthe ete samāsāḥ dvigor lug
GS24jvkasipu:35467: igantādiṣu iti kim ? pañcabhir aśvaiḥ krītaḥ pañcāśvaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35471: pañcāratnyo daśāratnyaḥ iti ca yaṇguṇayoḥ bahiraṅgalakṣaṇayor asiddhatvāt sthānivadbhāvād vā dvigusvara igantalakṣaṇaḥ pravartate //
GS24jvkasipu:35474: bahuśabdaḥ pūrvapadam igantādiṣu uttarapadeṣu dvigau samāse 'nyatarasyāṃ
GS24jvkasipu:35482: bahuśabdo 'ntodāttaḥ, tasya prakṛtisvare kṛte yatra yaṇādeśaḥ tatra
GS24jvkasipu:35483: udāttasvaritayor yaṇaḥ svarito 'nudāttasya (*8,2.4) ity eṣa svaro bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:35486: diṣṭi vitasti ity etayor uttarapadayoḥ dvigau samāse pūrvapadam anyatarasyāṃ prakṛtisvaram bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35489: diṣṭivitastī pramāṇe, tena atra mātraco luk //
GS24jvkasipu:35492: saptamyantaṃ pūrvapadaṃ siddha śuṣka pakva bandha ity eteṣu uttarapadeṣu rakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati sā cet saptamī kālān na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35496: phiṣi tu sāṃkāśyakāmpilyanasikyadārvāghāṭānām antaḥ pūrvaṃ vā iti
GS24jvkasipu:35497: paṭhyate, tatra pakṣe madhyodāttāv api bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35513: saptamīsvaraḥ kṛtsvareṇa bādhitaḥ punar ayaṃ vidhīyate //
GS24jvkasipu:35516: pari prati upa apa ity ete pūrvapadabhūtā varjyamānavācini aharavayavavācini rātryavayavavācini ca+uttarapade prakṛtisvarā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:35531: nipātā ādyudāttā upasargāś ca abhivarjam iti ādyudāttāni pūrvapadāni /
GS24jvkasipu:35532: tatpuruṣe bahuvrīhau ca siddhatvāt avyayaībhāvārtho 'yam ārambhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35533: tatra apaparīvarjane vartete, iti tayor eva varjyamānam uttarapadaṃ,
GS24jvkasipu:35535: ahorātrāvayavā api varjyamānā eva tayor bhavanti iti na pṛthagudāhriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:35536: varjyamānāhorātrāvayaveṣu iti kim ? pratyagni śalabhāḥ patanti /
GS24jvkasipu:35537: parivanam ity atra vanaṃ samāse (*6,2.178) ity etad bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:35540: rājanyavācināṃ bahuvacanāntānāṃ yo dvandvo 'ndhakavṛṣṇiṣu vartate tatra pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaram bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35546: śiniśabda ādyudāttaḥ, sa tadapatyeṣv abhedena vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:35548: dvīpe bhavāḥ iti dvīpād anusamudraṃ yañ (*4,3.10) /
GS24jvkasipu:35554: dvandve iti kim ? vṛṣṇīnāṃ kumārāḥ vṛṣṇikumārāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35566: ācāryopasarjanāntevāsināṃ yo dvandvaḥ, tatra pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ
GS24jvkasipu:35572: tena proktam āpiśalam, iñaś ca (*4,2.112) ityaṇ /
GS24jvkasipu:35573: tad adhīyate ye 'ntevāsinaḥ te 'py āpiśalāḥ, proktāl luk (*4,2.64) iti tasya taddhitasyādhyetari vihitasya luk kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:35574: āpiśaler vā chātrāḥ āpiśalāḥ, ity ubhayathāpyācaryopasarjanaścāntevāsī bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35575: ācāryopasarjanagrahaṇaṃ dvandvaviśeṣaṇārtham, sakalo dvandvaḥ ācāryopasarjano yathā vijñāyeta
GS24jvkasipu:35581: kārtakaujapādayo ye dvandvāḥ teṣu pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35586: kṛtasya apatyaṃ, kujapasya apatyam ity aṇantāvetau /
GS24jvkasipu:35594: pīlāyāḥ apatyaṃ pailaḥ, tasya apatyaṃ yuvā iti aṇo dvyacaḥ (*4,1.156) iti vihitasya phiñaḥ pailādibhyaś ca (*2,4.59) iti luk /
GS24jvkasipu:35595: śyāparṇaśabdo bidādiḥ, tasya apatyaṃ strī śyāparṇī, tadapatyaṃ yuvā śyāparṇeyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35596: bahuvacanamatantram, tena pailaśyāparṇeyau ity atra api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35598: kapirantodāttaḥ, tasya apatyaṃ bahutve kapi-bodha-aṅgirase (*4,1.107) iti utpannasya yañaḥ yañañoś ca iti luk, tena atra bahutvam āśrīyata eva /
GS24jvkasipu:35600: śitikākṣo nāma ṛṣiḥ, tasya apatyam iti ṛṣyaṇ, tadapatye yūni ya iñ tasya ṇyakṣatriyārṣañito yūni lugaṇiñoḥ (*2,4.58) iti luk /
GS24jvkasipu:35601: pāñcālasya apatyaṃ strī pāñcālī, tadapatyam yuvā pāñcāleyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35602: atra api bahuvacanam avivakṣitam iti śaitikākṣapañcāleyau ity atra api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35604: kaṭukasya apatyam iti ata iñ (*4,1.95), tasya bahvaca iñaḥ prācyabharateṣu
GS24jvkasipu:35608: śakalasya apatyaṃ śākalyaḥ, tasya chātrāḥ śākalāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35610: śunakasya apataym iti bidādibhyo 'ñ (*4,1.104), tasya bahuṣu luk /
GS24jvkasipu:35612: teṣāṃ śaṇakaśabād utpannasya iñaḥ bahvaca iñaḥ prācyabharateṣu (*2,4.66)
GS24jvkasipu:35623: kunteḥ surāṣṭrasya ca apatyeṣu bahuṣu tannivāse vā janapade dvandvo 'yam /
GS24jvkasipu:35630: atra api apatyeṣu bahuṣu iñaḥ bahvaca iñaḥ prācyabharateṣu (*2,4.66) iti luk kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:35637: kaṭhena proktam adhīyate kaṭhāḥ, vaiśampāyanāntevāsitvāt ṇiniḥ, tasya kaṭhacarakāl luk /
GS24jvkasipu:35639: kalāpino 'ṇ (*4,3.108) ity aṇ pratyayaḥ, tasmin inaṇyanapatye (*6,4.164)
GS24jvkasipu:35640: iti prakṛtibhāve prāpte na antasya ṭilope sabrahmacāripīṭhasarpi ity ādinopasaṅkhyānena ṭilopaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:35642: kuthuminā proktamadhīyate iti prāgdīvyato 'ṇ (*4,1.83), tasya pūrvavat ṭilopaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35645: lokākṣasya vā apatyaṃ laukākṣiḥ, tasya chātrāḥ laukākṣāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35652: maudapaippalādāḥ iti dviḥ paṭhyate, tasya prayojanaṃ pakṣe
GS24jvkasipu:35668: prakṛtyā pūrvapadam iti vartate, dvandve iti nivṛttam /
GS24jvkasipu:35669: mahān ity etat pūrvapadaṃ vrīhi aparāhṇa gṛṣṭi iṣvāsa jābāla bhāra bhārata hailihila laurava pravṛddha ity eteṣu uttarapadeṣu prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35680: mahacchabdo 'ntodāttaḥ, tasya ratipadokto yaḥ samāsaḥ sanmahatparamotkṛṣṭāḥ pūjyamānaiḥ (*2,1.61) iti tatra+eṣa svaraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35681: tena+eṣāṃ ṣaṣṭhīsamāso 'ntodātta eva bhavati, mahato vrīhiḥ mahadvrīhiḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:35683: karmadhāraye 'niṣṭhā (*6,2.46) ity ayam api śreṇyādisamāse vidhiḥ iti
GS24jvkasipu:35687: kṣullaka ity etat pūrvapadaṃ mahāṃś ca vaiśvadeve uttarapade prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35693: uṣṭraśabdaḥ pūrvapadaṃ sādivāmyor uttarapadayoḥ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35700: gośabdaḥ pūrvapadaṃ sāda sādi sārathi ity eteṣu uttarapadeṣu prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35709: taitilakadrū paṇyakambala ity ete samāsāḥ, teṣāṃ dāsībhārādīnāṃ ca
GS24jvkasipu:35717: rikte vibhāṣā (*6,1.208) iti pūrvapadam ādyudāttam antodattaṃ vā /
GS24jvkasipu:35724: aślīladṛḍharūpā iti hi saṃsthānamātreṇa śobhanā niḥśrīkā lāvaṇyavirahitā ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:35729: titilino 'patyaṃ chātro vā taitilaḥ ity aṇantaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35734: pratipadokte hi kṛtyānāṃ samāse dvitīyā dṛtyā ity eṣa vihitaḥ svaritaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35743: śṝsvṛsnihitrapyasivasi ity atra dhānye nit iti vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:35745: oṣo dhīyate 'syām iti karmaṇyadhikaraṇe ca (*3,3.93) iti kipratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35750: yasya tatpuruṣasya pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratvam iṣyate, na ca vihitaṃ, sa sarvo dāsībhārādisu draṣṭavyaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:35753: caturthyantaṃ pūrvapadaṃ tadarthe uttarapade tadabhidheyārthaṃ yat tadvācinyuttarapade prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35758: kusuyubhyaś ca ity atra nit iti vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:35770: arthaśabde uttarapade caturthyantaṃ pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35778: tadarthaviśeṣā eva dāruhiraṇyādayo bhavanti, na tvarthaśabdavācyaṃ sāmānyaṃ ity atadarthārtho 'yam ārambhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35780: etad anena jñāpyate, pūrvo vidhiḥ prakṛtivikṛtyoḥ samāse bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35781: aśvaghāsaḥ, śvaśrūsuram ity atra saty api tādarthye na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:35797: karmadhārye samāse ktānte uttarapade 'niṣṭhāntaṃ pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35805: karmadhāraye iti kim ? śreṇyā kṛtaṃ śreṇikṛtam /
GS24jvkasipu:35809: ahīnavācini samāse ktānte uttarapade dvitīyāntaṃ pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35814: trīṇi śakalāni asya triśakalaḥ, bahuvrīhisvareṇa ādyudāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35826: karmavācini ktānte uttarapade tṛtīyāntaṃ pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:35832: āṅi śrihanibhyāṃ hrasvaś ca iti ahirantodātto vyutpāditaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35836: nāsya khamastīti bahuvrīhau nakulanakheti nakhaśabdo nipātitaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35839: karmaṇi iti kim ? rathena yātaḥ rathayātaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35844: karmavācini ktānte uttarapade gatiranantaraḥ pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35850: vyavahitasya gater ayaṃ svaro na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35852: kārakapūrvasya tu sati śiṣṭatvāt thāthādisvara eva bhavati dūrādāgataḥ iti
GS24jvkasipu:35853: anantaragrahaṇasāmarthyād eva kṛdgrahaṇe gatikārakapūrvasya api ity etan na aśrīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:35854: karmaṇi ity eva, prakṛtaḥ kaṭaṃ devadattaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35858: takārādau ca tuśabdavarjite niti kṛti parato gatir anantaraḥ prakṛtisvaro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35871: tavai ca antaś ca yugapat || PS_6,2.51 ||
GS24jvkasipu:35873: tavaipratyayasya anta udātto bhavati gatiś ca anantaraḥ prakṛtisvaraḥ iti etad ubhayaṃ yugapad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35882: aniganto gatiḥ prakṛtisvaro bhavati añcatau vapratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35885: svarito vā+anudātte padādau (*8,2.6) ity ayam ekādeśaḥ udāttaḥ svarito vā
GS24jvkasipu:35887: anigantaḥ iti kim ? pratyaṅ, pratyañcau, pratyañcaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35890: coraniganto 'ñcatau vapratyayaḥ ity eva svaro bhavati vapratiṣedhena /
GS24jvkasipu:35895: ni adhi ity etau cāñcatau vapratyaye parataḥ prakṛtisvarau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35897: udāttasvaritayor yanaḥ svarito 'nudāttasya (*8,2.4) ity añcater akāraḥ
GS24jvkasipu:35904: īṣat ity etat pūrvapadam anyatarasyāṃ prakrtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35908: īṣadbhedaḥ ity evam ādau kṛtsvara eva bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:35914: dvau suvarṇau parimāṇam asya dvisuvarṇam, tad eva dhanam iti karmadhārayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35915: bahuvrīhāv api paratvād vikalpa eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35922: prathamaśabdaḥ pūrvapadam aciropasampattau gamyamānāyām anyatarasyāṃ prakrtisvaraṃ bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:35925: abhinavavaiyākaraṇaḥ, samprati vyākaraṇam adhyetuṃ pravṛttaḥ ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35928: vaiyākaraṇānāmādyo mukhyo vā yaḥ sa nityo 'ntodāttaḥ eva //
GS24jvkasipu:35931: kataraśabdaḥ katamaśadaś ca pūrvapadam karmadhāraye samāse 'nyatarasyāṃ
GS24jvkasipu:35935: karmadhārayagrahaṇam uttarārtham iha tu pratipadoktatvād eva siddham //
GS24jvkasipu:35946: karmadhāraye ity eva, āryasya brāhmaṇaḥ āryabrāhmaṇaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:35949: rājā ca pūrvapadaṃ brāhmaṇakumārayoḥ uttarapadayoḥ karmadhāraye samāse anyatarasyāṃ prakrtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35952: karmadhāraye ity eva, rājño brāhmaṇaḥ rājabrahamaṇaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35957: rājā iti vartate, anyatarasyām iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:35961: ṣaṣṭhī iti kim ? rājā cāsau pratyenāś ca rājapratyenāḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:35964: ktānte uttarapade nityārthe samāse pūrvapadam anyatarasyāṃ prakrtisvaram bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35969: satata iti yadā bhāve ktaḥ tadā thāthādisvareṇa antodāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35981: rājaśabdaḥ pūrvapadaṃ śilivācini uttarapade praśaṃsāyāṃ gamyamānāyām anyatarasyāṃ prakrtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35992: ita uttaraṃ yad vakṣyāmaḥ tatra pūrvapadasya ādir udātto bhavati ity evaṃ tadveditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:36000: udāttaḥ iti prakṛtyā bhagālam (*6,2.137) iti yāvat //
GS24jvkasipu:36003: saptamyantaṃ hārivāci ca pūrvapadaṃ dharmyevācini haraṇaśabdād anyasminn uttarapade ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36004: hāri iti deyaṃ yaḥ svīkaroti so 'bhidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:36006: dharmo hi anuvṛtta ācāraḥ, tasmād anapetaṃ tena vā prāpyam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:36012: sañjñāyām iti saptamīsamāsaḥ, kāranāmni ca iti vibhakter aluk /
GS24jvkasipu:36017: kvacid ayam ācāro vyavasthitaḥ, stūpādiṣu śāṇādi dātavyam, yājñikādīnām aśvādi iti /
GS24jvkasipu:36022: tasya bījaniṣekād uttarakālaṃ śarīrapūṣṭyarthaṃ yad dīyate haraṇam iti tad ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:36023: paro 'pi kṛtsvaro hārisvareṇa bādhyate vipratiṣedhena ity etad aharaṇe ity anena jñāpyate, tena vāḍavahāryam iti hārisvaraḥ siddho bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:36026: yuktavācini ca samāse pūrvapadam ādyudāttam bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36033: yuktaḥ iti samāhitaḥ, kartavye tatparo yaḥ sa ucyate //
GS24jvkasipu:36036: adhyakṣaśabde uttarapade vibhāṣā pūrvapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36041: pāpaśadaḥ śilpivācini utarapade vibhāṣā ādyudātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36045: samānādhikaraṇasamāsaḥ iti ṣaṣṭhīsamase na bhavati, pāpasya nāpitaḥ pāpanāpitaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:36048: gotravācini antevāsivācini ca+uttarapade mānavabrāhmanayoś ca kṣepavācini
GS24jvkasipu:36051: yo jaṅghādānaṃ dadānyaham iti vātsyaḥ sampadyate sa jaṅghāvātsyaḥ iti kṣipyate /
GS24jvkasipu:36061: kumāryādilābhakāmā ye dākṣādibhiḥ proktāni śāstrāṇy adhīyate tacchiṣyatāṃ vā pratipadyante ta evaṃ kṣipyante /
GS24jvkasipu:36070: atra yasya anyat samāsalakṣaṇaṃ na asti, supsupā ity eva tatra samāsaḥ kartavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36075: maireyaśabde uttarapade tadaṅgavācini pūrvapadāny ādyudāttāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:36078: madyaviśeṣo maireyastasya guḍavikārasya gudo 'ṅgaṃ bhavati, madhuvikārasya tasya madhu aṅgam
GS24jvkasipu:36084: bhaktamannam, tadākhyās tadvācinaḥ śabdāḥ, tadartheṣu uttarapadeṣu ādyudāttā bavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:36090: samaśanaṃ samāśaḥ iti kriyāmātram ucyate, na dravyam /
GS24jvkasipu:36095: gavādiṣu upamānavāciṣu uttarapadeṣu pūrvapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36102: dhānyaṃ gaur iva iti vigṛhya vyāghrāder ākṛtigaṇatvād upamitaṃ vyāghrādibhiḥ iti samāsaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36108: akapratyayānte uttarapade jīvikārthavācini samāse pūrvapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36113: dantalekhanādibhir yeṣāṃ jīvikā ta evam ucyante /
GS24jvkasipu:36117: jīvikārthe iti kim ? ikṣubhakṣikāṃ me dhārayasi //
GS24jvkasipu:36120: prāgdeśavartināṃ yā krīḍā tadvācini samāse akapratyayānte uttarapade pūrvapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36133: aṇante uttarapade niyuktavācini samāse pūrvapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36138: niyukto 'dhikṛtaḥ, sa ca kasmiṃścit kartavye tatparo na bhavati iti niyuktaḥ ity anena sidhyati /
GS24jvkasipu:36143: śilpivācini samāse aṇante uttarapade pūrvapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati, sa cedaṇ kṛño na bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:36153: sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye aṇante uttarapade akṛñaḥ pūrvapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36156: akṛñaḥ ity eva, rathakāro nāma brāhmaṇaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:36159: go tanti yava ity etāni pūrvapadāni pālaśabde adyudāttani bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:36174: upamānavāci pūrvapadaṃ śabdārthaṃprakṛtau eva ṇinante uttarapade ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36179: upamānagrahanam asya pūrvasa ca yogasya viṣayavibhāgārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:36182: prakṛtigrahaṇaṃ kim ? prakṛtir eva yatra+upasarganirapekṣā śabdārthā bhavati tatra+eva yathā syād, iha mā bhūd gardabhoccārī, kokilābhivyāhārī iti /
GS24jvkasipu:36185: śabdārthaprakṛtau tv anupamānamupamānaṃ ca ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36197: ete ṇinantāḥ ṇini (*6,2.79) ity asya+eva+udāharanārthaṃ pathyante purvottarapadaniyamārthā iti kecit /
GS24jvkasipu:36198: iha mā bhūt, vṛkṣārohi, yuktādhyāyī iti /
GS24jvkasipu:36211: ekaḥ śitiḥ pādo 'sya iti tripado bahuvrīhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36212: tatra ekaśitiśabdas taddhitārthottarapadaḥ iti tatpuruṣasañjñaḥ, tasya nimittisvarabalīyastvād antodāttatvaṃ prāptam ity ādyudāttatvaṃ vidhīyate
GS24jvkasipu:36213: evam api na artha etena, iganta dvigau (*6,2.29) iti siddhatvāt ? evaṃ tarhi jñāpanārtham
GS24jvkasipu:36214: etaj jñāpayati śityantasya+uttarapade dvigusvaro na bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:36215: tena dviśitipād ity atra tiśabda udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36216: nimittisvarabalīyastvasya apy ekaśitipātsvaravacanam eva jñāpakaṃ varṇayanti /
GS24jvkasipu:36217: pātresamitādayaś ca yuktārohyādayas tatas te 'py ādyudāttā bhavanti //
GS24jvkasipu:36220: dīrghāntaṃ pūrvapadam, kāśa tuṣa bhrāṣṭra vaṭa ity etāni ca je uttarapade
GS24jvkasipu:36230: je uttarapade bahvacaḥ pūrvapadasya antyāt pūrvam udāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36238: grāmaśabde uttarapade pūrvapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati na ced nivasadvāci bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36246: dākṣyādayo nivasanti yasmin grāme sa teṣām iti vyapadiśyate //
GS24jvkasipu:36267: yāny atra nivāsanām adheyāni teṣu nivasadvācīni api pūrvapadāni ādyudāttāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:36283: yadā śālāntas tatpuruṣo napuṃsakaliṅgo bhavati tadā api tatpuruṣe śālāyāṃ napuṃsake (*6,2.123) ity etasmāt pūrvavipratiṣedhena pūrvapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36288: prasthaśabde uttarapade karkyādivarjitam avṛddhaṃ pūrvapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36310: prasthe uttarapade mālādīnam ādir udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36324: ekāśoṇāśabdayoḥ eṅ prācāṃ deśe (*1,1.75) iti vṛddhasajñā //
GS24jvkasipu:36327: nagaraśabde uttarapade mahannavaśabdavarjitaṃ pūrvapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati, tac ced udīcāṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36334: arme ca avarṇam dvyac tryac || PS_6,2.90 ||
GS24jvkasipu:36336: armaśabde uttarapade dvyac tryac pūrvapadam avarṇāntam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36347: bhūta adhika sañjīva madra aśman kajjala ity etāni pūrvapadāni armaśabde uttarapade nādyudāttāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:36362: ita uttaraṃ yad vakṣyāmas tatra pūrvapadasya antaḥ udātto bhavati ity evaṃ veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:36367: prāk uttarapadādiḥ (*6,2.111) ity etasmād ayam adhikāro veditavyaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:36369: sarvaśabdaḥ pūrvapadam guṇakārtsnye vartamānam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36375: āśrayavyāptyā paramatvaṃ śvetatvasya iti guṇakārtsnye vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:36378: kārtsnye iti kim ? sarveṣāṃ śvetatatraḥ sarvaśvetaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36379: guṇāttareṇa samāsastaralopaś ca vaktavyaḥ ity evam atra samāsastaralopaś ca //
GS24jvkasipu:36382: sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye giri nikāya ity etayoḥ uttarapadayoḥ pūrvapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36392: kumāryām uttarapade vayasi gamyamāne pūrvapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36395: kumārīśabdaḥ puṃsā sahāsaṃprayogamātraṃ pravṛttinimittam upādāya prayukto vṛddhādibhir vayo viśeṣavacanaiḥ samānādhikaraṇo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36396: tac ca vayaḥ iha gṛhyate, na kumāratvam eva /
GS24jvkasipu:36401: tadvācini samāse udakaśabde uttarapade pūrvapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36404: svare kṛte ekādeśaḥ svarito vānudātte padādau (*8,2.6) iti pakṣe svarito
GS24jvkasipu:36410: dvigau uttarapade kratuvācini samāse pūrvapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36421: sabhāśabde uttarapade napuṃsakaliṅge samāse pūrvapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:36429: sabhāyāṃ pratipadoktaṃ napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ gṛhyate iti samaṇīyasabham,
GS24jvkasipu:36433: puraśabde uttarapade prācām deśe pūrvapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36442: ariṣta gauḍa ity evaṃ pūrve samāse puraśabde uttarapade pūrvapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36445: pūrvagrahaṇaṃ kim ? iha api yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:36450: hāstina phalaka mārdeya ity etāni pūrvapadāni puraśabde uttarapade na antodāttāni bhavanti
GS24jvkasipu:36459: kusūla kūpa kumbha śālā ity etāni pūrvapadāni bilaśabde uttarapade antodāttāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:36467: dikśabdāḥ pūrvapadāni antodāttani bhavanti grāmajanapadākhyānavāciṣu uttarapadeṣu, cānarāṭaśabde ca /
GS24jvkasipu:36493: uttarapadasya (*7,3.10) ity adhikṛtya yā vihitā vṛddhiḥ, tadvaty uttarapade sarvaśabdo dikśabdāś ca antodāttā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:36501: adhikāralakṣaṇād iha na bhavati, sarvamāsaḥ, sarvakārakaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:36504: bahuvrīhau samāse viśvaśabdaḥ pūrvapadaṃ sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye 'ntodāttaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:36510: bahuvrīhau iti kim ? viśve ca te devāḥ viśvadevāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36511: sañjñāyām iti kim ? viśve devā asya viśvadevaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36512: viśvāmitraḥ, viśvājinaḥ ityatra sañjñāyāṃ mitrājinayoḥ (*6,2.165) ity etad bhavati paratvāt
GS24jvkasipu:36516: udara aśva iṣu ity eteṣu uttarapadesu bahuvrīhau samāse sañjñāyāṃviṣaye pūrvapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36525: kṣepe gamyamāne udarādiṣu uttarapadeṣu bahuvrīhau samāse sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye pūrvapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36532: anudaraḥ, sūdaraḥ ity atra nañsubhyām (*6,2.172) ity etad bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:36536: bahuvrīhau samāse bandhuny uttarapade nadyantaṃ pūrvapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36544: bahuvrīhau samāse niṣṭhāntam upasargapūrvaṃ pūrvapadam anatarasyām anatodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36547: yadi mukhaśabdaḥ svāṅgavācī tadā pakṣe mukhaṃ svāṅgam (*6,2.167) ity etad bhavati, na cet pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratvena gatir anantaraḥ (*6,2.49) ity etad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36553: yad ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāma uttarapadasya ādir udātto bhavati ity evaṃ tadveditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:36559: ādiḥ iti prakṛtyā bhagālam (*6,2.127) iti yāvat //
GS24jvkasipu:36561: bahuvrīhau samāse varṇavācino lakṣaṇavācinaś ca karṇaśabda uttarapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:36567: paśūnāṃ vibhāgajñāpanārthaṃ dātraśaṅkupratirūpakaṃ karṇādiṣu cihnaṃ yat kriyate tad iha lakṣaṇaṃ gṛhyate, tena sthūlakarṇaḥ ity atra na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36573: sañjñāyām aupamye ca yo bahuvrīhir vartate tatra karṇaśabda uttarapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:36580: kaṇṭha pṛṣṭha grīvā jaṅghā ity etāni uttarapadāni bahuvrīhau samāse sañjñaupamyayor ādyudāttāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:36601: śṛṅgaśabdaḥ uttārapadam avasthāyāṃ sañjñau pamyayoś ca bahuvrīhau ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36610: naña uttare jaramaramitramṛtā bahuvrīhau samāse ādyudāttā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:36616: jarādayaḥ iti kim ? aśatruḥ, nañsubhyam (*6,2.172) iti uttarapadāntodāttatvam eva atra bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:36619: soḥ uttaraṃ manantam asantaṃ ca bahuvrīhau samāse ādyudāttaṃ bhavati lomoṣasī varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:36634: aninasmaṅgrahaṇānyarthavatā ca anarthakena ca tadantavidhiṃ prayojayanti ity anarthakayor api manasor iha grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:36636: kapi tu paratvāt kapi pūrvam ity etad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36641: kratvādayaḥ soruttare bahuvrīhau samāse ādyudāttā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:36653: yad ādyudāttaṃ dvyac uttarapadaṃ babuvrīhau samāse soruttaraṃ tad ādyudāttam eva bhavati chandasi visaya /
GS24jvkasipu:36656: ādyudāttam iti kim ? yā subāhuḥ svaṅguriḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36663: vīra vīrya ity etau ca śabdau śoruttarau bahuvrīhau samāse chandasi viṣaye ādyudāttau bhavataḥ
GS24jvkasipu:36666: vīryam iti yatpratyayāntaṃ tatra yato 'nāvaḥ (*6,1.123) iti ādyudāttatvaṃ na bhavati ity etad eva vīryagrahaṇaṃ jñāpakam /
GS24jvkasipu:36667: tatra hi sati pūrveṇa+eva siddhaṃ syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:36670: kūla tīra tūla mūla śālā akṣa sama ity etāni uttarapadāni avayībhāvasamāse ādyudāttāni bhavanti
GS24jvkasipu:36696: kaṃsa mantha śūrpa pāyya kāṇḍa ity etāni uttarapadāni dvigau samāse ādyudāttāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:36710: śālāśabdānte tatpuruṣe samāse napuṃsakaliṅge uttarapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36715: śālāyām iti kim ? brāhmaṇasenam napuṃsake iti kim ? brāhmaṇaśālā //
GS24jvkasipu:36718: tatpuruṣe samāse napuṃsakaliṅge kanthāśabdaḥ uttarapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36727: kanthānte tatpuruṣe samāse napuṃsakaliṅge cihaṇādīnām ādir udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36742: ādiḥ iti vartamāne punar ādigrahaṇaṃ pūrvapadādyudāttārtham //
GS24jvkasipu:36745: cela kheṭa katuka kāṇḍa ity etāni uttarapadāni tatpuruse samāse garhāyāṃ gamyamānāyām ādyudāttāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:36755: tatra putraḥ celam iva iti vigṛhya vyāghrāder ākṛtigaṇatvād upamitaṃ vyāghrādibhiḥ iti samāsaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:36760: cīramuttarapadam upamānavāci tatpuruṣe samāse ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36767: palala sūpa śāka ity etāny uttarapadāni miśravācini tatpuruṣe samāse ādyudāttani bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36779: kūla sūda sthala karṣa ity etāni uttarapadāni tatpuruṣe samāse sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye ādyudāttani bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:36793: karmadhārayavarjite tatpuruṣe samāse rājyam ity etad uttarapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36802: vagya ity evam ādīni uttarapadāni akarmadhāraye tatpuruṣe samāse ādyudattāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:36809: digādiṣu tu varga pūga gaṇa pakṣa ity evam ādayo ye paṭhitāḥ, te eva yatpratyayāntā vargyādayaḥ iha pratipattavyā //
GS24jvkasipu:36812: putraśabdaḥ puṃśabdebhya uttaras tatpuruṣe ādyudatto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36826: ācāryādyākhyebhyaḥ paraḥ putraśabdo nadyudātto bhavati ākhyāgrahaṇāt svarūpasya paryāyāṇāṃ viśeṣāṇāṃ ca grahaṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36846: uttarapadādiḥ iti vartate, tatpuruṣe iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:36847: cūrṇādīni uttarapadāni aprāṇivācinaḥ ṣaṣṭhyantāt parāṇi tatpuruṣe samāse ādyudāttāni bhavanti
GS24jvkasipu:36866: tatra+upagrahaḥ iti ṣaṣṭhyantam eva pūrvācāryopacāreṇa gṛhyate //
GS24jvkasipu:36869: ṣaṭ purvoktāni kāṇḍādīni uttarapadāni aprāṇiṣaṣṭhyā ādyudāttani bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:36870: kāṇḍaṃ gahāryām ity uktam, agarhāyām api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36873: cīram upamānam (*6,2.127) ity uktam, anupamānam api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36876: palalasūpaśākaṃ miśre (*6,2.128) ity uktam, anupamānam api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36879: palala-sūpa-śākaṃ miśre (*6,2.128) ity uktam, amiśre 'pi bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36883: kūlaṃ sañjñāyām (*6,2.129) ity uktam, asañjñāyām api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36890: kuṇḍam ity etat uttarapadaṃ vanavāci tatpuruṣe samāse ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36901: prakṛtyā ity etad adhikṛtam antaḥ (*6,2.143) iti yāvad veditavyam //
GS24jvkasipu:36904: śiteḥ uttarapadaṃ nityaṃ yad abahvaj bhasacchabdavarjitaṃ bahuvrīhau samāse tat prakṛtisvaram bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36911: nityagrahaṇam kim ? śitikakut kakudasya vasthāyāṃ lopo vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:36912: tatra avasthāyā anyatra śitikakuda iti bahvajuttarapadaṃ bhavati iti tena na nityābahvac /
GS24jvkasipu:36914: bahuvrīhau iti kim ? śiteḥ pādaḥ śitipādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36920: tatpuruṣe iti vartate, na bahuvrīhau iti /
GS24jvkasipu:36921: gateḥ kārakāt upapadāt ca kṛdantam uttarapadaṃ tatpuruṣe samāse prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36933: gatikāra - kopapadāt iti kim ? devadattasya kārakaḥ devadattakārakaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36936: prapacatitarām, prapacatitamām ity atra tarabādyantena samāse kṛte
GS24jvkasipu:36938: tatra sati śiṣṭatvād āma eva svaro bhavati ity eke /
