GS24jvkasipu:36943: vanaspatyādiṣu samāseṣu ubhe pūrvottarapade yugapat prakṛtisvare bhavataḥ
GS24jvkasipu:36948: tadbṛhatoḥ karapatyoś coradevatayoḥ suṭ talopaś ca iti suṭ takāralopaś ca
GS24jvkasipu:36953: kecit tu śārṅgaravādisu paṭhanti teṣām ādyudāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36956: na pāti na pālayati vā napāt kvibantaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36960: narā asmin āsīnāḥ śaṃsanti, narā evaṃ śaṃsanti iti vā narāśaṃsaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36966: śuna itva śepaḥ asya iti bahuvrīhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36967: tatra śepapucchalāṅgūleṣu śunaḥ sañjñāyām (*6,3.21) iti ṣaṣṭhyā aluk /
GS24jvkasipu:36971: tayor dvandve anyeṣām api dṛśyate (*6,3.167) iti dīrghatvam /
GS24jvkasipu:36978: viśvavayaḥśabdo 'pi bahuvrīhau viśvaṃ sañjñāyām (*6,2.106) iti viśvaśado 'ntodāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36986: devatāvācināṃ yo dvandvas tatra yugapadubhe pūrvottarapade prakṛtisvare bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36992: varuṇa unanpratyayāntaḥ, tena ādyudāttaḥ bṛhaspatiśabde vanaspatyāditvāt dvāv udāttau, tena indrābṛhaspatī ity atra traya udāttā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:37002: uttarapadagrahaṇam anudāttādau ity uttarapadaviśeṣaṇaṃ yathā syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:37012: manthin - śukrāmanthinau mantho 'sya asti iti manthī /
GS24jvkasipu:37014: pṛthivyādiṣu tu ubhe yugapat prakṛtisvare bhavata eva //
GS24jvkasipu:37018: yad ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmas tatra samāsasya+uttarapadasya antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:37024: tha atha ghañ kta ac ap itra ka ity evam antānām uttarapadānāṃ gatikārakopapadāt pareṣām antaḥ udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37027: hanikuṣinīramikāśibhyaḥ kthan iti ave bhṛñaḥ iti ca kthanpratyayāntāv etau
GS24jvkasipu:37030: upasarge vaseḥ iti athanpratyayaḥ ghañ - prabhedaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37038: kṣayo nivāse (*6,1.201) jayaḥ karaṇam (*6,1.202) iti ca ādyudāttau
GS24jvkasipu:37046: gāṃ varṣati, kharīṃ varṣati iti mūlavibhujāditvāt kapratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37055: su ity etasmād upamānāc ca paraṃ ktāntam uttarapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37062: suśabdāt gatir anantaraḥ (*6,2.49) iti prāpte upamānā dapi tṛtīyā karmaṇi
GS24jvkasipu:37067: sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye gatikārakopapadād ktāntam uttarapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati ācitādīn varjayitvā
GS24jvkasipu:37071: sambhūtaḥ iti pratyarthāt bhavateḥ karmaṇi ktaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37072: gatir anantaraḥ (*6,2.49) ity atra hi karmaṇi ity anuvartate,
GS24jvkasipu:37077: tṛtīyā karmaṇi (*6,2.48) iti prāptir iha bādhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:37088: saṃhitāśabdo yadā goranyasya sañjñā tadā antodatto na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37089: yadā tu goḥ sañjñā tadā antodātta eva //
GS24jvkasipu:37092: pravṛddhādīnāṃ ca ktāntam uttarapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37099: yānadīnām atra gaṇe pāṭhaḥ prāyovṛttipradarśanārthaḥ, na viṣayaniyamārthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37100: yānādibhyo 'nyatra api teṣām antodāttatvam bhavaty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:37104: tena punarutsyūtaṃ vāso deyam, punarniṣkṛto rathaḥ ity evam ādi siddhaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:37108: sañjñāyām iti vartate, ktaḥ iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:37109: sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye āśiṣi gamyamānāyāṃ kārakād uttarayoḥ dattaśrutayor eva ktāntayor anta udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37112: kārakāt iti kim ? kārakān niyamo mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:37115: etasmān niyamād atra sañjñāyām anācitādīnām (*6,2.146) ity antodāttatvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37116: tṛtīyā karmaṇi (*6,2.48) ity eva atra bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37117: evakārakaraṇaṃ kim ? kārakāvadhāraṇaṃ yathā syat, dattaśrutāvadhāraṇaṃ mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:37118: akārakād api dattaśrutayor anta udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37121: āśiṣi iti kim ? anāaśiṣi niyamo mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:37123: kārakād dattaśrutayor āśisyeva ity evam atra niyama iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:37124: tena āhato nadati devadattaḥ ity atra na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37126: tatra tṛtīyā karmaṇi (*6,2.48) iti pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratvam eva bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:37130: itthaṃbhūtena kṛtam ity etasminn arthe yaḥ samaso vartate tatra ktāntam uttarapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37135: kṛtam iti kriyāsāmānye karotirvartate, nābhūtaprādurbhāva eva /
GS24jvkasipu:37137: tṛtīyā karmaṇi (*6,2.48) ity asya ayam apavādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37138: bhāve tu yadā pralapitādayas tadā thāthādisvareṇa+eva siddham antodāttatvaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:37141: anapratyayāntam uttarapadaṃ bhāvavacanaṃ karmavacanaṃ ca kārakāt paramantodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37147: karmaṇi ca yena saṃsparśāt kartuḥ śarīrasukham (*3,3.116) ity ayaṃ yogaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:37149: karmaṇyupapade bhāve lyuḍ bhavati, karmaṇyabhidheye lyuḍ bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:37150: tatra pūrvasmin sūtrārthe bhāvavacanodāharaṇāni, uttaratra karmavacanodāharaṇāni /
GS24jvkasipu:37160: mannantaṃ ktinnantaṃ vyākhyāna śayana sthāna ity etāni yājakādayaḥ krītaśabdaś ca+uttarapadam anatodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37177: yājakādayo ye yājakadibhiś ca (*2,2.9) iti ṣaṣṭhīsamāsārthāḥ paṭhyante ta
GS24jvkasipu:37182: krītaśabde tu tṛtīyā karmaṇi (*6,2.48) ity asya apavādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37188: saptamyantāt paraṃ puṇyam ity etad uttarapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37192: tatpuruṣe tulyārtha iti pūrvapadakṛtisvaratvaṃ prāptam ity antodāttatvaṃ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:37193: uṇādīnāṃ tu vyutpattipakṣe kṛtsvareṇa ādyudāttaḥ puṇyaśabdaḥ syāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:37194: saptamyāḥ iti kim ? vedena puṇyam vedapunyam //
GS24jvkasipu:37197: ūnārthāny uttarapadāni kalahaśabdaś ca tṛtīyāntāt parāṇyanatodāttāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:37205: atra kecid arthe iti svarūpagrahaṇam icchanti /
GS24jvkasipu:37207: ūnaśabdena+eva tvarthanirdeśarthena tadarthānāṃ grahaṇam iti pratipadoktatvād eva tṛtīyāsamāsaparigrahe siddhe tṛtīyāgrahaṇaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:37212: miśra ity etad uttarapadam anupasargaṃ tṛtīyāntāt param antodāttaṃ bhavati asandhau gamyamāne
GS24jvkasipu:37218: iha anupasargagrahaṇaṃ jñāpakam anyatra miśragahaṇe sopasargagrahaṇasya /
GS24jvkasipu:37219: tena miśraślakṣṇaiḥ iti sopasargeṇa api miśraśabdena tṛtīyāsamāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37222: sandhiḥ iti hi paṇabandhena aikārthyam ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:37223: kecit punar āhuḥ gṛhyamāṇaviśeṣā pratyāsattiḥ sandhiḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:37224: atra rājño brāhmaṇaiḥ saha deśapratyāsattāv api satyāṃ mūrtivibhāgo gṛhyate iti brāhmaṇamiśro rajā iti pratyudāhriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:37228: sampādi arha hita alam ity evam arthā ye taddhitāḥ tadantāni uttarapadāni naño guṇapratiṣedhe vartamānāt parāṇi antodāttāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:37229: sampādi-karṇaveṣṭakābhyāṃ sampādi mukhaṃ kārṇaveṣṭakikam, na kārṇaveṣṭakikam akārṇaveṣṭakikam
GS24jvkasipu:37230: arhaṃ - chedamarhati chaidikaḥ, na chaidikaḥ acchaidikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37231: hita - vatsebhyo hitaḥ vatsīyaḥ, na varsīyaḥ avarsīyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37232: alamartha - santāpāya prabhavati sāntāpikaḥ, na sāntāpikaḥ asāntāpikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37233: nañaḥ iti kim ? gardabharatham arhati, gārdabharathikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37237: tatpratiṣedho yatra+ucyate samāse tatra ayaṃ vidhiḥ karnaveṣṭakābhyāṃ /
GS24jvkasipu:37239: sampādyarhahitālamarthāḥ iti kim ? pāṇinīyam adhīte pāṇinīyaḥ, na pāṇinīyaḥ apāṇinīyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37240: taddhitāḥ iti kim ? anyāṃ voḍhumarhati kanyāvoḍhā, na voḍhā avoḍhā /
GS24jvkasipu:37244: ya yat ity etau yau taddhitāv atadarthe vartate tadantasya+uttarapadasya
GS24jvkasipu:37246: pāśānāṃ samūhaḥ pāśyā, na pāśyā apāśyā /
GS24jvkasipu:37248: yat - danteṣu bhavaṃ dantyam, na dantyam adantyam /
GS24jvkasipu:37250: atadarthe iti kim ? pādārthamudakaṃ pādyam, na pādyam apādyam /
GS24jvkasipu:37253: niranubandhakaikānubandhakayor yayator grahaṇād iha na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:37254: vāmadevāḍḍyaḍḍyau (*4,2.5) vāmadevyam, na vāmadevyam avāmadevyam iti //
GS24jvkasipu:37257: ac ka ity evam antam aśaktau gamyamānāyām uttarapadaṃ nañaḥ paramantodattaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37266: ākrośe ca gamyamāne nañaḥ uttaramackāntam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37273: akrośe gamyamāne nañaḥ param uttarapadaṃ sañjñāyāṃ vartamānam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37279: kṛtya uka iṣṇuc ity evam antāś cārvādayaś ca nañaḥ uttare 'ntodāttāḥ
GS24jvkasipu:37287: iṣṇuj - grahaṇe kartari bhuvaḥ khiṣṇuc (*3,2.57) ity asya dvyanubandhakasya api grahaṇam ikārāder vidhānasāmarthyād bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37318: tṛnnanta anna tīkṣṇa śuci ity eteṣu naña uttareṣu vibhāṣā antaḥ udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37326: bahuvrīhau samāse idam etad tad ity etebhyaḥ uttarasya prathamaśabdasya pūraṇapratyayāntasya ca kriyāgaṇane vartamānasya anataḥ udāttaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37327: idaṃ prathamaṃ gamanaṃ bhojanaṃ vā yasya sa idaṃprathamaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37340: prathamapūraṇayoḥ iti kim ? tāni bahūnyasya tadbahuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37341: kriyāgaṇane iti kim ? ayaṃ prathama eṣāṃ te idaṃprathamāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37343: gaṇane iti kim ? ayaṃ prathama eṣām te idaṃprathamāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37345: uttarapadasya kāryitvāt kapi pūrvam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37347: bahuvrīhau ity etat vanaṃ samāse (*6,2.178) iti prāgetasmād adhikṛtam
GS24jvkasipu:37351: saṅkhyāyāḥ paraḥ stanaśabdo bahuvrīhau samāse 'ntodātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37359: chandasi viṣaye bahuvrīhau samāse saṅkhyāyāḥ paraḥ stanaśabdo vibhāsā 'ntodātto bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:37360: dvistanāṃ karoti dyāvāpṛthivyordohāya catuḥstanāṃ karoti paśūnāṃ dohāyāṣṭastanāṃ karoti chandasāṃ dohāya //
GS24jvkasipu:37363: sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye bahuvrīhau samāse mitra ajina ityetayoḥ uttarapadayoḥ antaḥ udātto bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:37375: vyavāyī vyavadhātā, tadvācinaḥ pramanataraṃ bahuvrīhau samāse antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37385: mukham uttarapadaṃ svāṅgavāci bahuvrīhau samāse 'ntodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37392: avyaya dikśabda go mahat sthūla muṣṭi pṛthu vatsa ity etebhyaḥ paraṃ mukhaṃ svāṅgavāci bahuvrīhau samāse na antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37407: niṣṭhāntāt upamānavācinaś ca mukhaṃ svāṅgam uttarapadam anyatarasyām bahuvrīhau samāse 'ntodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37409: yadā+etad uttarapadāntodāttatvaṃ na bhavati tadā niṣṭhopasargapūrvam anyatarasyām (*6,2.110) iti pakṣe pūrvapadāntodāttatvaṃ, tadabhāvapakṣe
GS24jvkasipu:37415: jātivācinaḥ ācchādanavarjitāt kālavācinaḥ sukhādibhyaś ca paraṃ ktāntaṃ kṛtamitapratipannān varjayitvā bahuvrīhau samāse 'ntodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37433: etesu bahuvrīhiṣu niṣṭhāntasya pūrvanipāto na bhavaty eva asmād eva jñāpakāt /
GS24jvkasipu:37438: jātaśabde uttarapade vā anta udātto bhavati bahuvrīhau samāse jātikālasukhādibhyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37447: nañsubhyāṃ param uttarapadaṃ bahuvrīhau samāse 'ntodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37455: samāsāntāś ca avayavā bhavanti iti anṛcaḥ, bahvṛcaḥ ity atra kṛte samāsānte 'ntodāttatvaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:37458: nañsubhyā kapi parataḥ pūrvam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37467: hrasvo 'nto yasya tad idaṃ hrasvāntam uttarapadaṃ samāso vā, tatra antyāt pūrvam udāttaṃ bhavati kapi parato nañsuhyāṃ paraṃ bahuvrīhau samāse /
GS24jvkasipu:37473: pūrvam iti vartamane punaḥ pūrvagrahaṇaṃ pravṛttibhedena
GS24jvkasipu:37474: niyamapratipattyartham, hrasvānte 'ntyāt pūrvam udāttaṃ bhavati, na kapi pūrvam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:37475: tena ajñakaḥ, sujñakaḥ ity atra kabantasya+eva antodāttatvaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:37478: utarapadārthabahutve yo bahuśabdo vartate tasmāt naña iva svaro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37479: nañsubhyām (*6,2.172) ity uktam, bahor api tathā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37482: kapi pūrvam (*6,2.173) ity uktam, bahor api tathā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37486: hrasvānte 'nto 'ntyāt pūrvam (*6,2.174) ity uktam, bahor api tathā bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:37490: naño jaramaramitramṛtāḥ (*6,2.116) ity uktam, bahor api tathā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37495: uttarapadabhūmni iti kim ? bahuṣu manaḥ asya bahumanāḥ ayam //
GS24jvkasipu:37498: buṇādayo 'vayavavācino bahor uttare bahuvrīhau nāntodāttāḥ bhavanti bahuguṇā rajjuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37508: upasargāt svāṅgaṃ dhruvaṃ parśuvarjitam antodāttaṃ bhavati bahuvrīhau samāse /
GS24jvkasipu:37512: dhruvam ity ekarūpam ucyate, dhruvam asya śītam iti yathā /
GS24jvkasipu:37513: satataṃ yasya pragataṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ bahvati sa prapṛṣṭhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37521: samāsamātre vanam ity etad uttarapadam upasargāt paramantodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37525: samāsagrahaṇaṃ samāsamātraparigrahārtham, bahuvrīhāv eva hi syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:37533: antaḥśabdaś ca uttarapadam upasargād antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37539: ni vi ity etābhyām uttaro 'ntaḥśabdo na anatodātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37543: tatra udāttasvaritayor yaṇaḥ svarito 'nudāttasya (*8,2.4) iti svarito bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:37546: parer uttaram abhitobhavivacanaṃ maṇḍalaṃ ca antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37555: yac ca+evaṃ svabhāvaṃ kūlādi tad abhitobhāvigrahaṇena gṛhyate //
GS24jvkasipu:37576: niṣkrāntaḥ kālakāt iti kanpratyayāntena kālaśabdena prādisamāsaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37601: upasargāt svāṅgam (*6,2.177) iti siddhe vacanam abahuvrīhyartham adhruvārtham asvāṅgārthaṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:37609: tatra api hi pari-praty-upa-apā varjyamāna. ahorātra-avyaveṣu (*6,2.33)
GS24jvkasipu:37614: sphiga pūta vīṇā añjas adhvan kukṣi ity etāny uttarapadāni sīranāmāni ca nāmaśabdaś ca apād uttarāṇy antodāttani bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:37620: upasargādadhvanaḥ (*5,4.85) iti yadā samāsānto na asti tadā anena antodāttatvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37621: tasmin hi saty acpratyayasya cittvād eva siddham /
GS24jvkasipu:37622: anityaś ca samāsāntaḥ ity etad eva jñāpakam /
GS24jvkasipu:37629: sphigapūtakukṣīṇāṃ grahaṇam abahuvrīhyartham adhruvārtham asvāṅgārthaṃ ca
GS24jvkasipu:37637: adhyārūḍho vā dantaḥ iti samānādhikaraṇa uttarapadalopī samassaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37638: dantasya+upari yo 'nyoḥ danto jāyate sa ucyate adhidantaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:37642: anor uttaram apradhānavāci kanīyaḥ ca antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37649: apradhānakanīyasī iti kim ? anugato jyeṣṭhaḥ anujyeṣṭhaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:37655: anvādiṣṭaḥ iti kim ? anugataḥ puruṣaḥ anupuruṣaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:37658: ateḥ paramakṛdantaṃ padaśabdaś ca antodātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37665: iha ca yathā syāt, atikrāntaḥ kārakāt atikārakaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:37685: rājaśabdaḥ samāsāntasya anityatvād yadā ṭaj na asti tadā prayojayati /
GS24jvkasipu:37686: tasmin hi sati cittvād eva antodāttatvaṃ siddham /
GS24jvkasipu:37687: tatpuruṣe iti kim ? pratigatāḥ aṃśavaḥ asya pratyaṃśuḥ ayam uṣṭraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37701: upād uttaraṃ dvyac ajinaṃ ca antodāttaṃ bhavati tatpuruṣe samāse gaurādīn varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:37710: tatpuruṣe ity eva, upagataḥ somo 'sya upasomaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37726: suśabdāt paramuttarapadaṃ tatpuruṣe samāse 'ntodāttaṃ bhavati avakṣepaṇe gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:37728: iha khalu idānīṃ susthaṇḍile susphigābhyāṃ supratyavasitaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37732: avakṣepaṇe iti kim ? śobhaneṣu tṛṇeṣu sutṛṇeṣu //
GS24jvkasipu:37735: utpucchaśabde tatpuruṣe vibhāṣā anta udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37737: yadā tu pucchamudasyati utpucchayati, utpuccayater ac utpucchaḥ, tadā thāthādisūtreṇa nityam antodāttatve prāpte vikalpo 'yam iti seyam ubhayatra vibhāṣa bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37738: tatpuruṣe ity eva udastaṃ puccham asya utpucchaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:37741: dvi tri ity etābhyām uttaresu pād dat mūrdhan ity eteṣu uttarapadeṣu yo
GS24jvkasipu:37742: bahuvrīhiḥ, tatra vibhāṣā antaḥ udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37751: mūrdhan iti tvakṛtasamāsanto nānta eva mūrdhanśabdaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37752: tasya etat prayojanam asatyapi samāsānte 'ntodāttatvaṃ yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:37753: etad eva jñāpakam, anityaḥ samāsānto bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:37754: yadā 'pi samāsāntaḥ kriyate tadā api bahuvrīheḥ kāryitvāt tadekadeśatvāc ca samāsāntasya antodāttatvaṃ pakṣe bhavaty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:37759: bahuvrīhau iti kim ? dvayor mūrdhā dvimūrdhā //
GS24jvkasipu:37763: saḥ akrāntāt paro vibhāṣā antodātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37770: chandasi visaye parādiḥ udātto bhavati bahulam /
GS24jvkasipu:37777: parādiś ca prāntaś ca pūrvāntaś ca api dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:37778: pūrvādayaś ca dṛśyante vyatyayo bahulaṃ smṛtaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:37780: parāntaś ca -- antodāttaprakaraṇe tricakrādīnāṃ chandasy upasaṅkhyānam /
GS24jvkasipu:37787: divodāsāya samagāya te ity evam ādi sarvaṃ saṅgṛhītaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:37788: iti kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau ṣaṣṭhādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:37792: aluk iti ca, uttarapade iti ca etad adhikṛtam veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:37793: yad iti ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmo 'luk uttarapade ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:37799: uttarapade iti kim ? niṣkrāntaḥ stokāt nistokaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37800: anyārtham idam uttarapadagrahaṇam iha apy aluko nivṛtiṃ karoti ity evam arthaṃ lakṣaṇapratipadoktaparibhāṣā na aśrayitavyā /
GS24jvkasipu:37812: samāse kṛte prātipadikatvāt supo luki prāpte pratiṣedhaḥ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:37813: dvivacanabahuvacanāntānāṃ tu stokādīnām anabhidhānāt samāsa eva na bhavati stokābhyāṃ muktaḥ, stokebhyo muktaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:37814: tena atra na kadācid aikapadyam aikasvaryaṃ ca bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37818: tasya vyutpattir asatā satā vā avayavārthena kriyate //
GS24jvkasipu:37821: ojas sahas ambhas tamas ity etebhya uttarasyāḥ tṛtīyāyāḥ aluk bhavati uttarapade /
GS24jvkasipu:37833: manasaḥ uttarasyāḥ tṛtīyāyāḥ sañjñāyām alug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37841: ājñāyinyuttārapade manasaḥ uttarasya tṛtīyāyāḥ alug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37846: ātmanaḥ uttarasyāḥ tṛtīyāyāḥ pūraṇapratyayānte utārapade 'lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37852: kathaṃ janārdanastvātmacaturtha eva iti ? bahuvrīhir ayam ātmā caturtho
GS24jvkasipu:37858: yayā sañjñayā vaiyākaraṇā eva vyaharanti tasyām ātmanaḥ uttarasyāś caturthyā alug bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:37865: parasya ca yā caturthī tasya vaiyākaraṇākhyāyām alug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37870: halantād adantāc ca+uttarasyāḥ saptamyāḥ sañjñāyām alug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37873: gaviṣṭhiraḥ ity atra tu gaviyudhibhyāṃ sthiraḥ (*8,3.95) ity ata eva
GS24jvkasipu:37882: haladantād iti kim ? nadyāṃ kukkuṭikā nadīkukkuṭikā /
GS24jvkasipu:37886: hṛd div ity etebhyām uttarasya ṅer alug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37891: prācāṃ deśe yatkāranāma tatra halādav uttarapade haladantād uttarasyāḥ saptamyāḥ alug bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:37896: kāraviśeṣasyāḥ sañjñā etāḥ, tatra pūrveṇa+eva siddhe niyamārtham idam /
GS24jvkasipu:37897: ete ca trayo niyamavikalpā atreṣyante, kāranāmny eva, prācām eva, halādāv eva iti /
GS24jvkasipu:37898: kāranāmni iti kim ? abhyarhite paśuḥ abhyarhitapaśuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37900: prācām iti kim ? yūthe paśuḥ yūthapaśuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37901: halādau iti kim ? avikaṭe uraṇaḥ avikaṭoraṇaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37902: haladantād ity eva, nadyāṃ dohanī nadīdohanī //
GS24jvkasipu:37905: madhyād uttarasyāḥ saptamyāḥ gurāv uttarapade 'lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37912: mūrdha-mastaka-varjitāt svāṅgād uttarasyāḥ saptamyāḥ akāme uttarapade 'lug
GS24jvkasipu:37919: akāme iti kim ? mukhe kāmo 'sya mukhakāmaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37926: tasminn uttarapade haladanttad uttarasyāḥ saptamyāḥ vibhāṣā alug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37930: svaṅgād dhi bahuvrihau pūrveṇa nityam aluk prāpnoti, tatpuruṣe tu svaṅgād
GS24jvkasipu:37931: asvāṅgāc ca na-in-siddha-badhnātisu ca (*6,3.19) iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti
GS24jvkasipu:37935: tatpuruṣe samāse kṛdante uttarapade saptamyāḥ bahulam alug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37943: prāvṛṭ śarat kāla div ity eteṣāṃ je uttarapade saptamyāḥ aluk bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37952: varṣa kṣara śara vara ity etebhya uttarasyaḥ saptamyāḥ je uttarapade vibhāṣā alug bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:37959: gha-sañjñake pratyaye, kālaśabde, tanapratyaye ca parataḥ kālanāmnaḥ uttarasyāḥ saptamyā vibhāṣā alug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37967: uttarapadādhikāre pratyayagrahaṇe tadantavidhir na+iṣyate hṛdayasya hṛllekha iti lekhagrahaṇāl liṅgāt /
GS24jvkasipu:37972: śaya vāsa vāsin ity eteṣu uttarapadeṣv akālavācinaḥ uttarasyāḥ saptamyā vibhāṣā aluk bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:37982: apsu bhavaḥ iti digāditvād yat pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37986: innante uttarapade siddhaśabde badhnātau ca parataḥ saptamyāḥ alug na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37993: cakrabandhaḥ iti kecid udāharanti, tat pacādyajantam draṣṭavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:37994: ghañante hi bandhe ca vibhāṣā (*6,3.13) ity uktam //
GS24jvkasipu:37997: sthe ca+uttarapade bhāṣāyām saptamyā aluk na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38006: ākrośe gamyamāne uttarapade ṣaṣṭhyā alug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38010: ṣaṣthīprakarane vāgdikpaśyadbhyo yuktidaṇḍahareṣu yathāsaṅkhyam alug vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38020: devānāmpriya ity atra ca ṣaṣṭhyā alug vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38030: putraśabde uttarapade ākrośe gamyamāne 'nyatarasyāṃ ṣaṣṭhyāḥ alug bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:38045: vidyāyonisambandhavācini eva+uttarapade yathā syāt, anyatra mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:38051: svasṛ pati ity etayoḥ uttarapadayoḥ ṛkārāntebhyaḥ vidyāyonisambandhavācibhyaḥ vibhāṣā 'lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38054: yadā luk tadā mātṛpitṛbhyāṃ svasā (*8,3.84) iti nityaṃ ṣatvam /
GS24jvkasipu:38055: yadā tu aluk tadā mātuḥ piturbhyam anyatarasyām (*8,3.85) iti vikalpena ṣatvam /
GS24jvkasipu:38069: putre ity atra anuvartate, ṛtaḥ iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:38070: tena putraśabde 'py uttarapade ṛkārāntasya anaṅādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38075: devatāvācināṃ yo dvandvaḥ tatra+uttarapade pūrvapadasya ānaṅ ādeśo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:38079: dvandve iti vartamāne punar dvandvagrahaṇaṃ prasiddhasahācaryārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:38080: atyantasahacarite lokavijñāte dvandvam ity etat nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:38081: tatra ye loke prasiddhasāhacaryā vede ca ye sahavāpanirdiṣṭās teṣām iha grahaṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38082: tena brahamaprajāpatī, śivavaiśravaṇau ity evam ādau na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38088: soma varuṇa ity etayoḥ devatādvandve agneḥ īkārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38094: kṛtavṛddhāv uttarapade devatādvandve agneḥ ikārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38097: agnīvaruṇau devate asya, agnīarutau devate asya iti taddhitaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38098: tatra devatādvandve ca (*7,3.21) ity ubhayapadavṛddhau kṛtāyām ānaṅ, ītvaṃ ca bādhitum ikāraḥ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:38105: div ity etasya dyāvā ity ayam ādeśo bhavati devatādvandve uttarapade /
GS24jvkasipu:38110: pṛthivyām uttarapade devatādvandve divo divas ity ayam ādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:38116: kathaṃ dyāvā cid asmai pṛthivī namete iti ? kartavyo 'tra yatnaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:38119: uṣasaḥ uṣāsā ity ayam ādeśo bhavati devatādvandve uttarapade /
GS24jvkasipu:38124: mātarapitarau ity udīcāmācāryāṇāṃ matenāraṅādeśaḥ mātṛśabdasya nipatyate mātarapitarau /
GS24jvkasipu:38135: striyāḥ puṃvad-bhāṣītapuṃskādanūṅ samānādhikaraṇe striyām apūraṇī-priyādiṣu || PS_6,3.34
GS24jvkasipu:38137: bhāṣitaḥ pumān yena samānāyāmākṛtāvekasmin pravṛttinimitte sa bhāṣitapuṃskaḥ śabdaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38138: tadetadevaṃ kathaṃ bhavati ? bhāsitaḥ pumān yasminn arthe pravṛttinimite sa bhāṣitapuṃskaśabdena+ucyate, tasya pratipādako yaḥ śabdaḥ so 'pi
GS24jvkasipu:38139: bhāsitapuṃskaḥ ūṅo 'bhāvaḥ anūṅ, bhāṣitapuṃskādanūṅ yasmin strīśabde sa bhāṣitapuṃskādanūṅ strīśabdaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38141: tasya bhāsitapuṃskāadanūṅaḥ strīśabdasya puṃśabdasyeva rūpaṃ bhavati samānādhikaraṇe uttarapade strīliṅge pūraṇīpriyādivarjite /
GS24jvkasipu:38145: striyā iti kim ? grāmaṇi brāhmaṇakulaṃ dṛṣṭirasya grāmaṇidṛṣṭiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38148: kathaṃ garbhibhāryaḥ, prasūtabhāryaḥ, prajātabhāryaḥ iti ? kartavyo 'tra
GS24jvkasipu:38151: samānādhikaraṇe iti kim ? kalyāṇā mātā kalyaṇīmātā /
GS24jvkasipu:38152: striyām iti kim ? kalyāṇī pradhānam eṣā kalyāṇīpradhānā ime /
GS24jvkasipu:38153: apūraṇī iti kim ? kalyāṇī pañcamī yāsāṃ tāḥ kalyāṇīpañcamā rātrayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38156: iha mā bhūt, kalyāṇīpañcamīkaḥ pakṣaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:38157: ap pūraṇīpramāṇyoḥ (*5,4.116) ity atra api pradhānapūraṇīgrahaṇam eva ity
GS24jvkasipu:38175: dṛḍhabhaktiḥ ity evam ādiṣu strīpūrvapadasya avivakṣitvāt siddham iti samādheyam //
GS24jvkasipu:38178: pañcamyās tasil (*5,3.7) ity ataḥ prabhṛti saṅkhyāyāḥ kriyābhyāvṛttigaṇane kṛtvasuc (*5,4.17) iti prāgetasmād ye pratyayāḥ tesu bhāṣitapuṃskādanūṅ
GS24jvkasipu:38200: guṇavacanasya iti kim ? kaṭhyāḥ bhāvaḥ kaṭhitvam kaṭhītā /
GS24jvkasipu:38205: katham āgnāyī devatā asya āgneyaḥ sthālīpākaḥ iti ? kartavyo 'tra yatnaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38211: kyaṅi parato mānini ca stiryā bhāṣitapuṃskād anūṅ puṃvat bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38217: iha tu darśanīyāmātmānaṃ manyate darśanīyamāninī iti pūrveṇa+eva siddham
GS24jvkasipu:38233: iha mā bhūt, pākabhāryaḥ, bhekabhāryaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:38236: sañjñāyāḥ pūraṇyāś ca striyāḥ puṃvadbhāvo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38256: vṛddher nimittaṃ yasmin sa vṛddhinimittaḥ taddhitaḥ, sa yadi rakte 'rthe
GS24jvkasipu:38257: vikāre ca na vihitaḥ, tadantasya strīśabdasya na puṃvad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38270: araktavikāre iti kim ? kaṣāyeṇa raktā kāṣāyī, kāṣāyī bṛhatikā yasya sa kāṣāyavṛhatikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38271: lohasya vikāro lauhīm lauhī īṣā yasya rathasya sa lauheṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38275: svāṅgād uttaro ya īkāraḥ tadantāyāḥ striyāḥ na puṃvad bhavati amānini parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38287: jāteś ca striyāḥ na puṃvad bhavati amānini parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38300: karmadharaye samāse jātīya deśīya ity etayoś ca pratyayayoḥ bhāṣitapuṃskādanūṅ striyāḥ puṃvad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38302: na kopadhāyāḥ (*6,3.37) ity uktam, tatra api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38306: sañjñāpūraṇyoś ca (*6,3.38) ity uktam, tatra api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38313: vṛddhinimittasya ca taddhitasyāraktavikare (*6,3.39) ity uktam, tatra api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38316: svāṅgāc ca+ito 'mānini (*6,3.40) ity uktam, tatra api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38320: jāteś ca (*6,3.41) ity uktam, tatra api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38332: strītvena vinā pūrvapadārtho 'tra jatiḥ sāmānyena vivakṣitaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38342: iha iḍabiḍ, darad, pṛthu, uśij ity ete janapadaśabdāḥ kṣatriyavācinaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:38343: tatra tadrājapratyayasya striyamataśca iti luki kṛte iḍabiḍvṛndārikā iti vigṛhya samāsaḥ kriyate
GS24jvkasipu:38349: gha rūpa kopa celaṭ brūva gotra mata hata ity eteṣū parato bhāṣitapuṃskat paro yo ṅīpratyayas tadantasya anekāco hrasvo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38360: brauva iti bravīti iti bruvaḥ pacādyuaci, vacyādeśo guṇaś ca nipātanānna bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38363: anekacaḥ iti kim ? nadyāḥ śeṣasya anyatarasyām (*6,3.44) iti vakṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:38368: nadyāḥ śeṣasya ghādiṣu parato hrasvo bhavati anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:38369: kaś ca śeṣaḥ ? aṅī ca yā nadī ṅyantaṃ ca yad ekac /
GS24jvkasipu:38380: ug-itaś ca parasyāḥ nadyāḥ ghādiṣu anyatarasyām hrasvo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38384: prakarṣayogāt prāk strītvasyā vivakṣitatvād vā siddham //
GS24jvkasipu:38387: samānādhikaraṇe uttarapade jātīye ca pratyaye parato mahataḥ ākārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38393: samānādhikaraṇajātīyayoḥ iti kim ? mahataḥ putraḥ mahatputraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38394: lakṣaṇoktatvād eva atra na bhaviṣyati iti ced bahuvrīhāv api na syād mahābāhuḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:38396: amahān mahān sampanno mahadbhūtaścandramāḥ ity atra gauṇatvān mahadarthasya na bhavatyātvam
GS24jvkasipu:38397: mahadātve ghāsakaraviśiṣṭeṣu upasaṅkhyānaṃ puṃvadvacanaṃ ca asamānādhikaraṇārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:38406: yukte iti kim ? aṣṭagavaṃ brāhmaṇasya taparakaraṇaṃ vispaṣṭārtham //
GS24jvkasipu:38409: dvi aṣṭan ity etayoḥ ākārādeśo bhavati saṅkhyāyām uttarapade abahuvrīhyaśītyoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38429: tri ity etasya trayas ity ayam ādeśo bhavati saṅkhyāyām abahuvrīhyaśītyoḥ
GS24jvkasipu:38440: catvāriṃśatprabhṛtau saṃkhyāyām uttarapade 'bahuvrīhyaśītyoḥ sarveṣām dvi aṣṭan tri ity eteṣāṃ yad uktaṃ tadvibhāṣa bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38449: hṛdayasya hṛt ity ayam ādeśo bhavati lekha yat aṇ lāsa ity eteṣu parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38456: etad eva lekhagrahaṇaṃ jñāpakam, uttarapadādhikāre pratyayagrahaṇe tadantagrahaṇasya //
GS24jvkasipu:38459: śoka syañ roga ity eteṣu parataḥ hṛdayasya vā hṛdādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38463: hṛdādeśapakṣe hṛdbhagasindhvante pūrvapadasya ca (*7,3.19) ity ubhayapadavṛddhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38465: hṛdayaśabdena samānārtho hṛcchabdaḥ prakṛtyantaram asti, tena+eva siddhe vikalpavidhānaṃ prapañcārtham
GS24jvkasipu:38468: pādasya pada ity ayam ādeśo bhavati āji āti ga upahata ity eteṣu uttarapadeṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:38471: ajyatibhyāṃ, pāde ca ity auṇādikaḥ iṇ pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38472: tatra ajer vībhavo na bhavati ata eva nipātanāt /
GS24jvkasipu:38475: pādaśabdo vṛṣāditvād ādyudāttaḥ, tasya sthāne padādeśaḥ upadeśe eva antodātto nipātyate, tena padopahataḥ iti tṛtīyā karmaṇi (*6,2.48) iti pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratvena antodāttatvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38476: padājiḥ, padātiḥ, padaga ity eteṣu kṛtsvareṇa samāsasya+eva antodāttatvam
GS24jvkasipu:38479: yatpratyaye parataḥ pādasya pad ity ayam ādeśo bhavaty atadarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:38482: atadarthe iti kim ? pādārtham udakaṃ pādyam /
GS24jvkasipu:38485: parpādibhyaḥ ṣṭhan (*4,4.10) iti pādaśabdāt ṣṭhan pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38486: śarīrāvayavavacanasya pādaśabdasya grahaṇam iha iṣyat, tena paṇapādamāṣaśatad yat (*5,1.34) ity atra padādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38491: hima kāṣin hati ity eteṣu pādaśabdasya pad ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38497: ṛkṣambandhinaḥ pādaśabdasya śe parataḥ pad ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38499: pādaṃ pādaṃ śaṃsati iti saṅkhyaikavacanāc ca vīpsāyām (*5,4.43) iti śas pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38500: ṛcaḥ iti kim ? pādaśaḥ kārṣāpaṇaṃ dadāti iti //
GS24jvkasipu:38503: ghoṣa miśra śabda ity eteṣu ca+uttarapadeṣu pādasya vā pad ity ayam ādeśo
GS24jvkasipu:38512: udakaśabdasya sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye uda ity ayam ādeśo bhavati uttarapade parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38516: sañjāyām uttarapadasy9a u)dakaśabdasya+udādeśo bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:38522: peṣaṃ vāsa vāhana dhi ity eteṣu ca+uttarapadesu udakasya uda ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38531: ekaḥ, asahāyaḥ tulyajātīyena anantareṇa halādinā, hal ādir yasya+uttarapadasya tadekahalādiḥ, tasminn ekahalādau pūrayitavyavāciny
GS24jvkasipu:38532: anyatarasyām udakasya uda ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38539: mantha odana saktu bindu vajra bhāra hāra vīvadha gāha ity eteṣu uttarapadesu udakasya uda ity ayam ādeśo bhavati anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:38545: bhāra - udakaṃ vibharti iti udabhāraḥ, udakabhāraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38546: hāra - udakaṃ harati iti udahāraḥ, udakahāraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38548: gāha - udakaṃ gāhate iti udagāhaḥ, udakagāhaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:38551: igantasya aṅyantasya uttarapade hrasvaḥ bhavati gālavasya ācaryasya matena anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:38584: acā hi gṛhyamāṇam atra viśeṣyate, na punar ac gṛhyamāṇena iti //
GS24jvkasipu:38587: ṅyantasya abantasya ca sañjñāchandasoḥ bahulaṃ hrasvo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38610: tvapratyaye parato ṅyāpoḥ bahulaṃ hrasvo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38616: iṣṭakeṣīkāmālānāṃ cita tūla bhārin ity eteṣu uttarapadeṣu yathāsaṅkhyaṃ hrasvo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38629: mumā hrasvo na bādhyate, anyathā hi hrasvaśāsanam anarthakaṃ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:38632: anavyayasya ity etad eva jñāpakam iha khidantagrahaṇasya //
GS24jvkasipu:38635: arus dviṣat ity etayor ajanatānāṃ ca khidanta uttarapade mumāgamo bhavati anavyayasya /
GS24jvkasipu:38646: ijantasya ekācaḥ khidante uttarapade amāgamo bhavati, ampratyayavac ca dvitīyaikavacanavac ca sa bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38652: ampratyayavac ca ity atideśāt ātvapūrvasavarṇaguṇeyaṅuvaṅādeśā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:38655: atheha kathaṃ bhavitavyam, śriyam ātmānaṃ brāhmaṇakulaṃ manyate ity upakramya śrimanyam iti bhavitavyam iti bhāṣye vyavasthitam ? tatra+idaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:38656: bhāṣyakārasya darśanam, atra viṣaye parityaktasvaliṅgaḥ śrīśabdo brāhmaṇakule vartate, yathā praṣṭhādayaḥ striyām /
GS24jvkasipu:38657: tatra svamor napuṃsakāt (*7,1.23) ity amo lug bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:38665: kāraśabda uttarapade satya agada ity etayor mumāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38666: satyaṃ karoti, satyasya va kāraḥ satyaṅkāraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38671: bhakṣaṃ karoti, bhakṣasya vā karaḥ bhakṣaṅkāraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38690: sūtograrājabhojamervityetebhya uttarasya duhitṛśabdasya putraḍādeśo vā vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38696: kecit tu śārṅgaravādiṣu putraśabdaṃ paṭhanti, teṣāṃ putrī iti bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38697: anyatra api hi dṛśyate śailaputrī iti //
GS24jvkasipu:38700: śyena tila ity etayoḥ pātaśabde uttarapade ñapratyaye pare mumāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38706: rātreḥ kṛdanta uttarapade vibhāṣā mumāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38724: tasmāl luptanakārān nañaḥ nuḍāgamo bhavati ajādav uttarapade /
GS24jvkasipu:38727: tasmāt iti kim ? naña eva hi syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:38728: pūrvānte hi ṅamo hrasvād aci ṅmuṇ nityam (*8,3.32) iti prāpnoti //
GS24jvkasipu:38732: nabhrāṭ napāt navedāḥ nāsatyāḥ namuci nakula nakha napuṃsaka nakṣatra nakra nāka ity eteṣu nañ prakṛtyā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38739: nāsatyāḥ - satsu sādhavaḥ satyāḥ, na satyāḥ asatyāḥ, na asatyāḥ nāsatyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38743: nakha - na asya kham asti iti nakham /
GS24jvkasipu:38744: napuṃsaka - na strī na pumān napuṃsakam /
GS24jvkasipu:38746: nakṣatra - na kṣarate kṣīyate iti vā najñātram /
GS24jvkasipu:38753: ekādiś ca nañ prakṛtyā bhavati, ekaśabdasya ca āduk āgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38757: pūrvānto 'yam āduk kriyate padāntalakṣaṇo 'tra anunāsiko vikalpena yathā
GS24jvkasipu:38766: aprāṇiṣu iti kim ? ago vṛṣalaḥ śītena //
GS24jvkasipu:38769: sahaśabdasya sa ity ayam ādeśo bhavati sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:38776: udāttānudāttavato hi sahaśabdasya antaryataḥ svaritaḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:38778: anyatra samāsāntodāttatvena bādhyata eva, seṣṭi, sapaśubandham iti //
GS24jvkasipu:38781: granthānte adhike ca vartamānasya sahaśabdasya sa ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38785: kalāntaṃ, mahūrtāntaṃ, saṅgrahāntam iti antavacane ity avyayībhāvaḥ samāsaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38786: tatra avyayībhāve cākāle iti kālavāciny uttarapade samāso na prāpnoti ity ayam ārambhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38792: dvayoḥ sahayuktayor apradhāno yaḥ sa dvitīyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38793: upākhyāyate pratyakṣata upalabhyate yaḥ sa upākhyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38795: tasmin dvitīye 'nupākhye sahasya sa ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38799: agnyādayaḥ sākṣād anupalabhyamānāḥ kapotādibhir anumīyamānāḥ anupākhyā bhavanti //
GS24jvkasipu:38802: avyayībhāve ca samāse akālavācini uttarapade sahasya sa ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38809: yasya sarve 'vayavā upasarjanībhūtāḥ sa sarvopasarjano bahuvrīhir gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:38810: tadavayavasya sahaśabdasya vā sa ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38815: sahakṛtvapriyaḥ, priyasahakṛtvā iti iha bahuvrīhau yad uttarapadaṃ tat paraḥ sahaśabdo na bhavati iti sabhāvo na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:38818: prakṛtyā sahaśabdo bhavati āśiṣi viṣaye agovatsahaleṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:38820: agovatsahaleṣu iti kim ? svasti bhavate sahagave, sagave /
GS24jvkasipu:38823: vopasarjanasya (*6,3.82) iti pakṣe bhavaty eva sahbāvaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:38827: samānasya sa ity ayam ādeśo bhavati chandasi viṣaye mūrdhan prabhṛti udakam ity etāni uttarapadāni varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:38831: samāno garbhaḥ sagarbhaḥ, tatra bhavaḥ sagarthyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38837: tena sapakṣaḥ, sādharmyam, sajātīyaḥ ity evam ādayaḥ siddhāḥ bhavanti //
GS24jvkasipu:38840: jyotis janapada rātri nābhi nāman gotra rūpa sthāna varṇa vayas vacana bandhu ity eteṣu uttarapadeṣu samānasya sa ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38854: caraṇe gamyamāne brahmacāriṇi uttarapade samānasya sa ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38856: brahma vedaḥ, tadadhyayanārthaṃ yad vrataṃ tad api brahma, tac carati iti
GS24jvkasipu:38858: samānaḥ tasya+eva brahmaṇeḥ samānatvad ity ayam artho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38862: tīrthaśabda uttarapade yatpratyaye parataḥ samānasya sa ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38867: udaraśabde uttarapade yatpratyayānte samānasya vibhāṣā sa ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38869: samānodare śayita o ca+udāttaḥ (*4,4.108) iti yat //
GS24jvkasipu:38872: dṛk dṛśa vatu ity eteṣu parataḥ samānasya sa ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38875: tyadādiṣu dṛśo 'nālocane kañca (*3,2.60) ity atra samānānyayośceti
GS24jvkasipu:38883: idaṃ kim ity etayor īś kī ity etau yathāsaṅkhyam ādeśau bhavato dṛgdṛśavatuṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:38906: viṣvag-devayoś ca ṭer adry añcatau vapratyaye || PS_6,3.92 ||
GS24jvkasipu:38908: viṣvak deva ity etayoḥ sarvanāmnaś ca ṭeḥ adri ity ayam ādeśo bhavati añcatau vapratyayānte uttarapade /
GS24jvkasipu:38913: tatra yaṇādeśe kṛte udāttasvaritayor yaṇaḥ svarito 'nudāttasya (*8,2.4)
GS24jvkasipu:38919: tena ayaskṛtam, ayaskāraḥ ity atra ataḥ kṛkamikaṃsakumbhapātra iti satvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38921: viśvāī ca ghṛtācī ca ity atra na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38922: kadrīcī ity atra tu bhavaty eva //
GS24jvkasipu:38925: sam ity etasya sami ity ayam ādeśo bhavati añcatau vapratyayante uttarapade /
GS24jvkasipu:38929: tiras ity etasya tiri ity ayam ādeśo bhavati añcāu vapratyayānte uttarapade 'lope, yadā asya lopo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38936: saha ity etasya saghriḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati añcatau vapratyānte uttarapade /
GS24jvkasipu:38942: chandasi viṣaye māda stha ity etayor uttarapadayoḥ sahasya sadha ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38947: dvi antar ity etābhyāṃ upasargāc ca uttarasya ap ity etasya īkārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38960: anor uttarasya apaḥ ūkārādeśo bhavati deśābhidhāne /
GS24jvkasipu:38963: dīrghoccāraṇam avagrahārtham, anu ūpaḥ anūpaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:38965: aṣaṣthīsthasya atṛtīyāsthasya ca anyaśabdasya dugāgamo bhavati āśis āśā āsthā āsthita utsuka ūti kāraka rāga cha ity eteṣu parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38976: aṣaṣṭhyatṛtīyāsthasya iti kim ? anyasya āśīḥ anyāśīḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38985: arthaśade uttarapade anyasya vibhāṣā dugāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38989: ku ity etasya kta ity ayam ādeśo bhavati tatpuruṣe samāse ajādāv uttarapade /
GS24jvkasipu:39001: ratha vada ity etayoś ca+uttarapadayoḥ koḥ kat ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39006: dṛṇaśabde uttarapade jātāv abhidheyāyāṃ koḥ kat ity ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39008: jātau iti kim ? kutsitāni tṛṇāni kutṛṇāni //
GS24jvkasipu:39011: pathin akṣa ity etayor uttarapadayoḥ koḥ kā ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39016: īṣadarthe vartamānasya koḥ kā ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39019: ajādāv api paratvāt kādeśa eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39024: puruṣaśabde uttarapade vibhāṣā koḥ kā ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39027: īṣadarthe tu pūrvavipratiṣedhena nityaṃ kā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39031: uṣṇaśabde uttarapade koḥ kavam ity ayam ādeśo bhavati, kā ca vibhāṣā /
GS24jvkasipu:39035: pathiśabde uttarapade chandasi viṣaye koḥ kavam kā ity etāv ādeśau bhavato vibhāṣā /
GS24jvkasipu:39039: pṛṣodaraprakārāṇi śabdarūpāṇi, yeṣu lopāgamavarnavikārāḥ śāstreṇa na vihitāḥ dṛśyante ca, tāni yathopadiṣṭāni sādhūni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:39040: yāni yāni yathopadiṣṭāni, śaṣṭair uccāritāni prayuktāni, tāni tathā+eva
GS24jvkasipu:39046: pūrvaśabdasya baśabda ādeśaḥ, uttarapadādeś ca latvam /
GS24jvkasipu:39050: śavaśabdasya śmādeśaḥ, śayanaśabdasya api śānaśabda ādeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39052: ūrdhvakhaśabdayoḥ ulū khala ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39062: dikśabdebhya uttarasya tīrasya tārabhāvo vā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39065: vāco vāde ḍatvaṃ ca labhāvaś ca+uttarapadasya+iñi pratyaye bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39071: dhāsu vā ṣaṣa utvaṃ bhavaty uttarapadādeśca ṣṭutvam /
GS24jvkasipu:39074: iha mā bhūt, ṣaṭ dadhāti dhayati vā ṣaḍdhā iti /
GS24jvkasipu:39076: kucchreṇa dāśyate nāśyate dabhyate ca yaḥ sa dūḍāśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39087: varṇāgamo varṇaviparyayaś ca dvau cāparau varṇavikāranāśau /
GS24jvkasipu:39089: saṅkhyā-vi-sāya-pūrvasya ahnasya ahann anyatarasyāṃ ṅau || PS_6,3.110 ||
GS24jvkasipu:39091: saṅkhyā vi sāya ity evaṃpūrvasya ahnaśabdasya sthāne ahan ity ayam ādeśo bhavaty anyatarasyāṃ ṅau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39102: ekadeśisamāsaḥ pūrvādibhyo 'nyasya api bhavati ity etad eva visāyapūrvasya
GS24jvkasipu:39104: tena madhyamahnaḥ madhyāhnaḥ ity api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39109: ḍhakārarephayoḥ lopaḥ yasmin sa ḍhralopaḥ, tatra pūrvasya aṇaḥ dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39124: sahi vahi ity etayoḥ avarṇasya okāra ādeśo bhavati ḍhralope /
GS24jvkasipu:39133: varṇagrahaṇaṃ kim ? kṛtāyām api vṛddhau yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:39136: tādapi paraḥ taparaḥ, taparatvād ākārasya grahaṇaṃ na syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:39139: sādhyai sāḍhvā sāḍhā iti nigame nipātyanate /
GS24jvkasipu:39144: nigame iti kim ? soḍhvā, soḍhā iti bhāṣāyām //
GS24jvkasipu:39148: yad iti ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ saṃhitāyām ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:39150: vidmā hi tvā gopatiṃ śūra gonām /
GS24jvkasipu:39151: saṃhitāyām iti kim ? vidma, hi, tvā, gopatiṃ, śūra, gonām //
GS24jvkasipu:39154: karṇaśabde uttarapade lakṣaṇavācino dīrgho bhavati viṣṭa aṣṭan pañcan maṇi bhinna chinna chidra sruva svastika ity etān varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:39160: yat paśūnāṃ svāmiviśeṣasambandhajñāpanārthaṃ dātrākārādi kriyate tad iha lakṣaṇaṃ gṛhyate
GS24jvkasipu:39173: nahi vṛti vṛṣi vyadhi ruci sahi tani ity eteṣu kvipratyayānteṣu uttarapadeṣu pūrvapadasya dīrgho bhavati saṃhitāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:39192: vana giri ity etayor uttarapadayor yathāsaṅkhyaṃ koṭaradīnām kiṃśulukādīnāṃ ca dīrgho bhavati sajñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:39220: rajaḥkṛṣyāsutiparṣado valac (*5,2.112) iti valac pratyayo gṛhyate, na prātipadikam /
GS24jvkasipu:39227: matau parato bahvaco 'jirādivarjitasya dīrgho bhavati sañjñāyām viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:39244: śarādīnāṃ ca matau dīrgho bhavati sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:39261: igantasya pūrvapadasya pīluvarjitasya vahe uttarapade dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39271: upasargasya ghañante uttarapade amanuṣye 'bhidheye bahulaṃ dīrgho bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:39289: igantasya upasargasya kāśaśabde uttarapade dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39297: dā ity etasya yaḥ takārādir ādeśaḥ tasmin parataḥ igantasya+upasargasya
GS24jvkasipu:39302: aca upasargāt taḥ (*7,4.47) ity antasya yady api takāraḥ kriyate tathāpi cartvasyāśrayāt siddhatvam iti takārādir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39310: aṣṭan ity etasya uttarapade sañjñāyāṃ dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39322: aṣṭau pādau asyāḥ iti bahuvrīhau pādasya lope kṛte pādo 'nyatarasyām
GS24jvkasipu:39324: gavi ca yukte bhāṣāyāmāṣṭano dīrgho bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:39334: viśvaśabdasya vasu rāṭ ity etayoḥ uttarapadayoḥ dirgha ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39337: rāṭ iti vikāranirdeśo yatra asya etad rūpaṃ tatra+eva yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:39342: naraśabda uttarapade sañjñāyām viṣaye viśvasya dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39344: sañjñāyām iti kim ? viśve narā yasya sa viśvanaraḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:39347: mitre ca+uttarapade ṛṣāvabhidheye viśvasya dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39352: manraviṣaye soma aśva indriya viśvadevya ity eteṣāṃ matuppratyaye parataḥ dīrtho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39360: oṣadhiśabdasya vibhaktāv aprathamāyāṃ parataḥ dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39367: ṛci viṣaye tu nu gha makṣu taṅ ku tra uruṣya ity eṣāṃ dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39373: taṅ iti thādeśasya ṅītvapakṣe grahaṇaṃ, tena+iha na bhavati, śṛṇota grāvāṇaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39380: igantaraya suñi parato mantraviṣaye dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39383: suñaḥ (*8,3.107) iti ṣatvam, naśca dhātusthoruṣubhyaḥ (*8,4.27) iti ṇatvam //
GS24jvkasipu:39388: vidmā hi tvā gopatiṃ śūra gonām /
GS24jvkasipu:39390: dvyacaḥ iti kim ? aśvā bhavata vājinaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39391: ataḥ iti kim ? ā devān vakṣi yakṣi ca //
GS24jvkasipu:39395: nipātasya ca ṛgviṣaye dīrgḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39400: anyeṣām api dīrgho dṛśyate, sa śiṣṭaprayogādanugantavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39401: yasya dīrghatvaṃ vihitaṃ, dṛśyate ca prayoge, tad anena kartavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:39433: karīṣasya iva gandho 'sya, kumudasya iva gandho 'sya, alpākhyāyām
GS24jvkasipu:39438: iko hrasvo 'ṅyo gālavasya (*6,3.61) ity etan na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39440: akṛta eva dīrghatve hrasvabhāvapakṣe kṛtārthena api dīrgheṇa pakṣāntare paratvād hrasvo bādhyate
GS24jvkasipu:39441: punaḥ prasaṅgavijñānaṃ ca na bhavati, sakṛdgatau vipratiṣedhe yad bādhitaṃ tadbādhitam eva iti //
GS24jvkasipu:39442: iti śrīvāmanaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau ṣaṣṭhādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:39447: yad ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ aṅgasya ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:39461: aṅgādhikāraḥ kṛto 'nyārtho nāmi dīrghatvādyapi vyavasthāpayati iti tadartham arthavadgrahaṇaparibhāṣā nāśrayitavyā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39462: aṅgasya iti sambandhasāmānye eṣā ṣaṣṭhī yathāyogaṃ viśeṣeṣu avatiṣṭhate /
GS24jvkasipu:39465: tato 'kārāntād aṅgāt bhisa ais ity evam ādy api samyak sampannaṃ bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:39468: aṅgāvayavād dhalo yad uttaraṃ samprasāraṇam tadantasya aṅgasya dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39478: tṛtīyā iti vā nipātanād atra dīrghābhāvaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39482: nām iti etat ṣaṣṭhībahuvacanam āgatanuṭkaṃ gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:39489: āgatanuṭkagrahaṇam uttarārtham, kṛte ca nuṭi dīrghapratipattyartham /
GS24jvkasipu:39491: nāmi dīrgha āmi cet syāt kṛte dīrghe na nuṭ bhavet /
GS24jvkasipu:39495: tisṛ catasṛ ity etayoḥ nāmi dīrgho na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39498: idam eva nāmi iti dīrghapratiṣedhavacanaṃ jñāpakam aci ra ṛtaḥ (*7,2.100)
GS24jvkasipu:39499: ity etasmāt pūrvavipratiṣedhena nuḍāgamo bhavati iti //
GS24jvkasipu:39502: chandasi vaṣaye tisṛ-catasroḥ nāmi parataḥ ubhayathā dṛśyate,
GS24jvkasipu:39508: nṛ ity etasya nāmi pare ubhayathā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39509: tvaṃ nṝṇāṃ nṛpate, tvaṃ nṛṇāṃ nṛpate kecid atra chandasi iti na anuvartayanti, tena bhāṣāyām api vikalpo bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:39512: nāntasya aṅgasya upadhāyāḥ nāmi parato dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39521: sarvanāmasthāne ca parato 'sambuddhau nopadhāyāḥ dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39532: ṣapūrvasya acaḥ nopadhāyāḥ nigamaviṣaye sarvanāmasthāne parataḥ asambuddhau vā dīrgho bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:39537: nigame iti kim ? takṣā, takṣāṇau, takṣāṇaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:39540: sakārāntasya saṃyogasya yo nakāraḥ mahataś ca tasya+upadhāyāḥ dīrgho bhavati sarvanāmasthāne parataḥ asambuddhau /
GS24jvkasipu:39550: ap ity etasya, tṛnantasya, tṛjantasya, svasṛ naptṛ neṣṭṛ tvaṣtṛ kṣattṛ hotṛ potṛ paśāstṛ ity eteṣāṃ cāṅgānām upadhāyā dīrgho bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:39553: bahvāmpi taḍāgāni iti kecid icchanti, tatra samāsānto vidhiranityaḥ iti samāsānto na kriyate
GS24jvkasipu:39554: nityam api ca numamakṛtva dīrghatvam iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:39571: vyutpattipakṣe niyamārtham, evam bhūtānām anyeṣāṃ sañjñāśabdānāṃ dīrgho mā
GS24jvkasipu:39579: in han pūṣan aryaman ity evam antānām aṅgānāṃ śau parata upadhāyā dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39586: siddhe satyārambho niyamārthaḥ, inhanpūṣāryamṇām upadhāyaḥ śāv eva dīrgho bhavati na anyatra
GS24jvkasipu:39592: dīrghavidhirya ihenprabhṛtīnāṃ taṃ viniyamya suṭīti suvidvān /
GS24jvkasipu:39593: śau niyamaṃ punar eva vidadhyāt bhrūṇahanīti tathāsya na duṣyet //
GS24jvkasipu:39594: śāsmi nivartya suṭītyaviśeṣe śau niyamaṃ kuru vāpyasamīkṣya /
GS24jvkasipu:39595: dīrghavidherupadhāniyamānme hanta yi dīrghavidhau ca na doṣaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:39597: yasya hi śau niyamaḥ suṭi naitattena na tatra bhavedviniyamyam //
GS24jvkasipu:39598: hanteḥ anunāsikasya kvijhaloḥ kṅiti (*2,4.15) iti dīrghatvaṃ yat tad api niyamena bādhyate vṛtrahaṇi, bhrūṇahani iti /
GS24jvkasipu:39600: inhanpūṣāryamṇām sarvanāmasthāne eva dīrgho bhavati, na anyatra iti /
GS24jvkasipu:39602: śau eva sarvanāmasthāne dīrgho bhavati na anyatra iti /
GS24jvkasipu:39604: yas tu na upadhālakṣaṇaḥ sa bhavaty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:39607: atha va anuvartamāne 'pi sarvanāmasthānagrahaṇe sāmarthyādayam aviśeṣeṇa
GS24jvkasipu:39609: śiśabdo hi sarvanāmasthāaṃ napuṃsakasya, na ca tasya anyat sarvanāmasthānam asti ity aviśeṣeṇa niyamaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39610: tatra tu napuṃsakasya ity etan na aśrīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:39611: tena anapuṃsakasya api dīrgho na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39612: sarvanāmasthānasañjñāvidhāne tu napuṃsakasya vyāpāro 'sti iti tatra niyamaḥ kriyamaṇo napuṃsakasya syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:39615: sāv asambuddhau parataḥ inhanpūṣaryamṇām upadhāyā dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39625: atu as ity evam antasya adhātor upadhāyāḥ sāvasambuddhau parataḥ dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39631: yadi hi paratvān nityatvāc ca num syat, dīrghasya nimittamatūpadhā vihanyeta /
GS24jvkasipu:39635: adhātoḥ iti kim ? piṇḍaṃ grasate iti piṇḍagraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39637: anarthako 'py asśabdo gṛhyate, aninasmaṅgrahaṇānyarthavatā ca anarthakena
GS24jvkasipu:39640: anyathā matupo grahaṇam na syād, upadeśe rūpanirgrahahetau nāyamatvantaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:39646: anunāsikāntasya aṅgasya upadhāyāḥ dīrgho bhavati kvipratyaye parato jhalādau ca kṅiti /
GS24jvkasipu:39665: ajantānām aṅgānaṃ hanigamyoś ca sani jhalādau pare dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39673: iha mā bhūt sañjigaṃsate vatso mātra iti /
GS24jvkasipu:39674: svargaṃ lokaṃ samajigāṃsat iti chandasi yadaniṅādeśasya api dīrghatvaṃ dṛśyate, tad anyeṣām api dṛśyate (*6,3.137) ity anena bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39675: atha vā iha ajgrahaṇaṃ na kartavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:39676: sani dīrgho bhavati ity etāvadeva sūtraṃ kartavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:39677: tatrācā gṛhyamāṇasya viśeṣaṇe sati siddham ajantasya dīrghatvam ? tat kriyate pravṛttibhedena gamer api viśeṣaṇārtham, ajantasya aṅgasya dīrgho
GS24jvkasipu:39679: tato na vaktavyam idaṃ gameriṅādeśasya iti //
GS24jvkasipu:39682: tanoter aṅgasya sani jhalādau vibhāṣā dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39685: sanīvantardha ity atra tanoter upasaṅkhyānād iḍāgamo bhavati vikalpena //
GS24jvkasipu:39688: krama upadhāyā vibhāṣā dirgho bhavati ktvā pratyaye jhalādau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39691: prakramya, upakramya iti bahiraṅgo 'pi lyabādeśo 'ntaraṅgānapi vidhīn bādhate iti pūrvam eva dīrghatvaṃ na pravartate //
GS24jvkasipu:39694: cha ity etasya satukkasya, vakārasya ca sthāne yathāsaṅkhyam ś ūṭḥ ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ, anunāsikādau pratyayai parataḥ kvau jhalādau ca
GS24jvkasipu:39698: antaraṅgatvāt che ca (*6,1.73) iti tuki kṛte satukkasya śādeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39700: siverauṇādike na pratyaye laghūpadhaguṇāt pūrvamūṭḥ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:39701: tatra kṛte 'ntaraṅgatvād yaṇādeśo nānāśrayatvāt ca na vārṇādāṅgaṃ balīyaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:39708: asiddhaṃ bahiraṅgamantaraṅge iti nājānantarye iti pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:39717: kecid atra kṅiti iti na anuvartayanti /
GS24jvkasipu:39718: kathaṃ dyubhyām, dyubhiḥ iti ūṭhi kṛte ? diva ut (*6,1.131) iti taparatvān mātrākālo bhaviṣyati
GS24jvkasipu:39719: chaśāṃ ṣaḥ ity atra chagrahaṇaṃ na kartavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:39722: vāha ūṭḥ (*6,4.139) ity ayam api ṭhideva //
GS24jvkasipu:39725: jvara tvara srivi ava mava ity eteṣām aṅgānāṃ vakārasya upadhāyāś ca sthāne ūṭḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati kvau parato 'nunāsike jhalādau ca kṅiti
GS24jvkasipu:39743: rephāduttarayoḥ chvorlopo bhavati kvau parato jhalādau kṅiti ca parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39753: rāllope sutukkasya chasya abhāvāt kevalo gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:39765: yad ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ ā adhyāyaparisamāpteḥ tad asiddhavat bhavati ity evaṃ veditavyam
GS24jvkasipu:39769: tac ced atra yatra bhavati tadā bhāt śāstrīyaṃ vidhīyate tadāśrayam eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39770: vyāśrayaṃ tu nāsiddhavad bhavati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39772: edhi, śādhi ity atra etvaśābhāvayoḥ kṛtayoḥ jhallakṣaṇaṃ dhitvaṃ na prāpnoti, asiddhatvād bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39773: āgahi, jahi ity atra anunāsika lope jabhāve ca ato heḥ (*6,4.105) iti luk prāpnoti, asiddhatvān na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39776: ata upadhāyāḥ (*7,2.116) iti vṛddhau kartavyāyāṃ nalopo nāsiddho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39780: vasusaṃprasāraṇam āllope yaṇādeśe uvaṅādeśe ca kartavye nāsiddhaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39781: āllopādīni vasau, vasantasya vibhaktau saṃprasāraṇam iti samānāśrayatvaṃ na asti /
GS24jvkasipu:39782: asiddhaṃ bahiraṅgamantaraṅge iti ? etad apy atra na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39783: kiṃ kāraṇam ? eṣā hi paribhāṣā ābhācchāstrīyā /
GS24jvkasipu:39784: tasyāṃ pravartamānāyāṃ vasusaṃprasāraṇādīnāmābhācchāstrīyāṇām eva asiddhatvād antaraṅgabahiraṅgayoḥ yugapat samupasthāpanaṃ na asti iti paribhāṣa na pravartate /
GS24jvkasipu:39799: supi ca (*7,3.102) iti paratvāt kṛte 'pi dīrghatve sthānivadbhavāt nalopaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:39801: viśnānām, praśnānām ity atra lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya+eva
GS24jvkasipu:39805: aniditām aṅgānāṃ halantānām upadhāyāḥ nakārasya lopo bhavati kṅiti pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39820: aniditāṃ nalope laṅgikampyor upatāpaśarīravikārayor upasaṅkhyānaṃ kartavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:39838: daṃśa sañja ṣvañja ity eteṣām aṅgānāṃ śapi parata upadhāyā nakārasya lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39844: rañjeś ca śapi parataḥ upadhāyāḥ nakārasya lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39849: bhāvakaranavācini ghañi parato rañjeḥ upadhāyā nakārasya lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39853: bhāvakaraṇayoḥ iti kim ? rajanti tasminn iti raṅgaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:39858: ikprakaraṇāt na dhātulopaḥ iti pratiṣedho na asti /
GS24jvkasipu:39865: avoda edha odma praśratha himaśratha ity ete nipātyante /
GS24jvkasipu:39866: avoda iti underavapūrvasya ghañi nalopo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:39867: edha iti indher ghañi nalopo guṇaś ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:39868: na dhātulopa ārdhadhātuke (*1,1.4) iti hi pratiṣedhaḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:39869: odma iti underauṇādike manpratyaye nalopo guṇaś ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:39870: praśratha iti prapūrvasya śrantherghañi nalopo vṛddhyabhavaś ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:39871: himaśratha iti himapūrvasya śrantheḥ ghañyeva nipātanam //
GS24jvkasipu:39874: añceḥ pūjāyām arthe nakārasya lopo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39883: ktvāprayaye parataḥ skanda syanda ity etayor nakāralopo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39888: tatra yadā iḍāgamaḥ tadā na ktvā seṭ (*1,2.18) iti kittvapratiṣedhād eva
GS24jvkasipu:39892: jāntānām aṅgānāṃ naśeś ca ktvāpratyaye parataḥ vibhāṣā nakāralopo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39899: bhañjeś ca ciṇi parato vibhāṣā nakāralopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39901: aprāpto 'yaṃ nalopaḥ pakṣe vidhīyate, tato na iti na anuvartate //
GS24jvkasipu:39904: śāsa upadhāyā ikārādeśo bhavati aṅi parato halādau ca kṅiti /
GS24jvkasipu:39910: ittve kṛte śāsivasighasīnāṃ ca (*8,3.60) iti ṣatvam /
GS24jvkasipu:39914: kvau ca śāsa ittvaṃ bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:39917: yasmāt śāseḥ aṅ vihitaḥ śāsu anuśiṣṭau iti, tasya+eva+idaṃ grahaṇam iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:39918: āṅaḥ śāsu icchāyām iti asya na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39921: kvippratyaye tu tasya api bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:39923: kṣiyāśīḥpraiṣeṣu tiṅākāṅkṣam (*8,2.104) iti nipātanād vā siddham //
GS24jvkasipu:39926: śāso hau parataḥ śā ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39929: upadhāyāḥ iti nivṛttam, tataḥ śāsaḥ iti sthāneyogā ṣaṣṭhī bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39931: tena yadā vā chandasi (*3,4.88) iti pittvaṃ hiśabdasya tadā apy ādeśo
GS24jvkasipu:39933: śādhi ity ādyudāttam api chandasi dṛśyate //
GS24jvkasipu:39936: hanterdhātoḥ jaḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati hau parata /
GS24jvkasipu:39940: anudāttopadeśānām aṅgānāṃ vanateḥ tanotyādīnāṃ ca anunāsikalopo bhavati jhalādau kṅiti pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39952: ktici tu na ktici dīrghaśca (*6,4.39) iti bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39983: upadeśagrahaṇaṃ kim ? iha vayathā syāt, gatiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39984: iha ca mā bhūt, śāntaḥ, śāntavān iti //
GS24jvkasipu:39987: lyapi parataḥ anudāttopadeśavanatitanotyādīnām anunāsikalopaḥ vā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39988: vyavasthitavibhāṣā ca+iyam, tena makārāntānāṃ vikalpo bhavati, anyatra nityam eva lopaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39999: ktici parato 'nudāttopadeśādīnām anunāsikalopaḥ dīrghaś ca na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40003: anunāsikalope pratiṣiddhe anunāsikasya kvijhaloḥ kṅiti (*6,4.15) iti dīrghaḥ prāpnoti, so 'pi pratiṣidhyate //
GS24jvkasipu:40018: viṭi vani ca pratyaye parataḥ anunāsikāntasya aṅgasya ākāra ādeśo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:40027: sanoter anaḥ (*8,3.108) iti ṣatvam goṣā indo nṛṣā asi ity atra /
GS24jvkasipu:40031: anunāsikasya iti vartamāne punar anunāsikagrahaṇam anunāsikāmātraparigrahārtham, anyathā hi anudāttopadeśavanatitanotyādīnām
GS24jvkasipu:40036: jana sana khana ity eteṣām aṅgānāṃ sani jhalādau kṅiti jhalādau pratyaye parataḥ ākāra ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40047: jhalgrahaṇaṃ sanviśeṣaṇārthaṃ kimartham anuvartyate ? iha mā bhūt,
GS24jvkasipu:40053: atra jhalādau kṅiti sanoter vipratiṣedhād ātvam anunāsikalopaṃ bādhate /
GS24jvkasipu:40058: yakārādau kṅiti pratyaye parato janasanakhanām ākāra ādeśo bhavati vibhāṣā
GS24jvkasipu:40065: janeḥ śyani jñā-janor jā (*7,3.79) iti nityaṃ jādeśo bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:40068: tanoteḥ yaki parato vibhāṣā ākāra ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40071: sanaḥ ktici lopaś ca asya anyatarasyām || PS_6,4.45 ||
GS24jvkasipu:40073: sanoter aṅgasya ktici pratyaye parata ākāra ādeśo bhavati, lopaś ca asya
GS24jvkasipu:40076: anyatarasyāṃgrahaṇam vispaṣṭārtham, yesambaddhaṃ hi vibhāṣāgrahaṇam iti nivṛttam ity āśaṅkyeta
GS24jvkasipu:40080: na lyapi (*6,4.69) iti prāg etasmād yad ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ ārdhahdātuke ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:40087: pratyayalopalakṣaṇapratiṣedhārthaṃ syāt ity etan na jñāpakaṃ śapo lopābhāvasya /
GS24jvkasipu:40114: syasicsīyuṭtāsiṣu bhāvakarmaṇor upadeśe 'jjhanagrahadṛśāṃ vā ciṇvadiṭ ca
GS24jvkasipu:40118: hriyeta yagantasya ajantatvāc ciṇvadbhāve sati vṛddhiḥ syāt, tataś ca yuk
GS24jvkasipu:40120: ato lopo yalopaś ca ṇilopaś ca prayojanam /
GS24jvkasipu:40121: āllopa ītvam etvam ca ciṇvadbhavaś ca sīyuṭi //
GS24jvkasipu:40124: bhrasjo rephasya upadhāyāś ca ram anyatarasyāṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40125: ropadhayoḥ iti sthānaṣaṣṭhīnirdeśāt upadhā rephaś ca nivartete /
GS24jvkasipu:40131: bhṛṣṭaḥ, bhṛṣṭavān ity atra pūrvavipratiṣedhena samprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40154: hala uttarasya yaśabdasya ārdhadhātuke lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40159: tatra alo 'ntyasya (*1,1.52) ity etan na bhavati, ato lopaḥ (*6,4.48) iti yakāro 'nena lupyate
GS24jvkasipu:40166: kyasya hala uttarasya vibhāṣā lopo bhavati ārdhadhātuke /
GS24jvkasipu:40169: samidhamātmanaḥ icchati, samidham iva ātmānam ācarati iti vā kyackyaṅau yathāyogam kartavyau
GS24jvkasipu:40195: seḍgrahaṇasāmarthyād iha pūrveṇa api na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40196: sanīvantardha (*7,2.49) iti jñaperiṭi vikalpite yasya vibhāṣā (*7,2.15)
GS24jvkasipu:40198: atha punaḥ ekācaḥ iti tatra anuvartate, tadā nityam atra bhavitavyam eva iḍāgamena iti seḍgrahaṇam anarthakam ? tat kriyate kālāvadhāraṇārtham,
GS24jvkasipu:40200: akṛte hi tatra ṇilope sati kāritam ity atra ekāca upadeśe 'nudāttāt
GS24jvkasipu:40204: janitā iti mantraviṣaye iḍādau ṇilopo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:40209: yajñakarmaṇi śamitā iti iḍādau tṛci ṇilopo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:40212: yajñe iti kim ? śṛtaṃ haviḥ śamayitaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:40215: ām anta ālu āyya itnu iṣṇu ity eteṣu parataḥ ṇeḥ ayādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40230: lyapi parato laghupūrvād varṇād uttarasya ṇeḥ ayādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40231: praṇamayya, pratamayya, pradamayya, praśamayya, sandamyya gataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40234: hrasvayalopāl lopānām asiddhatvaṃ na bhavati asamānāśrayatvāt, hrasvādayo hi ṇau, lyapi ṇerayādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40238: āpa uttarasya ṇerlyapi parato vibhāṣā ayādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40240: iṅādeśasya lākṣaṇikatvān na bhavati, adhyāpya gataḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:40243: yu plu ity etayor lyapi parataḥ chandasi viṣaye dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40250: kṣiyaś ca dīrgho bhavati lyapi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40254: ṇyataḥ kṛtyasya artho bhāvakarmaṇī, tābhyām anyatra yā niṣṭhā tasyāṃ kṣiyo
GS24jvkasipu:40260: prakṣīṇam idam devadattasya iti kto 'dhikaraṇe ca dhrauvya-gati.
GS24jvkasipu:40262: aṇyadarthe iti kim ? akṣitamasi mā mekṣeṣṭhāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40263: kṣitam iti bhāve dīrghābhāvāt kṣiyo dīrghāt (*8,2.46) iti niṣṭhānatvam api
GS24jvkasipu:40267: ākrośe gamyamāne dainye ca kṣiyo niṣṭhāyām aṇyadarthe vā dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40274: sva sic sīyuṭ tāsi ity eteṣu bhāvakarmaviṣayeṣu parata upadeśe ajantānām aṅgānāṃ han graḥ dṛś ity eteṣāṃ ca ciṇvat kāryaṃ bhavati vā /
GS24jvkasipu:40279: kāni punar asya yogasya prayojanāni ? ciṇvadvṛddhir yuk ca hanteś ca ghatvaṃ dīrghaś ca+ukto yo mitāṃ vā ciṇīti /
GS24jvkasipu:40280: iṭ ca asiddhas tena me lupyate ṇirnityaś ca ayaṃ valnimitto vighātī //
GS24jvkasipu:40291: graho 'liṭi dīrghaḥ (*7,2.37) iti prakṛtasya iṭo dīrghatvam /
GS24jvkasipu:40316: upadeśe iti kim ? kāriṣyate iti guṇe kṛte raparatve ca na prāpnoti,
GS24jvkasipu:40319: aṅgādhikāravihitaṃ kāryam iha atidiśyate, tena haniṇiṅāmādeśā na bhavanti
GS24jvkasipu:40323: hano vadha liṅi (*2,4.42), luṅi ca (*2,4.43), iṇo gā luṅi (*2,4.45),
GS24jvkasipu:40324: vibhāṣā luṅlṛṅoḥ (*2,4.50) ity ete vidhayo na bhavanti //
GS24jvkasipu:40327: dīṅo yuḍāgamo bhavati ajādau kṅiti pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40329: dīṅaḥ iti pañcamīnirdeśād ajāder yuḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40330: vidhānasāmarthyāc ca er aneka-aco 'saṃyogapūrvasya (*6,4.82) iti yaṇādeśe kartavye tasya siddhatvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40335: iṭy ajādāv ārdhadhātuke kṅiti ca ākārāntasya aṅgasya lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40350: rāter lāteś ca laṅi iṭi rūpam /
GS24jvkasipu:40355: īkāraḥ ādeśo bhavati ākārantasya aṅgasya yati parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40362: ghusañjñākānām aṅgānāṃ, mā sthā gā pā jahāti sā ity eteṣāṃ halādau kṅiti pratyaye parataḥ īkārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40376: pāter iha grahaṇaṃ na asti, lugvikaraṇatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:40380: jahāter iha nirdeśāt jihāter grahaṇaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40388: etad eva halgrahaṇaṃ jñāpakam asmin prakaraṇe vipratiṣedhena asiddhatvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40406: ghvādibhyaḥ anyasya saṃyogāder ākārāntasya vā ekārādeśo bhavati liṅi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40415: lyapi pratyaye parataḥ ghumāsthāgāpājahātisāṃ yaduktaṃ tanna /
GS24jvkasipu:40426: mayater ikārādeśo vā bhavati lyapi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40430: luṅ laṅ lṛṅ ity eteṣu parato 'ṅgasya aḍāgamo bhavati, udāttaś ca sa
GS24jvkasipu:40440: āḍāgamo bhavati ajādīnāṃ luṅ-laṅ-lṛṅ-kṣu parataḥ, udāttaś ca sa bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40453: iha aijyata, aupyata, auhyata iti laṅi kṛte lāvasthāyām aḍāgamād
GS24jvkasipu:40454: antaraṅgatvāl lādeśaḥ kriyate, tatra kṛte vikaraṇo nityatvād aḍāgamaṃ bādhate /
GS24jvkasipu:40455: śabdāntaraprāpter aḍāgamasya anityatvam, kṛte hi vikaraṇāntasya aṅgasya tena bhavitavyam, akṛte tu dhātumātrasya śabdāntarasya prāpnuvan vidhiranityo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40456: nanu śabdāntarād iti vikaraṇo 'nityaḥ ? vikaraṇe kṛte samprasāraṇam
GS24jvkasipu:40457: aḍāgamān nityatvād eva bhavati, samprasāraṇe ca kṛte 'jādyaṅgaṃ jātam iti āḍajādīnām ity āḍāgamaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:40461: yatra hi vihitaḥ tato 'nyatra api dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:40462: āṅajādīnām (*6,4.72) ity uktam, anajādīnām api dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:40466: āvaḥ iti vṛño luṅi mantre ghasahvara iti lerluki kṛte ca bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40471: māṅyoge luṅlaṅlṛṅkṣu yad uktaṃ tan na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40482: chandasi viṣaye māṅyoge 'pi bahulam aḍāṭau bhavataḥ, amāṅyoge 'pi na bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40486: māṅyoge 'pi bhavataḥ - mā vaḥ kṣetre parabījānyavāpsuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40491: ire ity etasya chadasi viṣaye bahulaṃ re ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40494: dhāño rebhāvasya asiddhatvād āto lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40497: atra reśabdasya seṭoṃ dhātūnāmiṭi kṛte punā rebhāvaḥ kriyate, tadartham irayoḥ ity ayaṃ dvivacananirdeśaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:40500: śnupratyayāntasya aṅgasya dhātoḥ ivarṇa-uvarṇāntasya bhru ity etasya iyaṅ uvaṅ ity etāv ādeśau bhavato 'jādau pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40526: iyaṅuvaṅprakaraṇe tanvādīnāṃ chandasi bahulam upasaṅkhyānaṃ kartavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:40537: abhyāsasya ivarṇovarṇāntasya avasarṇe 'ci parataḥ iyaṅ uvaṅ ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40549: strī ity etasya ajādau pratyaye parataḥ iyaṅ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40555: ami śasi parataḥ striyāṃ vā iyaṅ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40565: madhye 'pavadāḥ pūrvān vidhīn bādhante iti guṇavṛddhibhyāṃ paratvādayaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:40571: dhātoḥ iti vartate, tena saṃyogo viśeṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:40572: dhātor avayavaḥ saṃyogaḥ pūrvo yasmād ivarṇāna bhavati asāvasaṃyogapūrvaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:40573: tadantasya aṅgasya anekāco 'ci parato yaṇādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40580: eḥ iti kim ? asaṃyogapūrvagrahaṇam ivarṇaviśeṣaṇaṃ yathā syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:40582: luluvatuḥ, luluvuḥ ity etat tu oḥ supi (*6,4.83) iti niyamādapi sidhyati /
GS24jvkasipu:40587: dhātunā saṃyogaviśeṣaṇam kim ? iha api syād unnyau, unnyaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:40588: gatikārakābhyām anyapūrvasya neṣyate, paramaniyau, paramaniyaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:40591: dhātv avayavaḥ saṃyogaḥ pūrvo yasmād uvarṇān na bhavati, tadantasya aṅgasya anekācaḥ ajādau supi parato yaṇādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40608: varṣābhū ity etasya ajādau supi parato yaṇādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40619: bhū sudhī ity etayor yaṇādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40626: chandasi viṣaye bhū sudhi ity etayoḥ ubhayathā dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:40633: hu ity etasya aṅgasya śnupratyayāntasya anekācaḥ asaṃyogapūrvasya ajādau sārvadhātuke parato yaṇādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40642: idam eva huśnugrahaṇaṃ jñāpakaṃ bhāṣāyām api yaṅlugasti iti /
GS24jvkasipu:40643: chandasi chandasy ubhayathā (*6,4.86) ity ārdhadhātukatvād eva yaṇādeśasya aprasaṅgaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40644: naca yaṅlugantādayat pratyudāharaṇam uvarṇāntam anekāc asaṃyogapūrvaṃ sārvadhātuke vidyate
GS24jvkasipu:40651: bhuvo vugāgamo bhavati luṅi liṭi ca ajādau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40656: goho 'ṅgasya upadhāyā ūkārādeśo bhavati ajādau pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40663: upadhāyāḥ iti kim ? alaḥ antyasya mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:40665: yatra asya+etad rūpaṃ tatra+eva yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:40669: nigūhya gataḥ ity ūtvasya asiddhatvād lyapi laghupūrvād iti ṇerayādeśaḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:40670: vyāśrayatvād eva asiddhatvam atra na asti, ṇāvūtvaṃ, ṇyantasya ca lyapyayādeśa iti /
GS24jvkasipu:40675: doṣaḥ upadhāyā ūkāraḥ ādeśo bhavati ṇau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40682: cittavikarārthe doṣa upadhāyā vā ūkārādeśo bhavati ṇau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40687: mito dhātavaḥ ghaṭādayo mitaḥ ity evam ādayo ye pratipāditāḥ, teṣām upadhāyā hrasvo bhavati ṇau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40696: tena utkrāmayati, saṅkrāmayati ity evam ādi siddhaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:40699: ciṇpare ṇamulpare ca ṇau parataḥ mitām aṅgānām upadhāyāḥ dīrgho bhavati anyatarasyāṃ /
GS24jvkasipu:40704: dīrghagrahaṇaṃ kiṃ, na hrasvavikalpa eva vidhīyate ? na+evaṃ śakyam,
GS24jvkasipu:40705: śamayantaṃ prayuṅkte iti dvitīye ṇici hrasvavikalpo na syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:40706: ṇilopasya sthānivadbhāvād dīrghavidhau tvajādeśo na sthānivat /
GS24jvkasipu:40712: yo 'sau ṇau ṇirlupyate, yaś ca yaṅkāraḥ, tayor dirghavidhau ādeśo na sthānivad bhavati iti asthānivadbhāvāt dīrghaḥ siddho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40716: ṇau hi ṇiyaṅor lopaḥ, ciṇṇamulpare ṇāvaṅgasya dīrghatvam //
GS24jvkasipu:40719: khacpare ṇau parato hrasvo bhavati aṅgasya upadhāyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40725: hlādo 'ṅgasya upadhāyāḥ hrasvo bhavati niṣṭhāyāṃ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40729: hlādaḥ iti yogavibhāgaḥ kriyate, ktinyapi yathā stāt, prahlattiḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:40732: chāder aṅgasya advyupasargasya ghapratyaye parataḥ upadhāyāḥ hrasvo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40735: ṇilopasya asiddhatvaṃ sthānivadbhāvo vāvacanasāmarthyād atra na bhavati iti hrasvabhāvinī upadhā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40739: uttarā hi saṅkhyā pūrvasaṅkhyākṛtaṃ vyapadeśam nivartayati, nahi triputro dviputraḥ iti vyapadiśyate //
GS24jvkasipu:40742: is man tran kvi ity eteṣu parataḥ chādeḥ upadhāyāḥ hrasvo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40750: gama hana jana khā ghasa ity eteṣām aṅgānām upadhāyā lopo bhavaty ajādau pratyaye kṅiti anaṅi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40769: tani pati ity etayoḥ chandasi viṣaye upadhāyā lopo bhavati ajādau kṅiti pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40776: ghasi bhasa ity etayoḥ chandasi upadhāyā lopo bhavati lahādau ajādau ca kgiti pratyaye parataḥ
GS24jvkasipu:40777: sagdhiś ca me sapītiś ca me /
GS24jvkasipu:40779: sagdhiḥ iti adeḥ ktini bahulaṃ chandasi iti ghaslādeśe upadhāyāḥ lope ca kṛte jhalo jhali (*8,2.26) iti sakāralopaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40781: tataḥ samānā gdhiḥ sagdhiḥ iti samāse kṛte samānasya sabhāvaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40782: babdhām iti bhaser loṭi tāmi ślau dvirvacane kṛte upadhālopasalopadhatvajaśtvāni kartavyāni
GS24jvkasipu:40783: dvirvacanāt paratvān nityatvāc ca upadhālopaḥ prāpnoti, chāndasatvāt sa tathā na kriyate
GS24jvkasipu:40788: hu ity etasmād jhalantebhyas ca+uttarasya halādeḥ heḥ sthāne dhirādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40797: iha juhutāt, bhintāt tvam iti paratvāt tātaṅi kṛte sakṛdgatau vipratiṣedhena yad badhitaṃ tad bādhitam eva iti punaḥ dhibhāvo na bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:40798: bhindhaki, chindhaki ity atra paratvād dhibhāve kṛte punaḥ prasaṅgavijñānād akac kriyate //
GS24jvkasipu:40801: śru śṛṇu pṝ kṛ vṛ ity etebhya uttarasya heḥ dhirādeśo havati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:40807: śṛṇudhi ity atra dhibhāvavidhānasāmārthyād utaś ca pratyayāt iti herluk na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40809: ato 'nyatra vyatyayo bahulam iti śap, tasya bahulaṃ chandasi iti luk //
GS24jvkasipu:40818: rārandhi iti ramervyatyayena parasmaipadam , śapaḥ ślu, abhyāsadīrghatvaṃ chāndasatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:40829: akāritarām, ahāritamām ity atra talopasya asiddhatvāt taraptamapor na lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40830: ciṇo luk ity etad viṣayabhedād bhidyate //
GS24jvkasipu:40833: akārāntād aṅgād uttarasya heḥ lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40845: ukāro yo 'saṃyogapūrvaḥ tadantāt pratyayād uttarasya herluk bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40857: utaś ca pratyayādityatra chandasi vā iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:40861: lopaś ca asya anyatarasyāṃ ṃvoḥ || PS_6,4.107 ||
GS24jvkasipu:40863: yo 'yam ukāro 'saṃyogapūrvaḥ tadantasya pratyayasya anyatarasyāṃ lopo bhavati vakāram akārādau pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40875: karoteḥ uttarasya ukārapratyayasya vakāramakārādau pratyaye parataḥ nityaṃ lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40878: ukāralopasya dīrghavidhau asthānivadbhāvād hali ca (*8,2.77) iti dīrghatvaṃ prāptam, na bhakurchurām (*8,2.71) iti pratiṣidhyate //
GS24jvkasipu:40881: yakārādauca pratyaye parataḥ karoteḥ uttarasya ukārapratyayasya nityaṃ lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40885: ukārapratyayāntasya karoteḥ akārasya sthāne ukāraḥ ādeśo bhavati sārvadhātuke kṅiti parataḥ
GS24jvkasipu:40888: sārvadhātukagrahaṇaṃ kim ? bhūtapūrve 'pi sārvadhātuke yathā syāt, kuru /
GS24jvkasipu:40895: śnasya asteś ca akārasya lopo bhavati sārvadhātuke kṅiti parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40904: śnasoḥ iti ākārasya pararūpatvaṃ śakandhvādisu draṣṭavyam //
GS24jvkasipu:40907: śnā ity etasya abhyastānāṃ ca aṅgānām ākārasya lopo bhavati sārvadhātuke kṅiti parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40925: śnāntānām aṅgānām abhyastānāṃ ca ghuvarjitānām ātaḥ īkārādeśo bhavati halādau sārvadhātuke kṅiti parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40946: daridrāteḥ halādau sārvadhātuke kṅiti parataḥ ikarādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40953: siddhaś ca pratyayavidhau bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:40955: ākārāntalakṣaṇo ṇapratyayo na bhavati, pacāditvādajeva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40956: na daridrāyake lopo daridrāṇe ca neṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:40960: daridrasya iti nirdeśe chāndasaṃ hrasvatvam draṣtavyam //
GS24jvkasipu:40963: bhī ity etasya aṅgasya anyatarasyām ikārādeśo bhavati halādau kṅiti sārvadhātuke parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40973: jahāteś ca ikārādeśo bhavati anyatarasyāṃ halādau kṅiti sārvadhātuke parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40983: jahāter ākāraś ca antādeśo bhavati ikāraś ca anyatarasyāṃ hau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40987: lopo bhavati jahāteḥ yakārādau kṅiti sārvadhātuke parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40991: ghusañjñākānām aṅgānām asteś ca ekārādeśo bhavati hau parataḥ abhyāsalopaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:40999: liṭi parata ādeśaḥ ādir yasya aṅgasya na asti tasya ekahalmadhye asahāyayor halor madhye yo 'kāras tasya ekārādeśo bhavati, abhyāsalopaḥ ca liṭi kṅiti parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41021: liṭaḥ ādeśaviśeṣaṇaṃ kim ? iha api yathā syāt, nematuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41024: anaimittike natvasatve, tadādir liṭi ādeśādirna bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41025: iha abhyāsajaśtvacartvayor asiddhatvaṃ nāsti, tena tadādir apy ādeśādir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41027: rūpābhede cādeśādir na aśrīyate iti śasidadyoḥ pratiṣedhavacanaṃ jñāpakam /
GS24jvkasipu:41028: anyathā hi pecatuḥ, pecuḥ, dematuḥ, demuḥ ity evam ādīnām api prakṛtijaścarādīnām etvaṃ na syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:41038: aneśam iti naśeḥ luṅi puṣāditvād aṅ /
GS24jvkasipu:41039: menakā iti maneḥ āśiṣi ca (*3,1.150) iti vun /
GS24jvkasipu:41049: laṅi iṭi chandasyapi dṛśyate (*6,4.73) iti anajāder api iḍāgamaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:41052: thali ca seṭi parato 'nādeśādeḥ aṅgasya ekahalmadhyagatasya ataḥ sthāne ekāra ādeśo bhavati, abhyāsalopaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:41065: tṝ phala bhaja trapa ity eteṣām aṅgānām ata ekārādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:41066: abhyāsalopaś ca liṭi kṅiti parataḥ thali ca seṭi /
GS24jvkasipu:41085: rādhaḥ hiṃsāyāmarthe 'varṇasya ekāraḥ ādeśo bhavati, abhyāsalopaś ca liṭi
GS24jvkasipu:41093: ataḥ ity etad iha+upasthitaṃ taparatvakṛtamapāsya kālaviśeṣam asambhavād
GS24jvkasipu:41095: atha vā śnābhyas tayor ātaḥ (*6,4.112) ity anuvartate iti vyākhyeyam /
GS24jvkasipu:41096: ekahalmadhye vā yaḥ sa sthānī bhaviṣyati //
GS24jvkasipu:41099: jṝ bhramu trasa ity eteṣām aṅgānām ataḥ sthāne vā ekāra ādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:41100: abhyāsalopaś ca liṭi kṅiti parataḥ thali ca seṭi /
GS24jvkasipu:41121: phaṇādīnāṃ saptānāṃ dhātūnām avarṇasya sthāne vā ekāra ādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:41122: abhyāsalopaś ca liṭi kṅiti parataḥ thali ca seṭi /
GS24jvkasipu:41158: śasa dada ity etayoḥ vakārādīnāṃ ca dhātūnāṃ guṇa ity evam abhinirvṛttasya ca yo 'kāraḥ tasya sthāne ekārādeśo na bhavati, abhyāsalopaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:41171: guṇaśabdābhinirvṛttasya arśabdasya okārasya ca ayam akāraḥ iti etvaṃ pratiṣidhyate //
GS24jvkasipu:41174: arvan ity etasya aṅgasya tṛ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati, suścet tataḥ paro na
GS24jvkasipu:41175: bhavati, sa ca naña uttaro na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41188: maghavan ity etasya aṅgasya bahulaṃ tṛ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41202: bhasya ity ayam adhikāraḥ ā adhyāyaparisamāapteḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41203: yad ita ūrdhvam anukamiṣyāmaḥ bhasya ity evaṃ tadvedivyam /
GS24jvkasipu:41212: tadantasya aṅgasya bhasya pat ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41213: sa ca nirdiśyamānasyādeśā bhavanti iti pācchabdasya+eva bhavati, na tadantasya sarvasya /
GS24jvkasipu:41231: ākāralope kartavye vasusaṃprasāraṇasya vyāśrayatvād asiddhatvam na bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:41235: vāhaḥ ity evam antasya bhasya ūṭḥ ity etat samprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41243: atha kimarthamūṭḥ kriyate, samprasāraṇe eva kṛte guṇe ca vṛddhir eci
GS24jvkasipu:41244: (*6,1.88) iti vṛddhau satyām siddhaṃ rūpaṃ bhavati praṣṭhauhaḥ iti,
GS24jvkasipu:41246: etaj jñāpayati, bhavatyeṣā paribhāṣā asiddhaṃ bahiraṅgam antaraṅge iti /
GS24jvkasipu:41247: tasyāṃ hi satyāṃ bahiraṅgasya samprasāraṇasya asiddhatvāt antaraṅgo guṇo na syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:41250: śvan yuvan maghavan ity eteṣām aṅgānām ataddhite pratyaye parataḥ samprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41275: an ity evam antasya bhasya akāralopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41286: ṣakārapūrvo yaḥ an hanaḥ dhṛtarājñaś ca tasya akāralopo bhavati aṇi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41293: an iti prakṛtibhāvena allopaṭilopau ubhāvapi na bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41297: ṅau parataḥ śīśabde ca ano vibhāṣā akāralopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41303: vakāra-makārāntāt saṃyogād uttarasya anaḥ akārasya lopo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41343: ātaḥ iti yogavibhāgaḥ, tena ktvo lyap, halaḥ śnaḥ śānac ity evam ādi
GS24jvkasipu:41347: mantreṣu āgi parataḥ ātmanaḥ āderlopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41356: bhasya viṃśateḥ tiśabdasy aṅiti pratyaye lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41364: ṭisañjñakasya ḍiti pratyaye parataḥ lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41371: ḍiti abhasya api anubandhakaraṇasāmarthyat ṭilopo bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:41374: nakārāntasya bhasya ṭeḥ lopo bhavati taddhite parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41383: atra ye innantāḥ teṣām in aṇy anapatye (*6,4.164) iti prakṛtibhāvaḥ prāptaḥ, ye tu anantāḥ teṣām an (*6,4.167) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:41389: śaiśikeṣv artheṣu vṛddhatvād atra chaḥ prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:41405: ke punaḥ sāyaṃprātikādayaḥ ? yeṣām avyayānām avihitaṣṭilopaḥ, prayoge ca dṛśyate, te sāyaṃprātikaprakārāḥ grahītavyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41412: ārātīyaḥ, śāśvatikaḥ, śāśvataḥ ity evam ādiṣu na dṛśyate ṭilopaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:41415: ahan ity etasya ṭakhor eva parataḥ ṭilopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41417: dve ahanī adhīṣṭo bhṛto bhūto bhāvī vā dvyahīnaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41422: iha mā bhūt, ahnā nirvṛttam āhnikam /
GS24jvkasipu:41424: ahnaḥ eva ṭakhoḥ ity evaṃ niyamo na bhavisyati, ātmādhvānau khe (*6,1.169)
GS24jvkasipu:41428: uvarṇāntasya bhasya guṇo bhavati taddhite parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41437: orot iti vaktavye guṇagrahaṇaṃ sañjñāpūrvako vidhir anityo yathā syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:41441: ḍhe parataḥ uvarṇāntasya bhasya akarvāḥ lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41446: akadrvāḥ iti kim ? kādraveyo mantram apaśyat //
GS24jvkasipu:41449: ivarṇāntasya avarṇātasya ca bhasya ikāre pare taddhite ca lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41453: savarnadīrghatve hi sati atisakher āgacchati ity atra ekādeśasya antavattvād askhi iti ghisañjñāyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:41469: auṅaḥ śībhāve kṛte yasya+iti ca iti, sūryatiṣyāgastyamatsyānāṃ ya upadhāyāḥ (*6,4.149) iti ca lopaḥ prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:41471: vatsān prīṇāti vatsaprīḥ, tasya apatyam vātsapreyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41476: sūrya tisya agastya matsya ity eteṣāṃ yakārasya upadhāyāḥ bhasya lopo bhavati īti paratastaddhite ca /
GS24jvkasipu:41478: aṇi yo yasya+iti lopaḥ tasya asiddhatvaṃ na asti, vyāśrayatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:41479: īkāre tu yastasyā - siddhatvād upadhāyakāro bhasyāṇantasya sūryasya sambandhī iti lupyate
GS24jvkasipu:41482: agastya - agastyasya apatyaṃ strī, ṛṣitvādaṇi kṛte āgastī /
GS24jvkasipu:41489: iha mā bhūt, matsyasya+idaṃ māṃsaṃ mātsyam /
GS24jvkasipu:41495: iha mā bhūt, sauryam caruṃ nirvapet /
GS24jvkasipu:41501: antikaśabdasya tasipratyaye parataḥ kakāradeḥ śabdasya lopaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:41505: tamapratyaye antikaśabdasya takārādeḥ kakārādeś ca lopo vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41509: anyatra api hi vṛśyate, antike sīdati iti antiṣat /
GS24jvkasipu:41516: hala uttarasya taddhitayakārasya upadhāyāḥ īti parato lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41520: taddhitasya iti kim ? vaidyasya bhāryā vaidhyī //
GS24jvkasipu:41523: āpatyayakārasya halaḥ uttarasya taddhite anākārādau lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41532: halaḥ ity eva, kārikeyasya apatyaṃ kārikeyiḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:41535: kya cvi ity etayoś ca parataḥ āpatyayakārasya hala uttarasya lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41549: naḍādīnāṃ kuk ca (*4,2.91) iti kṛtakugāgamā bilvakādayo bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:41550: tebhyaḥ uttarasya chasya bhasya taddhite parato lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41551: bilvā yasyāṃ santi bilvakīyā, tasyāṃ bhavāḥ bailvakāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41561: chagrahaṇam kim ? chamātrasya lug yathā syāt, kuko nivṛttir mā bhūt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:41562: anyathā hi saṃniyogaśiṣṭānām anyatarāpāye ubhayor api abhāvaḥ iti kugapi nivarteta /
GS24jvkasipu:41563: luggrahaṇaṃ sarvalopo yathā syād, yakāramātrasya mā bhūt //
GS24jvkasipu:41566: iṣṭhan imanic īyasun ity eteṣu parataḥ tṛśabdasya lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41572: antyasya hi ṭeḥ (*6,4.155) ity eva siddhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41573: lug ity etad atra na anuvartate, tathā hi sati na lumatāṅgasya (*1,1.63)
GS24jvkasipu:41586: ṇāviṣṭhavat prātipadikasya kāryaṃ bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:41601: etad ubhayam api udāharaṇamātram, na parigaṇanam /
GS24jvkasipu:41605: sthūla dūra yuva hrasva kṣipra kṣudra ity eteṣāṃ yaṇādiparaṃ lupyate iṣṭhemeyassu parataḥ, pūrvasya ca guṇo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41622: paragrahaṇaṃ kim ? yaviṣṭhaḥ, yavīyān, hrasiṣṭhaḥ, hrasīyān ity atra
GS24jvkasipu:41628: priya sthira sphira uru bahula guru vṛddha tṛpra dīrgha vṛndāraka ity eteṣāṃ pra stha spha var baṃhi gar varṣi trap drādhi vṛnda ity ete yathāsaṅkhyam ādeśā bhavanti iṣṭhemeyassu parataḥ priya - preṣṭhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41653: priyorugurubahuladīrghāḥ pṛthvādiṣu paṭhyante, tena anyeṣāmimanij na
GS24jvkasipu:41655: bahor lopo bhū ca bahoḥ || PS_6,4.158 ||
GS24jvkasipu:41657: bahor uttareṣām iṣthemeyasāṃ lopo bhavati, tasya ca bahoḥ sthāne bhū ity
GS24jvkasipu:41662: bahor iti punargrahaṇaṃ sthānitvapratipattyartham, anyathā hi pratyayānām
GS24jvkasipu:41666: bahor uttarasya iṣṭhasya yiḍāgamo bhavati, bahoś ca bhūrādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41673: lopasya yiṭā vyavahitatvāt āt ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:41674: lope hi sati akṛdyakāra iti dīrghatvena jyāyān iti sidhyati //
GS24jvkasipu:41677: raśabda ādeśo bhavati ṛkārasya halāder laghoḥ iṣṭhemeyassu parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41694: pṛthuṃ mṛduṃ bhṛśaṃ ca+eva kṛśaṃ ca dṛḍham eva ca /
GS24jvkasipu:41695: paripūrvaṃ vṛḍhaṃ ca+eva ṣaḍetān ravidhau smaret //
GS24jvkasipu:41696: tataḥ iha na bhavati, kṛtamācaṣṭe kṛtayati /
GS24jvkasipu:41701: ṛju ity etasya ṛtaḥ sthāne vibhāṣā repha ādeśo bhavati iṣṭhemeyassu parataḥ chandasi viṣaye
GS24jvkasipu:41706: ekāc yad bhasañjñākaṃ tad iṣṭhemeyassu parataḥ prakṛtyā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41707: sragvinn ity etasya vinnantasya srajiṣṭhaḥ, srajīyān, srajayati /
GS24jvkasipu:41708: srugvad ity etasya matvantasya sruciṣthaḥ, srucīyān, srucayati /
GS24jvkasipu:41709: ekāc iti kim ? vasumat ity etasya vasiṣṭhaḥ, vasīyān /
GS24jvkasipu:41711: ake pratyaye parato rājanya manuṣya yuvan ity ete prakṛtyā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:41714: āpatyasya ca taddhite 'nāti (*6,4.151) iti yalopaḥ prakṛtibhāvena na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41717: tasya nas taddhite (*6,4.144) iti ṭilopo na bhavati //
