GS24jvkasipu:41724: abhividhau bhāva inuṇ (*3,3.44), aṇinuṇaḥ (*5,4.15) ity aṇ /
GS24jvkasipu:41726: aṇi iti kim ? daṇḍināṃ samūho dāṇḍam /
GS24jvkasipu:41731: gāthin vidathin keśin gaṇin paṇin ity ete ca aṇi prakṛtyā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:41740: saṃyogādiś ca in aṇi prakṛtyā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41746: annantamaṇi prakṛtyā bhavati apatye cānapatye ca /
GS24jvkasipu:41753: yakārādau ca taddhite abhāvakarmaṇor arthayoḥ an prakṛtyā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41755: vemanyaḥ abhāvakarmaṇoḥ iti kim ? rājño bhāvaḥ karma vā rājyam /
GS24jvkasipu:41756: rājan iti purohitādiṣu paṭhyate, tato 'yaṃ yakpratyayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:41759: ātman adhvan ity etau khe parataḥ prakṛtyā bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41764: pratyātmam iti avyayībhāve anaś ca (*5,4.108) iti samāsāntaḥ ṭacpratyayaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:41765: prādhvam iti upasargād adhvanaḥ (*5,4.85) iti acpratyayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:41768: mapūrvaḥ an avarmaṇo 'ṇi parato 'patye 'rthe na prakṛtyā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41772: apatye iti kim ? carmaṇā parivṛto rathaḥ cārmaṇaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41779: brāhmaḥ ity etad apatyādhikāre 'pi sāmarthyād apatyād anyatrāṇi
GS24jvkasipu:41786: apatye ātāvaṇi brahmaṇaṣ ṭilopo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41794: yady evaṃ kim artham idam, nas taddhite (*6,4.144) ity eva ṭilopaḥ siddhaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:41797: etaj jñāpayati tācchīlike ṇe 'ṇkṛtāni bhavanti iti /
GS24jvkasipu:41798: tena caurī, tāpasī iti ṇāntād api īkāraḥ siddho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41799: tācchīlye iti kim ? karmaṇaḥ idaṃ kārmaṇam //
GS24jvkasipu:41802: aukṣam iti anapatye 'ṇi ṭilopo nipātyate aukṣaṃ padam /
GS24jvkasipu:41807: dāṇdināyana hāstināyana ātharvaṇika jaihmāśineya vāsināyani bhrauṇahatya dhaivatya sārava aikṣvāka maitreya hiraṇmaya ity etāni nipātyante /
GS24jvkasipu:41808: daṇḍin hastin ity etau naḍādiṣu paṭhayete, tayorāyane parataḥ prakṛtibhāvo
GS24jvkasipu:41810: keṣāṃcit tu hastin iti naḍādiṣu na paṭhyate, teṣām ata eva nipātanāt phagapi bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41814: atharvaṇā prokto grantho 'pi upacārāt atharvan iti ucyate, tamadhīte yaḥ sa ātharvaṇikaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:41816: jihmāśin iti śubhrādiṣu paṭhyate, tasya ṇye parataḥ prakṛtibhāvo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:41822: bhrūṇahan, dhīvan ity etayoḥ ṣyañi parataḥ takārādeśo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:41825: hanasto 'ciṇṇaloḥ (*7,3.32) iti yat tatvaṃ tad dhātupratyaya eva iti
GS24jvkasipu:41826: bhrauṇaghnaḥ, vārtraghnaḥ ity atra na bhavati, ataḥ bhrauṇahatye tatvaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:41828: sārava iti sarayū ity etasya aṇi parato yūśabdasya va ity ādeśo nipātyate
GS24jvkasipu:41832: ikṣvākoḥ upatyam, janapadaśabdāt kṣatriyādañ (*4,1.166) iti añ, tatra ukāralopo nipātyate
GS24jvkasipu:41837: mitrayuśabdo gṛṣṭyādiṣu paṭhyate, tato ḍhañi kṛte yāderiyādeśāpavādo yuśabdalopo nipātyate
GS24jvkasipu:41839: atha kimarthaṃ mitrayuśabdo bidādiṣv eva na paṭhyate, tatrāñi kṛte yādeḥ
GS24jvkasipu:41840: iti iyādeśenaiva siddham, evaṃ ca yulopārthaṃ nipātanaṃ kartavyaṃ na
GS24jvkasipu:41841: bhavati, yaskādiṣu ca bahuṣu lugarthaḥ pāṭho na kartavyo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:41842: mitrayavaḥ ity añaḥ yañañoś ca (*2,4.64) ity eva hi lukaḥ siddhatvāt ?
GS24jvkasipu:41844: mitrayūṇāṃ saṅghaḥ ity atra gotracaraṇād vuñaṃ bādhitvā maitreyakaḥ saṅghaḥ ity atra saṅgha-aṅka-lakṣaṇeṣv añ. yañ-iñām aṇ (*4,3.127) iti aṇ prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:41845: hiraṇmayam iti hiraṇyasya mayaṭi yādilopo nipātyate, hiraṇyasya vikāraḥ hiraṇmayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:41848: ṛtvya vāstvya vāstva mādhvī hiraṇyaya ity etāni nipātyante chandasi viṣaye
GS24jvkasipu:41849: ṛtu vāstu ity etayoḥ yati yaṇadeśo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:41856: hiraṇyaśabdād vihitasya mayaṭo maśabdasya lopo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:41858: iti śrīvāmanaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau ṣaṣṭhādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:41862: yu vu ity etayoḥ utsṛṣṭaviśeṣaṇayoḥ anunāsikayaṇoḥ pratyayayor grahaṇam,
GS24jvkasipu:41863: tayoḥ sthāne yathāsaṅkhyam ana aka ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41873: anunāsikayaṇoḥ iti kim ? ūrṇāyā yus (*5,2.123) - ūrṇāyuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41875: evam ādīnāṃ hi yaṇo 'nunāsikatvaṃ na pratijñāyate, pratijñānunāsikyāḥ pāṇinīyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41876: iha yuvor iti nirdeśād dvandvaikavadbhāvapakṣe anityam āgamaśāsanam iti num na kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:41877: napuṃsakaliṅgatā vā liṅgamaśiṣyaṃ lokāśrayatvāl liṅgasya iti na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41879: yuvoś ced dvitvanirdeśo dvitve yaṇ tu prasajyate /
GS24jvkasipu:41880: atha ced ekavadbhāvaḥ kathaṃ puṃvad bhavedayam //
GS24jvkasipu:41882: aśiṣyatvād dhi liṅgasya puṃstvaṃ veha samāśritam //
GS24jvkasipu:41885: āyan ey īn īy iy ity ete ādeśāḥ bhavanti yathāsaṅkhyaṃ pha ḍha kha cha gha ity eteṣā pratyayādīnām
GS24jvkasipu:41892: khasya īnādeśo bhavati kulāt khaḥ (*4,1.139) - āḍhyakulīnaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41907: kṛteṣv eteṣu pratyayādyudāttatvaṃ bhavati, tathā ca ghacchau ca (*4,4.117)
GS24jvkasipu:41909: śaṅkhaḥ, ṣaṇḍhaḥ ity evam ādīnāṃ hi uṇādayo bahulam iti bahulavacanād
GS24jvkasipu:41911: ṛter īyaṅ (*3,1.29) iti vāvacanaṃ jñāpakaṃ dhātupratyayānāmādeśābhāvasya /
GS24jvkasipu:41912: ejeḥ khaś (*3,2.28), padarujaviśaspṛśo ghañ (*3,3.16) ity evam ādiṣu tu itsañjñayā bhavitavyam
GS24jvkasipu:41913: taddhiteṣu hi khakāraghakārayor ādeśavacanam avakāśavaditi itsañjñāṃ bādhituṃ na+utsahate
GS24jvkasipu:41914: āyannīnoḥ nakārasya itsañjñāyāṃ prāptāyāṃ pratividhātavyam, nitkāryaṃ hi sambhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:41918: pratyayāvayavasya jhasya anta ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41922: adya śvo vijaniṣyamāṇāḥ patibhiḥ saha śayāntai /
GS24jvkasipu:41928: asminn apy antādeśe kṛte pratyayādyudāttvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41929: tathā ca jhacaḥ citkaraṇam arthavac bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:41932: abhyastā daṅgād uttarasya jhakārasya at ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41947: ātmanepadeṣu yo jhakāraḥ, tasya anakārāntāt aṅgāt uttarasya at ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41959: nityatvād atra vikaraṇe kṛte jho 'ntādeśena bhavitavyam ity adādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41960: anakārāntena aṅgena jhakāraviśeṣaṇaṃ kim ? iha mā bhūt, adya śvo vijaniṣyamāṇāḥ patibhiḥ śayāntai //
GS24jvkasipu:41963: śīṅo 'ṅgād uttarasya jhādeśasya ataḥ ruḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41968: sa yadi jhakārasya+eva syād adādeśo na syād ity ata eva ayam ādeśasya
GS24jvkasipu:41974: vetter aṅgād uttarasya jhādeśasya ato vibhāṣā ruḍhāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41978: vetteḥ iti lugvikaraṇasya grahaṇaṃ kim ? iha mā bhūt, vinte, vindāte,
GS24jvkasipu:41990: ṛduśo 'ḍi guṇaḥ (*7,4.16) ity etad api bahulavacanād eva atra na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:41993: akārāntād aṅgād uttarasya bhisaḥ ais ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41997: jarāmatikrāntaiḥ iti vigṛhya samāse kṛte hrasvatve ca bhisa aisādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41999: sannipātalakṣaṇo vidhir animittaṃ tadvighātasya iti paribhāṣā iyam anityā,
GS24jvkasipu:42005: etvam bhisi paratvāc ced ata ais kva bhaviṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:42006: kṛte 'py etve bhautapūrvyādais tu nityas tathā sati //
GS24jvkasipu:42007: ataḥ ityadhikāro jasaḥ śī iti yāvat //
GS24jvkasipu:42011: ataḥ ityuktam, anato 'pi bhavati nadyaiḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:42012: ato na bhavati , devebhiḥ sarvebhiḥ proktam iti //
GS24jvkasipu:42015: idam adas ity etayoḥ akakārayoḥ bhisa ais na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42020: akoḥ ity etad eva pratiṣedhavacanaṃ jñāpakam tanmadhyapatitastadgrahanena gṛhyate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:42021: idamadasoḥ kāt iti noktam, viparīto 'pi niyamaḥ sambhāvyeta idamadasor eva kāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:42022: tataś ca+iha na syāt, sarvakaiḥ, viśvakaiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42023: iha ca syād eva, ebhiḥ, amībhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42027: akārāntād aṅgād uttareṣām ṭāṅasiṅasām ina āt sya ity ete ādeśāḥ bhavanti yathāsaṅkhyam /
GS24jvkasipu:42040: yathā tu bhāṣye tathā na+etad iṣyate iti lakṣyate //
GS24jvkasipu:42044: akārāntād aṅgād uttarasya ṅe ity etasya yaḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42049: sannipātalakṣaṇo vidhir animittaṃ tadvighātasya iti paribhāṣeyam anityā,
GS24jvkasipu:42053: akārāntāt sarvanāmnaḥ uttarasya ṅeḥ smai ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42060: atho 'tra asmai ityanvādeśe 'śādeśe ekādeśaḥ prāpnoti ? tatra antaraṅgatvād ekādeśāt pūrvaṃ smaibhāvaḥ kriyate paścād ekādeśaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:42063: ṅasi ṅi ity etayor akārāntāt sarvanāmnaḥ uttarayoḥ smāt smin ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42082: pūrvādibhyo navabhyaḥ sarvanāmnaḥ uttarayoḥ ṅasiṅyoḥ smāt smin ity etāv ādeśau vā bhavataḥ
GS24jvkasipu:42105: akārāntāt sarvanāmnaḥ uttarasya jasaḥ śī ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42116: ābantād aṅgād uttarasya auṅaḥ śī ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42121: ṅakāraḥ sāmānyagrahaṇārthaḥ, auṭo 'pi grahaṇaṃ yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:42122: aukāro 'yaṃ śīvidhau ṅidgṛhīto ṅiccāsmākaṃ na asti ko 'yaṃ prakāraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42123: sāmānyārthas tasya ca asañjane 'smin ṅitkāryaṃ te śyāṃ prasaktam sa doṣaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:42124: ṅittve vidyād varṇanirdeśamātraṃ varṇe yat syāt tac ca vidyāt tadādau /
GS24jvkasipu:42125: varṇaścāyam tena ṅittve 'py adoṣo nirdeśo 'yaṃ pūrvasūtreṇa vā syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:42128: napuṃsakād aṅgād uttarasya auṅaḥ śī ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42139: napuṃsakād aṅgād uttarayoḥ jaśśasoḥ śi ity ayam ādeśo bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:42146: jasā sahacaritasya śaso grahaṇād iha na bhavati, kuṇḍaśo dadāti, vanśaḥ praviśanti iti //
GS24jvkasipu:42150: tasmād uttarayoḥ jaśśasoḥ auś ity ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42155: etad eva kṛtātvasya grahaṇaṃ jñāpakam aṣṭana ā vibhaktau (*7,2.84) ity ātvavikalpasya /
GS24jvkasipu:42156: ṣaḍbhyo luk (*7,1.22) ity asya ayam apavādaḥ, nāprāpte tasminn idam
GS24jvkasipu:42158: yas tu supo dhātuprātipadikayoḥ (*2,4.71) iti, tasmin prāpte ca aprāpte ca iti sa na bādhyate, aṣṭaputraḥ, aṣṭabhāryaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:42162: priyāṣṭanaḥ ity atrātvasya abhāvād auśtvaṃ na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:42174: yatra tu upasarjanaṃ ṣaṭ tato na bhavati, priyaṣaṣaḥ, priyapañcānaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:42177: su am ity etayoḥ napuṃsakād uttarayoḥ lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42184: tadbrāhmaṇakulam ity atra lukā tyadādyatvaṃ bādhyate, pūrvavipratiṣedhena nityatvād vā /
GS24jvkasipu:42185: luko hi nimittam ato 'm (*7,1.24) iti lakṣaṇāntareṇa vihanyate, na
GS24jvkasipu:42187: yasya ca lakṣaṇāntareṇa nimittaṃ vihanyate na tadanityaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:42190: akārāntān napuṃsakād uttarayoḥ svamoḥ am ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42194: makāraḥ kasmān na kriyate ? dhīrghatvaṃ prāpnoti //
GS24jvkasipu:42197: ḍatarādibhyaḥ parayoḥ svamoḥ adḍ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42207: ḍitkaraṇaṃ kim ? katarat tiṣṭhati ity atra pūrvasavarnadīrgho mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:42208: iha tu katarat paśya iti sthanivadbhāvād ami pūrvaṃtvena api sidhyati /
GS24jvkasipu:42209: evaṃ tarhi takārādeśa eva kasmān na vidhīyate ? he katarat iti sambuddher lopo mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:42211: aḍḍittvāḍ ḍatarādīnāṃ na lopo na api dīrghatā //
GS24jvkasipu:42214: itaraśabdād uttarayoḥ svamoḥ chandasi viṣaye adḍādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42219: ato 'm (*7,1.24) ity asmād anantaram itarāc chandasi iti vaktavyam ?
GS24jvkasipu:42220: netarācchandasi iti vacanaṃ yogavibhagartham ekatarād dhi sarvatra chandasi bhāṣāyāṃ pratiṣedha iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:42224: yuṣmad asmad ity etābhyām uttarasya ṅasaḥ aś ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42228: anyathā hi ādeśavyapadeśapraklṛptyarthamāder eva syāt, tataś ca yo 'ci
GS24jvkasipu:42233: ṅe ity etasya prathamayoś ca vibhaktyoḥ prathādvitīyayoḥ yuṣmadasmadbhyām uttarayoḥ am ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42257: yuṣmadasmadbhyām uttarasya bhyasaḥ bhyam ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42260: bhyamādeśe kṛte śeṣelope ca bahuvacane jhalyet (*7,3.103) iti etvaṃ prāpnoti, tat aṅgavṛtte punarvṛttāvavidhirniṣṭhitasya iti na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42262: yeṣāṃ tu śeṣelopaḥ ṭilopaḥ, teṣām abhyamādeśa eva /
GS24jvkasipu:42266: pañcamyāḥ bhyasaḥ yuṣmadasmadbhyām uttarasya at ity ayam ādeśo bhavati yuṣmad gacchanti /
GS24jvkasipu:42270: pañcamyā ekavacanasya yuṣmadasmadbhyām uttarasya at ity ayam ādeśo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:42276: tasya yuṣmadasmadbhyām uttarasya ākam ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42279: atha kimartham āgatasuṭko gṛhyate, na ghādeśavidhānakāle suḍ vidyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:42281: ādeśe kṛte hi śeṣelope yuṣmadasmador akārāntatvāt suṭ prāptnoti, sa sthānyantarbhūtatvāt nivartate
GS24jvkasipu:42283: akami tu sati hrasvakaraṇe tadvidhānasāmarthyād eva savarṇadīrghatvaṃ na prāpnoti ? tatsāmarthyam etvaṃ prati bhaviṣyati iti akārakaraṇametvanivṛttyartham iti /
GS24jvkasipu:42287: ākārāntād aṅgād uttarasya ṇalaḥ aukārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42292: atra autvam, ekādeśaḥ , sthānivadbhāvaḥ, dvirvacanam ity anena krameṇa kāryāṇi kriyante /
GS24jvkasipu:42293: ekādeśād anavakāśatvād autvaṃ dvirvacanād api paratvād ekādeśaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:42296: tu hi ity etayoḥ āśiṣi viṣaye tātaṅ ādeśo bhavaty anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:42302: ṅittvāc cāsya sthānivadbhāvāt yat pittvaṃ prāpnoti tannivartate /
GS24jvkasipu:42304: tena bruva īṭ (*7,3.93) iti brūtād bhavān iti īṭ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42305: āśiṣi iti kim ? grāmaṃ gacchatu bhavān /
GS24jvkasipu:42307: tātaṅi ṅitvaṃ saṅkramakṛt syādantyavidhiś cet tacca tathā na /
GS24jvkasipu:42308: heradhikāre heradhikāro lopavidhau tu jñāpakam āha //
GS24jvkasipu:42309: tātaṅo ṅittvasāmarthyān na ayam antyavidhiḥ smṛtaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42313: vida jñāne ity etasmād dhātor uttarasya śatuḥ vasurādeśaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42315: sthānivadbhāvādugitkārye siddhe vasoḥ ukārakaraṇaṃ vasoḥ samprasāraṇam
GS24jvkasipu:42317: ekānubandhakagrahaṇe na dvyanubandhakasya ity etad api na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42323: samāse 'nañpūrve ktvā ity etasya lyap ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42335: anañ iti nañā anyadanañ nañsadṛśam avyayaṃ parigṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:42336: tena nañ anavyayaṃ canañ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42337: snātvākālakādiṣu mayūravyaṃsakādiṣu nipātanāl lyabādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42340: sa ca yena vidhis tadantasya ity anena tadantavidhinā, na tu kṛdgrahaṇe
GS24jvkasipu:42343: gatikārakapūrvasy eva tu grahaṇe sati nañpūrvasya prasaṅga eva na asti,
GS24jvkasipu:42344: nañ na gatir na kārakam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:42345: pradhāya, prasthāya ity ādiṣu hiprabhṛtīn antaraṅgan api vidhīn bahiraṅgo lyab bādhate eva iti jñāpitam etat //
GS24jvkasipu:42348: samāse anañpūrve ktvā ity etasya ktvā ity ayam ādeśo bhavati, apiśabdāl lyabapi bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:42359: chandasi viṣaye supāṃ sthāne su luk pūrvasavarṇa ā āt śe yā ḍā ḍyā yāc āl ity ete ādeśāḥ bhavanti
GS24jvkasipu:42372: yasmin sunvanti tasmin sāmidhenīḥ iti prāpte /
GS24jvkasipu:42384: yuyādeśo vayādeśaś ca chandasatvān na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42402: īkāraḥ - dṛtiṃ na śuṣkaṃ sarasī śayānam /
GS24jvkasipu:42419: makārasya api hi makāravacanam anusvāranivṛttyarthaṃ syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:42422: ātmanepadeṣu yastakāraḥ tasya chandasi viṣaye lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42430: api ity adhikārān na bhavati, tatra ātmānamanṛtaṃ kurute /
GS24jvkasipu:42431: ātmanepadeṣu iti kim ? vatsaṃ duhanti kalaśaṃ caturbilam //
GS24jvkasipu:42434: chandasi viṣaye dhvamo dhvāt ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42439: yajadhvam ity etasya enam ity etasmin parato makāralopo nipātyate vakārasya ca yakāraḥ chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:42444: taśabdasya loṇmadhyamapuruṣabahuvacanasya sthāne tāt ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42456: chandasi viṣaye tasya sthāne tap tanap tana thana ity ete ādeśā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:42471: chandasi viṣaye mas ity ayaṃ śabdaḥ ikārānto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42472: masaḥ sakārāntasya ikārāgamo bhavati, sa ca tasyānto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42482: ktvā ity etasya yagāgamo bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:42485: ktvāpi chandasi (*7,1.38) ity asya antantaram idaṃ kasmān na+ucyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:42489: iṣṭvīnam ity ayaṃ śabdo nipātyate chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:42497: snātvī ity evam ādayaḥ śabdā nipātyante chandasi visaye /
GS24jvkasipu:42505: avarṇāntāt aṅgād uttarasya jaseḥ asuk āgamo bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:42508: ye pūrvāso ya uparāsaḥ ity atra paratvād asuki punaḥ prasaṅgavijñānāt śibhāvaḥ prāptaḥ, sakṛdgatau vipratiṣedhe yad bādhitaṃ tad bādhitam eva iti na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:42512: aśva kṣīra vṛṣa lavaṇa ity eteṣām aṅgānām ātmaprītiviṣaye kyaci parato
GS24jvkasipu:42532: avarṇāt sarvanāmna uttarasya āmaḥ suḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42542: āmi iti ṣaṣṭhībahuvacanaṃ gṛhyate, na ṅerām nadyāmnībhyaḥ (*8,3.116) iti ,
GS24jvkasipu:42544: yaśca ghāt āmuḥ , āmaśca liṭi, na tau sarvanānmaḥ staḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42545: sānubandhakau iti vā tau na gṛhyete /
GS24jvkasipu:42547: iha tu sarvanāmnaḥ iti pañcamīnirdeśāt tasmād ity uttarasya (*1,1.67) iti
GS24jvkasipu:42551: tri ity etasya āmi pare traya ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42557: hrasvāntāt nadyantāt ābantāc ca+uttarasya āmaḥ nuḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42583: rephāntāyāḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ ṣaṭsañjñā na vihitā, ṣaḍbhyo luk (*7,1.22) iti lug mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:42589: upasarjanībhūtāyās tu saṅkhyāyāḥ na bhavati, priyaṣaṣām, priyapañcām,
GS24jvkasipu:42593: śrī grāmaṇī ity etayoḥ chandasi viṣaye āmo nuḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42596: śrīśabdasya vāmi (*1,4.5) iti vikalpena nadīsañjñā, tatra nityārthaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:42597: sūtagrāmaṇīnām iti yadā sūtāś ca te grāmaṇyaś ca sūtagrāmaṇyo bhavanti tadartham idaṃ vacanam
GS24jvkasipu:42598: yadā tu sūtaś ca grāmaṇīś ca sūtagrāmaṇi, sūtagrāmaṇi ca sūtagrāmaṇi ca sūtagrāmaṇi ca iti sūtagrāmaṇīnām iti, tadā hrasvāt ity eva siddham //
GS24jvkasipu:42601: go ity etasmāt ṛkpādānte vartamānād uttarasya āmaḥ nuḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42602: vidmā hi tvā gopatiṃ śūra gonām /
GS24jvkasipu:42603: pādānte iti kim ? gavāṃ gotramudasṛjo yadaṅgiraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42604: sarve vidhayaśchandasi vikalpyante iti pādānte 'pi kvacin na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42605: hantāraṃ śatrūṇāṃ kṛdhi virājaṃ gopatiṃ gavām //
GS24jvkasipu:42619: ayaṃ dhātūpadeśāvasthāyām eva nugāmamo bhavati kuṇḍā, guṇḍā iti, guroś ca halaḥ (*3,3.103) ity akārapratyayo yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:42620: tathā hi dhinvikṛṇvyora ca (*3,1.80) iti pratyayavidhāv eva numanuṣaktayor grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:42621: dhātugrahaṇam ca+iha kriyate dhātūpadeśakāla eva numāgamo yathā syāt ity evam artham /
GS24jvkasipu:42622: tāsisicoriditkāryaṃ na asti ity uccāraṇārtho niranunāsika ikāraḥ paṭhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:42623: amaṃsta ity evam ādau hi hanaḥ sic (*1,2.24) iti kitvavidhānasāmarthyāt nakāralopo na bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:42624: mantā ity atra api asiddhavad-atra-ā bhāt (*6,4.22) iti ṭilopasya asiddhatvān nalopo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42625: iha kasmān na bhavati, bhettā, dhettā iti ? iritāṃ samudāyasyetsañjñā iti
GS24jvkasipu:42627: avayavaśo 'pi itsañjñāyāṃ satyāṃ goḥ pādānte (*7,1.57) ito 'ntagrahaṇam
GS24jvkasipu:42631: śe pratyaye parato mucādīnam numāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42646: ke punaḥ tṛmphādayaḥ ? tṛpha tṛmpha tṛptau dṛpha ḍrmpha utkleśe, gupha gumpha granthe, ubha umbha pūraṇe, śubha śumbha śobhārthe ity atra ye
GS24jvkasipu:42647: sānuṣaṅgāḥ tṛmphādayaḥ teṣām aniditāṃ hala upadhāyāḥ kṅiti (*6,4.24) iti anunāsikalope kṛte num vidhīyate, sa ca vidhānasāmarthyāt na lupyate /
GS24jvkasipu:42653: ye tu niranuṣaṅgāḥ teṣāṃ tṛphati, dṛphati, guphati, ubhati, śubhati ity evaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:42656: masji naśi ity etayor aṅgayoḥ jhalādau pratyaye numāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42665: masjer antyāt pūrva numam icchanti anuṣaṅgādilopārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:42670: radhi jabhi ity etayoḥ ajādau pratyaye numāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42680: parāpi satī vṛddhirnumā bādhyate, nityatvāt aci iti kim ? raddhā /
GS24jvkasipu:42684: iḍādau aliṭi pratyaye pare radher numāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42692: numi kṛte saṃyogāntatvāt asaṃyogalliṭ kit (*1,2.5) iti kittvaṃ na asti iti nalopo na bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:42693: atha kvasau kathaṃ bhavitavyam ? redhivān iti /
GS24jvkasipu:42694: katham ? etvabhyāsalopayoḥ kṛtayoḥ iḍāgamaḥ kriyate, tato numāgamaḥ, tasya aupadeśikakittvaśrayo lopaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42695: atha iṭi liṭi ity evaṃ niyamaḥ kasmān na kriyate, liṭy eva iṭi na anyatra iti ? viparītam apy avadhāraṇaṃ sambhāvyeta, iṭy eva liṭi na anyatra iti /
GS24jvkasipu:42696: tathā hi sati rarandha ity atra na syāt, radhitā ity atra ca syād eva //
GS24jvkasipu:42699: rabheraṅgasya śabliḍvarjite 'jādau pratyaye parato numāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42710: labheś ca ajādau pratyaye śabliḍvarjite numāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42722: āṅaḥ uttarasya labheḥ yakārādiprayayaviṣaye numāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42725: prāk pratyayotpatteḥ numi kṛte vihitamadupadhatvam iti ṛhalor ṇyat (*3,1.124) iti ṇyatpratyayaḥ, tatra kṛduttarapadaprakṛtisvaratvena antasvaritatvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42728: katham agniṣṭoma ālabhyaḥ iti ? sarve vidhayaś chandasi vikalpyante /
GS24jvkasipu:42729: atha vā ālabhyaḥ ity atra numi kṛte 'nuṣaṅgalopaḥ kriyate //
GS24jvkasipu:42732: upād uttarasya labheḥ praśaṃsāyāṃ gamyamānāyāṃ yakārādipratyayaviṣaye numāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42736: praśaṃsāyām iti kim ? upalabhyam asmād vṛṣalāt kiñcit /
GS24jvkasipu:42740: upasargād uttarasya labheḥ khalghañoḥ parataḥ numāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42746: siddhe satyārambho niyamārthaḥ, upasargādeva labheḥ khalghañoḥ parato numāgamo bhavati, na anyatra /
GS24jvkasipu:42751: su dur ity etābhyāṃ kevalābhyām anyopasargarahitābhyām upasṛṣṭasya labheḥ khalghañoḥ parataḥ numāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42758: sudurbhām iti tṛtīyāṃ matvā kevalagrahaṇaṃ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:42760: atisulabham ity atra karmapravacanīyatvād eteḥ kevala eva suśabda upasargaḥ iti bhavati pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:42761: yadā tu atiśabdo na karmapravacanīyaḥ, tadā num bhavati eva atisulambhaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:42765: ciṇ ṇamul ity etayoḥ vibhāṣā labher num bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42768: vyavasthitavibhāṣā ceyam, tena anupasṛṣṭasya vikalpaḥ, upasṛṣṭasya nityaṃ num bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42773: ugitāmaṅgānāṃ dhātuvarjitānām añcateśca sarvanāmasthāne parato numāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42778: ugidacām iti kim ? dṛṣad, dṛṣadau, dṛṣadaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42781: añcatigrahaṇaṃ niyamārtham, añcater eva dhātor anyasya mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:42784: adhātoḥ iti kim ? adhātubhūtapūrvasya yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:42785: gomantam icchati gomatyati, gomatyater apratyayaḥ gomān /
GS24jvkasipu:42786: atra hi dhātutvād añcatigrahaṇān na syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:42789: yujer asamāse sarvanāmasthāne parato numāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42791: asamāse iti kim ? aśvayuk, aśvayujau, aśvayujaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42792: yujeḥ iti ikāranirdeśāt yuja samādhau ity asya grahaṇaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42796: napuṃsakasya jhalantasya ca sarvanāmasthāne parato numāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42811: ugito jhalantasya napuṃsakasya paratvād anena+eva num bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42822: igantasya napuṃsakasya aṅgasya ajādau vibhaktau numāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42832: yady evam, tatra+eva kartavyam ? iha tu karaṇasya etat prayojanam, he trapo ity atra num mā bhūt, iti, na ṅisambuddhyoḥ (*8,2.8) iti nalopapratiṣedhaḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:42833: nanu ca na lumatāṅgasya (*1,1.63) iti pratyayalakṣaṇe pratiṣiddhe
GS24jvkasipu:42834: vibhaktir eva na asti ? etad eva ajgrahaṇaṃ jñāpakaṃ pratyayalakṣaṇapratiṣedho 'tra na bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:42837: iko 'ci vyañjane mā bhūdastu lopaḥ svaraḥ katham /
GS24jvkasipu:42838: svaro vai śrūyamāṇe 'pi lupte kiṃ na bhaviṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:42840: nuḍ vācya uttarārthaṃ tu iha kiñcit trapo iti //
GS24jvkasipu:42843: tṛtīyādiṣu vibhaktiṣv ajādiṣu bhāṣitapuṃskam igantaṃ napuṃsakaṃ gālavasyācāryasya matena puṃvad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42844: yathā puṃsi hrasvanumau na bhavataḥ, tadvad atra api na bhavataḥ ity
GS24jvkasipu:42854: grāmaṇyāṃ brāhmaṇakulānām, numacira iti pūrvavipratiṣedhena nuṭ,
GS24jvkasipu:42868: iha kasmān na bhavati, pīlurvṛkṣaḥ, pīlu phalam, pīlune phalāya iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:42869: samānāyāmākṛtau yad bhāṣītpuṃskaṃ tulye pravṛttinimatte tasya puṃvadbhāvaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:42870: iha tu vṛkṣākṛtiḥ pravṛttinimittaṃ puṃsi śabdasya, phalākṛtirnapuṃsake /
GS24jvkasipu:42871: tad etad evaṃ kathaṃ bhavati bhāsitapuṃskam iti ? bhāṣitaḥ pumān yasminn
GS24jvkasipu:42872: arthe pravṛttinimitte sa bhāsitapuṃskaśabdena ucyate, uadyogād abhidheyam api yad napuṃsakaṃ tad api bhāṣitapuṃsakam /
GS24jvkasipu:42873: tasya pratipādakaṃ yac chabdarūpaṃ tad api bhāṣitapuṃskam iti ? ikaḥ ity eva, kīlālapā brāhmaṇaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42879: asthi dadhi sakthi akṣi ity eteṣā napuṃsakānāṃ tṛtīyādiṣu ajādiṣu vibhaktiṣu parato 'naṅ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati, sa ca+udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42888: asthyādaya ādyudāttāḥ, teṣām anaṅādeśaḥ sthānivadbhāvād anudāttaḥ syāt iti
GS24jvkasipu:42890: tatra bhasañjñāyām allope kṛte udāttanivṛttisvareṇa vibhaktir udāttā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42891: etair asthyādibhir napuṃsakair anapuṃsakasya api aṅgasya tadantagrahaṇam iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:42902: aci ity uktam, anajādau ai dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:42905: tṛtīyādiṣu ity uktam, atṛtīyādiṣu api dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:42907: vibhaktau ity ukta, avibhaktāv api dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:42912: dvivacane parataḥ chandasi viṣaye asthyādīnām īkārādeśo bhavati, sa ca udāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42915: akṣī ity atra num paratvādīkāreṇa badhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:42916: tena kṛte sakṛdgatau vipratiṣedhe yad bādhitaṃ tad bādhitam eva iti punar num na kriyate //
GS24jvkasipu:42919: abhyastād aṅgād uttarasya śatuḥ num na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42924: śaturanantara īkāro na vihitaḥ iti vyavahitasya api numaḥ pratiṣedho vijñāyate //
GS24jvkasipu:42927: abhyastād aṅgād uttaro yaḥ śatṛpratyayas tadantasya napuṃsakasya vā numāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42934: avarṇāntād aṅgād uttarasya śatuḥ vā numāgamo bhavati śīnadyoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42941: atra antaraṅgatvād ekādeśe kṛte vyapavargābhāvāt avarṇāntā daṅgād uttarasya śatuḥ iti na yujyate vaktum, ubhayata āśraye nāntadivat ity antādivadbhāvo 'pi nāsti, bhūtapūrvagatyāśrayaṇe vā adatī, ghnatī ity evam
GS24jvkasipu:42942: ādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ iti ? atra samādhiṃ kecid āhuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42943: śaturavayave śatṛśabdo vartate avarṇāntād aṅgād uttaro yaḥ śatravayavaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:42946: avarṇāntād aṅgād uttare ye śīnadyau tayoḥ parataḥ śatrantasya num bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:42947: tatra yena nāvyavadhānaṃ tena vyavahite 'pi vacanaprāmāṇyāt iti takāreṇa
GS24jvkasipu:42955: śap śyan ity etayoḥ śatuḥ śīnadyoḥ parato nityaṃ numāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42962: nityagrahaṇam vā ity asya adhikārasya nivṛttyartham /
GS24jvkasipu:42963: ihārambhasāmarthyān nityam uttaratra vikalpa eva aśaṅkyeta //
GS24jvkasipu:42969: atra kecit āt ity adhikārād āmamoḥ kṛtayoḥ numaṃ kurvanti /
GS24jvkasipu:42970: tena numā āmamau na bādhyete, āamambhyāṃ ca num iti /
GS24jvkasipu:42971: apare tu saty api sāmānyaviśeṣatve āmamoḥ numaś ca samāveśam icchanti, na
GS24jvkasipu:42975: dṛk svavas svatavas ity eteṣāṃ sau parato numāgamo bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:42984: div ity etasya sau parataḥ aut ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42987: dhātus tu sānubandhakaḥ, sa iha na gṛhyate, akṣadyūḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:42990: pathin mathin ṛbhukṣin ity eteṣām aṅgānāṃ sau parataḥ ākāraḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42995: bhāvyam anena savarṇānāṃ grahaṇaṃ na bhavati iti śuddho hy ayam ucvāryate //
GS24jvkasipu:42998: pathyādīnām ikārasya sthāne akārādeśo bhavati sarvanāmasthāne parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43005: āt iti vartāmāne punar advacanaṃ ṣapūrvārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:43006: ṛbhukṣaṇam ity atra vā ṣapūrvasya nigame (*6,4.9) iti dīrghavikalpaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:43009: pathimathoḥ thakārasya sthāne nthaḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati sarvanāmasthāne parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43024: sarvanāmasthāne ity anuvartamānam api virodhād iha na sambadhyate //
GS24jvkasipu:43027: puṃsa ity etasya sarvanāmasthāne parato 'suṅ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43029: iha paramapumān iti prāg eva vibhaktyutpatteḥ samāsāntodāttatvam,
GS24jvkasipu:43030: utpannāyāṃ vibhaktau asuñ ity aniṣṭaḥ svaraḥ prāpnoti ? tadartham asuṅi upadeśivadvacanaṃ kartavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:43040: kathaṃ he citrago, he śabalagava iti ? aṅgavṛtte punarvṛttāvavidhirniṣṭhitasya iti sambuddhijasorgune kṛte ṇittvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43041: atha vā gotaḥ iti sambadhalakṣaṇā ṣaṣṭhī, gotaḥ sambandhi yat
GS24jvkasipu:43043: yac ca tadarthasyaikatvādiṣu sarvanāmasthānaṃ tad goḥ sarvanāmasthānam ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:43046: kecit oto ṇit iti paṭhanti, dyośabdād api yat sarvanāmasthānaṃ vidyate tadartham /
GS24jvkasipu:43048: gotaḥ ity etad eva taparakaraṇanirdeśāt okārāntopalakṣaṇaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:43053: ṇitkāryaṃ tatra vā bhavati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43058: asambuddhau yaḥ sakhiśabdaḥ tasmāt paraṃ sarvanāmasthānaṃ ṇit bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43064: sakhiśabdasya sau parataḥ anaṅ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati, sa cet suśabdaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:43070: ṛkārāntānām aṅgānām uśanas purudaṃsas anehas ity eteṣām ca asambuddhau sau parataḥ anaṅ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43085: uśanasaḥ sambuddhau api pakṣe anaṅ iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:43087: na ṅisambuddhyoḥ (*8,2.8) iti nalopapratiṣedho 'pi pakṣe iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:43089: tathā coktam - sambodhane tūśanastrirūpaṃ sāntaṃ tathā nāntamathāpyadantam /
GS24jvkasipu:43090: mādhyandinirvaṣṭi guṇaṃ tvigante napuṃsake vyāghrapadām variṣṭhaḥ // iti /
GS24jvkasipu:43097: tṛjantasya yad rūpaṃ tadasya bhavati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43099: prayāsatteś ca kruśer eva ṛjantasya ya rūpaṃ tadatidiśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:43100: tac ca kroṣtṛ ity etad antodāttam /
GS24jvkasipu:43112: kroṣṭuśabdaṃ kecid gaurādiṣu paṭhanti, te ṅīṣi pratyaye tṛjvadbhāvaṃ kurvanti /
GS24jvkasipu:43113: teṣāṃ pañcabhiḥ kroṣṭrībhiḥ krītaiḥ pañcakroṣṭṛbhī rathaiḥ iti strīśabdasya luki kṛte na sidhyati, tatra pratividheyam /
GS24jvkasipu:43114: ye tu gaurādiṣu na paṭhanti, teṣāṃ striyām ity arthanirdeśaḥ, striyāṃ vartamānaḥ kroṣṭuśabdaḥ tṛjvad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43116: tatra udāttayaṇo halpūrvāt (*6,1.174) ity antodātta eva kroṣṭrīśabdo bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:43119: tṛtīyādiṣu vibhaktiṣu ajādiṣu kroṣṭurvibhāṣā tṛjvad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43134: catur anaḍuḥ iy etayoḥ sarvanāmasthāne parataḥ ām āgamo bhavati, sa codāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43160: cikīrṣati ity atra api yathā syāt iti dhātugrahaṇaṃ kriyate //
GS24jvkasipu:43167: oṣthyaḥ pūrvo yasmād ṝkārāt asau oṣṭhyapūrvaḥ, tadantasya dhātor aṅgasya
GS24jvkasipu:43173: dantyoṣṭhyapūrvo 'py oṣṭhyapūrvo bhavati ity atra api bhavati, vuvūrṣati
GS24jvkasipu:43175: oṣṭhyo hy atra pratyāsatter aṅgāvayava eva gṛhyate, tena ṝ gatau ity asya sampūrvasya samīrṇam iti bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43185: chandasi viṣaye ṝkārāntasya dhātor aṅgasya bahulam ukārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43186: oṣṭhyapūrvasya ity uktam, anoṣthyapūrvasya api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43194: iti kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau saptamādhyāyasya prathamḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:43198: parasmaipadapare sici parataḥ igantasya aṅgasya vṛddhir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43205: antaraṅgam api guṇam eṣāṃ vṛddhirvacanād bādhate /
GS24jvkasipu:43206: nyanuvīt, nyadhuvīt ity atra kuṭāditvāt ṅittve sati pratiṣiddhāyāṃ vṛddhau uvaṅādeśaḥ kriyate
GS24jvkasipu:43211: rephalakārau yāvataḥ antau samīpau tadantasya aṅgasya ata eva sthāne vṛddhiḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43216: ato halāder laghoḥ (*7,2.7) iti vikalpasya ayam apavādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43219: lrāntasya iti kim ? mā bhavān aṭīt /
GS24jvkasipu:43223: atra yau rephalakārau aṅgasya antau na tāvataḥ samīpau //
GS24jvkasipu:43226: vadavrajoḥ halantānāṃ ca aṅgānām acaḥ sthāne vṛddhir bhavati sici parasmaipade parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43234: atra yogavibhāge sati halantagrahaṇam antareṇa api sidhyati /
GS24jvkasipu:43235: katham ? vadivrajyoḥ ity atra prathamayoge ataḥ iti sthānī anuvartate,
GS24jvkasipu:43236: tato yat acaḥ iti sūtraṃ tatra aṅgena ajviśeṣyate, aṅgasya acaḥ sici
GS24jvkasipu:43240: anyathā hi yena na avyavadhānaṃ tena vyavahite 'pi vacanaprāmāṇyāt ity ekena varṇena vyavadhāne syāt, anekena halā na syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:43241: udavoḍhām, udavoḍham ity atra vaheḥ sici ḍhatvasalopādīnām pūrvatra asiddham (*8,2.1) ity asiddhatvāt pūrvaṃ halantalakṣaṇā vṛddhiḥ kriyate,
GS24jvkasipu:43243: tatra kṛte punar vṛddhir na bhavati, kṛtatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:43244: yatra tvakṛtā vṛddhiḥ, okārasya eva tatra bhavati, soḍhāmitrasya apatyam sauḍhāmitriḥ iti
GS24jvkasipu:43247: iḍhādau sici halanatasya aṅgasya vṛddhir na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43253: nanu ca etad apy antaraṅgatvāt guṇāvādeśayoḥ kṛtayoḥ halantaṃ bhavati ?
GS24jvkasipu:43255: antaraṅgam api guṇam vacanārambhasāmarthyāt sici vṛddhir bādhate ity uktam
GS24jvkasipu:43258: hakārāntānāṃ makārāntānāṃ yakārāntānām aṅgānām, kṣaṇa śvasa jāgṛ ṇi śvi ity eteṣām, editāṃ ca iḍādau sici parasmaipade parato vṛddhir na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43271: hmyantakṣaṇaśvasām editām ca ato halāder laghoḥ (*7,2.7) iti vikalpe prāpte pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:43272: jāgṛṇiśvīnāṃ tu sici vṛddhiḥ prāptā, sā ca neṭi (*7,2.4) iti na pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:43273: na ca antaraṅgatvād atra pūrvaṃ guṇo bhavati, sici vṛddher anavakāśatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:43274: yadi pūrvaṃ guṇaḥ syād iha ṇiśvigrahaṇam anarthakaṃ syāt, guṇāyādeśayoḥ kṛtayoḥ yakārantatvād eva pratiṣedhasya siddhatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:43275: tasmād idam eva śvigrahaṇaṃ jñāpakam na sidyantaraṅgam asti iti /
GS24jvkasipu:43276: atha jāgṛgrahaṇam kimartham, jāgro 'vi-ciṇ-ṇal-ṅitsu (*7,3.85) iti jāgarter guṇo vṛddher apavādo vidhīyate, sa yathā aco ñṇiti (*6,2.115) iti vṛddhiṃ bādhate tathā sici vṛddhim api bādhiṣyate ? na+etad asti /
GS24jvkasipu:43277: kṛte guṇe ato lrāntasya (*7,2.2) iti ya vṛddhiḥ prāpnoti sā pratiṣidhyate
GS24jvkasipu:43278: atha guṇavidhānasamarthyād uttarakālabhāvinyapi vṛddhir bādhyate, yathā jāgarayati ity atra ata upadhāyāḥ (*7,1.113) ity api vṛddhir na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:43279: tathā ciṇṇaloḥ pratiṣedho 'rthavān bhavati iti śakyam iha jāgṛgrahaṇam akartum ? tat tu kriyate vispaṣṭārtham //
GS24jvkasipu:43282: ūrṇoter iḍādau sici parasmaipadapare parato yibhāṣā vṛddhir na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43285: ṅittvapakṣe tu guṇavṛddhyor abhāve uvaṅ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43289: halāder aṅgasya laghor akārasya iḍādau sici parasmaipadapare parato vibhāṣā vṛddhir na bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:43294: nyakuṭīt, nyapuṭīt, ity atra ataḥ ity asminnasati sthāninirdeśārthamacaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:43296: tatra ajlakṣaṇā vṛddhir iglakṣaṇā na bhavati iti kṅiti ca (*7,2.118) iti pratiṣedho na syāt
GS24jvkasipu:43301: atha+iha kasmān na bhavati acakāsīt iti ? yena nāvyavadhānam tena
GS24jvkasipu:43302: vyavahite 'pi vacanaprāmāṇyāt iti halā vyavadhānam āśritam, na punaracāpi vyavadhānam iti vṛddhir na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43303: atha punar ekena varṇena vyavadhānam aśrīyate na punar anekena iti kalpane śakyamakartuṃ laghoḥ iti, atakṣīt ity atra anekena vyavadhānam iti na bhavisyati ? tat kriyate vispaṣṭārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:43307: vaśādau kṛti pratyaye parataḥ iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43322: tena ñamantāḍḍaḥ ity evam ādāv api hi pratiṣedho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43323: atha tatra uṇādayo bahulam (*3,3.1) iti samādhīyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:43329: ti tu tra ta tha si su sara ka sa ity eteṣu kṛtsu iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43362: auṇādikasya+eva taśabdasya grahaṇam iṣyate, na punaḥ ktasya, hasitam ity eva hi tatra bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:43391: grahādayo grahaprakārāḥ, yeṣām iṭ ktini dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:43400: upadeśe ya ekāc dhātur anudāttaś ca tasmād iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43402: ke punar upadeśe 'nudāttāḥ ? ye tathā gaṇe paṭhyante, ta eva vispaṣṭārtham
GS24jvkasipu:43404: aniṭsvarānto bhavati iti dṛśyatāmimāṃstu seṭaḥ pravadanti tadvidaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43405: adantamṝdantamṛtāṃ ca vṛṅvṛñau śviḍīṅivarṇeṣv atha śīṅśriñāvapi //
GS24jvkasipu:43406: guṇasthamūdantamutāṃ ca rusnuvau kṣuvaṃ tathorṇotimatho yuṇukṣṇavaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43407: iti svarāntā nipuṇaṃ samuccitāstato halantān api sannibodhata //
GS24jvkasipu:43408: dvaye eva dhātavaḥ, svarāntāḥ vyañjanāntāś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:43420: utāṃ ca ursnuvau kṣuvaṃ tathorṇotimatho yuṇukṣṇavaḥ - ravitā /
GS24jvkasipu:43424: vācya ūrṇorṇuvadbhāvo yaṅprasiddhiḥ prayojanam ity atideśād ekāctvam ūrṇoter asti iti udātta upadiśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:43428: iti svarāntā nipuṇaṃ samuccitās tato halantān api sannibodhata /
GS24jvkasipu:43429: śakistu kānteṣvaniḍeka iṣyate ghasiśca sāntesu vasiḥ prasāraṇī /
GS24jvkasipu:43433: vasa nivāse ity asya yajāditvāt saṃprasāraṇaṃ vihitam, na tu vasa
GS24jvkasipu:43435: sabhistu bhānteṣv atha maithune yabhistatastṛtīyo labhireva netare //
GS24jvkasipu:43439: yamiryamanteṣvaniḍeka iṣyate ramisca yaśca śyani paṭhyate maniḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43440: namiścaturtho hanireva pañcamo gamiśca ṣaṣṭhaḥ pratiṣedhavācinām //
GS24jvkasipu:43444: śyani iti kim ? manuteḥ manitā ity eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43449: ime 'niṭo 'ṣṭāviha muktasaṃśayā gaṇeṣu hāntāḥ pravibhajya kīrtitāḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:43458: muktasaṃśayāḥ iti kim ? tantrāntare catvāro 'pare paṭhyante /
GS24jvkasipu:43460: tatra sahervikalpastakārādau, muhirapi radhādau paṭhyate, tena tau sasaṃśayau savikalpau
GS24jvkasipu:43461: itarau tu dhātuṣu na paṭhyete, kaiścidabhyupagamyete iti svarūpeṇa+eva
GS24jvkasipu:43463: diśiṃ dṛśiṃ daṃśimatho mṛśiṃ spṛśiṃ riśiṃ ruśiṃ krośatimaṣṭamaṃ viśim /
GS24jvkasipu:43464: liśaṃ ca śāntānaniṭaḥ purāṇagāḥ paṭhanti pāṭheṣu daśaiva netarān //
GS24jvkasipu:43470: ṛdupadhānām udāttopadeśānāṃ mṛjidṛśī varjayitvā anudāttasya cardupadhasya anyatarasyām (*6,1.59) iti ramāgamavikalpaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43477: ime tu dhāntā daśa ye 'niṭo matāstataḥ paraṃ sidhyatir eva netare //
GS24jvkasipu:43489: budhyatisidhyatyoḥ śyanā nirdeśāt nyāyyavikaraṇayor buddhisidhyor iḍ bhavaty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:43492: niṣṭhāyāmāpi pratiṣedhābhāvāt budhitam, sidhitam ity eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43493: śiṣiṃ piṣiṃ śuṣyatipuṣyatī tviṣiṃ viṣiṃ śliṣiṃ tuṣyatiduṣyatī dviṣim /
GS24jvkasipu:43508: kṛṣestaudādikasya bhauvādikasya ca kṛṣikarṣatī iti nirdeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43509: tapiṃ tipiṃ cāpimatho vapiṃ svapiṃ lipiṃ lupiṃ tṛpyatidṛpyatī sṛpim /
GS24jvkasipu:43510: svareṇa vīcena śapiṃ chupiṃ kṣipiṃ pratīhi pāntān paṭhitāṃstrayodaśa //
GS24jvkasipu:43527: adiṃ hadiṃ skandibhidicchidikṣudīn śadiṃ sadiṃ svidyatipad yatī khidim /
GS24jvkasipu:43528: tudiṃ nudiṃ vidyati vinta ity api pratīhi dāntān daśa pañca cāniṭaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:43538: svidyati iti śyanā nirdeśo ñiṣvidā ity asya grahaṇaṃ mā bhūt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:43545: vidyati vinta ity api śyanā śnamā ca nirdeśo 'nyavikaraṇanivṛttyarthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43549: paciṃ vaciṃ viciricirañjipṛcchatīn nijiṃ siciṃ mucibhajibhañjibhṛjjātīn /
GS24jvkasipu:43550: tyajiṃ yajiṃ yujirujisañjimajjatīn bhujiṃ svajiṃ sṛjimṛjī viddhyaniṭsvarān
GS24jvkasipu:43573: mṛjirayamūdit paṭhyate, tato 'sya vikalpena iṭā bhavitavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:43574: mārṣṭā, marjitā iti, amāgamo 'py asya na dṛśyate ? tad iha pāṭhasya
GS24jvkasipu:43576: kecid asya sthāne vijiṃ paṭhanti, sṛjiṃ vijiṃ viddhyaniṭsvarān iti /
GS24jvkasipu:43578: tathā ca tantrāntare nijivijiṣvañjivarjam ity uktam /
GS24jvkasipu:43581: upadeśagrahaṇaṃ kim ? iha ca yathā syāt, laviṣyati, paciṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:43582: iha ca mā bhūt, kartā kaṭān, kartum iti //
GS24jvkasipu:43585: śri ity etasya ugantānāṃ ca kiti pratyaye parataḥ iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43605: kecid atra dvikakāranirdeśena gakārapraśleṣaṃ varnayanti, bhūṣṇuḥ ity evaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:43607: sautratvāc ca nirdeśasya śryukaḥ kiti ity atra cartvasya asiddhatvamanāśritya rorutvaṃ na kṛtam visarjanīyaś ca kṛtaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:43608: glājisthaś ca kṣnuḥ (*3,2.139) ity atra sthā ā ity ākārapraśleṣeṇa
GS24jvkasipu:43610: upadeśe ity eva, tīrṇa ity atra api yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:43611: itve hi kṛte raparatve cana syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:43613: iṭ sani vā (*7,2.41) iti vikalpe vihite yasya vibhāṣā (*7,2.15) iti niṣṭhāyāṃ pratiṣedho bhaviṣyati ? kasya punaḥ sā vibhāṣā ? ṝtaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43614: yady evam itve hi kṛte na ayam ṝkarānto bhaviṣyati ? sthānivadbhāvād bhaviṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:43615: analvidhau sthānivadbhāvaḥ, alvidhiścāyam ? tasmād anuvartayitavyam upadeśe iti /
GS24jvkasipu:43616: tathā ca sati jāgaritaḥ, jāgaritavān ity atra api prāpnoti, tad artham ekācaḥ ity anuvartayitavyam
GS24jvkasipu:43623: graha guha ity etayoḥ ugantānāṃ ca sani pratyaye parataḥ iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43629: (*7,2.49) iti vikalpavidhānāt śrayatir atra na anukṛsyate /
GS24jvkasipu:43634: kṛ sṛ bhṛ vṛ stu dru sru śru ity eteṣāṃ liṭi pratyaye iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43644: siddhe satyārambho niyamarthaḥ , krādaya eva liṭi aniṭaḥ, tato 'nye seṭaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:43649: vṛño hi thali vavartha iti nipātanād vyavasthā /
GS24jvkasipu:43650: studrusruśruvāṃ tu ṛto bhāradvājasya (*7,2.63) ity asmād api niyamāt ya iṭ
GS24jvkasipu:43658: ṛto bhāradvājasya (*7,2.63) ity etad apy asuṭkasya+eva+iṣyate,
GS24jvkasipu:43673: sa hi natvārthaḥ, natvaṃ ca niṣthāto 'nantarasya vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:43676: niṣṭhāyām ity adhikāraḥ ārdhadhātukasya+iḍ-valādeḥ (*7,2.35) iti yāvat //
GS24jvkasipu:43679: yasya dhātoḥ vibhāṣā kvacid iḍ uktaḥ tasya niṣṭhāyāṃ parataḥ iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43687: tanipatidaridrāṇām upasaṅkhyānam iti pater vibhāṣiteṭkasya api dvitīyāśritātītapatita (*2,1.24) ti nipātanāt iḍāgamaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:43690: āditaś ca dhator niṣthāyam iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43700: yogavibhāgakaraṇaṃ kimartham, āditaś ca vibhāṣā bhāvādikarmaṇoḥ ity evaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:43701: paṭhitavyam, anyatra hi bhāvādikarmabhyām yasya vibhāṣā (*7,2.15) iti pratiṣedho bhaviṣyati ? jñāpanārtham etat /
GS24jvkasipu:43702: jñāpayati - yad upādher vibhāṣā tad upādheḥ pratiṣedhaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:43703: tena vibhāṣā gamahanavidaviśām (*7,2.68) ity atra viderlābhārthasya
GS24jvkasipu:43704: vibhāṣā iti jñānārthasya pratiṣedho na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43709: bhave ādikarmaṇi ca ādito dhātoḥ vibhāṣā niṣṭhāyām iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43712: śakito ghaṭaḥ kartum, śakto ghaṭaḥ kartum /
GS24jvkasipu:43715: ādikarmaṇi ca na bhavaty eva, astaḥ kāṇḍaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:43719: kṣubdha svānta dhvānta lagan mliṣṭa viribdha phāṇṭa bāḍha ity ete nipātyante yathāsaṅkhyaṃ mantha manaḥ tamaḥ sakta avispaṣṭa svaraḥ anāyāsa bhṛśa ity eteṣv artheṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:43724: kṣubdhā girinadī ity evam ādyupamānāt bhaviṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:43737: itvam apy ekārasya nipātanād eva viribdham iti svaraś cet /
GS24jvkasipu:43740: anye tu viribhitam anyat iti paṭhanti /
GS24jvkasipu:43741: rabhiṃ sautraṃ dhātuṃ paṭhanti, te viribhitam iti pratyudāharanti /
GS24jvkasipu:43744: yadaśṛtamapiṣṭaṃ ca kaṣāyamudakasamparkamātrāt vibhaktarasamīṣaduṣṇaṃ tat phāṇṭam /
GS24jvkasipu:43748: bāhṛ prayatne ity asya dhātor etan nipātanam /
GS24jvkasipu:43753: tatra dhṛṣa śasa ity etayoḥ niṣṭhāyām iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43756: dhṛṣeḥ āditaś ca (*7,2.16) iti pratiṣedhaḥ siddha eva, śaser api udito vā
GS24jvkasipu:43757: (*7,2.56), yasya vibhāṣā (*7,2.15) iti ? niyamārthaṃ vacanam, dhṛṣiśasyoḥ vaiyātye eva iḍ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43765: dṛḍha iti nipātyate sthūle balavati cārthe /
GS24jvkasipu:43768: kim atra nipātyate ? dṛṃheḥ ktapratyaye iḍabhāvaḥ, hakāranakārayoḥ lopaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:43770: atha dṛhiḥ prakṛtyanataram asti ? tatra apy etad eva sarvaṃ nalopavarjam,
GS24jvkasipu:43773: ḍhalope hi sati tasya pūrvatra asiddhatvāt draḍhimā, draḍhīyān, draḍhayati ity atra ra ṛto halāderlaghoḥ (*6,2.161) iti repho na syāt, iha ca paridraḍhyya gata iti lyapi laghupūrvāt (*6,4.56) iti ṇerayādeśo na syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:43774: iha ca paridṛḍhasyāpatyaṃ pāridṛḍhī kanyā iti gurūpottamalakṣaṇaḥ ṣyaṅ ca prasajyeta /
GS24jvkasipu:43779: parivṛḍha iti nipātyate prabhuś ced bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43783: vṛhiśca yadi prakṛtiyantaram asti tasya api tad eva sarvam /
GS24jvkasipu:43788: parivṛḍhamācaṣṭe iti vigṛhya vṛḍhaśabdād eva ṇijutypadyate /
GS24jvkasipu:43789: saṃgrāmayater eva sopasargāṇ ṇijutpattir iṣyate na anyasmāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:43790: tathā sati parivraḍhayati iti tiṅṅatiṅaḥ (*8,2.28) iti nighātaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43791: parivraḍhayya ity atra pariśabdasya ktvāpratyayāntena samāse sati lyabādeśaḥ siddho bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:43796: kṛcchra gahana ity etayor arthayoḥ kaṣer dhātoḥ niṣṭhāyām iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43800: kṛcchraṃ duḥkham, tatkāraṇam apy agnyādikaṃ kṛcchram ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:43806: ghuṣer dhātor aviśabdane 'rthe niṣṭhāyām iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43814: viśabdanapratiṣedhaś ca jñāpakaścurādiṇij viśabdanārthasya anityaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:43815: tena ayam api prayogaḥ upapanno bhavati, mahīpālavacaḥ śrutvā jughuṣuḥ
GS24jvkasipu:43820: sam ni vi ity etebhya uttarasya ardeḥ niṣṭhāyām iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43828: abhiśabād uttarasya ardeḥ āvidūrye 'rthe niṣṭhāyām iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43833: vidūram viprakṛṣṭam, tato 'nyadavidūram, tasya bhāvaḥ āvidūryam /
GS24jvkasipu:43834: etasmād eva nipātanāt na nañpūrvāt tatpuruṣāt (*5,1.121) ity uttarasya bhāvapratyayasya pratiṣedho na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:43837: ṇyantasya vṛtter niṣṭhāyām adhyayanārthe vṛttam iti iḍabhāvaḥ ṇiluk ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:43841: vṛtirayam akarmakaḥ, sa ṇyarthe vartamānaḥ sakarmako bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43842: tena nirvṛttam iti hi prakṛṭer eva karmaṇi ktapratyayo dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:43843: tadvad iha api ṇyarthavṛtter eva ca vṛteḥ vṛtto guṇo devadattena iti bhaviṣyati iti nipātanam anarthakam ? tat kriyate yadāpi ṇicaiva ṇyartho 'bhidhīyate tadāvartitam ity adhyayane mā bhūt iti kecit /
GS24jvkasipu:43844: apare tu vartito guṇo devadattena ity api icchanti //
GS24jvkasipu:43848: dam śam pūrī das spaś chad jñap ity eteṣāṃ ṇyantānāṃ dhātūnāṃ vā aniṭtvaṃ nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:43857: jñaptes tu bharajñapisanām iti vikalpavidhānāt yasya vibhāṣā (*7,2.15) iti nitye pratiṣedhe prāpte vikalpārthaṃ nipātanam //
GS24jvkasipu:43861: ruṣi ama tvara saṅghuṣa āsvana ity eteṣāṃ niṣṭhāyāṃ vā iḍāgamo na bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:43863: ti-iṣa-saha-lubha-ruṣa. riṣaḥ (*4,2.48) iti vikalpavidhānāt yasya vibhāṣā
GS24jvkasipu:43867: āditaś ca (*7,2.16) iti pratiṣedhe prāpte vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:43871: sampūrvasya ghuṣer aviśaddane 'pi paratvād ayam eva vikalpo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43874: āṅpūrvasya svaner mano 'bhidhāne 'pi paratvādayaṃ vikalpaḥ kṣubdhasvānta
GS24jvkasipu:43878: lomasu vartamānasya hṛṣer niṣṭhāyāṃ vā iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43883: hṛṣu alīke ity udittvān niṣṭhāyāmaniṭ, hṛṣa tuṣṭau ity ayaṃ seṭ, tayor ubhayor iha grahaṇam ity ubhayatra vibhāṣā iyam /
GS24jvkasipu:43884: lomāni mūrdhajāni aṅgajāni ca sāmānyena gṛhyante, yathā lomanakhaṃ spṛṣṭvā
GS24jvkasipu:43886: tadviṣaye ca harṣe vartamāno lomasu vartate ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:43887: lomasu iti kim ? hṛṣṭo devadatta ity alīkārthasya, hṛṣito devadattaḥ iti
GS24jvkasipu:43897: apapūrvasya cāyteḥ niṣṭhāyām aniṭtvaṃ cibhāvaś ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:43904: hvarateḥ dhātor niṣṭhāyaṃ chandasi hru ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43911: hru ity etasya ādeśasya abhāvo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:43915: hvaritaḥ iti hvarater niṣṭhāyām iḍāgamo guṇaś ca nipātyate chandasi
GS24jvkasipu:43923: grasita skabhita stabhita uttabhita catta vikasta viśastṛ śaṃstṛ śāstṛ tarutṛ tarūtṛ varutṛ varūtṛ varūtrīḥ ujjvaliti kṣariti kṣamiti vamiti amiti ity etāni chandasi viṣaye nipātyante tatra grasita skabhita stabhita uttabhita iti grasu skambhu stambhu ity eteṣām udittvān niṣṭhāyām iṭpratiṣedhe prāpte iḍāgamo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:43932: uttabhita iti utpūrvasya nipātasāmarthyād anyopasargapūrvaḥ stabhitaśabdo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43933: catta, vikasta iti cateḥ kaseś ca vipūrvasya niṣṭhāyām iḍabhāvo nipātyate
GS24jvkasipu:43934: cattā varṣeṇa vidyut catitā iti bhāṣāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:43937: nipātanaṃ bahutvāpekṣam, vikastāḥ iti bahuvacanaṃ kṛtam /
GS24jvkasipu:43939: viśastṛ śaṃstṛ śāstṛ iti śaser vipūrvasya śaṃseḥ śāseś ca tṛci iḍabhāvo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:43946: tarutṛ tarūtṛ varutṛ varūtṛ varūtrīḥ iti tarateḥ vṛṅvṛñoś ca tṛci uṭ ūṭ ity etāv āgamau nipātyete
GS24jvkasipu:43954: idam api hi bhavati - ahorātrāṇi vai varūtrayaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:43957: varūtṛśabdo hi nipātitaḥ, tata eva ṅīpi sati siddho varūtrīśabdaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43958: ujjvaliti kṣariti kṣamiti vamiti amiti iti ca jvalater utpūrvasya kṣara kṣama vama ity eteṣāṃ ca tipi śapaḥ ikārādeśo nipātyate, śapo lugvā,
GS24jvkasipu:43970: itikaraṇaṃ pradarśanārtham tena kvacit īkāro bhāvati, ravimabhyamīti varuṇaḥ ity api hi vede paṭhyate //
GS24jvkasipu:43984: rudādibhyaḥ sārvadhātuke (*7,2.56) ity etasmin niyamārthe vajñāyamāne pratipattigauravam bhavati iti ārdhadhātukagrahaṇaṃ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:43989: iṭ iti vartamāne punaḥ iḍgrahaṇaṃ pratiṣedhanivṛttyartham //
GS24jvkasipu:43993: snukramoḥ ārdhadhātukasya valādeḥ iḍāgamo bhavati, na cet snukramī
GS24jvkasipu:43995: kva ca tāvātmanepadasya nimittam ? yatra ātmanepadaṃ tad āśrayaṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:43997: tena ayam saty ātmanepade pratiṣedho bhavati na asati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:44012: sarvatra+eva atra snaitiḥ kramiś ca ātmanepadasya nimittam /
GS24jvkasipu:44013: sanantād api pūrvavatsanaḥ (*1,3.62) iti ātmanepadaṃ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:44014: nimittagrahaṇaṃ kim ? sīyuḍādes tatparaparasya ca pratiṣedhārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:44015: iha tu prasnavitevācarati iti prasnavitrīyate iti kyaṅatam ātmanepadasya nimittam, na snautiḥ
GS24jvkasipu:44016: krames tu kartaryātmanepadaviṣayādasatyātmanepade kṛti pratiṣedho vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44022: snauteḥ sani kiti ca pratyaye śryukaḥ kiti (*7,2.11), sani grahaguhośca (*7,2.12) ity eva pratiṣedho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44028: grahaḥ uttarasya iṭaḥ aliṭi dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44040: tasmād uttarasya ṝkārāntebhyaś ca iṭo vā dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44051: vṛtaḥ uttarasya iṭo liṅi dīrgho na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44058: parasmaipadapare sici vṝta uttarasya iṭo dīrghaḥ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44073: sani grahaguhoś ca (*7,2.12) iti iṭpratiṣedhe prāpte pakṣe iḍāgamo vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:44074: iṭaś ca vṝto vā (*7,2.38) iti pakṣe dīrghaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44075: cikīrṣati, jihīrṣati ity atra+upadeśādhikārāt lākṣaṇikatvāc ca iḍāgamo na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:44078: vṝto liṅi sici ca ātmanepadapare vā iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44082: sici khalv api - avṛta, avariṣṭa, avarīṣṭa /
GS24jvkasipu:44087: liṅaḥ pratyudāharaṇaṃ na darśitam, asambhavāt yāsuṭo 'valāditvāt iti //
GS24jvkasipu:44090: ṛdantād dhātoḥ saṃyogādeḥ uttarayoḥ liṅsicorātmanepadeṣu vā iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44104: saṃskṛṣīṣṭa, samaskṛta ity atra+upadeśādhikārāt, abhāktatvāc ca suṭa
GS24jvkasipu:44108: svarati sūti sūyati dhūñ ity etebhyaḥ, ūdidbhyaśca+uttarasya valāder ārdhadhātukasya vā iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44113: ūdhidbhyaḥ khalv api - gāhū - vigāḍhā, vigāhitā /
GS24jvkasipu:44115: vā iti vartamane punar vāgrahaṇaṃ liṅsicor nivṛttyartham /
GS24jvkasipu:44116: sūtisūyatyor vikaraṇanirdeśaḥ ṣū preraṇe ity asya nivṛttyarthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44117: dhūñ iti sānubandhakasya nirdeso dhū vidhūnane ity asay nivṛttyarthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44118: savitā, dhuvitā ity eva nityam etayor bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44119: svarater etasmād vikalpāt ṛddhanoḥ sye (*7,2.70) ity etad bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:44122: kiti tu pratyaye śryukaḥ kiti (*7,2.11) iti nityaḥ pratiṣedho bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena
GS24jvkasipu:44128: radha hiṃsāsaṃsiddhyoḥ ity evam ādibhyo 'ṣṭābhya uttarasya valāder ārdhadhātukasya vā iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44134: mogdhā, moḍhā, mohitā, snogdhā, snoḍhā, snohitā /
GS24jvkasipu:44136: krādiniyamāl liṭi radhādibhyaḥ paratvād vikalpaṃ kecid icchanti /
GS24jvkasipu:44137: apare punarāhuḥ, pūrvavidheriṇniṣedhavidhānasāmarthyāt balīyastvaṃ pratiṣedhaniyamasya iti nityamiṭā bhavitavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:44141: nir ity evaṃ pūrvāt kuṣa uttarasya valāder ārdhadhātukasya vā iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44148: nisaḥ iti vaktavye niraḥ iti nirdeśena rephāntam upasargāntaram asti iti jñāpyate /
GS24jvkasipu:44149: tasya hi nilayanam iti upasargasya ayatau (*8,2.19) iti latvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44150: niso hi rutvasya asiddhatvāl latvaṃ na syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:44157: ārambho hi yasya nibhāṣā (*7,2.15) ity asya bādhakaḥ, anyathā hi nikalpārtha eva syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:44158: atra+eva nityam iḍāgamaḥ, uttaratra vikalpa eva iti //
GS24jvkasipu:44161: takārādāv ārdhadhātuke iṣu saha lubha ruṣa ity etebhyo vā iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44163: iṣu icchāyām ity asya ayaṃ vikalpa iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:44164: yas tu iṣa gatau iti daivādikaḥ, tasya preṣitā, preṣitum, preṣitavyam iti nityaṃ bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:44165: yo 'pi iṣa ābhīkṣṇye iti kṛyādau paṭhyate, tasya apy evam eva /
GS24jvkasipu:44166: tadartham eva tīṣasaha iti sūtre kecit uditamiṣaṃ paṭhanti /
GS24jvkasipu:44174: ivantānāṃ dhātūnām, ṛdhu bhrasja dambhu śri svṛ yu ūrṇu bhara jñapi san ity eteṣāṃ ca sani vā iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44184: bhara iti bhṛñ ity etasya bhauvādikasya grahaṇam, śapā nirdeśāt /
GS24jvkasipu:44200: kliśū vibādhane ity asya ktvāyāṃ vikalpaḥ siddha eva niṣṭhāyāṃ tu yasya vibhāṣā (*7,2.15) iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:44201: kliśa upatāpe ity etasya tu ktvāyāṃ niṣṭhāyāṃ ca nityam iḍāgamaḥ prāpnoti,
GS24jvkasipu:44205: pūṅaś ca ktvāniṣṭhayor vā iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44209: śryukaḥ kiti (*7,2.11) iti pratiṣedhe prāpte vikalpo vidhīyate //
GS24jvkasipu:44212: vasateḥ kṣudheś ca ktvāniṣṭhayoḥ iḍāgamaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44220: vastes tu udāttatvād eva bhavitavyam iṭā /
GS24jvkasipu:44224: añceḥ pūjāyām arthe ktvāniṣṭhayoḥ iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44227: udito vā (*7,2.56) iti ktvāpratyaye vikalpaḥ prāptaḥ, niṣṭhāyām yasya vibhāṣā (*7,2.15) iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāptaḥ, tadartham idaṃ prārabdham /
GS24jvkasipu:44232: lubho vimohane 'rthe vartamānāt ktvāniṣṭhayoḥ iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44237: vimohanam ākulīkaraṇam, tatra ktvāyāṃ tīṣasahalubharuṣariṣaḥ (*7,2.48) iti
GS24jvkasipu:44238: vikalpaḥ, niṣṭhāyām yasya vibhāṣā (*7,2.15) iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāptaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44245: jṝ vraści ity etayoḥ ktvāpratyaye iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44248: jṝ ity etasya śryukaḥ kiti (*7,2.11) iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāptaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:44253: udito dhātoḥ ktvāpratyaye parato vā iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44259: sakārādāvasici ārdhadhātuke kṛta cṛta chṛda tṛda nṛta ity etebhyo dhātubhyo vā iḍāgamo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:44294: gamer dhātoḥ sakārāder ārdhadhātukasya parasmaipadesu iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44306: gamer iṅādeśasya ajjhanagamāṃ sani (*6,4.16) iti dīrghatvam /
GS24jvkasipu:44307: se ity eva, gantāsmi, gantāsvaḥ, gantāsmaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44308: ātmanepadena samānapadasthasya gameḥ ayam iḍāgamo neṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:44310: kṛtyapi hi bhavati, parasmaipadaluki ca, saṃjigamiṣitā, adhijigamiṣitā
GS24jvkasipu:44313: parasmaipadagrahaṇam, parasmaipadeṣu yo gamir upalakṣitas tasmāt sakārāder
GS24jvkasipu:44315: tanmatena saṃjigaṃsitā, adhijigaṃsitā vyākaraṇasya ity eva bhavitavyam //
GS24jvkasipu:44318: vṛtādibhyaś caturbhyaḥ uttarasya sakārāder ārdhadhātukasya parasmaipadeṣu iḍagamo na bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:44331: caturbhyaḥ iti na vaktavyam, vṛdgrahaṇaṃ hi tatra dyutādiparisamāptyartham kriyate - kṛpū sāmarthye vṛt iti, tad eva yadi vṛtādisamāptyartham api vijñāyate na kiñcidaniṣṭaṃ prāpnoti ? tat kriyate syanderūdillakṣaṇam
GS24jvkasipu:44332: antaraṅgam api vikalpaṃ pratiṣedho yathā bādheta iti /
GS24jvkasipu:44333: caturgrahaṇe hi sati tātparyeṇa syandiḥ saṃnidhāpito bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44338: atra api ātmanepadena samānapadasthebhyo vṛtādibhya iḍāgama iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:44340: kṛtyapi hi parasmaipadaluki ca pratiṣedho bhavati, vivṛtsitā, vivṛtsa tvam iti //
GS24jvkasipu:44343: kṛpa uttarasya tāseḥ sakārādeś ca ardhadhātukasya parasmaipadeṣu iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44353: kḷper apy ātmanepadena samānapadasthasya iḍāgamaḥ iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:44355: kṛtyapi hi parsamipadaluki ca pratiṣedho bhavati, cikḷpsitā, cikḷpsa tvam iti //
GS24jvkasipu:44356: acas tāsvat thaly aniṭo nityam || PS_7,2.61 ||
GS24jvkasipu:44358: tāsau ye nityāniṭo dhātavaḥ ajantāḥ, tebhyastāsāviva thali iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44369: tāsi vibhāṣiteṭ, thali nityam iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44370: tāsvat iti vatinirdeśaḥ kimarthaḥ ? tāsau tatasthali pratiṣedhārthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44371: yo hi tāsāvasan, asattvāc ca nityāniṭ, tasya thali pratiṣedho na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44375: adādeśo hi ghasiḥ, veñādeśaś ca vayistāsau na asti //
GS24jvkasipu:44378: upadeśe yo dhāturakāravān tāsau nityāniṭ tasmāt tāsāviva thali iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44387: nityam aniṭaḥ ity eva, aṅktā, añjitā - ānañjitha //
GS24jvkasipu:44390: ṛkārāntād ghātoḥ bhāradvājasya acāryasya matena tāsāviva nityāniṭasthali iḍāgamo na bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:44393: siddhe satyārambho niyamārthaḥ, ṛta eva bhāradvājasya, nānyeṣāṃ dhātūnām /
GS24jvkasipu:44400: tathā hi sati vidhyartham etat syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:44403: babhūtha ātatantha jagṛbhma vavartha ity etāni nipātyante nigamaviṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:44413: krādisūtrād eva asya pratiṣedho siddhe niyamārthaṃ vacanam, nigame eva, na bhaṣāyām iti //
GS24jvkasipu:44416: sṛji dṛśi ity etayoḥ thali vibhāṣā iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44421: atti arti vyayati ity eteṣāṃ thali iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44425: vyeñaḥ na vyo liṭi (*6,1.46) iti ātvapratiṣedhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44426: attivyayatyoḥ ṛto bhāradvājasya (*7,2.63) iti niyamād vikalpaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44429: vikalpavidhāne hi sati attivyayatigrahaṇam anarthakam, pratiṣedhavidhāne ca artigrahaṇam iti nityo 'yaṃ vidhiḥ iḍgrahaṇam antareṇa api śakyate vijñātum //
GS24jvkasipu:44432: kṛtadvirvacanānāṃ dhātūnām ekācām, ākārāntānām, ghaseś ca vasau iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44437: dhātvabhyāsayoḥ ekādeśe kṛte etvābhyāsalopayoś ca kṛtayoḥ kṛtadvirvacanā ete ekāco bhavanti āt - yayivān /
GS24jvkasipu:44440: siddhe satyārambho niyamārthaḥ, ekājād ghasām eva vasāviḍāgamo bhavati na
GS24jvkasipu:44446: krādiniyamāt pratiṣedhābhāvāc ca ya iṭ prasaktaḥ sa niyamyate /
GS24jvkasipu:44448: dvirvacane hi kṛte iṭi hi sati āto lopena bhavitavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:44449: daridrātes tu kāsyanekājgrahaṇaṃ culumpādyartham ityāmā bhavitavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:44451: athāpyām na kriyate tathāpi ca daridrāteḥ ārdhadhātuke lopaḥ siddhaś ca pratyayavidhau iti prāg eva pratyayotpatter ākāre lupte iḍāgamasya nimittaṃ vihataṃ iti na iḍāgamo bhavati, dadaridrvān iti bhavitavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:44452: ghaser api yadi grahaṇam iha na kriyate tadā dvirvacanāt paratvād ghasibhasorhali ca (*6,4.100) iti upadhālope kṛte dvirvacanam eva na syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:44454: iha tu ghasigrahaṇād upadhālopam api paratvāt iḍāgamo bādhate /
GS24jvkasipu:44456: sa ca dvirvacane 'ci (*1,1.59) iti dvirvacane kartavye sthānivad bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:44460: gama hana vida viśa ity eteṣāṃ dhātūnāṃ vasau vibhāṣā iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44466: viśinā sāhacaryād iha videstaudādikasya lābhārthasya grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:44467: jñānārthasya tu nityaṃ vividvān ity eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44472: sanoteḥ sanater vā dhātoḥ saniṃsasanivāṃsam iti nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:44475: saniṅpūrvāt anyatra senivāṃsam ity eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44480: ṛkārāntānāṃ dhātūnāṃ hanteś ca sye iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44484: svarater veṭtvāt ṛddhanoḥ sye ity etad bhavati vipratiṣedhena /
GS24jvkasipu:44495: stu su dhūñ ity etebhyaḥ sici parasamipade parata iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44504: yama rama nama ity eṣām aṅgānām ākārāntānāṃ ca sagāgamo bhavati parasmaipade sici, iḍāgamaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:44509: yamādīnāṃ halantalakṣaṇā vṛddhiḥ prāptā sā neṭi pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:44515: smiṅ pūṅ ṛ añjū aśū ity eteṣāṃ dhātūnāṃ sani iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44523: aśeḥ ūdito grahaṇāt aśnoter nityam iḍāgamo 'sty eva //
GS24jvkasipu:44533: kiratigiratyoḥ - iṭ sani vā (*7,2.41) iti vikalpaḥ prāptaḥ, vṝto vā (*7,2.35) iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:44537: rudādibhyaḥ uttarasya valādeḥ sārvadhātukasya iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44548: īśa uttarasya se ity etasya sārvadhātukasya iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44553: īḍa jana ity etābhyām uttarasya dhve ity etasya, sye ity etasya ca sarvadhātukasya iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44562: janī prādurbhāve ity asya chāndasatvāt śyano luk upadhālopābhāvaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:44563: jana janane ity asya api śluvikaraṇasya grahaṇam atra+iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:44566: dhveśabde īśer api iḍāgama iṣyate īśidhve īśidhvam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:44567: tadarthaṃ kecit īḍijanoḥ sdhve ca iti sūtraṃ paṭhanti /
GS24jvkasipu:44568: tatra sakārādeḥ seśabdasya sūtra eva+upādānāc caśabdo bhinnakramaḥ īśeranukarṣaṇārtho vijñāyate
GS24jvkasipu:44569: īśīḍijanāṃ sedhvayoḥ ity ekam eva sūtraṃ na paṭhitam ? vicitrā hi sūtrasya
GS24jvkasipu:44571: dhve iti kṛtaṭer etvasya grahaṇāt laṅi dhvami na bhavitavyamiṭā /
GS24jvkasipu:44576: sārvadhātuke yo liṅ tasya anantyasya sakārasya lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44577: kaḥ punar anantyo liṅaḥ sakāraḥ ? yo yāsuṭsuṭsīyuṭām /
GS24jvkasipu:44587: akārāntāt aṅgād uttarasya yā ity etasya sārvadhātukasya iy ity ayam ādeśo bhavati, pacet, pacetām, paceyuḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:44593: nanu ca ato lopaḥ (*6,4.48) ity anena atra bhavitavyam, pacet ity atra api hi tarhi ato dīrgho yañi (*7,3.101) iti dīrghatvena bhavitavyam, tad anena avaśyaṃ vidhyantaraṃ bādhitavyam, sa yathaiva dīrghasya bādhakaḥ evam ato
GS24jvkasipu:44594: lopasya api bādhakaḥ syāt ? syād etad evaṃ yadi dīrghaḥ sārvadhātuke
GS24jvkasipu:44596: atha tu tiṅi vidhīyate, tadā yena nāprāptinyāyena dīrghasyaiva bādhakaḥ syān na punar ato lopasya /
GS24jvkasipu:44598: yaḥ iti vā ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśe yalopasya asiddhatvamanāśritya ādguṇaḥ kṛtaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:44600: kecit atra ato yāsiyaḥ iti sūtraṃ pathanti /
GS24jvkasipu:44604: ākārasya ṅidavayavasya ākārāntād aṅgād uttarasya sārvadhātukasya iy ity ayam ādeśo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:44612: sārvadhātukam apit (*1,2.4) ity atra na ṅitīva ṅidvat ity evam
GS24jvkasipu:44613: aṅgīkriyate, api tu ṅita iva ṅidvat iti /
GS24jvkasipu:44614: pūrvasūtra eva uccukuṭiṣati iti prasiddhaye tathāṅgīkaraṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:44615: yadi gāṅkuṭādisūtre ṅita iva ṅidvad bhavati ity evam aṅgīkriyate, tadā anudāttaṅiti ātmanepadam (*1,3.12) ity ātmanepadaṃ prapnoti iti /
GS24jvkasipu:44631: akāramātrabhakto 'yaṃ muk adupadeśagrahaṇena gṛhyate iti adupadeśād iti
GS24jvkasipu:44633: yady evam āto ṅitaḥ (*7,2.81) ity ayam api cidhiḥ prāpnoti ?
GS24jvkasipu:44636: lasārvadhātukānudāttatvam api tarhi na prāpnoti ? na+eṣa doṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44638: tena upadeśād ūrdhaṃ saty api kālabhede bhavitavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:44639: tathā ca pacavaḥ, pacāmaḥ ity atra api bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:44656: vikalpena ayam ākāro bhavati, etaj jñāpitam aṣṭano dīrghāt (*6,1.172) iti
GS24jvkasipu:44657: dīrghagrahaṇāt, aṣṭābhya auś (*7,1.21) iti ca kṛtātvasya nirdeśāt /
GS24jvkasipu:44658: tena aṣṭabhiḥ, aṣṭabhyaḥ ity api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44664: rai ity etasya halādau vibhaktau parataḥ ākārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44671: mṛjer vṛddhiḥ (*7,2.114) ity ataḥ prāg vibhaktyadhikāraḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:44674: yuṣmad asmad ity etayoḥ anādeśe vibhaktau parataḥ ākārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44681: hali ity adhikārād apy atra na syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:44682: uttaratra tu anādeśagrahaṇena prayojanam yo 'ci (*7,2.89) iti, tad ihaiva kriyate //
GS24jvkasipu:44685: dvitīyāyāṃ ca parataḥ yuṣmadasmadoḥ ākārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44695: prathamāyāś ca dvivacane parato bhāṣāyāṃ viṣaye yuṣmadasmadoḥ ākārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44704: bhāṣāyām iti kim ? yuvaṃ vastrāṇi pīvasā vasāthe //
GS24jvkasipu:44707: ajādau vibhaktau anādeśe yuṣmadasmadoḥ yakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44716: yuṣmadasmador anādeśe (*7,2.86) ity atra yadi hali iti anuvartate,
GS24jvkasipu:44717: śakyamakartum aci iti etat ? tat kriyate vispaṣṭārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:44724: kaśca śeṣaḥ ? yatra ākāro yakāraś ca na vihitaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44725: pañcamyāś ca caturthyāś ca ṣaṣṭhīprathamayor api /
GS24jvkasipu:44726: yāny advivacanāny atra teṣu lopo vidhīyate //
GS24jvkasipu:44744: śeṣe lope kṛte striyāṃ ṭāp kasmān na bhavati, tvaṃ brāhmaṇī, ahaṃ brāhmaṇī ? snnipātalakṣaṇo vidhir animittaṃ tadvighātasya, aliṅge vā yusmadasmadī iti /
GS24jvkasipu:44746: kecit tu śeṣe lopaṃ ṭilopam icchanti /
GS24jvkasipu:44747: katham ? vakṣyamāṇādeśāpekṣaḥ śeṣaḥ, te cādeśā maparyantasya vidhīyante,
GS24jvkasipu:44748: tena maparyantād yo 'nyaḥ sa śeṣaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:44749: tatra ayaṃ lopaḥ iti ṭilopo bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:44753: yadita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmo maparyantasya ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:44758: maparyantasya iti kim ? yuvakām, āvakām iti sākackasya mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:44761: maparyantasya iti kim ? sarvasya mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:44762: tathā ca sati tvamayor akārasya yo 'ci (*7,2.89) iti yakāre kṛte aniṣṭaṃ rūpaṃ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:44763: māntasya ity eva siddhe asmin yat parigrahaṇaṃ kṛtam, avadhidyotanārthaṃ tat /
GS24jvkasipu:44765: kadā ? yadā ṇyantayoḥ kvipi māntatvaṃ vidyate yuṣmadasmadoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44766: sthānivattvaṃ ca ṇeratra kvau lutatvān na vidyate //
GS24jvkasipu:44769: dvivacane ye yuṣmadasmadī dvyarthābhidhānaviṣaye tayoḥ maparyantasya sthāne yuva āva ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44776: yadā samāse dvyarthe yuṣmadasmadī bhavataḥ, samāsārthasya anyasaṅkhatvāt ekavacanaṃ bahuvacanaṃ vā bhavati, tadā api dvyarthayoḥ yuṣmadasmadoḥ yuvāvau bhavataḥ , yadi tvāhau sau (*7,2.94) ity evam ādinā ādeśāntareṇa na bādhyete /
GS24jvkasipu:44797: tvāhādīnāṃ tu viṣaye paratvāt te eva bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:44806: yadā tu yuṣmadasmadī ekatvabahutvayor vartete, samāsārthastu dvitve, tadā yuvāvau na bhavataḥ
GS24jvkasipu:44814: yuṣmadasmadoḥ maparyantasya jasi parato yūya vaya ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ
GS24jvkasipu:44821: tadantavidhir atra bhavati, aṅgādhikāre tasya ca taduttarapadasya ca iti
GS24jvkasipu:44824: yuṣmadasmador maparyantasya sau pare tva aha ity etau ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44833: yuṣmadasmadoḥ maparyantasya tubhya mahya ity etāv ādeśua bhavato ṅayi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44842: yuṣmadasmadoḥ maparyantasya tava mama ity etāv ādeśau bhavato ṅasi parataḥ
GS24jvkasipu:44852: ekavacane ye yuṣmadasmadī ekārthāmidhānaviṣaye tayor maparyantasya sthāne tva ma ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44861: yadā samāse ekārthe yuṣmadasmadī bhavataḥ, samāsārthasya tv anyasaṅkhyatvāt dvivacanaṃ bahuvacanaṃ vā bhavati, tadāpi tvamāvādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44862: ādeśāntarāṇāṃ tu tvāhau sau (*7,2.94) ity evamādīnāṃ viṣaye
GS24jvkasipu:44878: pratyaye uttarapade ca parata ekavacane vartamānayoḥ yusmadasmador maparyantasya tva ma ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44893: yuṣmākaṃ putraḥ, asmākaṃ putraḥ yuṣmatputraḥ, asmatputraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44894: vibhaktau ity adhikārāt pūrvayogo vibhaktāv eva /
GS24jvkasipu:44895: tato 'nyatra api pratyaye uttarapade ca yathā syāt ity ayam ārambhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44896: nanu cātrāpyantarvartinī vibhaktir asti, tasyām eva ādeśau bhavisyataḥ ?
GS24jvkasipu:44898: bahiraṅgo luk, antaraṅgau ādeśau, prathamaṃ tau bhaviṣyataḥ ? etad eva tarhi ādeśavacanaṃ jñāpakam antaraṅgān api vidhīn bahiraṅgo 'pi luk bādhate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:44899: tena gomān priyo 'sya gomatpriyaḥ ity evam ādau numādi lukā bādhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:44900: evaṃ ca sati tvāhau sau (*7,2.94) ity evam ādayo 'pi pratyayottarpadayor ādeśā na bhavanti
GS24jvkasipu:44908: atha kimarthm eṣāṃ tvāhādīnāṃ bādhanārtham etan na vijñāyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:44913: tri catur ity etayoḥ striyāṃ vartamānayoḥ tisṛ catasṛ ity etāv ādeśau bhavato vibhaktau parataḥ
GS24jvkasipu:44922: striyām iti ca+etat tricaturor eva viśeṣaṇaṃ na aṅgasya /
GS24jvkasipu:44923: tena yadā tricatuḥśabdau striyām, aṅgaṃ tu liṅgāntare, tadā apy ādeśau
GS24jvkasipu:44925: priyāḥ tisro brāhmaṇyo 'sya brāhmaṇasya priyatisā brāhmaṇaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44930: nadyṛtaś ca (*5,4.153) iti samāsānto na bhavati, vibhaktyāśrayatvena tisṛbhāvasya bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt
GS24jvkasipu:44931: yadā tu tricatuḥśabdau liṅgāntare, striyām aṅgam, tadā ādeśau na bhavataḥ
GS24jvkasipu:44932: priyāḥ trayo 'syāḥ, priyāṇi trīṇi vā asyāḥ brāhmaṇyāḥ sā priyatriḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44938: catastraḥ paśya ity atra caturaḥ śasi (*6,1.137) ity eṣa svaro mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:44939: catasṛṇām ity atra tu ṣaṭtricaturbhyo halādiḥ (*6,1.179) ity eva svaro
GS24jvkasipu:44944: tisṛ catasṛ ity etayoḥ ṛtaḥ sthāne rephādeśo bhavati ajādau vibhaktau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44959: ṛtaḥ iti kim ? tisṛcatasroḥ pratipattyartham, anyathā hi tadapavādaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:44963: jarā ity etasya jaras ity ayam ādeśo bhavati anyatrasyām ajādau vibhaktau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44964: jarasā dantāḥ śīryante, jarayā dantāḥ śīryante /
GS24jvkasipu:44965: jarase tvā paridadyuḥ, jarāyai tvā paridadyuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44970: iha atijarasaṃ brāhmaṇakulaṃ paśya iti lug na bhavati, ānupūrvyā siddhatvat /
GS24jvkasipu:44971: atijara am iti sthite luk, ambhāvaḥ, jarasbhāvaḥ iti trīṇi kāryāṇi yugapat prāpnuvanti
GS24jvkasipu:44972: tatra luk tāvadapavādatvād ambhāvena bādhyate, ambhāvo 'pi paratvāj jarasādeśena /
GS24jvkasipu:44973: na ca punar lukśāstraṃ pravartate, bhraṣṭāvasaratvāt, iti evam eva bhavati atijarasaṃ brāhmaṇakulaṃ paśya iti /
GS24jvkasipu:44974: prathamaikavacane tṛtīyābahuvacane ca atijaraṃ brāhmaṇakulaṃ tiṣṭhati,
GS24jvkasipu:44975: atijaraiḥ iti ca bhavitavyam iti gonardīyamatena /
GS24jvkasipu:44976: kiṃ kāraṇam ? sannipātalakṣaṇo vidhiranimittaṃ tadvidghātasya iti /
GS24jvkasipu:44977: anye tu anityatvāt asyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ atijarasaṃ brāhmaṇakulaṃ tiṣṭhati,
GS24jvkasipu:44978: atijarasaiḥ ity evaṃ bhavitavyam iti manyante //
GS24jvkasipu:44981: tyad ity evam ādīnām akārādeśo bhavati vibhaktau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44992: sañjñopasarjanībhūtāḥ tyadādayaḥ pāṭhādeva paryudastāḥ iti iha na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:44995: tyadādipradhāne tu śabde bhavaty eva, paramasaḥ paramatau, parmate //
GS24jvkasipu:44998: kim ity etasya kaḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati vibhaktau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45000: sākackasya apy ayam ādeśo bhavati, tena akāra eva kimo na vidhīyate kimo
GS24jvkasipu:45004: takārādau hakārādau ca vibhaktau parataḥ kim ity etasya ku ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45011: ati tiy etasyāṃ vibhaktau parataḥ kim ity etasya kva ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45015: kimo ḍvat iti pratyayāntaraṃ na vidhīyate, sākackārtham //
GS24jvkasipu:45018: tyadādīnāṃ takāra-dakārayoḥ anantyayoḥ sakārādeśo bhavati sau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45027: adasaḥ sau parataḥ sakārasya aukārādeśo bhavati sośca lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45029: autvapratiṣedhaḥ sākackād vā vaktavyaḥ sādutvaṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:45030: yadā ca autvapratiṣedhaḥ tadā sakārād uttarasya utvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45038: hrasvāl lupyeta sambuddhir na halaḥ prakṛtaṃ hi tat //
GS24jvkasipu:45039: āpa etvaṃ bhavet tasmin na jhalītyanuvartanāt /
GS24jvkasipu:45049: idamo dakārasya sthāne makārādeśo bhavati vibhaktau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45054: idamo makārasya yakārādeśo bhavati sau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45056: uttarasūtre puṃsi iti vacanāt striyāmayaṃ yakāraḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:45059: idamaḥ idarūpasya puṃsi sau parataḥ ay ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45064: idamaḥ akakārasya idrūpasya sthāne ana ity ayam ādeśo bhavati āpi vibhaktau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45069: āpi iti pratyāhāraḥ tṛtīyaikavacanāt prabhṛti supaḥ pakāreṇa //
GS24jvkasipu:45072: halādau vibhaktau parataḥ idamo 'kakārasya idrūpasya lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45078: nānarthake 'lontyavidhiḥ iti sarvasya ayam idrūpasya lopaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45088: mṛjer iti dhātugrahaṇam idam, dhātoś ca kāryam ucyamānaṃ dhātupratyaya eva
GS24jvkasipu:45090: tena kiṃsaparimṛḍbhyām, kaṃsaparimṛḍbhiḥ ity atra na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:45093: ajantasya aṅgasya ñiti ṇiti ca pratyaye vṛddhir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45103: jayater yauteś ca uṇādayo bahulam (*3,3.1) iti ṣṭran pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45107: aṅgopadhāyā akārasya sthāne ñiti ṇiti ca pratyaye vṛddhir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45120: taddhite ñiti ṇiti ca pratyaye parato 'ṅgasya acām ādeḥ acaḥ sthāne vṛddhir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45127: tvāṣṭraḥ, jāgataḥ ity atra acāmāder vṛddhir antyopadhālakṣaṇāṃ vṛddhiṃ bādhate //
GS24jvkasipu:45130: kiti ca taddhite parato 'ṅgasyācām ādeḥ acaḥ sthāne vṛddhir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45134: iti kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau saptamādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:45138: devikā śiṃśapā dityavāṭ dīrghasatra śreyas ity etaṣām aṅgānām acāmādeḥ acaḥ sthane vṛddhiprasaṅge ākāro bhavati ñiti, ṇiti, kiti taddhite parataḥ
GS24jvkasipu:45141: pūrvadevikā nāma prācāṃ grāmaḥ, tatra bhavaḥ pūrvadāvikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45142: prācāṃ grāma-nagarāṇām (*7,3.14) iti uttarapadavṛddhiḥ, sāpi ākāra eva
GS24jvkasipu:45144: śiṃśapā - śiṃśapāyāḥ vikāraḥ camasaḥ śāṃśapaḥ camasaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45145: palāśādirayam, tena pakṣe aṇ, anudāttādilakṣaṇo vā añ /
GS24jvkasipu:45147: pūrvaśiṃśapā nāma prācāṃ grāmaḥ, tatra bhavaḥ pūrvaśāṃśapaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45152: vṛddhiviṣaye 'cāmādeḥ acaḥ sthāne vahīnarasya ikārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45157: kekaya mitrayu pralaya ity eteṣāṃ yakārādeḥ iya ity ayam ādeśo bhavati taddhite ñiti, ṇiti, kiti ca parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45159: janapadaśabdāt kṣatriyād añ (*4,1.168) iti añ pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45163: loke ca ṛṣiśabdo gotram ity abhidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:45165: na y-vābhyāṃ padāntābhyāṃ pūrvau tu tābhyām aic || PS_7,3.3 ||
GS24jvkasipu:45167: yakāra-vakārābhyām uttarasya acāmādeḥ acaḥ sthāne vṛddhir na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:45168: tābhyāṃ tu yakāra-vakārābhyāṃ pūrvam aijāgamau bhavataḥ ñiti, ṇiti, kiti ca taddhite parataḥ
GS24jvkasipu:45173: yvābhyām iti kim ? nrarthasya apatyam nrārthiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45174: padāntābhyām iti kim ? yaṣṭiḥ praharaṇam asya yāṣṭīkaḥ yataḥ chātrāḥ yātāḥ
GS24jvkasipu:45176: iha mā bhūt, dādhyaśviḥ, mādhvaśviḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:45178: vṛddher abhāvāt pratiṣedho 'pi na asti ity aprasaṅgaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45181: yatra tu uttarapadasambandhī yaṇ na bhavati tatra na+iṣyate pratiṣedhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45182: dve aśītī bhṛto bhūto bhāvī vā dvyāśītikaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:45185: dvāra ity evam ādīnāṃ yvābhyām uttarapadasya acāmāder acaḥ sthāne vṛddhir na bhavati, pūrvau tu tābhyām aijāgamau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45197: śobhano 'dhyāyaḥ ity etasyāṃ vyutpattau tu pūrveṇa+eva siddham /
GS24jvkasipu:45198: atha api evaṃ vyutpattiḥ kriyate, svo 'dhyāyaḥ svādhyāyaḥ iti ? evam apy atra+eva svaśabdasya+eva pāṭhāt siddham /
GS24jvkasipu:45199: tadādāv api hi vṛddhiriyaṃ bhavaty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:45223: nyagrodhaśabdasya kevalasya yakārād uttarasya acāmādeḥ acaḥ sthāne vṛddhir na bhavati, tasmāc ca pūrvam aikāra āgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45225: kevalasya iti kim ? nyagrodhamūle bhavāḥ śālayaḥ nyāgrodhamūlāḥ śālayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45226: nyagrodhayati iti nyagrodhaḥ iti vyutpattipakṣe niyamārtham,
GS24jvkasipu:45233: karmavyatihāre ṇac striyām (*3,3.43) iti ṇacprayayaḥ, tadantāt ṇacaḥ striyām añ (*5,4.14)
GS24jvkasipu:45236: svāgata ity evam ādīnāṃ yaduktaṃ tan na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45243: vyavahāraśabdo 'yaṃ laukike vṛtte vartate, na tu karmavyatihāre /
GS24jvkasipu:45256: śvādeḥ aṅgasya iñi parato yad uktaṃ tana bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45259: śvanśbado dvārādiṣu paṭhyate, tatra ca tadādividhir bhavati iti etad eva vacanaṃ jñāpakam
GS24jvkasipu:45263: tadantasya ca anyatra api taddhite pratiṣedha iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:45267: śvādeḥ aṅgasya padaśabdāntasya anyatarasyāṃ yaduktaṃ tan na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45271: uttarapadasya ity ayam adhikāraḥ hanasto 'ciṇṇaloḥ (*7,3.32) iti prāgetasmāt /
GS24jvkasipu:45272: mad ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ uttarapadasya ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:45279: yatra pañcamīnirdeśo na asti je proṣṭhapadānām (*7,3.18) ity evam ādau,
GS24jvkasipu:45281: pañcamīnirdeśeṣv api vispaṣṭārtham, vṛddheś ca vyapadeśārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:45282: uttarapadavṛddhau sarvaṃ ca (*6,2.105) iti uttarapadādhikāre yā vṛddhiḥ ity evaṃ vijñāyate
GS24jvkasipu:45284: avayavavācinaḥ uttarasya ṛtuvācinaḥ uttarapadasya ca acāmādeḥ acaḥ vṛddhir bhavati taddhite ñiti, ṇiti, kiti ca parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45289: pūrvaṃ varṣāṇām, aparaṃ varṣāṇām iti ekadeśisamāsaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45290: tatra bhavaḥ (*4,3.53) ity etasiminn arthe varṣabhyaṣṭhak (*4,3.18),
GS24jvkasipu:45291: hemantāc ca (*4,3.21), sarvatra aṇ talopaś ca (*4,3.22) ity aṇ pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45292: tatra ṛtor vṛddhimadvidhau avayavāt iti tadantavidhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45293: avayavāt iti kim ? pūrvāsu varṣāsu bhavam paurvavarṣikam /
GS24jvkasipu:45298: su sarva ardha ity etebhyaḥ uttarasya janapadavācinaḥ uttarapadasya acāmāder acaḥ vṛddhir bhavati taddhite ñiti, ṇiti, kiti ca parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45307: digvācinaḥ uttarasya janapadavācino madravarjitasya acāmāder acaḥ vṛddhir bhavati taddhite ñiti, ṇiti, kiti ca parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45312: diśaḥ iti kim ? pūrvaḥ pañcālānām pūrvapañcālaḥ, tatra bhavaḥ paurvapañcālakaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45319: prācāṃ deśe grāmanagarāṇāṃ diśa uttareṣām acāmāder aco vṛddhir bhavati taddhite ñiti, ṇiti, kiti ca parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45328: grāmatvād eva nagarāṇām api grahaṇe siddhe bhedena yad ubhayor upādānaṃ tat sambandhabhedapratipattyartham
GS24jvkasipu:45330: pāṭaliputrādiḥ punar uttarapadam eva nagaram āha /
GS24jvkasipu:45331: tatra grāmavācinām aṅgānām avayavasya dikśabdād uttarasya nagaravācinām uttarapadānām avayavasya ca vṛddhir bhavati ity evam abhisambandhaḥ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:45332: itaratra tu diśa uttareṣām nagarāṇām ity eva /
GS24jvkasipu:45333: pūrvaiṣukāmaśamaḥ ity evam ādiṣu kṛtāyām uttarapadavṛddhau ekādeśo bhavati iti jñāpi ta nendrasya parasya (*7,3.22) iti pratiṣedhena //
GS24jvkasipu:45336: saṅkhyāyā uttarapadasya saṃvatsaraśabdasya saṅkhyāyāś ca acāmāder acaḥ sthāne vṛddhir bhavati taddhite ñiti, ṇiti, kiti ca parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45337: dvau saṃvatsarābadhīṣṭo bhṛto bhūto bhāvī vā dvisāṃvatsarikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45338: saṅkhyāyāḥ - dve ṣaṣṭī adhīṣṭo bhṛto bhūto bhāvī vā dviṣāṣṭikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45340: dviṣaṣṭhyādiśabdo varṣeṣu saṃkhyeyeṣu vartamānaḥ kālādhikāravihitaṃ pratyayam utpādayati /
GS24jvkasipu:45341: parimāṇāntasya asañjñāśāṇayoḥ (*7,3.17) ity eva siddhe saṃvatsaragrahaṇam parimāṇagrahaṇe kālaparimāṇasya agrahaṇārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:45342: tena dvaisamikaḥ, traisamikaḥ iti uttarapadavṛddhir na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45343: dvivarṣā, trivarṣā māṇavikā iti aparimāṇabistācita iti paryudāso na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:45346: saṅkhyāyā uttarasya varṣaśabdasya acāmāder acaḥ vṛddhir bhavati taddhite ñiti, ṇiti, kiti ca parataḥ, sa cet taddhito bhaviṣyatyarthe na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45347: dve varṣe adhīṣṭo bhṛto bhūto vā dvivārṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45349: abhaviṣyati iti kim ? yasya traivarṣikaṃ dhānyaṃ nihitaṃ bhṛtyavṛttaye,
GS24jvkasipu:45350: adhikaṃ vā api vidhyeta, sa somaṃ pātum arhati /
GS24jvkasipu:45352: adhīṣṭabhṛtayor abhaviṣyati iti pratiṣedho na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45353: gamyate hi tatra bhaviṣyattā, na tu taddhitārthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45354: dve varṣe adhīṣṭo bhṛto vā karma kariṣyati iti dvivārṣiko manuṣyaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:45357: parimāṇāntasya aṅgasya saṅkhyāyāḥ paraṃ yad uttarapadaṃ tasya acāmāder acaḥ vṛddhir bhavati taddhite ñiti, ṇiti, kiti ca parataḥ, sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye śāṇe ca+uttarapade na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45362: dvābhyāṃ niṣkābhyāṃ krītam dvitripūrvān niṣkāt (*5,1.30) dvinaiṣkikam /
GS24jvkasipu:45365: pañca lohityaḥ parimāṇamasya, pañca kalāpāḥ parimāṇamasya iti vihṛhya tad
GS24jvkasipu:45366: asya pariṃāṇam (*5,1.57) iti yogavibhāgāt pratyayaḥ, taddhitāntaścāyaṃ samudāyaḥ sañjñā /
GS24jvkasipu:45369: śāṇād vā (*5,1.35), dvitripūrvādaṇ ca (*5,1.36) ityaṇ pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45375: tatra yaḥ taddhito vihitaḥ tasmin ñiti, ṇiti, kiti ca parataḥ
GS24jvkasipu:45376: proṣthapadānām uttarasya acāmādeḥ acaḥ vṛddhir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45377: proṣṭhapadā nāma nakṣatram, tābhiḥ yuktaḥ kālaḥ ity aṇ /
GS24jvkasipu:45379: proṣṭhapadāsu jātaḥ, ṛtunakṣatrebhyo 'ṇ ity aṇ, proṣthapādaḥ māṇavakaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45380: je iti kim ? yadā proṣthapado megho dharaṇīmabhivarṣati, proṣthapadāsu bhavaḥ prauṣṭhapadaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:45381: proṣthapadānām iti bahuvacananirdeśāt paryāyo 'pi gṛhyate bhadrapādaḥ iti
GS24jvkasipu:45384: hṛd bhaga sindhu ity evam anto 'ṅge pūrvapadasya uttarapadasya ca acāmāder aco vṛddhir bhavati taddhite ñiti, ṇIti, kiti ca parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45396: saktupradhānāḥ sindhavaḥ saktusindhavaḥ, saktusindhuṣu bhavaḥ sāktusaindhavaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45398: sindhuśabdaḥ kacchādiṣu paṭhyate, tena tadantavidhir iṣyate iti aṇpratyayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:45401: anuśatika ity evam ādīnāṃ cāṅgānāṃ pūrvapadasya ca+uttarapadasya ca cāmāder acaḥ sthāne vṛddhir bhavati taddhite ñiti, ṇiti, kiti ca parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45406: aṅgāraveṇuḥ nāma kaścit, tasya apatyam āṅgāravaiṇavaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45408: asyahatya iti kecit paṭhanti, tato 'pi vimuktāditvādaṇ /
GS24jvkasipu:45412: ata eva vacanādasya samudāyasya prātipadikatvaṃ vibhakteś ca aluk /
GS24jvkasipu:45413: vadhyoga iti bidādiḥ ayam, tasya apatyam vādhyaugaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45419: janapadasamudāyo janapadagrahaṇena na gṛhyate iti vuñ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45421: ihaloka, paraloka - tatra bhavaḥ aihalaukikaḥ, pāralaukikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45425: sarvabhūmeḥ nimittaṃ saṃyogaḥ utpāto vā sārvabhaumaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45431: ṣyañi iti kim ? rājapuruṣasya apatyam rājapuruṣāyaṇiḥ /
