GS24jvkasipu:45438: tena idamapi siddhaṃ bhavati, abhigamamarhati ābhigāmikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45467: devatādvandve ca pūrvapadasya uttarapadasya ca acāmāder acaḥ sthāne vṛddhir bhavati taddhite ñiti, ṇiti, kiti ca parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45470: yo devatādvandvaḥ sūktahaviḥsambandhī, tatra ayaṃ vidhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45471: iha tu na bhavati, skandaviśākhau devate asya skāndaviśākhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45475: indraśabdasya parasya yad uktam tan na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45478: parasya iti kim ? aindrāgnamekādaśakapālaṃ caruṃ nirvapet /
GS24jvkasipu:45479: indraśabde dvāvacau, tatra taddhite ekasya yasyeti ca (*6,4.148) iti
GS24jvkasipu:45480: lopaḥ, aparasya pūrveṇa saha ekādeśaḥ ity aprāptir eva vṛddheḥ, tadedaṃ pratiṣedhavacanaṃ jñāpakam, bahiraṅgam api pūrvottarapadayoḥ pūrvaṃ kāryaṃ bhavati paścād ekādeśaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:45481: tena pūrvaiṣukāmaśamaḥ ity ādi siddhaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:45484: dirghād uttarasya varuṇasya yad uktaṃ tan na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45488: agneḥ īdagneḥ somavaruṇayoḥ (*6,3.27) ity asya anaṅapavādasya idvṛddhau
GS24jvkasipu:45489: (*6,3.28) iti pratiṣedho vidhīyate, tena dīrghāt paro na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:45492: prācāṃ deśe nagarānte 'ṅge pūrvapadasya uttarapadasya ca acāmāder acaḥ vṛddhir bhavati taddhite ñiti, ṇiti, kiti ca parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45495: prācām iti kim ? madranagaram udakṣu, tatra bhavaḥ mādranagaraḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:45498: jaṅgala dhenu valaja ity evam antasya aṅgasya pūrvapadasya acāmāder aco vṛddhir bhavati, vibhāṣitam uttaram uttarapadasya vibhāṣā bhavati taddhite
GS24jvkasipu:45503: ardhāt parimāṇasya pūrvasya tu vā || PS_7,3.26 ||
GS24jvkasipu:45505: ardhaśabdāt parasya parimāṇavācinaḥ uttarasya acāmāder acaḥ sthāne vṛddhir bhavati, pūrvasya tu vā bhavati taddhite ñiti, ṇiti, kiti ca parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45508: parimāṇasya iti kim ? ardhakrośaḥ prayojanam asya ārdhakrośikam //
GS24jvkasipu:45511: ardhāt parasya parimāṇākārasya vṛddhir na bhavati, pūrvasya tu vā bhavati taddhite ñiti, ṇiti, kiti ca parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45515: taparakaraṇaṃ kim ? iha mā bhūt, ardhakhāryāṃ bhavā ardhakhārī /
GS24jvkasipu:45516: kiṃ ca syāt ? ardhakhārī bhāryā yasya ardhakhārībhāryaḥ, vṛddhinimittasya ca taddhitasya araktavikāre (*6,3.39) iti puṃvadbhāvapratiṣedho na syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:45517: yatra hi taddhite vṛddhiḥ pratiṣidhyate, sa vṛddhinimittaṃ na bhavati iti puṃvadbhāvo na pratiṣidhyate, yathā vaiyākaraṇī bhāryā asya vaiyākaraṇabhāryaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:45520: pravāhaṇasya ḍhe parataḥ uttarapadasya acāmāder acaḥ vṛddhir bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:45526: ḍhakprayayāntasya pravāhaṇaśabdasya taddhiteṣu parataḥ uttarapadasya acāmāder acaḥ vṛddhir bhavati, pūrvasya tu vā /
GS24jvkasipu:45529: bāhyataddhitanimittā vṛddhiḥ ḍhāśrayeṇa vikalpena bādhitum aśakyā iti sūtrārambhaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:45532: nañaḥ uttareṣāṃ śuci īśvara kṣetrajña kuśala nipuṇa ity eteṣām acāmāder acaḥ vṛddhir bhavati, pūrvapadasya vā bhavati taddhite ñiti, ṇiti, kiti ca parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45538: atra kecid āhuḥ iyaṃ pūrvapadasya vṛddhir aprāptaiva vibhāṣā vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:45539: na nañpūrvāt tatpuruṣāt ity uttaro bhāvapratyayaḥ pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:45540: tatra śucyādibhyaḥ eva pratyaye kṛte paścānnañsamāse sati vṛddhiranaṅgasyāpi vacanāt bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:45542: bhāvavacanādanyopi hi taddhito vṛddhinimittamapatyādiṣu artheṣu nañsamāsād eva vidyate /
GS24jvkasipu:45543: bahuvrīheś ca nañsamāsāt bhāvavacano 'pi asti, tatra aṅgādhikāropamardanaṃ na yujyate iti
GS24jvkasipu:45544: akṣetrajñānīśvarau tatpuruṣau eva brāhmaṇādiṣu paṭhyete, tataḥ tābhyāṃ bhāve ṣyañ bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:45547: yathātatha yathāpura ity etayoḥ nañaḥ uttarayoḥ paryāyeṇa acamāder acaḥ vṛddhir bhavati taddhite ñiti, ṇiti, kiti ca parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45550: ayathātatha aythāpura iti brāhmaṇādiṣu nañsamāsau etau draṣṭavyau /
GS24jvkasipu:45551: sūtre yathātathāyathāpuraśabdau tu yathā 'sādṛśye (*2,1.7) iti avyayībhāvasamāsau /
GS24jvkasipu:45553: bhāsye tu yathādarśita ayathātathābhāvaḥ iti tathā supsupeti samāso lakṣyate //
GS24jvkasipu:45556: taddhiteṣu iti nivṛttam, tatsambaddhaṃ kiti ity api /
GS24jvkasipu:45558: hanaḥ takārodeśo bhavati ñiti, ṇiti pratyaye parataḥ ciṇṇalau varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:45566: dhāto kāryam ucyamānaṃ dhātoḥ pratyaye vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:45567: iha na bhavati, vārtraghnam itarat iti //
GS24jvkasipu:45570: ākārāntasya aṅgasya ciṇi kṛti ñṇiti yugāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45584: udātopadeśasya māntasya aṅgasya ācamivarjitasya ciṇi kṛti ca ñṇiti yad uktaṃ tan na bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:45585: kiṃ ca uktam ? ata upadhāyāḥ (*7,2.116) iti vṛddhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45597: katham udyamoparamau ? aḍa udyame, yama uparame iti nipātanād anugantavyau /
GS24jvkasipu:45598: upadeśagrahaṇam kim ? śamī, damī, tamī ity atra yathā syāt, iha mā bhūt,
GS24jvkasipu:45607: āmaḥ iti caurādikasya ṇici vṛddhau satyāṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45608: tatra hi mittvaṃ na asti na anye mito 'hetau iti /
GS24jvkasipu:45609: sūryaviśrāmā bhūmiḥ ity evam ādikaṃ prayogamanyāyyam eva manyante /
GS24jvkasipu:45614: jani vadhi ity etayoḥ ciṇi kṛti ca ñṇiti yad uktaṃ tan na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45621: vadhiḥ prakṛtyantaraṃ vyañjanānto 'sti, tasya ayaṃ pratiṣedho vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:45622: bhakṣakaścenna vidyeta vadhako 'pi na vidyate iti hi prayogo dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:45624: ciṇkṛtoḥ ity eva, jajāna garbha mahimānamindram //
GS24jvkasipu:45628: arti hrī vlī rī knūyī kṣmāyī ity eteṣām aṅgānām ākārāntānāṃ ca pugāgamo bhavati ṇau parataḥ
GS24jvkasipu:45637: arti iti ṛ gatiprāpaṇayoḥ, ṛ gatau iti dvayor api dhātvor grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:45638: rī ity api rī gatireṣaṇayoḥ, rīṅ śravaṇe iti /
GS24jvkasipu:45639: pukaḥ pūrvāntakaraṇam adīdapat ity atra upadhāhrasvo yathā syāt iti //
GS24jvkasipu:45642: śā dhā sā hvā vyā ve pā ity eteṣam aṅgānāṃ yugāgamo bhavati ṇau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45650: pāgrahaṇe pai ovai śoṣaṇe ity asya api iha grahaṇam icchanti /
GS24jvkasipu:45651: pā rakṣaṇe ity asya lugvikaraṇatvān na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45657: ete 'pi pūrvāntā eva kriyante, tena nyaśīśayat, apīpalat, adūdhunat,
GS24jvkasipu:45660: kim etasya ākhyāne prayojanam ? etasmin prakaraṇe lakṣaṇapratipadoktaparibhāṣā na asti ity upadiśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:45661: tena adhyāpayati, jāpayati ity evam ādi siddhaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:45664: vā ity etasya vidhūnane 'rthe vartamānasya jugāgamo bhavati ṇau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45667: kimarthaṃ sūtram, vaja gatau ṇyantasya siddhatvāt ? vāteḥ puk mā bhūt ity evam artham /
GS24jvkasipu:45668: pai ovai śoṣaṇe ity etasya etad rūpm //
GS24jvkasipu:45671: lī lā ity etayor aṅgayoḥ anyatarasyāṃ nuk luk iy etāv āgamau bhavato ṇau parataḥ snehavipātane 'rthe /
GS24jvkasipu:45674: lī ī iti īkāraḥ praśliṣyate, tataḥ īkārāntasya+eva nuk bhavati, na tu kṛtātvasya vibhāṣā līyateḥ (*6,1.51) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:45678: lā iti lāteḥ, kṛtātvasya ca līyateḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:45681: bhī ity etasya hetubhaye 'rthe ṣugāgamo bhavati ṇau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45684: atra api bhī ī iti īkārapraśleṣaḥ kṛtātvasya pugnivṛttyarthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45685: muṇḍo bhāpayate ity evaṃ hi tatra bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45686: hetubhaye iti kim ? kuñcikayā enaṃ bhāyayati /
GS24jvkasipu:45687: na atra hetuḥ prayojako bhayakāraṇam, kiṃ tarhi, kuñcikā //
GS24jvkasipu:45690: sphāy ity etasya aṅgasya vakārādeśo bhavati ṇau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45694: śadeḥ aṅgasya agatau arthe vartamānasya takārādeśo bhavati ṇau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45696: agatau iti kim ? gāḥ śādayati gopālakaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:45699: ruheḥ aṅgasya anyatarasyāṃ pakārādeśo bhavati ṇau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45701: pratyayasthāt kāt pūrvasya ata id āpy asupaḥ || PS_7,3.44 ||
GS24jvkasipu:45703: pratyayasthāt kakārāt pūrvasya akārasya ikārādeśo bhavati āpi parataḥ, sa ced āp supaḥ paro na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45711: kakāramātraṃ pratyayo na asti iti sāmarthyāt pratyayasthasya grahaṇam śakyate vijñātum /
GS24jvkasipu:45714: pūrvasya iti kim ? parasya mā bhūt, paṭukā /
GS24jvkasipu:45722: atha āpi ity anena kim ? viśiṣyate ? kakāraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45723: yady evam, kārikā ity atra api na prāpnoti, akāreṇa vyavahitatvāt ?
GS24jvkasipu:45725: ekādeśaḥ pūrvavidhau sthānivadbhavati iti vyavadhānam eva ? vacanād vyavadhānamīdṛśaṃ yat sthānivadbhāvakṛtam ekena varṇena tadāśrīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:45726: rathakaṭyādiṣu tu śrutikṛtam anekena varṇena vyavadhānam iti itvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45727: asupaḥ iti kim ? bahavaḥ parivrājakā asyāṃ mathurāyām bahuparivrājakā mathurā /
GS24jvkasipu:45728: subantād ayaṃ bahuparivrājakaśabdāt paraḥ āp iti pratiṣedho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45730: paryudāse hi sati samudāyād asubantāt parataḥ āp iti itvam atra syād eva /
GS24jvkasipu:45731: avidyamānaḥ sup yasmin so 'yam asup iti ? evam api nāśīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:45732: tathā hi sati bahucarmikā ity atra api na syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:45736: kevalamāmaka iti niyamāt sañjñāchandasoḥ īkāro na asty atra, tena aṇpratyayāntād api ṭāp bhavati, narān kāyati iti narikā /
GS24jvkasipu:45739: udīcāmātaḥ sthāne yakpūrvāyāḥ (*7,3.43) iti vikalpo mā bhūt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:45744: yā sā ity etayoḥ ikārādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45747: yā sā iti nirdeśo 'tantram, yattador upalakṣaṇametat /
GS24jvkasipu:45748: iha api pratiṣedha iṣyate, yakāṃ yakāmadhīmahe takāṃ pacāmahe iti /
GS24jvkasipu:45771: tāntave iti kim ? vaṇikā bhāgurī laukāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:45775: śakunau iti kim ? vartikā bhāgurī laukāyatasya /
GS24jvkasipu:45785: udīcām ācāryāṇāṃ matena yakārapūrvāyāḥ kakārapūrvāyāś ca ātaḥ sthāne yo
GS24jvkasipu:45792: ātaḥ iti kim ? sāṅkāśye bhavā sāṅkāśyikā /
GS24jvkasipu:45794: ātaḥ ity anena hy ataḥ iti sthānī viśiṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:45796: yakapūrvāyāḥ iti strīliṅganirdeśaḥ ātaḥ strīpratyayasya pratipattyartham /
GS24jvkasipu:45797: iha na bhavati, śubhaṃ yāti iti śubhaṃyāḥ - śubhaṃyikā /
GS24jvkasipu:45800: dhātvantayoḥ yakārakakārayor asya pratiṣedhasya pratiṣedho vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45807: eṣām ātaḥ sthāne yo 'kāras tasya itvaṃ na bhavati udīcāmācaryāṇāṃ matena /
GS24jvkasipu:45819: kiṃ kāraṇam ? tatra hi sati yadi sākackābhyāṃ nañsamāsaḥ, athāpi kṛte nañsamāse paścādakac, ubhayathāpi samāsād ya vibhaktir utpadyate tasyāṃ
GS24jvkasipu:45820: satyāṃ tyadātyatve sati ṭāpā bhavitavyam, so 'ntarvartinyā vibhaktyā subantāt paraḥ iti itvasya prāptir eva na asti /
GS24jvkasipu:45821: tena aneṣakā, advake ity eva nityaṃ bhavitavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:45823: bhastrā ity ayam abhāṣitapuṃskaḥ, tasya abhāṣitapuṃskāc ca (*7,3.48) ity eva siddhe yad iha grahaṇaṃ tadupasarjanārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:45826: atra upasarjanahrasvatve kṛte punar bahuvrihau kṛte bhāṣitapuṃskād yaḥ ṭāp utpadyate tasya ke 'ṇaḥ (*7,4.13) iti yo hrasvaḥ, na asau abhāsitapuṃskād
GS24jvkasipu:45828: nañpūrvāṇām api ity apiśabdād anyapūrvāṇāṃ kevalānāṃ ca vidhir ayam iṣyate
GS24jvkasipu:45829: nirbhastrakā, nirbhastrikā, bahubhastrakā, bahubhastrikā, ity evam anayor
GS24jvkasipu:45831: atra nañpūrvāṇām iti vacanam anuvāda eva mandabuddhipratipattyarthaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:45834: abhāṣitapuṃskād vihitasya ātaḥ sthāne yo 'kāraḥ tasya udīcām ācāryāṇāṃ
GS24jvkasipu:45839: bahuvrīhau yadā kapi hrasvaḥ kriyate tadā bhavitavyam anena vidhinā /
GS24jvkasipu:45840: atra api abhāṣitapuṃskād vihitasya ataḥ sthāne bhavatyakāraḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:45841: yadā tu avidyamānā khaṭvā asyāḥ akhaṭvā, alpā akhaṭvā akhaṭvikā iti tadā na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45842: tathā atikrāntā khaṭvām atikhaṭvā, alpā atikhaṭva atikhaṭvikā //
GS24jvkasipu:45845: abhāṣitapuṃskāt ātaḥ sthāne yo 'kāraḥ tasya ācāryāṇām ākārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45851: aṅgasya nimittaṃ yaḥ ṭhaḥ, kaś ca aṅgasya nimittam, pratyayaḥ, tasya pratyayaṭhasya ikaḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45855: ṭhagādiṣu yadi varṇamātraṃ pratyayaḥ, uccāraṇārtho 'kāraḥ, tadā iha api
GS24jvkasipu:45857: saṅghātagrahaṇe tu pratyaye 'tra api saṅghātagrahaṇam eva /
GS24jvkasipu:45858: tatra kaṇeṣṭhaḥ kaṇṭhaḥ ity evam ādīnām uṇādīnām uṇādayo bahulam
GS24jvkasipu:45860: mathitaṃ paṇyam asya māthitikaḥ ity atra tu yasya+iti ca (*6,4.148) iti lope kṛte is-us-uk-tāntāt kaḥ (*7,3.51) iti sthānivadbhāvādikasya kādeśaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:45861: prāpnoti, sannipātalakṣaṇo vidhir animittaṃ tadvighātasya iti na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45866: is us ity evam antānām ugantānāṃ tāntānāṃ cāṅgānām uttarasya ṭhasya kaḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:45877: isusoḥ pratipadoktayor grahaṇād iha na bhavati, āśiṣā carati āśiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45883: cakārajakārayoḥ kavargādeśo bhavati ghiti ṇyati ca pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45892: nyaṅku ity evam ādīnāṃ kavargādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45894: madguḥ - mimasjibhya uḥ iti masjeḥ upratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45895: bhṛguḥ - prathimadibhrasjāṃ samprasāraṇaṃ salopaś ca iti upratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45896: dūrepākaḥ, phalepākaḥ - dūre pacyate svayam eva, phale pacyate svayam eva
GS24jvkasipu:45899: tatpuruṣe iṛti bahulam (*6,3.14) iti saptamyā aluk /
GS24jvkasipu:45900: kṣaṇepākaḥ ity api hi kecit paṭhanti /
GS24jvkasipu:45904: takram vakram iti pañcater vañcateś ca sphāyitañcivañci ity ādinā sūtreṇa rak /
GS24jvkasipu:45909: śvapākaḥ, māṃsapākaḥ, kapotapākaḥ, ulūkapākaḥ iti karmopadādaṇ pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45911: nyagrodhaḥ, vīrud ity atra nyakpūrvasya ruheḥ pacādyaci, vipūrvasya kvipi dhakāro vidhīyate
GS24jvkasipu:45916: hanteḥ hakārasya kavargādeśo bhavati ñiti ṇiti pratyaye parataḥ nakāre ca
GS24jvkasipu:45925: haḥ iti kim ? alo 'ntyasya mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:45928: ñṇitpratyayo hanter viśeṣaṇam, nakāro hakārasya, nakāre 'nantarasya
GS24jvkasipu:45933: yady api sarvair eva ñṇinnairhantihakāro viśiṣyate tathāpi yena nāvyavadhānaṃ tena vyavahite 'pi vacanaprāmāṇyāt iti ñṇiti dhātvavayavena vyavahite 'pi sati bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45934: iha tu na bhavati, hananam icchati hananīyati, hananīyater ṇvul hananīyakaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:45941: abhyāsanimitte pratyaye hanter aṅgasya yo 'bhyāsaḥ tasmād eva+etat kutvam
GS24jvkasipu:45942: iha na bhavati, hananīyitum icchati jihananīyiṣati //
GS24jvkasipu:45945: hinoter hakarasya abhyāsād uttarasya kavargādeśo bhavati acaṅi /
GS24jvkasipu:45951: katham ? caṅyabhyāsanimitte ṇau hinotir aṅgaṃ bhavati, tatra abhyāsanimitte pratyaye heraṅgasya iti vijñāyamane prāptir eva na asti ?
GS24jvkasipu:45953: etat jñāpyate, heracaṅi iti caṅo 'nyatra herṇya dhikasya api kutvaṃ bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:45957: sani liṭi ca pratyaye jeḥ aṅgasya yo 'bhyāsaḥ tasmād uttarasya kavargāadeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45961: jināteḥ samprasāraṇe kṛte yady api jirbhavati, tathāpi lākṣaṇikatvāt tasya
GS24jvkasipu:45962: grahaṇaṃ na bhavati, jijyatuḥ, jijyuḥ ity eva bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:45965: cinoteḥ aṅgasya sanliṭor abhyāsād uttarasya vibhāṣā kavargādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45971: kavargādeḥ dhātoḥ cajoḥ kavargādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45979: aji vraji ity etayoś ca kavargādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45984: ajes tu ajer vy-aghañ-apoḥ (*2,4.56) iti vībhāvasya vidhānāt ṇyati na asti
GS24jvkasipu:45988: bhuja nyubaj ity etau śabdau nipātyete pāṇau upatāpe ca /
GS24jvkasipu:45993: nyubjitāḥ śerate 'sminn iti nyubjaḥ upatāpaḥ, rogaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45999: prayāja anuyāja ity etau nipātyete yajñāṅge /
GS24jvkasipu:46004: prayājānuyājagrahaṇaṃ pradarśanārtham, anyatra apy evaṃ prakāre kutvaṃ na
GS24jvkasipu:46006: ekādaśopayājāḥ, upāṃśuyājamantarā yajati aṣṭau patnīsaṃyājā bhavanti,
GS24jvkasipu:46007: ṛtuyājaiścaranti ity evam ādi siddhaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:46010: vañceḥ aṅgasya gatau vartamānasya kavargādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46016: ucer dhātoḥ ke pratyaye okaḥ iti nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:46017: kim punar atra nipātyate ? kutvaṃ guṇaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:46021: adhikaraṇādau tu kārakāntare ghañarthe kavidhānam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:46022: kim arthaṃ punar ayaṃ ghañyeva na vyutpadyate ? svarārtham antodātto 'yam
GS24jvkasipu:46024: divaukasaḥ, jalaukasaḥ ity evam ādāv apy asuni pratyaye uṇādayo bahulam
GS24jvkasipu:46028: ṇye parataḥ āvaśyake 'rthe kavargo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46037: yaja yāca ruca pravaca ṛca ity eteṣāṃ ṇye parataḥ kavargādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46043: ṛdupadhād api ṛcer ata eva nipātanāt ṇyat bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46046: apare punar āhuḥ, upasargapūrvasya niyamārtham, prapūrvasya+eva vacer aśabdasañjñāyāṃ kutvapratiṣedho yathā syāt, anyopasargapūrvasya mā bhūt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:46049: etat tu viśeṣa eva+iṣyate, daśarātrasya yad daśamamahaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46055: vaco 'śabdasañjñāyāṃ ṇyati parataḥ kutvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46061: prayojya niyojya ity etau śabdau śakyārthe nipātyete /
GS24jvkasipu:46075: ghusañjñakānāṃ leṭi parato vā lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46080: āḍāgame sati lope 'pi dadāt iti siddhaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46081: tatra vāvacanaṃ vispaṣṭārtham, eṣā hi kasyacidāśaṅkā syāt, dadāt ity eva
GS24jvkasipu:46082: nitye prāpte lopaḥ ārabhya māṇo bādhate eva etad rūpam iti //
GS24jvkasipu:46085: okārāntasya aṅgasya śyani parato lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46098: kakāravataḥ upādānaṃ kim ? iha mā bhūt, utsau /
GS24jvkasipu:46102: lug vā duha-diha-liha-guhām ātmanepade dantye || PS_7,3.73 ||
GS24jvkasipu:46104: duha diha liha guha ity eteṣām aṅgānām ātmanepade dantyādau parataḥ kṣasya vā lug bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:46117: anyatra tu antyasya+eva lope kṛte jhalo jhali (*8,2.26) iti sakāralopena sidhyati /
GS24jvkasipu:46118: sthānivadbhāvo 'pi akāralopasya na asti, pūrvatra asiddhe na sthānivat iti /
GS24jvkasipu:46120: yadi sa na gṛhyeta tataḥ taugrahaṇam eva atra kṛtaṃ syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:46123: śamādīnām aṣṭānāṃ dīrgho bhavati śyani parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46137: ṣthivu klami ācam ity eteṣāṃ dīrgho bhavati śiti parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46147: kramaḥ parasmaipadapare śiti parato dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46150: iha utkrāma, saṅkrāma iti herluki kṛte na lumatāṅgasya (*1,1.66) iti pratyayalakṣaṇapratiṣedhāt dīrgho na prāpnoti ? na+eṣa doṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46151: lumatāśabdena lupte ya daṅgaṃ tasya kārye sa pratiṣedhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46152: na ca hau kramir aṅgam, kiṃ tarhi, śapi //
GS24jvkasipu:46155: iṣu gami yama ity eteṣāṃ śiti parataḥ chakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46160: iha mā bhūt, iṣyati, iṣṇāti iti /
GS24jvkasipu:46161: ye tu iṣimuditaṃ na adhīyate te iha ca sūtre aci iti anuvartayanti /
GS24jvkasipu:46162: tac ca pradhānam ajgrahaṇam śiti ity anena viśeṣyate iti varṇayanti /
GS24jvkasipu:46164: yasmin vidhis tadādāvalgrahaṇe ity etad api viśeṣṇena+eva isyate, tena iṣāṇa ity atra chatvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46165: na hy ayam ajeva śit iti //
GS24jvkasipu:46169: pa ghrā dhmā sthā mnā dāṇ dṛśi arti sarti śada sada ity eteṣāṃ piba jighra dhama tiṣtha mana yaccha paśya ṛccha dhau śīya sīda ity ete ādeśā bhavanti śiti parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46181: pibater laghūpadhaguṇaḥ prāpnoti, saḥ aṅgavṛtte punar
GS24jvkasipu:46183: atha vā akārānto 'yam ādeśaḥ ādyudātto nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:46185: anyatra sarati, anusarati ity eva bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:46188: jña jana ity etayoḥ jādeśo bhavati śiti parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46194: pū ity evam ādīnāṃ hrasvo bhavati śiti parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46196: pūñ pavan ity ataḥ prabhṛti plī gatau vṛt iti yāvat kecit icchanti,
GS24jvkasipu:46197: vṛtkaraṇam etat lvādīnāṃ pvādīnāṃ ca parisamāptyartham iti /
GS24jvkasipu:46198: apare tu lvādīnām eva parisamāptyarthaṃ vṛtkaraṇam etad icchanti,
GS24jvkasipu:46203: yeṣām āgaṇāntāḥ pvādayaḥ teṣāṃ jānāti ity atra hrasvaḥ prāpnoti, jñājanor jā (*7,3.79) iti dīrghakaraṇasāmarthyān na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46204: janer api hi jādeśe sati ato dīrgho yañi (*7,3.101) iti dīrghatvena jāyate
GS24jvkasipu:46208: mīnāter aṅgasya śiti pratyaye parato hrasvo bhavati nigamaviṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:46213: mider aṅgasya iko guṇo bhavati śiti pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46218: jusi ca pratyaye parataḥ igantasya aṅgasya guṇo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46222: atha cinuyuḥ, sunuyuḥ ity atra kasmān na bhavati ? atra hi dve ṅittve,
GS24jvkasipu:46224: tatra na aprāpte sārvadhātukāśrayaṅittvanimitte pratiṣedhe jusi guṇaḥ ārabhyamāṇaḥ tam eva bādhate /
GS24jvkasipu:46225: yāsuḍāśrayaṅittvanimittaṃ tu na bādhate, tatra hi prāpte ca aprāpte ca
GS24jvkasipu:46229: sārvadhātuke ārdhadhātuke ca pratyaye parataḥ igantasya aṅgasya guṇo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46238: yadi hi pratyaye saṅi iti vā ucyeta, iha api syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:46241: jāgu ity etasya aṅgasya guṇo bhavati aviciṇṇalṅitsu parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46249: vṝddhiviṣaye pratiṣedhaviṣaye ca yathā syāt iti jāgarter ayaṃ guṇaḥ ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:46250: tasmin kṛte yā ata upadhāyāḥ (*7,2.116) vṛddhiḥ prāpnoti sā na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46251: yadi hi syāt anarthaka eva guṇaḥ syāt, ciṇṇaloś ca pratiṣedhavacanam
GS24jvkasipu:46253: aviciṇṇalṅitsu iti kim ? jṝśṝstṛrjāgṛbhyaḥ kvin jāgṛviḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46258: vi iti kecid ikāram uccāraṇārthaṃ varṇayanti, kvasāv api vakārādau guṇo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46260: ajāgaruḥ, ahaṃ jajāgara ity atra pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti ? na, apratiṣedhāt /
GS24jvkasipu:46261: aviciṇṇalṅitsu iti paryudāso 'yam, athavā jāgraḥ iti praptirasāvānantaryād viciṇṇalṅitsu pratiṣidhyate
GS24jvkasipu:46262: yā tu jusi ca (*7,3.83), sārvadhātukārdhadhātukayoḥ (*7,3.84) iti ca prāptiḥ , sā na pratiṣidhyate
GS24jvkasipu:46265: pugantasya aṅgasya laghūpadhasya ca sārvadhātukārdhadhātukayor guṇo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46273: pratyayāder aṅgāvayavasya ca halorānantarye sati lag hūpadhaguṇo na vyāvartyate iti jñāpitam etat knusanoḥ kitkaraṇena, trasigṛdhidhṛṣikṣipeḥ knuḥ (*3,2.140), halantāc ca (*1,2.10) iti saṃyoge gurusañjñāyāṃ guṇo bhettur na sidhyati /
GS24jvkasipu:46274: vidhyapekṣaṃ laghoś ca asau kathaṃ kuṇḍir na duṣyati //
GS24jvkasipu:46278: knusanor yatkṛtaṃ kittvaṃ jñāpakaṃ syāl laghor gaṇe //
GS24jvkasipu:46279: upadhā ca atra ig eva gṛhyate, tato bhinatti iti guṇo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46280: apare puki antaḥ pugantaḥ, laghvī upadhā laghūpadhā, pugantaśca laghūpadhā ca pugantalaghūypadham iti sūtrārthaṃ varṇayanti //
GS24jvkasipu:46281: na abhyastasya aci piti sārvadhātuke || PS_7,3.87 ||
GS24jvkasipu:46283: abhyastasañjñakasya aṅgasya laghūpadhasya ajādau piti sārvadhātuke guṇo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46306: bhū sū ity etayoḥ tiṅi sārvadhātuke guṇo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46316: atha bobhavīti iti yaṅluki guṇapratiṣedhaḥ kasmān na bhavati ? jñāpakāt,
GS24jvkasipu:46317: yad ayaṃ bobhūtu iti guṇābhāvārthe nipātanaṃ karoti //
GS24jvkasipu:46321: ukārāntasya aṅgasya vṛddhir bhavati luki sati halādau piti sārvadhātuke /
GS24jvkasipu:46341: api stuyād rājānam ity atra hi ṅicca pinna bhavati iti pittvapratiṣedhād vṛddher abhāvaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46342: na abhyastasya ity etad iha anuvartate, yoyoti, roroti ity evam ādyartham
GS24jvkasipu:46345: ūrṇoter vibhāṣā vṛddhir bhavati halādau piti sārvadhātuke /
GS24jvkasipu:46352: ūrṇoter dhātoḥ apṛkte hali piti sārvadhātuke guṇo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46355: hali iti vartamāne yadapṛktagrahaṇaṃ kriyate, tena+eva jñāpyate bhavaty eṣā paribhāṣā yasmin vidhis tadādāvalgrahaṇe iti //
GS24jvkasipu:46358: tṛṇaha ity etasyāṅgasya imāgamo bhavati hali piti sārvadhātuke /
GS24jvkasipu:46366: tṛṇaha iti āgataśnaṃko gṛhyate, śnami kṛte imāgamo yathā syāt iti //
GS24jvkasipu:46369: vrū ity etasmād uttarasya halādeḥ pitaḥ sārvadhātukasya īḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46378: yaṅaḥ uttarasya halādeḥ pitaḥ sārvadhātukasya īḍāgamo bhavati vā /
GS24jvkasipu:46381: tridhā baddho vṛṣabho roravīti maho devo martyāṃ ā viveśa /
GS24jvkasipu:46384: halādeḥ pitaḥ sārvadhātukasya yaṅantād abhāvaḥ iti yaṅlugantasya udāharaṇam //
GS24jvkasipu:46387: tu iti sautro 'yaṃ dhātuḥ, ru śabde, ṣṭuñ stutau, śamu upaśame, ama gatyādiṣu ity etebhyaḥ parasya sārvadhātukasya halāder vā īḍāgamo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:46393: śamyamoḥ bahulaṃ chandasi (*2,4.73) iti vikaraṇaluki sati
GS24jvkasipu:46396: tatra sarveṣām eva chandasi viṣaye vidhir ayaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46397: sārvadhātuke iti anuvartamāne punaḥ sārvadhātukagrahaṇam apidartham,
GS24jvkasipu:46398: stuvīta, śamīdhvam ity atra api yathā syāt iti //
GS24jvkasipu:46401: aster aṅgāt sijantāc ca parasya apṛktasya sārvadhātukasya īḍāgamo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:46410: āhibhuvorīṭi pratiṣedhaḥ iti sthānivadbhāvapratiṣedha tena+iha na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:46414: astisicor apṛktasya sārvadhātukasya īḍagamo bhavati bahulaṃ chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:46420: abhaiṣīrmā putraka iti ca bhavati, chāndasatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:46421: māṅyoge 'pi aḍāgamo bhavati, akṣaḥ, atsāḥ iti, sica iḍabhāvaś ca //
GS24jvkasipu:46424: rudādibhyaḥ parasya sārvadhātukasya halādeḥ apṛktasya īḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46439: rudādibhyaḥ pañcabhyaḥ parasya apṛktasya sārvadhātukasya aḍāgamo bhavati gārgyagālavayor matena
GS24jvkasipu:46453: ada bhakṣaṇe, asmād uttarasya apṛktasya sārvadhātukasya aḍāgamo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:46461: akārāntasya aṅgasya dīrgho bhavati yañādau sārvadhātuke parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46470: kecid atra tiṅi ity anuvartayanti, teṣāṃ bhavavān iti kvasau sārvadhātukadīrgho na bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:46474: supi ca yañādau parato 'kārāntasya aṅgasya dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46484: bahuvacane jhalādau supi parato 'kārāntasya aṅgasya ekārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46504: tasminn āṅi parataḥ, cakārād osi ca, āvantāṅgasya ekārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46512: āpaḥ iti pito grahaṇaṃ kim ? kīlālapā brahmaṇena /
GS24jvkasipu:46514: ṅyābgrahaṇe 'dīrghagrahaṇam iti vacanāt iha na bhavati, atikhaṭvena brāhmaṇakulena //
GS24jvkasipu:46518: sambuddhau ca parataḥ ābantasya aṅgasya etvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46525: ambārthanām aṅgānāṃ nadyantānāṃ hrasvo bhavati sambuddhau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46541: talo hrasvo bā ṅisambuddhyor iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:46546: mātṝṇāṃ mātajādeśo vaktavyaḥ sambuddhau, putrāya putram abhidhātum /
GS24jvkasipu:46548: mātrā vyapadeśam arhati ślāghanīyatvād yaḥ putras tadartham /
GS24jvkasipu:46555: hrasvāntasya aṅgasya guṇo bhavati sambuddhau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46559: he kumāri, he brahmabandhu ity evam ādīnāṃ hrasvavidhānasāmarthyād guṇo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46560: yadi guṇaḥ iṣṭaḥ syāt, ambārthānāṃ hrasvaḥ ity uktvā nadīhrasvayor guṇaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:46564: jasi parato hrasvāntasya aṅgasya guṇo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46570: jasādiṣu chandasi vāvacanaṃ prāṅ ṇau caṅyupadhāyā hrasva ity etasmāt /
GS24jvkasipu:46571: itaḥ prakaraṇāt prabhṛti chandasi vā iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:46572: kiṃ prayojanam ? ambe, darvi, śatakratvaḥ, paśve nṛbhyaḥ, kikidīvyā /
GS24jvkasipu:46581: ṛkārāntasya aṅgasya ṅau parataḥ sarvanāmasthāne ca guṇo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46594: ghyantasyāṅgasya ṅiti pratyaye parato guṇo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46608: nadyantād aṅgād uttarasya ṅitaḥ pratyayasya āḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46615: ābantā daṅgād uttarasya ṅitaḥ pratyayasya yāḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46622: atikhaṭvāya ity atra akṛte dīrghe ṅyābgrahaṇe adīrghaḥ iti vacanād yāḍāgamo na bhavati, kṛte tu lākṣaṇikatvāt //
GS24jvkasipu:46625: sarvanāmnaḥ ābantād aṅgād uttarasya ṅitaḥ pratyaysya syāṭ āgamo hrasvaś ca bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46642: dvitīyā tṛtiyā ity etābhyām uttarasya ṅitaḥ pratyayasya vibhāṣā syāṭ āgamo
GS24jvkasipu:46648: nadyantāt ābantāt nī ity etasmāc ca+uttarasya ṅeḥ ām ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46660: ikārokārābhyāṃ nadīsañjñakābhyām uttarasya ṅeḥ ām ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46666: yan na nadisañjñaṃ na api ghisañjñam ikārāntam , tadiha+udāharaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:46672: ghisañjñakād uttarasya ṅeḥ aukārādeśo bhavati, tasya ca gheḥ akārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46677: at iti taparakaraṇaṃ striyāṃ ṭāpo nivrttyartham /
GS24jvkasipu:46678: audacca gheḥ iti yeṣām ekam eva+idaṃ sūtram, te pradhānaśiṣṭam idudbhyām
GS24jvkasipu:46679: auttvaṃ varṇayanti, anvācayaśiṣtaṃ gheḥ akāram iti //
GS24jvkasipu:46682: gheḥ uttarasya āṅaḥ na abhāvo bhavati astriyām /
GS24jvkasipu:46689: iti kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau saptamādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:46694: caṅpare ṇau yadaṅgam, tasya upadhāyā hrasvo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46701: iha tu mā bhavānaṭiṭat iti nityatvād dvitīyasya dvirvacanaṃ prāpnoti,
GS24jvkasipu:46702: tathā sati hrasvabhāvino 'ṅgasya akārasya upadhātvaṃ vihitam iti hrasvo na
GS24jvkasipu:46704: oṇeḥ ṛdit - karaṇaṃ jñāpakaṃ nityam api dvirvacanam upadhāhrasvatvena
GS24jvkasipu:46706: ṇau iti kim ? caṅyupadhāyā hrasvaḥ ity ucyamāne alīlavat ity atra vacanasāmarthyāt antaraṅgām api vṛddhim ādeśaṃ ca bādhitvā hrasvaḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:46707: adīdapat ity atra hrasvatvena puko bādhaḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:46708: apīpacat ity evam ādautu naiva syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:46713: tadedadupadhāgrahaṇam uttarārtham avaśyaṃ kartavyaṃ tad iha api hrasvatvaṃ nivartayati ity evam arthaṃ yena na avyavadhānam ity etannāśrayitavyam iti
GS24jvkasipu:46716: yo 'sau ṇau ṇilopastasya sthānivadbhāvena aglopitvāt aṅgasya hrasvo na prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:46720: aglopinām aṅgānāṃ śāseḥ ṛditāṃ ca ṇau caṅi upadhāyā hrasvo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46725: ageva yatra kevalo lupyate tatra sthānivadbhāvād api siddham, halacor ādeśe tu na sidhyati iti tadartham etad vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:46732: bhrāja bhāsa bhāṣa dīpa jīva mīla pīḍa ity eteṣām aṅgānāṃ ṇau caṅi upadhāyā hrasvo bhavati anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:46746: pibateḥ aṅgasya ṇau caṅi upadhāyāḥ lopo bhavati, abhyāsasya īkārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46748: upadhālope kṛte oḥ puyaṇ vacanaṃ jñāpakaṃ ṇau sthānivadbhāvasya iti sthānivadbhāvād dvirvacanam
GS24jvkasipu:46751: tiṣṭhater aṅgasya ṇau caṅi upadhāyāḥ ikārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46755: jighrateḥ aṅgasya nau caṅi upadhāyā ikārādeśo vā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46760: ṇau caṅi upadhāyāḥ ṛvarṇasya sthāne vā ṛkārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46766: taprakaraṇaṃ dīrghe 'pi sthānini hrasva eva yathā syāt, acīkṛtat iti /
GS24jvkasipu:46767: na ca ayaṃ bhāvyamānaḥ, kintu ādeśāntaranivṛttyarthaṃ svarūpam eva+etad
GS24jvkasipu:46771: chandasi viṣaye ṇau caṅi upadhāyā ṛvarṇasya sthāne ṛkarādeśo bhavati nityam /
GS24jvkasipu:46777: dayater aṅgasya liṭi parato digi ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46779: dayateḥ iti dīṅo grahaṇaṃ na tu daya dāne ity asya /
GS24jvkasipu:46784: ṛkārāntasya aṅgasya saṃyogādeḥ guṇo bhavati liṭi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46795: pratiṣedhaviṣaye 'pi guṇo yathā syāt ity ayam ārambhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46803: atra hi pūrvaṃ dhātuḥ sādhanena yujyate paścād upasargeṇa ity atra darśane liti kṛte, tadāśraye ca dvirvacane, paścād upasargayoge sati,
GS24jvkasipu:46805: evaṃ ca kṛtvā saṃskṛṣīṣṭa, upaskṛṣīṣṭa ity atra suṭo bahiraṅgalakṣaṇasya asiddhatvāt ṛtaś ca saṃyogādeḥ iti iḍāgamo na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:46808: ṛcchater aṅgasya, ṛ ity etasya, ṝkārāntānāṃ ca liṭi parato guṇo na bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:46813: ṛccher alaghūpadhatvād aprāpto guṇo vidhīyate, ṝtāṃ tu pratiṣiddhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46819: śṝ dṝ pṝ ity eteṣāṃ aṅgānāṃ liṭi parato vā hrasvo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46828: śrā pāke, drā kutsāyāṃ gatau, prā pūraṇe ity eteṣām anekārthā dhātavaḥ iti śṝdṝprāmarthe vartamānānāṃ viśaśratuḥ, viśaśruḥ, vidadratuḥ, vidadruḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:46829: nipapratuḥ, nipapruḥ ity etāni rūpāṇi sādhayanti /
GS24jvkasipu:46830: tathā ca sati kvasau viśaśṛvān ity etad rūpaṃ na syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:46838: rākā, dhākā ity atra uṇādayo bahulam (*3,3.1) iti hrasvo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46839: na kapi (*7,4.14) iti pratiṣedhasāmarthyāt kano 'pi sānubandhakasya grahaṇam iha bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:46842: kapi pratyaye parato 'ṇo hrasvo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46846: gostriyor upasarjanasya (*1,2.48) ity ayam api hrasvaḥ kapi na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46847: samāsārthe hi uttarapade kapi kṛte, paścāt kabantena saha samāsena bhavitavyam iti strīpratyayāntasamāsaprātipadikaṃ na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:46850: ābantasyāṅgasya kapi hrasvaḥ na bhavaty antarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:46855: ṛvarṇāntānāṃ dṛśeś ca aṅi parato guṇo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46864: asyater aṅgasya thugāgamo bhavati aṅi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46868: śvayateḥ aṅgasya akārādeśo bhavati aṅi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46872: pater aṅgasya pumāgamo bhavati aṅi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46876: vaceḥ aṅgasya aṅi parataḥ umāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46880: śīṅaḥ aṅgasya sārvadhātuke parataḥ guṇo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46885: yakārādau kṅiti pratyaye parataḥ śīṅaḥ aṅgasya ayaṅ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46894: upasargād uttarasya uhater aṅgasya hrasvo bhavati yakārādau kṅiti pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46903: aṇaḥ ity eva, ā ūhyate ohyate /
GS24jvkasipu:46907: eter aṅgasya upasargād uttarasya liṅi yakārādau kṅiti parato hrasvo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46911: āśiṣi liṅi akṛtsārvadhātukayoḥ iti dīrghatve kṛte hrasvo 'nena bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46913: aṇaḥ ity eva, ā īyāt eyat /
GS24jvkasipu:46917: akṛdyakāre asārvadhātukayakāre ca kṅiti parato 'jantasya aṅgasya dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46945: ṛkārāntasya aṅgasya akṛdyakāre asārvadhātuke yakāre cvau ca parato rīṅ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:46952: kṅiti ity etan nivṛttam, tena+iha api bhavati, piturāgataṃ pitryam /
GS24jvkasipu:46957: ṛkārāntasya aṅgasya śayak ity etayoḥ liṅi ca yakārādau asārvadhātuke parato raṅ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46972: guṇo bhavati arteḥ saṃyogādīnām ṛkārāntānāṃ yaki parato ligi ca yakārādau asārvadhātuke /
GS24jvkasipu:46977: iha saṃskriyate, saṃskriyāt iti suṭo bahiraṅgalakṣaṇasya asiddhatvāt abhaktatvāt vā saṃyogāditvam aṅgasya na asti iti guṇo na pravartate /
GS24jvkasipu:46983: yagi ca parataḥ arteḥ saṃyogādeś ca ṛtaḥ guṇo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46989: na ndrāḥ saṃyogādayaḥ (*6,1.3) iti dvirvacanapratiṣedhḥ yakārasya neṣyate
GS24jvkasipu:46995: ghrā dhmā ity etayoḥ yaṅi parataḥ īkārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47001: acarṇāntasya aṅgasya cvau parataḥ īkārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47009: kyaci parataḥ avarṇāntasya aṅgasya īkārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47018: aśanāya udanya dhanāya ity etāni nipātyante bubhukṣā pipāsā gardha ity eteṣu artheṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:47019: aśanāya ity aśanaśabdasya ātvaṃ kyaci nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:47030: chandasi viṣaye putravarjitasya avarṇāntasya aṅgasya kyaci yad uktaṃ tan na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47040: durasyuḥ draviṇasyuḥ vṛṣaṇyati riṣaṇyati ity etāni chandasi nipātyante /
GS24jvkasipu:47055: aśva agha ity etayoḥ kyaci parataḥ chandasi viṣaye ākārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47058: etad eva ātvavacanaṃ jñāpakaṃ na cchandasy aputrasya (*7,4.35) iti dīrgharatiṣedho bhavati iti //
GS24jvkasipu:47061: deva sumna ity etayoḥ kyaci parataḥ ākārādeśo bhavati kāṭhake yajuṣi /
GS24jvkasipu:47064: yajuṣi iti kim ? devāñ jigāti sumnayuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47068: kavi adhvara pṛtanā ity eteṣām aṅgānāṃ kyaci parato lopo bhavati ṛci viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:47074: dyati syāti mā sthā ity eteṣām aṅgānām ikārādeśo bhavati takārādau kiti pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47087: śā chā ity etayoḥ anyatarasyām ikārādeśo bhavati takārādau kiti /
GS24jvkasipu:47096: devatrāto galo grāha iti yoge ca sadvidhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47100: dadhāter aṅgasya hi ity ayam ādeśo bhavati takārādau kiti pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47106: jahāter aṅgasya hi ity ayam ādeśo bhavati ktvāpratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47113: jahāter aṅgasya vibhāṣā hi ity ayam ādeśo bhavati chandasi viṣaye ktvāpratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47118: sudhita vasudhita nemadhita dhiṣva dhiṣīya ity etāni chandasi viṣaye nipātyante /
GS24jvkasipu:47119: tatra sudhita vasudhita nemadhita iti suvasunemapūrvasya dadhāteḥ ktapratyaya ittvam iḍāgamo vā pratyayasya nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:47126: dhiṣva iti loṇmadhyamaikavacane dadhāteḥ ittvam iḍāgamo vā pratyayasya dvirvacanābhāvaś ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:47129: dhiṣiya iti āśīrliṅi ātmanepadottamaikavacane dadhāteḥ ittvam, iḍāgamo vā pratyayasya nipātyate
GS24jvkasipu:47134: dā ity etasya ghusañjñakasya dad ity ayam ādeśo bhavati takārādau kiti pratyaya parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47141: ghoḥ iti kim ? dāp lavane - dātaṃ barhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47144: evaṃ hy uktam - tānte doṣo dīrghatvaṃ syād dānte doṣo niṣṭhānatvam /
GS24jvkasipu:47146: yadi tu dasti iti takārādau dīrghatvaṃ tadā tānte 'pi adoṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47147: dāntadhāntayor api sannipātalakṣaṇo vidhir animittaṃ tadvighātasya iti natvadhatve na bhaviṣyataḥ iti na doṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47150: aca upasargāt taḥ (*7,4.47) iti prāpte nipātyante /
GS24jvkasipu:47151: anupasargā vā ete avādayaḥ kriyāntaraviṣayā veditavyāḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:47154: ajantād upasargāduttarasya dā ity etasya ghusaṃjñakasya ta ity ayam ādeśo bhavati takārādau kiti /
GS24jvkasipu:47164: upasargāt iti paccamīnirdeśād āder alaḥ prāpnoti ? tatra samādhimāhuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47165: acaḥ ity etad dvirāvartayitavyam, tatra ekaṃ paccamyantaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:47166: upasargaviśeṣaṇārtham, aparam api ṣaṣṭhyantaṃ sthāninirdeśartham ity ākārasya sthāne takāro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47167: dvitakāro vā saṃyogo 'yam ādiśyate, so 'nekāltvāt sarvasya bhaviṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:47168: apo bhi (*7,4.48) ity atra pañcamyantam acaḥ ity anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:47170: dyater ittvād acasta ity etad bhavati vipratiṣedhena /
GS24jvkasipu:47175: ap ity etasya aṅgasya bhakārādau pratyaye parataḥ ta ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47179: svavaḥsvatavasormāsa uṣasaś ca takārādeśa iṣyate chandasi bhakārādau /
GS24jvkasipu:47186: sakārāntasya aṅgasya sakārādau ārdhadhātuke parataḥ takārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47198: tāseḥ asteś ca sakārasya sakārādau pratyaye parataḥ lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47203: asteḥ akārāsakārayoḥ luptayoḥ se iti pratyayamātram etat padam, tena sāt padādyoḥ (*8,3.111) iti ṣatvaṃ na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:47206: rephādau ca pratyaye parataḥ tāsastyoḥ sakārāsya lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47213: tāsastyoḥ sakārasya hakārādaśo bhavati eti parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47218: yakārādau ivarṇādau ca parato dīdhīvevyoḥ lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47230: sani pratyaye sakārādau parataḥ mī mā ghu rabha labha śaka pata pada ity eteṣām aṅgānām acaḥ sthāne is ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47231: mī iti mīnātiminotyoḥ dvayor api grahaṇam iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:47247: sani rādho hiṃsāyām aca is vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47252: āp jñapi ṛdha ity eteṣām aṅgānām aca īkārādeśo bhavati sani sakārādau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47256: jñapeḥ dvāvacau, tatra ṇeḥ pūrvavipratiṣedhena lopaḥ, itarasya tu ītvam /
GS24jvkasipu:47260: sanīvantardha iti jñapeḥ ṛdheś ca iṭo vikaopaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:47263: dambheḥ aca ikārādeśo bhavati, cakārāt īt ca sani sakārādau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47268: muco 'karmakasya guṇo vā bhavati sani sakārādau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47270: mokṣate vatsaḥ svayam eva, mumukṣate vatsaḥ svayam eva /
GS24jvkasipu:47271: akarmakasya iti kim ? mumukṣati vatsaṃ devadattaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47275: yad etat prakrāntaṃ sani mīmā ity ādi muco 'karmakasya iti yāvat, atra abhyāsalopo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:47277: abhyāsasya ity etac ca achikṛtaṃ veditavyam ā adhyāyaparisamāpteḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47278: ita uttaraṃ yad vakṣyāmaḥ abhyāsasya ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:47281: sani mīmādhurabhalabhaśakapatapadāmaca is, abhyāsalopaś ca, ity evam siddhe yad atragrahanam iha akriyate, tad viṣayāvadhāraṇārtham, atraiva abhyāsalopo bhavati, sanvadbhāvaviṣaye na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47285: sarvasya abhyāsasya ayaṃ lopaḥ iṣyate, tadartham eva kecit atragrahaṇaṃ varṇayanti /
GS24jvkasipu:47297: abhyāsasya yad ucyate anaci tad bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:47311: ādiśeṣanimitto 'yam anāder lopo vidhīyate, tatra abhyāsajāteḥ āśrayaṇāt
GS24jvkasipu:47312: kvacid api vartamāno halādiḥ anadeḥ sarvatra nivṛttiṃ karoti /
GS24jvkasipu:47313: apare tu bruvate, śeṣaśabdo 'yaṃ nivṛttyā viśiṣṭam avasthānam āha /
GS24jvkasipu:47314: tadavasthānam uktito yady api pradhānam, avidheyatvāt tu tadapradhānam /
GS24jvkasipu:47316: tatra ayam artho 'sya jāyate, abhyāsasya anāder halo nivṛttiḥ bhavati iti
GS24jvkasipu:47317: sā kim iti āder avidheyāṃ satīm anivṛttim apekṣiṣyate iti //
GS24jvkasipu:47320: abhyāsasya śarpūrvāḥ khayaḥ śiṣyante, anye halo lupyante /
GS24jvkasipu:47327: ucicchiṣati ity atra uccheḥ antaraṅgatvāt tuki kṛte dvirvacanam, tatra halādiḥ śeṣe sati abhyāse takāraḥ śrūyeta //
GS24jvkasipu:47340: kavateḥ abhyāsasya yaṅi parataḥ cuḥ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47343: kavateḥ iti vikaraṇanirdeśaḥ kauteḥ kuvateś ca nivṛttyarthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47349: kṛṣeḥ chandasi viṣaye yaṅi parataḥ abhyāsasya cuḥ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47356: dādharti dardharti dardharṣi bobhūtu tetikate alarṣi āpanīphaṇat saṃsaniṣyadat karikrat kanikradat bharibhrat davidhvataḥ davidyutat taritrataḥ sarisṛpatam varīvṛjat marmṛjya āganīganti ity etāni aṣṭādaśa chandasi viṣaye nipātyante /
GS24jvkasipu:47357: dādharti dardharti dardharṣi iti dhārayateḥ, dhṛṅo vā ślau yaṅluki vā abhyāsasya dīrghatvaṃ ṇilopaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:47362: atra ca yallakṣaṇena anupapannaṃ tat sarvaṃ nipātanāt siddham /
GS24jvkasipu:47363: bobhūtu iti bhavateḥ yaṅlugantasya loṭi guṇābhāvo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:47364: naitad asti prayojanam, atra bhūsuvostiṅi (*7,3.88) iti guṇābhāvaḥ siddhaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:47366: jñāpayati, anyatra yaṅlugantasya guṇapratiṣedho na bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:47369: yaṅo ṅittvāt pratyayalakṣaṇena ātmanepadaṃ siddham eva ? jñāpanārthaṃ tu ātmanepadanipātanam, anyatra yaṅlugantād ātmanepadaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47370: alarṣi iti - iyarteḥ laṭi sipi abhyāsasya halādiḥ śeṣāpavādo rephasya latvaṃ nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:47371: sipā nirdeśo 'tantram, tipyapi dṛśyate alarti dakṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47372: āpanīphaṇat iti - phaṇater āṅpūrvasya yaṅlugantasya śatari abhyāsasya nīk
GS24jvkasipu:47374: saṃsaniṣyadat iti - syandeḥ saṃpūrvasya yaṅluk, śataryeva abhyāsasya nik,
GS24jvkasipu:47376: na cāsya sampūrvatā tantram, anyatra api hi dṛśyate, āsaniṣyadat iti /
GS24jvkasipu:47377: karikrat iti - karoteḥ yaṅlugantasya śatari cutvabhyāvaḥ, abhyāsakakārasya rigāgamo nipātyate
GS24jvkasipu:47378: kanikradat iti - krandeḥ luṅi cleḥ aṅādeśaḥ, dvirvacanam abhyāsasya,
GS24jvkasipu:47382: bharibhrat iti - bibharteḥ yaṅlugantasya śatari bhṛñām it (*7,4.76) iti itvābhāvo jaśtvābhāvo 'bhyāsasya rigāgamaḥ nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:47383: davidhvataḥ iti - dhvarateḥ yaṅlugantasya śatari jasi rūpam etat /
GS24jvkasipu:47384: atra abhyāsasya vigāgamaḥ ṛkāralopaś ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:47386: davidyutat iti - dyuteḥ yaṅlugantasya śatari abhyāsasya amprasāraṇābhāvaḥ attvam, vigāgamaś ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:47387: taritrataḥ iti - tarateḥ śatari ślau ṣaṣṭhyekavacane abhyāsasya rigāgamaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:47389: sarīsṛpatam iti - sṛpeḥ śatari ślau dvitīyaikavacane abhyāsasya rīgāgamaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:47391: varīvṛjat iti - vṛjeḥ śatari ślau rīgāgamaḥ nipātyate abhyāsasya /
GS24jvkasipu:47392: marmṛjya iti - mṛjeḥ liṭi ṇali abhyāsasya rugāgamaḥ dhātoś ca yugāgamo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:47393: tato mṛjer vṛddhiḥ (*7,2.114) na bhavati, alaghūpadhatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:47395: āganīganti iti - āṅpūrvasya gamerlati ślau abhyāsasya cutvābhāvaḥ nīgāgamaś ca nipātyate
GS24jvkasipu:47397: itikaraṇam evaṃ prakāraṇām anyeṣām apy upasaṅgrahārtham //
GS24jvkasipu:47404: narnarti, narinarti, narīnarti ity evam ādau abhyāsavikāreṣu apavādo
GS24jvkasipu:47405: na+utsargān vidhīn bādhate iti uḥ adatve kṛte rugādaya āgamāḥ kriyante //
GS24jvkasipu:47408: dyuti svāpi ity etayoḥ abhyāsasya samprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47415: svāpiḥ ṇyanto gṛhyate, tasya abhyāsanimittena pratyayena ānantarye sati samprasāranam iṣyate
GS24jvkasipu:47416: iha na bhavati, svāpayater ṇvul svāpakaḥ, tasmāt kyaci svāpakīyati,
GS24jvkasipu:47422: halādiḥ śeṣeṇa yakārasya nivṛttau prāptāyāṃ samprasāraṇaṃ kriyate,
GS24jvkasipu:47423: vakārasya na saṃprasārane saṃprasāraṇam (*6,1.37) iti pratiṣidyate /
GS24jvkasipu:47427: iṇo 'ṅgasya yo 'bhyāsaḥ tasya dīrgho bhavati kiti liṭi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47429: iṇo yaṇ (*6,4.81) iti yaṇādeśe kṛte sthānivadbhāvād dvirvacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:47434: abhyāsasya ādeḥ akārasya dīrgho bhavati liṭi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47441: tasmād ato 'bhyāsād dīrghībhūtād uttarasya dvihalo 'ṅgasya nuḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47444: dvihalaḥ iti kim ? āṭa, āṭatuḥ, āṭuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47445: ṛkāraikadeśo repho halgrahaṇena gṛhyate, tena+iha api dvihalo 'ṅgasya
GS24jvkasipu:47449: aśnoteś ca dīrghībhūtād abhyāsād uttarasya nuḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47451: aśnoteḥ iti vikaraṇanirdeśaḥ aśnāter mā bhūt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:47455: bhavater abhyāsasya akārādeśo bhavati liṭi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47457: bhavateḥ iti kṛtavikarananirdeśād iha na bhavati, anubabhūve kambalo devadattena /
GS24jvkasipu:47463: sūter liṭi parasmaipadaṃ vugāgamaḥ abhyāsasya ca atvaṃ nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:47468: nijādīnāṃ trayāṇāṃ abhyāsasya guṇo bhavati ślau sati /
GS24jvkasipu:47472: trigrahaṇam uttarārtham, eṣāṃ hi vṛtkaraṇam samāptyarthaṃ paṭhyate eva iti
GS24jvkasipu:47476: bhṛñādīnāṃ trayāṇām abhyāsasya ikārādeśo bhavati śalau sati /
GS24jvkasipu:47484: arti piparti ity etayoḥ abhyāsasya ikārādeśo bhavati ślau /
GS24jvkasipu:47489: chandasi viṣaye abhyāsasya ślau bahulam ikārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47511: sani iti vartate, it iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:47512: uvarṇāntābhyāsasya pavarge yaṇi jakāre ca avarṇapare parataḥ ikārādeśo bhavati sani pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47522: etad eva puyaṇjyapare iti vacanaṃ jñāpakam, advirvacananimitte 'pi ṇau sthānivad bhavati iti
GS24jvkasipu:47523: oḥ iti kim ? pāpacyateḥ san - pāpaciṣate /
GS24jvkasipu:47530: sravati śṛṇoti dravati pravati plavati cyavati ity eteṣām abhyāsasya oḥ avarnapare yaṇi vā ikārādeśo bhavati sani parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47538: pūrvasūtrena tu anantara eva yaṇi bhavitavyam iti aprāptabibhāṣeyam /
GS24jvkasipu:47543: yaṅi yaṅluki ca igantasya abhyāsasya guṇo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47551: akito 'bhyāsasya dīrgho bhavati yagi yaṅluki ca /
GS24jvkasipu:47560: nanu cātra apavādatvān nuki kṛte abhyāsasya anajantatvād eva dīrghatvaṃ na bhaviṣyati ? evaṃ tarhi akitaḥ ity anena etaj jñāpyate, abhyāsavikāreṣv apavādā na+utsargān vidhīn bādhante iti /
GS24jvkasipu:47561: kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam ? ḍoḍhaukyate ity atra dīrgho 'kitaḥ ity anena sandhyakṣarahrasvo na bādhyate, acīkarat ity atra dīrgho laghoḥ (*7,4.94) ity anena sanvaditvaṃ na bādhyate, mānprabhṛtīnāṃ dīrgheṇa sanītvaṃ na bādhyate - mīmāṃsate, ī ca gaṇaḥ (*7,4.97) itītvena halādiśeṣo na bādhyate - ajīgaṇat //
GS24jvkasipu:47564: vañcu sraṃsu dhvaṃsu bhraṃsu kasa pata pada skanda ity eteṣām abhyāsasya nīgāgamo bhavati yaṅi yaṅluki ca /
GS24jvkasipu:47583: anunāsikāntasya aṅgasya yo 'bhyāsaḥ tasya akārāntasya nugāgamo bhavati yaṅyaṅlukoḥ parataḥ
GS24jvkasipu:47594: tena yaṃyamyate ity evam ādau ajhalparatve 'pi anusvāro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47596: vā padāntasya (*8,4.59) iti parasavarnavikalpo yathā syāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:47598: taparakaraṇaṃ tu bhūtapūrvasya api dīrghasya nivṛttyartham, bābhamyate /
GS24jvkasipu:47602: japa jabha daha daśa bhañja paśa ity eteṣām abhyāsasya nugāgamo bhavati yaṅyaṅlukoḥ parataḥ
GS24jvkasipu:47609: dandaśīti daśa iti daṃśiḥ ayaṃ nakāralopārtham eva nirdiṣṭaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47617: cara phala ity etayoḥ abhyāsasya nugāgamo bhavati yaṅyaṅlukoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47624: caraphaloḥ abhyāsāt parasya ataḥ ukārādeśo bhavati yaṅyaṅlukoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47629: parasya iti kim ? abhyāsasya mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:47630: ataḥ iti kim ? alo 'ntyasya mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:47631: uditi taparakaraṇaṃ cañcūrti, pamphulīti ity atra
GS24jvkasipu:47633: dīrghasya asiddhatvāt iha labhutvaṃ na nivartate //
GS24jvkasipu:47636: takārādau pratyaye parataḥ caraphaloḥ akārasya ukārādeśo bhavati caraṇaṃ cūrtiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47640: yaṅyaṅlukoḥ, abhyāsasya iti ca anuvartamānam api vacanasāmarthyād iha na abhisambadhyate
GS24jvkasipu:47643: ṛdupadhasya aṅgasya yo 'bhyāsaḥ tasya rīgāgamo bhavati yaṅyaṅlukoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47657: yaṅluki ṛdupadhasya aṅgasya yo 'bhyāsas tasya rugrikau āgamau bhavataḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:47667: ṛkārāntasya aṅgasya yo 'bhyāsaḥ tasya rugrikau āgamau bhavataḥ rīk ca
GS24jvkasipu:47674: kiratiṃ carkarītāntaṃ pacati ity atra yo nayet /
GS24jvkasipu:47675: prāptijñaṃ tamahaṃ manye prārabdhas tena saṅgrahaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:47676: tatreyaṃ prāptiḥ taparakaranasāmarthyād aṅgaviśeṣaṇam ṛtaḥ ity etat, tayā cāprāptiḥ kirater ugādīnām iti //
GS24jvkasipu:47679: laghuni dhātvakṣare parato yo 'bhyāsaḥ tasya caṅpare ṇau parataḥ sanīva kāryaṃ bhavati anaglope /
GS24jvkasipu:47683: oḥ puyaṇjyapare (*7,4.80) ity uktam, caṅpare 'pi tathā /
GS24jvkasipu:47698: atra kecid gaśabdam labhumāśritya sanbadbhāvam icchanti, sarvatraiva laghorānantaryam abhyāsena na asti iti vyavadhāne 'pi vacanaprāmāṇyād
GS24jvkasipu:47700: yena na avyavadhānaṃ tena vyavahite 'pi vacanaprāmāṇyāt ity ekena
GS24jvkasipu:47702: yady evam, katham acikṣaṇat iti ? ācāryapravṛttir jñāpayati bhavaty evaṃ jātīyakānām ittvam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:47703: yad ayaṃ tad bādhanārthaṃ samratyādīnām atvam vidadhāti /
GS24jvkasipu:47705: paragrahaṇaṃ kim ? caṅi eva kevale mā bhūt, acakamata /
GS24jvkasipu:47708: vāditavantaṃ prayojitavān avīvadat ity atra yo 'sau ṇau ṇerlopo nāsāvaglopa ity āśrīyate
GS24jvkasipu:47709: kiṃ kāraṇam ? caṅpare iti ṇijāter nimittatvena ākṣepāt, tato 'nyasya ako lopaḥ parigṛhyate
GS24jvkasipu:47710: mīmādīnām atra grahaṇāt sanvadbhāvena abhyāsalopo na bhavati ity uktam /
GS24jvkasipu:47711: kiṃ ca sanvat iti sanāśrayaṃ kāryamatidiśyate, na ca lopaḥ sanam eva apekṣate, kiṃ tarhi, isbhāvādyapi /
GS24jvkasipu:47712: tadabhāvāt amīmapat ity ādau abhyāsalopo na bhaviṣyati //
GS24jvkasipu:47715: dīrghā bhavati laghoḥ abhyāsasya laghuni ṇau caṅpare anaglope /
GS24jvkasipu:47728: smṛ dṝ tvara pratha mrada stṝ spaśa ity eteṣām abhyāsasya at ity ayam ādeśo bhavati caṅpare ṇau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47737: taparakaraṇasāmarthyāt ati kṛte dīrgho laghoḥ (*7,4.94) ity etad api na
GS24jvkasipu:47741: veṣṭi ceṣṭi ity etayoḥ abhyāsasya vibhāṣā at ity ayam ādeśo bhavati caṅpare ṇau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47747: gaṇeḥ abhyāsasya īkārādeśo bhavati caṅpare ṇau parataḥ, cakārāt at ca /
GS24jvkasipu:47749: iti śrīvāmanaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau saptamādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:47753: sarvasya iti ca dve iti ca+etad adhikṛtaṃ veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:47754: ita uttaraṃ yad vakṣyāmaḥ padasya (*8,1.16) ity ataḥ prāk, sarvasya dve bhavataḥ ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:47755: vakṣyati - nityavīpsayoḥ (*8,1.4) iti, tatra sarvasya sthāne dve bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47756: ke dve bhavataḥ ? ye śabdataś ca arthataś ca ubhayathāntaratame /
GS24jvkasipu:47760: yadā tu dviḥ prayogo dvirvacanam tadā sa eva pacatiśabdo dvirāvartate,
GS24jvkasipu:47763: atha padasya ity eva kasmān na+ucyate ? na+evaṃ śakyam, iha hi na syāt prapacati prapacati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:47764: iha drogdhā, droḍhā iti ghatvaḍhatvayoḥ asiddhatvād akṛtayor eva tayor dvivacanaṃ prāpnoti, tatra paścād vikalpe satyaniṣtam api syāt drogdhā
GS24jvkasipu:47766: tasmād vaktavyam etat pūrvatra asiddhīyam advirvacane iti /
GS24jvkasipu:47767: sarvasya ity etad eva vā kṛtaṃ sarvakāryapratipattyarthaṃ draṣṭavyam //
GS24jvkasipu:47770: tasya dviruktasya yat paraṃ śabdarūpaṃ tad āmreḍitasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47771: caura caura 3, vṛṣala vṛṣala 3, dasyo dasyo 3 ghātayiṣyāmi tvā,
GS24jvkasipu:47773: āmreḍitapradeśāḥ - āmreḍitaṃ bhartsane (*8,2.95) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:47776: anudāttaṃ ca tad bhavati yad āmreḍitasañjñam /
GS24jvkasipu:47781: nitye cārthe vipsāyāṃ ca yad vartate tasya dve bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47782: keṣu nityatā ? tiṅkṣu nityatā avyayakṛtsu ca /
GS24jvkasipu:47786: yāṃ kriyāṃ kartā prādhānyena anuparaman karoti tan nityam /
GS24jvkasipu:47791: lunīhi lunīhi ity evāyaṃ lunāti ktvāṇamulorloṭaś ca dvirvacanāpekṣāyām eva paunaḥpunyaprakāśane śaktiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47792: yaṅ tu tannirapekṣaḥ prakāśayati, punaḥ punaḥ pacati pāpacyate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:47793: yadā tu tatra dvirvacanam tadā kriyāsamabhihāre paunaḥpunyaṃ draṣṭavyam pāpacyate pāpacyate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:47795: kā punar vīpsā ? vyāptiviśeṣaviṣayā prayoktur icchā vīpsā /
GS24jvkasipu:47796: kā punaḥ sā ? nānāvācinām adhikaraṇānāṃ kriyāguṇābhyāṃ yugapat prayokturvyāptum icchā vīpsā
GS24jvkasipu:47797: nānābhūtārthavācināṃ śabdānāṃ yānyadhikaraṇāni vācyāni teṣāṃ kriyāguṇābhyāṃ yugapat prayoktum icchā vīpsā /
GS24jvkasipu:47801: yat tiḍantaṃ nityatayā prakarṣeṇa ca yuktaṃ tataḥ kṛtadvirvacanāt prakarṣapratyaya iṣyate pacati pacatitarām iti /
GS24jvkasipu:47802: iha tu āḍhyataramāḍhyataramānaya iti prakarṣayuktasya vīpsāyoga iṣyate //
GS24jvkasipu:47805: pari ity etasya varjane 'rthe dve bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47812: pari pari trigartebhyo vṛṣṭo devaḥ, pari trigartebhyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47813: samāse tu tena+eva+uktatvād varjanasya na+eva bhavati, paritrigartaṃ vṛṣṭo devaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:47816: pra sam upa ut ity etaṣāṃ pādapūraṇe dve bhavato dvirvacanena cet pādaḥ pūrvate /
GS24jvkasipu:47819: upopa me parā mṛśa kiṃ nodudu harṣase dātavā u /
GS24jvkasipu:47820: pādapūraṇe iti kim ? pra devaṃ devyā dhiyā /
GS24jvkasipu:47825: upari adhi adhas ity eteṣāṃ dve bhavataḥ sāmīpye vivakṣite /
GS24jvkasipu:47832: iha kasmān na bhavati, upari śiraso ghaṭaṃ dhārayati ? auttarādharyam eva vivakṣitaṃ na sāmīpyam iti dvirvacanaṃ na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:47836: vākyāder āmantritasya dve bhavataḥ asūyāsammatikopakutsanabhartsaneṣu yadi tad vākyaṃ bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:47843: asūyāyām tāvat - māṇavaka 3 māṇavaka, abhirūpaka 3 abhirūpaka, riktaṃ te ābhirūpyam /
GS24jvkasipu:47844: sammātau - māṇavaka 3 māṇavaka, abhirūpaka 3 abhirūpaka, śobhanaḥ khalvasi /
GS24jvkasipu:47845: kope - māṇavaka 3 māṇavaka, avinītaka 3 avinītaka, idānīṃ jñāsyasi jālma /
GS24jvkasipu:47846: kutsane - śaktike 3 śaktike, yaṣṭike 3 yaṣṭike, riktā te śaktiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47847: bhartsane - caura caura 3, vṛṣala vṛṣala 3, ghātayiṣyami tvāṃ bandhayiṣyāmi tvām /
GS24jvkasipu:47848: asūyādiṣu svaritam āmreḍite 'sūyā-saṃmati-kopa-kutsaneṣu (*8,2.103) iti pūrvapadasya plutaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:47849: bhartsane tu āmreḍitaṃ bhartsane (*8,2.95) ity āmreḍitasya+eva plutaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47850: vākyādeḥ iti kim ? antasya madhyamasya ca mā bhūt, śobhanaḥ khalvasi māṇavaka /
GS24jvkasipu:47852: asūyādiṣu iti kim ? devadatta gāmabhyāja śuklām //
GS24jvkasipu:47855: ekam ity etac chabdarūpaṃ dviruktaṃ bahuvrīhivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47862: na bahuvrīhau (*1,1.129) iti pratiṣedho na bhavati, bahuvrīhir eva yo
GS24jvkasipu:47864: nana, susu, nañsubhyām (*6,2.172) ity antodāttatvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47865: ṛk ṛk, pūḥ pūḥ, ṛk pūḥ iti samāsānto na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:47869: tatra vartamānasya dve bhavataḥ, bahuvrīhivaccāsya kāryaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47876: priyasya ciragamanādinā pīḍyamānaḥ kaścid evam prayuṅkte prayoktā //
GS24jvkasipu:47879: ita uttareṣu dvirvacaneṣu karmadhārayavat kāryaṃ bhavati ity etad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:47887: kopadhāyā api hi karmadhārayavadbhāvāt puṃvatkarmadhārayaḥ iti puṃvadbhāvo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47892: adhikāreṇaiva siddhe yat uttareṣu iti vacanaṃ tadvispaṣṭārtham //
GS24jvkasipu:47904: paṭujātīyaḥ, mṛdujātīyaḥ ity api hi bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47905: tat katham ? vakṣyamāṇam anyatarasyāṃgrahaṇam ubhayoḥ śeṣo vijāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:47909: yadyapyatra agniśabdo gośabdaś ca mukhyārthasambandhādavabhṛtabhedaṃ taikṣṇyajāḍyādikamarthāntare gunaviśeṣam eva pratipādayituṃ pravṛttaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:47910: tathāpi sarvadā guṇavacano na bhavati iti na dvirucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:47916: asmāt kārṣāpaṇād iha bhavadbhyām māṣaṃ māṣaṃ dehi /
GS24jvkasipu:47918: atra hi dvāv eva māṣau dīyete, na sarve kārṣāpaṇasambandhino māṣāḥ, tena vīpsā na vidyate
GS24jvkasipu:47919: avadhāryamāṇe iti kim ? asmāt kārṣāpaṇād iha bhavadbhyāṃ māṣamekaṃ dehi,
GS24jvkasipu:47920: dvau māṣau dehi, trīn vā māṣān dehi /
GS24jvkasipu:47921: anekasmin iti kim ? asmāt kārṣāpaṇād iha bhavadbhyāṃ māṣamekaṃ dehi /
GS24jvkasipu:47925: nāvaśyaṃ dvāveva śabdau prayoktavyau, kiṃ tarhi, yāvadbhiḥ śabdaiḥ so 'tho
GS24jvkasipu:47929: sa bhavān lunīhi lunīhi ity eva ayaṃ lunāti /
GS24jvkasipu:47933: nitya ity eva siddha iti tatra+uktam /
GS24jvkasipu:47939: tadarthaṃ kecit ḍāci bahulam iti paṭhanti /
GS24jvkasipu:47943: ātiśayiko 'pi dṛśyate, pūrvataraṃ puṣpyanti, prathamataraṃ pacyante iti /
GS24jvkasipu:47944: ḍataraḍatamayoḥ samasampradhāraṇayoḥ strīnigade bhave dve bhavata iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:47952: tathā strīnigadādbhāvāt anyatra api hi dṛśyate, ubhāvimāvāḍhyau, kataraḥ kataro 'nyorvibhavaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:47953: karmavyatihāre sarvanāmno dve bhavata iti vaktavyaṃ samāsavacca bahulam /
GS24jvkasipu:47954: yadā na samāsavat prathamaikavacanaṃ tadā pūrvapadasya anyamanyamime brāhmaṇā bhojayanti, anyonyamime brāhmaṇā bhojayanti /
GS24jvkasipu:47968: priya sukha ity etayoḥ anyatarasyāṃ dve bhavataḥ akṛcchre dyotye /
GS24jvkasipu:47979: yo ya ātmā, yad yadātmīyam, tattad, yathāsvam, tasmin yathāyatham iti
GS24jvkasipu:47984: sarveṣāṃ tu yathāyathaṃ yathātmīyam ity arthaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:47987: dvandvam iti dviśabdasya dvirvacanam, pūrva padasyāmbhāvaḥ, attvaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:47988: ca+uttarapadasya nipātyate rahasya maryādāvacana vyutkramaṇa yajñapātraprayoga abhivyakti ity eteṣu artheṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:47993: mātā putreṇa mithunaṃ gacchati, pautreṇa, tatputreṇa api iti maryādārthaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:47996: dvivargasambandhanena pṛthagavasthitā dvanvdvaṃ vyutkrāntā ity ucyante /
GS24jvkasipu:47997: yajñapātraprayoge - dvandvaṃ nyañci yajñapātrāṇi prayunakti dhīraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:48001: anyatra api dvandvam ity etad dṛśyate, tadarthaṃ yogavibhāgaḥ kartavyaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:48002: dvandvaṃ yuddhaṃ vartate, dvandvāni sahate dhīraḥ, cārthe dvandvaḥ (*2,2.29) iti //
GS24jvkasipu:48006: yad ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ padasya ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:48012: vakṣyamāṇavākyāpekṣayā padasya adhikṛtasya ṣaṣṭhyarthavyavasthā draṣṭavyāḥ kvacit sthānaṣaṣṭhī, kvacidavayavaṣaṣṭhī //
GS24jvkasipu:48015: padāt ity ayam adhikāraḥ prāk kutsane ca supyagotrādau (*8,1.69) ity etasmāt /
GS24jvkasipu:48016: yad iti ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ padāt ity evaṃ tad deditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:48018: āmantritasya padāt parasya anudāttādeśo bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:48023: anudāttam iti ca, sarvam iti ca, apādādau iti ca, apādādau iti ca etat trayam adhikṛtaṃ veditavyam ā pādaparisamāpteḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:48024: ita uttaraṃ yad vakṣyāmaḥ anudāttaṃ sarvam apādādau ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:48027: apādādau iti kim ? yat te niyānaṃ rajasaṃ mṛtyo anavadharṣyam /
GS24jvkasipu:48029: grāmo vaḥ svam, janapado naḥ svam /
GS24jvkasipu:48030: apādādau iti kim ? rudro viśveśvaro devo yaṣmākaṃ kuladevatā /
GS24jvkasipu:48033: sarvagrahaṇam sarvam anūdyamānaṃ vidhīyamānaṃ ca anudāttaṃ yathā syāt iti
GS24jvkasipu:48034: tena yuṣmadasmadādeśānām api vākyabhedena anudāttatvaṃ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:48035: yuṣmadasmadādeśāś ca sarvasya subantasya padasya yathā syuḥ, yatra api svādipadaṃ padasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48040: āmantritasya padasya padāt parasya apadādau vartamānasya sarvam anudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48045: iha mā bhūvan, ayaṃ daṇḍo hara anena, odanaṃ paca tava bhaviṣyati, odanaṃ paca mama abhaviṣyati
GS24jvkasipu:48046: iha ca yathā syāt, iha devadatta mātā te kathayati, nadyāstiṣṭhati lūke,
GS24jvkasipu:48048: āmantritāntaṃ tiṅantaṃ yuṣmadasmadādeśāś ca yasmāt parāṇi na teṣāṃ sāmarthyam iti tadāśrayā nighātayuṣmadasmadādeśā na syuḥ, samarthaḥ padavidhiḥ (*2,1.1.) iti vacanāt //
GS24jvkasipu:48051: yuṣmad asmad ity etayoḥ ṣaṣṭhīcaturthīdvitīyāsthayoḥ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ vām nau ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ, tau cānudāttau /
GS24jvkasipu:48052: padasya, padāt, anudāttaṃ sarvamapādādau iti sarvam iha sambadhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:48059: ekavacanabahuvacanāntayor ādeśāntar avidhānād dvivacanāntayoḥ etāv ādeśau vijñāyete /
GS24jvkasipu:48060: ṣaṣṭhīcaturthīdvitīyāsthayoḥ iti kim ? grāme yuvābhyāṃ kṛtam /
GS24jvkasipu:48062: iha mā bhūt, ayaṃ yuṣmatputraḥ ayam asmatputraḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:48065: bahuvacanāntayoḥ yuṣmadasmadoḥ ṣaṣṭhīcaturthīdvitīyāsthayoḥ yathāsaṅkhyam vas nas ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:48074: yuṣmadasmadoḥ ekavacanāntayoḥ ṣaṣthīcaturthīsthayoḥ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ te me ity etau ādeśau bhavataḥ
GS24jvkasipu:48083: dvitīyāyā yad ekavacanaṃ tad antayoḥ yuṣmadasmadoḥ yathāsaṅkhyam tvā mā ity etau ādeśau bhavataḥ
GS24jvkasipu:48088: ca vā ha aha eva ebhir yukte yuṣmadasmadoḥ vānnāvādayoḥ na bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:48090: grāmastava ca svam, grāmo mama ca svam, yuvayoś ca svam, āvayoś ca svam,
GS24jvkasipu:48091: yuṣmākaṃ ca svam, asmākaṃ ca svam /
GS24jvkasipu:48092: grāmas tubhyāṃ ca dīyate, grāmo mahyaṃ ca dīyate, yuvābhyāṃ ca dīyate,
GS24jvkasipu:48093: āvābhyām ca dīyate, yuṣmabhyaṃ ca dīyate, asmabhyaṃ ca dīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:48094: grāmastvāṃ ca paśayati, grāmo māṃ ca pśayati, yuvāṃ ca paśyati, āvāṃ ca paśyati, yuṣmāṃś ca paśyati, yuṣmān vā paśyati, asmān vā paśyati /
GS24jvkasipu:48095: vā - grāmastava vā svam, grāmo mama vā svam, yuvayor vā svam, āvayor vā svam, yuṣmākaṃ vā svam, asmākaṃ vā svam /
GS24jvkasipu:48096: grāmastubhyaṃ vā dīyate, grāmo mahyaṃ vā dīyate, yuvābhyāṃ vā dīyate,
GS24jvkasipu:48097: āvābhyāṃ vā dīyate, yuṣmabhyaṃ vā dīyate, asmabhyaṃ vā dīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:48098: grāmastvāṃ vā paśyati, grāmo māṃ vā paśyati, yuvāṃ vā paśyati, āvāṃ vā paśyati, yuṣmān vā paśyati, asmān vā paśyati /
GS24jvkasipu:48099: ha - grāmastava ha svam, grāmo mama ha svam, yuvayor ha svam, āvayor ha svam, yuṣmākaṃ ha svam, asmākaṃ ha svam /
GS24jvkasipu:48100: grāmastubhyaṃ ha dīyate, grāmo mahyaṃ ha dīyate, yuvābhyāṃ ha dīyate,
GS24jvkasipu:48101: āvābhyāṃ ha dīyate, yuṣmabhyāṃ ha dīyate, asmabhyaṃ ha dīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:48102: grāmastvāṃ ha paśyati, grāmo māṃ ha paśyati, yuvāṃ ha paśyati, āvāṃ ha paśyati, yuṣmān ha paśyati, asmān ha paśyati /
GS24jvkasipu:48103: aha - grāmastava aha svam, grāmo mama aha svam, yuvayor aha svam, āvayor aha svam, yuṣmākam aha svam, asmākamaha svam /
GS24jvkasipu:48104: grāmastubhyamaha dīyate, grāmo mahyam aha dīyate, yuvābhyām aha dīyate,
GS24jvkasipu:48105: āvābhyām aha dīyate, yuṣmabhyam aha dīyate, asmabhyam aha dīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:48106: grāmastvām aha paśyati, grāmo mām aha paśyati, yuvām aha paśyati, āvām aha paśyati, yuṣmān aha paśyati, asmān aha paśyati /
GS24jvkasipu:48107: eva - grāmastava+eva svam, grāmo mama+eva svam, yuvayor eva svam, āvayor eva svam, yuṣmākam eva svam asmākam eva svam /
GS24jvkasipu:48108: grāmastubhyam eva dīyate, grāmo mahyam eva dīyate, yuvābhyām eva dīyate,
GS24jvkasipu:48109: āvābhyām eva dīyate, yuṣmabhyam eva dīyate, asmabhyam eva dīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:48110: grāṃstvām eva paśyati, grāmo mām eva paśyati, yuvām eva paśyati, āvām eva paśyati, yuṣmān eva paśyati, asmān eva paśyati /
GS24jvkasipu:48113: grāmaś ca te svam, nagaraṃ ca me svam //
GS24jvkasipu:48118: taiḥ paśyārther anālocane vartamānair yukte yuṣmadasmadoḥ vānnāvādayo na bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:48131: vidyamānapūrvāt prathamāntāt padāt uttarayoḥ yuṣmadasmadoḥ vibhāṣa vānnāvādayo na bhavanti
GS24jvkasipu:48132: grāme kambalaste svam, grāme kambalastava svam /
GS24jvkasipu:48133: grāme kambalo me svam, grāme kambalo mama svam /
GS24jvkasipu:48134: grāme kambalaste dīyate, grāme kambalastubhyaṃ dīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:48135: grāme kambalo me dīyate, grāme kambalo mahyaṃ dīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:48136: grāme chātrāstvā paśyanti, grāme chātrāstvāṃ paśyanti /
GS24jvkasipu:48137: grām chātrā mā paśyanti, grāme chātrā māṃ pśyanti /
GS24jvkasipu:48140: pathamāyāḥ iti kim ? kambalo grāme te svam /
GS24jvkasipu:48143: iha mā bhūt, atho grāme kambalaste svam, atho grāme kambalo me svam /
GS24jvkasipu:48144: apara āha - sarva eva vānnāvādayo 'nanvādeśe vibhāṣā vaktavyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:48146: kambalo me svam, kambalo mama svam /
GS24jvkasipu:48147: ananvādeśe iti kim ? atho kambalaste svam /
GS24jvkasipu:48149: na tarhi idānīmidaṃ vaktavyam sapūrvāyāḥ prathamāyā vibhāṣā iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:48153: atho grāme kambalaste svam, atho grāme kambalaste svam /
GS24jvkasipu:48154: atho grāme kambalo me svam, atho grāmekambalo me svam, atho grāme kambalo
GS24jvkasipu:48158: tiṅantāt padāt parāṇi gotrādīni kutsane ābhīkṣṇye cārthe vartamānāni anudāttāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:48187: kutsanābhīkṣṇyayoḥ iti kim ? khanati gotraṃ sametya kūpam /
GS24jvkasipu:48189: tena anyatra api gotrādigrahaṇena kutsanābhīkṣṇyayor eva kāryaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:48192: tiṅantaṃ padam atiṅantāt padāt param anudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48205: tāseḥ parasya lasārvadhātukasya anudāttatve sati sarvatāsir eva udāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:48206: yatra tu ṭilopaḥ, tatra udāttanivṛttisvaro bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:48210: yat yadi hanta kuvit net cet caṇ kaccit yatra ity etair nipātair yuktaṃ tiṅantaṃ nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48222: samuccayādiṣu tu yaḥ caśabdaḥ, tena yogena vidhir ayaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48227: nipātaiḥ iti kim ? yat kūjati śakaṭam /
GS24jvkasipu:48230: yuktam iti kim ? yatra kva ca te mano dakṣaṃ dadhasa uttaram //
GS24jvkasipu:48233: naha ity etena yukte pratyārambhe tiṅantaṃ nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48234: coditasya avidhīraṇe upālipsayā pratiṣedhayuktaḥ pratyāraṃhaḥ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:48237: pratyārambhe iti kim ? naha vai tasmiṃś ca loke dakṣiṇām icchanti //
GS24jvkasipu:48240: satyam ity anena yuktaṃ tiṅantaṃ na anudāttaṃ bhavati praśne /
GS24jvkasipu:48243: praśne iti kim ? satyaṃ vakṣyāmi nānṛtam //
GS24jvkasipu:48246: aṅga ity anena yuktaṃ tiṅantaṃ aprātilomye gamyamāne nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48250: aprātilomye iti kim ? aṅga kūja 3 vṛṣala, idānīṃ jñāsyasi jālma /
GS24jvkasipu:48254: hi ity anena yuktaṃ tiṅantam aprātilomye nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48258: aprātilomye ity eva, sa hi kūja vṛṣala, idānīṃ jñāsyasi jālma //
GS24jvkasipu:48262: chandasi viṣaye hiyuktaṃ tiṅantaṃ sākāṅkṣaṃane kam api nānudāttaṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:48264: kadācid ekaṃ kadācid anekam ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:48265: tatra anekaṃ tāvat - anṛtaṃ hi matto vadati, pāpmā enaṃ vipunāti /
GS24jvkasipu:48267: ekaṃ khalv api - agnir hi pūrvamudajayat tamindro 'nūdajayat tiṅantadvayam api hiśabdayuktam etat /
GS24jvkasipu:48268: tatra ekam udajayat ity ādyudāttam, aparam anudāttam /
GS24jvkasipu:48269: ajā hy agner ajaniṣṭa garbhāt sā vā apaśyaj janitāram agne /
GS24jvkasipu:48273: yāvat yathā ity etābhyāṃ yuktaṃ tiṅantaṃ nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48283: yāvad yathā ity etābhyāṃ yuktam anantaraṃ tiṅantaṃ pūjāyaṃ viṣaye nānudāttaṃ na bhavati, kiṃ tarhi ? anudāttam eva /
GS24jvkasipu:48290: anantaram iti kim ? yāvad devadattaḥ pacati śobhanam /
GS24jvkasipu:48295: yāvadyathābhyāṃ yuktaṃ upasargavyapetaṃ ca pūjāyāṃ viṣaye nānudāttaṃ na bhavati, kiṃ tarhi ? anudāttam eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48296: pūrvam anantaraṃ ity uktam, upasargavyavadhānārtho 'yam ārambhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:48301: anantaram ity eva, āvad devadattaḥ prapacati /
GS24jvkasipu:48305: tu paśya paśyata aha ity etair yuktaṃ tiṅantaṃ nānudāttaṃ bhavati pūjāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:48310: pūjāyām iti kim ? paśya mṛgo dhāvati /
GS24jvkasipu:48311: pūjāyām iti vartamāne punaḥ pūjāyām ity ucyate nighātapratiṣedhārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:48312: tad dhi pratiṣedhasya pratiṣedhena sambaddham iti //
GS24jvkasipu:48315: aho ity anena yuktaṃ tiṅantaṃ nānudāttaṃ bhavati pūjāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:48321: aho ity anena yuktaṃ tiṅantaṃ śeṣe vibhāṣā nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48326: pūjāyām ity asay pūrvatra ca anukṛṣṭatvād anadhikāre siddhe śeṣavacanaṃ vispaṣṭārtham //
GS24jvkasipu:48329: purā ity anena yuktaṃ tiṅantaṃ parīpsāyām arthe vibhāṣā nānudāttaṃ bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:48334: paīpsāyām iti kim ? naḍena sma purā adhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:48339: nanu ity anena yuktaṃ tiṅantaṃ nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48344: anujānīṣva māṃ karaṇaṃ prati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:48345: anujñaiṣaṇāyām iti kim ? akārṣīḥ kaṭaṃ devadatta ? nanu karomi bhoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:48349: kim ity etat kriyāpraśne yadā vartate tadānena yuktaṃ tiṅantaṃ anupasargam apratiṣiddhaṃ nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48352: atra kecid āhuḥ, pūrvaṃ kiṃyuktam iti tan na nihanyate, uttaraṃ tu na
GS24jvkasipu:48354: apare tvāhuḥ, yady apy ekasya ākhyātasya samīpe kiṃśabdaḥ śrūyate, tathāpi sarvasya saṃśayaviṣayasya tena yogaḥ iti ubhayatra pratiṣedhena bhavitavyam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:48355: kriyāgrahaṇaṃ kim ? sādhanapraśne mā bhūt, kiṃ devadattaḥ odanaṃ pacati,
GS24jvkasipu:48357: praśna iti kim ? kim adhīte devadattaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:48359: anupasargam iti kim ? kiṃ devadattaḥ prapacati, āhosvit prakaroti /
GS24jvkasipu:48360: apratiṣiddham iti kim ? kiṃ devadatto na paṭhati, āhosvin na karoti //
GS24jvkasipu:48363: kimo lope kriyāpraśne tiṅantam anupasargam apratiṣiddhaṃ vibhāṣā nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48364: kva ca asya lopaḥ ? yatra gamyate cārthaḥ, na ca prayujyate kiṃśabdaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:48371: ehi manye ity anena yuktaṃ lṛḍantaṃ nānudāttaṃ bhavati prahāse /
GS24jvkasipu:48373: ehi manye odanaṃ bhokṣyase, na hi bhokṣyase, bhuktaḥ so 'tithibhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:48374: ehi manye rathena yāsyasi, na hi yāsyasi, yātastena te pitā /
GS24jvkasipu:48375: prahāse iti kim ? ehi manyase odanaṃ bhokṣye iti /
GS24jvkasipu:48378: gatyarthaloṭā lṛṭ ity eva siddhe satyārambho niyamārthaḥ, ehimanyeyukte prahāse eva yathā syāt, anyatra mā bhūt iti , ehi manyase odanaṃ bhokṣye iti /
GS24jvkasipu:48380: prahāse eva hi manyater uttamo vihitaḥ, tato 'nyatra madhyama eva bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:48381: tatra anena niyamena nivṛttiḥ kriyate, ehi manyase odanaṃ bhokṣye iti //
GS24jvkasipu:48384: jātu ity etad avidyamānapūrvam, tena yuktaṃ tiṅantaṃ nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48387: apūrvam iti kim ? kaṭaṃ jātu kariṣyati //
GS24jvkasipu:48391: kiṃvṛttagrahaṇena tadvibhaktyantaṃ pratīyāt, ḍataraḍatamau ca pratyayau /
GS24jvkasipu:48392: tat kiṃvṛttaṃ ciduttaram avidyamānapūrvaṃ yat tena yuktaṃ tiṅantaṃ nānudāttam bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48401: apūrvam ity eva, devadattaḥ kiñcit paṭhati //
GS24jvkasipu:48405: āho utāho ity etābhyām apūrvābhyāṃ yuktam anantaraṃ tiṅantaṃ nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48410: anantaram iti kim ? śeṣe vibhāṣāṃ vakṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:48411: apūrvam ity eva, devadatta āho bhuṅkte /
GS24jvkasipu:48415: āho utāho ity etābhyāṃ yuktaṃ tiṅantaṃ nānudāttam śeṣe vibhāṣā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48421: gatyartha-loṭā lṛṇ na cet kārakaṃ sarvānyat || PS_8,1.51 ||
GS24jvkasipu:48425: tena gatyarthaloṭā yuktaṃ lṛḍantaṃ tiṅantaṃ nānudāttaṃ bhavati, na cet kārakam sarvānyad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48426: yatra+eva kārake kartari karmaṇi vā loṭ, tatra+eva yadi lṛḍ api bhavati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:48427: kartṛkarmaṇī eva atra tiṅantavācye kārakagrahaṇena gṛhyete, na karaṇādi kārakāntaram /
GS24jvkasipu:48432: gatyarthagrahaṇaṃ kim ? paca devadatta odanam, bhokṣyase enam /
GS24jvkasipu:48433: loṭā iti kim ? āgaccheḥ devdatta grāmam, drakṣyasi enam /
GS24jvkasipu:48434: lṛṭ iti kim ? āgaccha devadatta grāmam, paśyasi enam /
GS24jvkasipu:48435: na cet kārakam sarvānyat iti kim ? āgaccha devadatta grāmam, pitā te odanaṃ bhokṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:48436: uhyantāṃ devadattena śālayaḥ, saktavaḥ tena pāsyante /
GS24jvkasipu:48437: sarvagrahaṇam kim ? āgaccha devadatta grāmam, tvaṃ cāhaṃ ca drakṣyāvaḥ enam ity atra api nighātapratiṣedho yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:48438: lṛḍantavācye hi sarvasmin kārake anyasmin na bhavitavyam, iha tu yat
GS24jvkasipu:48439: loḍantasya kārakaṃ taccānyacca lṛḍantena ucyate iti //
GS24jvkasipu:48442: loḍantaṃ tiṅantaṃ gatyarthaloṭā yuktaṃ nānudāttaṃ bhavati, na cet kārakaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:48444: loḍantayor ekaṃ kārakaṃ yadi bhavati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:48448: gatyarthānām ity eva, paca devadattaudanam, bhuṅkṣva enam /
GS24jvkasipu:48449: loṭā ity eva, āgaccheḥ devadatta grāmam, paśya enam /
GS24jvkasipu:48450: na cet kārakaṃ sarvānyat ity eva, āgaccha devadatta grāmam, paśyatu enam yajñadattaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:48451: sarvagrahaṇānuvṛttestu iha bhavaty eva, āgaccha devadatta grāmam tvaṃ cāhaṃ ca paśyāva /
GS24jvkasipu:48457: loḍantaṃ sopasargam uttamavarjitaṃ gatyarthalootā yuktaṃ tiṅantaṃ vibhāṣitaṃ nānudāttam bhavati, na cet kārakaṃ sarvānyad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48460: sopasargam iti kim ? āgaccha devadatta, grāmaṃ paśya /
GS24jvkasipu:48461: anuttamam iti kim ? āgacchāni devadatta, grāmaṃ praviśāni //
GS24jvkasipu:48465: hanta ity anena yuktaṃ loḍantaṃ sopasargam uttamavarjitaṃ vibhāṣitaṃ nānudāttam bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48469: nipātair yadyadihanta iti nityam atra nighātapratiṣedho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48474: āmaḥ uttaram ekapadāntaram āmantritāntam anantike nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48477: bho ity āmantritāntam api, nāmantrite samānādhikaraṇe sāmānyavacanam iti nāvidyamānavad bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:48478: āmaḥ iti kim ? śākaṃ pacasi devadatta 3 /
GS24jvkasipu:48479: ekāntaram iti kim ? ām prapacasi devadatta 3 /
GS24jvkasipu:48480: āmantritam iti kim ? ām pacati devadattaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:48482: āma ekāntaram āmantritaṃ yat tasya ekaśruter anudāttasya ca pratiṣedha iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:48483: tad ubhayam anena kriyate iti kecid āhuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:48485: apareṣāṃ darśanam, anantike ity anena yan na dūraṃ na sannikṛṣṭaṃ tat
GS24jvkasipu:48486: parigṛhyate, tena asminnekadśruteḥ prāptir eva na asti, plutodātto 'pi
GS24jvkasipu:48492: yatparaṃ, hiparaṃ, tuparaṃ ca tiṅantaṃ chandasi nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48494: hiparam - indavo vāmuśanti hi tuparam - ākhyāsyāmi tu te /
GS24jvkasipu:48495: nipātair yadyadihanta iti, hi ca (*8,1.34) iti, tupaśyapaśyatāhaiḥ iti ca
GS24jvkasipu:48496: nighātapratiṣedhe siddhe vacanam idaṃ niyamārtham, ebhir eva parairyoge
GS24jvkasipu:48498: iha na bhavati, jāye svo rohāvaihi /
GS24jvkasipu:48499: ehi ity anena gatyarthaloṭā yuktasya rohāva ity asya loḍantasya highāto bhavaty eva //
GS24jvkasipu:48502: cana cid iva gotrādi taddhita āmreḍita ity eteṣu parataḥ agateḥ uttaraṃ tiṅantaṃ nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48509: iha api gotrādayaḥ kutsanābhikṣṇyayoḥ eva gṛhyante /
GS24jvkasipu:48512: anudāttaḥ taddhita iha udāharaṇam, anyatra taddhitasvareṇa tiṅsvaro
GS24jvkasipu:48515: agateḥ iti kim ? devadattaḥ prapacati cana /
GS24jvkasipu:48516: atra agatigrahaṇe, sagatir api tiṅ ity atra ca upasargagrahaṇaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:48522: cādiṣu ca parataḥ tiṅantamagateḥ paraṃ nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48523: cādayaḥ na cavāhāhaivayukte (*8,1.24) ity atra ye nirdiṣṭāḥ, te iha parigṛhyante /
GS24jvkasipu:48524: caśabde tāvat - devadattaḥ pacati ca khādati ca /
GS24jvkasipu:48525: vā - devadattaḥ pacati vā khādati vā /
GS24jvkasipu:48526: ha - devadattaḥ pacati ha khādati ha /
GS24jvkasipu:48529: agater ity eva, devadattaḥ prapacati ca prakhādati ca prakhādati ca /
GS24jvkasipu:48530: prathamasyātra tiṅantasya cavāyoge prathamā iti nighātaḥ pratiṣidyate eva,
GS24jvkasipu:48534: agateḥ iti pūrvasūtre ca anukṛṣṭam ity atra nānuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:48535: ca, vā ity etābhyāṃ yoge prathamā tiṅavibhaktir nānudāttā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48536: gardarbhāś ca kālayati, vīṇāṃ ca vādayati /
GS24jvkasipu:48537: gardabhān vā kālayati, vīṇāṃ vā vādayati /
GS24jvkasipu:48538: yogagrahaṇaṃ pūrvābhyām api yoge nighātapratiṣedho yathā syāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:48539: prathamāgrahaṇam dvitīyādeḥ tiṅantasya mā bhūt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:48540: cavāyogo hi dvisamuccaye vikalpe ca sati bhavati, sa ca anekasya dharma iti //
GS24jvkasipu:48543: ha ity anena yuktā prathamā tiṅvibhaktiḥ nānudāttā bhavati kṣiyāyāṃ gamyamānāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:48545: svayaṃ ha rathena yāti 3, upādhyāyaṃ padātiṃ gamayati /
GS24jvkasipu:48546: svayaṃ ha odanaṃ bhuṅkte 3, upādhyāyaṃ saktūn pāyayati /
GS24jvkasipu:48548: kṣiyāśīḥpraiṣeṣu tiṅākāṅkṣam (*8,2.104) iti ca pluto bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:48551: aha ity anena yuktā prathamā tiṅvibhktir nānudāttā bhavati viniyoge
GS24jvkasipu:48556: kṣiyāyām - svayamaha rathena yāti 3, upādhyāyaṃ padātiṃ gamayati /
GS24jvkasipu:48557: svayamaha odanaṃ bhuṅkte 3, upādhyāyaṃ saktūn pāyayati /
GS24jvkasipu:48561: calope ahalope prathamā tiṅvibhaktiḥ nānudāttā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48562: eva iti etac ced avadhāraṇārthaṃ prayujyate, kva ca asya lopaḥ ? yatra gamyate cārthaḥ, na ca prayujyate, tatra lopaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:48563: tatra caśabdaḥ samuccayārthaḥ, āhaśabdaḥ kevalārthaḥ iti samānakartṛke
GS24jvkasipu:48565: calope - devadatta eva grāmaṃ gacchatu, sa devadatta evāraṇyaṃ gacchatu /
GS24jvkasipu:48566: grāmaṃ cāraṇyaṃ ca gacchatu ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:48567: ahalope - devadatta eva grāmaṃ gacchatu, yajñadatta evāraṇyam gacchatu /
GS24jvkasipu:48568: grāmaṃ kevalam, araṇyaṃ devalam ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:48569: avadhāraṇam iti kim ? devadattaḥ kveva bhokṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:48571: na kva cid bhokṣyate ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:48575: cādayaḥ, na ca-vā-ha-aha-evayukte (*8,1.24) iti sūtranirdiṣṭā gṛhyante /
GS24jvkasipu:48576: teṣāṃ lope prathamā tiṅvibhaktiḥ nānudāttā bhavati vibhāṣā /
GS24jvkasipu:48577: calope - śuklā vrīhayo bhavanti, bhavanti, avetā gā ājyāya duhanti /
GS24jvkasipu:48578: bhavanti ity etad vikalpena na nihanyate /
GS24jvkasipu:48583: vai vāva ity etābhyāṃ yuktā prathamā tiṅvibhaktiḥ vibhāṣā nānudāttā bhavati chandasi viṣaye
GS24jvkasipu:48586: vāva - athaṃ vāva hasta āsīt, netara āsīt //
GS24jvkasipu:48589: eka anya ity etābhyāṃ samarthābhyāṃ yuktā prathamā tiṅvibhaktiḥ vibhāṣā nānudāttā bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:48595: eka iti saṅkhyāpadam etat, anyārthe na vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:48596: ekaśabdasya vyavasthārthaṃ ca samarthagrahaṇam, vyabhicāritvāt tasya //
GS24jvkasipu:48602: yatra pade yacchabdo vartate tatsarvaṃ yadvṛttam /
GS24jvkasipu:48604: ḍataraḍatamau ca pratyayau ity etan na aśrīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:48605: tasmād yad vṛttād uttaraṃ tiṅantaṃ nānudāttam bhavati nityam /
GS24jvkasipu:48617: pūjanebhyaḥ kāṣṭhādibhyaḥ uttarapadaṃ pūjitam anudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48637: dāruṇam adhyāpakaḥ ity evam ādiṣu na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48638: malopaś ca ity anena apy ayam eva viṣaya ākhyāyate, yatra vibhakter abhāvāt makāro na śrūyate tatra audāttatvam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:48641: pūjanāt ity eva pūjitaparigrahe siddhe pūjitagrahaṇam anantarapūjitapratipattyarthaṃ /
GS24jvkasipu:48642: etad eva jñāpakam iha prakaraṇe pañcamīnirdeśe 'pi nānantaryamāśrīyate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:48643: tathā ca yadvṛttān nityam (*8,1.66) ity atra udāhṛtam /
GS24jvkasipu:48644: anudāttam iti vartamāne punar anudāttagrahaṇam pratiṣedhanivṛttyartham //
GS24jvkasipu:48647: sagatir agatir api pūjanebhyaḥ kāṣṭhādibhyaḥ paraṃ pūjitaṃ tiṅantam anudāttam bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48652: tiṅṅatiṅaḥ (*8,1.28) iti nighātasya, nipātair yadyadihanta iti pratiṣedhe prāpte punar vidhānam
GS24jvkasipu:48655: iha na bhavati, yat kāṣṭhaṃ śuklīkaroti /
GS24jvkasipu:48661: kutsane ca subante gotrādivarjite parataḥ sagatir api tiṅ agatir api anudātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48672: kartuḥ kutsane mā bhūt, pacati pūtir devadattaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:48676: vibhāṣitaṃ ca api bahvartham anudāttam bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:48679: supi kutsane kriyāyā malopa iṣṭo 'tiṅi iti coktārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:48680: pūtiś ca cānubandho vibhāṣitaṃ ca api bahvartham //
GS24jvkasipu:48688: gatau iti kim ? ā mandrairindra haribhiryāhi mayūraromabhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:48689: yāhi ity etat prati kriyāyogādāṅityeṣa gatiḥ, tasya gatau ity etasmin na sati gatiḥ ity anāśritaparanimittakam anudāttatvaṃ syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:48697: anyathā hi yaṃ prati gatiḥ, tatrānudātto bhavati iti dhātau eva udāttavati
GS24jvkasipu:48698: syāt, pratyaye na syāt yat prakaroti iti /
GS24jvkasipu:48699: yatkriyāprayuktāḥ prādayas teṣām taṃ prati gatyupasargasañjñe bhavataḥ iti tiṅante dhātum eva prati gatisañjñā /
GS24jvkasipu:48700: āmante tarhi na prāpnoti, prapacatitarām, prapacatitamām iti ? atra kecidāmantena gataḥ samāsaṃ kurvanti /
GS24jvkasipu:48701: teṣām avyayapūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratve satyakriyamāṇe 'pi tiṅgrahaṇe paramanudāttavad bhavati iti gatinighāto naiva sidhyati /
GS24jvkasipu:48702: atha tarabantasy gatisamāsaḥ ? evam api satiśiṣṭatvādāma eva svare sati
GS24jvkasipu:48703: gateḥ anudāttaṃ padam ekavarjam (*6,1.158) ity evānudāttatvaṃ siddham /
GS24jvkasipu:48704: yeṣāṃ gatikārakopapadānāṃ kṛdbhiḥ samāsavacanam prāk subutpatteḥ ity anena vacanena kṛdantena+eva prāk subutpatteḥ samāso bhavati, na anyena, iti
GS24jvkasipu:48705: darśanam, teṣām evaṃvidhe viṣayesamāsena na+eva bhavitavyam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:48706: pṛthak svarapravṛttau satyāmanena nighātena prayojanam asti /
GS24jvkasipu:48712: āmantritaṃ pūrvam avidyamānavad bhavati, tasmin sati yatkāryaṃ tana
GS24jvkasipu:48716: devadatta, yajñadatta ity atra āmantritasya padāt parasya iti nighāto na
GS24jvkasipu:48719: devadatta pacasi ity atra tiṅṅantiṅaḥ (*8,1.28) iti nighāto na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48720: devadatta tava grāmaḥ svam, devadatta mama grāmaḥ svam ity evam ādisu yuṣmadasmadādeśā na bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:48722: yāvad devadatta pacasi ity atra api pūjāyāṃ nānantaram ity eva pratiṣedho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48723: jātvapūrvam (*8,1.47) tiy etat, devadatta jātu pacasi ity atra api bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:48724: āho utāho cānantaram (*8,1.49) iti, āho devadatta pacasi, utāho devadatta pacasi ity atra api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48725: āma ekāntaramāmantritamanantike (*8,1.55) iti, ām bho pacasi devadatta ity atra api bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:48727: pūrvam iti kim ? devadatta ity etasya āmantritādyudāttatve kartavye na
