GS24jvkasipu:48729: pūrvatvam ca parāpekṣam bhavati iti parasya+eva kārye svanimitte 'nyanimitte vā tadavidyamānavad bhavati, na tu svakārye /
GS24jvkasipu:48730: devadatta pacasi ity atra api hi āmantritādyudāttatvaṃ bhavaty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:48731: iha imaṃ me gaṅge yamune sarasvati iti gaṅgeśabdaḥ pūrvamānantritam, tataḥ parasya yamuneśabdasya anudāttatve kartavye svayam avidyamānavattvān nimittaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48735: avidyamānavattvasya pratiṣedhaḥ āmantritānte samānādhikarane parataḥ pūrvam āmantritāntaṃ sāmānyavacanam na avidyamānavad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48741: samānādhikarane iti kim ? devadatta paṇḍita yajñadatta /
GS24jvkasipu:48742: atra yajñadattaviśeṣanam paṇḍitaśabdaḥ, na pūrveṇa samānādhikaranaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:48743: sāmānyavacanam iti kim ? paryāyeṣu mā bhūt, adhnye, devi, sarasvati, īḍe,
GS24jvkasipu:48746: evaṃ hi uktam, etā te aghnye nāmāni iti //
GS24jvkasipu:48750: viśeṣavacane samānādhikarane āmantritānte parataḥ pūrvam āmantritaṃ bahuvacanāntaṃ vibhāṣitam avidyamānavad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48753: sāmānyavacanādhikāradeva viśeṣavacane iti siddhe viśeṣavacanagrahaṇaṃ vispaṣṭārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:48756: iti vāmanakāśikāyāṃ vṛttau aṣṭamasya adhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:48760: pūrvatra asiddham ity adhikāro 'yam ā adhyāyaparisamāpteḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:48761: yad ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ pūrvatra asiddham ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:48762: tatra yeyaṃ sapādasaptādhyāyī anukrāntā, etasyām ayaṃ pādono 'dhyāyo
GS24jvkasipu:48764: ita uttaraṃ ca uttara uttaro yogaḥ pūrvatra pūrvatra asiddho bhavati asiddhavad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48768: asmā uddhara, dvā atra, dvā ānaya, asā ādityaḥ ity atra vyalopasya śasiddhatvāt, ād guṇaḥ (*6,1.87) iti, akaḥ savarṇe dīrghaḥ (*6,1.101) iti ca na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48769: amuṣmai, amuṣmāt, amuṣmin iti utvasya asiddhatvāt smāyādayo bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:48772: śuṣkikā ity atra śuṣaḥ kaḥ (*8,2.51) ity asya asiddhatvād udīcāmātaḥ sthāne yakapūrvāyāḥ (*7,3.46) ity etan na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48773: śuṣkajaṅghā iti na kopadhāyāḥ (*6,3.37) iti puṃvadbhāvapratiṣedho na
GS24jvkasipu:48775: kṣāmimān iti kṣāmasya apatyaṃ kṣāmiḥ, kṣāmo vā asya asti iti kṣāmī, kṣāmiḥ kṣāmī vā yasya asti iti kṣāmimān /
GS24jvkasipu:48776: kṣāyo maḥ ity asya asiddhatvān mādupadhāyāś ca iti vatvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48777: aujaḍhat iti vaherniṣṭhāyāmūḍhaḥ, tamākhyat iti ṇic, tadantāl luṅ, caṅi
GS24jvkasipu:48778: (*6,1.11) iti dvirvacane kartavye ḍhatvadhatvaṣṭutvaḍhalopānām asiddhatvāṇ ṇau ca yaḥ ṭilopaḥ, tasya sthānivadbhāvāt tha ity etad dvirucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:48779: anaglope iti pratiṣedhāt sanvadittvaṃ na asti, tena aujaḍhat iti bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48780: aujiḍhat ity etat tu ktinnantasya uḍhiśabdasya bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48781: guḍaliṇmān iti guḍaliho 'sya santi iti matup, tatra ḍhatvajaśtvayor asiddhatvāt jhayaḥ (*8,2.10) iti vatvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48782: ye 'tra ṣaṣthīnirdeśāḥ, saptamīnirdeśāḥ, pañcamīnirdeśāś ca, teṣāṃ ṣaṣṭhī sthāneyogā (*1,1.49), tasminniti nirdiṣṭe pūrvasya (*1,1.60), tasmād ity uttarasya iti ca kartavye na asiddhatva bhavati, kāryakālaṃ hi sañjñāparibhāṣam iti pūrvatvamāsāṃ paribhāṣāṇāṃ na asti iti /
GS24jvkasipu:48783: vipratiṣedhe param ity eṣā ca paribhāṣā yena pūrveṇa lakṣaṇena saha
GS24jvkasipu:48784: spardhate, paraṃ lakṣaṇaṃ tatprati tasya asiddhatvān na pravartate /
GS24jvkasipu:48785: tathā ca visphoryam, agoryam iti guṇaḥ pareṇa hali ca (*8,2.77) iti dīrghatvena na bādhyate
GS24jvkasipu:48786: apavādasya tu parasya api utsarge kartavye vacanaprāmaṇyād asiddhatvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48787: tena dogdhā, dogdhum ity atra ghatvasya asiddhatvād ho ḍhaḥ (*8,2.31) iti na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:48790: nalopaḥ pūrvatra asiddho bhavati subvidhau, svaravidhau, sajñāvidhau,
GS24jvkasipu:48792: vidhiśabdo 'yaṃ pratyekam abhisambadhyamānaḥ svarasañjñātukāṃ vidheyatvāt taiḥ karmaṣaṣṭhīyuktaiḥ bhāvasādhano 'bhisambadhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:48794: tena supaḥ sthāne yo vidhiḥ, supi ca parabhūte, sarvo 'sau subvidhiḥ iti sarvatrāsiddhatvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48795: subvidhau tāvat rājabhiḥ, takṣabhiḥ ity atra nalopasya asiddhatvāt ato
GS24jvkasipu:48797: rājabhyām, takṣabhyām, rājasu, takṣasu iti supi ca (*7,3.102) iti,
GS24jvkasipu:48798: bahuvacane jhalyet (*7,3.103) iti dīrghatvametvaṃ ca na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48799: svaravidhau - rājavatī ity atra nalopasya asiddhatvāt anto 'vatyāḥ
GS24jvkasipu:48801: pañcārmam, daśārmam, ity atra nalopasya asiddhatvāt arme cāvarṇaṃ dvyac tryac (*6,2.90) iti pūrvapadasya ādyudāttatvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48802: pañcadaṇḍī ity atra nalopasya asiddhatvād igante dvigau iti pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaro na bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:48803: sañjñāvidhau - pañca brāhmaṇyaḥ, daśa brāhmaṇyaḥ iti nalopasya asiddhatvāt ṣṇāntā ṣaṭ (*1,1.24) iti ṣaṭsañjñā bhavati, tataś ca na ṣaṭsvasrādibhyaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:48805: tad etat prayojanaṃ kathaṃ bhavati ? yadi pratikāryaṃ sañjñāpravṛttiḥ ity etad darśanam /
GS24jvkasipu:48806: yā hi jaśśasorlugarthā ṣaṭsañjñā pravṛttā, tayā strīpratyayapratiṣedho na
GS24jvkasipu:48807: kriyate iti sā punaḥ pravartayitavyā iti /
GS24jvkasipu:48808: tugvidhau - vṛtrahabhyām, vṛtrahabhiḥ iti nalopasya asiddhatvāt hrasvasya piti kṛti tuk (*6,1.71) iti tug na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48809: atra kecit sannipātalakṣaṇo vidhir animittaṃ tadvighātasya iti tukaṃ prati nalopasya animittatvāt, bahiraṅgalakṣaṇena vā asiddhatvāt,
GS24jvkasipu:48811: tat tu kriyate paribhāṣadvayasya anityatvaṃ jñāpayitum /
GS24jvkasipu:48812: kṛti iti kim ? vṛtrahacchatram, vṛtrahacchāyā, che ca (*6,1.73) iti tug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48813: atra siddhe satyārambho niyamārthaḥ, eteṣv eva nalopo asiddho bhavati, na anyatra /
GS24jvkasipu:48814: tena rājīyati, rājāyate, rājāśvaḥ iti ītvam, dīrghatvam, ekadeśaś ca siddho bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:48817: mubhāvo nābhāve kartavye na asiddho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48820: mubhāvasya asiddhatvāt ghilakṣaṇo nābhāvo na syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:48821: kṛte tu nābhāve mubhāvasya asiddhatvāt, supi ca (*7,3.102) iti dīrghatvaṃ yat prāpnoti, tat sannipātalakṣaṇo vidhir animittaṃ tadvighātasya iti na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48823: atha vā ne parato yat prāpnoti tasmin kartavye mubhāvo na asiddhaḥ ity eṣa eva atra sūtrārthaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:48824: ne tu kartavye mubhāvasya yat siddhatvaṃ tadarthāt saṅgṛhītam /
GS24jvkasipu:48825: tena atra mubhāvasya siddhatvāt nābhāvaś ca bhavati, dīrghatvaṃ ca na
GS24jvkasipu:48839: katham idam udāharaṇam yadi udāttayaṇo halpūrvāt (*6,1.174) ity udāttatve kṛte vibhakteḥ āṭaś ca (*6,1.90) ekādeśaḥ, tadā bhavati idam udāharaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:48840: atha tu kṛte ekādeśe udāttayaṇo halpūrvāt (*6,1.174) iti svaraḥ, tadā
GS24jvkasipu:48844: ekādeśaḥ svaraḥ gāṅge 'nūpa iti gāṅgeśabde ekāraḥ ekādeśa udāttena+udāttaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:48846: tasya siddhatvāt ya punaḥ eṅaḥ padāntādati (*6,1.109) iti ekādeśaḥ sa
GS24jvkasipu:48847: ekādeśa udāttena+udāttaḥ (*8,2.5) iti, ata svarito vā 'nudātte padādau
GS24jvkasipu:48851: adupadeśāt iti lasārvadhātukānudattatve kṛte ekādeśaḥ, tad udāttasya siddhatvāt śaturanumo nadyajādī (*6,1.173) antodāttāt ity eṣa svaro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48852: anuma iti pratiṣedho jñāpakaḥ, ekādeśasvaraḥ śatṛsvare siddhaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:48853: nahi sanuṃkaṃ śatrantaṃ śatrantaṃ kiñcid ekādeśasvaram antareṇa antodāttam asti /
GS24jvkasipu:48856: ekadeśasvarasya siddhatvāt tena anudāttaṃ padam ekavarjam (*6,1.158) iti varjyamānatā bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:48859: ekādeśasvarasya siddhatvāt kṛte tasmin tiṅṅatiṅaḥ (*8,1.27) iti nighāto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48860: antaraṅga iti vacanād bahiraṅgasya asiddhatvam eva, pacatīti, prapacatīti
GS24jvkasipu:48863: harivaḥ iti matubantam etat, tatra chandasīraḥ (*8,2.15) iti vattve,
GS24jvkasipu:48864: saṃyogāntasya lope ca kṛte, matuvaso ru mambuddhau chandasi (*8,3.1) iti
GS24jvkasipu:48865: rutvam, tasya saṃyogāntasya lopasya asiddhatvāt haśi ca (*6,1.114) iti utvaṃ na prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:48869: iṭa īṭi (*8,2.29) iti sijlopasya siddhatvāt savarṇadīrghatva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48873: niṣṭhādeśasya siddhatvāt jhali iti ṣatvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48874: kutvaṃ tu prati asiddha eva iti tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48877: yadā kṣīber niṣṭhāyām iṭi kṛte itśabdalopo nipātyate, tadā kṣībaḥ iti
GS24jvkasipu:48878: sañjñāyām itśabdalopasya asiddhatvāt niṣṭhā ca dvyajanāt (*6,1.205) ity eṣa svaro na prāpnoti, kṣībena tarati kṣībikaḥ iti dvyajalakṣaṇaṣṭhan na
GS24jvkasipu:48880: yadā tu takāralopo nipātyate, tadā tasya asiddhatvāt iḍāgamaḥ prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:48882: plutavikārasya asiddhatvat che ca (*6,1.73) iti hrasvalakṣaṇo nityas tug na prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:48884: ścyutir kṣaraṇe ity ayaṃ dhātuḥ sakārādiḥ paṭhyate, tasya ścutvasya asiddhatvāt aṭ ścyotati, raṭ ścyotati iti ḍaḥ si ḍhuṭ (*8,3.21) iti prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:48885: aṭati iti aḍ, raṭati iti raḍ, kvibanto 'yam /
GS24jvkasipu:48886: kimarthaṃ punaḥ sakārādiḥ paṭhyate ? iha madhu ścyotati iti madhuścyut,
GS24jvkasipu:48887: kvibantaḥ, madhuścyutam ācaṣṭe iti ṇic, madhuścyayati, madhuścyayateḥ punaḥ kvipi kṛte saṃyogāditvāt salopaḥ, saṃyogāntatvād yalopaḥ, cakārasya
GS24jvkasipu:48889: śakārādau punar etasmin saṃyogāntalopena yakāracakārayoḥ luptayoḥ śakārasya ṣatve sati madhuḍ iti syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:48894: chideḥ vicicchitsati, uccheḥ ucicchiṣati iti abhyāsādeśasya asiddhatvāt che ca (*6,1.73) iti tuk na prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:48896: sayṃ yṃ yantā, savṃ vṃ, vatsaraḥ, yalṃ lṃ, lokam, talṃ lṃ lokam iti parasavarṇasyāsiddhatvād yaraḥ iti dvirvacanaṃ na syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:48908: latvādīnāṃ vikalpitānām asiddhatvāt kṛte dvirvacane satyupariṣṭad vikalpe siti garo galaḥ, galo garaḥ ity evaṃ rūpam api dviruktaṃ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:48909: tad etat sarvaṃ na mu ne iti yogavibhāgena sādhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:48910: na ity etāvadaniṣṭe viṣaye pūrvatra asiddhasya pratiṣedhārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:48915: udāttayaṇaḥ svaritayaṇaś ca parasya anudāttasya svaritaḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48918: udāttanivṛttisvareṇa ayam īkāraḥ udāttaḥ, tasya sthāne yaṇādeśaḥ sa
GS24jvkasipu:48919: udāttayaṇ, tasmāt parasya anudāttasya svaritaḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48922: sakṛllūḥ, khalapūḥ iti kṛtsvareṇa antodātau, tayoḥ roḥ supi (*8,3.16) iti
GS24jvkasipu:48923: yaṇādeśaḥ, sa udāttayaṇ, tataḥ parasya saptamyekavacanasya svaritatvam,
GS24jvkasipu:48924: tasya yaṇādeśaḥ svaritayaṇ, tasmāt svaritayaṇaḥ parasya āśāśabdākārasya anudāttasya svarito bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48925: nanu ca saptamyekavacanasya yadudāttayaṇaḥ iti svaritatvam, tadasiddhaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:48926: yaṇādeśe, tat kathamayaṃ svaritayaṇ bhavati ? āśrayāt siddhatvaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:48927: yadi evam, udāttād anudāttasya svaritaḥ (*8,4.66) ity etasya api āśrayāt siddhatvaṃ prāpnoti, tataś ca dadhyaśā ity atra api svaritaḥ syāt ? tasmād ayam eva yaṇsvaro yaṇādeśe siddho vaktavyaḥ kecit tu bruvate, udāttāt svaritayaṇo 'pi parasya anudāttasya svaritatvaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:48929: tathā ca taittirīyake śākhāntare paṭhyate - yāste viśvāḥ samidhaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:48931: agne ity ayam akāraḥ svaritaḥ paṭhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:48932: tathā brāhmaṇe 'pi dadhyāśayati ity ākāraḥ svaritaḥ paṭhyate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:48933: yathā tu vārtikaṃ bhāśyaṃ ca, tathā udāttāt svaritayaṇaḥ parasya anudāttasya anena svaritatvaṃ na bhavati iti sthitam /
GS24jvkasipu:48934: tathā ca bhāṣye svaritayaṇgrahaṇam idaṃ pratyākhyāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:48935: sakṛllvyāśā ity evam ādau udāttayaṇaḥ ity eva svaritasya siddhatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:48936: svaritayaṇvyavadhānam avyavadhānam eva, svarividhau vyañjanam avidyamānavat iti /
GS24jvkasipu:48937: tat tu kriyate, pūrvasmād api vidhau sthānivadbhāvāt vyavadhānam asti,
GS24jvkasipu:48938: svaradīrghayalopeṣu ca lopājādeśasya sthānivadbhāvaḥ pratiṣidhyate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:48939: udāttasvaritayoḥ iti kim ? vaidī āśā vaidyāśā /
GS24jvkasipu:48947: udātena saha anudāttasya ya ekādeśaḥ sa udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48955: lasārvadhātukānudāttatve kṛte dvayor anudāttayoḥ ayam ekādeśaḥ, pararūpe kartavye svaritasya asiddhatvāt //
GS24jvkasipu:48958: anudātte padādau udāttena saha ya ekādeśaḥ sa svarito vā bhavati udātto vā
GS24jvkasipu:48962: sūtthitaḥ iti suśabdaḥ suḥ pūjāyām (*1,4.94) iti karmapravacanīyaḥ, tasya prāditvāt samāse sati avyayapūrvaprakṛtisvaratvena ādyudāttaḥ, śeṣam anudāttam iti ca anudātte padādau ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48963: vīkṣate, vasuko 'si ity atra api tiṅṅ atiṅaḥ (*8,1.28) iti nighāte kṛte
GS24jvkasipu:48966: udātte hi vikalpite tasminnasatyāntaryata eva svarito bhaviṣyati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:48973: prātipadikasya padasya yo 'ntyo nakāraḥ tasya lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48983: prātipadikagrahaṇam asamastam eva supāṃ suluk iti ṣaṣṭhyā lukā nirdiṣṭam /
GS24jvkasipu:48988: ro 'supi (*8,2.69), ahan (*7,2.68) iti repharutvayor asiddhatvāt nalopaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:48989: prāpnoti, sāvakāśaṃ tadubhayaṃ sambuddhau, he 'haḥ, he dīrghāto nidāgheti
GS24jvkasipu:48991: ahan iti ruvidhau yad upādīyate prathamaikavacanāntam akṛtanalopaṃ tad āvartyate, tatra ekayā āvṛttyā tad evaṃ rūpaṃ nalopābhāvārtham
GS24jvkasipu:48995: ṅau parataḥ sambuddhau ca nakāralopo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49001: etasmād eva nalopapratiṣedhavacanāt apratyayaḥ iti pratyayalakṣaṇena prātipadikasañjñā na pratiṣidhyate iti jñāpyate, bhasañjñā ca na bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:49002: tathā ca rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ rājapuruṣaḥ ity atra nalopaś ca bhavati, allopaś ca na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49005: he rājan vṛndāraka ity atra samudāyārthasambodhanam, na pūrvapadārthasambodhanaṃ pratīyate iti sambuddhyantaṃ pūrvapadaṃ na+eva
GS24jvkasipu:49011: matoḥ iha kāryitvena upādānāt sāmarthyalabdhaṃ prātipadikaṃ tat māt iti makārāvarṇābhyāṃ viśiṣyate
GS24jvkasipu:49012: makārāvarṇaviśiṣṭayā ca upadhayā ity ayam artho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49013: makārāntāt makāropadhāt avarṇāntād avarṇopadhāt ca uttarasya matoḥ vaḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati, yavādibhyas tu parato na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49040: dhraji, dhvaji, sañji ity eteṣāṃ chandasīraḥ (*8,2.15) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:49041: harit, kakut, garut ity eteṣāṃ jhayaḥ (*8,2.10) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:49042: ikṣu, madhu, druma, maṇḍa, dhūma ity eteṣāṃ sañjñāyām (*8,2.11) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:49045: yasya sati nimitte matupo vattvaṃ na dṛśyate sa yavādiṣu draṣṭavyaḥ iha nṛmataḥ idaṃ nārmatam iti bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt avarṇopadhasya matupo vattvaṃ na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:49048: jhayantād uttarasya matoḥ vaḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49055: sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye matoḥ vaḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49062: āsandīvat aṣṭhīvat cakrīvat kakṣīvat carmaṇvatī ity etāni sañjñāyāṃ nipātyante /
GS24jvkasipu:49068: apare tu āhuḥ, āsandīśabdo 'pi prakṛtyantaram eva asti, tathā coktam,
GS24jvkasipu:49071: āsandīvat ity eta prapañcārtham iha paṭhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:49078: cakrīvanti sado havirdhānāni bhavanti ity etat tu chāndasatvād anugantavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:49084: apare tu āhuḥ, ruman iti prakṛtyantaram asti, tasya etan nipātanaṃ
GS24jvkasipu:49087: carmaṇvatī iti carmaṇo nalopābhāvo ṇatvaṃ ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:49093: udanvān iti udakaśabdasya matāvudanbhāvo nipātyate udadhāvarthe, sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye ca /
GS24jvkasipu:49094: udanvān nāma ṛṣiḥ yasya audanvataḥ putraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49097: udadhāu iti kim ? udakavān ghaṭaḥ ity atra tu dadhātyartho na vivakṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:49102: śobhano rājā yasminniti sa rājanvān deśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49107: chandasi viṣaye ivarṇāntād rephāntāc ca+uttarasya matorvattvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49115: chandasi sarve vidhayo vikalpyante iti iha na bhavati, saptarṣimantam,
GS24jvkasipu:49116: ṛṣimān, ṛtīmān, sūryaṃ te dyāvāpṛthivīmantam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:49123: anantād uttarasya matoḥ nuḍāgamo bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:49129: nuṭaḥ asiddhatvāt tasya ca vatvaṃ na bhavati, tataḥ parasya ca bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:49132: nakārāntāt uttarasya ghasañjñākasya nuḍāgamo bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:49140: rathaśabdād eva vā matvarthīyo 'yam īkāraḥ chandasīvanipau iti //
GS24jvkasipu:49145: tena yaḥ kevalo repho, yaś ca ṛkārasthaḥ, tayor dvayor api grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:49147: tato 'yaṃ kevalasya rephasya sthāne lakārādeśo vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:49148: ṛkārasya apy ekadeśavikāradvāreṇa lṛkāraḥ, evaṃ ca luṭi ca klṛpaḥ (*1,3.93) ity evam ādayo nirdeśā upapadyante /
GS24jvkasipu:49155: kṛpā ity etat ṛpeḥ samprasāraṇam ca iti bhidādiṣu pāṭhād bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49156: tasya hi kṛtasamprasāraṇasya lākṣaṇikatvāt iha kṛpaḥ iti grahaṇaṃ na asti
GS24jvkasipu:49158: uṇādayo bahulam (*3,3.1) iti vā kṛpereva latvābhāvaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49159: vālamūlalaghvasurālam aṅgulīnāṃ vā ro lamāpadyata iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:49166: kapilakādīnāṃ sañjñāchandasor vā ro lamāpadyata iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:49174: kim idam ekatvasmaraṇamiti ? samānaviṣayatvam eva tayoḥ smaryate ity arthaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:49177: ayatau parataḥ upasargasya yo rephaḥ tasya lakāraḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49180: atra ca yo 'yam ekādeśaḥ, tasya sthānivadbhāvād ayateḥ upasargasya ca vibhāge sati, yadi ayatigrahaṇaṃ rephasya viśeṣaṇam, tadā yena na
GS24jvkasipu:49181: avyavadhānaṃ tena vyavahite 'pi vacanaprāmāṇyāt iti ekena varṇena vyavadhāne 'pi latvaṃ bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:49182: tathā ca palyayate ity atra api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49183: upasargaviśeṣaṇe tu ayatigrahaṇe siddham eva+etat sarvam, prater api tu
GS24jvkasipu:49185: tatra keṣāṃcid darśanaṃ bhavitavyam eva platyayate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:49186: prathamapakṣadarśanābhiniṣṭāstu pratyayate ity eva bhavati iti manyante /
GS24jvkasipu:49187: apare tu pratiśabdopasṛṣṭasya ayateḥ prayogam eva na+icchanti /
GS24jvkasipu:49188: nis dus ity etayos tu rutvasya asiddhatvāl latvena na+eva bhavitabyam /
GS24jvkasipu:49193: gṝ ity etasya dhātoḥ rephasya lakāra ādeśo bhavati yaṅi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49196: kecid graḥ iti girateḥ gṛṇāteś ca sāmānyena grahaṇam icchanti /
GS24jvkasipu:49198: gṛṇāter hi yaṅeva na asti, anabhidhānād iti /
GS24jvkasipu:49202: ajādau pratyaye parato gro rephasya vibhāṣā lakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49207: tena galaḥ iti prāṇyaṅge nityaṃ latvaṃ bhavati, garaḥ iti viṣe nityaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49209: nigālyate iti ṇilopasya sthānivadbhāvāt aci vibhāṣā iti latvavikalpaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49210: pūrvatra asiddhe na sthānivat iti etad api sāpavādam eva, tasya doṣaḥ saṃyogādilopalatvaṇatveṣu iti /
GS24jvkasipu:49211: antaraṅgatvād vā kṛte latvavikalpe ṇilopo bhaviṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:49212: girau, giraḥ ity atra dhātoḥ svarūpagrahaṇe tatpratyaye kāryavijñānam iti latvaṃ na bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:49213: giratir vā latvavidhāv adhikṛtaḥ, gṛṇāter etad rūpam //
GS24jvkasipu:49216: pari ity etasya yo rephaḥ tasya ghaśabde aṅkaśabde ca parato vibhāṣā lakāra ādeśo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:49219: gha iti svarūpagrahaṇam atreṣyate, na taraptamapau iti /
GS24jvkasipu:49229: iha śreyān, bhūyān iti rutvam param api asiddhatvāt saṃyogāntasay lopaṃ na
GS24jvkasipu:49231: jaśtve tu nāprāpte tadārabhyāte iti tasya bādhakaṃ bhavati, yaśaḥ, payaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:49232: dadhyatra, madhvatra, ity atra tu yaṇādeśasya bihiraṅgalakṣaṇasya asiddhatvāt saṃyogāntalopo na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:49235: saṃyogāntapadasya yo rephaḥ tasmād uttarasya antasya sakārasya lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49238: kṣarateḥ tsarateś ca luṅi sicaḥ chāndasatvād īḍabhāvaḥ bahulaṃ chandasi
GS24jvkasipu:49241: mātuḥ, pituḥ iti ṛta ut (*6,1.111) iti uttve kṛte raparatve ca sati rāt sasya iti salopaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:49242: siddhe satyārambho niyamārthaḥ, rāt sasya eva lopo bhavati, na anyasya iti
GS24jvkasipu:49247: dhakārādau pratyaye parataḥ sakārasya lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49250: yadyatra sakāralopo na syāt, sicaḥ ṣatve jaśtve ca vibhāṣeṭaḥ (*8,3.79)
GS24jvkasipu:49252: itaḥ prabhṛti sicaḥ sakārasya lopa iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:49253: iha na bhavati, cakāddhi palitaṃ śiraḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:49254: tathā payo dhāvati ity evam ādāv api na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49255: sagdhiḥ, babdhām iti chāndaso varṇa lopaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49256: bhāṣyakārastvāha, cakādhi ity eva bhavitavyam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:49257: tena payo dhāvati ity evam ādau yatnānataramāstheyam /
GS24jvkasipu:49259: āśādhvaṃ tu kathaṃ jaśtvaṃ sakārasya bhaviṣyati //
GS24jvkasipu:49260: sarvam evaṃ prasiddhaṃ syāc chru tiścāpi na bhidyate /
GS24jvkasipu:49261: luṅaścāpi na murdhanye grahaṇaṃ seṭi duṣyati //
GS24jvkasipu:49262: ghasibhasor na sidhyeta tasmāt sijgrahaṇaṃ na tat /
GS24jvkasipu:49267: jhalaḥ uttarasya sakārasya jhali parato lopo bhavati abhitta /
GS24jvkasipu:49271: avāttām, avātta ity atra vā sicaḥ sakāralopasya asiddhatvāt saḥ syārdhadhātuke (*7,4.49) iti sakārasya takāraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49276: ayam api sica eva lopaḥ, tena+iha na bhavati, somasut stotā, dṛṣtsthānam iti //
GS24jvkasipu:49279: hrasvāntād aṅgād uttarasya lopo bhavati jhali parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49290: ayam api sica eva lopaḥ, tena+iha na bhavati, dviṣṭarām, dviṣṭamām iti /
GS24jvkasipu:49291: sujantād dviśabdāt taraptamapau, adravyaprakarṣe ātiśayikaḥ ām pratyayaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:49294: iṭaḥ uttarasya sakārasya lopo bhavati īṭi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49306: padasya ante yaḥ saṃyogaḥ, jhali parato vā yaḥ saṃyogaḥ, tadādyoḥ sakārakakārayor lopo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:49316: kim idaṃ siṅi iti ? sanaḥ saprabhṛti mahiṅo ṅakāreṇa pratyāhāraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49318: thakāre jhali kakārasya saṃyogāder lopaḥ prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:49319: tad atra śakeḥ kvibantasya prayoga eva na asti ity āha kāṣṭhaśageva na
GS24jvkasipu:49321: vāsyartham, kākvartham ity atra api bahiraṅgalakṣaṇasya yaṇādeśasya
GS24jvkasipu:49330: cavargasya kavargādeśo bhavati jhali parataḥ, padānte ca /
GS24jvkasipu:49339: kruñcā ity atra siṅi iti vacanād ñakārasya cakāre jhali kutvaṃ na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:49341: nakāropadho vā dhāturayaṃ repharahitaśca kruñca kauṭilyālpībhāvayoḥ iti paṭhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:49343: yujikruñcāṃ ca iti tasyaiva repho 'dhiko nakārasya lopābhāvaś ca iti nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:49344: tatra anusvārasya parasavarṇasya ca asiddhatvāt ñakāra eva na asti iti kutvaṃ na bhaviṣyati
GS24jvkasipu:49347: hakārasya ḍhakāradeśo bhavati jhali parataḥ padānte ca /
GS24jvkasipu:49359: dakārādeḥ dhātoḥ hakārasya ghakārādeśo bhavati jhali parataḥ padānte ca /
GS24jvkasipu:49372: dhātoḥ iti dādisamānādhikaraṇam etan na, kiṃ tarhi, tadviśeṣaṇam
GS24jvkasipu:49373: avayavaṣaṣṭhyantam, dhātor avayavo yo dādiḥ śabdas tad avayavasya hakārasya iti /
GS24jvkasipu:49374: kiṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati ? adhok ity atra api ghakāraḥ siddho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49376: atha vā dhātūpadeśe yo dādiḥ ity evaṃ vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:49377: tathā ca dāmalihamicchati dāmalihyati, dāmalihyateḥ kvip pratyayaḥ dāmaliṭ ity atra api na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:49380: druha muha ṣṇuha ṣṇiha ity eteṣāṃ dhātūnāṃ hakārasya vā ghakārādeśo bhavati jhali parataḥ padānte ca /
GS24jvkasipu:49389: druheḥ dāditvād ghatvaṃnityaṃ prāptam, itareṣām aprāptam eva ghatvaṃ vikalpyate //
GS24jvkasipu:49392: naho hakārasya dhakārādeśo bhavati jhali pare padānte ca /
GS24jvkasipu:49400: āho hakārasya thakārādeśo bhavati jhali parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49404: jhali ity eva, āha, āhatuḥ, āhuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49409: udgrābhaṃ ca nigrābhaṃ ca brahma devā avīvṛdhan //
GS24jvkasipu:49412: vraśca bhrasja sṛja mṛja yaja rāja bhrāja ity eteṣām, chakārāntānām,
GS24jvkasipu:49413: śakārāntānāṃ ca ṣakāraḥ ādeśo bhavati jhali parataḥ padānte ca /
GS24jvkasipu:49439: kecit tu rāṣṭiḥ, bhrāṣṭiḥ iti kvinnantam icchanti /
GS24jvkasipu:49444: cchvoḥ śūḍanunāsike ca (*6,4.19) ity atra kṅiti ity anuvartate iti
GS24jvkasipu:49454: ekāco baśo bhaṣ jhaṣantasya s-dhvoḥ || PS_8,2.37 ||
GS24jvkasipu:49456: dhātor avayavo ya ekāc jhaṣantaḥ tadavayavasya baśaḥ sthāne bhaṣ ādeśo bhavati jhali sakāre dhvaśabde ca parataḥ padānte ca /
GS24jvkasipu:49457: atra catvaro baśaḥ sthānino bhaṣādeśāścatvāra eva, tatra saṅkhyātānudeśe prāpte ḍakārasya sthānino 'bhāvāt ḍhakārādeśo na bhavati ? āntaryato vyavasthā vijñāsyate /
GS24jvkasipu:49467: ajarghāḥ - gudheḥ yaṅlugantasya laṅi sipi labhūpadhaguṇe kṛte sipo halṅyādilope ca dhātoḥ avayavasya ekāco baśaḥ sthāne bhaṣbhāvaḥ, tato dhakārasya jaśtvam, daś ca (*8,2.75) iti rutvam, ro ri (*8,3.14) iti pūrvarephasya lopaḥ, ḍhralope pūrvasya dīrgho 'ṇaḥ (*6,3.111) iti dīrghatvam gadarbhayateḥ apratyayaḥ - gardhap /
GS24jvkasipu:49468: ekācaḥ iti kim ? dāmaliham icchati dāmalihyati, dāmalihyater apratyayaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:49470: asati hy ekājgrahaṇe dhātoḥ ity etad baśo viśeṣaṇaṃ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:49477: dadha dhāraṇe ity etasya yaṅluki loṭi hujhalbhyo herdhiḥ (*6,4.101) iti dhibhāve saty etad bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:49481: tasya jhalantasya baśaḥ sthāne bhaṣ ādeśo bhavati takārathakārayoḥ parataḥ, cakārāt sdhvoś ca parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49488: tathoḥ iti kim ? ānantaryāt sdhvor eva vijñāyeta /
GS24jvkasipu:49493: jhalāṃ jaśaḥ ādeśā bhavanti padasyānte vartamānānām /
GS24jvkasipu:49503: jhaṣa uttarayoḥ takārathakārayoḥ sthāne dhakāraḥ ādeśo bhavati, dadhātiṃ varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:49536: ra-dābhyāṃ niṣthāto naḥ pūrvasya ca daḥ || PS_8,2.42 ||
GS24jvkasipu:49538: rephadakārābhyām uttarasya niṣthātakārasya nakāraḥ ādeśo bhavati pūrvasya ca dakārasya /
GS24jvkasipu:49550: raḥ ity atra raśrutisām anyaṃ na+upādīyate, kiṃ tarhi, vyañjanamātram /
GS24jvkasipu:49551: rephasāmānyanirdeśe 'pi sati rephāt parā yā 'jbhaktis tadvyavadhānānnatvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49556: pūrvasya iti kim ? parasya mā bhūt, bhinnavadbhyām /
GS24jvkasipu:49558: iha kṛtasya apatyaṃ kārtiḥ iti vṛddheḥ bahiraṅgalakṣaṇāyā asiddhatvānnatve kartavye rephasya asiddhatvam //
GS24jvkasipu:49561: saṃyogādiḥ yo dhātur ākārānto yaṇvān, tasmād uttarasya niṣthātakārasya
GS24jvkasipu:49579: lūñ chedane ity etat prabhṛti vṝñ varaṇe iti yāvat vṛtkaraṇena samāpitā lvādayo gṛhyante /
GS24jvkasipu:49602: grāsakarmakartṛkasya iti kim ? sitā pāśena sūkarī /
GS24jvkasipu:49603: grāso 'pi yadā karmaiva bhavati na karmakartā, tadā na bhavati, sito grāso devadattena iti //
GS24jvkasipu:49606: okāreto dhātor uttarasya niṣṭhātakārasya nakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49634: kṣiyo dhātoḥ dīrghād uttarasya niṣthātakārasya nakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49638: kṣiyaḥ niṣṭhāyām aṇyadarthe (*6,4.60), vā+ākrośādainyayoḥ (*6,4.61) iti dīrghatvaṃ bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:49640: akṣitam iti ktapratyayo bhāve, bhāvaś ca ṇyadarthaḥ iti dīrghābhāvaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49641: hrasvasya api hi dhātvanukaraṇasya iha iyaṅā nirdeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49642: kṣiyaḥ niṣthāyām aṇyadarthe (*6,4.60) ity atra dīrghagrahaṇaṃ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:49643: viparābhyāṃ jeḥ (*1,3.19) ity evam ādau tu dhātutvam anukāryagataṃ
GS24jvkasipu:49647: śyāyateḥ uttarasya niṣthātakārasya asparśe nakāraḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49653: śītam udakam ity atra guṇabhūto 'pi sparśaḥ natvapratiṣedhasya samprasāraṇasya ca nimittaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49654: guṇe ca sparśe pratiṣedho 'yam, na roge, tena pratiṣīnaḥ ity atra natvaṃ bhavty eva //
GS24jvkasipu:49657: añcateḥ uttarapadasya niṣthātakārasya nakārādeśo bhavati na ced apādānaṃ tatra bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49660: anapādāne iti kim ? udaktam udakaṃ kūpāt /
GS24jvkasipu:49664: divaḥ uttarasya niṣthātakārasya nakārādeśo bhavati avijigīṣāyam arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:49671: nirvāṇaḥ iti nispūrvād vāter uttarasya niṣthatakārasya nakāro nipātyate,
GS24jvkasipu:49678: nirvāṇaḥ pradīpo vātena ity atra tu pradīpādhikaraṇo vātyarthaḥ, vātastu tasya karaṇam iti bhavaty eva natvam //
GS24jvkasipu:49681: śuṣeḥ dhātor uttarasya niṣthātakārasya kakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49686: paceḥ dhātor uttarasya niṣthātakārasya vakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49696: prapūrvāt styāyateḥ uttarasya niṣthātakārasya anyatarasyāṃ makārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49701: yadā matvaṃ na asti, tadā saṃyogāder āto dhātor yaṇvataḥ (*8,2.43) ity asya pūrvatra asiddhatvāt saṃprasāraṇaṃ prathamaṃ kriyate, tatra kṛte nimittavyāghātān natvaṃ na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:49704: phulla kṣība kṛśa ullāgha ity ete nipātyante, na ced upasargād uttarā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:49705: phullaḥ iti ñiphalā viśaraṇe ity etasmād dhātor uttarasya niṣṭhātakārasya lakāro nipātyate
GS24jvkasipu:49707: ktavatvantasya apy etal latvam iṣyate, phullaḥ, phullavān iti /
GS24jvkasipu:49708: kṣībakṛśollādhāḥ iti kṣībikṛśibhyām utpūrvāc ca lāgheḥ kta pratyayasya talopaḥ iḍabhāvaś ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:49721: parikṛśaḥ ity atra yaḥ pariśabdaḥ sa kriyāntarayogāt kṛśiṃ pratyanupasarga
GS24jvkasipu:49725: nuda vida unda trā ghrā hrī ity etebhyaḥ uttarasya niṣṭhātakārasya nakāra ādeśo bhavati anyatarasyām
GS24jvkasipu:49732: hrī ity etasmād aprāptaṃ natvam, itareṣāṃ nityaṃ prāptaṃ vikalpyate /
GS24jvkasipu:49733: vida vicāraṇe ity asya vider iha grahaṇam iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:49734: evaṃ hy uktam - vettestu vidito niṣṭhā vidyater vinna iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:49735: vinater vinnaś ca vittaśca bhogavittaś ca vindateḥ // iti //
GS24jvkasipu:49739: dhyā khyā pṝ mūrcchi mada ity eteṣāṃ niṣṭhātakārasya nakārādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49750: radābhyām, saṃyogādeḥ iti ca prāptaḥ pratiṣidhyate //
GS24jvkasipu:49753: vittaḥ iti vider lābhārthāt uttarasya ktasya natvābhāvo nipātyate bhoge pratyaye ca abhidheye
GS24jvkasipu:49763: bhittam iti nipātyate śakalaṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49768: bhidikriyāvivakṣāyāṃ hi śakalaviṣaye bhinnam bhittam ity eva bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:49771: ṛṇam iti ṛ ity etasmād dhātor uttarasya niṣṭhātakārasya nakāro nipātyate ādhamarṇyaviṣaye
GS24jvkasipu:49772: adhamaḥ ṛṇe adhamarṇaḥ, etasmād eva nipātanāt saptamyantena uttarapadena samāsaḥ, tadbhāvaḥ ādhamarṇyam /
GS24jvkasipu:49773: yady evam, uttamarṇaḥ iti na sidhyati ? na+eṣa doṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49775: tena uttamarṇaḥ ity api hi bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49778: ādhamarṇye iti kim ? ṛtaṃ vakṣyāmi nānṛtam //
GS24jvkasipu:49781: nasatta niṣatta anutta pratūrta sūrta gūrta ity etāni chandasi viṣaye nipātyante /
GS24jvkasipu:49782: nasatta, niṣatta iti sadeḥ naṇpūrvāt nipūrvāc ca natvābhāvo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:49790: praturtam iti tvarateḥ turvī ity etasya vā nipātanam /
GS24jvkasipu:49793: sūrtam iti sṛ ity etasya utvaṃ nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:49796: gūrtam iti gūrī ity etasya natvābhāvo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:49803: kvin pratyayo yasmād dhātoḥ sa kvinpratyayaḥ, tasya padasyālo 'ntyasya
GS24jvkasipu:49809: kvinaḥ kuḥ iti vaktavye pratyayagrahaṇaṃ kṛtaṃ bahuvrīhivijñānārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:49810: kvin pratyayo yasmād vihitas tasmād anyasminn api pratyaye kutvaṃ yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:49813: sṛjidṛśibhyāṃ hi kvin vihitaḥ, tayor luṅi kutvam etat /
GS24jvkasipu:49815: īṭ ca na bhavati, bahulaṃ chandasi (*7.3.97) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:49816: tathā dṛgbhyām, dṛgbhiḥ iti kvibantasya api dṛśeḥ kutvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49817: evaṃ ca sati rajjusṛḍbhyām ity atra api kutvaṃ prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:49818: atha tu na+iṣyate, pratividhānaṃ kartavyam iti //
GS24jvkasipu:49833: śamitamidamādīnāṃ kvip, anunāsikasya kvijhaloḥ kṅiti (*6,4.15) iti dīrghatvam /
GS24jvkasipu:49843: makāravakārayoś ca parataḥ makārāntasya dhātoḥ nakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49846: gamerlaṅi bahulaṃ chandasi iti śapo luk /
GS24jvkasipu:49848: vibhāṣā gamahanajanavidaviśām (*7,2.68) iti kvasau iḍāgamasya abhāvaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49852: sakārāntasya padasya sajuṣ ity etasya ca ruḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49860: avayāḥ śvetavāḥ puroḍāḥ ity ete nipātyante /
GS24jvkasipu:49861: avapūrvasya yajeḥ avetapūrvasya vaheḥ, puras pūrvasya dāśateḥ mantre śvetavahokthaśaspuroḍāśo ṇvin (*3,2.71), ave yajaḥ (*3,2.72) iti ṇvini kṛte, śvetavahādīnāṃ ḍaspadasya iti ḍaspratyaye nipātanāni etāni /
GS24jvkasipu:49862: kimarthaṃ tarhi nipātanaṃ yāvatā pūrveṇa+eva ruḥ siddhaḥ, dīrghatvam api atvasantasya cādhātoḥ (*6,4.14) iti ? sambuddhau dīrghārtham ete
GS24jvkasipu:49864: atvasantasya cādhātoḥ (*6,4.14) ity atra hi asambuddhau iti vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:49872: ahan ity etasya padasya ruḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49875: nalopam akṛtvā nirdeśo jñāpakaḥ nalopābhāvo yathā syāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:49877: ahan ity atra tu lākṣaṇikatvād ahanśabdasya ruḥ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49882: ro 'supi (*8,2.69) ity asya apavādo rutvam upasaṅkhyāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:49883: apara āha - sāmānyena rephādau rutvaṃ bhavati, ahoramyam, ahoratnāni iti //
GS24jvkasipu:49886: ahan ity etasya rephādaśo bhavati asupi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49891: nanu catra api pratyayalakṣaṇena subasti, ahardadāti, aharbhuṅkte iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:49893: uktam etat - ahnor avidhau lumatā lupte pratyayalakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:49895: yatra tu lopaśabdena lupyate tatra pratyayalakṣaṇaṃ bhavaty eva, yathā he dīrghaho 'tra, dīrghāho nidāgha iti /
GS24jvkasipu:49896: atra hi halṅyābbhyaḥ iti lopena pratyayasya nivṛttiḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:49899: amnas ūdhas avas ity eteṣāṃ chandasi viṣaye ubhayathā bhavati, rurvā repho vā /
GS24jvkasipu:49903: yadā rutvaṃ tadā bhobhago 'gho 'pūrvasya yo 'śi (*8,3.17) iti yakāraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49904: chandasi bhāṣāyāṃ ca vibhāṣā pracetaso rājany upasaṅkhyānaṃ kartavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:49910: visarjanīyabādhanārtham atra pakṣe rephasya+eva repho vidhīyate //
GS24jvkasipu:49913: bhuvas ity etasya mahāvyāhṛteḥ chandasi viṣaye ubhayathā bhavati, rurvā repho vā /
GS24jvkasipu:49915: mahāvyāhṛteḥ iti kim ? bhuvo viśveṣu savaneṣu yajñiyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49916: bhuvaḥ ity etad avyavyam antarikṣavāci mahāvyāhṛtiḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:49919: sasajuṣo ruḥ (*8,2.66) ity ataḥ saḥ iti vartate, tena sambhavāt vyabhicārāc ca vasur eva viśeṣyate, na sraṃsudhvaṃsū, vyabhicārābhāvāt,
GS24jvkasipu:49921: vasvantasya padasya sakārāntasya sraṃsu, dhvaṃsu, anaḍuḥ ity eteṣāṃ ca dakārādeśo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:49935: rutve nāprāpte idam ārabhyate iti tad bādhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:49936: saṃyogāntalopas tu na+evam iti tena etad eva datvaṃ bādhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:49938: numastu vidhānasāmarthyānna bhavati, anaḍvān, he anaḍvan iti /
GS24jvkasipu:49943: tipi parataḥ sakārāntasya padasya anasteḥ dakāra ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49946: tipi iti kim ? cakāsteḥ kvip, cakāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49947: anasteḥ iti kim ? āpa eva+idaṃ salilaṃ sarvamāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49948: āḥ ity asteḥ laṅi tipi bahulaṃ chandasi (*7,3.97) iti īḍ na kṛtaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:49951: sipi parataḥ sakārāntasya padasya dhātoḥ ruḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:49958: dakārāntasya dhātoḥ padasya sipi parato ruḥ bhavati, dakāro vā /
GS24jvkasipu:49963: rephavakārāntasya dhātoḥ padasya upadhāyāḥ ikaḥ dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49970: ikaḥ iti kim ? atra+eva pratyudāharaṇe bhaśabdākārasya mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:49977: hali ca parato rephavakārāntasya dhātoḥ upadhāyāḥ ikaḥ dīrghaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49984: dhātoḥ ity eva, divam icchati divyati /
GS24jvkasipu:49992: dhātoḥ upadhābhūtau yau rephavakārau halparau tayoḥ upadhāyāḥ iko dīrgho bhavati hurcchā - hūrcchitā /
GS24jvkasipu:49996: hali ity eva, ciri, jiri - ciriṇoti /
GS24jvkasipu:49998: iha kasmān na bhavati, rī gatau riryatuḥ, riryuḥ, vī gatyādiṣu vivyatuḥ
GS24jvkasipu:49999: vivyuḥ iti ? yaṇādeśasya sthānivattvāt asiddhatvāc ca bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvena halparau rephavakārau na bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50000: caturyitā ity atra api bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt ato lopasya dhātoḥ upadhābhūto repho na bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:50001: pratidīvnā ity atra tu hali ca (*8,2.77) iti dīrghatvam, dīrghavidhau lopājādeśasya sthānivad bhāvapratiṣedhāt /
GS24jvkasipu:50002: asiddhaṃ bahiraṅgamantaraṅge ity etat tu nāśrayitavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:50003: uṇādayo 'vyutpannāni prātipadikāni iti jivriḥ, karyoḥ, giryoḥ ity evam
GS24jvkasipu:50007: rephavakārāntasya bhasya kur chur ity etayos ca dīrgho na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50015: adaso 'ser dād u do maḥ || PS_8,2.80 ||
GS24jvkasipu:50017: adaso 'sakārāntasya varṇasya dāt parasya uvarṇādeśo bhavati, dakārasya ca makāraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50020: bhāvyamānena apy ukāreṇa savarṇānāṃ grahaṇam iṣyate iti ekamātrikasya mātrikaḥ, dvimātrikasya dvimātrikaḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50021: aseḥ iti kim ? adaḥ icchati adasyati /
GS24jvkasipu:50023: okārarephayor api pratiṣedho yathā syāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:50026: tadarthaṃ kecit sūtraṃ varṇayanti, aḥ seḥ yasya so 'yam asiḥ, yatra sakārasya akāraḥ kriyate iti, tena tyadādyatvavidhāne etad anyatra na bhavitavyam eva iti /
GS24jvkasipu:50027: adryādeśe katham ? adaso 'dreḥ pṛthaṅ mutvaṃ kecid icchanti latvavat /
GS24jvkasipu:50030: yaiḥ aseḥ iti sakārasya pratiṣedhaḥ kriyate, anantyavikāre antyasadeśasya iti ca paribhāṣā na aśrīyate, teṣām ubhayor api mutvena bhavitavyam,
GS24jvkasipu:50031: amumuyaṅ, amumuyañcau, amumuyañcaḥ iti , yathā calīklṛpyate iti latvam /
GS24jvkasipu:50032: ye tu paribhāṣām āśrayanti teṣām antyasadeśasya eva bhavitavyam, adamuyaṅ,
GS24jvkasipu:50034: yeṣaṃ tu tyadādyatvaviṣaya eva mutvena bhavitavyam iti darśanam teṣām atra na bhavitavyam, adadryaṅ, adadryañcau, adadryañcaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:50035: dāt iti kim ? alo 'ntyasya mā bhūt, amuyā /
GS24jvkasipu:50039: adaso dakārād uttarasya ekārasya īkārādeśo bhavati, dakārasya ca makāraḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:50046: bahuvacane ity arthanirdeśo 'yam, pāribhāṣikasya hi bahuvacanasya grahaṇe amī ity atra na syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:50050: vākyasya ṭeḥ iti, plutaḥ iti ca, udāttaḥ iti ca, etat trayam apy adhikṛtaṃ veditavyamāpādaparisamāpteḥ
GS24jvkasipu:50051: yat iti ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ vākyasya ṭeḥ pluta udattaḥ ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:50057: ṭigrahaṇaṃ vyañjanāntyasya api ṭeracaḥ pluto yathā syāt, agnici3t iti //
GS24jvkasipu:50059: pratyabhivādo nāma yadabhivādyamāno gururāśiṣaṃ prayuṅkte, tatra aśūdraviṣaye yad vākyaṃ vartate tasya ṭeḥ pluta udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50061: aśūdre iti kim ? abhivādaye tuṣajako 'han, bho ayuṣmān edhi tuṣajaka /
GS24jvkasipu:50063: abhivādaye gārgyaham, bho āyuṣmatī bhava gārgi /
GS24jvkasipu:50064: asūyake 'pi kecit pratiṣedham icchanti, abhivādaye sthālyahaṃ bhoḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:50066: yāvac ca tasya asūyakatvaṃ na jñāyate tāvad eva pratyabhivādavākyam /
GS24jvkasipu:50067: tasmiṃstvasūyakatvena nirjñāte pratyabhivādaḥ eva na asti, kutaḥ plutaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50068: tathā hy uktam - asūyakastvaṃ jālma, na tvaṃ pratyabhivādanam arhasi,
GS24jvkasipu:50070: abhivādanavākye yat saṅkīrtitaṃ nāma gotraṃ vā, tad yatra pratyabhivādavākyānte prayujyate tatra plutiḥ iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:50071: iha na bhavati, devadatta kuśalyasi, devadatta āyuṣmān edhi iti /
GS24jvkasipu:50073: bho abhivādaye devadatto 'ham, āyuṣmānedhi devadatta bhoḥ3, āyuṣmanedhi devadatta bhoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50074: rājanya - abhivādaye indravarmā ahaṃ bhoḥ, āyuṣmānedhi indravarma3n,
GS24jvkasipu:50076: viś - abhivādaye indrapālito 'ham bhoḥ, āyusmānedhi indrapālita3,
GS24jvkasipu:50080: dūrād dhūte yad vākyaṃ vartate tasya ṭeḥ pluto bhavati, sa ca+udāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50084: dūraṃ yady apy apekṣābhedād anavasthitam, tathāpi hūtāpekṣaṃ yat
GS24jvkasipu:50085: tadāśrīyate iti yatra prākṛtāt prayatnād yatnaviśeṣe āśrīyamāṇe śabdaḥ śrūyate tad dūram /
GS24jvkasipu:50087: tena yatra apy āhvānaṃ na asti tatra api plutir bhavati, saktūn piba devadatta3, palāyasva devadatta3 iti /
GS24jvkasipu:50088: asyāś ca pluter ekaśrutyā samāveśaḥ iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:50089: dūrāt iti kim ? āgaccha bho māṇavaka devadatta /
GS24jvkasipu:50090: dūrādāhvāne vākyasyānte yatra sambodhanapadaṃ bhavati tatra ayaṃ plutaḥ iṣyate, tena+iha na bhavati, devadatta āgaccha //
GS24jvkasipu:50093: haiheprayoge yad vākyaṃ vartate tatra haihayoḥ eva pluto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50098: punar haihayor grahaṇam antyayor api yathā syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:50099: guror anṛto 'nantyasya apy ekaikasya prācām || PS_8,2.86 ||
GS24jvkasipu:50101: pratyabhivāde 'śūdre (*8,2.83) ity evam ādinā yaḥ pluto vihitaḥ, tasya+eva
GS24jvkasipu:50103: ṛkāravarjitasya guroḥ anantyasya, apiśabdād antyasya api ṭeḥ ekaikasya sambodhane vartamānasya pluto bhavati prācām ācāryāṇāṃ matena /
GS24jvkasipu:50106: guroḥ iti kim ? vakārāt parasya mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:50111: tad anena yad etad ucyate, sarva eva plutaḥ sāhasamanicchatā vibhāṣā kartavyaḥ iti tadupapannaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:50114: abhyādānaṃ prārambhaḥ, tatra yaḥ oṃśabdaḥ tasya pluto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50116: abhyādāne it kim ? om ity etad akṣaram udgītham upāsīta //
GS24jvkasipu:50119: ye ity etasya yajñakarmaṇi pluto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50121: yajñakarmaṇi iti kim ? ye yajāmaha iti pañcākṣaram iti svadhyāyakāle mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:50122: ye yajāmahe ity atra+eva ayaṃ plutaḥ iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:50123: iha hi na bhavati, ye devāso divyekādaśa stha iti //
GS24jvkasipu:50128: ka eṣa praṇavo nāma ? pādasya vā ardharcasya vā antyam akṣaram upasaṃgṛhya tadādyakṣaraśeṣasya sthāne trimātramokāram oṅkāraṃ vā vidadhati taṃ praṇava ity ācakṣate /
GS24jvkasipu:50132: okāraḥ sarvādeśo yathā syāt, vyañjanānte antyasya mā bhūt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:50133: yajñakarmaṇi ity eva, āpaṃ retāṃsi jinvati //
GS24jvkasipu:50136: yājyā nāma ye yājyākāṇḍe paṭhyante mantrāḥ, teṣām antyo yaḥ ṭiḥ sa plavate
GS24jvkasipu:50140: antagrahaṇaṃ kim ? yājyā nāma ṛcaḥ kāścidvākyasamudāyarūpaḥ, tatra yāvanti vākyāni teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ ṭeḥ plutaḥ prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:50144: brūhi preṣya śrauṣaṭ vauṣaṭ āvaha ity eteṣām ādeḥ pluto bhavati yajñakarmaṇi /
GS24jvkasipu:50150: āvaha devān yajamānāya ity evam ādāvayaṃ pluto na bhavati, sarve vidhayaḥ chandasi vikalpyante iti //
GS24jvkasipu:50157: tena iha na bhavati, agnīdagnīn vi hara barhiḥ stṛṇāhi iti /
GS24jvkasipu:50158: tadarthaṃ kecid vakṣyamāṇaṃ vibhāṣa ity abhisambadhnanti, sā ca vyavasthitavibhāṣā iti
GS24jvkasipu:50159: apara āha - sarva eva plutaḥ sāhasamanicchatā vibhāṣa vijñeyaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:50160: iha tu, uddhara3 uddhara, abhihara3 abhihara iti chāndasaḥ plutavyatyayaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:50165: akārṣīḥ kaṭaṃ devadatta ? akārṣaṃ hi3, akārṣaṃ hi /
GS24jvkasipu:50166: alāvīḥ kedāraṃ devadatta ? alāviṣaṃ hi3, alāviṣaṃ hi /
GS24jvkasipu:50167: pṛṣṭaprativacane iti kim ? kaṭaṃ kariṣyati hi /
GS24jvkasipu:50173: tatra nigṛhyānuyoge yad vākyaṃ vartate tasya ṭeḥ pluto bhavati vibhāṣā /
GS24jvkasipu:50174: anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti kenacit pratijñātam, tam upālipsuḥ upapatibhir nigṛhya sabhyasūyam anuyuṅkte, anityaḥ śabda ity āttha3, anityaḥ śabda ity āttha /
GS24jvkasipu:50175: adya śrāddham ity āttha3, adya śrāddham ity āttha /
GS24jvkasipu:50177: adya amāvāsyā ity evaṃ vādī yuktyā pracyāvya svamatād evam anuyujyate //
GS24jvkasipu:50180: vākyādeḥ āmantritasya iti bhartsane dvirvacanam uktam, tasya āmreḍitaṃ plavate /
GS24jvkasipu:50181: caura caura3, vṛṣala vṛṣala3, dasyo dasyo3, ghātayisyāmi tvā,
GS24jvkasipu:50188: aṅga ity anena yuktaṃ tiṅantam ākāṅkṣaṃ bhartsane plavate /
GS24jvkasipu:50189: aṅga kja3, aṅga vyāhara3, idānīṃ jñāsyasi jālma /
GS24jvkasipu:50190: tiṅ iti kim ? aṅga devadatta, mithyā vadasi /
GS24jvkasipu:50193: bhartsane ity eva, agādhīṣva, odanaṃ te dāsyami //
GS24jvkasipu:50196: pramāṇena vastuparīkṣaṇaṃ vicāraḥ, tasya viṣaye vicaryamāṇānāṃ vākyānāṃ ṭeḥ pluto bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:50199: yūpe tiṣṭhet, yūpe anupraharet iti vicāryate //
GS24jvkasipu:50202: bhāṣāyāṃ viṣaye vicāryamāṇānāṃ pūrvam eva plavate /
GS24jvkasipu:50210: śravaṇābhimukhyaṃ ca tatra aviśeṣāt sarvasya grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:50211: pratiśravaṇe yad vākyaṃ vartate tasya ṭeḥ pluto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50212: māṃ me dehi bhoḥ, ahaṃ te dadāmi3 /
GS24jvkasipu:50217: anudāttaḥ pluto bhavati praśnānte, abhipūjite ca agama3ḥ pūrvā3n grāmā3n
GS24jvkasipu:50218: grāmā3n agnibhūtā3i, paṭā3u ? agnibhūte, paṃṭo ity etayoḥ praśnānte vartamānayoṇ anudāttaḥ pluto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50219: agamaḥ ity evam ādīnāṃ tu anantyasya api praśnākhyānayoḥ (*8,2.105) iti svaritaḥ pluto bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:50224: cit ity etasmin nipāte upamārthe prayujyamāne vākyasya ṭeḥ anudāttaḥ pluto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50225: pluto 'py atra vidhīyate, na guṇamātram agnicid bhāyā3t /
GS24jvkasipu:50227: agniriva bhāyāt, rājeva bhāyāt ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50233: uparisvidāsīt ity etasya ṭeḥ anudattaḥ pluto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50235: adhaḥ svidāsīd ity atra vicāryamāṇānām (*8,2.97) iti udāttaḥ plutaḥ, upari svidāsīt ity atra tu anena anudāttaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:50238: svaritaḥ pluto bhavati āmreḍite parataḥ asūyāyām, sammatau, kope, kutsane ca gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:50239: vākyāder āmantritasya asūyā-sammati-kopa-kutsana-bhartsaneṣu (*8,1.8) iti dvirvacanam uktam, tatra ayaṃ plutavidhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50240: asūyāyāṃ tavat - māṇavaka3 māṇavaka, abhirūpaka3 abhirūpaka, riktaṃ ta ābhirūpyatm /
GS24jvkasipu:50241: sammatau - māṇavaka3 māṇavaka, abhirūpaka3 abhirūpaka, śobhanaḥ khalv asi
GS24jvkasipu:50242: kope - māṇavaka3 māṇavaka, avinītaka3 avinītaka, idānīṃ jñāsyasi jālma /
GS24jvkasipu:50243: kutsane - śāktīka3 śāktīka, yāṣṭīka3 yāṣṭīka, riktā te śaktiḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:50249: kṣiyā ācarabhedaḥ, āśīḥ prārthanāviśeṣaḥ, śabdena vyāpāraṇam praiṣaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:50250: eteṣu gamyamāneṣu tiṅantam ākāṅkṣaṇaṃ yat tasya svaritaḥ pluto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50251: ākāṅkṣati iti ākāṅkṣam, tiṅantam uttarapadam ākāṅkṣati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50252: kṣiyāyāṃ tāvat - svayaṃ rathena yāti3, upādhyāyaṃ padātiṃ gamayati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:50253: svayam odanaṃ ha bhuṅkte3, upādhyāyaṃ saktūn pāyayati /
GS24jvkasipu:50254: pūrvam atra tiṅantam uttarapadam ākāṅkṣati iti sākāṅkṣaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50255: āśiṣi - sutāṃś ca lapsīṣṭa3 dhanaṃ ca tāta /
GS24jvkasipu:50257: praiṣe - kaṭaṃ kuru3 grāmaṃ ca gaccha /
GS24jvkasipu:50259: ākāṅkṣam iti kim ? dīrghaṃ te āyurastu /
GS24jvkasipu:50263: padasya iti vartate, svaritam iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:50264: anantyasya api antyasyāpi padasya ṭeḥ pluto bhavati praśne ākhyāne ca /
GS24jvkasipu:50265: sarveṣam eva padānām eṣa svaritaḥ plutaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50266: antyasya anudāttaṃ praśnāntābhipūjitayoḥ (*8,2.100) iti anudatto 'pi pakṣe bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50271: tatra aicaḥ plutaprasaṅge tadavayavabhūtau idutau plutau /
GS24jvkasipu:50272: atra yadevarṇovarṇayoḥ avarṇasya ca saṃvibhāgaḥ, tadā idutau dvimātrāvanena plutau kriyete
GS24jvkasipu:50274: idutau plavete vṛddhiṃ gacchataḥ ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50275: tāvatī ca sā plutir bhavati yayā tāvecau trimātrau sampadyete /
GS24jvkasipu:50276: yadā tu ardhamātrā avarṇasya adhyardhamātrā ivarṇovarṇayoḥ, tadā tau ardhatṛtīyamātrau kriyete iti /
GS24jvkasipu:50277: bhaṣye tu uktam, iṣyate eva caturmātraḥ plutaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:50278: tat katham ? samapravibhāgapakṣe idutor anena trimātraḥ pluto vidhīyate //
GS24jvkasipu:50279: eco 'pragṛhyasya adūrādhdūte pūrvasya ardhasya ad uttarasya+idutau ||
GS24jvkasipu:50281: eco 'pragṛhyasya adūrād dhūte plutaviṣayasya ardhasya akāraḥ ādeśo
GS24jvkasipu:50282: bhavati, sa ca plutaḥ, uttarasye - kārokārāvādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50285: praśnānte - agama3ḥ pūrvā3n grāmā3n agnibhūtā3i, paṭā3u /
GS24jvkasipu:50286: abhipūjite - bhadraṃ karoṣi māṇavaka3 agnibhūtā3i, paṭā3u /
GS24jvkasipu:50287: vicāryamāṇe - hotavyaṃ dīkṣitasya gṛhā3i pratyabhivāde - āyuṣmān edhi agnibhūtā3i, paṭā3u
GS24jvkasipu:50289: so 'yam ākaraḥ pluto yathāviṣayam udātto 'nudāttaḥ svarito veditavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50291: parigaṇanaṃ kim ? viṣṇubhūte viṣṇubhūte3 ghātayiṣyāmi tvā /
GS24jvkasipu:50293: parigaṇane ca sati adūrād dhūte iti na vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:50295: iha mā bhūt, bhadraṃ karoṣi gauḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:50296: apragṛhyasya iti kim ? śobhane khalu staḥ khaṭve3 /
GS24jvkasipu:50301: tayoḥ idutoḥ yakāravakārādeśau bhavato 'ci saṃhitāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:50303: ita utaram ādhyāyaparisamāpteḥ yad vakṣyāmaḥ saṃhitāyām ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:50307: idutor asiddhatvāt iko yaṇaci (*6,1.77) iti na prāpnoti ity ayam ārambhaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:50308: athāpi kathañcit tayoḥ siddhatvaṃ syāt, evam api svarṇadīrghatvanivṛttyarthaṃ śākalanivṛttyarthaṃ ca vaktvayam etat /
GS24jvkasipu:50309: athāpi tan nivṛttyarthaṃ yatnāntaram asti, tathāpi yaṇsvaranivṛttyartham idam ārabhyate
GS24jvkasipu:50312: kiṃ nu yaṇā bhavati iha na siddhaṃ yvāvidutoryadayaṃ vidadhāti /
GS24jvkasipu:50313: tau ca mama svarasandhiṣu sidddhau śākaladīrghavidhī tu nivartyau //
GS24jvkasipu:50314: ik tu yadā bhavati plutapūrvas tasya yaṇaṃ vidadhātyapavādam /
GS24jvkasipu:50315: tena tayoś ca na śākaladīrghau yaṇsvarabadhanam eva tu hetuḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:50316: iti śrīvāmanaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau aṣṭamādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50321: matvantasya vasvantasya ca padasya ruḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati sambuddhau parataḥ chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:50322: matvantasya tāvat - indra marutva iha pāhi somam /
GS24jvkasipu:50324: maruto 'sya santi, harayo 'sya santi iti matup /
GS24jvkasipu:50325: suptakārayoḥ halṅyādilope saṃyogāntasya lope ca kṛte nakārasya ruḥ bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:50326: vasvantasya khalv api - mīḍhvastokāya tanayāya mṛla /
GS24jvkasipu:50330: sambuddhau iti kim ? ya evaṃ vidvān agnim upatiṣṭhate /
GS24jvkasipu:50337: chandasi bhāṣāyāṃ ca bhavat bhagavat aghavat ity eteṣāṃ vibhāṣa ruḥ
GS24jvkasipu:50344: atha vā bho ity evam ādayo nipātā draṣṭavyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50348: tathā striyām api ca dṛśyante, bho brāhmaṇi ityādi /
GS24jvkasipu:50349: saṃhitādhikāra uttaratra upayujyate, yatra bhinnapadasthau nimittanimittinau naśchavyapraśān (*8,3.7) iti //
GS24jvkasipu:50353: ita uttaraṃ yasya sthāne ruḥ vidhīyate tataḥ pūrvasya tu varṇasya vā anunāsiko bhavati ity etad adhikṛtaṃ veditavyam, yad ita ūrdhvam
GS24jvkasipu:50360: adhikāraparimāṇāparigrahe hi sati ḍho ḍhe lopa (*8,3.13) ity atra api
GS24jvkasipu:50364: aṭi parato roḥ pūrvasya ākārasya sthāne nityam anunāsikādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50365: dīrghādaṭi samānapāde (*8,3.9) iti tvaṃ vakṣyati, tataḥ pūrvasya āto
GS24jvkasipu:50370: kecid anusvāram adhīyate sa cchāndaso vyatyayo draṣṭavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50371: ātaḥ iti kim ? ye vā vanaspatīṃranu /
GS24jvkasipu:50379: anunāsikādanyo yo varṇaḥ roḥ pūrvaḥ, yasya anunāsikaḥ na kṛtaḥ, tataḥ paro 'nusvāra āgamaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50391: kecit tu paraśabdam eva anyārthaṃ varṇayanti /
GS24jvkasipu:50392: anunāsikāt paraḥ anunāsikāt anyaḥ anusvāro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50393: yasmin pakṣe 'nunāsiko na asti tatra anusvārāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50394: sa tu kasya āgamo bhavati ? roḥ pūrvasya+eva+iti vartate, vyākhyānād ādeśo na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:50397: samaḥ ity etasya ruḥ bhavati suṭi parataḥ saṃhitāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:50404: atra rorvisarjanīye kṛte vā śari (*8,3.66) iti pakṣe visarjanīya eva prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:50406: tena atra nityaṃ sakāra eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50407: asminneva sūtre sakārādeśo vā nirdiśyate, samaḥ suṭi iti dvisakārako nirdeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50411: ruvidhau hy aniṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ, saṃsskartā, puṃsskāmā, kāṃsskān iti //
GS24jvkasipu:50413: pum ity etasya ruḥ bhavati ampare khayi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50418: puṃskāmā ity atra visarjanīyasya kupvoḥ ḥkaḥpau ca (*8,3.37) iti prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:50420: dvisakārakanirdeśapakṣe tu pūrvasmād eva sūtrāt saḥ ity anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:50421: rutvam tu anuvartamānam api nātrābhisambadhyate, sambandhānuvṛttistasya iti /
GS24jvkasipu:50430: nakārāntasya padasya praśānvarjitasya ruḥ bhavati ampare chavi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50442: nakārāntasya padasya chavi parataḥ ampare ubhayathā ṛkṣu bhavati, rurvā nakāro vā /
GS24jvkasipu:50444: ṛkṣu iti kim ? tāṃstvaṃ khāda sukhāditān //
GS24jvkasipu:50448: dīrghād uttarasya padāntasya nakārasya ruḥ bhavati aṭi parataḥ, tau cen nimittanimittinau samānapāde bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50449: ṛkṣu iti prakṛtatvād ṛkpādaḥ iha gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:50451: devāṃ acchā dīdyat mahāṃ indro ya ojasā /
GS24jvkasipu:50458: nṝn ity etasya nakārasya rurbhavati paśabde parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50463: ubhayathā ity api kecid anuvartayanti nṝn pāhi ity api yathā syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:50466: svatavān ity etasya nakārasya rurbhavati pāyuśabde parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50470: kān ity etasya nakārsya ruḥ bhavati āmreḍite parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50474: tena kupvoḥ ḥkaḥpau ca (*8,3.37) iti na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50475: samaḥ suṭi (*8,3.5) ity ato vā sakāro 'nuvartate, sa eva atra vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:50476: pūrveṣu yogeṣu sambandhāvṛttyā gatasya roḥ atra anabhisambandhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50477: āmreḍite iti kim ? kān kān paśyati /
GS24jvkasipu:50482: saty api padādhikāre tasya asambhavād apadāntasya ḍhakārasya ayaṃ lopo vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:50486: śvaliḍ ḍhau kate ity atra tu jaśve kṛte kāryaṃ na asti iti lopābhāvaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50487: na ca ḍhalopo jaśtvāpavādo vijñātuṃ śakyate, tasya hi līḍhādiḥ viṣayaḥ sambhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50489: śāstrakṛtaṃ tu yadā nānantaryaṃ ṣṭutvasya asiddhatvena prāptam, tat tu sūtrakaraṇasāmarthyād bādhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:50490: śvaliḍ ḍhaukate ity atra tu na śrutikṛtamanantaryam, na śāstrakṛtam iti
GS24jvkasipu:50501: padasya ity atra viśeṣaṇe ṣaṣṭhī, tena apadāntasya api rephasya lopo bhavati, jargṛdheḥ ajarghāḥ, pāspardheḥ apāspāḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:50505: rephāntasya padasya khari parato 'vasāne ca visarjanīyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50514: iha nṛkuṭyāṃ bhavaḥ nārkuṭaḥ, nṛpater apatyaṃ nārpatyaḥ iti vṛddher bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt tadāśrayasya rephasya asiddhaṃ bahiraṅgam iti
GS24jvkasipu:50518: ru ity asya rephasya supi parato visarjanīyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50523: siddhe satyārambho niyamārthaḥ, ror eva supi visarjanīyādeśaḥ, na anyasya /
GS24jvkasipu:50527: bhor bhagor aghor ity evaṃ pūrvasya avarṇapūrvasya ca roḥ rephasya yakārādeśo bhavati aśi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50543: hali sarveṣām (*8,3.22) ity ayaṃ lopaḥ aśi hali yathā syāt, iha mā bhūt,
GS24jvkasipu:50544: vṛkṣaṃ vṛścati iti vṛkṣavṛṭ, tamācaṣṭe yaḥ sa vṛkṣavayati, vṛkṣavayater apratyayaḥ vṛkṣav karoti /
GS24jvkasipu:50545: atha tatra+eva aśgrahaṇaṃ kasmān na kṛtam ? uttarārtham, mo 'nusvāraḥ
GS24jvkasipu:50547: vyor laghupratyatnataraḥ śākaṭāyanasya (*8,3.18), lopaḥ śākalyasya (*8,3.19) ity etac ca vṛkṣav karoti ity atra mā bhūt ity aśgrahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:50552: vakārayakārayoḥ bhobhagoaghoavarṇapūrvayoḥ padāntayo laghuprayatnatara ādeśo bhavati aśi parataḥ śākaṭāyanasya ācaryasya matena /
GS24jvkasipu:50567: vakārayakārayoḥ padāntayoḥ avarṇapūrvayoḥ lopo bhavati śākalyasya ācāryasya matena aśi parataḥ
GS24jvkasipu:50574: tena yadā 'pi laghuprayatnataro na bhavati ādeśaḥ, tadāpi vyoḥ pakṣe
GS24jvkasipu:50578: okārād uttarasya yakārasya lopo bhavati gārgyasya ācāryasya matena aśi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50585: yo 'yamalaghuprayatnasya vikalpena lopaḥ kriyate so 'nena nivartyate /
GS24jvkasipu:50590: kecit tu sarvam eva yakāram atra na+icchanti //
GS24jvkasipu:50593: avarṇapūrvayoḥ vyoḥ padāntayor lopo bhavati uñi ca pade parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50596: pade iti kim ? tantra utam, tantrayutam /
GS24jvkasipu:50597: veñaḥ samprasāraṇe kṛte uñiti bhūtapūrveṇa ñakāreṇa śakyate pratipattum iti /
GS24jvkasipu:50598: atha uñ ity evaṃ rūpo nipātaḥ pratipadokto 'sti ? tadā lākṣaṇikatvād veñādeśasya grahaṇam iha na asti, uttarārthaṃ padagrahaṇaṃ kriyate //
GS24jvkasipu:50601: hali parataḥ bhobhagoaghoapūrvasya yakārasya padāntasya lopo bhavati sarveṣām ācāryāṇāṃ matena
GS24jvkasipu:50609: sarveṣāṃ grahaṇaṃ śākaṭāyanasya api lopo yathā syāt, laghuprayatnataro mā bhūt iti //
GS24jvkasipu:50612: makārasya padāntasya anusvāraḥ ādeśo bhavati hali parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50623: nakārāsya makārasya ca apadāntasya anusvārādeśo bhavati jhali parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50635: samo makārasya makāraḥ ādeśo bhavati rājatau kvippratyayānte parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50646: hakāre makārapare parato makārasya vā makāra ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50650: yavalapare hakāre makārasya yavalā yathāsaṅkhyaṃ vā bhavanti iti vaktavyam
GS24jvkasipu:50656: nakārapare he parataḥ makārasya vā nakārādeśaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50661: ṅakāraṇakārayoḥ padāntayoḥ kuk ṭuk ity etāv āgamau vā bhavataḥ śari parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50666: pūrvantakaraṇaṃ prāṅk chete ity atra chantvartham /
GS24jvkasipu:50667: śaścho 'ṭi (*8,4.63) iti hi padantāj jhayaḥ iti tad vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:50668: iha mā bhūt, purā krūrasya visṛpo virapśin /
GS24jvkasipu:50669: prāṅk sāyaḥ ity atra api sāt padādyoḥ (*8,3.111) iti ṣatvapratiṣedhārthaṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:50670: vaṇṭ sāyaḥ ity atra ca na padāntāṭ ṭoranām (*8,4.42) ṣṭutvapratiṣedhārtham
GS24jvkasipu:50673: ḍakārantāt padāt uttarasya sakārādeḥ padasya vā dhuḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50676: parādikaraṇaṃ na padāntāṭ ṭoranām (*8,4.42) iti ṣṭutvapratiṣedhārtham //
GS24jvkasipu:50679: nakārāntāt padāt uttarasya sakārasya vā dhuḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50682: dhuṭaḥ cartvasya ca asiddhatvāt naśchavyapraśān (*8,3.7) iti rutvaṃ na
GS24jvkasipu:50686: nakārasya padantasya śakāre parato vā tugāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50689: yady evaṃ kurvajcchete ity atra nakārasya apadāntatvāt ṇatvaṃ prāpnoti ?
GS24jvkasipu:50690: tatra samadhimāhuḥ, stoḥ ścunā ścuḥ (*8,4.40) ity atra yogavibhāgaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:50691: kriyate, ṇatvapratiṣedhārthaṃ stoḥ ścunā ṇakāro na bhavati iti, tataḥ ścuḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:50692: ṅamo hrasvād aci ṅamuṇ nityam || PS_8,3.32 ||
GS24jvkasipu:50694: hrasvāt paraḥ yo ṅam tadantāt padāt uttarasya acaḥ ṅamuḍāgamo bhavati nityam /
GS24jvkasipu:50707: iha paramadaṇḍinau, paramadaṇdinā iti uttarapadatve cāpadādividhau iti pratyayalakṣaṇapratiṣedhād uttarapadasya padatvaṃ na asti iti ṅamuṭ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50708: atha vā, uñi ca pade (*8,3.21) ity ataḥ saptamyantaṃ pade ity anuvarvate /
GS24jvkasipu:50712: maya uttarasya uño vā vakārādeśo bhavati aci parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50716: pragṛhyatvāt uñaḥ prakṛtibhāve prāpte vakāro vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:50717: tasya asiddhatvād hali iti mo 'nusvāraḥ (*8,3.23) na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:50721: visarjanīyasya sakāraḥ ādeśaḥ bhavati khari parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50736: śarpare khari parato visarjanīyasya visarjanīyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50743: na iti vaktavye visarjanīyasya visarjanīyādeśavidhānaṃ vikāranivṛttyartham, tena jihvamūlīyopadhmanīyau na bhavataḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:50746: visarjanīyasya visarjanīyādeśo vā bhavati śari pare /
GS24jvkasipu:50755: kavargapavargayoḥ parato visarjanīyasya yathāsaṅkhyam ḥkaḥpa ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ, cakārād visarjanīyaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:50762: visarjanīyasya saḥ (*8,3.34) ity etasminnāprāpte idam ārabhyate iti etasya
GS24jvkasipu:50763: bādhakam, śarpare visarjanīyaḥ (*8,3.35) ity etat tu na bādhyate, vāsaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:50765: pūrvatrāsiddhe nāsti vipratiṣedho 'bhāvād uttarasya iti śarpare
GS24jvkasipu:50767: kecit tu etad arthaṃ yogavibhāgaṃ kurvanti /
GS24jvkasipu:50768: kupvoḥ śarparayoḥ visarjanīyasya visarjanīyaḥ ādeśo bhavati, kimartham
GS24jvkasipu:50769: idam, ḥkaḥpau ca iti vakṣyati, tadvādhanārtham iti //
GS24jvkasipu:50772: sakāra ādeśaḥ bhavati visarjanīyasya kupvoḥ apadādyoḥ parataḥ pāśakalpakakāmyeṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:50783: iha mā bhūt, prātaḥ kalpam, punaḥ kalpam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:50785: ror eva kāmye na anyasya iti niyamārthaṃ vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:50790: upadhmānīyasya kavarge parataḥ sakārādeśo bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:50791: kiṃ prayojanam ? ubjirupadhmānīyopadhaḥ paṭhyate iti darśane abhyudgaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:50796: iṇaḥ uttarasya visarjanīyasya ṣakārādeśo bhavati kupvor apadādyoḥ parataḥ pāśakalpakakāmyeṣu
GS24jvkasipu:50811: ita uttaraṃ saḥ iti, iṇaḥ saḥ iti ca vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:50812: tatra iṇaḥ paro yo visarjanīyaḥ tasya ṣakāro bhavati, anyasya sakāro bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:50815: namas puras ity etayoḥ gatisañjñakayoḥ visarjanīyasya sakārādeśo bhavati kupvoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50819: gatyoḥ iti kim ? pūḥ, purau, puraḥ karoti //
GS24jvkasipu:50822: ikāropadhasya ukāropadhasya ca apratyayasya visarjanīyasya ṣakāra ādeśo bhavati kupvoḥ parataḥ
GS24jvkasipu:50840: mātuḥ karoti, pituḥ karoti, atra rāt sasya (*8,2.24) iti sakāralope kṛte
GS24jvkasipu:50841: rephasya yo visarjanīyaḥ, tasya apratyayavisarjanīyatvāt ṣatvaṃ prāpnoti ?
GS24jvkasipu:50842: kaskādiṣu tu mrātuṣputragrahaṇaṃ jñāpakam ekādeśanimittatvāt ṣatvapratiṣedhasya /
GS24jvkasipu:50852: tirasaḥ visarjanīyasya anyatarasyāṃ sakārādeśo bhavati kupvoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50858: tiraḥ kartavyam gater ity eva, tiraḥ kṛtvā kāṇḍaṃ gataḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:50862: dvis tris catur ity eteṣāṃ kṛtvo 'rthe vartamanānāṃ visarjanīyasya ṣakāra
GS24jvkasipu:50873: idudupadhasya ity etasya anuvṛttau satyāṃ krtvo 'rthaviṣayeṇa ca padena visarjanīye viśeṣyamāṇe dvistriścatur iti śakyamakartum /
GS24jvkasipu:50875: ṣatvaṃ vibhāṣayā bhūnnanu siddhaṃ tatra pūrveṇa //
GS24jvkasipu:50876: siddhe hy ayaṃ vidhatte caturaḥ satvaṃ yadāpi kṛtvo 'rthe /
GS24jvkasipu:50878: evaṃ sati tvidānīṃ dvistriścatur ity anena kiṃ kāryam /
GS24jvkasipu:50879: anyo hi nedudupadhaḥ kṛtvo 'rthaḥ kaścid apy asti //
GS24jvkasipu:50881: caturo na sidhyati tadā rephasya visarjanīyo hi //
GS24jvkasipu:50882: tasmiṃs tu kriyamāṇe yuktaṃ caturo viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50883: prakṛtaṃ padaṃ tadantaṃ tasya api viśeṣaṇaṃ nyāyyam //
GS24jvkasipu:50884: evaṃ tu kriyamāṇe dvistriścaturgrahaṇe catuḥśabdasya kṛtvo 'rthe 'pi
GS24jvkasipu:50886: pūrvatra siddhe na asti vipratiṣedho 'bhāvād uttarasya //
GS24jvkasipu:50890: is us ity etayoḥ visarjanīyasya anyatarasyāṃ ṣakārādeśo bhavati sāmarthye kupvoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50891: sarpiṣkaroti, sarpiḥ karoti yajuskaroti, yajuḥ karoti /
GS24jvkasipu:50892: sāmarthye iti kim ? tiṣṭhatu sarpiḥ, piva tvamudakam /
GS24jvkasipu:50893: sāmarthyam iha vyapekṣā, na punar ekārthībhāvaḥ, ubhayaṃ vā //
GS24jvkasipu:50897: samāsaviṣaye isusoḥ visarjanīyasua anuttarapadasthasya nityaṃ ṣtvaṃ bhavati kupvoḥ parataḥ
GS24jvkasipu:50905: etad eva anuttarapadasthasya iti vacanaṃ jñāpakam isusoḥ pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt sa vihitaḥ tadādeḥ ity ayaṃ niyamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50906: tena vākye 'pi paramasarpiṣkaroti, paramasarpiḥ karoti, isusoḥ sāmarthye (*8,3.44) ity etad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50907: vyapekṣā ca tatra sāmarthyamāśritam iti samāse na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:50910: akārād uttarasya anavyayavisarjanīyasya samāse anuttarapadasthasya nityaṃ sakārādeśo bhavati kṛ kami kaṃsa kumbha pātra kuśā karṇī ity eteṣu parataḥ
GS24jvkasipu:50919: ayaskumbhī, payaskumbhī ity atra api bhavati, prātipadikagrahaṇe liṅgaviśiṣṭasya api grahaṇam bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:50927: śunaskarṇaḥ ity ayaṃ tu kaskādiṣu draṣṭavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50931: bhāskaraḥ ity ayaṃ tu kaskādiṣu draṣtavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50941: adhas śiras ity etayoḥ visarjanīyasya samāse anuttarapadasthasya sakāraḥ ādeśo bhavati padaśabde parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50951: kaska ity evam ādisu ca visarjanīyasya sakāraḥ vā yathāyogamādeśo bhavati kupvoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50959: krīṇāter ayaṃ sampadāditvāt kvip pratyayaḥ, tatra bhavaḥ kratuḥ sādyaskraḥ
GS24jvkasipu:50961: dhanuṣkapālam, varhiṣpūlam, yajuṣpātram ity eṣāṃ pāṭhaḥ uttarapadasthasya api ṣatvaṃ yathā syād iti /
GS24jvkasipu:50962: paramasrpiḥphalam ity evam ādi pratyudāharaṇāt iti pārāyaṇikā āhuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50963: bhāṣye vṛttau ca nityaṃ samāse 'nuttarapadasthasya (*8,3.45) ity atra praramasarpiḥkuṇdikā ity etad eva pratyudāharaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:50969: chandasi viṣaye visarjanīyasya vā sakārādeśoḥ bhavati kupvoḥ parataḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:50976: sūryaraśmirharikeśaḥ purastāt, sa naḥ pāvaka ity evam ādiṣu sarve viṣayaśchandasi vikalpyante iti satvaṃ na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:50979: kaḥ karat karati kṛdhi kṛta ity eteṣu parataḥ anaditeḥ visarjanīyasya sakārādeśo bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:50983: anaditeḥ iti kim ? yathā no aditiḥ karat //
GS24jvkasipu:50987: pañcamīvisarjanīyasya sakārādeśo bhavati parau parataḥ adhyarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:50992: pañcamāḥ iti kim ? ahiriva bhogaiḥ paryeti bāhum /
GS24jvkasipu:50993: parau iti kim ? ebhyo vā etal lokebhyaḥ prajāpatiḥ samairayat /
GS24jvkasipu:50994: adhyathe iti kim ? divaspṛthivyāḥ paryeja udbhṛtam /
GS24jvkasipu:50998: pātau ca dhātau parataḥ pañcamīvisarjanīyasya bahulaṃ sakārādeśaḥ bhavati chandasi visaye
GS24jvkasipu:51005: ṣaṣthīvisarjanīyasya sakārādeśo bhavati pati putra pṛṣṭha pāra pada payas poṣa ity eteṣu parataḥ chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:51013: ṣaṣṭhyāḥ iti kim ? manuḥ putrebhyo dāyaṃ vyabhajat //
GS24jvkasipu:51016: iḍāyāḥ ṣaṣthīvisarjanīyasya vā sakāra ādeśo bhavati patyādiṣu parataḥ chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:51027: apadāntasya iti, mūrdhanyaḥ iti caitad adhikṛtam veditavyam āpādaparisamāpteḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51035: ṣaḥ ity evaṃ siddhe mūrdhanyagrahaṇaṃ ḍhakārārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:51040: saher dhātoḥ sāḍrūpasya yaḥ sakāraḥ tasya mūrdhanyaḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51044: saheḥ iti kim ? saha ḍena vartate saḍaḥ, tasya apatyaṃ sādiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51045: sāḍgrahaṇaṃ kim ? yatrāsya etad rūpaṃ tatra yathā syāt, iha mā bhūt
GS24jvkasipu:51048: saḥ iti kim ? ākārasya mā bhūt //
GS24jvkasipu:51052: ita uttaraṃ yad vakṣyāmaḥ, iṇaḥ kavargāc ca ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:51068: nuṃvyavāye 'pi visarjanīyavyavāye 'pi śarvyavāye 'pi uttarasya sakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51079: tena iha na bhavati, niṃsse, niṃssvaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:51080: ṇisi cumbane ity etasya etad rūpam /
GS24jvkasipu:51081: atra hi numā, sakāreṇa śarā ca vyavadhānam //
GS24jvkasipu:51084: mūrdhanyaḥ iti vartate, sa iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:51086: ādeśo yaḥ sakāraḥ, pratyayasya ca yaḥ sakāraḥ iṇkor uttaraḥ tasya mūrdhanyo bhavati ādeśaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:51093: indro mā vakṣat, sa devān yakṣat iti vyapadeśivadbhāvāt pratyayasya iti ṣatvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51094: yajater vahateś ca pañcamalakāre parasmaipadaprathamaikavacane ikāralopaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:51095: leṭo 'ḍaṭau (*3,4.94) iti aṭ, sibbahulaṃ leṭi (*3,1.34) iti sip, tataḥ siddhaṃ yakṣat, vakṣat iti //
GS24jvkasipu:51098: śāsi vasi ghasi ity eteṣāṃ ca iṇkoḥ uttarasya yakārasya mūrdhanyo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51110: ghasir yady apy ādeśaḥ, sakārastvādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51116: stauteḥ ṇyantānāṃ ca ṣabhūte sani parataḥ abhyāsāt iṇaḥ uttarasya ādeśasakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51121: siddhe satyārambho niyamārthaḥ, stautiṇyoḥ eva ṣaṇi abhyāsād yathā syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:51126: stautiṇyoḥ ṣaṇi eva iti hi vijñāyamāne tuṣṭāva ity atra na syāt, iha ca syād eva sisikṣati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:51127: ṣaṇi iti kim ? anyatra niyamo mā bhūt, siṣeca /
GS24jvkasipu:51128: ko vinate 'nurodhaḥ ? avinate niyamo mā bhūt, suṣupsati /
GS24jvkasipu:51130: kaḥ sānubandhe 'nurodhaḥ ? ṣaśabdamātre niyamo mā bhūt, suṣupiṣa indram /
GS24jvkasipu:51131: abhyāsāt iti kim ? abhyāsāt yā prāptiḥ tasyā niyamo yathā syāt, dhātoḥ yā prāptis tasyā niyamo mā bhūt, pratīṣiṣati /
GS24jvkasipu:51135: svidi svadi sahi ity eteṣāṃ ṇyantānāṃ sani ṣabhūte parato 'bhyāsād
GS24jvkasipu:51144: prāk sitasaṃśabdanād yān ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ tatra aḍvyavāye 'pi
GS24jvkasipu:51145: mūrdhanyo bhavati ity evaṃ tad veditavyam, apiśabdād anaḍvyavāye 'pi /
GS24jvkasipu:51158: upasargāt sunoti ity atra sthāsenayasedha iti sthādayaḥ, tesu sthādiṣu prāk sitasaṃśabdanāt abhyāsena vyavāye mūrdhanyo bhavati, abhyāsasakārasya ca bhavati ity evaṃ veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:51159: abhyāsena vyavāye aṣopadeśārthaṃ ca abhiṣiṣeṇayiṣati, pariṣiṣeṇayiṣati /
GS24jvkasipu:51162: abhyāsasya iti vacanam niyamārtham, sthādiṣu eva abhyāsasakārasy mūrdhanyo
GS24jvkasipu:51169: mūrdhanya iti vartate, saḥ iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:51170: upasargasthān nimittāt uttarasya sunoti suvati syati stauti stobhati sthā senaya sedha sica sañja svañja ity eteṣāṃ sakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:51228: nirgatāḥ secakā usmasad deśāt niḥsecako deśaḥ iti nāyaṃ siceḥ upsargaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51229: abhisāvakoyati ity atra api na sunotiṃ prati kiryāyogaḥ, kiṃ tarhi ?
GS24jvkasipu:51231: abhiṣāvayati ity atra tu sunotimeva prati kriyāyogaḥ, na sāvaryatiṃ prati
GS24jvkasipu:51235: sadeḥ sakārasya upasargasthān nimittāt aprateḥ uttarasya mūrdhanya ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51246: stanbheḥ sakārasya upasargasthān nimittāt uttarasya mūrdhanya murdhanya ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51253: aprateḥ ity etad iha na anuvartate, tena etad api bhavati, pratiṣṭabhnāti,
GS24jvkasipu:51257: avaśabdāt upasargāt uttarasya stanbheḥ sakārasya mūrdhanyaḥ ādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:51265: ālambanāvidūryayoḥ iti kim ? avastabdho vṛṣalaḥ śītena /
GS24jvkasipu:51269: veḥ upasargāt avāt ca+uttarasya bhojanārthe svanateḥ sakāsya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51281: pari ni vi ity etebhyāḥ upasargebhyaḥ uttareṣām seva sita saya sivu saha suṭ stu svañja ity eteṣām sakārasya mūrdhanya ādeśaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51332: pūrveṇa+eva siddhe stusvañjigrahaṇam uttarārtham, aḍvyavāye vibhāṣā yathā
GS24jvkasipu:51337: sivādīnām aḍvyavāye 'pi parinivibhyaḥ uttarasya sakārasya vā mūrdhanyo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51341: anu vi pari abhi ni ity etebhyaḥ uttarasya syandateḥ aprāṇiṣu sakārasya vā mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:51354: prāṇyaprāṇiviṣayasya api syandateḥ ayam vikalpo bhavati, anuṣyandete
GS24jvkasipu:51359: veḥ upasargād uttarasya skandeḥ sakārasya mūrdhanyo vā bhavati aniṣṭhāyām
GS24jvkasipu:51366: pariśabdād uttarasya skandeḥ sakārasya vā mūrdhanyo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51373: pṛthagyogakaraṇasāmarthyāt aniṣthāyām ity etan na anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:51377: pariskandaḥ iti mūrdhanyābhāvo nipātyate prācyabharateṣu prayogaviṣayeṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:51378: pūrvena mūrdhanye prāpte tad abhavo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:51386: sphuratisphulatyoḥ sakārasya nis ni vi ity etebhyaḥ uttarasya vā mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51395: veḥ uttarasya skabhnāteḥ sakārasya nityaṃ mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51403: iṇantād aṅgāt uttareṣāṃ ṣīdhvaṃluṅliṭāṃ yo dhakāraḥ tasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51415: arthavadgrahaṇād api siddham ? tat tu nāśritam //
GS24jvkasipu:51418: iṇaḥ parasmāt iṭa uttareṣāṃ ṣīdhvaṃluṅliṭāṃ yo dhakāraḥ tasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati vibhāṣā
GS24jvkasipu:51424: atha iha kathaṃ bhavitavyam, upadidīyidhve ? kecidāhuḥ, iṇantād aṅgād uttarasya iṭa ānantaryaṃ yuṭā vyavahitam iti na bhavitavyaṃ ḍhatvena iti /
GS24jvkasipu:51425: apareṣāṃ darśanam, aṅgāt iti nivṛttam, iṇaḥ ity anuvartate, tataś ca yakārād eva inaḥ paro 'nantaraḥ iṭ iti pakṣe bhavitavyaṃ mūrdhanyena iti
GS24jvkasipu:51428: saṅgasakārasya aṅguleḥ uttarasya mūrdhanya ādeśo bhavati samāse /
GS24jvkasipu:51432: samāse iti kim ? aṅguleḥ saṅgaṃ paśya //
GS24jvkasipu:51437: samāse ity eva, bhīroḥ sthānaṃ paśya //
GS24jvkasipu:51440: agneḥ uttarasya stut stoma soma ity eteṣāṃ sakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati samāse /
GS24jvkasipu:51445: tena iha na bhavati, agnisomau māṇavakau /
GS24jvkasipu:51446: tathā ca jyotir agniḥ, somaḥ latāviśeṣaḥ, agnisomau tiṣṭhataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51450: jyotis āyus ity etābhyām uttarasy stomasakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati samāse /
GS24jvkasipu:51453: samāse ity eva, jotiḥ stomaṃ darśayati //
GS24jvkasipu:51456: mātṛ pitṛ ity etābhyām uttarasya svasṛsakārasya samāse mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51461: mātur pitur ity etābhyām uttarasya svasṛśabdasya anyatarasyāṃ mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati samāse
GS24jvkasipu:51464: mātuḥ pituḥ iti rephāntayor etad grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:51465: ekadeśavikṛtasya ananyatvād visarjanīyāntā sakārāntāt ca ṣatvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51466: samāse ity eva, vākye mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:51467: mātuḥ svasā ity eva nityaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:51470: abhinis ity etasmāt uttarasya stanatisakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati anyatarasyāṃ śabdasañjñāyāṃ gamyamānāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:51477: upasargasthān nimittāt prādusśabdāc ca+uttarasya yakāraparasya acparasya ca astisakārasya mūrdhanyo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51490: atha asatyapi astigrahaṇe sakāram eva prati upasarga āśrīyate,
GS24jvkasipu:51491: prāduḥśabdasya ca kṛbhvastiṣv eva prayogaḥ iti anyatrāprasaṅgaḥ ? tathāpi etat pratyudāhartavyam, anusūte anusūḥ, anusvo 'patyaṃ ānuseyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51492: śubhrāditvāḍ ḍhak (*4,1.123), ḍhe lopo 'kadrvāḥ (*6,4.147) iti uvarnalopaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51498: su vi nir dur ity etebhyaḥ uttarasya supi sūti sama ity eteṣāṃ sakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:51513: supeḥ ṣatvaṃ svapermā bhūd visuṣvāpeti kena na /
GS24jvkasipu:51515: sthādīnāṃ niyamo nātra prāk sitāduttaraḥ supiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51517: pūrvatrāsiddhīyamadvirvacane iti kṛte ṣtve tato dvirvacanam //
GS24jvkasipu:51520: ni nadī ity etābhyām uttarasya snātisakārasya mūrdhnyādeśo bhavati kauśale gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:51524: supi sthaḥ (*3,2.4) ity atra supi iti yogavibhāgāt kapratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51529: pratiṣṇātam iti nipātyate sūtraṃ ced bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51536: kapiṣṭhalaḥ nāma yasya saḥ kāpiṣṭhaliḥ putraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51537: gotre iti kim ? kapeḥ sthalam kapisthalam //
GS24jvkasipu:51543: agragāmini iti kim ? prasthe himavataḥ puṇye /
GS24jvkasipu:51547: viṣṭaraḥ iti nipātyate vṛkṣe āsane ca vācye /
GS24jvkasipu:51555: vipūrvāt stṛ ity etasmād dhātoḥ chandonāmni ca (*3,3.34) ity evaṃ vihito
GS24jvkasipu:51556: ghañ iti viṣṭaraḥ ity api prakṛte viṣṭāraḥ iti vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:51565: gośabdād ahalantād api etasmād eva nipātanāt saptamyā alug bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:51568: vi ku śami pari ity etebhyaḥ uttarasya sthalasakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51576: amba āmba go bhūmi savya apa dvi tri ku śeku śaṅku aṅgu mañji puñji parame barhis divi agni ity etebhaḥ uttarasya sthaśabdasakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51602: śobhanaṃ sāma yasya asau suṣāmā brāhmaṇaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51607: suśabdasya karmapravacanīyasañjñākatvān nirdurśabdayoś ca kriyāntaraviṣayatvād anupasargatve sati pāṭho 'yam /
GS24jvkasipu:51616: ṅyāpoḥ sañjñāchandasor bahulam (*6,3.63) iti pūrvapadasya hrasvatvam /
GS24jvkasipu:51623: ekāraparasya sakārasya mūrdhanyādeśaḥ bhavati iṇkor uttarasya agakārāt parasya sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye
GS24jvkasipu:51628: sañjñāyām iti kim ? pṛthvī senā yasya sa pṛthuseno rājā /
GS24jvkasipu:51632: nakṣatravācinaḥ śabdād uttarasya sakārasya vā eti sañjñāyām agakārāt mūrdhanyo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51639: hrasvād uttarasya sakārasya mūrdhanyādeeśo bhavati tādau taddhite parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51640: tarap tamap taya tva tal tyap, etāni prayojayanti /
GS24jvkasipu:51655: pratyayasakārasya sāt padādyoḥ (*8,3.111) iti saty api pratiṣedhe prakṛtisakārasya syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:51662: nisaḥ sakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati tapatau parato 'nāsevane 'rthe /
GS24jvkasipu:51666: anāsevane iti kim ? nistapati suvarṇaṃ suvarṇakāraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51668: niṣṭaptaṃ rakṣo niṣṭaptā arātayaḥ ity atra sadapyāsevanaṃ na vivakṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:51672: yuṣmat tat tatakṣus ity eteṣu takārādiṣu parataḥ sakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo
GS24jvkasipu:51681: antaḥpādam iti kim ? yanma ātmano mindābhūdagnistatpunarāhārjatavedā vica
GS24jvkasipu:51684: yajuṣi viṣaye yuṣmattattatakṣuḥṣu parata ekeṣām ācāryāṇāṃ matena sakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:51692: stuta stoma ity etayoḥ sakārasya chandasi viṣaye mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati ekeṣāmācāryāṇāṃ matena
GS24jvkasipu:51695: pūrvapadāt ity eva siddhe prapañcārtham idam //
GS24jvkasipu:51698: chandasi iti vartate, ekeṣām iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:51699: pūrvapadasthānnimittāt parasya sakārasya murdhanyādeśo bhavati chandasi viṣaye ekeṣāmācāryāṇāṃ matena /
GS24jvkasipu:51705: asamāse 'pi yat pūrvapadaṃ tadapi iha gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:51709: suñ iti nipāta iha gṛhyate, tasya pūrvapadasthānnimittāt uttarasya
GS24jvkasipu:51718: anaḥ iti kim ? gosaniṃ vācamudeyam pūrvapadāt ity eva siddhe niyamārtham idam /
GS24jvkasipu:51719: atra kecit savanādipāṭhād gosanirniyamasya phalaṃ na bhavati iti sisānayiṣati iti prayudāharanti
GS24jvkasipu:51724: pṛtanā ṛta ity etābhyām uttarasya sahisakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51728: ṛtīṣaham ity atra api yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:51730: avagrahe tu ṛtisaham ity eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51734: rephaparasya sakārasya sṛpi sṛji spṛśi spṛhi savanādīnāṃ ca mūrdhanyo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51737: spṛpi - purā krūrasya visṛpaḥ sṛji - vāco visarjanāt /
GS24jvkasipu:51749: aśvasanigrahaṇam aniṇo 'pi ṣatvam asti iti jñāpanārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:51750: tena jalāṣāham, aśvaṣāham ity etat siddhaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51765: sāt ity etasya padādeś ca mūrdhanyādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51775: sicaḥ sakārasya yagi parato mūrdhanyādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51778: upasargāt iti yā prāptiḥ sā padādilakṣaṇam eva pratiṣedhaṃ bādhate, na sico yaṅi iti /
GS24jvkasipu:51783: gatau vartamānasya sedhateḥ sakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51789: pratistabdha nistabdha ity etau mūrdhanyapratiṣedhāya nipātyete /
GS24jvkasipu:51803: stambhu sivu saha ity eteṣāṃ caṅi parataḥ sakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51804: stanbheḥ (*8,3.77) iti, parinivibhyaḥ iti ca prāptaḥ mūrdhanyaḥ pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:51812: upasargādyā prāptiḥ tasyāḥ eva pratiṣedho yathā syāt, abhyāsādyā prāptiḥ tasyā mā bhūt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:51816: sunoteḥ sakārasya mūrdhanyadeśo na bhavati sye sani ca parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51822: na+etad asti prayojanam, tatra stautiṇyor eva ṣaṇyabhyāsāt (*8,3.71) iti niyamāt na bhaviṣyati
GS24jvkasipu:51823: idaṃ tarhi, abhisusūṣate ? etad api na asti, sthādiṣv abhyāsena ca
GS24jvkasipu:51825: idaṃ tarhi, abhisusūṣateḥ apratyayaḥ abhisusūḥ ity udāharanam iti ? atra hi sanṣabhūto na bhavati ity abhyāsāt prāptir asti /
GS24jvkasipu:51829: sadi ṣvañja ity etayoḥ dhātvoḥ liṭi parataḥ sakārasya parasya mūrdhanyaḥ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51836: svañjeḥ saṃyogāntād api vibhāṣā liṭaḥ kittvam icchanti iti pakṣe
GS24jvkasipu:51840: ni vi abhi ity etebhyaḥ upasargebhyaḥ uttarasya sakārasya aḍvyavāye chandasi viṣaye mūrdahnyādeśo na bhavati vā /
GS24jvkasipu:51844: sadiṣvañjor iti tad iha na anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:51846: vyaṣṭaut, vyastaut, abhyaṣṭaut, abhyastaut ity etad api siddhaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:51847: iti vāmanakāśikāyāṃ vṛttau aṣṭamādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51851: rephaṣakārābhyām uttarasy nakārasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati, samānapadasthau cen nimittanimittinau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51858: ṣagrahaṇam uttarārtham, ṣṭutvena+eva hi siddham etat /
GS24jvkasipu:51867: avarnabhaktyā ca vyavadhāne 'pi ṇatvaṃ bhavati iti kṣubhnādiṣu nṛnamanatṛpnotigrahaṇaṃ jñāpakam
GS24jvkasipu:51868: athavā ṛvarṇād api ṇatvaṃ bhavati iti etad eva anena jñāpyate //
GS24jvkasipu:51871: aṭ ku pu āṅ num ity etair vyavāye 'pi rephaṣākārabhyām uttarasya nakārasya
GS24jvkasipu:51889: aḍvyavāye iti siddhe āṅgrahaṇaṃ padavyavāye ity asya pratiṣedhasya bādhanārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:51893: tena tṛṃhaṇam, tṛṃhaṇīyam ity atra anusvāravyavāye numabhāve 'pi ṇatvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51894: saty api ca numi yatra anusvāro na śrūyate tatra na bhavati, prenvanam,
GS24jvkasipu:51896: vyavāyopalakṣaṇārthatvād aḍādīnām iha vyastaiḥ samastair vyavāye 'pi
GS24jvkasipu:51900: pūrvapadasthān nimittād uttarasya gakāravarjitād nakārasya ṇakāra ādeśo bhavati sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:51907: kecid etan niyamārthaṃ varṇayanti, pūrvapadāt sañjñāyām eva ṇatvaṃ na anyatra iti /
GS24jvkasipu:51908: samāse 'pi hi samānapade nimittanimittinor bhāvād asti pūrveṇa prāptiḥ iti sa ca niyamaḥ pūrvapadasambadhād uttarapadasthasya+eva ṇatvaṃ nivartayati,
GS24jvkasipu:51909: carmanāsikaḥ iti, na taddhitapūrvapadasthasya, khārapāyaṇaḥ, mātṛbhonīṇaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:51911: agaḥ iti yogavibhāgena ṇatvapratiṣedhaḥ, na niyamapratiṣedhaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:51912: apare tu pūrvasūtre samānam eva yan nityaṃ padaṃ tat samānapadam ity āśrayanti, samānagrahaṇāt
GS24jvkasipu:51913: teṣām aprāptam eva ṇatvam anena nidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:51914: samāse hi pūrvapadottaravibhāgād asamānapadatvam apy asti iti //
GS24jvkasipu:51918: puragā miśraka sighrakā śārikā koṭarā agre ity etebhyaḥ pūrvapadebhyaḥ uttarasya vananakārasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:51925: siddhe satyārambho niyamārthaḥ, etebhya eva parasya vananakārasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati, na anyebhyaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:51932: pra nir antar śara ikṣu plakṣa āmra kārṣya khadira pīyūkṣā ity etebhyaḥ uttarasya vananakārasya sañjñāyām asañjñāyām api ṇakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51946: oṣadhivāci yat pūrvapadaṃ vanaspativāci ca tatsthān nimittād uttarasya vananakārasya ṇakāra ādeśo bhavati vibhāṣā /
GS24jvkasipu:51959: satyapi bhede vṛkṣavanaspatyor iha bhedena grahaṇaṃ draṣtavyam //
GS24jvkasipu:51962: adantaṃ yat pūrvapadaṃ tatsthān nimittād uttarasya ahno nakārasya ṇakāra ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51968: ahnaḥ ity akārāntagrahaṇād dīrghāhnī śarad ity atra na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:51971: āhitavāci yat pūrvapadaṃ tatsthān nimittād uttarasy avāhananakārasya ṇakāra ādeśo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:51975: vāhane yad āropitam uhyate tad āhitam ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:51980: pānanakārasya pūrvapadasthān nimittād uttarasya deśābhidhāne ṇakāra ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51983: kṣīraṃ pānaṃ yeṣāṃ te kṣīrapāṇā uśīnarāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51988: deśe iti kim ? dākṣīṇāṃ pānam dākṣipānam //
GS24jvkasipu:51991: bhāve karaṇe ca yaḥ pānaśabdaḥ tadīyasya nakārasya ṇakāra ādeśo bhavati vā pūrvapadasthānimittād uttarasya /
GS24jvkasipu:52003: prātipadikānte numi vibhaktau ca yo nakāraḥ tasya pūrvapadasthānnimittād uttarasy vā ṇakāra ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52011: iha hina bhavati, gargāṇāṃ bhaginī gargabhaginī /
GS24jvkasipu:52012: yadā tv evaṃ bhavati, gargāṇāṃ bhago gargabhagaḥ, gargabhago 'syā asti iti gargabhagiṇī iti, tadā mātṛbhogīṇavannityam eva ṇatvena bhavitavyam /
