GS24jvkasipu:52013: māṣavāpiṇī, māṣavāpinī ity atra tu gatikārakopapadānāṃ kṛdbhiḥ saha samāsavacanaṃ prākṣubutpatteḥ iti kṛdantena+eva samāse sati prātipadikasya
GS24jvkasipu:52016: sa hi samudāyabhaktatvād uttarapadasya anto na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52024: ekājuttarapadaṃ yasya sa ekājuttarapadaḥ, tasminn ekājuttarapadasamāse prātipadikāntanuṃvibhaktisu pūrvapadasthānnimittād uttarasya nakārasya ṇakāraḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52031: ṇaḥ iti vartamāne punarṇagrahaṇaṃ vikalpādhikāranivṛtteḥ vispaṣṭīkaraṇārtham //
GS24jvkasipu:52034: kavargavati ca+uttarapade prātipadikāntanuṃvibhaktiṣu pūrvapadasthānnimittād uttarasya nakārasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52046: ṇopadeśasya dhātor yo nakāraḥ tasya upasargasthān nimittād uttarasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati asamāse 'pi samāse 'pi /
GS24jvkasipu:52051: upasargāt iti kim ? pragatā nāyakāḥ asmād deśāt pranāyako deśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52052: asmāse 'pi kim ? pūrvapadādhikārāt samāsa eva syāt iti tadadhikāraṇivṛttidyotanārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:52057: hinu mīnā ity etayoḥ upasargasthān nimittād uttarasya nakārasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52062: hinumīnāgrahaṇe vikṛtasya api bhavati, ajādeśasya sthānivattvāt //
GS24jvkasipu:52065: āni ity etasya loḍādeśasya upasargasthān nimittād uttarasya nakārasya ṇakāradeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52075: ni ity etasya upasargasthānnimittād uttarasya nakārasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati gada nada pata pada ghu mā syāti hanti yāti vāti drāti psāti vapati vahati śāmyati cinoti degdhi ity eteṣu parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52120: neḥ iti vartate, upasargāt iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:52121: akakārādirakhakārādiraṣakārāntaḥ ca upadeśe yo dhātuḥ sa śeṣaḥ, tasmin parataḥ upasargasthānnimittāt uttarasya neḥ nakārasya vibhāṣa ṇakāra ādeśo
GS24jvkasipu:52128: upadeśagrahaṇaṃ kim ? iha ca pratiṣedho yathā syāt, pranicakāra,
GS24jvkasipu:52134: aniteḥ nakārasya upasargasthānnimittād uttarasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52140: upasargasthānnimittāt uttarasya anitinakārasya padānte vartamānasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52145: kecit tu pūrvasūtre eva etad antagrahaṇaṃ sāmīpyārtham abhisambadhnanti /
GS24jvkasipu:52146: nimittasamīpasthaikavarṇavyavahitasya anitinakārasya padānte vartamānasya ṇakārādeśo yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:52148: tair dvitīyam api padāntasya ṇatvārtham antagrahaṇam āśrayitavyam eva /
GS24jvkasipu:52149: yeṣāṃ tu paryaṇiti iti bhavitavyam iti darśanam, teṣāṃ pūrvasūtre na artho
GS24jvkasipu:52153: sābhyāsasya aniteḥ upasargasthān nimittād uttarasya ubhayoḥ nakārayoḥ ṇakāra ādeśo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:52158: pūrvatrāsiddhīyam advirvacane ity etasmin sati pūrveṇa+eva kṛtaṇatvasya dvirvacane kṛte siddham etad antareṇa api vacanam ? etat tu nāśrayitavyam
GS24jvkasipu:52163: akārapūrvasya hantinakārasya upasargasthāt nimittād uttarasya ṇakāra ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52175: vakāramakārāyoḥ parataḥ hantinakārasya upasargasthān nimittād uttarasya vā ṇakārādeśo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:52182: antaḥśabdād uttarasya hantinakārasya atpūrvasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati adeśābhidhāne /
GS24jvkasipu:52191: ayananakārasya ca antaḥśabdād uttarasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati adeśābhidhāne /
GS24jvkasipu:52198: ṛkārāntād avagrahāt pūrvapadād uttarasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:52201: atra hi nṛmaṇāḥ, pitṛyāṇam iti ṛkāro 'vagṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:52202: avagrahagrahaṇaṃ kimartham ucyate, yāvatā saṃhitādhikāra ā
GS24jvkasipu:52204: avagṛhyamāṇād yathā syāt, anavagṛhyamāṇāt mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:52208: nas ity etasya nakārasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati dhātusthān nimittād uttarasya uruśabdāt ṣuśabdāc ca chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:52217: upasargasthān nimittāt uttarasya naso nakārasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati bahulam /
GS24jvkasipu:52223: bahulagrahaṇād bhāṣāyām api bhavati, praṇasaṃ mukham /
GS24jvkasipu:52227: kṛtsthaḥ yo nakāraḥ acaḥ uttaraḥ tasya upasargasthān nimittād uttarasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:52228: ana, māna, anīya, ani, niṣṭhādeśa ete ṇatvaṃ prayojayanti /
GS24jvkasipu:52247: bhujo kauṭilye, asya niṣṭhāpratyayaḥ, oditaś ca (*8,2.45) iti
GS24jvkasipu:52248: niṣṭhānatvam, coḥ kuḥ (*8,2.30) iti kutve siddhaṃ paribhugnaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:52254: ṇyantād yo vihitaḥ kṛtpratyayaḥ tatsthasya nakārasya upasargasthān nimittāt uttarasya vibhāṣā ṇakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52260: prayapaṇau, prayāpinau, vihitaviśeṣaṇaṃ kim ? prayapyamāṇam ity atra yakā vyavadhāne 'pi yathā syāt iti //
GS24jvkasipu:52264: halādiḥ yo dhāturijupadhaḥ tasmāt paro yaḥ kṛtpratyayaḥ tatsthastha nakārasya aca uttarasya upasargasthān nimittād uttarasya vibhāṣā ṇakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52276: halaḥ iti vartate, tena iha sāmarthyāt tadantavidhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52277: ijādeḥ sanumaḥ halantād dhātoḥ vihito yaḥ kṛt, tatsthasay nakārasya upasargasthān nimittāt uttarasya ṇakāro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52284: siddhe satyārambho niyamārthaḥ, ijāder eva sanumaḥ, nānyasmāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:52287: halaḥ ity adhikārād ṇyante nityaṃ vidhyartham etan na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:52291: niṃsa nikṣa ninada ity eteṣāṃ nakārasya upasargasthān nimittāt uttarasya vā ṇakārādeśo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:52298: bhā bhū pū kami gami payāyī vepa ity eteṣām upasargasthāt nimittād uttarasya kṛtsthasya nakārasya ṇakārādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52306: pūṅo hi bhavaty eva ṇatvam, prapavaṇaṃ somasya iti /
GS24jvkasipu:52320: ṣakārāt padantād uttarasya nakārasya ṇakārādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52328: pade antaḥ padāntaḥ iti saptamīsamāso 'yam, tena iha na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:52340: antagrahaṇaṃ ṣāntabhūtapūrvamātrasya api yathā syāt, pranaṅkṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:52352: padena vyavāye 'pi sati nimittanittinoḥ nakārasya nakārādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52363: svādau pūrvaṃ padam iti gośabdaḥ pūrvapadam tena vyavāyaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:52367: kṣubhnā ity evam ādiṣu śabdeṣu nakārasya ṇakāradeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52369: ajādeśasya sthānivadbhāvād iha api pratiṣedho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52374: nandin, nandana, nagara, etāny uttarapadāni sañjñāyāṃ prayojayanti -
GS24jvkasipu:52380: nartana, gahana, nandana, niveśa, nivāsa, agni, anūpa, etāni uttarapadāni prayojayanti
GS24jvkasipu:52381: parinartanam, parigahanam iti sañjñāyām pūrvapadāt sañjñāyām iti prāpnoti
GS24jvkasipu:52382: parinandanam ity atra upasargād asamāse 'pi iti prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:52383: śaraniveśaḥ, śaranivāsaḥ, śarāgniḥ, darbhānūpaḥ ity etāḥ sañjñāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52388: irikā, timira, samīra, kubera, hari, karmāra ity uttarapadavanaśabdasthasya sañjñāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:52393: sakāratavargayoḥ śakāracavargābhyāṃ sannipāte śakāracavargāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52394: stoḥ ścunā iti yathāsaṅkhyam atra neṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:52395: sakārasya śakāreṇa, cavargeṇa, dvābhyām api sannipāte śakāro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52396: tavargasya api ca śakāreṇa, cavargena ca sannipāte cavargo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52397: ādeśe tu yathāsaṅkhyam isyate, sakārasya śakāraḥ, tavargasya ca cavargaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:52423: stoḥ ścau iti saptamīnirdeśo na kṛtaḥ, pūrveṇa pareṇa ca ścunā sannipāte ścutvaṃ yathā syāt iti //
GS24jvkasipu:52427: sakāratavargayoḥ ṣakāraṭvargābhyāṃ sannipāte ṣakāraṭavargāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52454: padāntāṭ ṭavargād uttarasya stoḥ ṣṭutvaṃ na bhavati nām ity etad varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:52457: padāntāt iti kim ? īḍa stutau - īṭṭe /
GS24jvkasipu:52468: tavargasya ṣakāre yaduktaṃ tan na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52475: śakārād uttarasya tavargasya yaduktaṃ tan na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52481: yaraḥ padāntasya anunāsike parataḥ vā anunāsikaḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52495: aca uttarau yau rephahakārau tābhyām uttarasya yaro dve bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52503: acaḥ iti vartate, yaraḥ iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:52504: anacparasya aca uttarasya yaro dve vā bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52509: yaṇo mayo dve bhavata iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:52510: kecid atra yaṇaḥ iti pañcamī, mayaḥ iti ṣaṣṭhī iti vyācakṣate /
GS24jvkasipu:52512: apare tu mayaḥ iti pañcamī, yaṇaḥ iti ṣaṣṭhī iti /
GS24jvkasipu:52514: śaraḥ khayo dve bhavata iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:52515: atra api yadi śaraḥ iti pañcamī, khayaḥ iti ṣaṣṭhī, tadā stthālī, stthātā iti udāharaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:52516: athavā khaya uttarasya śaro dve bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52521: avasāne ca yaro dve bhavata iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:52528: ādini parataḥ ākrośe gamyamāne putraśabdasya na dva bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52531: ākrośe iti kim ? tattvakathane dvirvacanaṃ bhavaty eva, puatrānatti iti puttrādinī /
GS24jvkasipu:52539: cayo dvitīyā bhavanti śari parataḥ pauṣkarasāder ācāryasya matena /
GS24jvkasipu:52547: aco rahābhyāṃ dve (*8,4.46) iti prāptiḥ pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:52555: triprabhṛtiṣu varṇeṣu saṃyukteṣu śākaṭāyanasya matena dvitvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52563: śākalyasya ācaryasya matena sarvatra dvirvacanaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52570: dīrghād uttarasya ācāryāṇāṃ matena na dvitvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52577: jhalāṃ sthāne jaśādeśo bhavati jhaśi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52592: abhyāse vartamānānāṃ jhalāṃ carādeśo bhavati, cakārāj jaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:52612: khari ca parato jhalāṃ carādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52613: jaśgrahaṇaṃ na anuvartate, pūrvasūtre ca anukṛṣtatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:52623: avasāne vartamānānāṃ jhalāṃ vā carādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52630: aṇaḥ apragṛhyasañjñasya avasāne vartamānasya vā anunāsikādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52640: anusvārasya yayi parataḥ prasvarṇaḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52656: iha kurvanti, vṛṣanti ity atra ṇatvasya asiddhatvāt pūrvaṃ nakārasya anusvāraḥ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:52657: tasya api parasavarṇena punar nakāra eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52658: tasya api asiddhatvāt punar ṇatvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52664: padāntasya anusvārasya yayi parataḥ vā parasavarṇādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52665: taṅkathañcitrapakṣaṇḍayamānannabhaḥsthampuruṣo 'vadhīt, taṃ kathaṃ citrapakṣaṃ ḍayamānaṃ nabhaḥsthaṃ puruṣo 'vadhīt //
GS24jvkasipu:52676: udaḥ uttarayoḥ sthā stambha ity etayoḥ pūrvasavarṇādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52702: jhayaḥ iti vartate, anyatarasyām iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:52703: jhaya uttarasya śakārasya aṭi parataḥ chakarādeśo bhavati anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:52710: kiṃ prayojanam ? tacchlokena, tacchmaśruṇā ity evam artham //
GS24jvkasipu:52714: hala uttareṣāṃ yamāṃ yami parato lopo bhavati anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:52715: śayyyā ity atra dvau yakārau, kramajastṛtīyaḥ, tatra madhyamasya vā lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52717: aditer apatyamādityyaḥ ity atra takārāt paraḥ ekaḥ yakāraḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:52718: yaṇo mayaḥ iti kramajo dvitīyaḥ, tatra madhyamasya vā lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52720: ādityo devatā asya sthālīpākasya iti ādityyaḥ ity atra api dvau yakārau kramajastṛtīyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52721: tatra madhyamasya madhyamayor vā lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52728: halaḥ iti vartate, anyatarasyām iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:52729: hala uttarasya jharo jhari savarṇe parato lopo bhavati anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:52730: pratttam, avatttam ity atra trayastakārāḥ, kramajaścaturthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52731: tatra madhyamasya madhyamayor vā lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52732: maruttttaḥ ity atra catvārastakārāḥ kramajaḥ pañcamaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52733: tatra madhyamasya madhyamayoḥ madhyamānāṃ vā lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52734: marucchabdasya hi upasaṅkhyānasāmarthyāt aca upasargāttaḥ (*7,4.47) iti tatvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52737: allopasya ca pūrvatra asiddhe na sthānivat iti sthānivadbhāvapratiṣedhāt cakārasya ñakāre lopaḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:52740: savarṇagrahaṇasāmarthyāt iha saṅkhyātānudeśo na bhavati, savarṇamātre lopo vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:52741: tena śiṇḍhi, piṇḍhi iti ḍhakāre ḍakārasya lopo bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:52749: asya svaritasya asiddhatvāt anudāttaṃ padam ekavarjam (*6,1.158) ity etan na pravartate
GS24jvkasipu:52753: udattodayasya svaritodayasya ca anudāttasya svarito na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52761: tasminnudātte parato gārgyaśabdaḥ svarito na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52764: kvaśabdaḥ svaritaḥ, tasmin parataḥ anudāttaḥ svarito na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52767: teṣāṃ hi matena svarito bhavaty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:52777: iha śāstre kāryārthamakāro vivṛtaḥ pratijñātaḥ, tasya tathābhūtasya eva
GS24jvkasipu:52778: prayogo mā bhūt iti saṃvṛtapratyāpattir iyaṃ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:52779: dīrghaplutayoś ca anena vivṛtena akāreṇa grahaṇaṃ neṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:52781: saṃvutena ca sarvaguṇasya mātrikasya grahaṇam iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:52785: iti śrīvāmanakāśikāyāṃ vṛttau aṣṭamādhyāyasya turīyaḥ pādaḥ samāptaścāyamadhyāyo granthaśca
